Lectures are interesting if you take the time to attend classes and work for your grades, instead of complaining and expect a free pass. Always available during office hours and goes beyond the call of duty to help us.

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: Olbey is clearly very knowledgeable and passionate about his subject, however class with him was consistently frustrating. He is stubborn and unwilling to admit when he makes mistakes--for example, on a quiz he made an incorrect answer the correct one on the answer key & refused to fix it when confronted by the class. Overall not worth the stress

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: I was hesitant to take this course based off most of these reviews. But I think he's a fair marker, and you can do well on the quizzes/ tests as long as you actually do the readings, pay attention in class, and take notes. If you are taking this in the spring, I would caution against taking another course with it because there is a lot of reading.

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: This is the second class I've taken with this prof. If you show up you get easy attendance marks, plus his lectures are filled with important info for quizzes & exams. He gives the option of creative finals & staggers due dates, ultimately, he is passionate & loves to discuss opossing views and opinions. He's a fair marker, if you put in the work.

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: You must cater to his preference when you write, but other than that his lectures get pretty dull when you just go over the book you've already read. He is a smart prof and you feel like your education is in good hands because of it. I would probably take another course with him even though the load was heavy.

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: I haven't been in a class where I was unaware of how to succeed. Instructions for the assignments were unclear and the feedback was hard to interpret. The lectures are also poorly structured and hard to learn from, as he rambles for most of it. It's hard to tell if he wants you to succeed or if he wants to trick you into getting questions wrong.

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: For ENGL 201 he was a decent professor. Good class to take if you enjoy reading and exploring different themes throughout the books he assigns. He has high expectations for his students but I think it's only so we push ourselves. Made me realize how much I enjoy reading and English in general. Quizzes are extremely easy if you read the books.

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: Buddy sucks. This class had more work than all of my other classes combined....(A quiz every week, marks for attendance, 2 small essays, 1 large essay, midterm and a final) Pretty much tells you that you need to read the textbook and then expects you to read his mind. The highest mark for the second short essay in our class was 79... STAY AWAY!!!!!

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: good luck if you want anything higher than a C. weekly quizzes with the trickiest questions and he goes off on tangents majority of the class. marks for attendance but you cant get your classmates to sign for you because he gets to know your name. will not take another class with him. definitely likes sports and makes sure everyone knows it.

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: Expects way too much out of his students. You need to be able to read his mind to do well on his tests and papers. Has little sympathy for his students when they need help. Avoid him if you can.

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: Dr. Olbey's criteria for all writing assignments are very complicated for no damn reason. His lectures are scattered and he does not have any real sympathy for his students. If you disagree with him, good luck with your C- and dropped GPA. I would not recommend him for the English department or anyone for that matter. Worst prof I have ever had.

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: His lectures have no structure - he literally just talks about whatever pops into his head, and it's difficult to take notes. He sets far too much reading for his weekly quizzes, and I don't think it's right to be tested way more on memorisation than actual analysis and thought in an English class. He's an EXTREMELY harsh marker and just annoying.

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: horrible prof. Guy seems to care more about hitting the gym than helping his students succeed. Aims for a C class average and very unclear instructions.

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: Very engaging professor and is passionate about what he teaches. Too much reading.

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: He has made the achievable for non-major students. Always on top of his back and knows how to make the students work for there grade. He was always prepared for the lectures and made them interesting and brought up new ways of thinking. He does consider attendance and give marks for attending his class. Quizzes, Final Exam, Assignments are there.

Name: Christian William Olbey
Review: Really outlined what his expectations were and what you had to do to get a good grade. Attendance marks were an easy 5% which really helped. Don't rely on Sparknotes, etc. for the reading quizzes and try to participate. Oh, and he marks easier on short stories.

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Dr. Hamilton held very engaging lectures that were entertaining and shorter than the slotted time. Material was covered fast but efficiently and he was always available outside of class to explain. He took notes very fast but they were very well written and posted within 30 min of lecture ending. Final for course was very rushed.

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: he is awesome

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Hamilton is the epitome of a beauty. He's hilarious, understanding, RIPPED, and super smart. He does cover content quite quickly, but for MATH275 thats necessary. To refresh your minds, he gives a 'fact of the day' every lecture half way through. Notes in this class are quality over quantity. Because of his relaxed teaching I'd use him again 100%

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Answers questions really well and is great at keeping everyone's attention.

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: There's many times you may feel lost, but Ryan is very approachable and as long as you're willing to work hard, you'll do fine!

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Dr. Hamilton is an absolute genius, so caring and respected! If it wasnt for him, I would have dropped this class long back. It was him who motivated me to continue to work hard and helped me so much by giving feedback. He loves Analysis and loves sharing the knowledge he has with students. His teaching style is amazing and easy to understand!

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Facts of day are great, good at explaining and giving resources to help you succeed, and overall attitude during lectures is spectacular.

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Hamilton is one of my favourite profs. He makes lectures engaging with his humour and facts of the day. Learned a lot and had fun doing it. Our lectures always ended in applause for a reason.

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Great professor! The lectures are done very well and the tests are fair. The class is hard but Professor Hamilton posts so much online that it makes the content manageable. He is helpful if you go into his office hours and is overall an amazing professor!

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Very good prof

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Ryan Hamilton is an absolute gem. He loves his work and always brightened everyone's day with his great sense of humor and interesting stories. His pace of teaching was very fast though (too fast for me) which meant I would sometimes be confused after lectures. If you have this problem, definitely make an effort to catch him at his office hours.

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Hamilton is a legend. He makes lectures interesting with his humour and makes math easily understandable by thoroughly explaining examples. He gets you to understand then purely memorize. Facts of the day give lectures a nice twist. At the end of the day, Id still take Hamilton over elsabrouty. After all theres a reason he won 2 awards this year

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Ryan Hamilton manages to make calculus lectures engaging and interesting, which is a feat in itself. He's widely loved by everyone in the lecture, and for good reason. 10/10

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Dr. Hamilton is an amazing professor who teaches difficult concepts in a careful and effective way so that student always learn tons in his classes.

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Definitely my favourite prof, going to his class is what motivated me through the day. His sense of humour is amazing and really cares about his students. Gives lots of practice questions and gives cute little facts of the day. Would love to take another course with him.

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Absolute gem. Hilarious, kind, caring. Has adorable facts of the day. Posts everything he teaches, and tries his best to explain. Midterms and finals were hard, but practice is key. Took his 8am class 4 times a week, he made them doable by being his fabulous self.

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Truly is one of the best profs uofc has to offer. He's so kind & genuinely cares for his students. His lecture notes were very easy to follow, and were in proper detail so most times if you looked back you wouldn't be lost/confused. He's also extremely accessible, in-person & through emails and responds to them very quickly. 10/10 would recommend!

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: He is a great prof who is incredibly engaging, FACTS OF THE DAY! are the best. Teaching pace is acceptable. Only drawback is since he is so incredibly smart, he occasionally assumes you know the ins and outs of these rectal exams called related rates. His midterms and final were brutally hard compared to assignments and quizzes.

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Best teacher ever

Name: Ryan Hamilton
Review: Makes Calculus fun (if that's possible) this was my favourite course this semester mostly thanks to his ability to teach the content in an understand able way. I'm not great at math but I did enjoy his class.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Great prof! Was super passionate and knowledgable. Final for the course is much easier than the midterm. Be ready to draw a ton of graphs in your notes for the second part of the term.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Dr Huddleston is easily the best professor I have ever had the pleasure of being taught by. The course is very content heavy, and posted prior to the lecture so you can follow along. The midterm is harder in comparison to the final, but study regularly and you will succeed. Very well organized !

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Good prof who is very passionate about the subject. First midterm was TOUGH, final was easy. Had exam reviewing sessions and was very helpful with feedback, seemed to care a lot about helping his students improve.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: His lectures were amazing. He was really kind and super funny, kept extremely boring material much more interesting. Approachable outside of class and gave relatively good feedback. 10/10 would take his class again

Name: William Huddleston
Review: A relatable professor. His teaching style is perfect for what the course is. He cares about his students and the course.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: I found Professor Huddleston's lectures very worthwhile as well as entertaining. He was also quick to respond to emails. But attending lecture was practically mandatory in this class since none of the annotated lecture slides were posted online and some of the material couldn't even be found in the textbook.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Huddleston is by far one of the best people that I have EVER met in my life. He is extremely sympathetic, kind, and very compassionate. I 10/10 recommend him as a prof. God bless his soul, this man is gold! Keep it up Huddleston! AMEN

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Great profs, one of the best ones I had in first year. He teaches in a very clear manner. I would definitely take another class with him. He's nice and will help clear up concepts if you ask. Really good powerpoint presentations.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Huddleston is the type of professor that all professors should aspire to be. He lectures in a clear, simple and concise manner, he is clear on deadlines and marking criteria, and he has the most well structured class ever. Clear break times, good TopHat questions, posted old exams for us to study from. Admittedly, the midterm was very difficult.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: I am an alien trying to study human beings as a mission for my overlords. Taking Huddleston's class really did improve my understanding of how life works since he is very organized in his teaching. I found the labs difficult however since my planet has more advance technology and I was not used to the ones here on earth. Overall, a great dude!

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Average teacher, terrible course coordinator. Maintains a pleasant and professional demeanour until you challenge him on the rubric and grading. Would rather bully students into stepping down from addressing inconsistencies or ambiguity in quiz and lab questions than take the time and effort to understand another person's view and adjust.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Awesome professor and is engaging during lectures. I enjoyed his class. You must study very hard for the midterm to pass though.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Huddleston is a solid proffesor who provides clear templates and notes for all his lectures. He did miss up on grading one of our lecture quizzes but your tophat score can replace it anyways.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Honestly the best BIOL prof that I've had so far. He is hilarious and he makes every lecture bearable. You have to work hard to ace his tests though.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Huddleston is an amazing prof. He was funny, kind and approachable. He presented the material in an interesting way and did his best to help everyone succeed in the class. The midterm was unnecessarily hard but that is on all the BIOL241 professors and had they curved it the course would've went much better for lots of students.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Very organized, good one on one. Passionate about the material. The course itself is challenging and there is lots of little things to do all the time that really add up. My advice would be to spend time doing the little things even though it may not seem worth it.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Great instructor, super nice and approachable. You can tell he loves the subject he teaches. Makes a boring class much better.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Mr. Huddleston is a really great lecturer, and he explains things in a really simple way that is easy to understand. Tests were fair, textbook isn't required but going to class is pretty much required because he fills in the lecture slides in class. Overall a great experience, I hope he teaches upper level courses too!

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Funny, engaging, and knowledgeable.

Name: William Huddleston
Review: Friendly guy and he makes the course material interesting.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: I love all the comments here. "He's a nice guy, but the class sucks even though he's the course coordinator, so I'll give him a 5/5". It's like saying hey, I'll hire a plumber to fix my toilet. He didn't do his job, but I'll give him a 5/5. Worst professor I took in Haskayne. You're better of going to labs for bonus marks on quiz and study at home.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: Norm is a good enough human but is teaching a rather dry and vague course. He was a co author on the required textbook and get ready to know it inside and out. Tests are a little sneaky so dont get caught off guard.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: Norm has a very good heart and means well. He wants students to succeed in their future classes thats why he gives many many presentations so be prepared for that. If you read the textbook thoroughly, you should be able to do well on the quizzes which are worth a lot. Make sure you stay on top of things and work together as a group!

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: The only way you can really dislike this class is if you are put with a bad group.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: Norm as a prof is pretty good. At first, I was very intimaited by him but about a month or two in, I realized he's pretty chill and understanding. If you get wrong answers in class he doesn't embarrass you for it and lectures arent note or slide heavy, so its a nice change. It took some time for me to warm up to Norm, but I liked having him.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: The thing that makes this class terrible, is how the entire class is focused around selling Norm's textbook. The material in this class is so clearly made up and useless with its sole purpose to put money in Norm's pockets. Get ready to spend $180 on an unbound textbook while Norm wastes ALL of your free time with useless group work. WASTE OF TIME!

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: Norm as a prof isn't so bad, it's the course that's awful. He's actually pretty chill and I actually preferred him over Peggy. Get ready to memorize the entire textbook that's written by him for the exams though. Stay on track in this course and pray you get a good group for the project. Show up to class, sometimes there's bonus marks.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: I was initially scared to see I had Norm because a lot of people told me different things. After the first class, he became one of my favourite profs. Very untraditional lecturing (was like conversation), but I actually learned so much and took no notes. The 2 Quizzes (midterms) were super fair, just read the textbook. Norm is truly amazing!

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: I don't know who gives these good ratings, but Norm is one of the worst professors. It's a class of brute memorization and failing the assignment. DO WELL ON THE PPE ASSIGNMENT because everything else is really hard to do well. If you know somebody else that took this course, you can always use theirs because it's the SAME assignment year per year.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: Norm's your best bet for the course (its either Norm or Peggy). You gotta take this course for business so your best bet it to do you part in the group project and make sure you communicate with your group members and STAY ON TRACK! Focus on memorizing that textbook! Those midterms are straight memory (and are worth 55%). Goodluck!

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: Norm is a pretty solid professor. He's been teaching this course for years and the course structure has barely changed. The group project does suck but it isn't impossible to get a decent grade on it. I put more focus into the midterms and it paid off. Grind the textbook into your memory. The in class activities were a blast.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: Norm is condescending and rude, his lectures consist of rambling that's pretty much useless and most of the time not relevant to the textbook. All midterms/quizes /final are based solely on his textbook (which you HAVE to buy). The group project is hell especially if you get stuck with a bad group. Good luck.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: Dr. Althouse is one of few professors that has made it fun to show up to class. The course material itself was quite plain, but that is inescapable. As long as a modest effort is given, all assessments should go well. However, beware the term group project paper. Very low marks intentionally given... try your hardest to find the criteria before.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: Great guy, but the course itself is one of the worst for Business students. Textbook is 100% required, study as hard as you can for the two exams. Lectures aren't mandatory but some are as some activities are graded. Pray for a good group because this course sees a ton of apathetic kids, so be prepared to carry or get carried if you are a slacker.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: I didn't find him too bad, but he definitely wasn't the best teacher I've ever had. He likes to dock off marks on little things that seem very insignificant.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: Great guy, but the term paper is marked very, very hard, but not marked by him ( independent markers), but if you come to class and participate, he will love you. Also gives away free marks on the last few lectures.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: Norm is a very good Prof. I would recommend him over other SGMA profs. You need to show up. there are bonus marks up for grabs and good material. A big group work project that you will likely fail because they want to scare all the business kids. don't be scared. you can pass with Norm and he will help you if need be. Try your best, study hard.

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: The level of work he makes students do, while taking marks off of reports for single periods/commas out of place is ridiculous. He sets the grading so high, that you need to devote all your time to this course simply to receive a B+. His exams consist 100% of regurgitating information you need to memorize from his own written textbook. Nightmare!

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: Norm is amazing. I love reading people complain about him here because if you show up (ON TIME) and do your readings, he will show you the upmost respect. If you disrespect him, he will reciprocate. Read the textbook. He wrote it so obviously the midterms are word of word from the book. Work hard on the project, its worth a lot (especially grammar)

Name: Norman Althouse
Review: Wow, what can I say about Norm. His lectures were nothing short of boring and his attitude pompous to say the least. The amount of mistakes he makes during class and question period needs to be addressed. Students are failing courses because of the lack of proper instruction. Textbook not used. No help available from Norm if you get a bad group.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: One of my best profs. So caring and always ready to help. I havent met a prof like that in a long time. Listens to feedback and goes above and beyond to give us any tool to help succeed. So accessible too! I have met with her so many times. So helpful

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: Im finishing my degree and she is the best prof Ive had so far. Loving her in BIOL 331. Rarely found a prof that actually cares about how I learn. Loving the flipped class  been able to study at my own pace in my own way. Loving my team too.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: She is amazing! She cares so much about our learning and gives us every single possible study tool. Super accessible and gave us two review sessions for midterm. Don't be afraid to reach out to her for help. So helpful! I learned so much from this course -- thought I would hate cell bio but did not because of her.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: Don't be deceived by the good reviews. Even though she is super enthusiastic, you will not learn a single thing from her. She teaches basically nothing in lectures and make you listen to podcasts at home on your own time. Class time was just used for team activities. She made the course way too easy but didn't teach anything. She also DOESN'T REPLY

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: Loving her! Actually feel like I am learning not just memorizing. This is what I came to university for. Loving the group problems. Its nice to have teammates to work with.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: I really love the flipped BIOL 331. I am learning so much more than just sitting in class listening to lectures. I actually get to practice right away and really know what I am learning. I wish other courses would do this. I actually get why reading and prepping before class work and am doing this for my other courses. Thanks Dr. B-N!

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: I really wanted to like Barrette-Ng as a prof, she's enthusiastic, but her classes are a disaster. She uses flipped learning, which theoretically could work, but in reality there is so much time is wasted on little group assignments, and then you have to teach yourself all the material as her lecture and summary notes do not go in-depth at all.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: Really great prof. Actually cares about us and doesnt just lecture at us. I feel like she really wants me to learn. Loving the flipped class so far.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: Don't listen to the other posts. The quizzes are super easy and only worth 1%. They are really helping me break down the material and help me understand. She is a great prof and I love what she is doing with the class.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: She thinks shes doing good things but she made me depressed

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: She puts stuff on quizzes that you only have 2 days to study for that she never stresses. They are cumulative but you dont know that. Her teaching style is all over the place and probably results in more passing but lower overall grades.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: I loved this prof. She encouraged me and I felt motivated. Lectures were clear and she gave us lots of practice questions. Even offered two review sessions for final exam.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: I really loved Barrette-Ngs energy and passion, but her teaching style was so convoluted, confusing, and messy. She was all over the place. I think it was a case of a professor being too good in their field and not knowing how to dumb it down enough for students.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: Dr. Barrette-Ng was excellent. I really loved her as a teacher. She expects a lot from you, so you have to study. You can't cram the night before the exam because you need to apply your knowledge. The final was tough, but fair. Super accessible for help. Learned a lot.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: Not a fan of her as a teacher. She starts her portion of the lectures emphasizing that she will help you learn and make sure you are prepared for labs and all the material in the course. I would strongly disagree. The course is very unorganized and the labs are a waste of time. She completely under prepares students for the final exam. Watch out!

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: The course content was interesting, and Dr. Barrette-Ng did her best to communicate her enthusiasm to the class. However, she rarely responded to individual emails and was sometimes dismissive of questions asked during class. Also, this course relies on group work, so if that isn't your thing, be ready for it.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: Overall, she is a good prof but not as good as in BIOL 311. Does not respond to emails for MONTHS, and won't address questions in person either. SO MUCH GROUP WORK. Assigns groups for tutorials, then makes you sit together in lecture as well. Good lectures and explanations though. Midterm exam was difficult (application style questions).

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: Amazing lecturer and teacher, really cares about students' success and puts in a lot of work. That being said, she really expects you to put the same work in, and her exams are difficult.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: Dr. Barrette-Ng is one of the best profs in the Biology department. She constantly reinforces lecture materials through concept maps and posts many practice problems. Her assignments and exams were tricky with lots of concept applications, but they are quite fair and reasonable if you have a thorough understanding of the material.

Name: Isabelle Barrette-Ng
Review: she is simply amazing! Stick to her notes and road map and you will be golden

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: She could be confusing but still managed to get the full content across. Set up grading so that class participation in the form of TopHat would replace your lowest quiz grade. Class was curved. Professor was always available outside of class and very passionate. Not the best presenter but still very knowledgeable. I got more out of one on ones.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: Awful prof and her style of teaching is awful as well. Class is easy especially if you did good in chem 30.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: She is a wonderful person and is very passionate about Chemistry, however her lectures are so confusing. She makes every single concept way too complicated and answers questions with bizarre metaphors. She makes such an easy class a nightmare to understand. Also her notes are kind of a mess. However, I do enjoy her TopHats.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: Too many tophats and not enough examples.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: I think you can really benefit from going to her lectures if you read the notes before going into them. But going into a lecture without reading anything is suicidal. She's willing to put in hours into explaining a concept to you after class. I think she might be underrated, but hey, that's just my opinion.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: She explained everything assuming you already know it. Lectures where almost purely top hats without answer explanation

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: Shes a very nice person and easily approachable outside of class if you need extra help. However, coming from a good Chem 30 background this class was very confusing and very difficult. You cant be successful unless practice the material a lot and read the textbook. Requires a lot of self-studying to make concepts less complicated and confusing.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: She explains the material explicitly, and performs experiments (demos) during lectures. One of the awesomest profs ever, she has flexible office hours and willing to sit with students whenever she has time to go over what they didnt get in lecture.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: She does not teach content like most are use to, her class is a way to practice and ensure you know which concepts to focus on. I didn't think she was going to be a good fit for me, but I actually enjoyed her teaching style. She's easy to talk to, and extremely approachable. She helped me be successful in this class.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: Dr. Mozol is actually a very good prof, interacts with students and is always willing to answer questions.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: Mozol is clearly a caring professor and is knowledgeable but something is lacking when she teaches. The tophats are a good way to engage students, but it still is not enough. The notes she goes by are okay but not something you can use to study. Something is missing in the way she conveys or maybe the notes? but I can't put my finger on it.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: She is actually a very caring and passionate prof and deserves better ratings. She is always willing to answer questions and makes an effort to be available for office hours every day. If the class tells her that we're confused, she will not move on until we understand better. Also, she uses good analogies to help you remember stuff

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: Thinks we already know more than we do and only teaches of top hat questions

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: Honestly... the class i took with her was more useless than my appendix. I learnt the entire course from the textbook because every time I went to the class I almost always left more confused than when I just went over the content on my own. She treats each class like a review of the readings assigned rather than actually teaching it.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: Honestly, I dont understand why people are complaining so much. If you pay attention to what she says you can understand just fine, and her tophats help you keep up with the material and arent that bad. Sometimes she messes up but she always recognizes it and has a good sense of humour about it. Not the best prof ever, but nowhere near the worst

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: She makes very simple concepts from high school chemistry extremely confusing and nonsensical. She purposely tries to trick her students during tophat questions, opting to go off technicalities rather than fundamental concepts. She often answers the questions wrong and confused the entire class. If you are in engineering chem I'm sorry.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: Her explanations in lecture leave out a lot of important details; when you go back to look at your notes, it is often hard to understand because they lack crucial points. She starts to explain new material one lecture before the actual midterm; Dr. Mozo does not spend a lot of time explaining new material but prefers to do top hat review ):

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: Nice person and tries her best to help. Unfortunately, her style of teaching lectures left everyone confused but her powerpoints themselves were very helpful. Read the textbook a lot and her notes and do as many past exams as possible.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: Dr. Mozol clearly knows what she's teaching, she just doesn't know how to teach. Her lectures tend to have very little cohesion or structure and she relies heavily on TopHat questions for live quizzing during class. She teaches as if everyone already knows what she's telling them. Read the textbook.

Name: Vivian Mozol
Review: Mozol is the worst professor I have ever seen, I will try to make a valid argument why. Dont get me wrong she is apparently a good person, but a terrible professor , she is more of a review section honestly. She will be assuming you did just know everything already and is there to review. My tip is study as much as you can alone.

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: One of the best people Ive ever met. 10/10

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: She is always late and irresponsible. When it is her duty to signed off on forms she's always coming up with miscellaneous excuses. One time she even lost my form. I wouldn't trust her with even the most minute things like signing off a form for any administrative purposes, registration deadlines etc.

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: The sweetest person youll ever meet. Love her!

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: Nancy is a good prof, fairly accessible outside class for help and a very friendly lady. She does lag behind the lecture schedule initially so some chapters may get rushed through. She mostly gets you to read the notes before class and then just works on examples during lecture. Tests are fair but looooong so don't waste any time while writing.

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: Worst Stats prof available. Seems to think homework is necessary for things she hasn't taught yet. Inconsistent pacing, where you learn somethings literally the day before an exam. Examples are ridiculously easy compared to what's found on the tests. Teaches how to do everything on the computer instead of by hand. AVOID!

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: Nice woman, but not a great lecturer. Can't tell you much else as I was attending Robison's lectures from the second week of classes - on. Moves slowly compared to other prof's and the lectures are pretty dry. Didn't help that it was at 9AM... Very easy course though.

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: Nancy is probably one of the worst professors I've had the misfortune of getting. Her examples are very inconsistent with what you have to do on assignments and exams. She focuses mostly on Tophat questions, some of which we haven't even covered in class, and her pacing is horrendous. We went through 1 section for over 2 weeks because we're behind.

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: She does not cover anything in lectures. She only does Tophat questions on stuff she has not taught yet and expects you to know what shes doing. She is all over the place in her teaching and makes mistakes all the time. Midterm quizzes had mistakes in them and threw you off because the mistakes contradicted what you knew.

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: Constantly makes mistakes when going through examples in her notes which just confuses you more. Moves too quickly through notes and spends too long on TopHat questions. Never seems to be able to figure out how to center her notes on screen so your notes are always cut off. Generally very irritating. Always needs correction from her students.

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: She is not good at explaining things and not very competent in general.

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: Chibry really doesn't seem to care.  She gives easy examples as notes that pale in comparison to quizzes and exams and assigns videos of concepts when she runs out of time to cover them.  She was also conveniently away for the week of the exam...  I suggest avoiding her for this difficult course.

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: Tries to be funny but really just annoys the whole class.

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: Annoying,  and has huge mood swings.

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: Nnacy didn't write the final but her quizzes are fair comapred to the other sections. You have to watch all the videos she posts if you want to get a good mark and havent bought the book. She really wants her class to do well so she tries to bring up marks as much as she can. The class is really tough but shes one of the best profs for stats

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: STATS 321 is known to be the toughest Stats course in the department. So, it's no surprise that most students found it difficult. But Nancy is one of the most caring profs. She offers extra marks through TopHat, provides the notes to print and bring to class (answers are filled during class), posts videos of qs that can't be solved in class,etc.

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: Hands down one of the most horrible professors at U of C. She claims that she cares for her students but she doesn't at all. Shows up late for her office hours or sometimes she is not there at all. She also doesn't go into depth but briefly summarizes on what we should know. Take this Robison or Stallard. At least they go into depth

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: When we fell behind in the first week, she had no urgency in catching up and spent too much time on top hat questions. I studied hard and went into the final with an A, but the final was IMPOSSIBLE! No amount of studying could have prepared anybody for that exam. It tested your reading comprehension skills rather than your STATS skills. Stay away!

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: Easily the hardest class you will take in University so it doesn't really help which professor you take it with. Nancy was always behind in class and a bid reason for that was the endless amount of tophat questions she would use during lectures. The final IS SO INSANE that someone collapsed in the middle of it and people were crying after.

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: It always seemed that Nancy was rushed and she did not seem to know where the class was at even though students were failing her exams left and right. She was hard to reach outside of class and did not even attend the final exam. The number of tophat questions was ridiculous and the final was beyond this world. Avoid this class unless it's required

Name: Nancy Chibry
Review: Doesn't actually teach during class and was behind schedule after first week. kept spending too long on examples and never had time for proofs, kept posting videos made by a different prof online as proofs and they were very poor quality.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Don't let the negative reviews turn you away from Dr. Hunt. So far, he is by far the best prof I've had! His notes are strategically made for you to fill in the key concepts, his lectures are very informative and interesting and he's extremely helpful in office hours. You just walk in and he'll keep explaining until it clicks for you! 10/10!

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Chemistry 515 was a tough course but he walked us through it well.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Dr. Hunt was a good prof. Some concepts in organic chem are difficult to understand, but Dr. Hunt does a good job of explaining them. He seems mean and not approachable, but if you ask for help in office hours, he will gladly help. If you attend lecture, do all practice sets, the old exams, and go to his office hours, you'll get a good mark.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: He is horrible. He should be reported. He seems very insecure and immature to be constantly having temper tantrums in class

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: I had the professor last year and had a very poor experience. He got angry that the class because we failed to participate when he asked us a question and threw his headset on the table and stormed out. He did come back a few minutes later to continue. Embarrassed multiple student for simply asking a question(reason for the lack of participation).

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Dr. Hunt seems a bit scary, but he teaches CHEM 559 well! It's a spectroscopy course and he's very good at teaching it. He always tries to make the class more interactive and engaging by letting us work in groups. His exams were fair and consistent with the past versions. I recommend him because he's a good teacher.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Ian Hunt gets a bad reputation but honestly, he is a good prof. He was really good at explaining difficult topics and his notes were really good for studying for the final. OChem is a hard class but he made it a lot easier for me to get through.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Lecture notes were terribly organized in sync with tutorials. Hunt was decent at explanations but wasn't approachable at all... which any competent prof should be. He continues to put students down at every chance he gets (emails, test reviews, even lecture explanations, yes lecture note explanations) and makes it difficult to ask questions.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: The way he set up the course was not appropriate at all and does not give you a chance to do good in course. He uploads practice worksheets without answer keys which is really "helpful", so thanks for that. And the hardest material of the course was taught in the last two lectures, which were rushed, and that correlates to more than halfontheFINAL

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Awful professor. Notes are copy-pastes from the website but attendance is essentially mandatory. If you don't understand something it's your fault and you should work harder, not ask him. I'm a fan of dry humour but this guy just isn't funny. 90 is an A+ so it isn't too bad but it's the same for any 351/353 prof.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Feel sorry for the below rater. ian hunt has a way of humiliating students who ask honest questions. He has a problem with people who just want to improve and understand very complicated problems, that he himself designs to fail students.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: I don't like his teaching style at all and he humiliated me for asking questions

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: People get intimidated with organic chemistry and if you don't put in the work you won't do well. Dr. Hunt does a very good job of teaching such a hard subject and is very helpful if you ask for it. Don't be discouraged by the negative ratings, Dr. Hunt is one of the best professors I have ever had at the U of C.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Dr. Hunt knows a lot about organic chemistry and his notes were clear and concise. In that regard he was a pretty good prof BUT, he was extremely rude to the students in his class. He'd get frustrated when people would not answer questions and would make students uncomfortable. Also, I still have nightmares of him banging his hands on his desk.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Teaches concepts but doesn't teach you the process which you need for the exams. Hunt is extremely rude, and if he thinks a question is dumb he will call you out in front of the entire class. As such, he is not approachable at all and students are scared to answer his questions for fear of being wrong and being called out

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Hunt may seem rough on the outside, and he certainly is, but he is also a very smart man who explains detailed information very well. If you ask a question in lecture or challenge him, he will make you feel terrible and everyone will feel bad for you. To his credit, he does try to throw in some humour and make lectures not entirely dull.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Dr. Hunt is not the best, but also not the worst. He comes across as rude in class and in electronic communication, but I thought he was reasonable when approached in person. Study the old midterms and finals like your life depends on it, and really UNDERTSAND reaction mechanisms. Memorizing helps, but you'll eventually hit a wall. Ochem is tough.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: This professor is really terrible. Unreasonably harsh grading standards and high expectations. If you take CHEM 351 with him I feel sorry for you.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Unreasonably hard exams and grading comparing to what he taught.

Name: Ian Hunt
Review: Hard course to begin with, but ontop Hunt does nothing to help students. He is also abrupt on email and condescending in his D2L posts, which is not to be taken personally, he does not like teaching. He should not be course coordinator, and this course needs to be completely changed.

Name: William Holden
Review: Holden is my favourite professor in university. Best lectures, and a hilarious person. Super passionate about what he teaches. Highly recommend taking any of his classes.

Name: William Holden
Review: I've taken elective courses just because Holden was teaching it, he's one of my favourite people I've ever met. Truly cares about his students and is passionate about his work. Attendance isn't mandatory but it helps the material stick since a lot of the exams are memorization. It's not the easiest class but you learn a lot and it's interesting

Name: William Holden
Review: The best prof I had all year. You don't have to go to class to get an A but he is so amazing, you want to go to his class. He is hilarious and a really great guy. Would reccomend taking as many of his classes as you can.

Name: William Holden
Review: Fire it up.

Name: William Holden
Review: Best Prof I've ever had! He literally is the reason I switched into Geography

Name: William Holden
Review: He is such a good prof! His lectures are very interesting and he is hilarious. His tests are just from questions banks that you get from the beginning of the year. Memorize the specific answers and you will get 90 +

Name: William Holden
Review: Best prof i've ever had. I have never met someone who is so hilarious, so passionate, and so caring and willing to help whenever you need it. He will do whatever he can to help you, whether its take you to the printer room and print an entire section of one of his fascinating books he's written, or just to pour you a cup of coffee. Great Guy

Name: William Holden
Review: He is so funny when doing his lectures. He's super nice too when i went to talk to him to fix my midterm grade, i thought i was going to be interrogated but hes super friendly. you dont have to go to class since all the possible test questions are online and the answers are straight from his notes. the TAs mark labs super easy too. great proff

Name: William Holden
Review: Best prof in the school by far. Super hilarious and knows the material super well. He's engaging and interested in what he's teaching, gives you lots of hints for the exams and all the questions are based off of study questions on D2L. Any class you can take with him is well worth it- be prepared that his notes are all handwritten.

Name: William Holden
Review: Super funny. Impossible to fall asleep in his class.

Name: William Holden
Review: Holden makes me want to change my major to geography. Hes that good. If you have the chance to take one of his classes, DO IT. Showing up isnt essential to doing well in his course as he posts everything you need online, but you wont want to miss his lectures. I always leave in a better mood than when I came. Best prof I have ever had.

Name: William Holden
Review: I had two professors that really marked my school years and Dr Holden was one of them! He is not only a good teacher but a hilarious and great human being. + I was able to find the classroom just by hearing his voice from the other end of the hallway. Get ready to laugh! + if you do the work, you'll pass with an A.

Name: William Holden
Review: Amazing man, amazing grading. Hes the epitome of what a great prof is. He literally makes everything simple, his notes are accurate and he teaches at an exceptional pace. Take his class and you shall pass.

Name: William Holden
Review: A great prof, funny, exciting, and passionate. I loved this course and the midterms were relatively easy, but make sure to do as well as possible on the midterms because the final is worth 50% and isnt easy (not impossible but alot of studying is needed). You dont have to go to class because he uploads all the notes but you'll miss out

Name: William Holden
Review: I took a number of courses from him in the early 2000's. I think so fondly of him, I googled him to see what he is doing. By far one of the best University experiences was taking a course from him. If you want to learn about the subject he is teaching and learn valuable life lessons with hilarity, take his courses.

Name: William Holden
Review: You don't have to show up to his class, he made it very apparent on day one. He literally uses his study questions on D2L for his midterms so you just have to cram those and you'll get an easy A in this course. Loved his use of sport analogies during class, and the fact that he uses a hockey stick as a pointer is hilarious.

Name: William Holden
Review: I took Geography 251 with him, and it was by far the easiest class I've ever taken. You don't need to attend lectures because 100% of the test questions come from the study questions he posts, and the answers for those are in the lecture notes which he also posts. Memorize the answers word for word from the notes, show up to tests, easy A.

Name: William Holden
Review: Hands down the best prof ever! He is not only passionate about what he teaches, but is also able to convey it in an incredible way. His enthusiasm just oozes out of him. Atending his lectures wasn't necessary (as he posts everything online), but I still attended every single lecture because that's how good he was! AND IT WAS AN 8AM CLASS!!

Name: William Holden
Review: By far the most unique professor I've ever taken. He's so funny, passionate and respectful all at the same time. He is VERY loud when speaking so take it in the morning so he wakes you up! Also, labs are free marks thrown at you but midterms are fully written but easy seeing as he gives away exam questions in class. One of the best classes I've had

Name: William Holden
Review: If you enjoy a nice shrill atonal alarm in the morning, take Holden's class in the morning, the time of the day where he still has his voice to shout as if you were standing a mile away. I do not like how he uses half of a hockey stick and a pointer or his sports analogies. Yet, he is passionate, honest, and has great respect for other cultures.

Name: Ross Geller
Review: He gave us a lot of homework during Spring Break. WE WERE ON A BREAAAK!

Name: Ross Geller
Review: I don't think he was a real professor because you can't be a professor at that age.

Name: Ross Geller
Review: A few times he looked like hed sprinted across the city to get to class. And his accent was super inconsistent.

Name: Ross Geller
Review: Loved him, very funny! He used to bring in his capuchin Marcel as a guest lecturer.

Name: Ross Geller
Review: A really good professor.

Name: Ross Geller
Review: An awesome professor, even tho hes one of the toughest ones for the toughest subject of mankind. There are two girls in my class, one named Emily and the other one Rachel. This professor has a habit of confusing their names together. He has such a passion for dinosaurs and has a huge thing for this absurd concept called UNAGI !!!! LMFAO !

Name: Ross Geller
Review: Professor Geller was so warm and passionate about dinosaurs! Lots of homework during break, lol.

Name: Ross Geller
Review: I dont know about this guy, I always hear him in the hallway randomly screaming "UNAGI"! at people behind their back. STAY AWAY

Name: Ross Geller
Review: First day of class he was ridiculously late. Something having to run across campus from his last class. Literally walked in and introduced himself and the bell rang. Plus sometimes he talks in British accents. Theres also a rumor that hes in love with a male student and bumped up his grade because of it

Name: Ross Geller
Review: The first class after Easter vacation he asked why I hadn't submitted a response to the articles he posted. All I said was we were on a break, and he totally flipped out on me!

Name: Ross Geller
Review: He's a total hottie! Take the class, just so you can look at his face. I dated him briefly, pretty good kisser. -Elizabeth

Name: Ross Geller
Review: professor geller is superrrr passionate about dinosaurs, he even made velociraptor sounds. hes either super hilarious or boring. i think his personal life gets in the way of grading because he gave the entire class a B on an essay. But he did give a couple kids extra credit who told him they loved him

Name: Ross Geller
Review: I told him I love him and he gave me an A, but somebody ruined it by telling him the same thing so he changed my grade back to its original. I wouldn't recommend taking his class because his lectures are boring!!

Name: Ross Geller
Review: Ross Geller is annoying. Tbh thats basically it.

Name: Ross Geller
Review: I didn't need this class for my major so i wasn't paying attention on the first day. Once he started to phase his accent out it was hilarious . He seems to have a very sad personal life, one woman came in screaming how they were still married. Boy did that lady rip him a new one!

Name: Ross Geller
Review: Horrible!! Spends half of the class talking about his three divorces! Avoid him at all cost!

Name: Ross Geller
Review: Amazing lectures. Funny. Dedicated.

Name: Ross Geller
Review: Good professor! A little unprofessional but who isnt? love love love

Name: Ross Geller
Review: Hes very fun and inspirational. Accent was a little weird but by the end of the course it wore off, so I guess it wont be a problem anymore. He came to class in roller skates for a few weeks as well and that was pretty fun. Overall quite fun

Name: Ross Geller
Review: Took his class based on so many great reviews here. Liked the content, but he sucks at OH. All he did was sit on the phone with his girlfriend pissed about some Mark dude! I mean had questions about how to interpret the taphonomy of skeletons & bonebeds, & the possible biases taphonomic events w.r.t. fossil records. Take Dr. Wheeler instead.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: First exam class average was 58.2 I have never seen so many failing grades in my life... Thats all I am going to say...

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: One of the best professors I've had in my time at York. Rebecca has a lot of integrity, and truly does her best for her students. She approaches the material from a nice middle ground between stern and sympathetic. She is very considerate of the chaos of student life, she does not test on hard facts and historical events, only the main concepts.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: She is an excellent professor. She gives plenty of examples when explaining. She is also quite entertaining.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: Her lectures and book are not connected. She is not providing slides, and her exams are very difficult and ambiguous.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: Must attend every second class and pay attention, but best prof at York, hands down! I love her class even though its extremely content heavy! LOVE HER!

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: I expected to do better in this class because I did well with her in Intro. I found not only the material to be more difficult but also her exam questions more challenging. A lot of material to cover and a lot of reading. The most weight falls on the toughest exams which doesn't help.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: Make sure you give her more than she asks in her exam or assignment. She doesn't ask for it in the question but she wants those comprehensive answers. She is not open to feedback. Not a good class to get an A.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: Its not an easy course and her way of grading doesnt make it easier. Make sure in her short answer questions, provide more details than she asked for. She is very tough on her grading.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: Listen... if you don't attend her lectures YOU WILL NOT DO WELL. However, she's an amazing and understanding professor who explains things clearly and genuinely wants students to do well. A good grade is attainable if you put in the work but her tests are quite tricky, so it's definitely not an easy A.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: I took this course online. I recommend that you don't because this is a lot of theory-based and there are so many words that are so similar to each other that I got confused. I think it would better if you took this in class, at least you can ask questions. Otherwise, Professor Rubis is super easy and to the point.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: Awesome lecturer, one thing tho is always read your textbook. because the test only covers 2% on what she said in class and the remaining 98% is the textbook. great course

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: No slides or anything, it isn't necessary to go to every class. She'll drop hints about certain things that may be on the test. Learn the vocabulary and make notes on the book to study and you'll do well.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: Lectures were fun. She gives personal examples and details everything on a chalkboard, which is a nice change from professors reading from slides. The textbook she assigns is brilliant; there's even a portion at the beginning on how to manage your time effectively as a student. I recommend this course to everyone.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: this course is not the most interesting but she really breaks down the concepts to make it simpler and more interesting. go to lectures and you will be set, then you will barely have to do the readings. her teaching style may be somewhat old school but it is effective. be aware that her TAs are not very generous markers.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: her tests are horrible. No Pre-test or Practice test . you have to read every single sentences to pass. not recommending at all !!

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: This Prof was horrible

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: If you are in general an okay student, you will do fine in her class. This profs teaching style is amazing. She writes notes on the board, gives examples, is always upbeat and uses expression. 3 hrs goes by very fast. Tests r application based. Makes difficult concepts so easy to understand.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: Dr. Rebecca is one of the best professors I've ever had. She explains the concepts really well and gives a lot of examples. Make sure you attend and write notes. Also read the chapters from the textbook and watch the video assigned to get a good grade. The tests are mainly multiple choice questions ,and she gives hints for short answer questions.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: Hard tests, you need to read the textbook, basically impossible to pass her class unless you study every single detail in the textbook chapters.

Name: Rebecca Jubis
Review: Her tests were incredibly hard. our class average was so low for every test. she does give you hints beforehand for the short answers but honestly, her marking criteria is extremely hard. she does'nt post her lecture notes or anything online, she writes everything on the blackboard which is only visible to the front two rows. don't recommend her.

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: If you're looking for an "easy" professor than Yoel is definitely for you. However, take note that while he may be "easy" this comes to bite you in the ass for exams. Yoel does not answer questions, he is condescending, and sits on his phone the entire recitation. I would argue that Yoel is one of the worst professors at NYU. I wouldn't take him.

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Knows the material well, looking to make sure his students do well. Has a great time but also teaches well. Must take!!!

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: His grading structure and class structure is random and does not play out fairly. Avoid taking any of his classes.

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: I would recommend to take Yoel for the recitation sections for both Chem1 and Chem2. He was very helpful in giving us practice questions to prepare us for the exams.

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Yoel is actually hilarious, the perfect balance of a relaxed class environment and promoting success. I was in his gen chem 1 and 2 recitation classes and absolutely would recommend him to all future students. He was always able to answer any questions and was highly accessible through email and various office hours held throughout the weeks.

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Yoel is the bomb. com- though his humorous antics may not be for everyone, if you speak up in class with specific questions you will absolutely have your questions addressed. He makes time for office hours despite being crazy busy, and made every recitation fun. Never a dull moment with Yoel.

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Yoel is a character. A great one. He will teach you what you need to know and make coming to class fun. He is extremely funny. He is very unique, you'll love him.

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Yoel calls himself an entertainer, which explains why he is always making chemistry jokes. He very good-humored and approachable, and his class is enjoyable because of it. It is easy to ask him questions and he has the ability to make convoluted concepts clearer. He is also highly accessible outside of classes through office hours and by email.

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Yoel is funny and brings a light to Gen Chem that is encouraging and relieving. He is always holding office hours, and he walks you through questions that are likely to come up on quizzes and exams. His humor can be polarizing, but underneath, it is clear that he genuinely cares about chemistry and his students. Would absolutely take again!

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Yoel is a unlike any professor I've had. He is funny, caring, involved and an all around genuine instructor. He helps whenever you ask and has a ton of dad jokes. He presents the material in a way that you are able to understand it. I came back to school after many years off and he helps me feel no different than anyone else. Would deff take again!

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Yoel is the best recitation instructor for Gen Chem 1 & 2 you can find! He is amazing at preparing you for exams and recitation quizzes. He's very helpful during office hours.

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: He is more than professor. You can reach and talk to him anytime and anyplace. He gives great lectures notes before lectures and hand it to you. He is very Gentle. He teaches labs too. He sends pre and post lab by email and you write them . I saved my lab book because it is expensive. Im still taking his class this semester. A+ Take him for sure

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Yoel is frustrating. He is dismissive of questions, has told me outright "Don't take chemistry," expects instant understanding from the students, and just reads off of the lecture notes he gives to us. He gives you 10/10 for just handing in the homework and provides no feedback. Grading criteria is opaque. Never take a class with him.

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Literally the best: had him as TA for both gen chem I and II. always gives the best advice for quizzes in recitation on Friday cares a lot about his students, our sleep, how we are, our grades. the funniest guy has LOTS of office hours and he'll tell you whenever he has via email every time, and he'll be incredibly helpful (in rec and office hours)

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Yoel is the rare NYU science professor who cares for his students. DNA Nanotech isn't easy and his lectures can be scattered, but he does everything he can to help you understand both outside of lecture and in recitation. He can be a tough grader on exams, but he literally tells you what concepts will be on the exam during lecture - go to class.

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Yoel is awesome, and the best TA in Gen Chem. I strongly recommend taking him. Just be warned: he'll sometimes tell everyone to stop what they're doing in the lab to tell a bad dad joke.

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Yoel is the best TA in all of General Chemistry, and probably in all of NYU. He cares about all of his students and teaches only towards their success! He gives excellent tips for quizzes and exams, and makes chemistry genuinely more fun. You are doing yourself a disservice if you don't choose him for as your recitation instructor. :)

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Yoel is the absolute best!! I had him for both Chem I and Chem II and loved him! He is very passionate about chemistry and will be willing to help you whenever you need it! Overall, I highly recommend taking Yoel if you can

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: LOVE LOVE LOVE Yoel! Honestly the best recitation instructor every! Definetely take him if you have a chance

Name: Yoel Ohayon
Review: Yoel is honestly the best recitation instructor ever! He always sends us resources for studying for the midterms/finals, and always answers any questions you have (he literally responds to his emails in 2 minutes). Definitely choose him when you take gen chem!!!

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: Prof. Rochon is an amazing teacher. He knows his subject, keeps the class engaged and give real-life examples to make things easier to understand.

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: He is the best professor for ADMS Stats. He makes this boring and hard Stats course much more easier to learn. He gives students a very clear guidance how to learn step by step and always care about if students understand and catch what he teaches. I could have got a higher grade only because I didn't arrange time well during the final exam.

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: He is one of the best teachers for this course. Go above and beyond for each of his assignments, and read the textbook for his midterm. He teaches very quickly because the course is so vast, but his knowledge in this field is amazing. No complaints for this professor at all, will take his class again.

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: i have to say that he is a really good prof. his ideas and lectures are well organized. clear explanation for the course topics. if you are taking stats then chose him. hi is the best!

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: He was awesome. Class is hard. Not harder then stats I though. gave real life examples and was really clear in lectures. answers all questions. Best at YU hands down!!!!!! Made me like numbers by the end....

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: Choices are limited for profs, so the best choice would be Rochon. Not sure what the hype is about with this guy, he's ok. Adms 3330 is a lot of work and you need to do the work regardless who the prof is. Attend the tutorials.

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: I made an account to just say he's the greatest professor, ever.

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: I'm sure you have walked around campus and seen all the "STATS made EASY" posters, charging you a lot money to teach you something you can learn by simply attending his classes. He is Extremely funny and he makes STATS look super easy. If a complete idiot like me can get an A by just going to every class, i'm sure there is hope for everyone.

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: He breaks down the concepts so well - they're easy to understand. He's very energetic and funny, so it's really easy to stay engaged in class. And he truly believes that there are no such things as stupid questions, so don't be afraid to tell him if you don't understand anything! Also, don't forget to practice lots of questions!

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: Best Professor I have had so far at York. Take his online course and you will be fine if you practice course work weekly.

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: Best prof in the university

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: Very good prof i ever had

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: Michael is such a good prof. I am not even in his class but I do attend every week. If you're taking stats he is definitely the one to take the course with. He does not often finish the class early but 3 hours lecture with Michael is chill.

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: Makes you actually enjoy and pay attention in a 7pm-10pm stats class. Best prof at York, taking his class will be the best decision you make in your undergrad.

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: The God of statistics. God sent him for a reason. Keep it up Proffesor.

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: BEST PROF IN THE ENTIRE WORLD. I don't even know if someone can do better work than him. it's the first class that I actually paid attention and I learned a lot from him

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: His slides are great. His explanation is simple direct and applicable. Engaging lecturer. Fair grader. Listen in class and do the home work and you will do great. Loved the final project.

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: Prof. Rochon is one of the best professors at Schulich. Fair grader, approachable for feedback and help, and makes an effort to make statistics fun and understandable for everyone.

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: Best prof at york :)

Name: Michael Rochon
Review: Be very diligent with your assignments. Make sure you pay attention in his class and your knowledge of stats is taken care of. He knows the subject inside out and does not weasel away from questions.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: Worst prof I have had so far. He acts like this is high school. He does not let anyone use laptops or phones. You cannot rest your head even for a 3 hour lecture. half of the class time goes to him telling EVERY SINGLE PERSON to get off their phones. He gave us a test on halloween and the test ended at 8 PM. he is just frustrating.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: Most amazing prof I've ever had! I don't understand why other people are complaining about him. He takes the time to make sure his students understand the concepts and is very approachable. 10/10 recommend him!

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: He's not helpful at all. When I tried to visit him outside of the class for advice he simply referred me to the textbook (which btw is useless). He can be insulting at times and doesn't accommodate for slower learners. The only saving grace is that he bell curves so you can still pass his class as long as your scores are around the average.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: If you decide to take his class, at least do not take it during the summer term. He did not let us bring any cheat sheets for the midterms or final exams because he was providing one which was of no use. The examples he gives in class and the WebAssign questions are completely different level difficulty from the midterm/final questions.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: This prof. loves mathematics and enjoys it for sure. But he is incredibly hard to understand.. If you can skip taking him if you are noob in linear algebra but if you have some knowledge about the course, this prof. will help you get better at it and shares a few key tips that I still use to this day.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: This prof is adorable! At first I thought he was hard but he really can teach and if you pay attention and know how to answer the web assign questions, you will do well. Nothing is really a surprise. I don't know what these people are saying cause if you are good student and come to lectures I think you'd be fine. My advice - sit at the front!!

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: Just don't.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: Lecture are more on the definition and less on doing examples. but working on assignment gives you enough chances to work on the examples. be ready to work alot by yourself. the lecture slides are good to look for definition but again you have to put lots of time aside for this class. the tests are very long. but overall it was enjoyable challenge.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: Reads off powerpoint slides in lecture. Refuses to do examples on the board; if you ask questions, he just repeats definitions. Tests are unreasonably long for the time given. Bad quality of lectures compounded by an awful confusing textbook. Insulted me when I approached him for help. Lots of proofs and assumed knowledge in an "applied" course.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: Really puts mathematical thinking into perspective. The concepts are not easily comprehensible, yet Raguimov shines a new light on the mathematics which define what makes up the universe.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: Had an accent which made it hard to understand him and he sometimes taught things that we didnt even have to know. Tests and final exam were easy as long as you knew how to do all the webassign questions. Would i take him again no but hes not the worst prof.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: Great prof. He can be a savage, which, if not directed at you, is quite hilarious. Pay Attention in Class! The test is predictable. Question difficulty is as the homework - keep in mind you do not have the internet and friends to help then. Read through the textbook as review. Do the homework. You have to listen hard though - heavily accented.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: Worst prof ever! Can't teach math period! Breaks his promises and doesn't prepare you well for test! Switch to a more capable prof!

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: Honestly, his lecture is sometimes boring, but if you had prepared before the lecture, it is acceptable. For any math course, you need to do more practice for sure. If you practice enough, you can get a decent mark. Although the exams are relatively difficult, the final mark could be impressive because of the bell curve.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: Can't teach math at all. The class content is so easy but this professor made it extremely hard. You can't even understand what he's saying half the time. Material is easy but tests are unnecessarily hard

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: Has an impenetrable accent, dryly lectures straight from the textbook, tells students they can't use laptops, take pictures, or record lectures, and provides laughably small time periods for large tests. He's the perfect storm of a terrible professor. The class average on our first test was 30%.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: It's better to stay home and learn from the textbook because it hard to understand and cannot teach.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: Very hard to understand. Would recommend transfer out of his class as soon as possible. You will not succeed.

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: The professor has a very monotone put-you-to-sleep voice. He is very hard to follow in lectures and it is better if you just study from the book and ask a tutor if u have any questions. The only good thing was that he has lyryx so theres practice problems you can do

Name: Iouldouz Raguimov
Review: I have been in his class for 10 minutes and already can not stand him, slow speaker, inaudible, and just a horrible 3 hours of my week

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: 4 exams with MC and 2 short answers but u get two attempts at it. gotta show up to class to participate in iclicker which ultimately can save ur mark by a couple percent so definitely do it! even if u get the wrong answer it counts as participation. LOTS of reading but nothing u cant handle. test is basically textbook plus lectures no surprises

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: Not a great teacher

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: Very good prof, tests are difficult so do not skip class.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: So glad I had her as my first year psychology prof. She made me love my major even more. Highly recommend taking this class with her.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: Such a good prof, her class was an easy A and she gives you a lot of chances, it's hard to fail this course with her teaching it.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: she literally made my first year way easier at York. Even if you don't make it to the lectures she records and uploads them so as long as you do the readings and now what you're studying for you'll get a good grade.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: Mongrain is a solid prof. She gives two chances on each midterm, she has a good background in psych, and most people like her. Read the textbook and you'll pass, I stopped going to class half way through because I couldn't stay awake. Her tests are straightforward, MC right from textbook and SA right from the slides.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: The most amazing psyc prof ever. extra 5% from the iclicker questions which is a clutch, lectures were recorded. Do not miss your chance to take with her. take my words DO NOT MISS YOUR CHANCE TO BE TAUGHT BY HER.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: Friendly teaching, unfriendly hand writing. She is not a fan of PPT. Don't believe the note, even if you study them all, you still won't recive half the content from the text.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: One of the best prof's you'll ever encounter. She is able to teach very well & has one of the best personalities - very kind & funny. You'll get an extra 5% through participation on Iclicker. Her slides aren't overwhelmingly text heavy, they are clear & concise & the readings give more detail on the topics discussed in lecture. Strongly recommend!

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: One of the most amazing profs I've come across! She's honestly a gem and the class is pretty easy as long as you attend lectures because all the test questions come from there.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: She tries to make the material understandable and is generally successful :) She has a song for every topic/lecture. Class is not really mandatory, just for the bonus marks that really higher your final grade.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: Incredible. Super clear and makes even the toughest content easy to understand. One of the best profs I've ever had and definitely would take the course again if I had to. Easy to reach her or at least a TA, midterms marked fast. Clear on what you need to do to suceed. Lectures recorded and posted online. Amazing.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: Possibly the best prof of my undergrad,shes awesome. She gets straight to the point, and the way she conveys the lectures grabs your attention for the whole class. Course isnt hard if u put in the work, and tests are more than fair.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: Dr Mongrain gives many opportunities for success: URPP, test redos, iClicker, non-cumulative tests. The material is easy and there isn't too much. Dr Mongrain is interesting but slow when lecturing, so I just put 2x speed on her recordings. She tries to minimize students' stress before tests. I strongly suggest taking her class, she's wonderful!

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: Professor Mongrain is an excellent professor that makes concepts well known to the class. Heavy reading for the course. The exam is about 50% in class content and 50% textbook. She gives you a chance to write the midterm twice, which helps a whole lot.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: Amazing lectures, Draw focus and narrow the scope of review.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: She gives 2 chances to take each MidTerm, and keeps the better grade. All her lectures are recorded and posted on Moodle, so you can skip class and just watch the Lectures at your leisure. She follows the TextBook, and explains the material in an easily understandable way. Her Tests are fairly easy (30 MC, 2 SA), and she is a fantastic teacher.

Name: Myriam Mongrain
