Review: She is so caring and teaches really well. This is my favourite course at York so far and her tests are relatively easy as long as you pay attention to her lectures. I barely use the textbook (kind of don't use it at all) and yet I'm doing well, considering her class average is usually 65 so I'm a bit above that. She also posts recordings

Name: Myriam Mongrain
Review: she's pretty good at outlining very specifically what you need to know on the exams, you just have to make sure you do it. she uses iClicker for participation (marks) and attendance so you could just log in if you didnt go to class and try to answer the questions. she was funny, made the class fun.

Name: John Paschakis
Review: Very good professor Very good lectures John is a very nice person I love him Take him!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Name: John Paschakis
Review: He has bad accent, hardly to understand what he wants to express. The ppt he shows all the handwriting, which it is difficult to read. He makes the easy course harder to achieve higher mark.

Name: John Paschakis
Review: I just graduated from York and I took his course a few years ago as an elective. He is the best professor I ever had and he is the most caring Professor I have ever met throughout my undergrad! Take this class with him if you have a chance. Thank you again!

Name: John Paschakis
Review: Rambles about Trump? He summarizes the textbook in his slides, thoroughly understand those - do the examples in them! Midterm was MC Q's, 50/50 course split - Midterm/Final. Go to every other class and you'll pass (sometimes he "yell-talks"/talks loud) Don't understand? Just ask - tries to explain it #investToyota

Name: John Paschakis
Review: Great professor. Very funny and tries to help. Fair tests, just make sure to practice and there will be no surprises. Likes to talk about other topics other than economics at times which is refreshing

Name: John Paschakis
Review: He is absolutely hilarious. I never thought I would say a lecture is FUN to go to but professor pashakis really goes out of his way. Extremely helpful and very knowledgeable in real world application and economics. A must take!

Name: John Paschakis
Review: Best professor I've had in 4 years of york. Will always help you. And is willing to talk to you about stocks and investing

Name: John Paschakis
Review: John is a funny prof and he cares a lot about his students. If you put effort into his class then you will end with a great mark.

Name: John Paschakis
Review: He is the best

Name: John Paschakis
Review: One of the few profs that truly cares when you go talk to him.

Name: John Paschakis
Review: read the textbook and slides but most importantly practice the test banks

Name: John Paschakis
Review: he is a very nice professor, he likes to share some real market information rather just we should learn from the book. I really like his teaching style, his exam is a little bit hard. Need to do some extra work. Don't miss any classes, don't leave early. You should be fine for his class.

Name: John Paschakis
Review: perfect

Name: John Paschakis
Review: honestly if i could take all of my Econ classes with this guy, i would do so in a heartbeat. this guy is like The Greatest Of All Time. GOAT! John, if you have a tinder account i'll swipe you to right big up yo' self BIg J

Name: John Paschakis
Review: Honestly, John is an amazing professor. He cares about his students so much and he's willing to help students to get good grade if they're willing to put in the effort. I got an A and all I did was showing him my effort to learn. People complained because they got bad grades. You can't expect an A if you don't show up to class or don't study. :/

Name: John Paschakis
Review: hey a good teacher he's funny he rewards students that make effort but ppl who dont hey will not give a easy a h need to show up and sit in class to get the best make if u attent class u will get handouts and u will not need the text book

Name: John Paschakis
Review: Truly a professor that cares about teaching and is passionate about the material. Reading the textbook several times is a must, as lecture material can be awkward and confusing at times. Likes to give multiple choice exams which are a nightmare trying to split hairs between possible answers. Accessible, cooperative. caring.

Name: John Paschakis
Review: He talked about how much money he lost because of Enron and Nortel for the whole semester.

Name: John Paschakis
Review: A passionate, caring professor that cares about his class and economics. Although his accent and lectures make it tempting to skip class, he usually covers the topics for the tests very well. The tests are fair, and are completely doable with practice from the textbook. He cares for his students, and will help you out if you drop in by his office.

Name: John Paschakis
Review: Absolutely GREAT guy. Lecture style is awkward, and his accent does not help, and if you read the material and listen hard he gets the message through effectively. Will help a student to the best of his ability provided you can show him that you are making an effort. Would take him again for ECON4200.

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: Definitely a great prof, he tries his best to make the lectures entertaining and educational. This prof is definitely one of a kind

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: Definitely do all the labs and test options. I missed a few labs and skipped the first midterm. I got a bit stressed because everyone on here claimed his exam was brutal. It was the exact same difficulty as the midterms.I studied for it and got an A, so I have no idea why they claim it's so hard. He's a great prof, and the course is not difficult.

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: He is genuinely an amazing professor!! Yes, there is material on the test from the readings so do not just depend on lectures to do well. He makes lectures interesting and gives good advice. He is also very caring and helpful outside of class.

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: So far, he's the best lecturer I've had at York. He explains everything so well and makes everything easy to understand. But not only are his lectures amazing but his life lessons are very valuable. I can genuinley say that my perspective in life has changed in so many positive ways and I'm sothankful to have had the oppurtunity to be in his class

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: He Is the worst prof I have ever came across, he is not knowledgeable but he talk like he knows everything. The material in the exam are completely different from what he teaches in the class and he NEVER CURVES ANY MARKS. Labs are tedious and the TAs are not professional at their jobs. The most bs course I have ever took.

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: The exam was not fair. It basically consisted of anatomy and different formulas and graphs discussed during the labs plus a few of his favourite topics out of the whole entire textbook. This course is a waste of money and time and I feel bad for the students who need to take this course next year!

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: BEST PROF IN KINE! Very straight forward with his teaching style, and he makes lectures fun. Don't skip any labs and make sure you attend all his midterms. He will bell curve for diligent students.

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: The course is somewhat boring, but he makes it interesting. Definitely go to lecture or listen to the recordings since some things he mentions are not in the textbook, and will be on the tests. Otherwise, everything is straightforward. Tests are average, and the labs are easy mark boosters.

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: gooood

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: Lectures are recorded and posted online and he combined the lecture notes and text book into one so its less expensive for students. loved his class

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: Will not only teach you the material but some valuable life lessons

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: Very inspirational, he explains everything very clear and he makes sure that the way he talks or uses words is easy for anyone to understand. If you pay attention in class not only youll get an A but learn even more life lessons

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: Good. Really good lecturer! Dont skip on the labs, theyre free marks. Go to classes and sit near the front. Youll do fine

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: The final is basically 50%. But if you skip midterms and labs it could be worth 100%. He told us that the final is just like the midterms. I got 95% on both midterms because the questions were basically straight out of the book. But NOTHING prepared me for that final. Dropped my mark by almost 20%.

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: Merv is current in his research, he makes attending lecture fun. Clear and concise in his teaching style. The course skilled performance is taught by two professors and Merv teaches the second part.

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: Merv is an excellent prof. Your mark primarily comes from the final exam which can range anywhere from 50%-100% depending on whether or not you do the labs and midterms. The final is very different compared to the midterm, but as long as you study everything your should be fine.

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: He is great prof. Pay attention to the labs and lecture notes and u will get an A

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: Merv is one of the best. Hilarious, but real. Tests cover lectures, labs, AND readings, so be sure not to skimp on any, and you'll be golden. Lectures are interesting, and test content and difficulty fair. Some tricky questions, but no trick questions. If you can, take the all-test-and-labs option. Grade boosters.

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: completely agree with the post below. don't let people scare you about the exam, it is not half as bad as they make it out to be. study and you'll do well.

Name: Merv Mosher
Review: Everyone scared me about the final exam of this course but honestly, it isn't bad at all. He gives you 3 hours to finish the exam and if you know everything in the course and ignore what people in upper years tell you, you'll do well. Try to understand everything he says and understand the book concepts too. Focus more on the lectures tho.

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: 10/10 said time travel might be possible. Will go back in time to re-experience lectures when possible.

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: He thinks he is profound. Literally brags non stop about how enlightened he is. You can learn the entire course by watching the news or using social media. He may be knowledgeable about his subject but he dosn't manage to convey anything new or interesting to the class.

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: He tries... The lectures are long and he spends half the time talking about unrelated stuff. Fairly disorganized. You can learn everything in his class with a quick google search. The material is valuable and worth learning, but he is not good at teaching it. He spends too much time talking about himself. Kind make an unpleasant atmosphere

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: Alright professor overall. I stopped attending lectures after a few weeks; they're not mandatory. If you're a well-read, well-informed person, his information will come off as redundant. The assignments given are fairly simple and straight forward. Take this course if you're looking for something easy, GPA boosting, and somewhat engaging.

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: Loved attending his lectures. He was very inspirational

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: He is awesome, makes you think a lot about what is surrounding us instead of feeding is the usual textbook info and readings!

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: Professor Perchal not only taught great life lessons in his lectures but also opened my eyes to things that not every millennial realizes. The course material may be dry at times but overall he made it easy to listen to and enjoyable to be a part of. Class discussions were always interesting. I would absolutely take one of his classes again!

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: Easily one of the best professors I've ever had. If you have the opportunity to take a class with him do it! Attend all lectures, they're not only useful but extremely interesting.

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: Took this course years ago, as mentioned by many below, he is much less profound that he thinks.  will talk about whatever is on CNN at the moment. Extremely biased in his arguments, and arguments themselves are overly simplistic and if you are a well read person with common sense you will learn 0 in his class.  Easy mark, but don't waste your time

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: I've never had a prof like him. Just so inspirational and passionate about what he teaches. He can really open your eyes to a new side of things and all he wants, is to see his student grow. There are 2 major papers (10-15 pgs/each) that sum up your grade, no exams or tests. But it's totally worth it! You learn so much from him!

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: I've never had a prof like him. Just so inspirational and passionate about what he teaches. He can really open your eyes to a new side of things and all he wants, is to see his student grow. There are 2 major papers (10-15 pgs/each) that sum up your grade, no exams or tests. But it's totally worth it! You will learn so much from him!

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: I've studied abroad & at York U; honestly, I have NEVER had such an amazing, inspirational, gem of a professor! His teaching style is to prepare us for the future, for the real world. He's very up-front, the class was a real eye-opener and I would recommend it to EVERY student. The best prof. Hands down, no comparison. No words can do him justice.

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: Walter is one of the best profs you will ever encounter amongst York. Of course the issues he discusses in class are somewhat disturbing because it is what we choose to ignore in society and amongst ourselves. He will challenge you to think differently and encourage you to make a change. 2 essays + a final assignment. You get what you work for.

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: The Twilight Zone the Class.  Interesting and engaging in a way that will keep you thinking about it after it is done.

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: This class will make you feel uncomfortable because the material he discusses are about the issues we tend to ignore and be indifferent to. I learned a lot from this class and I also learned something from myself. Dr. Perchal really cares about his students and wants them to care about the world as well. It's worth  it to stay till 10 for his class

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: One of the best profs out there!

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: The only way to get an A is to suck up to him. His marking is completely arbitrary. Puts very little effort into teaching this course, opting to lecture about whatever simple issue is on the front page of CNN. Is this course easy? Yes. Will you learn anything? No.

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: For SOSC 1950, Walter was engaging but it was difficult to contact him. The class consisted of 2 essays and a journal. My first essay, I will admit was not good, but I put my heart and soul into the remaining 80% of the course and was given a very low mark. I emailed him twice but no answer!! Don't take his class if you'reinterested in transparency

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: TAKE THIS COURSE! Become aware of the major threats to mankind in the 21st century, motivated to think critically and empowered to make a change. Develop a sense of responsibility for your future and the future of humanity.  Become inspired by your own experiences and those of your classmates. Professor Perchal is a true educator.

Name: Walter Perchal
Review: He will most likely give you a B+ if he doesn't know you. No clear grading criteria for any of the class work.

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: I worked so hard just to get a C+. Her lectures didnt overlap with the textbook and she spoke so fast I couldnt keep up with what she was saying. She only puts minimal info in her slides so you have to really rely on the textbook and write down everything she says in class. Shes funny and nice but I would NOT recommend this course with her.

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: Took research methods and Personality with her last summer, and absolutely loved both classes. She's funny, the content of her lectures is super interesting; she was even able to make research methods engaging. One of the best profs at York, I'd say.

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: Loved this Professor. Took two classes with her in the summer and really enjoyed them. Very, very engaging. Articulate, intellectual, critical thinker.

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: You will really work in this class for a good grade. I was on the upper echelon; asked her for the bump to an A+ from 89.5 and she granted it to me. You have to really pay attention and engage with the prof when the opportunities arise. Read the book, and try to map out what might be on the test. The tests are pretty fair, and she is very engaging.

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: I am in Kristas class right now summer 2019. Her tests are all mc theyre 33% each. Parts of her lecture overlap SOME of the textbook so lecture is optional just ask someone for notes. All you have to do is study the text book. Make specific notes because the mc questions are identical to everything in the textbook! If you dont read you wont pass

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: She is such a great lecturer! Lectures are based slightly on the text and also based on real life application. Her tests are based 80% on textbook and 20% on lecture. There are test banks for this class so find them and you will get an A. Overall great prof and I would take this again!

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: Only 2 midterms & final exam - all m/c. Her lectures are not based off the text per-say - she wants you to read that on your own. She lectures based off own experience in field & brings interesting info/material that is not in the text. Tests are based off chapters AND lecture material/info. Overall, she's just really cool & knowledgable

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: I studied hard, went to all classes and still was only able to pass with a B-. She has the most confusing and tricky questions on exams that are so ambiguous and tricky that its almost impossible to do well even when you know the material. If you want to keep a high GPA take this course with someone else.

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: She was honestly one of my favourites compared to my first year professors. Her lectures were actually good. She was very approachable and would help explain anything you have questions on. With my rating. She's ain't bad at all. If you get her, you shouldn't worry at all. Tests weren't super tough, just make sure to read the textbook.

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: You basically have to teach yourself the text book. She doesn't answer questions about the textbook, you have to email your t.a. for that. Most of the test is from the textbook. The lectures have little to do with the textbook, The level of difficulty of the exam does not line up with the way the class is taught.

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: Theres no way her class averages are in the high C+ range like she says. Ive had such easy psyc classes with a C+ average. Her tests are brutal

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: She is nice, interesting, shows lots of videos, and explains things clearly. However, you MUST go to lectures b/c her slides are not sufficient enough on their own, and textbook use is mandatory for a decent grade. Her tests are all m/c and quite tricky/difficult. I'm a straight A student, but I barely passed with an A in this class. Study hard!

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: Her tests are textbook heavy, the lectures are very detailed and long and yet only 20 percent are on the tests.

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: This class is not that hard if you attend the lectures and make accurate notes. She makes 20 percent of the exam from items in class. The assignments also help to boost your mark. This class is boring and her voice is very monotone so it doesnt hep but it is doable if you attend class regularly and read the textbook thoroughly !

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: She is a very tough marker. Be warned.

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: This was by far the worst class I have ever had. Lecture heavy and most of the time she just goes on and on and on about things that aren't really related to lecture? Be prepared to memorize the textbook its just as horrible as the class itself. The tests are horrible so better study. Honestly, if you can get another prof go for it.

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: Now my second time taking her course - took Personality with her a few years back. She goes far beyond textbook material in her lectures. You need both to do well, as she pulls the standard 75% book, 25% lecture MC allotment on her tests. MCQs can be a little confusing. Very understanding during strike.

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: terrible. lectures consist of her wandering off into personal conversations that don't relate to course material whatsoever. i memorized the textbook and finished with a 69.5 which she kept as a C+. Most ridiculous and wordy multiple choice questions will result in you failing the test despite knowing all the theories. Do not take with Krista

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: I loved class with Krista. She is very knowledgeable and experienced in her field and it is clear in the many examples she gives to help us understand the content better. She makes you want to just listen to her in lecture but you have to focus and take good notes!!! She does give a lot of "all of the above" answers on tests so it can get tricky.

Name: Krista A Phillips
Review: Very knowledgeable and easy to listen to. Reading the textbook is a must for exams.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: I took this course since there weren't any 6 credit courses that matched my timings. The TA leaders are very nice. Overall the course is really content-heavy.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: THIS COURSE IS HORRIBLE. PROFESSOR KEHOE MAKES YOU BUY HIS OWN WRITTEN BOOKS THAT ARE SUPER EXPENSIVE THAT ARE VERY CONFUSING AND WASTE OF READING. THE TUTORIAL CLASS IS HORRIBLE. NEVER AGAIN WILL I TAKE A COURSE LIKE THIS.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: I took Dr. kehoe classes a few years back. He is a great educator, though the duration of the exams was always short. However he has the most horrible TA, now forgot her name, is an older woman, she laughs all the time, treats the students nicely until the submission of the educators rating forms, afterward, she becomes rude, and hard marker.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: This was one of the best courses I have ever taken! I learned so much about the human mind and our interactions. Lectures are so relatable and enjoyable. It helped me understand why we behave the way we do, making me an even better understanding human being. All I have to say is, prof Kehoe and Dagmara (TA) are the best and ridiculously hilarious!

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: The duration of the exams is shorter than expected.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: I'll be real here: took these courses to make my schedule lighter (as it only requires 1 hour for a tutorial - and there are many time slots to choose from). LOTS of memorization required for quizzes and the final exam, but he basically tells you exactly what to study for the exam. The quality of the online lectures and PPTs def needs improvement.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: Don't take COMN 211 class. The TAs are hard makers for no reason. if you don't have anything memorized for the exam, you will not get a good mark. Seriously, for the first exam, everyone failed. The highest mark was 60. Do not take the class. Especially, if you want for your elective. The class sounds easy and it should be, But they make it hard.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: Kehoe's class are great because first of all it's online, secondly the notes are provided for you and thirdly the T.A (Dagmara) goes in detail about certain topics and clarifies any question you have. One thing that is annoying is the online lecture on Youtube because sometimes the sound gets distorted. Also, be ready to memorize for the exam!

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: The professor explain into great detail the course material, in a way that not only inspires to learn more, but also allows the student to understand the material to the point where studying becomes more a review, and knowledge from the course becomes everyday knowledge. However, is important to note that the text book and attendance help as well.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: A lot of memorizing is required for this prof.  You will have to memorize things word for word to get an A on the exam.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: The class is blended, so the lectures are online and virtually make you feel like you are in class. If the quality of the videos were better, they'd be perfect. Tutorials are okay, not very productive but still a good experience. I learned quite a bit, it's not a difficult course, and keeping with the lectures is probably the best way to get an A.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: Amazing course. This was an online class but with a tutorial which made is a little easier. He is a great prof and the lectures are broken up into different parts so they are easy to watch. He uses a mix of videos as well in his lectures and makes the lectures interesting. Only 1 quiz in the course and 2 essays and then the exams. Loved this class.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: He gives really good lectures, they are easy to follow and he makes funny comments or jokes that keep you interested. The lectures are not too long and come in sections so if you do need a short bathroom break or food or just stepping away, there is opportunity to do so.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: Wasn't too bad but i did not find the class to organized. getting grades is tough for sure!!!!!

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: Not the type of quality education we should be getting from York. The online lectures are an interesting idea, but they're terribly executed. The website looks like something out of a 90's sitcom and video-lectures are bad quality. It's almost as if the course is designed this way - not to enhance learning - but to make his job as a prof. easier.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: Interesting professor. Expectations clear. Tough to study for exams because he wants full memorization of content. Timed Quiz is highly unfair. Set up to fail when you have to answer 25 questions in 15 minutes. Exams are long and are based on case studies. Online course but never drops in to check on students. Only take the course if its required.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: Extremely confusing assignments. The quiz was 20 questions in 15 minutes for 3112 an in 3111 was 15 minutes for 15 questions. Way too crammed and high pressure. The lectures were okay, he clarified some things but tended to ramble. I found the text to be confusing and didn't really help.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: All courses taught by Kehoe are very useful for those who are planing to work in organizations and who are majoring in business. I learned lots of useful things from his courses. I took 3 of them. And if you will keep up with the lectures you will do good. Textbook is not needed for his courses because all info is on slides.

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: horrible, they really need to change the time limit on these tests... 15 mins for a 20 question quiz.. it should be at least 30mins so we can relax and slow down and think about the questions.... other than that its a pretty boring course

Name: Dalton Kehoe
Review: Worst. Poor communication skills.  Save your money and don't buy the textbook!

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: Took in the summer. She posts videos so make sure you watch them for the MIDTERM! my mistake i made for the first midterm.. Her multiple choice can be very specific for these videos. Tests were marked super fair. She LOVES clicker!! So dont skip class! Youre allowed a "cheat sheet" for tests! :) dont need to memorize any formulas!

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: She's really funny but also really weird. She makes weird jokes during lectures and goes off topic about life and the human mind to the point where we barely got to cover half the slides during each lecture. Her tests are really easy and the assignments are easy as well. It's nice to have an eccentric prof once in a while.

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: If you read the textbook, attendance is not mandatory. She does use encourage the use of an app to participate in in-class questions that give you bonus marks at the end of the course.

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: Dr. Kopinska is the best professor I have ever had. Her lectures explain most of the material and she finds ways to make it more interesting. She teaches you about life lessons and additional interesting information. She is a very kind, caring and engaging professor. I have learned so much about myself aside from course content. 100% Recommend!!!

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: Going to Dr. Kopinska's class is so interesting because her lectures make you reflect on yourself instead of just absorbing the information for tests. She's a really interesting person herself and if you talk to her she is so kind and wants to get to know her students. She is by far one of my favorite professors for actual learning. Fair marker.

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: she is the best. you will learn a lot from her. not a tough grader. so many bonus marks that you can boost your mark.

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: Dr. Kopinska is one of the most interesting and genuinely kind people that you will meet at YorkU. When you take her classes, you will learn much more than you initially expected to- about the course content and as well as yourself. She is wonderful.

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: Shes pretty good. Take part in the clicker stuff that she does in class and mindtap they make a huge difference in your mark if you are not really strong in math. Definitely go over lectures, read the textbook. Shes very funny and what she teaches in lecture is usually on the test not in the exact same way though. Mc worth 60% SA worth 40%

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: Absolutely lovely. Really enjoyed her classes, she's very funny and easy to understand. She sticks to her lectures and almost makes sure that you pass just make sure you come to class because some slides and videos won't be accessible to you and she does questions in class. Would highly recommend !!!!

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: I had Dr. Kopinska for psyc 1010 and 2020 and she is very kind, she teaches well. Posts lectures on moodle and videos to watch for exams. All multiple choice questions on exam, up to 60. Easy course but participation matters.

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: she has great sense of humor the only thing is it gets boring. she doesn't really focus on the text book which I find in this course it we should specially if %90 of the exam questions are based on the book and not the lecture. I wish the exam wasn't multiple choice rather essay questions.

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: Great person and pretty good teacher. She doesn't allow computer or phones during class unless you have an accommodation and will call you out if she sees you on either. Really generous when it comes to grading and makes lectures interesting by using memes and interesting iclicker questions. Overall really enjoyed the class.

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: Took Kopinska for 2 courses and I can say her marking scheme is very good. My advice would be to study from the book and not her notes because this is where you will run into trouble. Her tests are 100% based off of the textbook (usually bolded terms in textbook) and videos. She also gives a bell curve, which is nice.

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: She is such a nice human being and she makes stuff so easy, she explains so clearly and she's also a generous grader. we had 4 tests(All MC) and 1 assignment but iclicker is mandatory so you have to attend classes which can be boring sometimes. but overall I learned a loooot. don't miss it if it's with her!

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: I enjoyed this course a lot. I also took statistics and animal behaviour with this professor. She is a great teacher. She also is a wonderful person.

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: Iclicker is mandatory for participation, and waste of my time to come tbh majority is just stupid MC questions based on feelings and sometimes the videos she makes us watch. LOTS OF TED TALK VIDEOS. Her lectures are fairly useless because she reads off slides and elaborates very little and shows videos. Only positive thing is her energy.

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: Dr. Kopinska is a great teacher. I have learned more in this course that in all my years of education. It was lots of work but she cares about her students and is generous with grading. You can earn an extra grade using clicker and participating in online forums.

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: Taking this class in the summer so we have two 3-hour classes per week where we should cover a chapter a class, which would be possible if she actually taught the material instead of pondering about life and going on tangents. There's also no screens allowed which is not a big deal but she makes it a big deal. Most of us are adults, just let us be.

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: a fantastic teacher and a very interesting course

Name: Agnieszka Kopinska
Review: I took this course during summer Her lecture talking is hard to follow She sometime ignore people who raise their hands She barely write anything on blackboard No laptop or cell phone allowed unless you have special condition Not providing practice questions before exam So glad I only need 6 credits in Social Science

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: Easy A+ if you put in the work

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: I'm not good in math or stats but was able to get an A, so everyone can just put some effort into it. Her teaching style is old and confusing at times but her course kit is all you need to know. Gives out practice exams & assignment make sure you do them ad you'll do fine (focus more on practice exams).  Found PASS sessions 210very helpful.

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: Her style of teaching is very unorganized which makes it hard to understand. Its more useful to just study from the book rather than attending her lectures. Her answers for multiple choice are very similar to each other, you need to know every detail. Long answers are easier, a lot like ones in the assignments.

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: She is a great prof ! If you can read a textbook you will do well !! EASY A WITH HER !

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: Did not attend one class all year or even the Midterm walked into the final after studying 3 solids Full days and got a B+ in the course. Easiest credit of my Life, probably could have gotten an A if i didnt completely blank out on 2 of the 4 mark questions.  If you are a person who can read a textbook youll do well.

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: I was expecting a tough professor who did not care after reading some of these ratings. But I loved her class, if you're willing to work hard and pay attention in class, you should do fine. I got an A and I was nervous and anxious with math and stats and everything. So dedicate some time for it and you should be fine.

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: She is a great prof! Took STATS 1 with her and loved it !

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: Dr. Wolfram is an excellent professor. She just does not believe in "spoon feeding"  She is also very approachable and great at lecturing statistics.

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: Worst prof

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: She's real tricky. The midterm was so easy, like "I'll trick you into thinking this class is an easy A then destroy you at the final". The midterm was the same thing as the practice test she gave out so you can just memorize the steps and ace the test. But the final was yikes, maybe it was the strike, idk. but read her textbook you should be fine

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: Stats is a tough course. Get over it. Once you accept this you will be glad you got this prof. If you are a winer then you will suffer. This course is not for wimps. If you are trying to learn the material this is exactly the prof you would hope for. She uses he own book: it's concise and it saves you $70 as compared to the other long winded books

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: Wolfram uses alot of time explaining theory but gives weekly homework (short and provides corrections), teaches straight out of her textbook (also short). She's straight to the point- tells you exactly what you need don't need for exams (2 - 50%). TA is amazing! MC and Short answers not to hard. Practice makes perfect bc im NOT a stats person !!!!

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: She spent more time covering how to succeed in the course rather than the actual work that we were doing.   she assigned her own book which was terrible.  Wish that I had just dropped this course, she did not help at all.   should not be teaching at all

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: She is extremely knowledgeable.  She uses a textbook that she wrote and if you follow it it is very clear cut and chapter questions prepare you for exams.  She has optional homework that you can get feedback on.  Classes are review of chapter so go if you are confused, she does many example questions.

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: This instructor was not very helpful and unapproachable. She insulted her students in front of the class leaving sine of is very disempowered. Unfortunately, she never provided the big picture of each lesson. No doubt she is a master in her field, but ability to convey this information and teach students how to apply it is unsatisfactory.

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: She doesn't have a thick accent, her lectures are clear; the main problem is the stigma surrounding her courses. If you try, you can succeed. If stats is not your thing, you've got to work harder to understand it. She gives great practice questions, and there is usually a PASS (Peer assisted study sessions) Leader for extra help, + TA's, its doable

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: I liked this class very much, I would recommend it. her textbook is simple and clear it is 50 dollars compare to others that are above 120. if you want to understand well the topics without a lot of waste time trying to understand difficult textbooks taker her class :D.

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: Horrible. She's borring. Teachers her textbook. Cant understand her. Would not recommend her at all

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: Her classes were extremely boring, I found myself zoning out ALOT. Her textbook was very helpful though, it gets to the point and helps you learn the skills needed in stats. I wouldn't recommend this professor if you are somebody who needs guidance from the professor as I  was very confused most of the time in the lectures.

Name: Margarete Wolfram
Review: I was in her class in Sept but dropped out later in the month because she was too confusing, has a thick accent, and would ramble on about irrelevant things. I felt bad for her, but she really needs to try to stay on topic and speak clearer.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: She's a good & kind person but as a prof, she fails big time! She often makes unnecessary passive-aggressive comments towards students, regularly late to lectures, never gives marks back on time, is not clear in instructions of assignment unless you ask her what she exactly wants on the paper. Several times, she's canceled lectures 1 hour before.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: DrAllen is actually very kind individual. Her lectures are funny & informational if you listen. She released a List of the exam short answers to study for. Majority of your marks for Phil2075 depend on your TA so if they mark easy, you will be golden! Textbook isnt necessary because its just a compilation of Ethics papers that available online.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: I believe the course was meant to be fairly easy and straightforward. However, the professor has failed to return anything back by the end of the course and it leaves students confused as to where they stand in the course. Otherwise, the professor is very boring and attendance is mandatory to receive your 20% participation grade.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: Monotone, hard, all essays. You won't get grades back and you'll be bored.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: She is inefficient when it comes to getting grades back, it is the end of the semester and she still hasn't marked a single thing we have done. Due to this there is no feedback whatsoever. It is very dry. For detailed instruction you should come to class because she taught things that aren't in the textbook. Wouldn't recommend this course with her

Name: Julie Allen
Review: I found that the material she taught in lectures did not align to what was supposed to be taught in the course. Her lectures are very intense, so boring and super difficult to keep up with. I'm definitely not dumb but I would not recommend anyone to take this course if you think its a bird course - it is not a bird course, especially with her!

Name: Julie Allen
Review: Really great content and planning .... The course flowed like a waterslide from ancient Greek to angry britts in 6 weeks.  There was a lot of writing (wouldn't be except the course was condensed) but it made sense and there was a lot of room for flexibility in topics.  Great course would take it again

Name: Julie Allen
Review: All the exam/assignment questions were based off things we didn't go over in class to force you to do the readings (which were long) so there was no benefit to showing up for lectures, which were dry and dragged on.  TAs had to teach us everything we were going to be graded on.  All the readings can be found for free online if you just Google them.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: Bad prof, boring, monotone. Her voice is very harsh and the way she talks comes off as aggressive. She uses sparknotes to teach... word for word, and quote for quote. The two TA's who were assisting her in the course knew more about the course material than her. The course was very disorganized, and instead of moodle she uses turnitin

Name: Julie Allen
Review: Her voice is absolutely terrible. Easy to fall asleep in her class. Her lectures are overall pretty boring. I used to enjoy philosophy, but her class was just awful. Learning more from the T.A. then I do her.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: Prof. Julie Allen has a clear and understandable teaching style. This class consisted of two in-class tests which were average difficulty, and two essays. She allows students to miss ONE out of two tests for a valid reason without any documentation, and provides a make-up assignment. A very fair marker; my grades were always higher than I expected.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: Shes an ok prof. you better have a clear head and re-read the textbook to understand it. you need to understand the materials rather than just memorize whats in the textbook. its pretty easy however the last paper was confusing to do because her outline for it was confusing. But she will help you alot if you just ask her for help.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: Prof. Allen is very monotone and boring to listen to in lecture. For a first year PHIL course this course in my opinion is intense. On the plus side she missed a ton of classes so our exam had less on it. If you can't write essays do not take this course. Basically 100% essays. And TA's make it or break it. Too much info for a 1st yr course!

Name: Julie Allen
Review: Professor Julie Allen is one of those 'old school' professors whose sole intent seems to be to get the students to learn the required material. Although she is a genuinely nice person, there is no room for ignorance in her classroom. I've taken two classes with her at York and I would take more if I could.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: She is a very monotone speaker making lectures very boring.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: She does explain some of the concepts pretty well, by using analogies. Though it is hard to follow when there is no lecture slide to focus on the material. My TA was not very good, she doesn't really help us understand the readings that much.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: A great professor. Explain the doubts using simple examples for better understanding. I took this full year course in 1 semester. Recommend this professor for this course

Name: Julie Allen
Review: Her voice is difficult to focus on.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: She is not terrible as some other students here said. Her lecture seems quite boring but the contents are very fruitful. She also makes some jokes during lecture and are funny. There are lots of works but she is not a tough grader. (she is very fair) She is a good professor and I would like to take her course again.

Name: Julie Allen
Review: She's pretty boring and so is the class. If it does not interest you, you won't do well I guess. I didn't even try but I got a B.

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: Hard.

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: Tough.

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: I wish I could give zeros. Why is she still teaching. Someone tell her to come read her reviews please.

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: Diane was comically bad.  Made multiple contradictory statements on the course website regarding the mid-term and the final.  Was terse or unavailable if anyone tried to contact her.  Made a typo in the description of the final exam that directed us to bring laptops (open book exam) when in fact they were NOT allowed (she forgot the word "Don't)

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: Awful teacher. Absolutely Zero support. Even if you ask for assistance and to fix your marks she ignores your msg or responds at best with an answer she copied and pasted to 300 other students. DO NOT TAKE.

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: worst professor ever

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: don't take any class with this prof extremly strict. A grade student will fail her class.

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: don't take any course with this prof..!

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: Worst class in my life please stay away from her.

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: She wasn't that bad. Not sure why noone liked her. She did a decent job teaching the material at least.

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: Honestly the worst prof ever. No feedback whatsoever on participation grades. Its almost as if shes not even there and it makes it worse since its online. Please nobody take this class unless you want your gpa to really drop!

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: My theory about this prof is that she isn't getting satisfied in the right manner if you know what I mean and she takes that bottled up tension out on her students. I am a terrific writer but still got a D+ in her class for adms 1010 which is seemingly an easy course but not with her.

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: Please avoid her at all cause.She has some issues.She is not helpful as well as her comments to every student is "Please apply theoretical explanation " when asked by users can you explain what excately are you looking for she never replied back to any student. York university should take her off the staff.I hope she reads this!!!!

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: Why she is allowed to continue teaching is simply beyond me! WORST PROF EVER!

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: This professor was very difficult. For those taking the ADMS 1010 course I do not recommend her!

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: awesome prof...her teaching manner is really good you will understand each and every thing in the class..

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: she's an okay teacher, just do your work/readings and you will do fine. Make sure you attend lectures because she posts nothing online so you'll have to hear what she expects of you in tests/assignments. Not an easy A class in the slightest.

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: Terrible professor! Although she goes through her slides quickly which makes it impossible for students to write it all down in time, she doesn't post lectures on the school website coz she has no clue about anything! Absolutely not recommending her to anyone, even straight A students! She will fail you!

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: terrible old lady. she treats first year students like graduate students. she's a fast talker, does not try to hear student's opinion. thus she is the LAW.

Name: Diane Jurkowski
Review: SHE IS A BIT HARD ON MARKS, BUT SERIOUSLY, AS A STUDENT YOU NEED TO STUDY HARD TO GET A GOOD MARK. WITH HER ALL YOU NEED IS TO ATTEND HE LECTURES AND YOU WILL BE FINE. ALSO SOMETIME TALK TO HER AFTER CLASS, SHE SOMETIMES GETS HAPPY IF YOU ASK HER A QUESTION; ESPECIALLY IF SHE KNOWS THE ANSWER..LOL NOW THE DECISION IS URS

Name: William Pietro
Review: He's the ISCI Chemistry professor for the whole year. For the future ISCI kids, he comes off as a guy who does not care about anything from the start, but as the course goes on, youll start to like him. Probably the best professor of the ISCI second term.

Name: William Pietro
Review: He is very knowledgeable and smart. But his test are a bit hard the final exam is hectic but if show up to class and do the questions from the chapters you will be fine.

Name: William Pietro
Review: If you like your GPA - Pietro is not the professor for you. Tests are BRUTAL.  He's an interesting lecturer but we're not here for theatrics and a joke here or there are we? As a 3rd year student looking back at it, I wouldn't recommend. I would avoid at all costs. If you're a Chemistry genius maybe you'll like it.

Name: William Pietro
Review: His lectures are decent, however not as good as others claim. His tests are very very tricky and it seems like he is out to get you a lot of the time. The textbook examples that you practice with do not help, the way to succeed is to use the old tests. It's not even worth it to do all the problems in the textbook.

Name: William Pietro
Review: Avoid at all costs. I do not understand how professor Pietro is getting good ratings on this. He is a terrible professor. His tests are extremely difficult. I had many mental breakdowns throughout the semester. Attend his lectures because he uses many formulas that are not in the textbook. He is not clear on what he is testing you on for tests.

Name: William Pietro
Review: I didn't do well in 1000 bc I did exactly what he told us NOT to do - write every single thing down and memorize. I got an A in 1001 bc I wrote nothing down in lectures, just paid close attention and went home and worked out all the practice qs myself. He's not testing if u know how to use a bunch of formulas, he's testing if u understand chem.

Name: William Pietro
Review: An amazing but challenging professor. He has lots of experience, and delivers above the expected in his lectures in both an entertaining and strict way. However, this class will be a challenging class. Doing well in this class is possible, but requires lots of textbook practice and review.

Name: William Pietro
Review: Yeah, he's a good professor in lectures and you've really got to pay attention to the formula he focuses on because those will be on the test and you will need to memorize them - tests are quite difficult but if you know those formulas and do lots of past tests and homework you'll be ok but get ready for lots of work

Name: William Pietro
Review: The best chem 1000/1001 prof in terms of lectures. The tests are harder than the others but if you study right with his past tests, you should be good. Do all the textbook questions and old tests

Name: William Pietro
Review: Funny guy, he's a chem Genius, tests are hard as hell tho. Like his beard alot. If you search his name on google, you'll find something funny lol.  Out of all seriousness, great prof, you HAVE to study, no joke, be prepared. But his classes are so worth and you will definitely be learning chemistry and a whole different level than the other profs

Name: William Pietro
Review: You can only enjoy this if you are a chem genius! His tests  are so hard and tricky. But his final exam which was written by 2 other profs was fair.  you will definitely fail the first midterm if you are an average student. He even tells you that every year his first midterm average is only 30%. good luck

Name: William Pietro
Review: Dr. Pietro by far has been a dream to receive lecture from. He is so passionate about his field that you will feel no other way than to love it just as much as he does. Unfortunately, that's as far as it goes. If you do all of the textbook homework without much difficulty that's fantastic but it doesn't cut it. Tests and exams are gruelling.

Name: William Pietro
Review: His test difficult was off the roof. I have a 90% average in all my african studies classes, however I am getting a 30% in this class before exams and I don't expect to pass despite putting in my best efforts!

Name: William Pietro
Review: Great prof for chem 1000 and 1001. Very clear explanations and generally pretty helpful during tutorial sections. Tests are tougher than the other profs but his lectures are the ones  that you want to go to. Pietro's tests are mostly application based,

Name: William Pietro
Review: hes tests are SUPER easy... you dont even have to show up to class just do textbook questions!!

Name: William Pietro
Review: Pietro isn't the easiest first year chem prof but he's definitely the best. His quizzes are quite fair once you realize that what he's really testing is how fast you can recognize what a question  is asking and solve it - and that comes with practice. The days before a quiz you should just be doing question after question to master the concepts...

Name: William Pietro
Review: I felt that his class was a bit more difficult in the sense that he taught a lot of things that were not included in the textbook, but more like for upper years. He expected his students to know more than first year stuff. But at the same time, he made class dynamic and interesting. His tests was hard but because he demanded more, exam was easy!

Name: William Pietro
Review: Professor Pietro was a great lecturer, who kept classes animated, interesting, and captivating. However, he's not a very nice guy, as he often makes unnecessary comments which he thinks are amusing. Also, his tests are quite difficult, so you really must understand all of the concepts to do well. He gets his students to work hard which is good.

Name: William Pietro
Review: I enjoyed his lectures a lot but from being in his class I started getting test anxiety because his quizzes are quite difficult and long and sometimes seemingly impossible.

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: The guy knows his stuff, but he cant teach it. He reads off the slides every class, so youre better off taking the blended online/class course cuz u wont learn anything by showing up. The tests are super hard, so expect a 50% average, but everyone does so poorly that you all get curved anyway.

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: 47% of his class failed the first mid term and he did not attempt to bell curve or help in any way besides lecturing us on how we should be putting more effort

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: Extremely nice. Ignore all the negative comments. This is my second course with him and although i did not do well, I have learnt a lot of valuable knowledge from him.

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: This professor puts the final exam on the last week of class just to attend a conference somewhere. Extremely unfair. Avoid his class. Report him if he does that to your class too

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: Here's the thing. Took 4 diff courses with him. Every semester there's gonna be something that makes his cut classes and put the midterms or finals earlier than normal. For this sem, the ECON3411's final exam is 2 weeks earlier than the final exam period, which is 6th of June. Extremely unfair to students. Avoid taking his class

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: Avoid this prof. He doesn't understand economic himself. Didn't explain course materials well and has no exam deferral for both midterm and final exam even for those with legit reason/proof at all.

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: Didnt post any materials AT ALL. Doesnt prepare himself before class. Lots of mistakes while explaining the core content. Refuse exam deferral at all so students will have to go straight to petition. Avoid taking his class

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: Knowledgable. Have to go to class as he does not upload anything online.

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: Decent course, but tough. Good professor & cares about his students, but you basically teach yourself the whole course. If you aren't going to pay attention in class don't show up because he doesn't like when people are on their phones. Don't waste his time and he won't waste yours. There are lots of resources offered to help you with ECON courses.

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: He is a great prof. However, he didn't come prepared for a few classes, so he had to waste time thinking out a few examples. Read slides, and then often make mistakes elaborating the points. (will correct them next class)

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: Freaking terrible accent. Cannot understand what he teaches. The lecture is boring, but he is a good guy :))

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: Lectures are boring. Reads off the slides. Can easily get angry if class fails to participate. Text book will be your best friend.

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: His classes are easy if you do all the readings he assigns, come prepared to lectures to understand the material better.

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: I just didnt like how he spent most of the class lecturing us on being late. he also went on and on about how we dont use moodle. i just felt like i taught myself the whole course. boring lectures but he seems like a nice guy thats trying to explain

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: Midterm is easy, final is a little bit harder The overall is not so hard Focus more on the graph, his question is very directly to test you.

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: Class attendance usually very low (boring lecturer). Heavily based online with weekly homework's and a couple online quizzes. Comes off as lazy and does little to help, provides very little help when emailed. Exams are very difficult and expects you to draw out entire diagrams and graphs, offers no guidance or prep on how to best prepare for them.

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: Hes a very good lecturer.

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: Straightforward, throws in a joke here and there, and is overall a great prof. Lectures can get boring at times, but if you take the blended course then everything will work itself out.

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: very nice & funny professor. lectures can be boring, but if you take blended online/in-class I recommend doing the textbook readings each week (jot down a few notes), following the study plan on myeconlab, and doing the practice exams online. sure to be successful by doing so! I didn't go to any lectures.

Name: Ardeshir Noordeh
Review: Great Prof.

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: If I could go back in time and not take this class, I would. Seems fun at first but then you get your marks back and you arent laughing. Despite how much effort you put in he wont give you higher than mid 80s, people got feedback of excellent but got grades of 80s. At the end he went crazy curving everyone down to meet department averages.

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: The text is Experimental Design for the life sciences. read it for first 6 weeks then have test. good fair questions, mostly about application. then you get to have some fun with a grant proposal and also short student talks. good course. the grading is fair but definitely at upper level.

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: Rude

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: Run as far as u can. Marks hard!

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: Text then papers. Got to write your own grant proposal.

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: Beware this class. Nobody got an A+, 6 people got As, and the rest fell below (B+ or lower). He is a hard marker and purposefully curves down on tests/assignments to meet department averages, even when nobody is at an A+. There is no curve at the end. If you are pre-med/pre-dental/pre-vet and your trying for an A+ avoid!!!

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: Hes soo passionate about his work, and always makes the lectures very interesting. Very applied course with many journal articles to read. And a poster session at the end, which was awesome. One of the best profs at York, I'll never forget how great he was as a prof. Take this course for sure!

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: fun class with good readings. super interesting to see how environmental science relates to people.

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: We read a book together for the first 6 wks. Excellent book. A bit pricey. each week, he also lectures about the content and WHAT it means too. that is the hard part. plus I liked experiments in labs.

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: The course was biology for environmental management. Very applied course and we worked through a lot of readings. All journal papers no textbook. Good, I liked the poster at the end on the topic of our choice.

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: in experimental design, we did a grant proposal for grant school. I got in because of this.

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: Just rediscovered the text and my notes for some contract work for MNR. Cool that it was useful in trying to decide how to design an experiment with different kinds of controls. need more courses like this at yorku.

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: Biostats was a grad course. Big focus on R and coding.

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: Excellent stats course.

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: big focus on reading papers. that is ok but just be prepared

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: Best class ever. We did a big poster session at end with pizza and had a guest judge that was a real science reported. cool!

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: BIology for environmenrtal management was an applied course where you get a topic each week then reverse engineer the solution. then a group poster that end. good format. upper year.

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: nice prof and good class!

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: biostats was super helpful. very funny prof.

Name: Christopher Lortie
Review: stellar class

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: Gives engaging lectures. Old school prof, doesn't tolerate people disrupting the class. Fantastic.

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: Most compassionate and funny professor I encountered in first year. Genuinely loves teaching and his students and will do whatever he can to ensure your success. Beautiful man.

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: Amazing professor. Honestly the best prof in first year. Was going to going into chem. eng just because of him. This would bless your first year if you got him

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: such a gem, but NEVER GO ON YOUR PHONE IN HIS CLASS, anyways hes a great teacher although he can be a bit intimidating to some people. If you're one of those people then I would recommend sitting at least 4 or 5 rows back, regardless hes great and gets the point across and hes also caring too

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: Beautiful man, beautiful prof

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: The best, most passionate prof you can imagine. He's scary, but amazing.

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: Best Prof Ever .

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: The best prof even theoretically possible. The man showed up for a early morning lecture after having surgery at 4AM. Most dedicated, caring person at any university for my money. Made a subject I hated a must-attend. Offered to help even after the 2nd prof took over. Just imagine every good thing a prof could do, and thats him. A god amongst men.

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: Miss His amazing lecture so much

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: He's the best

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: Seems like a nice guy, but he has his priorities for how much time he spends on the content all wrong. He spends 4 weeks on review then tries to teach all the new hard content in a week. Also his APSC131 final is all thermo and that is bullcrap because there is more to the course than just thermodynamics!

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: honesty is the best kind of prof!

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: He's the  best. You can go to him anytime and he is always that patient and funny. He cares about students. Just a great prof and a great man. Sad that he's not teaching me now.

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: Excellent prof. Makes learning very easy. 5***

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: great guy, great face

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: Great prof!

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: Newstead is a beauty! Helpful, comical, and really gets the point across. pay attention in class though because he will call you out in the middle of a lecture.

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: Newstead baby! I'm gonna miss you

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: Newstead baby, you're the bomb .com. One of the best prof's  of first year, genuinely cares about the class, always available to give a helping hand. All assessments are fair, and he does drop hints during lectures (so make sure to go!). Made 8:30 am classes not half bad.

Name: Bill Newstead
Review: Most caring professor I've ever encountered. There for extra help always, will give you his personal phone number if you are in desperate need and is overall amazing if you put in the effort.

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: Online course but I wish I had taken a course with Gauthier in person! His lectures are interactive which make doing the module so much more fun. There are weekly quizzes of 3-6 questions each but there are easy to do. You have to get each part of the questions correct to get full marks, though. Overall the course is great! Happy Birthday!

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: Honestly, I had him for two 3 hour lectures basically back to back and still went to every one. He was very fair in the way he did things and overall Has been my favourite prof Ive had at queens. He gives ample opportunity to do well and I cant wait to take another one of his classes.

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: Professor Phil is engaging and creative with the ways in which he presents material. I really enjoyed his class and would take it again!

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: My friend who isn't even in film started coming to class because she loves him so much. 10/10 the only prof I would send photos of my cat to. Great class, his emails are the best thing in my life right now.

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: Im a kinesiology student in my 4th year here at Queen's and Ive never taken a film course before but after taking this one, I regret not taking more throughout my time at university! The prof is always in incredible spirits and really puts a lot of effort into making this class the most fun it possibly can be! Would definitely recommend!!!

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: I love this prof soooooooooooooo much!!!!!! he is sooooo funny and tried so hard to make us not boring in the class and he is sooo kind and supportive all the time!

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: Phil is a very fun prof. If you can pay attention and put in some effort, you can do really well in his courses. He has entertaining lectures with lots of jokes, and obscure references.

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: The prof is silly but filled with wisdom at the same time. Be aware of in-class karaoke.

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: He is so humorous, I like him!!!

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: This is my favorite professor in Queen's University and his class is super intriguing including FILM 240 and FILM 260(Online). He gives very fair grades and thorough feedbacks, I would definitely take his classes again in the future.

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: Good class, but the powerpoint needs improvement.

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: He is a nice teacher. I would like to take his class again in other course next year.

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: An absolute gem. Couldn't be more of a hype-beast, totally just wants you to do well and learn about the wonders of science fiction. Love you Phil, thanks for your amazing work

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: awesome!

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: phil was a great guy to say the least. Very understanding and funny. thoroughly enjoyed his class

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: Phil is a really great professor and he always loves to make student engaged to class and enjoy the learning process: He shows clips, tells jokes and it makes a 3hr lecture easier to handle than it should be.

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: This prof makes it easy to do well if you are putting in the effort. He works hard on his lectures and actually cares about the well-being of his students. So do yourself a favour and show up, laugh at his corny jokes, and appreciate one of the few profs who are passionate about their course and rooting for their students to do well. 10/10

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: He is a really good prof! Very enthusiastic and interesting. He really makes the lectures fun and interactive. He plays songs, funny videos, sound effects, and kahoots at the end of class. The tests and assignments aren't too difficult either. The lectures do drag on a bit, and the 3 hour class could definitely be shortened (it often ends early).

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: Great class, even better prof. Prof Gauthier is a real beauty!

Name: Philippe Gauthier
Review: I literally love Phil. He makes this course engaging and supports everyone to do well!

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: Alan Ableson is an awesome professor! He makes his lectures readily accessible on YouTube, has plenty of helpful resources online, and can make complex topics simple. He also takes the time to help you out if you need it, and he is always energetic and eager. Overall a lovely professor and a lovely human being.

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: I've used Alan Abelson's online videos since I got a really. awful prof, and they've saved my life!! Awesome guy who cares about what he's doing, not everyone would make their lectures so readily available for students.

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: Amazing teacher . He is so enthusiastic about topics that would otherwise be boring. He always has a smile on his face and makes me want to go to lectures. His teaching method is so good for me where we do lots of practice questions in class! Grading was fair on tests and everything else although exam was a little difficult.

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: Absolute favourite professor. Great attitude, always has a smile on his face, and puts in a lot of effort to make students succeed. Tests are a fair assessment of the material, no surprises if you do the practice problems. Overall great at explaining difficult concepts and provides lots of opportunities to practice!

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: you need to watch a bunch of videos and does not teach you anything

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: Tests are not too difficult if you pay attention in class, nothing is a surprise. Super great pace

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: He's awesome math is just hard

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: Guy is a real gem but really hard exams

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: He absolutely loves what he is teaching and is excited to be teaching it, all around 10/10 guy

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: Alan is an excellent prof. He brings his cheerleader attitude into the lecture. His lectures were the ones where I actually wanted to pay attention to. His tests were very fair and most of the questions were very similar to the homework. But as good as he is, BEWARE OF THE EXAMS!!! His exams are very unfair and class averages sit in the 50s.

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: A really great prof. Brings positive energy into all of his lectures.

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: My personal hero, made learning fun.

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: Ableson is such a great professor! I am not a fan of calculus but he made me excited to learn. He's very good at explaining concepts if you go during his office hours, and he's very willing to help if you're having a hard time. I got hurt during the exam period and he helped me find the resources I needed. 10/10 great guy

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: Ableson is the best professor ever! He's so kind and accommodating to students. When I saw that he was teaching this course I knew that I had to take it. I only went to the lectures because of him! He's super friendly and approachable. And his laugh makes my day.

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: Ableson is an awesome professor who tries so hard to help you succeed. He is very good at explaining. His tests can be challenging but for the most part they are fair.

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: clear and straightforward. good at clarifying concepts.

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: AMAZING guy. I looked forward to his lectures, he genuinely likes the subject and he always sounds like he's on the verge of laughing. He explains the course material very clearly, but there is a lot of material and, I found it went too quickly. But, the LDIs were very helpful and he's accessible outside of class. He's a real gem.

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I LOVE ALAN I

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: Great prof, would take again.

Name: Alan Ableson
Review: I love this course! I love Ableson! Notice me senpai.

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Interesting class, easy to understand, encouraged participation and questions. Real life examples were good.

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Lecture was very easy to understand

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Lot of information backed up by research papers, useful for further reading.

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Explained things well but its a tough topic

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Good amount of slides not too long good pace of delivery and very good at explaining certain concepts

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Made sure to check we were all understanding as he went along. Referred to current research going on to give an insight in the relevance. Gave appropriate breaks.

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Very good and interesting lecture, but not too many words on screen so note taking was essential. Also he did not put the lecture slides up which was slightly inconvenient

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: A lecture with lots of new content but it was lead out clearly with lots of diagrams to help explain the concepts. I like that the research paper is included for the slides so I know where I can find out more.

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Good short lecture slides

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Good clear lectures on a topic which can come across as difficult.

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Lecture was clear and diagrams well explained. Made what is a difficult topic understandable. Would he helpful if the lecture slides were made available for revision purposes.

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Lecture content well explained Learning outcomes met

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Lecture on EPCs was actually brilliant. The way it was explained was very good and easy to understand and there wasn't so much information that you couldn't pay attention. Really liked the use of papers and micrographs. Describing EPCS with the baby and sports was so helpful.

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Really and explains things clearly

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Encourages participation.

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Enjoy earning about his previous research

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Great lectures, in depth knowledge and passionate about teaching

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: lectures are short and to the point. keeps it interesting.

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Clear lectures with great use of examples. Explains tough topics in an intuitive manner.

Name: Reinhold Medina
Review: Takes breaks through lectures to make sure everyone is following and has no questions which I really appreciate!

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: Fun&great guy don't get me wrong but he writes way too fast and I feel like he solves the problems for himself and not for us. So we leave class just as lost as we walked in...

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: Somi has a significant clear step by step on board explanation on sample questions and principles. Overall excellent prof. Indian accent may hard to understand but not bad.

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: He teaches very quickly and can sometimes be difficult to follow, but he genuinely cares about students success and will gladly slow down to explain a concept if asked.

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: Somi is an absolute gem. He is reliable, always available outside of class to talk to/get extra help from. He is very approachable, and non-judgemental. His exams are a little tough, but fair, and very manageable if you put the work in. One of my favourite profs.

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: He gives jokes every week in class

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: After struggling and being confused for weeks with another prof, I had Somi for J. He was fantastic, constantly showing many examples and helping us through learning catalytics! I wish I would have gone to his lectures in the beginning because of how much of a difference he made. I have nothing but great things to say about him.

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: Definitely my favourite prof. He was always available for help if needed and liked to make class fun with demos and jokes.

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: Professor Somi really cares about his students. He was always there whenever I needed help, and never once judged me if I didn't understand a topic.  Goes a bit fast in lectures, so make sure you do pay attention. If you do miss anything, he's always available during office hours. Amazing prof, really made me like 112.

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: Terrible at explaining things and not very helpful but luckily the class was just 206 repeated.  Wouldn't recommend for classes that are actually hard.

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: If you're worried about struggling in this course see him for extra help! He is extremely clear and caring one-on-one and helped me throughout the semester.

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: He is a pretty good prof, cares for his students if you put in the effort and can keep your attention. His derivations do become messy and his board use is atrocious. His messiness was much more apparent in 112 rather than 111. Can get pretty mad, sort of randomly, did more than once in 111, and 112.

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: Don't confuse 'funny' with 'good'. I sure didn't.

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: He genuinely really cares about students, I saw him for extra help quite a bit during the semester and he was always helpful. Go to his review session before the final! Dont rely just on class to teach the material, I realized in the second half of the semester I needed to use the textbook and online resources along with extra help.

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: He's actually a good prof. I don't know why people are so bitter, physics is a hard subject don't expect to put in no work and do well.
