Somi is enthusiastic during lectures, and has an open door policy meaning you can to his office when ever he is there for help. Also you can email him with any questions you have and he'll help!

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: :/ if you can switch profs i would.

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: His lectures and course is structured rlly badly. He's personally a decent guy, his jokes are good but teaching wise...GET ME SOMEONE ELSE!

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: excellent professor!

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: Seems like a nice guy, people tend to overlook his terrible ability to teach because of the occasional jokes he drops during lectures. Most lectures are dull and uninformative. His tests and quizzes are most of the time just not fair.

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: Great prof, always willing to help you out if u go to office hours. Exams are hard, but his weekly puns make up for that, overall great prof

Name: Somi Narayanan
Review: Terrible professor, spends entire lecture only going through examples. Even so, his chalkboard organization is terrible. He makes the final J section exam much much harder than the normal course. He even told us that 'I'm no nice guy, the final will be much harder'. Doesn't seem to properly go over theory. He may be funny, yes..but bad at teaching.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Worst prof I've ever had at Queen's. He doesn't teach the material and gives extremely hard exams. If you skip class you will lose marks because every class is either a lab or a quiz, and he leaves no room for error.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Sets up course so that if you skip any class you will be losing grades, as every class is either a quiz or a lab. The quizzes, labs, and pre-lab are an unreasonable amount of work and do not help my understand of the material whatsoever. His lectures are just him preaching and no actual exam content.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Would highly consider investing in the testbank since he pulls all the exam questions from the bank. No point in going to lecture since all tested material is covered in the textbook but a decent lecturer to listen to. Grading and course organization is fair

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Tripp is a nice prof, but seems to get carried away in anecdotal stories during lecture that barely pertain to the material. Doesn't cover anything in lecture that is on the exams, and makes the questions the tiniest details from the textbook that no one would ever think to study.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Not a fan.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Nice person, horrible professor. My worst course at Queen's, and his semester was the worst part of the class. Lectures don't even show up on exams (only the textbook does) and his exams were unnecessarily difficult. He also said he wouldn't put names on the exam, and at least 5 questions were about psychologists. Went off topic often in lecture.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Silver fox and basically Tim Allan's Hotter twin

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Dean Tripp is my favourite professor at Queen's. His lectures got me up in the morning because I loved hearing him speak. His personal stories add a lot to the lecture and aid understanding. His tests are not hard at all as long as you go to lecture (sometimes) and read the textbook. He's is very supportive, and wants the best for his students.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Great lecturer, great professor -- lazy grader. Questions are recycled from the Textbook's testbank which can be found online and accessed by anyone.  Textbook stimulated my interest in the subject significantly, but be prepared to read  every single detail.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: The prof is a funny person, but really isn't qualified for a great teacher. The materials covered in the tests are way more than what he talked about in class, you have to read the textbook really thoroughly to do good on the tests.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: His lectures are pretty unrelated to the material. He talks mostly about himself. One thing I found is that he's extremely biased. You can tell exactly what he thinks about different disorders when in lecture. He is pretty dismissive of some mental disorders while he really focused on how debilitating others are. Not the best quality in a professor

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: He tells funny stories, but they aren't related to course content and do not help you learn the material. His examples on his clinical patients were interesting. The exams for this class are extremely difficult - many questions test specific irrelevant content in the textbook. Only textbook material is on the exam - lectures are pointless.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: I only go to lectures to listen to him speak. He goes off topic a lot but its always really interesting and hilarious. You definitely need to read the textbook, as the tests are taken solely from the textbook. Overall the lectures could cover the topics a bit better but Dean's anecdotes make up for it.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Took positive psychology, very easy class(dont bother going to lecture, its straigh out of the textbook). Thought him to be a pretty unfair teacher

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Informative class, and practical for my own lifestyle. Good content and material, not particularly difficult but a good amount to memorize and know. Disliked how the lectures weren't very helpful

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: As said, he tests straight from the textbook. But he will choose ridiculously obscure details for the sole purpose of manipulating the grades of the students in the class.  The "great" anecdotal stories he tells in class lack insightfulness- after a while you realize they all contain the same fruitful simplistic theme. Cant believe he wins awards

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Tripp is just mailing it in at this point. He shows up, chats about his life for 45 minutes, then might half-heartedly get to the lecture. He doesn't even make up his own tests!  The guy doesn't hold a candle to Bowie, Chivers, Holden, Dringenberg, Menard, or any of the other great psyc profs at Queen's. Avoid him.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Expect to read the entire textbook because lectures are relatively anecdotal (which is nice) but he doesn't usually leave enough time to get through the lecture in detail. The professor often says "read it in the textbook" and moves on.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Whole course is just reading from the textbook! Exams are not made by him, but he takes questions from the textbook that sometimes have no relevance. Hard to study for.

Name: Dean A Tripp
Review: Tripp's a really lazy prof, he doesn't seem to put any effort into his lectures or exams.  People love him because he jokes around in class, but he doesn't actually teach you anything or prepare you for future classes. I go to class to learn and Tripp was a disappointment

Name: John Hanes
Review: John Hanes is the best prof this university has ever seen. All tested material comes from the lectures but is also reused year after year so if you study old exams you'll do fine. All exams and midterms are 100% memorization, but the lectures are great. 10/10 would go for a hike up a volcano with this guy. Highly recommend.

Name: John Hanes
Review: Class is boring, try not to fall asleep! His theory on exams is stupid, why do I care is the theoretical mark for knowing nothing is 20%? The content on there is basically multiple guess because its a bunch of stats! Does he not remember talking about key concepts? because random numbers were on there more than the big ideas! Its a crap shoot!

Name: John Hanes
Review: He is a nice person. But he is old. His lecture is efficient but boring so you have to force yourself to focus. But if you follow up, you won't regret.

Name: John Hanes
Review: Amazing prof teaching a course that a lot of people don't really seem care about. Met with him outside of class for a long discussion, ended up helping me pick my major. Awesome guy  and very good professor, loved both him and his course.

Name: John Hanes
Review: Honestly just study previous mid terms and exams from the exam bank to pass with a high mark. The exam from 2015 was 90% of the same material as the one in 2016.

Name: John Hanes
Review: Great teacher. Exams are nice and easy

Name: John Hanes
Review: Loved this class!!!! and the hockey stick.

Name: John Hanes
Review: Amazing lecturer, he is extremely clear and makes everything interesting.  Difficult exams, study old ones to do well

Name: John Hanes
Review: Amazing guy, really got me interested in the material. Its definitely different than other class styles and you have to get used to taking notes and listening carefully. Labs are pretty cool if you put the effort in.

Name: John Hanes
Review: Very good Professor

Name: John Hanes
Review: a fantastic professor, goes thru the material quite nicely and effectively, cares about his students and makes volcanoes and earthquakes interesting. exam is very fair and pretty much the exact same as from exam bank. loved this guy

Name: John Hanes
Review: Hanes was amazing! Couldn't have asked for a better proff.  Makes the stuff extremely interesting and gets you interested in geology.

Name: John Hanes
Review: Great prof! Old-fashioned but effective teacher. The exam was the exact same as the one from exambank!

Name: John Hanes
Review: the class is interesting if you don't know anything about science, but if you do it's SO boring. easy, but boring. it's all common sense. i lost a lot of respect for him when he had 4 graphs in a row all with time on the y-axis....rookie mistake

Name: John Hanes
Review: Amazing speaker. Apparently been at Queen's for many decades, absolutely passionate about what he teaches, makes class interesting. In labs learn many rocks. Would have never taken a geology class unless was mandatory at Queen's for first year engineers but worth it just to hear Hockeystick Hanes talk

Name: John Hanes
Review: When you're in class it doesn't seem like class, its just interesting

Name: John Hanes
Review: Influential, brilliant, moving, poignant, and honourable.

Name: John Hanes
Review: Awesome :D

Name: John Hanes
Review: Uses slides and goes fast. Hockey stick for a pointer.

Name: John Hanes
Review: Amazing prof!  Absolutely dedicated to what he teaches.  He deserves nothing but respect from his students.

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: "Teaching is about making connections; connections between teacher and student, connections between student and subject, connections between theory and practice…. and of course synaptic connections between students' brain cells" Leo The Great!

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: Prof Jonker was the first person at Queens that showed an interest in my well being. I had severe mental health issues and my attendance and grades were poor. He went out of his way to ask how I was doing and what he could do to help. An absolutely wonderful human being. He also made things very clear for me as a ConEd student with no math skills

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: Absolutely the best math prof at Queen's. Awesome person if you talk to him personally too.

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: Best prof ever. If you ever have to go see him for anything, he's a great guy "in person" too.

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: Jonker's the man! I'm so sad he's not teaching anymore :(

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: Smart man

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: He is the greatest calc prof ever!!

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: AMAZING PROF

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: Best professor of first year calculus. very fair and he's such a nice man. great!!!

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: Dr. Jonker is a fantastic professor.  He runs an interactive class, posing questions and challenging students to think about how to solve each problem.

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: One of my best first year profs. Extremely helpful and knowledgeable.

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: I hated Calculus before i took this course.  Jonker is the most amazing math teacher.  I understand integrals and derivatives so much better since taking his course.  he's also more than willing to answer any questions you have.  The best teacher of first year eng by far.

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: No Comments

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: I don't know what's up with the negative comments, but Jonker is by far one of the greatest professors currently teaching first year.  His course is well organized, his lectures clear, and the tutorials are aligned perfectly with the course material.  He consistently challenges students to understand the material, and not just memorize.

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: The last comment is jokes man. Whoever wrote that doesn't know what a good prof is and what a good teacher is. Leo Jonker is one of the best profs of first year Queen's. He makes time for everyone and is ready to provide personal attention to every single student. He teaches you how to think and tries to open your mind when working on math.

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: Calculus was my favourite class before I had Jonker as a professor. He makes everything much more complicated than it needs to be.  He tries every day tp turn a lecture of 400 people into a 'group discussion'.  This simply is not possible and a waste of time for those who do want to learn.

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: I never went to his lectures but whenever you have trouble with something you can always drop him an e-mail or by his office and he'll help you.  I hated the guest lecturers

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: Greatest math professor

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: this guy is top notch...way better than those foreign Grad Students who randomly teach the class

Name: Leo B Jonker
Review: Great guy.

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: Best elective in commerce program with long waiting lists to get in. Top prof too.

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: In engineering and Took this towards my certificate in business. was the most fascinating and current elective for me. Hadnt done much team work or PowerPoint presentations. Am now much better and more confident. JP is accessible 24/7. Can earn a Marketing Excellence award if you get 90 percent or higher which about 1/3 of the class did!

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: Variety variety of very interesting, challenging marketing assignments, readings, etc. I am a life sci major And the workload was OK. I liked assignments every few few weeks so we could see how we were doing each step. The TAs had taken the course so they knew how to help and relate to me. Prof even hosted a thanksgiving brunch. Very kind.

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: Good marketing course with good video reviews of assignments and grading. Very fair and enjoyable.

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: Shopify and Blog projects bets experience in commerce so far. Financial support from FaceBook and Shopify made it very real and practical. Mint course, guests and professor

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: First marketing course as elective. Worth it. Wish more courses like this. Thnx prof.

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: Take anything JP offers if you can get into them. Current materials and exercises. Helpful for career and self development. Makes the learning fun and relevant to current events. A winner.

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: I was off campus but JP made the online experience fun with his video taped lectures and demonstrations about metrics, concepts, etc. He tore apart every case study line by line for us to show how to do deep anaylsis. This was the best. The grading was timely and the rubrics fair. Sign up if you want a super online marketing experience.

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: JP is hands down, the best professor of all time. His classes provided so many relevant and inspiring experiences and opportunities that have already transformed my life for the better.

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: Make sure you form good groups for the major blog and shopify projects because that will help you earn the Digital Marketing Excellence Awards. This entire experience was tops. Doc P always says "to launch big ships you must go where the water is deep". This course is a big ship and as the saying goes..." Go big or go home" :-)

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: Much work, many assignments and goodd helpful takeaways. As exchange student was demanding and top course for me in all university time. Professor invited exchange students to his home for meal. Merci!

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: Ditto ditto ditto to all the previous course comments about JPs digital marketing course. The Mount Everest of unforgettable experiences in the BComm if you're lucky enough to get into it.

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: Got a job because of this course content and assignments. Amazing but not a surprise because Prof knows his stuff and has huge lists of contacts.

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: Best course in the MBA program. No doubts. Creativity + digital marketing + fun + state of the art materials and lectures. Super.

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: The visitors from Google and Facebook weee the best. I earned one of the digital marketing excellence awards. Prof also encouraged us to earn the free online Google certifications and I got 3 of the 6 possible ( analytics, vdeo, Adwords). Many skills learned and digital tools too. Thank you JP and remember enroll early beaucse!!

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: Super course, super relevant, super guests, super fun.

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: If you don't have a lot of exp. with digital marketing and your resume is weak in this area try and get into this course . The best of everything. !!!!

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: Best guests from top digital marketing companies super TAs, and projects all interesting and helpful no matter what your major stream. Sign up early hard to get in.

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: COMM339 is a recently reinstated class for 2016 (hasn't been taught in about 6 years). Absolutely amazing. The online textbook used was a great read and super relevant to digital marketing (will read again!). Guest speakers from Shopify, Facebook, and Google. Class projects developed your skills in SEO, Shopify Platform management, Blog creation

Name: John Pliniussen
Review: Professor P has just started this new internet mrkting course and the waiting list for both sections is supposely largest ever. Amazing guest speakers already, relevant projects, and amazing online resources. sign up for this asap because its a musthave for any Bcomm. Plus he is anice guy who really seems to care about our careers and lives.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: caring professor but way too unorganized. Never posted slides even though she said she would and didnt respond to many emails of mine. When I was having a rough time she gave me an extension but honestly she was an unorganized lecturer & did not know OnQ

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: Awesome prof, if you have her be sure to see her sometimes after class if you have trouble understanding any of the material.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: I am impressed of her knowledge on the course I have taken. She is helpful and fair. You need to follow her class and do necessary readings. As long as you fulfill requirements, there is no reason to fail or to get low marks.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: Lectures are extremely difficult to follow, I honestly don't know why she uses PowerPoint at all as she almost never refers to the slides and zooms through them too fast to even read. Communicating with her is extremely difficult. The material is interesting and I did learn something, but I think it's a bit of a stretch to call it a history class.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: I took her HIST241 class and I barely could bring myself to go to class. Her lectures are unorganized, impossible to follow and mainly just her showing random youtube videos. She sometimes responds to emails, but absolutely not at the rate she should be.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: I took her 122 class, and she was awful. But I thought that maybe a smaller class size would be better. Still awful. Shows documentaries in almost every lecture.  Her lectures are extremely unorganized. She is not open to anyone else's opinions. Does not respond to emails. Extremely judgemental. If you want an education, do not take her courses.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: During lecture she comes across as bumbling, unknowledgeable and fails to property organize slides or course material in a substantive way. Trust me: take Canadian history in first year if you are going to major or minor in it.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: A very pleasant prof who clearly loves what she teaches. She is super out going and friendly and stimulates interest in the subject. The course is super easy and entertaining. Some people might say she is scatter brained, but she sticks to the syllabus and her lectures are always interesting.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: Her consumer history course was great! Loved it! Learn a lot about the transforming history of consumerism. She is a set in her ways, but if you accept that her opinion and that you are entitled to your own you will be fine. Definitely write the papers towards her opinion and you'll do fine.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: She is all over the place and is not open to slightest criticism of her old fashion beliefs.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: She tries to engage her students to the course, her lectures can be disorganized, which is ok for me, I don't really mind that. However, the real problem for me is that most of her ideas are quite a bit out of date, she does not seem to follow the recent literature on the topics that she teaches.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: Can be rather unorganized, but it pays off! It forces us to keep track of what's going on ourselves as opposed to sitting on our butts. Would recommend her seminars, they are a lot of fun.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: Ariel Salzmann is the weakest link of the department, she is famous for her incoherent, unstructured and unorganized lectures. Basically, run!

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: Her lectures on Middle Eastern history is way more confusing and hard to follow than the present day situation of the Middle East. She starts talking about a subject, then she jumps to another topic, then another, and another, it is virtually impossible to understand if there can possibly be a connection between these pieces of information.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: Lectures are very scattered and hard to follow. LOTS of reading, and you come out having no idea what you learned. The plus was that the exam focused on very major themes so it was still doable.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: Ms. Salzmann seemed enthusiastic about what she was teaching. Unfortunately, enthusiasm is not always conducive towards helpful lectures. Her thoughts were often disorganized and scattered, and her lectures lacked clarity and structure. It wasn't until the end of the semester until she told us "this is what you should focus on, go back to your note

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: Salzmann does not know the difference between teaching and monologue. Plus, she is all over the place jumping from one topic to the next. It is so sad that the material she "teaches" is actually very interesting, but she somehow manages to ruin it all.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: Let me put in this way: in a perfect world she would NOT be teaching even in a high school let alone a high profile university. She is not a bad person, but being a professor and teaching is simply not her thing and she should have chosen herself a different occupation.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: She taught first semester of 122 4 years ago and helped me fall in love with history. She spent the semester  just teaching us rather than just following the course. I probably learned more that semester than the rest of my undergrad and none of it was tested. It was genuinely just about learning.

Name: Ariel Salzmann
Review: Found her to be a little disorganized, she didn't put many words on her slides and then didn't make it any easier to note down what she was saying during lecture because she would start with one thing and then go to a whole different thing that left you very confused. A sweet person though, and her dog is entertaining.

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: good guy, clearly cares about his students and want them to do well, but does a horrible job explaining the material with useless "virtual experiments" and his exam was very tough

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: funny guy, wants his students to do well, too bad he isn't very easy to understand... only had him for 3 weeks, it was plenty...

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: Great teacher that really cares about students. Puts a lot of effort into making sure students understand by using lots of analogies and examples. Funny and engaging. Creates a great atmosphere to learn in

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: He's a nice guy, and he seemed to care about the students, but his accent made it difficult to understand what he was saying sometimes. It got better as time went by, but he still seemed to go through things a little quickly

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: So hard to understand at times, but he's a super nice guy who puts a LOT of effort into making sure you understand the material and are ready for the exam.

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: FAV PROF!

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: n/a

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: What a great teacher

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: The first half of the course was a gong show (thermodynamics...) but once he got into the materials stuff it got a little more interesting (still fell asleep in class a lot, though). Not the most approachable person (especially due to serial napping). I relied heavily on the textbook. Open book did not go well.

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: Open note exams and uses questions straight from the text book assigned questions that you get to bring to class. He puts no work into his lectures the figures are stolen straight from the text. He gets good marks cus he babies us.

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: One love.

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: One of my favourite professors at Queen's. Really cares about his students, and does his best to make you enjoy his classes. Would definitely recommend this prof.

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: Want to learn something new in a friendly and stimulating atmpsphere? Take this course.

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: what can I say...except he is the best prof in the chem department hands down! I took his 4th year course simply because he was teaching it.

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: This site should consider only more recent ratings in the overall prof-smiley.  It seems, from ancient posts, that he used to bore students to tears.  These days, however, he deserves all smiles!  Perhaps extra smiles for improving so much!  The material's tough (especially thermo) but the funny/useful applications and his anectodes are fabulous.

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: This professor is just great!

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: He seems to care about us, clear explenations, so far interesting

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: Sweet little old man - I just adore this guy.  However, the subject is really damned hard (especially for the physics non-inclined), and sometimes it's difficult to figure out what he's trying to say.  The open book tests were a life saver, and you really got the idea taht he wanted you to do well.  Awesome prof!

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: He likes the subject and enjoys teaching it. Good prof to have. Open-book exam is great.

Name: Gregory Jerkiewicz
Review: Very well-organized, easy-to-follow material. Open-book tests!

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: Best prof at Queen's by far. His lectures are basically long essays and he uses prescient examples to back up his points. Definitely gonna take whatever course he teaches in the future.

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: I found Professor Nossal's lectures to be very hit or miss. Sometimes it would be a lecture that I was engaged in, sometimes he would rant for what felt like hours. He was difficult to understand at times, but he used a lot of examples which was helpful during the exam. Lectures are a choice, but he doesn't use OnQ so if you miss it, you miss a lot

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: Dr. Nossal is easily my favourite prof at Queen's. His lectures, while long, are very informative. His exams are really fair and the marking isn't crazy hard because he knows his content is pretty subjective. GO TO CLASS! He does not post any lecture materials online! Seriously the nicest, funniest prof! I'll take anything he teaches, he's awesome.

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: kim nossal is an amazing prof. He is clearly very intelligent and his lectures are never dull. 10/10 would take again

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: KIM NOSSAL IS A LEGEND. NO WORDS FOR THIS MAN.

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: Great prof that made all classes very interesting!

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: First off, my man Kimmy is a legend. 11/10 would be his apostle. Doesnt upload slides on OnQ so going to class is helpful. Plus, hes a fun guy so that doesnt hurt. He gave me a birthday shoutout too. What a G.

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: Nossal is an incredible specimen who is so articulate and well-spoken, yet absolutely hilarious. He loves what he teaches. He doesn't use onQ though, so going to the lectures realllly helps.

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: Dr. Nossal is quirky, humorous, and routinely replies to emails. It might feel like he's rambling at times, but that "rambling" is a part of a strict outline that Dr. Nossal follows -- point, example, explain, explain. These 10+ essay-style lectures clearly illustrate Dr. Nossal's points, leaving it difficult to be confused. 10/10 top lad

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: I love Kim

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: Nossal is a top-tier prof. Great lecturer and really funny at times. When I first took his class I thought none of his slides made any sense and felt I wasn't learning anything, but come time to write my essay and exam I found I had actually learned a lot! I'm super pumped to take his third year course!

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: A fair professor who will answer your emails quickly. His lectures are captivating and effectively build upon each other as the semester progresses. Easy to do well if you attend every lecture.

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: Lectures were hit and miss. Sometimes you'll have a good laugh, sometimes you'll be deriving a word from its latin or greek meaning - as brutal as it sounds

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: Great prof, always available to talk to you and replies to emails really quickly. Uses detailed powerpoint which helps to take notes, but does not put them up, attendance needed. Does not have a textbook but there are reading that you need to do, best to do them weekly. He has great eyebrows and is a great lecturer makes going to class worth it.

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: Amazing lectures, good times.

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: Lectures were pretty clear and he used good examples to explain concepts but he's a bit vague and slow. He has great eyebrows and is overall a cool guy. Midterms and exams are entirely lecture based but the textbook isn't a hard read. Not a bad prof overall.

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: The guy is a true hero. He's probably the most engaging guy I've ever listened to, all of his lectures are structured similarly to that of a story. He provides good examples and context for all the material he covers and encourages class participation in a way that everyone could feel comfortable contributing. He's really funny as well.

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: Decent prof. good times.

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: He's a high quality lad.

Name: Kim Richard Nossal
Review: The man's an elderly australian firecracker........10/10 highly recommended

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: Hans was an amazing professor. His course on sleep was extremely interesting and manageable. It is very easy to do well in if you put in the work (the material involves understanding it - not just common knowledge). One of the best courses I've taken at Queen's. Attendance isn't mandatory, but you won't want to miss them.

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: Hans was the best! crystal clear explanations, good notes, and hilarious. you will love going to his class, and his exam questions are fair.

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: Hans was great!

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: My favourite psyc 100 prof. He was so enthusiastic and hilarious, I definitely looked forward to going to his classes. I learned a lot because he was good at explaining things. Really nice guy.

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: Such a funny guy. Love the accent!

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: he makes neurons sexy

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: He's the best prof!!!

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: AMAZING PROFS CANT GET ANY BETTER. MAKES THINGS CRYSTAL CLEAR

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: Absolutely hilarious prof. Dressed up as dracula and taught the class like that for Halloween. He presented lecture material clearly, and was easy to focus on. Lecture was actually really interesting.

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: Best Psyc teacher ever! Hilarious, made lectures interesting!

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: made really funny sexual comments

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: hans was an amazing prof in psyc 100! he was excited and interesting and hilarious! he did a great job

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: Spectacular prof, very approachable and eager to discuss ideas in class or out of it.  Flexible with respect to any issues that might arise.  Good sense of humour, and a genuine interest in his field of research/teaching.  Plus he's superhot.  Yumyum...

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: A really great prof. If you have a science background his material is pretty easy. His exam is fair. In psyc 100 if you know the material including DETAILS you will do really well.

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: Hans has been one of my favourite profs so far in university. He's so happy and adorable, and the fact that he dressed up for Halloween just made my day.

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: Hans is so awesome! I *heart* hans! He is an amazing prof! the lectures are hilarious, and he explains difficult concepts well. The accent is so cute!

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: Funny funny guy, but I dunno...when on Hallowe'en he dressed up as Dracula, he was distracted for a good ten minutes in front of the overhead projector, screaming something about the castle of darkness. Kind of makes ya wonder...

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: He basically made me love neuroscience.

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: great

Name: Hans Christian Dringenberg
Review: Excellent prof.  You can really see that he is extremely interested in what he discusses - a credit to the module system of PSYC100.  Very funny and generally effective.

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: J Rose is a great guy and a great lecturer! You can tell he's really passionate about what he's talking about as he offers a lot of substance. I took his Trump class 2 years ago and he always made sure to keep up to date with new info coming in from the Trump administration. We would go into what was happening as it was happening and it made it fun

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: All around great prof and makes his lectures and classes interesting. Would definitely recommend

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: He is kind of overrated. Overall a really nice guy in class but he only really teaches at face value, not really delving deeper into topics. Most of what he discussed in this course I already knew thanks to Goodyear-Grant's second year Gender and Politics class. The class was easy at least.

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: Incredibly over-rated

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: All style, no substance.  Doesn't get to the core of the relevant political concepts and instead deflects and goes off in a bunch of different directions. The flashy approach is ultimately a shallow  one.

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: J Rose genuinely cares about his students. POLS110 set the foundations for me to understand more complicated concepts and think critically about them throughout my undergrad. Lectures were always enjoyable and J Rose is totally up on technology - check him out on twitter!

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: Rose is hands down the best all-around professor I've had at Queen's. He's very knowledgable and is clearly passionate about his field, teaching, and helping students. His lectures are both interesting and fun, and he is the only prof I've had so far that used in-lecture discussion as a way to help everyone learn.

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: Such a great prof, really cares about students and getting them excited about the subject matter. You'll never want to miss a lecture.

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: While Rose was extremely enthusiastic and entertaining to listen to, his lectures lacked clarity. He often took heavy and incredibly ambiguous political concepts such as power and started ranting about them for weeks without references to KEY scholars in the field or realistic examples. He's friendly, but also highly presumptuous and judgmental.

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: Best prof ever! Actually made me want to never skip a class.

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: Really interesting!

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: Sick prof! His lectures are really engaging, and although the readings are painful to get through, his classes are well worth it. Teaches you how to think on top of what to think, which is really important.

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: Jonathan Rose is the perfect politics prof! He makes material that can be very dry/hard to understand interesting and clear! Lectures are really engaging! Made me decide to major in politics. Exams and assignments are very fair and he is always open to questions/conversation! Follow him on twitter!

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: Absolute best prof/teacher/mentor/person I've ever had in my life. Not only is he easy on the eyes, he is hilarious and makes the class so interesting!

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: One of my favorite Profs at Queens... You can really tell how much he cares about his students which helped me engage in his lectures. His good looks also helped me focus. However, I hated the textbook, as it made simple concepts complicated. Overall, good course though.

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: The textbook is useful. JRose is a good guy, but he's not the best professor. He doesn't cover enough content in class, and spends too much time asking students for their opinions or going off on tangents instead of covering the necessary material. Things meant to make the class interactive (peer reviews, clickers) also make it worse.

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: my favourite prof by far

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: Meh, I'm just not as in love with as most students are.  He's an ok guy, but honestly his lectures are heavy on charisma and showmanship, but contain very litle meaningful, challenging content. I learned very little from his lectures.

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: Great class! Had so much fun! Very engaging lectures!

Name: Jonathan W Rose
Review: Made me want to major in Pols.  Great way of presenting material making it easy to get a good grade if you pay attention/go to class. Overall great guy.

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: I have never had such an amazing and wonderful teacher. Last math class I took was in grade 10, so STAT 263 was a bit of a challenge. However, Charles' kind demeanor, jokes, and jazz music, inspired me to persevere. It's true what they say, a good teacher makes all the difference. Go to classes, use the resources, and watch your grades rise.

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: Probably the most entertaining teacher at Queens.

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: Loved taking his course! My grade went from a D to an A+ in just three months once I applied myself. Molson is very communicative and encouraging, providing students with all the resources needed to succeed.

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: very passionate about the lecture

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: Literally one of the absolute nicest people I've ever met. Took this class as a dumb first year and struggled but he was super supportive and wonderful throughout. Even if I wasn't great at the content, he completely changed the way I think about statistics and the way statistics affects the world in general. Absolutely amazing. Love him.

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: The best professor by far I have ever had in undergrad. An incredible human being. I highly recommend watching some of the lectures he has about life and academic failure on his site as well as strike up a convo with him in person.

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: What a gem. Not only is he very endearing and passionate about his students actually doing well, but flexible for issues that may arise. Very hands on teacher and willing to go the extra mile to help his students understand the course work!

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: He is awesome! !

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: Funniest Gem of a Professor, Love u Grandpa Chuck

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: Amazing professor, but I still found the class content a little difficult. But that is probably because I am not the best at math. Make sure you do the recommended homework! Other than that, the professor is awesome and really funny.

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: While a good professor who puts genuine passion and effort into his lecture videos, he is prone to rambling on and stumbling over words which can be extremely distracting. Perhaps in a face to face environment, this is less of an issue. For the online course, I think he would be better off like MATH 121 videos and have a concise script.

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: best teacher I've had so far at queens!! He is the nicest man and really cares about his students, if you attend lectures you will do fine in the course. He is very helpful during office hours also

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: favourite instructor to date. lectures were interesting and comical.

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: Most caring prof at Queen's, genuinely has an interest in statistics and wants to convey his knowledge in a fun and inviting manner.

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: Nice Prof! All of his emails start with a quote. The last question of his final is a little tricky, about half of the questions are taken from Chapter 12. DO PRACTICE EXAMS!!!

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: I would get lit with this man

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: I'm a bit surprised about the amazing reviews. The lecture and the corresponding slides did not help me do anything more than scratch the surface of the theory behind what we're doing, 99% of any kind of understanding came from doing the homework/tutors. Might as well have not attended lecture. Fav prof ever? Y'all need to attend more classes.

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: Great Prof, couldn't be more pleased with him. I would definitely take a class with him again. Also very funny.

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: I respect a guy who makes stats actually enjoyable

Name: Charles Arthur Molson
Review: I took this course because i had to and i've never been good at anything math-related. My plan was just to suck it up and try to pass. Turns out though, Prof Molson makes stats make sense - and even kind of fun. Suffice to say i was dreading this course but i did well and actually really enjoyed it... and i feel like Prof Molson is the reason why.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Okay, so he doesn't actually teach at BU anymore, he's a prof/head of writing department at UCI. He's really good BUT he assigns a lot of work and the majority of it is ungraded which feels like a waste of time but is part of "the drafting process". He gives a lot of pep talks and is, overall, a great professor though.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Easily the best Writing Professor EVER. He's clear and explicit when it comes to voicing his expectations, and he's fully dedicated to helping his students get the A. If you put in a lot of effort, he said the lowest you can get in his class is a B+. But he's a great teacher. You'll learn a lot from B. Queen.  TAKE HIM.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Queen is the greatest human that has ever inhabited the face of the earth. I loved him so much, and everyone should have him. But he's leaving so sorry

Name: Brad Queen
Review: I took Mr. Queen's First Amendment WR150 course and absolutely loved it! The professor is so helpful and reaches out to his students to help them. Although some of the readings are difficult, students have the freedom to choose paper topics -literally whatever you want to write about, he'll love it! He is so eager to make sure his students succeed!

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Prof Queen really wants his students to do well. Grades fairly and judges by final product as well as the amount of work and effort put into it. His lectures have nothing to do with the papers and assigns a lot of reading that might not pertain to your paper topic. Overall, hes a nice guy and easy to talk to in office hours.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Great guy. Work you put in was the grade you got. Always encouraging and engaging.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: I had Prof. Queen for both semesters of the studio. I found him to be always helpful and constructive in his feedback. He clearly enjoys teaching us. He planned the second semester in two parts to respond to our needs, since the writing portion started seven weeks into the spring semester. I learned alot.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Disregarding the superfluous nature of this UHC requirement, Prof. Queen consistently talked down to students.  Perhaps because the students are in UHC, he seems to feel the need to humble, patronize, and condescend to his students.   While the class is not particularly difficult, he will regularly change his syllabus and disrupt the schedule.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Queen is the best professor I have come across at BU so far. Its not because he is extremely easy or something like that, its because he is fair. He loves the topic he is teaching and you can tell he loves to teach. its not an easy A. you have to work for your grade but he gives you the grade you deserve. take if you like the subject matter.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: My favorite prof. He's really easy to talk to. I think I learned more in this class than I have in all my previous writing or English classes put together.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: I liked this class because it was more like a workshop. Prof Queen didn't lecture at us, he had us figure things out for ourselves and devoted a lot of time to us figuring out how to make our own writing and arguments better. Just be forewarned that you will have to put a lot of work in and sometimes the material is really difficult.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Writing class on the First Amendment, but all we really seemed to do was peer review. Professor Queen treats the class as if it was in high school and assigns readings that the class summarizes popcorn style in class. While I like the subject, I couldn't stand the professor.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Umm, he's hot. But more importantly, he is an inspiring, challenging teacher. I definitely recommend him for any WR course.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: He is kind of annoying. He calls on people on the spot so make sure you know something about every reading he assigns. He assigns a lot of reading but its not really necessary to read it in full unless its going to be something you're writing about. He is encouraging but kind of awkward. He is definitely allergic to As (though not A-).

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Proffessor Queen is one of the best writing or english teachers I have ever had. I got my first A on a paper with him. He grades very fairly, if he sees you have put in effort, he will give you a good grade. Office hours with him are a blessing. One of my favorite teachers to date. Makes class interesting and is extremely supportive.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Professor Queen does intimidate me a bit, but he's awesome! I find that my writing skills have greatly improved and he really does want his students to do well.I LOVE HIM

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Good class. A pretty heavy workload but I learned a lot and my researching skills are definitely much better. Helpful in office hours. He will very clearly explain how to improve your work.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Great professor,great discussions and learning material.  One negative is that I feel that he makes this class a bit too complex and difficult for a 200 level.  As a student in SMG while I find the material interesting, I find myself not as educated as other students who are majoring in Am. Studies.  Reading can be overwhelming but you just gotta f

Name: Brad Queen
Review: Took this class as a freshman, and have to admit I found Prof. Queen intimidating at first.  The class was engaging and none of the readings were superfluous.  He can really help improve your writing; he might be a critical grader but he is fair.  Just be prepared to take full responsibility for your own success.

Name: Brad Queen
Review: queen was at first a pain but now i really see how he wants us to succeed. it can be rough but hes a great guy

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: Pretty good prof - lectures are really heavy and lots of notes/graphs. READ THE TEXTBOOK or you won't understand whats going. Cromb clearly cares about Econ and tries to make it as interesting as he can. Work hard on the assignments. Quizzes are pretty easy. Not a course you can take 'lightly'

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: Literally what is economics

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: Professor Cromb displays his love for econ while also losing the focus of his students. It's a hard subject to understand yet he does his best to make jokes and ask students if they have any questions. He is very available/helpful during office hours and wants his students to do well. Exams are tough but quizzes and assignments are very manageable.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: Good prof for an intro course

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: Lectures are bit boring... But I mean it's ECON. Really friendly person if you ask him a question after class :)

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: He is enthusiastic and passionate about what he's teaching. He is also very approachable, he is very helpful after the lectures and during his office hours.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: Not the most inspirational guy. I can really tell that he cares a lot about economics, but I can tell that he doesn't really like to teach first-year economics. There's a lot of reading directly off the slides, and everything on the slides is straight out of the textbook.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: Cromb is a really smart guy! He really knows his stuff. He is super available outside of class and is very approachable. Lectures, while not always thrilling (but its intro to econ so that is to be expected) he presents material clearly. He also tries to be funny by making dated pop culture references, which is kind of hilarious.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: Crombs is a smart man and knows his economics - however, many people skip his lectures, myself included. They are very boring, especially with such boring topics (fundamentals of economics). I also feel bad because as he tries to make jokes and be personable, literally no one laughs.. come on! Give the guy a break! No one participates @ lectures.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: I have only been to his class few times in the whole semester. His classes are boring and the seats are uncomfortable to fall asleep in. Maybe he's an experienced prof that he's not that passionate about the class anymore. He gets his word done.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: Very,very boring. Get very sleepy at the 3 hours evening class.  Most of the students skip the lectures.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: Contradicts the textbook, but a brilliant economist. The theories taught in class don't show up on the finals, quizzes, or assignments. Read the textbook and use Khan Academy.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: Great guy who knows his stuff... but a TERRIBLE lecturer.  Especially when this is one of those courses that you have to go to class for.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: I feel like I un-learn sitting in his lectures. He completely contradicts the textbook and I could better spend my 3 hours a week doing basically anything else. It's pretty easy to hit the A range without going to lectures though.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: This guy shouldn't be teaching, doesn't explain anything, only talks about theories in class that don't even show up on the exams or assignments.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: This guy really knows his stuff. People say that he doesn't, and most people don't go to class, but they ALL END UP REGRETTING IT.  If you want to know the material thoroughly, go to his class! If you have questions, go to his office hourstalk to him after class.  I'm also very grateful for the pre-exam forum he opened up so we can ask questions.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: He makes you feel like you're un-learning

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: This class is A LOT of work. The assignments are brutal and take a long time and the quizzes are challenging. He would outline questions on the assignment in class so that was helpful. He seemed to make econ overly complex though. It is easy to get lost in his lectures. Nice guy though.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: If you are an Arts student interested in taking this class because you liked freakonomics, do not do it. Economics is just not interesting at all. You have been warned. He is a fine teacher though if you know you are into economics.

Name: Ian James Cromb
Review: Cromb is a really great guy and knowledgable prof who is always happy to help those that ask for it. Taking 110 with him wasn't particularly thrilling, but that's because of the material and not so much his style.

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: A real G, made me hate chemistry less

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: I really liked Dr. Mombourquette as a prof. He's genuinely very passionate about the material and that makes a big difference in capturing student's interest. He also really cares about the success of his students, and will make the effort to help you out if you reach out. Love this guy, wish I could have taken another course with him.

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: Easily one of the worst profs in the chemistry department at Queen's. Particularly in labs, he teaches students things that are 100% incorrect. His own research failed, he is not up to date on chemistry, and is a good example of tenure gone wrong.

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: CHEM 112 IS THE WORST COURSE AT QUEENS. Mombourquette seems like a nice guy but really he'd rather be anywhere than with chem 112. Be prepared to teach yourself the entire course, and make friends so you can do the lab write ups together because they arn't hard just extremely tedious and frequently unclear.

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: Dr. Mombourquette is a great prof. He is very clear in lecture, gives excellent explanations in the lab, and is very charismatic. Really appreciated and respect him as a prof.

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: Great guy, but not necessarily the best teacher.  His anecdotes are great though

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: Really fair prof! If you work hard, you will be able to earn a good grade. He's an understanding prof; if for some reason you flaked on grades, don't take advantage of him. Talk to him honestly and he'll definitely help out if he can. Great prof!

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: Sometimes gets a bad rap when compared to Newstead but he is definitely the teacher to take the time to help you. Attend classes, he explains stuff and is always there for you after and during class to clarify.

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: Don't really understand the hate here. He took over for Newstead for half of this semester and has done a great job. Quantum chemistry is a weird and difficult subject and he manages to explain it pretty well. A bit quirky but overall a pretty great prof.

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: Lectures were pretty good and exam was fair

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: Lectures are boring and confusing, all exams look exactly like past exams.

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: Easy to approach. Nice. Clear speaker. Logical course notes. All around great professor. Really enjoyed his class. My one piece of advice is to sit close to the front, because he dims the lights and puts on the projector, so if it's late in the year and you're tired/stressed you might fall asleep in class.

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: WORST.PROF.EVER, BUT exam was an absolute joke, now i know what artsci tests are like

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: Prof. Mombourquette often goes off on tangents and random personal stories - once the class got too much detail into his marriage. He isn't clear in the material and doesn't give any examples of exam questions. He doesn't offer practise questions. Overall an enthusiastic but poor prof.

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: He taught expecting student to previously know material - so it made it more like a quick review of the subject. Found it difficult to understand many concepts due to him not fully explaining them. He leaves a lot of stuff out. Overall, he seems to enjoy teaching but unfortunately doesn't do it very well.

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: Dr. M is underrated, he does exactly what he's required to. He explains concepts pretty well and has good notes. At times he can be difficult to listen to though. His examinations are fair and good studying will pay off.

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: The worst teacher i have ever had... does not explain his material well, and he needs to learn how to use his computer BEFORE class

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: A very approachable and understandable teacher. His slides are to the point and he teaches with interest and enthusiasm.

Name: Michael J Mombourquette
Review: WORST prof in the chemistry department!!!! Before I list his flaws as teacher, of which there are many, I will say that his notes are concise and effective. He is unable to; highlight the major themes; tie it all together; focuses almost exclusively on math and; is not available for help. Because of him 221 was a waste of time and money!

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: I thought Dr. Butler was a great professor. I loved the computer science material Dr. Browse presented the most, but Dr. Butler was a more engaging speaker. I think his material was needed for those who might not have a computer science background, since allot of student are not in computing. He also doesn't have office hours, so keep that in mind.

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: Dr. Butler's lectures were too theoretical at times but this was personal preference (I preferred Dr. Browse's material). Difficulty was quite high for a 1st year class (>25% of class failed). Attendance isn't mandatory but you need to go if you want a decent grade. Also little textbook use. A challenging but interesting course - take it seriously.

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: Not excellent. I felt let down by the course, as I thought it would be truly interesting before I actually attended a lecture. Very witty man and helpful, but considering there was no TAs for this class he was often busy.

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: Absolutely amazing prof! Definitely recommend this class.

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: I found him a funny prof with really interesting material but the marking system was really hard. I think the standard deviation was really off. This was my worst mark by far. There are no weekly tutorials and if i had questions i found him rather condescending and unhelpful.

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: Intelligent, interested in course and comprehension of students, very funny

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: Great prof, kept the class interesting. Also google him and you'll find some interesting articles.

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: LOVE HIM!!! VERY ENJOYABLE CLASS, YOU CAN TELL HE IS REALLY PASSIONATE ABOUT WHAT HE TEACHES!

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: Butler is AMAZING! This is my favourite class, love it so much! You can really tell that he is passionate about what he teaches. the material is very interesting on its own but his enthusiasm and humour make the best! Great prof. and such a cutie! Sad that this is only a half year course! Only problem would be that there aren't any tutorials...

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: This is my favourite class! i especially love the more psychological aspects of it. You can really tell that he is passionate about what he is teaching. the material is really interesting and his enthusiasm and humour make it even better. plus, he's such a cutie! i'm sad that this is only a half year course! i'm gonna miss it!

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: Incredibly interesting course material, very enthusiastic and enjoyable lectures

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: I'm in my third class this year with professor Butler and he's absolutely fantastic. Passionate about what he teaches and cares a great deal for the students. By far my favourite professor at Queen's. :)

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: In class, went on many amusing tangents. Interesting topics, but slideshow notes were not very helpful. Hard to find outside of class....

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: He's a great prof, helpful, humorous, and makes learning thoroughly enjoyable.

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: He is a very funny prof, very wise and intelligent looking! very nice person. his lectures are hard, but this course is abstract and he tries his best. if you read his lecture notes and the textbook you'll understand. Butler is awesome!

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: Good

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: The most majestic and lordly of beards rests upon the face of Professor Brian Butler. Oh, and he's a good prof, too.

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: George Lucas here was ridiculously dry. His exams were marked randomly and the course material went against everything psychology ever developed in the past 100 years. Arrogant and had total disregard for science. Real science.

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: Worst Prof at Queens. His lectures were random and useless. Going to his class was the lowpoint in my university career

Name: Brian E Butler
Review: hated him at first, but his lecturing still grew on me. I found myself excited to come to class. VERY interesting course and he's a GREAT prof, probably my favourite psyc prof.

Name: Richard B Day
Review: As a professor, he seems passionate about what he teaches and he explains the content very well. But when it comes to his tests? Not that great. Most of his tests are based on the textbook, and you gotta memorize more than you should have to if you want a decent mark. Try to get test banks if you can, you'll fail w/out them. His tests are hard :/

Name: Richard B Day
Review: Dr Day is a very good prof and clearly cares about the content he teaches but can be very tricky. The format of the course is a classic 2 midterms, 1 exam, all multiple choice with many all of the above and none of the above within the questions. This course takes dedication and you can do well if you give it attention.

Name: Richard B Day
Review: Tests are all none of the above and all of the above, stats, and specific textbook info. He's not clear about what you need to know either.

Name: Richard B Day
Review: Such an awesome guy, his lectures are super enjoyable and he explains things really well. His tests are impossible if you don't have the test banks, but other than that I really enjoyed his course.

Name: Richard B Day
Review: Dr. Day is by far my favourite prof at McMaster. It is evident that he knows what he is teaching, and is passionate about it. The way he delivers lecture content makes you want to attend his lectures. He also makes his lecture materials as accessible as possible (podcasts, audio recordings, and power-points are all made available on avenue).

Name: Richard B Day
Review: A lovely prof. His voice is amazing, like a really good audio book spokesperson. Textbook questions can be hard. Understand his info clearly!

Name: Richard B Day
Review: Definitely do the readings when youre supposed to or else you'll fail.

Name: Richard B Day
Review: Amazing guy, very funny and entertaining lectures, yet also very interesting.

Name: Richard B Day
Review: Dr. Day is a fantastic prof, he's insanely charismatic & great to listen to. His class come with a podcast too. Only complaint is his tests are SO hard. Every question has all of the above & none of the above. idk if i would take his class bc i know it will cost me a good grade. He usually has practice quizzes online but they didnt work for my sem

Name: Richard B Day
Review: his lectures are AMAZING--i made sure to never miss any even tho they were podcasted. his testing is v specific about details from lecture, but hes clear about what he wants you to know. only real complaint is that his textbook questions are too specific for how much reading we have to do, but there werent many TB qs so i didnt mind that much!

Name: Richard B Day
Review: I did very poorly in the course, but he is an AMAZING lecturer. However, your mark is based on 3 tests, all multiple choice, and his questions are incredibly difficult. You are expected to remember pretty much every little detail in the course content. About 18 % of students failed the final exam, average in the low 60s.

Name: Richard B Day
Review: Dr Day is THE BEST! If you enjoy psych and are looking to actually learn / do not mind putting in some work in order to achieve a good grade then you need to take a course with him! he is so knowledgeable, and makes all material accessible / fair game. I wouldn't say it is EASY to get a good grade in his class, but you can if you put in effort!

Name: Richard B Day
Review: Fun lectures, but the grading is pretty rough. If I could go back, I probably wouldn't pick his course for an elective. So much textbook work too

Name: Richard B Day
Review: Dr. Day's lectures changed my approach to life and school. This class isn't easy, but it's certainly worth it.

Name: Richard B Day
Review: I loved this course so much, he presented the information in such a great way and kept everyone engaged. He's also a very friendly and inviting man who seems like he's always out to help. His test however are another story. They're very statistic heavy and rely heavily upon your memorization of the course content versus your actual understanding.

Name: Richard B Day
Review: his tests are insane. no question bank, no practice questions. just rote memorization. he's not clear with what you actually need to know

Name: Richard B Day
Review: Unclear marking scheme, doing well in this class is more a matter of luck than of knowing important things. Prof Day makes buying his handbook mandatory, though he claims otherwise. As Prof Day might put it, this course is an experiment in random punishment to make external its students' loci of control. Would not recommend, would untake if allowed

Name: Richard B Day
Review: Very good at lecturing, you can tell he is genuinely passionate about the topics discussed and isn't just doing it because he has to. Tests are very hard, but if you memorize all the past tests and go over all the questions posted, it's very possible to get an 80.

Name: Richard B Day
Review: If I wrote a book I would seriously have this guy be the voice for the audio version. I love listening to this man talk. The class is extremely interesting and he is passionate, well informed and happy to be teaching it! I love these lectures. The tests however? Be prepared for tricky questions, double negatives, misleading questions, all that!!

Name: Richard B Day
Review: As a prof i LOVE him. He's amazing at teaching and definitely has a lot of perspective and great teaching skills, he is very captivating to listen to. his classes are podcaster so not really mandatory to go, but its honestly easier to listen to it in person rather than a recording. His tests I found very difficult though and very hard to do well

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: She barely teaches anything in class. Classes are slow-paced. She gives students 24-hour group assignments on holidays when everyone else could take a break except you.

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: Rita's lectures are boring but some of the exam questions come from her lectures so you would probably want to attend them. The group projects are graded strictly. To do well in the exams you definitely want to read the textbook well.

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: She is very strict but she knows what shes talking about and the textbook is useful. The class structure is very organized and by the book. Lectures are useless as the slides are posted

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: You will lose 1% total grade when you come late more than 5 minutes in tut. And there is no basic attendence grade.

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: Overall she's an alright professor. She's very organized and encourages you to come to class. The lectures and course itself are pretty straightforward but what was asked of us in tutorial was so particular such as losing a mark for not having your assignment stapled. Little things like this made it hard to get good marks in tutorial.

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: She can seem a little scary and intense but she really cares about her students and she really wants her students to do well. I wouldn't mind taking another one of her classes.

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: Very particular in what she asks for when doing assignments for her. Pay attention to detail. If you study for her midterms and exams looking at everything in the textbook they aren't that hard. if you put in the work you will get good results.

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: tutorial is mandatory, but is meaningless actually, just sit for 50 minutes on doing meaningless works. Get ready to read and read and read, tests and exam are not really easy.

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: meh, she was very organized and the course was very smoothly coordinated and well run so ill give her that. she makes u come to lecture to find the missing words from her online lecture slides.. pls stop its a pain having to go to class for an hour just to fill in 1 or 2 words..

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: 1% grade deduction for everything even breathing the wrong way at this point. treats everyone like kids. literally avoid at all costs

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: Lots of textbook reading, but the information is useful in the real world so it is interesting. Two group projects make up 10% of your grade, which isn't too bad. Tests were easy if you just read the textbook beforehand. Overall, enjoyable class with a good professor; albeit a little strict.

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: Bad professor ever ever

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: She will give the test as hard as she can make.

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: 1% deduction on OVERALL grade if: come to tutorial one minute late, pull out your phone, leave early, do not put name tag on desk and if you forget a comma or period in a citation.

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: sets you up for failure avoid at all costs

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: you will dread tutorial, no phones and insane project that you can receive a negative grade on. a group failed cause they left out a comma in a citation

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: talks about herself all lecture and what she does with our money

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: the prof everyone tells you to avoid

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: This professors courses set up like you only need to learn her course in university.

Name: Rita Cossa
Review: This course was OK, prof was OK, tests were OK, it was all just OK

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: If you follow lectures and tutorials in addition to the homework, there should not be anything that you find challenging! many people simply skip homework that he emphasizes and end up getting low marks. So I would say focus on that!! Funny facts: he sometimes literally talks like the book that he wrote when he wants to explain some concepts LOL!

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: hard to understand both lectures and messy notes. Did not make calculus enjoyable at all

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Did life sci calculus in first year and literally understood nothing. His lectures were hard to follow and he didn't explain the concepts well in my opinion. Made me sad because I actually enjoyed calculus in high school.

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Lovric is a really great prof and genuinely cares about his students passing but he can be hard to follow during lectures so his teaching style isn't for everyone. He posts all his lecture notes but they're hard to understand if you don't go to class. Do the assignments and homework!!! A lot of the questions were repeated in the tests

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Honestly, he's a blast to have. Even if the material was dry, I always enjoyed his lectures since he was SO kind and engaging. I hate that his classes have 4 tests, but also thankful that he drops one :') Thank you for being a fair prof who genuinely wants their students to succeed and get a good grade.

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Dr. Lovric is a good professor however he is hard to understand at times. The notes are all hand written and can become quite difficult to comprehend for somebody who did not attend lecture and looked at them after being posted. Do the assignments and all previous tests and exams. Not many grading opportunities so hard to do well.

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Best Prof I ever met in my life in university for the following reasons: - test what he taught -provides notes for each lecture - ensure you are prepared for each midterm by giving you good exercise with solutions provided -very easy to listen and follow during lecture -very nice prof many respect -will definitely take any course he teaches

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Very chill. Tries his best to make the class interesting, even when the material itself is dry, and usually succeeds. Clear expectations.

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: His lectures are very effective. At first it may be hard to adjust to his teaching style, but overtime, I found the way he teaches concepts very interesting and enjoyable. He explains new concepts thoroughly and starts with the basics. One of my favourite profs so far!!

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Amazing prof, but sometimes hard to follow along with. Do the assignments, and youll do well in the class

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: He is very popular among students - it is hard to get a spot in his core for 1LS3! He is great at explaining the math, responds to emails with questions fast, and is easily approachable. Very interesting class. You can 12 it if you do the assignments!

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Dr. Lovric is interesting and respected. Attending his lecture is mandatory because he never posts his notes online.

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Entire mark is composed of 4 Tests (lowest is dropped though) and an exam. But he makes the tests very doable and the content is never harder than the practice. His lectures are a bit messy and will take some getting used to, but they are pretty effective and if you pay attention and do the work, an A is easy. Also,very nice prof and he's funny too

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Lovric is amazing!

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Lovric is the GOAT. He is my favourite professor so far and honestly he cares about all 1000 of his students. I even watched his videos on youtube. I love this guy. Coming out of high school I didn't love math, but he made math interesting to learn. The content is not too difficult, show up to class and tutorials, study well and you'll do fine.

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Miroslav is a legend. He is hilarious without even trying and his quirkiness is lovable. Fantastic prof and the tests were all very based on assignments and previous practise tests. Extremely easy to do well if you go to class and keep up. Miroslav is actually my favourite and he cares so much about students. He's a gem y'all!!

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: This is one of the best profs at Mac. Beats everyone else by a long shot. He's so kind and humble, and really cares about the students. Super easy to approach and helpful. Would take all my courses with him if I could.

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: simply AMzing

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Amazing professor, best course I have taken so far and would recommend it to anyone- truly is the best math course that can help with real life ! Very caring and tries his very best to make sure everyone has a good enough understanding of the concepts. His attitude towards math and his professionalism is truly inspirational !

Name: Miroslav Lovric
Review: Will continue to be one of the profs at Mac that truly care about the success of the students and makes the content interesting & understandable.

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: best prof for bio 1m03. provides numerous info/resources to help you succeed. gives away pens if you participate in class. gives weblink project (if you do it, you get a reference letter). fair test questions, you can always make an appointment with her to discuss lecture related contents or participation opportunities

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: I'm so grateful that Dr Kajiura provides study tips and practice problems for me to work on that help me to understand the concepts faster. Her suggestions gave me the confidence to succeed in the course. I know that those helped me a lot.

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: Dr Kajiura explains concepts really well. I like how she made me to be more serious about studying. I'm more focused and can tackle answering questions a lot better. Gives good advice. Also join her IMPACT project.

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: Kajiuras lectures kept my interest. Went to her study sessions. She answered all my questions. Great prof

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: I mean she is a nice person but as a professor vaguely goes over material and instead spends more time talking about how to study. Going to office hours is pointless because she just tells you to do your own research and she makes you feel dumb for asking questions. Not the most exciting class and I LOVE biology.

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: she loves her job and tries really hard. she will also be there for you and help you to succeed outside of the classroom

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: She is super nice and has such positive energy! Her lectures are always such a joy to attend! You can clearly see that she cares and loves what she does!

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: Dr Kajiura is amazing, she is very motivational! I love her way of teaching, but make sure you attend her lectures. Her midterms are pretty easy, and make sure you know every detail from the lecture notes, for example, names of people she mentions.

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: I love Bio lectures! The fact that she gives us opportunities and advice about academic skills, networking, and careers is great too.

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
