Review: Followed her advice for studying for the test and feel good about it. Glad that I didn't cram and studied early like she told our class to do.

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: I have new appreciation for Bio. She's dedicated and enthusiastic. Follow her advice about academic skills and you'll do great,

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: Enjoyed her lectures a lot. If I had a problem understanding something, she can explain in a different way so that I get it. I found the test questions tough but fair.

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: Easy explanations and her MC are easier than most, provided you have studied and understand the material. It is always two choices that are completely wrong, two choices that are similar (from which you have to pick the correct answer), and the occasional questions that have options like both A and B, all of the above, or B and C.

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: Very satisfied with Dr K. I learnt a lot from her lectures. She taught in a way that I know will retain it for years to come. Like that she promotes projects that students can get involved with.

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: Her exam was super detailed, often from additional things she said beyond her lecture notes + the videos she made you watch (watch these attentively not passively)! Its not hard to do well for her portion but you do have to memorize all the details! She gives study tips and genuinely wants you to do well but also work for it so stay caught up :)

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: Good prof. I used her study advice that helps a lot.

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: Enjoyed 1M03... make me appreciate the world a lot more. Like the emphasis on applied knowledge taught during lectures. Focusing on concepts, study skills and applications helps me learn better,

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: Her exam isn't hard, but its super detailed. Most of her section was pure recall and very little application. Her midterms were easy, you just need to memorize everything. You must look at the new info in the readings and you must go to lectures for her supplementary info if you want a good grade. She is a very nice prof and super helpful.

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: She was an angel of a prof! Super caring and inspirational. It is much easier to do well if you regularly attend the lectures.

Name: Lovaye Kajiura
Review: If you don't go to her lectures, you WILL NOT get a good grade. Your mark often depends on the notes you make off her speaking and not from the lecture slides. If your notes aren't complete you will miss out on a lot of testable content. She definitely makes you work for the mark but show up and do the work and you'll be fine.

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: A pure soul. his courses are very organized. gives you all the resources needed for you to succeed and do well. his lectures are all writing notes but they actually explain whats happening and are clear. his dark dry humour makes his class fun to go to. good course would recommend.

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: cool guy. boring lectures, dont need to go if you have the notes from a friend. strict to marking schemes. tests are fair

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: Best Prof at McMaster! Highly recommend taking his classes! Does the midterm test examples before the midterms.

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: He is a super amazing professor, makes the classes interesting rather than boring. All his jokes during class keep it fun. A really fun professor. Take him if you can!

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: Really good, loved the way he teached. Perfect combination of examples and theory. Actually understood how it worked instead of memorizing how to do a question.

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: Best math prof at mac Includes midterm-like examples in lectures Explains theory in an understandable matter

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: Taking notes in class while still listening to everything was quite difficult, however, his notes are so clear that if you go back and read them all again, it was easy to understand the content. I highly recommend doing his suggested textbook problems as they build a good base when attempting his practice tests. He is also hilarious. True gem.

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: The best prof at mac

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: Excellent lecture, probably the best choice in Math dept.

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: Childs goes at a slow pace and it's great . Actually repeats the questions other students ask and makes sure that he answers the question fully and a little extra. If you enjoy dark joke you'll love this guy. The tests are fair, but he will try to trick you sometimes. All resources are on his website and perfectly laid out for you to find and use.

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: He's HILARIOUS! Makes confusing things very simple to understand. Show up to lectures and everything will make sense.

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: An absolute gem. Clear and thorough notes and explanations. Also hilarious. The assignments and practice tests he provided were both helpful and relevant to the tests/exam. I haven't enjoyed a class at Mac this much in a while.

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: Among the best and most entertaining teachers I've ever had in my life. To be honest, if you just show up to lectures and listen, you'll be fine even if you've never done statistics in your life. Single-handedly made me enjoy statistics.

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: THE BEST PROF AT MAC TO BE HONEST!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: good guy, tries hard, loves the game

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: Going into this course, i was confident it was going to be miserable as I personally have no interest in stats. This man single handedly made me enjoy stats and actually taught me how to apply it. Lectures are pretty heavy but assignments aren't too difficult as long as you follow the manual. Also his jokes fall under the "so bad its funny" label.

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: Dr. Childs is really nice. His handwriting is clear.

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: Seriously the best prof I've had. He makes class enjoyable, explains things really well, and makes concepts easy to understand. 10/10 would recommend.

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: STATS 2B03 is not an easy 12 but if you do the midterms he gives you to practice and really take the time to understand the material, an 11 or 12 are very possible. His questions are usually not surprises however he may try to trick you so read carefully! He's really funny and gives great notes :)

Name: Aaron Childs
Review: love him, hes funny and so helpful! If you ever email him, he responds so fast even though there are 800 other students in the same class. his notes are amazing, and super helpful! If you study his notes and practice tests you will do good in the course!

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Godsent Prof. I used to hate the concept of accounting, that is why I've never taken one in highschool. When I was forced to take one in undergrad, I nearly failed because I found it too artificial as someone with a physical science background. He talks a bit fast, but teaches very well, makes me want to do a CPA. Breaks down hard concepts to easy

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Prof Juma is amazing. Best professor ever. But I am not a fan of the flipped format. There so many ways to teach the material. Please choose a different way

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Most enjoyable and challenging course so far.

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: I would agree that he seems intimidating however is really nice if you go to his office and chat with him. He gives you tips on how to study better.

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Accounting is such a dry subject but he is passionate about the material which helps.

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: He might seem to be tough at first but once you get to know him, he's a great man. I recommend visiting him if you have time because it helps you get to know your prof better as well as build up the connection between you and your instructor. He's also gonna give you tons of motivation if you talk to him.

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Ive taken his course before but had to drop it. Im really looking forward to taking it again with him.

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Professor Juma cares about the progress of his students and is always ready to help. I wish more students came to his F2F class because he actually explains the material so clearly.

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Absolutely stunning teaching. He explains things clearly and patiently. No question is too stupid for him to address and he guides such questions to the source of the answer like the outline. He respectfully answers all questions asked of him.

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Aadil is by far my most favourite professor I ever had. He explains everything crystal clear and makes sure that everyone understands. He is super caring about the success of his students and it's clear to see his dedication. This man should be the lead instructor of all accounting courses, literally a teaching god.

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Professor gave lots of time after course was over to help us with our entrepreneurial activities. He always encouraged us and is so motivational and inspirational.

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Professor Juma explained the content really well and realted the content to application through sharing examples of his experience in his work in Kenya and in franchising. He is passionate about what he teaches and is also very reasonable in expectations. He gives lots of resources to students, however, it is hard to find time to go through it all

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Great prof who is approachable and explains concepts clearly. If you attend the lectures, do the quizzes and read the notes you can achieve a good grade in this course. Even though accounting can be a challenging subject Aadil makes the lectures interesting and engaging.

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Best Prof! So approachable for help

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Great professor, explains topics very clearly.

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: He is a great professor, if you ask the right questions. If you haven't taken grade 12 accounting before reading before lectures is extremely important. He does a pretty good job at explaining things but will not explain anything unless someone asks, so if you're confused, speak up.

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: He's very enthusiastic about his teaching, makes you want to like the subject, even when it isn't the best subject

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Aadil is a real one. Accounting is hard and heavy but he makes lectures so easy to understand and so enjoyable. The real life examples will help you understand everything! you wont ever want to miss one of his lectures because he literally brightens your day! he prepares you well for both the midterm and the final

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: If you have the opportunity to take Comm1AA3 with Aadil, dont miss it. The lectures are heavy and lots of content, but he makes them worth it, and explains everything very throughly. Dont skip the lectures, youll do a lot better in the course if you go. The exams were hard; but he prepares you for them.

Name: Aadil Merali Juma
Review: Love the way he teaches, the perfect class notes, recordings, and most of all, the real life examples he uses to explain concepts. I might forget finsys but not the examples and the learning from it.

Name: Joe Kim
Review: A fun prof who taught one of the easiest courses I've ever taken. Honestly really chill class and if you go through the slides and modules once before any test content you breeze through with high 90s.

Name: Joe Kim
Review: Lectures are interesting, quizzes are tricky, you need to actually enjoy psychology to really thrive in this course.

Name: Joe Kim
Review: Unpopular opinion but I did not like Dr. Kim. The structure of the course was nice to be able to do the modules ahead of time, but it made the lectures totally redundant. I found his lecture style to be boring, and not very informative. The level of difficulty between quiz questions and test questions were insanely unbalanced. Do the extra credit.

Name: Joe Kim
Review: I took Psych 1F03 as an elective because all other electives were full. I was pleasantly surprised by how interesting the online modules were. Kim makes the modules funny and engaging. Would definitely recommend going through all the modules and reading the textbook for a good grade. Loved the fact that it was an online class.

Name: Joe Kim
Review: Joe Kim is a funny prof, who is really passionate about what he's teaching. Personally, I really liked his modules and lectures, and found the content interesting. However, his class was a blended learning type of class, which I realize isn't for everybody.

Name: Joe Kim
Review: Amazing course, amazing teacher. Really well run, hard subject but put in the time and its easy to do well

Name: Joe Kim
Review: best teacher courses are very organized

Name: Joe Kim
Review: Really good professor.

Name: Joe Kim
Review: This is an incredibly structured course and is very interesting. It is difficult to grasp all concepts however there are lots of opportunities for extra credit. Dr. Kim is easily one of the best professors and truly cares about his students and their education. I definitely recommend taking a course with him.

Name: Joe Kim
Review: The man, the myth, the legend. Psych is easily the best-designed course for first years - even the tutorials are interesting. Lectures are fun and engaging, and Dr. Kim is very clear. Online modules are actually helpful. Has very accessible office hours as well. 10/10 would recommend taking a class taught by Dr. Kim.

Name: Joe Kim
Review: Great structure to the course, makes it very easy to succeed. Weekly quizzes and participation marks help your grade, and iclicker points allow you to drop your lowest marks. Concepts are not difficult to grasp just require a bit of work.

Name: Joe Kim
Review: Loved this course, including how it was structured. I enjoyed going to lectures: rly engaging and funny, material was interesting, and Joe is a rly great prof. There's a bit of work to do each week, but if you do your work and understand the material, you can do rly well. Take this course!!! You won't regret it :)

Name: Joe Kim
Review: lectures are 10/10 and really high quality web modules. the course has been layed out extremely well and weekly quizzes are not too difficult

Name: Joe Kim
Review: He's a really good lecturer and really knows his stuff, but I find that the weekly quizzes were pretty difficult and since they end up being worth 30%, it can really affect our average! I love the content, but are struggling in terms of maintaining a decent average because of the way we get tested, a lot of it can be opinion based!

Name: Joe Kim
Review: Joe has a very pleasant personality: really nice, funny and expressive. However, his class was so incredibly hard. The quizzes/exams are really tricky and weighed heavily, and going through the modules can be very daunting. However, the modules definitely have MORE content than the actual lectures...

Name: Joe Kim
Review: The online lectures and podcasts were disgusting to navigate through, the exam was atrocious, lectures were not interesting although the topics were. Pointless iClicker questions for marks

Name: Joe Kim
Review: favourite course i've taken in my 3 years of undergrad

Name: Joe Kim
Review: joe kim's lectures are super engaging and you can tell that he's really passionate about education. his m/c questions can be tricky at first but after a while you get a hang of them. the exam is very similar to the weekly quizzes so there's really no surprises there

Name: Joe Kim
Review: This was honestly one of my favourite classes in first-year. The lectures are very interesting and the course is organized in a way to help you retain information. You do have to complete the modules before lectures though and those are super time-consuming! Overall, Joe Kim is an amazing prof and I would 10/10 recommend!!

Name: Joe Kim
Review: This course is set up for a student to succeed. Do the work and you can get a 12. Prof is a fantastic lecturer: well-spoken, engaging and knows the material. The weekly quizzes are very useful - if you can do the practice quizzes without your notes, you'll definitely ace the exam.

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: Not a great prof at all. SO disorganized. He knows his flaws (in terms of teaching style and not explaining well enough) but he refuses to fix the flaws. Some people do well in the course because he repeats questions from the test banks. I believe he has retired tho, so yay!

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: He was better at explaining things in office hours. Just read the textbook and go to his office hours, use your friend's help on the in class quizzes. After all that, just hope for a decent mark

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: dont take it unless you have to.

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: He is a terrible lecturer but his tests come from the courseware. So his poor teaching is reflected on the tests. he's not like other profs who suck and then butcher you on the exams. I want to have him again, if you study the courseware you'll get at least a 10

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: He is extremely hard to follow, the amount of mistakes in his courseware is copious, and the exam has nothing in common with midterms/courseware.

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: Lectures are not helpful at all.  Too many errors in courseware.

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: If you get sick for a period of time and have to miss any classes you'll be screwed because his evening section has a quiz or test every week.  His lectures are long and monotonous, involving him simply doing the math behind problems for two hours.  He doesn't explain any sort of theory behind the work. He changed the exam format at the last minute

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: Do not take his evening microeconomics class; poorly run class with terrible instruction.

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: In short:  1) Lectures are useless and boring 2) Courseware has a multitude of typos that confuse students trying to learn the math 3) He reuses questions from his courseware, yes, but he changes them 4) Work is easy but hard to understand properly, you may think you're right but you're actually wrong 5) His exams are brutally hard

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: Lol I swear going to class confuses you more... IF YOU TAKE HIS CLASS DONT ATTEND LECTURE JUST READ THE COURSEWARE

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: There was no structure to his course, let alone his lectures. His courseware was full of errors and he was behind in his lectures. Lost a lot of quizzes, not to mention the amount of errors he made in recording our marks. Overall, too much work for a course I didn't learn anything from. Take it with another professor if you have to!!

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: Terrible prof, hard to understand and doesnt have any notes or powerpoint slides. His courseware is full of errors.

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: Worst Teacher Ever..

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: He is not a greater lecturer but his tests are pretty easy. His test questions are very similar to his practice questions in the course pack. Take his courses if you just care about a good grade rather than learning new content.

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: please do yourself a favour and get out of this class, such a great guy but his courseware isn't legible and nobody can understand him

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: perfect

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: Pretty bad lecturer but he recycles questions and it's easy to do well in his classes. Take it if you're more interested in your grade than in learning the actual material.

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: No need to go to classes, only need to read the courseware and do the practise quiz and tests, got A+

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: terrible course with a terrible prof. his lecture is useless as his courseware. the best advice is to drop his class as soon as possible. his accent and his poor clarity make most students hard to understand. REALLY REALLY TERRIBLE.

Name: Rashid Khan
Review: The most abysmal professor I've ever had at McMaster University. This class was so poorly taught I would recommend anybody who has Khan as a professor to immediately drop the class and avoid the utter waste of time. The subject itself has so much potential, but it is ruined by this prof who is incapable of teaching, organizing, and speaking audibly

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: Definitely very knowledgeable, had good anecdotes and helpful videos. Also very good at addressing questions outside of class. However, a very tough grader, and frequently unclear criteria for assignments. Dr Vaillancourt is also the kind of prof you're likely to butt heads with if you, like her, have strong opinions.

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: Truly skilled professor! I wish she taught all my classes! Expert information, personable, clear expectations. All the negative comments came from students who thought uni would be easy..Not so.always available for questions and easy to relate to. Thanks Dr V!

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: Possibly opposed to the use of fertilizers to treat clinically depressed foliage herba.  Seemingly opposed to the use of soap to wash cars, but undoubtedly a capable professor.

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: Dr. Vaillancourt is quiet beautiful. I think her husband is so lucky :)

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: She is not the best prof I've had.  Though she was entertaining and seemingly an easy going prof, she was actually very difficult and borderline unpleasant because of her attitude towards the class.  Her tests were tough to say the least.  Her personal experience in psych makes her an interesting prof but it's not quite enough to redeem her I think

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: Useless worthless experience. Donot recommend her to anyone ever. Her final was brutal. She doesn't like the class average to be more then 70

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: Tests were hard but OK still. Final exam was brutal.

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: She was clearly the worst professor ever. She told us once that if the class average was very high she would lose her job. I guess she already has even after the class average being low. She often made false promises and her finals were always very hard.

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: mean, arrogant, selfish prof. Never keeps her promises. Overall sad combination

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: Worst professor ever.  If you can't see through her fake skin, then university hasn't taught you to be critical enough.  She is deceptive, selfish, narcissistic, and could care less about the success of her students. She does, however, give a great example of what a FAKE person is like - right to the dot.

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: Very Funny Prof. Made 8:30 class worth going to. Past comments are blown way out of proportion because if you went to class you would do well as she gives hints to her questions. One of the most interesting classes I have taken here. Loved her and sad she is gone.

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: She makes Lame Jokes and is SOO TOUGH!!!

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: She used to be nice many years ago but not anymore!!!! One of the toughest profs around now. Avoid her otherwise you will regret it.

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: VERY Impersonable. She replies to emails like this "Hi,", I have a name alright....what is "Hi," ?? She is soooo tough...she hates the class average to be more than 70-71%....she will kill the whole class on future tests and exam if the class average is high. Terrible attitude towards students. It's only a garbage PSYCH course!!! get a life!!

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: Great prof!! She was helpful, understanding, clear, and the tests were very well organized. Learned alot!

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: VERY HARD SHORT ANSWER QUESTIONS ON THE FINAL EXAM TAKE IT EASY ON MCMASTER STUDENTS PLEASE. STOP ASKING SHORT ANSWER QUESTIONS IF POSSIBLE. THANK YOU.

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: I took both 3CC3 and 3N03 with Dr. V.  I received an 11 in both.  You can get an A in her class and I don't think she is any different from other profs when it comes to grades.  She is just up front about what is going on at the university.  Loved her classes.  Take them if you can!

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: What a great prof, and a really interesting class. She cares about the material and is a very engaging speaker.

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: She is a nice lady but her tests are kind of tough. Still her multiple choice are way easier than Dr.Day's multiple choice so quit complaining!!! Just read the book multiple times. Dont know how bad her short answers will be since didn't have the final yet. She always answers emails and is helpful if you talk to her after class.

Name: Tracy Vaillancourt
Review: I totally agree with some of the comments people have posted --- She does not like the class average to be more than 70-73. Last year I took Forensic Psych with her and the average on both midterms was high (76-80) so she gave a deadly final with very specific multiple choice and brutal short answers. Not every psych prof has her type of mentality.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Many people didn't come to lectures because whatever he covered in lectures was pulled from the book. Although I loved the lectures as he gave specific examples and related the terms and theories so our lives and made them easier to understand and remember.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: This class is a hit or miss, I think it just depends on whether you intend on majoring in Communications or not. I loved the class and found Professor Sevigny to be interesting, to be fair everything in lecture is pulled straight from the textbook, but he does add in personal anecdotes. Great prof to have if you want to work in the industry.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: How can you say that Dr. Sevigny says nothing? His experience as a PR pro is extensive and successful. I hung on every word and went to his office - he spent an hour with me talking about politics, PR, my future. Gave me great tips for an internship.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Really surprised by his high rating and quite disappointed by the fact that many won't believe my rating because it's shrouded by more positive reviews. Extremely boring speaker. Not captivating in the least bit. Like the other reviewer, i stopped attending classes as i found them useless... don't think I learned anything from this class.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Don't know what the last commenter was thinking. Must have attended a different lecture. This was my best course in my whole first year at Mac. Dr. Sevigny is awesome.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Really terrible prof. never really said anything important, all material was pulled from the textbook, and most was common sense. I stopped attending lectures because they were a waste of time since the notes were posted online, and he really had nothing to add that was useful.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Best. Professor. Ever.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Really enjoying Dr. Sévigny's 4N03 seminar. He makes it all seem so effortless - doesn't speak from notes, always knows the answer to your question. I really feel that I have learned a lot about agenda setting, framing and the news industry. His guest speakers are great, too.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: he is by far my favorite professor yet.. I love his teaching style, the way he approached the course material and his interaction with the class... I seriously wish we had more like him, he's such a fascinating and knowledgeable guy and it certainly shows in his lectures... I enjoyed his class so much that I took the 4N03 seminar that he teaches.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Quite an amazing professor. This social media class is the most useful one I have taken yet. Dr. Sevigny brings his own experience to the classroom. Also one of the best public speakers I have ever seen. I think he should be Prime Minister. Busy man - catch him in a free moment and he'll talk to you but can be hard to find him outside office hours.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Intriguing man. Seems to be a lot to him, but seems to be strangely sad sometimes. Sevigny's lecture style is amazing and he has the best real-world examples. But I am always wondering... who is he? A mystery. Fantastic professor, though - scary smart and cultured.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Great speaker, engages class extremely well. Gives several assignments that only take a couple hours to complete and have small weightings which helps ease first year students into university expectations and allows for steady improvement over the semester. Very passionate communicator and wants the best for his students.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Dr. Sevigny is an inspiring person. He makes you feel safe and secure when you are with him in class. When I talk to him after class, or in his office, I never see the time go by. He's a very good man. It's a shame few of us get to know him well. I'm jealous of his lab manager - she spends so much time with him and he obviously really likes her.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Sometimes, you are lucky to run into a professor as talented and passionate Dr Sevigny. He cares a lot about his students' well-being and he focuses on students' development as individuals. He also does his best to promote students in their careers. Be careful though - he will ask you to be honest with yourself. That can be a hard thing to do.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Extremely passionate and the most brilliant professor I had in 6 years! Extremely knowledgeable and his market experience differentiate him from other scholars. Fair marker; he probably can't stand stupidity. If you are a serious student and that you take learning seriously, i.e. actually read your textbooks, you'll love him.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Bad communication skills, difficult to reach for help, goes on a useless tangents about self and therefore does not have time left for actual course material. He still test on topics he did not teach and is a hard marker. Low use of communication textbook which he co-authored and made us buy for the sake of royaltees.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Alex is an excellent prof. Really knows political comm/elections. Wish I got to know him better. He's so busy and in-demand that it's hard to catch up to him. He doesn't suffer fools well either so if he seeks you out, that's a compliment - be thankful. His lab manager is a very lucky woman to be able to spend so much time with him. I'm jealous.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Alex is a overall great guy. He knows his stuff and doesn't try to shove it down your throat. We would stop for coffee breaks (8:30 class) and he would come ask everyone how the weekend was. Classy professor that deserves his good reputation. He is still friends with the majority of this older students, always a positive sign.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: A truly decent person and a pleasure to have a professor. I learned more during this course than in any other of my undergrad. My favourite course of all the ones I took at McMaster. Period.

Name: Alexandre Sevigny
Review: Dr Sévigny is, quite simply, a true gentleman and superb professor. He is my model, now that I am in graduate school.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: Best professor I've come across at McMaster University. Very intelligent, passion for teaching and very approachable. tests were difficult but his ability to make every lecture interesting was worth every minute!

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: would take any class taught by him. tough marker but approachable and fair. took his class as an elective, ended up minoring in psych. best proff at mac

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: Amazing professor!!! Makes material so interesting, engaging and his tests are very reasonable. Completely changes your mind about first year psych. I would take any course with him!

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: He keeps class very interactive and interesting by using current disease and conditions in his examples as well as utilizing the TAs to demonstrate specific activities. He likes to perform "role plays" of various conditions during class. A downside is that his tests are too short and there are very few chances to redeem   your mark in the course.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: Very difficult to understand, since he speaks very fast. His email explanations are very unclear. He is very approachable after class. His tests are too short

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: I've taken two classes with Ullal, decided to minor in Psych so I can take more with him! Such a sweet, easygoing guy, and he's so passionate about teaching. His 2NF3 class is especially interesting, definitely recommended

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: His short answers were marked way too hard. Other than that, the material is interesting and he can communicate it well in lecture. The only thing is that his e-mails tend to be extremely useless if you are trying to understand something.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: He is extremely knowledgeable and very approachable after class. The course was really well structured and the content was very interesting. He paces himself according to the class, teaching whatever he can without stressing over time. Defined my interest in clinical neuroscience.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: He is very enthusiastic about his material, however he is very hard to understand sometimes - he tend to talk in a very low voice, thick accent, and fast.  If you're going to take a class of his do yourself a favour and sit in a front row.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: Designed my career for me. Never had a prof that has had such a profound effect on me. Thank you Prof. Ullal.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: His exams will ruin you, you will be lucky to get a C, no tutorials, sometimes one assignment per course, (ive taken more than one of his courses), overall, very difficult.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: he does love what he teaches but his tests are ridiculous, and i mean you can study A LOT for them and still get horrible because he tests on the most irrelevant details that have nothing to do with what the main focus of the lectures are about. And this has nothing to do with being whiny, his tests are just plain unfair period.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: Dr. Ullal is great prof. Has so much passion for what he does. As long as you understand the slides and you go to every lecture it's not impossible to get an A. He can be quite specific when he's testing you with details, but it's not the hardest course.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: Really awesome prof. Makes the subject interesting. Hard tests and exams.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: Great teacher. enough said.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: This guy is brutal, hes nice and enthusiastic and all but hes doesnt speak loud enough, hes boring as hell and hard to understand. He likes to test the most random things out of his lectures. I don't recommend this one.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: A very poor professor. Shouldn't still be teaching. Lectures are all over the place and he can be difficult to understand due to his accent.He also tends to test on the most specific, irrelevant details resulting in test averages in the 50s. Low competence in using online resources.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: Interesting class. Memorize like crazy. Not insurmountable, but hard to get 12. Dr. Ullal, however, is a fantastic professor who shows enthusiasm and interest in teaching. Tests and assignments depend on how nice the TAs are, and they are variable. Only about 5-10 people will get 12s each semester but getting 10 or over is possible with studying.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: Dr. Ullal is one of my favourite professors ever.He made neuroscience and sensory processes classes so interesting and educative.I got A in both of them and I decided to focus on neuroscience in the future.he is very enthusiastic and nice.But I do admit,you have to study your *ss off to get good marks.

Name: Gautam Ullal
Review: You will rock this course if you memorize the lectures, which is easier said than done as they tend to be ALL OVER THE PLACE! Don't need to read the text because he never tests out of it. Over all, if you're interested in the content, take 2F03 instead, which covers the same content but is structured much more logically.

Name: Todd Alway
Review: amazing prof. makes the most boring courses fun!

Name: Todd Alway
Review: Actually made me want to go to my elective -- Alway's energy is unmatched by literally any other prof and he makes it very easy to get excited about the subject. Goes into excellent detail while still remaining concise. Virtually no readings for the course and he told us *exactly* what was going to be on the final. Legend-tier prof

Name: Todd Alway
Review: Very loud, but a great prof. Content is perfect, and uploads summaries. Focus on arguments made in class b/c they make up the exam. Two major papers. 1st is On Liberty; 2nd is on a debatable topic. My TA was a hard marker and slacked. The prof is very organized, though. Tutorial has group projects. Group assessment at the end. Exam has three essays

Name: Todd Alway
Review: Alway is an amazing prof but 2NN3 is probably the driest course I've taken so far. It's not Alway but just content itself is super boring, I doubt anyone really wants to sit through research methods and data collection for an entire semester. Some of it was difficult but Alway was very helpful and really tried to explain the concepts to us.

Name: Todd Alway
Review: One of the best professors in McMasters Social Science department. The level of enthusiasm he has when he gives lectures is always fresh and energizing compared other profs in the department. Genuinely a nice, laid back guy and a very good professor as well.

Name: Todd Alway
Review: Amazing prof!! Made me fall in love with Political Science

Name: Todd Alway
Review: I took 1AB3, and while you don't have to attend lecture, I definitely recommend it to do well in the class. Depending on your TA they're tough graders, which makes the exam difficult a well. Research paper and exam were both 35% so be ready to work hard on your paper if you don't mind that I'd recommend the course.

Name: Todd Alway
Review: I had Dr. Alway for Stats 3NN3. Math is not my strongest subject so this class was a bit intimidating. The class was easy for me because I went to all the lectures - the math is easy once you've seen Alway demonstrate how to solve the questions. He was also really determined to make sure we all understood and did well which was nice of him!!!

Name: Todd Alway
Review: You can tell he really cares about his profession and wanting to make sure his students understand the content of his course. Be aware though, he only yells during his lectures so sometimes its a little excessive and distracting. The TAs can be tough markers but if you go to them about assignments or grades they're usually good with helping out.

Name: Todd Alway
Review: Dr. Alway is a great professor. I took both POLSCI 1AA3 and POLSCI 1AB3. Be sure to attend lectures, not only for the material but also because he makes it very interesting so it is almost impossible that you don't learn anything valuable. The only thing is that his TAs mark very hard and expect a lot of unnecessary "specifics" from students.

Name: Todd Alway
Review: He cares so much about his students. The class itself is not that hard and you will want to attend lectures for his personality. 10/10 recommend his class. The only downside is the tutorials are vague but maybe that was just my TA.

Name: Todd Alway
Review: Took this class because I was interested in Political Science and I was not disappointed. Always is an engaging prof who clearly cares about the material he teaches. Super easy to do well if you go to class and do the readings otherwise you'll be struggling on the exam. Definitely would take another class with him!

Name: Todd Alway
Review: you're lucky he's awesome. just go to class

Name: Todd Alway
Review: This man is amazing and is the reason I am in political science. I have now taken 4 classes with him and every single one has been a ride. Best lecturer who will surely entertain you even through a 2 hour lecture on a Monday night. Makes boring (but necessary) content interesting. Very fair level of difficulty, you get out what you put into it.

Name: Todd Alway
Review: I loved this class. I wasn't sure going into it how much I would enjoy the topic as depending on the teacher politics can become a dry subject but I am pretty sure he could talk about anything and make it interesting. He is really good at making sure you understand the material and really cares about his students succeeding. Would highly recommend

Name: Todd Alway
Review: Lectures with Alway are always entertaining, although if you do not attend class or fail to follow some the high speed delivery of the course content you may struggle with this class.

Name: Todd Alway
Review: best prof I've had by far, I've been in 3 of his classes and have been impressed each time. he's obviously passionate about the course material which makes his teaching even better. also really funny and talks so loud that you are constantly engaged in the lecture

Name: Todd Alway
Review: this guy is amazing. although i took the morning lectures and could barely get out of bed most days, when i did, he gave me a good start to the day. very energetic, knows what he teaches, delivers it well and concisely. if you take this, get a head start on reading J.S. Mill's On liberty (check syllabus) as the essay focus a lot on his principles.

Name: Todd Alway
Review: He can talk about paint drying and it'll still be interesting. If you took grade 12 politics his first-year pol sci course won't be anything new but it is sure as hell an amazing class. He is extremely passionate about politics and the workload is fairly light. Coke needs to sponsor this guy already.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: Her voice is dull, but the content she teaches is interesting. Since it is an online course, her videos are just videos (not in online course module format) so be prepared to turn on the captions and pause A LOT to capture what she is saying so that you can write out your notes.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: I took SOCSCI2CC3 online and it was a breeze. There's a lot of reading and papers to write but it's enjoyable and can be done at your own pace. Geraldine's lectures can be a little boring but generally good. She responds to emails quickly and kindly. If you follow clearly defined grading criteria in syllabus, you should do well on papers!

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: Most boring lecturer I've ever had. She seems like a good person but doesn't do a great job at delivering course material & doesn't know how to engage students. As a result many people skipped class & those who did show up seemed half asleep the whole time. Don't take her class unless you have to & are good at teaching yourself!

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: Seems to only be interested in bashing trump and praising CNN. Course material is dry and her delivery is horrid. Attempts to make funny jokes which only 1/4 of the class finds funny. Assignment is boring and topics appear to be unbiased even though voros is the most bias professor you'll have.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: I loved this prof! One of the best to have in your first year. Very kind and really cares about her students.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: She is so sweet, I recommend anyone take this course not only because HLTHAGE 1AA3 is easy but also because Geraldine is an absolute sweetheart. She makes you feel like you are one of her children, such a wonderful person.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: Very kind, understanding and captures the attention of the class.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: Geraldine is one of a kind. Really wonderful.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: She is even more caring than my mom.  Inspiring and respected.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: Doctor Voros is definitely one of my favourite profs. Not only is she exceptionally caring for all her students, she knows how to run a course in an effective way but also a not very stressful way. She keeps you engaged in lecture even when you don't want to be, and her personality is one of a kind. Would definitely take her class again.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: Geraldine Voros is just amazing. Here you have a person that is beyond busy but some how still finds time to really connect with her students. She treats her students the way she would want her own children treated. Geraldine Voros teaches, guides, and inspires. Geraldine Voros is one of a kind.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: She is a very kind woman who clearly cares about her students. Her lectures can be a bit emotionally heavy depending on the course.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: good prof

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: Dr. Voros is one of the most caring professors i have ever had the pleasure of learning from. She is all about facilitating her students, not hindering them. She takes the opinions of her students into consideration, is fair to everyone, and is very reassuring in times of stress. She has made my learning experience stress-free, and very enjoyable.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: Very funny teacher,however, the class was very boring. Almost unbearable. Easy grade and test was an easy A. The essays on the other hand were almost impossible to get a high 60 low 70.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: Listen to the podcasts and you're golden!

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: Absolutely amazing lady, when things got tough in other courses she gave extensions to the whole class to ease stress. She posted a great exam review, her final exam was very fair. Every lecture was interesting and while she didn't follow a slideshow she was intriguing and I felt comfortable going to her office hours.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: Hardest tests that  I  have written at Mcmaster! You ll pass it 99% doing very little, but you wont get an A studying tons!

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: She is an absolute GEM. Best professor I have ever had.

Name: Geraldine Voros
Review: such a sweetheart, she even gives her home phone number in case you need to contact her

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: EXTREMELY hard marker, her grading scheme made it quite literally impossible to pass. Instead of testing students knowledge on the course content, she made sure we included very specific words in our answers on midterms in order to pass, if you didn't, you fail. Lectures are awful, she does not post all slides, makes tests unnecessarily hard.

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: She is a pretty good lecturer but her personality is really awful. She looks down on all the students and seems to think she owns the whole school. She'll call you out for distracting the class if you go on your phone/whispering AT ALL which was way more distracting than the actual whispering/phone use. Her tests are pointlessly hard to understand.

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: Lecture heavy, but does not post slides. Textbook was easy to follow, but the short answers which were given on tests were too specific and didn't take too much from the textbook. Quizzes online were also tricky as well. Only positive is that she is an okay lecturer, but personally didn't enjoy her personality.

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: An engaging lecturer, but her tests are worded illogically as she herself admitted. She is condescending in conversation. When I reviewed my test at allotted hours, she inexplicably raised her voice and refused to speak to me until I sat down, after I had stood waiting in a line up to ask her for clarification, and all other girls got to stand.

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: good lecturer; tests are purely based on the words she says; slides arent helpful. Tests are much harder than they should be considering the material is fairly easy. VERY specific grading criteria if you dont follow youll fail. Dont expect her to care btw, i had a personal emergency and she refused to meet with me. you CAN do well though

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: Nice. Her lectures are really very good. Her tests are awful. Seems like she's overcompensating for the easy subject matter by making them tricky rather than a test of students knowledge. The average for this simple class was very low every exam on her end. Desperate NEED to be called Doctor, prepared into her lecture slides(inferiority complex?).

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: You need to answer exactly what she thinks you should answer, no room for you to interpret anything other than the one she explained. don't learn in the way that is helpful to you, memorize her words. in order. good lectures, tests do not match up. makes content harder than it needs to be. doesn't really want you to get a good mark but u learn

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: I was hesitant to take a class with Dr. O because of what I heard about her tests being impossible or that she was a hard marker. However, her lectures were amazing and as long as you studied what was taught in lecture and the textbook sections that were clearly outlined, the tests were absolutely manageable. I've learned so much from the course!

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: Dr. Ostovich is excellent at engaging students. She made the pretty dry material extremely interesting. If you pay attention, take good notes, and read the textbook it's possible to do well. On tests, she looks for very detailed information, and although somewhat unapproachable, she is excellent at giving feedback and cares about her students.

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: If you care about your grades dont take a Jen Ostovich class. Material was interesting, good lecture style, but youll be guessing at whats important information and whats not. The whole course was a guessing game imo.

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: -She talks way too fast when it comes to specfic explanations and concepts we have to know for tests. -She only has like 3 TAs and the class is packed. She should at least have more! -She doesn't post everything she shows on the slides -GPA killer in my opinion

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: Going into Dr. O's class I was pretty skeptical of how the semester was going to go based on what I've heard about her, and I was pleasantly surprised. Honestly, as long as you go to class and do your work, it's not a challenging course. I found her tests to be pretty fair with no surprise content, and she was engaging and interesting in lecture.

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: Shes a great prof! Loved her in both of the classes she taught, but the midterms were SO hard, and I studied more for them than I have for anything else. You absolutely need to go to class if you want to pass!!

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: Really hard because it is not taught well. This class needs a tutorial and has only 3 ta's for over 300 students. The TA's often have to ask each other for answers. The exams are like two part riddles, very easy theories but they need to be applied and I found not well explained. There is no review. The textbook is secondary to lecture. Useless.

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: Unapproachable and not helpful

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: SUCKS. Abrupt and sometimes rude, you cannot miss 1 class. No support in the class at all, she says in the first class that if you email her she will delete it. If you have the chance to skip this class, do.

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: Dr. Ostovich somehow manages to make the most boring-sounding course interesting. Shes organized, clear, funny, and always willing to help students. I love her testing style  it actually forces you to understand the material, not just memorize it.

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: Genuinely enjoyed her lecture style, found it very easy to remember content thanks to her many examples. Big focus on experiments in Social Psych. Havent taken a course with her that required short answers so found tests very fair and not overly difficult if you understood the content and attended lectures.

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: Only graded by two tests and the exam, nothign to boost your mark. Her tests were much harder than everyone expected and brought down a lot of averages

Name: Jennifer Ostovich
Review: She is a good lecturer but, when she grades you... :(  she is one of the hardest marking professors I have had in my 4 years at McMaster. Let's just say there is a reason why she is known as the GPA killer.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: Amazing professor, incredibly engaging lectures. Through out the year the lecture hall was full, speaking to how well he is at his job. Material covered is extremely relevant to what will be asked of you on tests. Very easy class as long as you give a sliver of effort.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: He has very confusing lectures and is not good at explaining. Only 10 people show up to his lectures. He does not know how to connect his laptop to the projector.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: In regards to Dr. Hoppes knowledge of the course, he is outstanding. However, he writes on the chalkboard in lectures, messy writing, and no content was posted anywhere on Avenue or Aaron childs' website. Basically, read the textbook for this entire course and had to teach myself everything. Assignments, 2 midterms 1 test. I recommend another prof.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: Bird course. Not offered every year since Hoppe's the only one who teaches it. Assignments: 70% (14% x 5), but with friends, you should be able to get 100% every time. He reuses old assignment questions. Exam was similar to the assignment but is tricky, uses the same concepts, only 30%. His lectures are interesting but people don't show up.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: Funny guy, loved his lectures because he was very insightful. The key to doing well in this course is doing all the homework problems since they'll be a subset of the tests & exam, but you should really know your concepts well. Go to his office hours, he'll enthusiastically answer your questions and make sure you understand. 10/10 would take again.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: This is class was very similar to stats 2D03; he attempted to be interactive by bringing in dice, cards and paddle boards but at times the material was very repetitive and he wasn't very good at managing his time for the class to cover everything

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: No real office hours. Graded the hard exam VERY LATE. You could tell he was a research prof and has low priority on teaching. I guess the only upside was that he's nice.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: :( - stay away!!!!!

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: I don't attend his class anymore because he reads off his slides, and his slides are horrible. Have the material isn't on them and when he solves problems he skips many steps. Please explain

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: Best STats professor on campus. If you want to be challenged and want to learn how to think deeply on Assignments, I suggest you take Dr. Hoppe's classes.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: One out of 5 is too much for this professor. He is the most unhelpful person in the whole world.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: Even though I got an A- in this course, I think I deserved an A+. His exam was unfair and brought my mark down. I wish he had dropped our lowest Assignment, which he did not considering the one on Martingale's was so unfair.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: Toughest Statistics Professor in the History of Mankind. His Assignments were a nightmare and impossible to solve on your own and his final was more challenging then expected.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: Very unfair professor. His exams consist mostly of questions you have never seen before. Way harder then the Assignment problems. I suggest that he start giving more fair exams.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: Extremely unfair prof. He really does not care about students. His exam was so hard.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: Definitely the worst prof ever.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: He would put me to sleep in Winter 2005. Early Morning Nap Time was his Lecture. Very Hard Multiple Choice Tests

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: He was really the worst professor you can possibly imagine. His take home final was impossible and very hard. He acts very cool but he is veryyyy uncool. He doesnot like giving good marks to students.

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: This prof is really really stale. His lectures should be flushed. They are so stinky!!!

Name: Fred M Hoppe
Review: After the first lecture itself I realized he was going to be a terrible prof.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: Do not take this class if you are not prepared to buy a $115 textbook and memorize it front to back. The midterm required memorizing stats and specific definitions, no questions actually relating to what was taught in lecture. His class average this semester was a C-. Would not reccomend.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: very interested in the field and what he was teaching, enjoyed the class a lot. Some midterm/exam questions were specific stats/definitions from the textbook so it's prob a good idea to read it

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: The tests and the exam are so detailed. He just loves to test the students on detail stuff. The readings on textbook is really really a lot. You have to read & remember the whole book, or you will lose a lot of marks of detailed questions. i remembered all his lecture and maps, but i didnt read the textbook, then i got a C. the course is so heavy

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: Great guy, but marks tests extremely hard.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: Simply put, here is a man who understands his class is taken by a lot of students as an "easy" course, but decides to punish them by writing an exam of obscure facts from the textbook. If you find yourself in his class and can't get out, READ THE BOOK.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: Assignment 2 was so poorly planned, it was a group assignment where you are at the mercy of if you select a good enough partner. I had more homework in this class than all of my other ones combined, most of which were nonsense. If you have a photographic memory, or can memorize an entire textbook than this is the class for you. If not, good luck.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: This was not a geography course nor did it test my skills and understanding of geographic concepts. Rather, this course is all about your ability to memorize the defenitions in the textbook that Dr. Mercier wrote. The marking was unreasonable and so was the amount of homework. Made us buy "courseware" aka a cash-grab. Tutorials were like daycare.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: Too much homework, almost three times the amount of other courses in the same program, would never take any GEO again.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: If you love walking around Hamilton in a freezing weather take this course!

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: Dr. Mercier is the best for this course. He is a bit fast according to me, but his lectures are quite good. He doesn't post the completed notes, so make sure you attend lectures to fill them up. The midterm was pretty easy, and the exam was okay.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: absolute worst class i've ever taken... on exam we had "finish the sentences" questions from the textbook aka memorize the text..... do not do it, please, don't take this course

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: Mercier is a talented professor. His lecture delivery is on point. He explains things very clearly, uses great examples and keeps the lecture lively by moving around and using his voice effectively. It is wise to attend his lectures since he only posts skeletal lecture notes online and Ive heard he uses some lecture material on exams.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: Took this as an elective and god what a mistake. Course material is basically more in depth of what you learned in grade 6 geo. Incredibly boring. Tutorials are once a week and 2 hours long with weekly homework. Assignment number two gave me stage 4 brain cancer and was marked incredibly hard, especially considering marking criteria was not given

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: i regretted every single minute of my life when i took this course. trust me, don't do it.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: I would never ever wish this experience on someone else. My advice would to NEVER take a course with him. The course felt like torture, or rather a punishment.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: Horrible course. I felt punished. The textbook, which he wrote, was unnecessary to my understanding and took away from it. He had me run around the entire city taking pictures in the cold. There was a two hour tutorial which made me want to cry. There were 23 chapters. I feel overwhelmed and sad.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: Prof was good. But, the course itself was horrible. His slides are partly empty, so you'll have to go to class to fill them in. Some portions of the slides are not in the textbook. At times his lecture will not flow with the chapters (i.e. Lecture 1 slides will start at the end of chapter 1 textbook). The book will put you to sleep.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: Took this course as an elective. Dr. Mercier is a VERY good lecturer. I didn't really enjoy the course itself, the 2 hour tutorials were annoying and the weekly homework tasks were tedious. GEOG 1HB3 is NOT a bird course and I wouldn't recommend taking it for an easy 12. Nonetheless, Dr. Mercier is a good professor but be prepared to work hard.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: Dr. Mercier was one of the better profs I had during first year. His lectures were clear and concise, very easy to take notes. He was a very nice and approachable guy and every once in a while he had a good little joke. Definitely would take one of his classes again. Almost made me consider switching to geography from business.

Name: Michael Mercier
Review: Dr. Mercier is one of the best teaching professors that McMaster has. He is approachable, and is very knowledgeable about his field. He is witty and the course material was almost, like, fun.

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Dr. Horn is the most incredible lecturer I've ever experienced. However, this class is one of the nine circles of hell. While the lectures are captivating and near-perfect, the grading on the (2) essays is cut-throat and each is worth 30%. I was in the A-range on the first one, and soon dropped to a C after the second. A perfectionist's nightmare.

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Professor Horn is a very good professor. I found his lectures really enjoyable, which is good because if you want to pass the class you really should attend. However, they are really well structured and include the right balance of important/interesting info. Overall really good class if you attend lectures.

Name: Martin Horn
Review: This is the guy you think of when you first thought of a university professor; arrogant, loud mouthed, cuts you off constantly, and has impossibly high essay standards.  But man was he great.

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Amazing lecturer!

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Horn was my boy.   Talked about swamp donkeys.  Marty was the man.

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Dr. Horn has great lectures, which he is definitely known for. He's so knowledgeable and that definitely shows in class. He's a very tough grader.  My issue with Dr. Horn was that he was very unapproachable. I am a student with a disability and he seemed very annoyed to accommodate and was doing so bc Mac forces profs to. I didn't feel respected.

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Good storyteller, but you can't expect less from a prof who teaches the same thing every year. Does minimal work as a lecturer. Very unapproachable outside of class and doesn't provide lecture notes. Automatically gives out zeroes without reading 12 page essays by referring to ambiguous citation rules that he does not care  to elaborate on.

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Fantastic lecturer who made War in the West one of the most interesting, informative courses I have taken. Each class was like he was telling a story. Very charismatic.

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Dr. Horn is extremely knowledgeable in history and is a good teacher, but this has made him very arrogant. He regularly insults the class without appearing to notice it. His lectures are good, but they are very fast paced so it is best to use a laptop to take notes in his class. He is also a hard marker and his handwriting is incomprehensible.

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Excellent lecturer, old-school style and doesn't try getting students involved (will answer questions, but leaves discussions for tutorial.) Take thorough notes, attend class, and you'll succeed.  Not an easy marks class, but marks are fair and supported.  Very approachable during office hours.

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Dr Horn is a great lecturer, and a very talented orator. He is very passionate about what he teaches, and imparts his knowledge and his perspective in his field while in lecture. He doesn't use avenue to learn, so lectures are mandatory. Great course, high marks in this course are hard to attain due to his standards. Still learned a lot

Name: Martin Horn
Review: I absolutely love Dr. Horn! Very passionate lecturer, knowledgeable, and inspiring. I looked forward to his class every week! Attendance was mandatory if you wanted to do well, but it was well worth it! Amazing prof, simply amazing. He makes McMaster proud!

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Dr. Horn is one of the best professors at McMaster. Attendance is mandatory if you want to do remotely well but by the end of the course you will walk away with a so much amazing knowledge about the topic.

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Best professor I've ever had! Fascinating, highly intelligent, and very good looking :)

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Amazing prof!! He inspired me to major in history! Great lecturer and very passionate.

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Very good lecturer. Tough marker, but pretty fair

Name: Martin Horn
Review: I wish I got my degree in history, or a at least a minor

Name: Martin Horn
Review: extremely intelligent, easy to follow, detail oriented and hot :)

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Great lecturer!  A bit intimidating to talk to face to face, but great class overall!

Name: Martin Horn
Review: Friendly, organized, helpful, intelligent. Knows what hes talking about and lectures are extremely clear. Marks were too much determined by TAs, which is frustrating because they are often hard markers. Wish he would have told us a little more about the exam prior to writing it. But he is so friendly, helpful and clear -would love to have him again

Name: Simon Wood
Review: Honestly my favourite professor at Mac! He had all of these cool/memorable stories about music that he incorporated into the class which made the content even more interesting to learn. Method of assessment was 2 tests and one final exam. He doesnt post slides/notes online so you have to go to class

Name: Simon Wood
Review: Best prof I've ever had! It's super hard for me to attend night classes, but this class was so easy for me to attend. Instead of it feeling like I'm in a class and bored, I'm always having so much fun in this class! He explains the material perfectly and I never get bored. Also he tells you exactly what sections you need to read for the test!

Name: Simon Wood
Review: shouldn't be allowed to teach, completely goes off on tangents related to nothing about the class and is pointless to talk to about material worthless.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: way too hard. ridiculous in all honesty.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: Hes hands down the best prof at Mac. If you attend the lecures, take note during lectures and study the reading you should have no problem getting a double digit in his courses. Hes so funny and makes the classes so exciting.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: Extremely tough.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: Wood had a lot of interesting stories that made classes enjoyable and concepts memorable. Tests (2 midterms and a final) were very fair if you put a little effort into taking notes during class and did the small amount of readings he clearly stated would be tested (put out study guides for every test). Doesn't post notes online.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: Amazing professor! Funny, easy to talk to and very entertaining! EXTREMELY HARD CLASS! Marks are solely based on multiple choices (two midterms and one final exam). The multiple choices are really difficult considering there were so many questionable tricks to it. Not a bird course.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: Exams based on several days worth of studying lecture notes, several film-viewings, and textbook readings. Beware* 30% of your mark is based on only 25-30 questions which are difficult.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: This has been one of the most interesting classes I've ever taken. It was a Monday night 3-hour lecture and I looked forward to it all week long. If you genuinely just enjoy film, you'll love this class. If you're paying attention in class its pretty easy, if you don't, then you might have a hard time.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: exams are tough, rude guy

Name: Simon Wood
Review: Test questions are extremely tricky (A,B,C,A+B,All of the above etc.). I studied the material through and through for over a week and knew everything. But his tests are purposely tricky. Judging by the 2nd set of exam results, it looks like a lot of people struggled too. NO extra credit is offered. This is my only class that won't be a 12.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: Simon Wood is one of the best professors I have ever had at McMaster. He teaches music so passionately that content ends up sticking in your head. Tests are fair and the textbook is required.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: Best professor I've ever had, his lectures were fun and very informative. This is definitely the best class I've ever had. I'm passionate about music and Prof. Wood has a rare gift transmiting his passion as well! Overall amazing.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: Best prof I have ever had

Name: Simon Wood
Review: easy material, tough test, cool guy. I got a 12.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: Hes THE BEST! He truly cares about his students and is the funniest pro ive ever had. However, the midterms and exam were a little challenging but you can definitely get a double digit without putting too much effort. Also, if youre ever confused with anything, you can just email him and he gets back to you in less than a day. Amazing prof.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: A breath of fresh air. Truly understanding prof and lectures are amazing. Gives specific pages for readings. He is abs great! Midterms are easy

Name: Simon Wood
Review: THE REAL DEAL. Great man, great prof. Sometimes he repeats stories he already told (I'm guessing he forgot he already told them) and it's so cute and funny, if a little flustering. He's so versed and knowledgeable and truly loves what he teaches. One of McMaster's gems.

Name: Simon Wood
Review: Simon Wood is extremely engaging, every class is fun to be in. Its definitely such an enjoyable elective. And every now and then, he blows your mind with cool facts. Textbook readings are given before every test and only questions from the pages he says show up on the test, so its not reading heavy. Definitely recommend this course and Music 2F03!

Name: Chris McLean
Review: If you take this professor you won't touch your phone (or get distracted in anyway). This man has helped me see the true reason why we learn Mathematics. He is hilarious and will keep you awake and attentive throughout the lecture. I hope he gets an award for his lectures some day.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: Lectures are full of energy & explained in a good amount of detail as well. He can occasionally moves through things a little quickly, but makes up for it by virtually always being accessible right after class, so if you missed something, you can very easily go up to him to clarify. Tests can get a little spooky but if you study you'll be fine.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: Great prof, absolutely hilarious, pretty much stand up comedy in a lecture. Tests are pretty easy and the course is quite bird overall. Go to Math Help and ask for Tony, he's insane at Stats and great at explaining.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: He is such a good proff. His classes are enjoyable and makes the course easier to understand. Loved him. If you don't go to class, you'll be super confused though, so always go.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: This guy is hilarious. He makes the lectures so much more enjoyable. If it wasn't for his humorous lectures, I would probably never go to that class.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: Spends more time making his lectures a theatrical performance than caring about the success of his students. Make sure you make your textbook your best friend, and get ready to cringe at everything that comes out of his mouth.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: Best prof, i would wake up at 6am for him because best explanations you could get out of your post secondary education.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: He is the best teacher I could ever ask for! Helpful, funny, clear he could make anyone understand what he is teaching! Do whatever you can to get into his class

Name: Chris McLean
Review: McLean is by far the funniest teacher I have ever had. Listening to his lectures is easy due to his clear thought process, humor, and quality notes. The tests/assignments/labs are fair. However, his lectures can be a little hard to follow if you are a very logically minded person, and looking back at his notes if you missed a class is difficult.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: Overall great guy. Tests are not difficult at all and he always cracks jokes. Pay attention in lectures even though the notes are posted on the class website. He is easily accessible for extra help and usually stays longer than necessary to help.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: He is the best math prof/teacher I have ever had. Calc 2 is a very difficult course, but he puts in the effort to teach us, and that goes a long way. Can't say enough great things about him. Wish he taught more upper year courses.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: Honestly amazing. Ive never found it so easy to wake up for 8:30 math lectures before, but McLean made learning math very fun and enjoyable, with relevant in class examples and easy to follow solutions. I really recommend him to anybody who wants their math lectures to feel like watching tv and learning at the same time.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: Best prof I've had, took him for all 1st yr maths. Seriously passionate about math, inspired me to actually take interest in the content. Will answer any question, available in&outside of class. Jokes/humour may seem tacky to some, but keeps lectures positive. Do his sample tests, assignments and some txtbook work and the tests should be a breeze.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: The best math prof ever.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: Dr. Mclean is awesome, though his handwriting is awful... You have to keep writing , and I cannot really catch up with him during class. To get a good mark, you have to make sure you understand all the material covered in the notes. Linear algebra is abstract, but if you memrise those concepts, you will be fine.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: i hated my math prof so i sat in his lectures instead and it helped so much! super funny with timmy and his cookies examples. super organized and super fair! real gem of a prof and super approachable and ready to help. show and take notes and youre set!

Name: Chris McLean
Review: Hes a flipping legend. I wake up at 7am every morning to watch his interpretive dances, and not feel bad about my weight or level of fitness.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: Amazing professor. Lecture's I'd say are mandatory due to how well he explains the concepts, and are worth going to because of how hilarious and entertaining they are. Lots of homework though, and the exam was hard. I ended up getting a 12, but had to put effort in. Just make sure you do the textbook homework on the site and the practice tests.

Name: Chris McLean
Review: The best prof

Name: Chris McLean
Review: Great prof made first year interesting only downside is he snaked everyone really bad on the exam study hard!!!

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: Best prof by far. His exam questions are lengthy and sometimes confusing so wouldn't reccomend if english isnt a strong suit. Def would take again.

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: Tom Haffie is one of the best educators I have had in academia. Great appreciate his teaching methods and life coaching.

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: He acts like he's the best prof ever and thinks he's helping our learning, but in reality just tanking our GPAs by making things unnecessarily hard.

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: Haffie engaged me to take ownership of my learning giving me the tools for learning independently and collectively with others in his course. Generous with guidance. His whimsy is heartwarming and memorable.

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: Tom Haffie  Icon

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: Honestly Haffie is a thank me later kind of prof. He will test you by bringing 2-4 lectures/concepts together in each question, so you have to focus on bringing everything together into one big idea. Be ready for an 80min exam with 35 long multiple-multiple choice answers that will challenge you more then any high school ever could.

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: Haffie is an overrated prof and definitely not worth they hype. I attended all his lectures and found he doesn't explain concepts clearly and expects you to make your own judgements. I visited his office hours and he did not help at all, he is rude and makes you feel dumb. His exams are all over the place!

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: Haffie is an amazing prof, he explains concepts clearly and tries his best so all students understand. However, he expects a lot of hard work from students. His exams are so far the hardest I ever got, that's because you need to "THINK SLOW'' to actually get the question correct. Beware of tricks in the exam. He prepares us for the upcoming years.

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: Slightly unpopular opinion, but I actually really loved Haffie. Don't be mistaken--his exams can be extremely hard and he definitely makes you work for it, but he genuinely cares about his students and did a pretty fantastic job of preparing me for second year. GO TO LECTURE! He's the tough love every first year hates but needs.

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: Haffie is my fave prof! Authentic, humble, and always creating new things to help us students learn.

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: A lot of students don't really like him at first but he uses many creative teaching methods for the class. Haffie is a wake up call to university as his exams will test your understanding of the material rather than what you memorize. His lectures are a great experience and you can tell that he really wants the students to succeed in future courses

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: Best prof! I like that he encourages us to view concepts from multiple perspectives. Truly cares about teaching & mentorship.

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: tom fractalized my mind into dust

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: It was my first time learning Russian with interconnected classmates that were of Russian ancestry. I was whacked into believing for the remainder of my undergraduate career that I had low IQ thus cascading me, as a node, from undergoing atrophy from the system. The time alotted was a ticking time-bomb - had the time allotted been greater, ...

Name: Tom Haffie
