Review: READ THIS! Haffie is one of the most difficult professors I have ever had. His exams were very very challenging. However, he forced me to learn how to study well, learn properly, and perform on tests better. He was hard, but I learned so much more about myself and how to do well academically due to him. The skills I acquired are astronomical.

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: Classes are very unorganized, Haffie just bases some lectures off of recent articles he's found online. Tests are typical Haffie questions, which requires a lot of thinking and understanding of mechanisms. Definitely the hardest prof in UWO sci 1st/2nd year, but also by far the most engaging and interesting.

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: his class is not easy, thats a fact. although I didn't do as well as I wanted to on exams, he taught me a deeper understanding of bio and ways to critically think. lecture content was interesting and I learned how to improve my study skills.

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: Despite his well known "haffie questions" which require critical thinking and application of knowledge (thus, they are sort of hard), he's an excellent professor who explains concepts clearly. If you don't understand something, he's always open to explain it to you and help you better your studying methods so you can do well! A real gem

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: Had haffie two years ago for first year biology; was really good then! But for genetics; he is just all over the place and I don't think he knows what he is even teaching... some of the material isn't relevant and you have to rely a little on the textbook

Name: Tom Haffie
Review: My favourite professor thus far. I had him for 1st year Bio and have the opportunity of having him again for 2nd year genetics. Glad to be back in his class! I feel like I am using my brain and thinking again rather than memorizing straight facts. His lectures are interesting, and he explains things really well.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: You will not learn anything in class. You must learn everything on your own or in your group. I hope you can read people well when you first meet them because you are going to need to find the smart people with programming experience and stick with them. Good luck.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: He's a good prof despite the content being quite dull. Very helpful outside of class. Gives good advice and you tell tell he cares.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: This class is not easy. Make sure you get the textbook for this class or you will be lost and if you forgot it somewhere he'll give you the chance to get. Decent guy with decent grading. Class is mainly group focused so make sure you pair up with people competent. i hate coding so ill probably never take another again but this is by far the best

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: You will need to use the resources available to do well and have to set time to focus on the material

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: Really nice guy and he likes to talk. You 100% need your textbook for this class. His teaching style is very different. It's kind of a teach yourself kind of class, I learned more in the tutoring center. All round great guy though.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: Collar made this class the best it could possibly be. He cares about his students passing and will do a lot to help you out. Also is very knowledgeable on not only the course content, but will give you a lot of life tips along the way. Take him if you take this class.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: Very great professor, clear with assignments and has very laid back lectures. Always there for you outside of class.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: Good guy. Always willing to meet outside of class to help you finish projects. Only negative is that he can be condescending at times. But overall hes a good guy and means well.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: He's a good professor who gives quality information about life after college, the projects are a little difficult but you're given enough time to do it and he helps you out a lot on them. The lectures become a little boring sometimes but overall the class isn't bad at all.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: He'll give you good feedback he wont tell you what you want to hear

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: Very good, exams are difficult. Loves to tell personal stories but most are funny or interesting to hear. No power points which is good

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: Great Professor! Easy A if you do all the work and do good on test. Very funny and will teach you so many life lessons.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: The professor has a great energy and really cares about his students. He is always available to help students and is willing to come to campus outside of his office hours for meetings. Even if the class is hard, he is willing to help as much as he can, and successfully makes the class interesting for students who aren't too into the subject matter.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: Good lectures, keeps students engaged. Provides study guides for each test that have everything that will be included on the test.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: Prepare to learn a lot of helpful tips to use in the real world.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: Professor Collar is a great professor. He interacts with all of his students and always does his best. He curves tests to benefit the students. He will always go the extra mile to help the students. He always tries to make the best of the topic even if it is boring. Great guy and would absolutely take this class again.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: Offers a lot of office hours and outside of class reach but really veers off topic during lecture. Very uninformative and leaves information incomplete. I.e. you leave lecture with more questions than questions than you started with.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: The most condescending professor I have ever met. Speaks as if he is the only reason you won't be living on the street after university. He speaks about irrelevant topics during the lectures and will regularly remind you that he is providing mind-blowing knowledge that you will hear nowhere else, despite it actually being mostly common knowledge.

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: A real pleasure to have as a teacher!

Name: Emilio Collar Jr
Review: Collar is very passionate about COBOL. He believes that every student has a chance of passing but he's going to make you work for it. But that's okay when the quality of his teaching is so high.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: I had Lena for my first seminar. She's very relaxed and doesn't care a lot about grades. She's Swedish and has a bit of an accent. She's a wholesome lady and she's passionate about the history she was teaching us. We had some short response papers (8 for the whole quarter) and then one big final paper. No tests!

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: Lena Ericksen is one of the most awful professors I have ever encountered. First off, she teaches blatantly incorrect information. She has incorrect definitions of sexualities, and she has incredibly offensive memes peppered throughout her presentations including one misgendering a trans person. She also tried to deny me disability services.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: prof ericksen was so nice i struggled on the first few quizzes and she told me how to study and I started doing so much better on them. She is a very kind and understading. Make sure to read the chapters in the book before taking the online quizzes and youll do great on them

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: Dr. Ericksen is a lovely professor. She is very funny, respectful, and engages the entire class. Her lectures are exactly what her powerpoint and the book is, but she adds in interesting parts. Coming to class is exciting! You can tell that she deeply cares for her students, diversity, and just people in general. 10/10 would recommend.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: Lena is an interesting one. If you actually want to learn stuff on this subject, dont take this class. a lot of her information is inaccurate (ex believing intersex and trans are the same) and she constantly misgenders trans people. She likes to only talk about hereto couples too. Shes very funny though, study for tests and youll do fine.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: She does read her slides word for word and also posts them on canvas, coming to class is kind of pointless unless you want to listen to her babble for almost 2 hours, and laugh a few times. There are 2 100 point mc exams and you get graded on launchpad quizzes that you take at home. Buy the book new, it has a code that can only be used once!

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: I didn't realize anyone could NOT love prof eriksen, she's so funny and tells it like it is. I guess if you're easily offended don't take her? I found her to be a teacher who clearly cares for her students and people in general and has an appreciation for diversity. She is accepting and uses up to date termonology. She is extremely knowledgable.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: I took Psych of Gender with Dr. Ericksen. She tries to be funny to break through the awkwardness of some of the topics, but it simply distracts from the points she's trying to teach. Studying for exams is hard because you don't actually know what you're supposed to be learning. Easy content, but sitting through her lectures is nearly unbearable.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: I rated this class a 5 as "hardest thing I've ever done" not due to the material (that's not relevant/up to date) but because of sitting through her lectures. Requires her OWN new $80 book + code that is literally otherwise $3 on amazon. Tests are 100Q & impossible to study for due to the fact her lectures are verbatim from slides ab. mythology...

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: I really disliked Ericksen, her lectures are pretty pointless & insufferable regurgitations of the textbook. She had us read a completely irrelevant book she wrote & in my essay I cited studies that were contrary to what she portrayed in the book so she marked me down for it. I guess she just wants us to essentially write a good review for her book

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: This was a difficult class, but Lena was like the grandma anyone could have ever wanted. She told us real stories, made going to class fun, and is the sweetest woman Ive ever met. As long as you really learn the homework, youll pass the class! None of the exams are cumulative.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: She's goes through slides way too fast and the only thing graded is the exams. They are all 100 questions. Not an easy class for a 101.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: She is so terrible. Some people love her but it might just be because she's an old swedish lady who tells sexist jokes. Somehow the lectures always ended up being about how great she is (and often how terrible the rest of society is). You have to write a paper on a thing she made up and there's a question on the final about her kid.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: This class was pretty easy and I have nothing against Lena as a person but so much of what she teaches and presents in class is either extremely outdated, not even relevant to the class, or outright incorrect. When students attempt to challenge her she is extremely dismissive. Makes attempts to be inclusive but is not successful.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: Lena is knowledgeable and one of my favorite professors Ive had at western. She is engaging, explains the material very well, and I looked forward to going to class. She is very respectful of all views, but sadly some people decide to be so overly sensitive and take a lot of what she says as an insult to whatever they identify as.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: Lena Erickson is by far the best professor I've taken at Western. She is respected and so knowledgable. I kept apologizing because of all the questions I asked her and she gave me a whole speech on why I shouldnt apologize. She uses accurate definitions for the LGBTIQ community so I'm not sure why some people get offended. Best Professor ever.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: I did not love Lena's class. I found that it wasn't that important to go to her class because nothing she really talked about was that great. She is amazing and very funny but this class just wasn't great. she reads word for word off her powerpoint then posts them on canvas. The tests are pretty hard if you go to class or not.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: Took this class because fellow students recommended her to me, and it was a complete mistake. Lectures were half opinion and half info straight from the textbook (that she co-wrote and we had to buy new). She wouldn't back claims with evidence and most of the info we were presented with was entirely irrelevant to the subject of the class.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: This class is very easy. I've only showed up for the first test, and the final. Quizzes are online, and through launchpad. Tests are in-lecture, and consist of 100 MC questions. I didn't like Lena at all. She never cited sources for lecture, and teaches some outdated material. Overall she made a good class, terrible. Cannot stand her.

Name: Lena Ericksen
Review: So, I showed up maybe 6 or 7 times total to this class and I'm on track to get a B. There's two tests and online homework and that is all that you're graded on. Lectures are pretty boring and not super worthwhile; the slides are posted online. Also, for teaching a psychology of gender class, Lena is woke for like a 2004 standard at best.

Name: Kim Luton
Review: disgusting exams. not sure how they are allowed in general to be honest.

Name: Kim Luton
Review: Worst professor I ever had in the sociology department. She absolutely tanked my average with her incredibly unfair exams. She would ask questions about things she never taught, and would demand that you picked answers that she wanted based on her own personal beliefs and values.

Name: Kim Luton
Review: Easily my favourite prof in the Soc Department. Ashby is extremely inspirational and articulate in her lectures. She uses relevant examples and is obviously passionate about what she teaches. HOWEVER** her powerpoint are vague so show up to class. Her exams are a complete mess and almost feel as if they're set up to fail students. Lots of readings.

Name: Kim Luton
Review: Horrible prof. Absolutely heartless, uncaring,rude and not helpful. Created a very unfair exam which the whole class complained about. Submitted the final exam mid-course with content that we neither covered not was listed in the texts. Avoid if possible

Name: Kim Luton
Review: Very passionate about what she teaches and can be very funny. Beware -- you will not succeed unless you adhere to the rigid ideological boundaries which are dogmatically centred around intersectional theory. If you value intellectual diversity, you may want to avoid her classes, and this one in particular.

Name: Kim Luton
Review: Professor Luton is by far my favourite professor at Western. I had her first year for sociology 1020 and swore I would never take another class with her. However, her upper year courses are so different. She cares immensely about her students and wants to see you work hard. If you put in the work she will recognize it! 100% recommend her classes

Name: Kim Luton
Review: When I initially enrolled in Kim's class, all of my friends told me to get out due to the "myth of the Luton". Many believe that she is an impossible professor and that you cannot succeed in her classes. Her class has proven the myth to be false - this is my favourite class this year! You will succeed if you work hard. I currently have over 80.

Name: Kim Luton
Review: This prof can be nice but she is very stern, her tests are also very hard and there is a lot of them! I have a 80 percent average and my grade in this class really does not reflect that. If you want to do well you have to not just attend the class and do all of the readings of which there are many, you have to be fully switched on all of the time!

Name: Kim Luton
Review: Very difficult exam with questions that were very obviously not taken from this year's course material. It's possible to do well if you put in a lot of effort, but no matter how hard you study for the exam be prepared to get a bad mark.

Name: Kim Luton
Review: She handed out tissues during our exam "just in case we felt like crying". I don't think making fun of your students stress right before they're about to take an exam is remotely funny.

Name: Kim Luton
Review: Amazing professor. High expectations, achievable if you work for it.  Shock to most new university students who are used to easy high grades in High School. She does not believe you are all special snowflakes. She wants to see you put in effort.  She makes you listen and apply you knowledge. Not easy but one of the best courses I've ever taken.

Name: Kim Luton
Review: Absolutely amazing professor. I have taken three of her classes, Soc 1020, 3312, and 3358. While sociology can be a bit disheartening for the first year student, the low average is necessary. These are things that change in her upper year courses, and she cares deeply about each and every one of her students. I would recommend any of her classes!

Name: Kim Luton
Review: Kim Luton is very knowledgeable in her field and offers great, informative lectures. Unfortunately she is an extremely tough grader, so you have to be on top of your game at all times or your mark will suffer greatly. Exams are tough and you will have to pay attention to tiny details that most profs won't think is significant.

Name: Kim Luton
Review: Doesn't let you use a laptop, have to hand write all notes. Lectures are a pain to go for only an hour but she takes 10-15 minutes trying to figure out her powerpoint in the beginning so basically each class is around 30 minutes. Exams are difficult because she includes lecture questions, textbook questions, and questions from the tutorial book

Name: Kim Luton
Review: She cares about her students and gives good lectures but I did not find her very approachable. Once she gets to know you she is very nice but is intimidating at first. Her midterms were very hard and difficult to study for and even if you do study, you do not feel prepared. She often has to bell-curve because her average is too low.

Name: Kim Luton
Review: her exams are very challenging. the average for most of the exams in my year were in the high 50's-low 60's. be prepared to attend every single lecture and study hard

Name: Kim Luton
Review: She is the worst. I have an 83 average throughout my three years at Western, and while I put in the time and effort for Luton's classes, she simply disliked me and made sure my grade reflected her attitude. She is vindictive, unpleasant, and simply not nice. No prof should behave like this. Avoid her at all costs.

Name: Kim Luton
Review: Do not take this course.  Exams are impossible to do well on no matter how much you study.  Assignments are marked subjectively by the TA's.  Participation marks are also dolled out very unfairly.  Your grade will not reflect your effort and this course will cause so much stress.

Name: Kim Luton
Review: such a lovely woman, i loved going to her lectures. this was one of my fav classes... too bad i almost failed! if you don't need this course, i highly suggest taking the half year courses of soc. Exams are EXTREMELY difficult... averages on midterms were about 57%. No matter how hard you study they are impossible. Read the text book!!

Name: Kim Luton
Review: Didn't really learn anything in this class and exams were totally unfair,  the highest mark out of all the exams was an 84 and the avg was around 59, switch out if u have her!

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: Dr Mike is such a gem. His lectures are so engaging and he's obviously very passionate about his job. His exams are not bad at all, and he definitely adds information and value that you can't get just from the textbook! He's super accessible before and after class as well :)

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: The most amazing prof. His lectures are amazing and theatrical. Very willing to talk outside of class, answers emails and is super helpful to students. Best prof at Western.

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: His lectures covered very little of the actual course material. but if you don't go to class you wont be able to answer the last 20 questions on each exams. will have to read the textbook from front to back, every single section before exams. If you do have questions, he is pretty easy to reach and is helpful. easy 5% from his online assignments.

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: I'm beyond glad I took this class with Mike. My favourite prof of all time. Always answers questions after lectures and always gives review sessions before exams. Even if you aren't in psych this class is extremely interesting!

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: I took this class in my first year, and loved it! A great intro to all things psych. Made lectures interesting and fun to go to. Always had many visual aids to accompany slides and video material to enhance concepts and ensure understanding. Exams are very fair! Great guy, great 1.0 elective credit for first year!

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: Amazing prof; his lectures are very interesting and really help you to understand the material. Always has great music playing at the start of class too. He's also one of the authors of the textbook which is very helpful.

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: hes a gem. make sure you read the textbook though and study in advance.

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: This course is not for me, I did not enjoy the lectures and do not understand them did not take much away, the teacher was very nice and funny his teaching style was not for me though.

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: By far my favourite first year prof. Makes even the more dry material interesting.

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: Gives great, interesting lectures and really knows the material he is teaching. Makes class fun to go to. Extremely accessible and accommodating. Fantastic professor who really cares about his students and making psychology interesting.

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: Best professor at Western by far. Psych 1000 isn't a fun course by any means but Mike made lectures enjoyable and the content understandable. His lecture questions on exams are harder than Laura's but that isn't much compared to the quality of teaching he delivers. Unfortunate he had to leave during the last part of the semester, fav prof by far!

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: Mike has without a doubt the most entertaining lectures of any prof I've had. They are fun, and engaging. This being said the exams are hard, no question about it. If you're not looking for a course where you absolutely have to read the textbook, psych probably isn't for you.

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: A legend.

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: This guy is probably one of the best profs you'll ever have. The man coordinates his playlists with lectures and they're all bangers. Lectures are ALWAYS interesting and class is always short. Dr. Mike is 100% certified beauty.

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: Great Professor

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: I deeply respect Dr. Atkinson and enjoyed his lectures. While I received a very decent grade I still want to point out that his lecture section on exams is much harder than any other prof. That is my only complaint, and for some people, situations can be a lot worse.

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: Best prof I had in first year. Hated psych, loved Mike.

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: BEST PROF I HAD IN FIRST YEAR. Lectures TOP quality, felt like going to see a show. Lots of notes to take in class, but makes class enjoyable as possible. Textbook almost cover to cover is testable, lots of reading, divide and you will conquer. If you study the material, you will do well, Qs weren't difficult if you studied. Available for Qs.

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: Dr. Mike has absolutely amazing lectures. Although his lecture questions are harder than Laura's, it's still worth taking his section because of how entertaining the lectures are. Amazing

Name: Michael Atkinson
Review: Awesome! Love him so much!

Name: Chris Butler
Review: Chris Butler gets straight to the point and his tests and quizzes are taken from the notes (usually). I would suggest doing the HW which are the MPODS and use the book for extra problems or clarification, but the book is not necessary. Lots of extra credit opportunities, take advantage of that and try getting those points early in the semester.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: He seemed to really care about his students. Even though I took Calc 2 in high school and did very well, I still struggled to get an A. The tests are really easy to mess up on, and on most tests, the grade you receive doesn't truly represent your mastery of the content. I really wish he gave more room for error. The TAs are the worst by the way.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: Chris is very funny and makes his lectures easy to understand. There are daily quizzes in the beginning of the class so you can't be late. There are easy extra credit opportunities which is just to go to events around campus(not particularly math-related). He has MPODs that are very useful. If you do the MPODs you really don't need to do the HW.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: daily quizzes are easy but they are at the start of class so you can't be late

Name: Chris Butler
Review: Good professor with good explanations of material. He's a funny guy and pretty helpful. Definitely do the MPODS.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: I had Prof. Butler some time ago. He had some valuable lessons, but for some reason I felt like I was on his bad side. He'd be friendly and laugh with other students, but took on a more intimidating persona with me. I feel like I could have learned more from him had that not been the case. I guess you can't gel with everyone.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: He was pretty good overall. I liked him better for 122 than 121, 121 had daily quizzes which i wasn't a fan of. However 122 had weekly quizzes which were usually pretty easy. His tests aren't easy but they aren't too hard, he gives a lot of review material for them on his website. He also gives extra credit and curves at the end by around 1%.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: He can seem like a funny and charming professor at first but soon enough through the course you'd realize that his jokes get old, boring and fail to hide his shortcomings as an introductory math professor. He will teach you how to solve test type questions and you can get an A but tries to avoid having to explain how the math theory actually works.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: Great prof.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: while attendance isn't mandatory, he doesn't have media vision so you have to go to class to get notes. He's well respected, interesting, and easily accessible outside of class. You get the feeling that he really cares about his students. He provides answer keys to past exams and gives extensive review problems. Overall a good time. daily quizzes.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: He is very nice. His hand writing is excellent. He gives all the past papers and keys before exams which is extremely useful. Its really worthy and proud to be his student.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: Absolutely awesome professor. Class was at 8:30 but it's definitely worth getting up for. Gives really good examples during lecture and you always know what to expect from tests because he puts all his past tests on his website. Do your MPODs and go to class and you should be fine. Really tries to make his lectures interesting and humorous too!

Name: Chris Butler
Review: Professor Butler really cares about his students and Calculus. He is an excellent professor, but this is a difficult class. The tests especially are very fast paced, and there are no homework points to balance them. You will want to use the SI hours and do all of your MPODS, as well as time yourself to study. Difficult but rewarding course.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: No mediavision. Tuesday quizzes. Has practice quizzes online and practice test with solutions online as well. Assigns homework from textbook but is not graded. Tests are not curved. Up to 1% extra credit provided for going to school activities.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: Amazing professor. love him and his work. very helpful and friendly as well as the TAs

Name: Chris Butler
Review: Chris is a great professor who really cares and really knows how to teach the material. You can't go wrong with him.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: Chris is available in his office nearly every day for students that need help. He keeps the lectures interesting by cracking jokes and getting the class involved. Overall, still a difficult topic but Chris made the class much better.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: Great professor, easy class if you do the worksheet and take notes in lecture. Tests very predictable, he gives you plenty of past tests to practice. Funny teacher, pretty creative and three cheers for donut day.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: Chris is very funny and very knowledgeable about calculus. He's a great professor, but moves very fast. Your entire grade depends on tests and quizzes, which is understandable. Work at your own pace and don't fall behind and you'll be okay.

Name: Chris Butler
Review: Chris Butler is absolutely phenomenal. I hated math before I took Calc 1 and 2 with him. Lectures are very entertaining, and the SIs can help you understand any material you are struggling with.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: Glenn is a funny and engaging prof. His lectures are very informational and often left interesting w/ funny quips & interesting personal analogies. Exams are based off slides, just a bit harder. Offers A LOT of extra credit; it's a waste to not take advantage of that. Able to challenge exams to get higher marks. Entire experience was great!

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: I have never had a more flexible prof. Never took one test in class because of Random reasons I couldn't be there. He always let me take it in his office. Clearest expectations for test. he accidentally gave me an a as a final grade and said because I did so good on the final I could have it. ALSO so refreshing to have a poc prof teaching a racecla

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: This class is one of the biggest on campus. Professor Tsunokai is an effective lecturer. His slides have a lot of information on them, but he tells the class what to focus on. You have the opportunity to challenge the exams. A great class!

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: Professor Glenn is a very caring person who wants his students to do well. He provides detailed study guides and lets you replace your lowest exam score with a retake exam. You can tell that he is very passionate about the topic.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: Glenn is kind professor. that being said, 269 is over-hyped. Slides with tons of info shown for 15 seconds then a picture for 3 minutes. Had +/- 20 TA's. tests were 75Q on a BROAD topics. definitions changed to fit subject which will confuse anyone who has learned the terms in other classes. interesting class, a little scattered, decent BCGM.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: Lots of opportunities to get extra credit, asked questions you had to put theories into practice - not that easy, because he didn't really go into detail with those theories.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: This class was super interesting and well taught. Attendance isnt mandatory. Glen uses great examples to go with his points. You do have to study but the textbook is unnecessary. Glen is great.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: Professor Tsunokai is a wonderful teacher. His lectures are engaging and he's very passionate about all topics he covers. He creates many opportunities for extra credit and goes above and beyond to make sure students can achieve the grades they want. He's a very understanding and caring teacher.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: Gives so much extra credit if you fail all the tests you can do extra credit and still pass. Love Glenn best teacher ever, such a good lecture giver. Would take again a thousand times over.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: Glenn was literally the best teacher Ive ever had, I would take him again in a heartbeat. He gives HELLA extra credit too!!

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: I loved taking this class. Glenn is an excellent professor, and I really hope to take classes from him in the future. He gives a lot of extra credit, and I really believe he cares about his students. His lectures are always organized and very informative.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: Glenn is an extremely qualified professor who genuinely cares about his students. There are endless extra credit opportunities and he really wants you to succeed. I 10/10 recommend any of his classes, we stan Glenn.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: He's an amazing professor and I love everything he teaches, so real and so needed. It's very lecture heavy and test heavy but he gives an extreme amount of extra credit so if you fail it really is on you.. He makes it easy to pass if you put the work in, and while sometimes I'll leave class with way too much info to digest, it's the best class.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: Best professor I've ever had at WWU for sure. Insane amounts of easy extra credit, and his lectures are genuinely fascinating. He uses tons of illustration and provides super clear study guides and practice problems. He gives you so much extra credit that you really have no excuse not to get at least a B in the class.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: Soc 269 was by far the largest class size I endured at WWU. 400+ students. I looked forward to this class so much though because Professor Tsunokai is relative and an excellent lecturer. His class is test heavy, but he offers extra credit and if you're in the top 10% of the class he bumps your grade up by a half-letter. Highly recommend!

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: This class was really easy (pay attention in class and do the STUDY GUIDES) and the lectures were really interesting. Glenn did a wonderful job at keeping students engaged with lots of videos and pictures. He also gives out extra credit like candy. This is a really good GUR choice that won't bore you to death. The textbook really isn't necessary.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: This class was very easy but very informative. I came out with a 4.0 and with much more knowledge than I had coming in. Show up to the lectures, and youll do fine. Dont even bother buying the book, but do read the online articles he provides for you.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: SOC269 was probably one of my favorite class I took. It was quite ease because it was so interesting and didn't even feel like work. Glenn is such a great lecturer and does such an amazing job teaching some really sensitive issues. He gives loads of extra credit, so if you show up you will definitely get an A!

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: Glenn is the sweetest! The lectures are worth going to because then you really won't need the book. I found this class fun and would suggest Glenn to anyone, he is beyond helpful and WANTS people to learn and take away from this class.

Name: Glenn Tsunokai
Review: Overhyped. Class was so much work had to read 2 large textbooks, a bunch of online articles (20 pages each) and he slams you with info each lecture. He talks so fast and I'm often confused when he starts talking about a write up we have to do that came out of no where. Literally SO much you have to know for the tests. He's an alright guy i guess

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: The content you learn in this class will be used more in the "real world" than anything you learn in any other class. If you are looking for practical skills, then take this class. Professor Heather is an amazing educator because she knows how to teach student-colleagues. I wished she taught other courses besides Events and Professional Comms.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: One of the best professor's I've had the pleasure of working with. If you are comfortable actively participating in the class you won't regret taking it.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: COMM318 with Heather is a great teacher for professional communication development. It offers opportunity to create a custom resume and cover letter for a job, which was awesome. I love classes that require you to do things that are actually needed in real life. You may miss two class days in the quarter without participation points being deducted.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Heather is my favorite professor at Western. She is supportive, she cares, and she is entirely authentic. She makes the classroom feel like a family, and she makes all of her students feel heard. At the same time, she has high standards and makes sure you leave her classroom better prepared for the real world.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Heather is an amazing teacher, she is very relateable and if you ever get a chance to take her class DO IT!!!! You wont regret it. Ive taken three classes with her already and Im planning on taking another.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Heather is great but often I wish that she practiced what she preached. Leaving our issues at the door is great but there were times where she did not. beaking down in class, and leaving early. assignments are easy and her classes are easy. makes deep connections with you but I found that when you leave her, she doesn't really care about you

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Heather is an amazing teacher who is very understanding of everyones circumstances. She teaches a well thought out course with great readings that aren't to extensive but valuable to your future. Highly recommend taking one of her classes.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Heather is amazing! She really cares about her students and makes an effort to teach meaningful stuff. You'll gain skills and experience that is applicable to the real world. I love her stories and her honesty. I highly recommend this class to anyone! syllabus day is a little rough but stick through and you won't regret it.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Heather is incredible. Trust her when she takes you to the ropes course- also, she will listen to your feedback to make it better if you have qualms with it. She will teach you that professionalism is defined by more than white men in suits, along with how to make your resume your own. She deserves to be paid more.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Heather is the best professor I've had during my four years at WWU! She's hilarious and her classes are actually fun to be in. She covers very important topics and is honest with students. The work load and grading is very fair. This class is the best and I think it covers relevant topics for any student, no matter their major!

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Heather is so great. She truly cares about her students well-being, and wants you to succeed. She's easygoing, but is extremely passionate about her teaching, anyone that has her class is lucky.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Heather is a great professor. She is helpful and genuinely cares about her students. The class isn't hard but assignment heavy. If you show up and do the homework you're guaranteed to pass

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Heather is awesome!! I loved coming to class! And she knows what she is talking about and will help you get a job!

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Loved this class and loved Heather. Actually worth taking if you want to learn a little something about heading down a career path. WILL BENEFIT MAJORS BESIDES COMM AS WELL.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Heather is a gem. Her lectures were just the right length and always gave you the exact content you needed. She gave life lessons I will never forget and if you have the opportunity to take one of her classes, do it.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: If you have the chance, you should definitely take a class from Heather. She genuinely cares for students and wants to see you succeed. The syllabus is intimidating at first, but the class is actually structured very well. Definitely one of my favorite and memorable professors.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Heather is one of the most inspiring and empathic professors I have ever met at WWU, she cares and supports each student endlessly. Sometimes, for a student to feel successful in a class isn't only about a solid based on grade but also the emotions and supports that professors bring to the individuals.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: Great professor! Loved this class. As a communications student Heather is definitely one of my favorite professors now after taking her class. Truly caring and understanding. She also knows her stuff and actually gives you good advices that you'll need for the real world.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: By the end of the quarter, Heather was a friend to us all. The first couple classes are a little scary, and she's gonna stress how hard the class is, but if you stick with it, don't drop the class, show up almost every day, and participate, it's really not that difficult.

Name: Heather Davidson
Review: She is the best teacher I have had in 12 years. She is the realest and a true real world teacher that helps you get into the real world. Take her if you can.

Name: Paul James
Review: Look, Paul is a nice guy, he just isn't the most prolific lecturer. He is an anthropologist and is very smart and IMO should be out working in the field and not stuck in a classroom. This was not my favorite class overall and I would not recommend taking it. However, it was not super hard either and tests were pretty commonsense.

Name: Paul James
Review: Don't waste your time or money. He goes on so many tangents, his group work is a mess, he barely knows what he wants you to for the project. Take the class with literally anyone but him. Wish I could get a refund.

Name: Paul James
Review: It could be a very interesting class, but it's clear the he is only teaching what he is personally interested in. He goes on long rants about his views almost every class, and you have to learn everything at home. I recommend Anth 201, just not with Paul James.

Name: Paul James
Review: Paul was fine. He does go on a lot of tangents. As long as you attend class when there are discussions (Wednesdays) and quizzes (every other Friday) you should be good.

Name: Paul James
Review: One-on-one, he seems like a good professor and it sounds like he is going to help you to succeed. In class, he doesnt really care what happens and doesnt follow through very well. His lectures are a struggle to get through and he doesnt know when to pause and when to keep going in the slides. I wouldnt take his class unless I had to.

Name: Paul James
Review: He does tend to ramble, but overall hes a pretty good teacher and has an interesting class. As long as you memorize the words from the text book and pay attention in class to the examples, youll get a B. There are quizzes every other week and the questions from those are used on the final.

Name: Paul James
Review: The class itself was very easy to do well in. There were discussions every Wednesday with a small group that was easy to get 100% on, and 1 project in the quarter we'd sometimes spend time on on Friday. Everything else is just reading off slides and going on tangents that felt redundant- none of the info felt new. The readings were interesting tho

Name: Paul James
Review: Paul is a professor that is only teaches so that he can get his own research money and it shows. All of his slides are white with black font. In one of the biggest lecture halls at wwu, he never leaves from behind the podium and cannot engage any of the students. I'm annoyed that I payed to take this class because it was all common sense content.

Name: Paul James
Review: Boring class, but an easy A. No need to come to class, only for weekly group discussion days. Study the lecture slides at home and go over the reviews on Canvas before exams and you should pass no problem. You must pick 2 out of 4 individual written/project assignments, which are easy. I didn't crack open the book once, so don't buy it.

Name: Paul James
Review: What most students don't take into consideration is that lecture is boring because Paul is bored in general lecturing about it. You can tell he's passionate about anthropology, but not as a lecturing professor. He'd rather be out there applying his knowledge than lecturing. With that said, he is the NICEST guy and grades SO easy.

Name: Paul James
Review: i have no idea why i didnt read these reviews before signing up for the class. im in this class right now and its so dreadful. i just skip every class except for wednesdays, and read over the slides, since he will just read over the slides super quickly then go off topic about some personal unrelated topic. hes also so cringy :/

Name: Paul James
Review: He spends the majority of class time covering all of the same material that he has already explained or talking about his time in South American when he went to WWU. The class itself is pretty easy but his lectures are unbearably boring and you're better off just reading his slides even though they're barely decodable.

Name: Paul James
Review: Paul James was a great professor except that it was very hard to get a hold of him outside of class. He did not respond to a single email of mine over the quarter.

Name: Paul James
Review: paul is a nice enough guy, but he doesn't teach the material as much as tell stories about his own experiences that dont really help on the exams. his lectures are mainly google definitions, as long as you go over them a bit and do the study guides youll do fine on the tests. show up wednesdays and youll get most of the points you need to pass

Name: Paul James
Review: Paul's class is easy. The lectures don't really help you on the tests just go over the slides and use his study guides. Put in minimal effort and show up Wednesday's and you'll pass. He wants you to get an A. He's a sweet guy the class is pretty dull though. Also don't buy the textbook but buy the other book you will barely use it though.

Name: Paul James
Review: Paul is such a fun professor! I am not an Anthropology major and took his class for a GUR and its great! He is very lecture heavy, but he makes his lectures interesting with the stories he tells! you will read a lot in class and you do need to study a lot (mostly his power points & the textbook) Overall great class and great professor!

Name: Paul James
Review: Lectures are not always super focused and the test reviews are not very clear or organized. The class itself isn't bad but a lot of it is self-taught.

Name: Paul James
Review: He wants you to get an A. Show up to class and take notes and you will understand his exams. he does weekly discussion groups in his cultural anthro class which are reading heavy but as long as you have something good to say so others can record it, youll get all the credit for them.

Name: Paul James
Review: Paul is VERY lecture heavy. He goes off topic and talks about some kind of example for a solid half hour before he basically gets off the first slide. The content is great but he also needs help with time management, discussion days we are supposed to have 20 min with our groups and there are times when we have 10 or less. Boring reading.

Name: Paul James
Review: His lectures were long and boring. He made no attempt to answer student's questions during lecture. The reviews for all exams, including the final, were not posted until the very last second the night before, guaranteeing that students would be up late cramming for the tests. He puts questions about himself on exams. Do not recommend.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: Terrible experience. I was a great math student all through HS... That changed this year. This guy is not clear

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: Do not take this class here. He does not know how to explain the material at all and expects everyone to somehow have a base knowledge of the material he is covering that day. Take this at a community college or another university. You will be saving lots of stress and most likely your GPA.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS AT WESTERN. Take it at a community college and transfer your credits over. Mark is the worst professor. The failing rate in his class is 6o%. Lectures are boring and confusing, he doesn't teach the material well and gives you tons of homework exercises and unnecessary information. Avoid him if you can.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: He is the worst professor at Western Michigan University. Does not care about his student what so ever, opens the class up on the first day saying a third of the students will fail. I "failed this class twice and have a 3.5 GPA. That should tell you everything you need to know take it at KVCC or a CC back home this man is doing students terribly.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: I have heard many bad things about this class and about Professor Schreiner so I was very hesitant when taking this class. There is a lot of homework, not gonna lie. But Schreiner is a really great teacher and explains the material well. I usually am awful at math but I got an A. As long as you do all of the assignments you will get an A.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: For anyone look to take this class dont. Having gone to both a community college and university, he is one of if not the worst professor I have ever had. He gives so much unnecessary work along with reading and online assignments that they dont help. He doesnt care about students and makes you feel like you arent putting in any effort.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: He was so mean. Didnt care about his students. Wasnt helpful at all.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: Are you trying to have a hard time while doing lots of homework that are not even worth a significant percentage in your final grade? if you answered yes then take this class. This professor is HARD and gives you too much unnecessary work. Tough grader and does not care how you do.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: 4.0 student my first year and I flat out could not pass this class. Undoubtably the worst experience Ive ever had in a college course. TAKE THIS AT KVCC. Youll have to devote 3+ hours daily to this class to earn a respectable grade. You will have to teach yourself. Very harsh grader. 40% pass rate.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: I took this class over a year ago and I'm still pressed about how terrible it was. Just take it at KVCC. The math is simple, Mark just wants to ruin your life and gpa. This class is a 30% pass rate, lol.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: Terrible class

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: Doesn't explain very well.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: He tends to over complicate things when he tries to explain them. There is also a lot of assignments written, and online, which don's count for much of your grade. Everything rides on test, do well on those and you will pass, if not, your going to fail. The tutor lab is the best thing you can do to help yourself

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: You MUST go to class on time. 2 skips & you're down a full letter grade even if you're late to class by 2 min, you're skipping! Use Fox Hall's SSC for help & not Bronco study zone. Was in there nightly for help, very good. Expect to teach yourself as he doesn't teach. Not given enough time on tests (harder than content given). Homework heavy.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: Almost all work is online- 50 minute lectures are spent taking attendance and going over the material quickly. Mostly self taught course. Labs just collect homework and go over the problems

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: There are many assignments both online and written that you will have to complete. He is not clear when lecturing so I would recommend going to the TAs or available tutors for additional assistance. If you do not do assignments his way you will be docked points and all points matter in this class. Recommend taking at a community college.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: I had heard a lot of bad things about this class but it was the best I've taken at WMU. There's a lot of online homework but it's super easy so long as you complete it. Tests are all based on the online homework. Schreiner was very fair and cool in his lectures, wish all WMU classes could be like this!

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: This class is a pain and such a weed out course.I always went to lectures, but still learned nothing. Make sure you keep up on the online assignments too. Make sure you take advantage of the tutors because they will save your grade. Also make sure your TA likes you because they are the ones who actually grade your stuff, go to lab class on Fridays.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: I thought this class was very easy. The only reason so many people fail is because they don't do the homework then expect the test to be easy. Material is explained well especially in the labs. Just do the work and you can expect an A.

Name: Mark Schreiner
Review: This is the college professor that they warn you about in high school. I hated this class and it was so difficult start to finish. It would be better if homework and online things were more weighted as most of your grade is based off the tests. Take advantage of study opportunities. Good luck, and hold your breath!

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: Dr. Orbe has been one of my favorite professors. he makes it a goal to learn everyone's names (well over 100 students) and relates to us and a whole new level. his exams are a little tough but manageable. if you do take com 2000 GO TO THE STUDY SESSIONS. they are extremely helpful. over all great guy

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: not just an amazing educator and academic, but a really great person. open minded in the sense that he will listen to you and be able to share with you from his own perspective without overshadowing your own opinion while still standing strongly with his own, a characteristic of a great professor and person. 11/10.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: Absolutely loved Orbe's class. I actually looked forward to going there every day. His lectures are extremely engaging and entertaining, rather than a snooze fest like other professors. He keeps me awake and actively listening. One day he started singing a song from the Lion King to emphasize an example for a theory. I would recommend him to all.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: Orbe has been my favorite professor since freshman year. He cares about your success but will not hand it out freely. He is open minded and wants people to learn not memorize. Lots of group work in this class but it's just talking and sharing ideas. You have to go to class to pass. And you will probably want to.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: This man cares about students. I only took the class because I wanted a class with him, but the intercultural class really opened my eyes.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: One of the best profs I've ever had! Knew his information and made it relatable to all of us. He also told the funniest stories- which made going to lecture so much better!

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: Orbe is an awesome professor. He is the type of teacher who wants every student to get the best grade that they can. Love him.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: Dr. Orbe is a very knowledgeable and well-educated professor who knows the material at the back of his hand. However, he is tough as nails when it comes to papers. He is so specific about what he is looking for on them that it makes it impossible for a casual student to succeed in the class. I would suggest taking COM classes with someone else.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: Only take Dr. Orbe if you're a very deep thinker like him, I'm not. That said, the weekly critical reflections and the final essay were graded pretty harshly due to his very high expectations. I'm an A/B student and struggled to get Cs in his classes, despite asking him for help. Even with a disability, he still grades like you don't have one.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: I also had Orbe for COM2000 before taking 3050 and I took that course specifically because he taught it. Orbe's class changed my life which I know sounds cliche but it's true. He's a tough grader in upper level courses and he can be really frustrating to work with but at the end of the day, he cares so much that it's impossible to hate him.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: orbe is a one of a kind professor who is all about the students he makes sure that every student does there best he's not only a professor but he is a mentor, friend, and big time motivator.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: Best teacher I have ever had he can change your life if you have any opportunity to take him for anything do it. He is amazing the best teacher ever.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: top notch prof

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: Orbe has a passion for teaching that makes his students want to learn. He says that his class is transformative, and he isn't kidding! I have taken a couple of classes with him and have never been disappointed.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: Orbe's class was so fun to be in. His lectures are easy to follow through, and he gives hilarious examples.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: AWESOME, great teacher, personable, funny, knows how to teach, lots of examples. You can tell he loves what he does! Best professor I've ever had, hands down. Hope to take more classes with him.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: Attendance is required, and at the end, it can count as much as a test grade. HE is the best professor on campus hands down! you're lucky if you have the pleasure of taking his class! DUMELA!

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: Very funny. He's very good at getting you interested in the class. He knows what he's talking about. He engages the students in the class. Be sure to come to class, attendance is mandatory. Take notes and read the chapter. Exams are thorough, but he's also helpful during those too!

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: Dr. Orbe is the best professor you will ever have! He is extremely knowledgeable and easy to talk to! He is helpful and personable. Somehow he manages to make a 150+ student lecture feel like a personal discussion. You will love him and his classes! He's fun and lectures are very interesting, he will definitely keep you listening.

Name: Mark Orbe
Review: I don't understand why a lot of undergrad students like him, especially for COM 2000. If you're fairly new to WMU and are looking for super easy classes to skate through, then Dr. Orbe isn't the professor for you. He makes you work very hard for a really good grade with a lot of stress. He isn't for those who can't critically think deep like him.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Megan is a really nice woman and she just wants everyone to succeed in her class, she used worksheets which helped understanding the topics and homework. drops 6 lowest ( or missed) homework assignments and lowest test grade, very fun and friendly.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Dr. Deeney is super nice and I 100% recommend her. She gives handouts out at the beginning of class of notes which is super helpful. While she does assign homework every class, it is super helpful and she only grades homework on a few select problems. She makes math easy to understand and I would definitely take another class of hers.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Dr Deeney is the best 157 prof I've come across and WWU. Calc is hard but she does a good job of getting everyone through it. Homework to completion every night is a must. She curves tests if they're really bad. We even got a sheet of notes for the final! Overall a very fair and helpful math prof.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Her lecture wasn't too helpful. But it is good that she doesn't take attendance. I rather spend the time studying myself and just stop by everyday to turn in the homework.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Dr. Deeney is amazing. She prepares great examples with videos and footage that relates to topics. She teaches very thorough and makes sure everyone gets the topic. class goes by fast! I just don't like how often we have homework, though it's awesome she gives us 6 free passes. Tests are fair. Overall great class.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: By far my favorite professor. Teaches through fill in the blank worksheets, so you always have the notes you need. Super clear and easy tests, usually wont ask you to simplify. Don't be afraid of her "you need to know algebra like your own name" talk, you will be fine. Love her and wish I could take from her again!

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: She is a good teacher and will get you through what you need to know. She moves fast, but that's because there is a lot to cover. She provides helpful worksheets so you can follow along, studying outside class is crucial. I enjoyed the class and I think she does a good job at explaining things.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Avoid taking business calculus with her its long grueling and Ive heard better things about just about every other 157 professor.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Handed out worksheets instead of requiring notes which was very helpful

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Megan makes math super straight forward and organized. I mean, it's still math, but she knows what she is talking about/is very professional. I love that she gives out handouts every day to simplify taking notes/doing example probs. Def a Virgo in the best way possible

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Nice person, just not a good teacher. She makes things far more complicated than they need to be and sometimes puts problems on the tests that seem to be meant to trick and confuse students. Overall a mediocre teacher and youll most likely be frustrated in her MATH 157 class even if you have decent math skills.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Probably one of the best math classes Ive ever had. She explains everything precisely and in an easy to understand way. Every class she has a work sheet that she does in the class (math 107) and this was extremely helpful. Megan is also funny and made going to class not a chore. Lowest 6 homeworks and 1 test are dropped. Take Megan Deeney!

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Dr. Deeney is one of the best math teachers I've ever had. She runs her class in a simple fashion where you're able to ask questions at any time and expect to receive a clear and understandable answer. There is homework everyday but she hand picks the problems you'll need and she also condenses the chapters in the textbooks onto daily worksheets.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Megan is very up-front and clear about what she needs you to know to pass the class. She's extremely compassionate and truly cares whether you're learning. Her study sheets are extremely helpful, the material can be difficult to grasp if you don't get the pieces in the right order.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Deeney is such a caring and wonderful professor. Truly one of the best professors I've had. homework every night, lowest 6 scores are dropped 4 exams, lowest score dropped. also first 10-15 minuets of class are always dedicated to a couple homework questions from the previous nights homework. HIGHLY RECOMMEND

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Dr. Deeney is an excellent math professor. She was always very clear and helpful. She answered questions every day on the homework from the previous day. I would say I had a little more experience in math than some of the other students but even if math isn't your best subject Dr. Deeney is a very solid teacher.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Dr. Deeney gave great examples and was very helpful during lectures. You will have homework every night but her assignments and practice problems are very helpful when it's time to take tests. Her tests were somewhat easy if you look at her review questions and hand outs. She can be stern but tries to stay upbeat and make jokes.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: Dr. Deeney was the best math teacher Ive ever taken. She has very clear grading criteria and you will always know what is expected of you for tests. While I was a little intimidated at by her at first, she is actually very humorous and is well respected by her students. Super knowledgeable in the subject and will gladly answer any questions.

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: I don't have any love for math, but this professor was great and clear in her teachings!

Name: Megan Deeney
Review: She's a nice enough professor and the material isn't too difficult. However, there is homework assigned every single night and you have to go to class to turn it in. Also, homework is graded on whether or not you got the problems correct, not whether or not you did them. If you have to take a math, she's fine.

Name: David Creasey
Review: David seems like a really nice guy but I did not like his teaching style. Way too note heavy and seemed to emphasize weird things.

Name: David Creasey
Review: Amazing professor.

Name: David Creasey
Review: David Creasy seems like a genuinely nice guy, and he's a great lecturer. His course structure leaves something to be desired (peer-graded essay questions and missing information/typos in exams are frequent frustrations), but you WILL learn quite a bit. Just don't expect to come out with a perfect grade.

Name: David Creasey
Review: Yes, he's tough. Yes, you must attend lecture. Yes, you will work hard for your grade.   You will be thanking yourself when you've made it to med school and you can still recognize and characterize bullous pemphigoid from Dr. Creasey's lectures, and you know the cell inside and out. His lessons stick, and they prepare you for down the line.

Name: David Creasey
Review: A lot of people don't like Creasey, but be cautious about the lower rating on here because a lot of students also love him. I found his class challenging, but also very easy to study for. He gives excellent notes, and everything you need to know for the class is in them. Sometimes he's more specific than is ideal, but otherwise very fair.

Name: David Creasey
Review: I would nominate Dr. Creasy for a Harry Hickman Teaching Award. This guy expects nothing less than excellence - and he will demand it of you. But, with time and effort, you and truly excel. I started off with a minimal interest in cell biology, and left with a passion for it.

Name: David Creasey
Review: Is unclear in all aspects of the course, and rarely clarifies for any students who are having trouble. Would definitely not take his course, however biology 190 A and B are required for your biology undergrad. Overall a poor professor.

Name: David Creasey
Review: Dr. Creasey is hard to work with and spacey. He lost several final exams at the end of term., taking more than two months, with even the BIO department having a hard time reaching him, before he finally found the exams to get graded for students. Stressful to say the least. I would go out of my way to avoid taking a class with him if possible.

Name: David Creasey
Review: I took this class as a pre requisite for my program. He is a good teacher. But, I think he should be teaching biochemistry instead of just biology. Gives unnecessary information- out of the course. His diagrams are confusing.

Name: David Creasey
Review: Honestly I really liked David as a teacher, very respectful, knew what he was talking about, always on point. I don't know why he's so low

Name: David Creasey
Review: Great professor. You will never find a midterm or exam question for which the answer can't be found written explicitly in the lecture notes.

Name: David Creasey
Review: Dr. Creasey was very disorganized. He provided a syllabus that lacked any structure pertaining to allotted class time per subject. The two midterms consisted one 1-2 topics each. In the last 3 weeks of class we covered 6 topics which made the course extremely easy for the first 23 and extremely heavy for the last 13. Great skeletal notes.

Name: David Creasey
Review: Intimidating as hell. Go to his office hours if you have any questions because Lord knows he never answer any one of my 15 emails...

Name: David Creasey
Review: Creasey did a lot of work with his notes and study questions to help us succeed in this class. Although the diagrams he did in lecture were sometimes confusing with a lot of info to retain, he was a good prof

Name: David Creasey
Review: He's a really nice professor and is always available to offer help. However, his lectures can be kind of confusing and his diagrams don't make much sense most of the time. The only things that count towards your grade are the two midterms and the final. Pay close attention to all the little details, do the study questions provide & you'll be fine.

Name: David Creasey
Review: he gives out study guides, if you do them, you will do well on the exams. Lots of office hours that you can go to, and he welcomes students not during these times as well. You also don't need to buy the textbook, save your money, he tests based off of his notes.

Name: David Creasey
Review: My favourite professor of all time

Name: David Creasey
Review: not a fan of this professor. he isn't friendly and does not accept questions in class. his tests are extremely detailed-oriented and not accessible for individuals not fluid in science. all of my science major friends are unhappy with him. would avoid.

Name: David Creasey
Review: Really fair teacher, he lays out what is expected and really goes over the material. its hard to get an A without putting in some effort but I barely studied and got a B+. Really nice guy when you go to talk to him.

Name: David Creasey
Review: If you actively try to understand his notes, you will get an A+. It can be helpful to study with somebody else so you can determine exactly what he means since some of his sentences and shorthand can be a bit confusing. You can tell he just wants everyone to know everything he knows about biology.

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: Class is based on 3 exams, the last one being worth 50%. All lectures were posted online, and class was quite easy to pass depending on the subject. Memorization of 20 kinds of invertebrates and the differences between them was the hardest. If the right study methods are used, this class is as easy to do well in.

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: Greg, love you, but it was super hard to not fall asleep to your voice. Its literally the perfect voice to lull you to sleep. I swear, the lectures were fine and all and I learned a lot, but I couldnt stay awake. He also uses upper-level bio language in an introductory course for those who havent taken bio which can get confusing. Hes chill.

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: Greg was a decent prof. His lectures were a bit dry but he is a nice guy and makes an effort to mark fairly. He set up study sessions outside of class for his students before the midterm and even changed the grading rubric to help out students who did poorly on the second midterm.

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: I liked Greg. He didn't crack jokes often but when he did it always came out of nowhere and caught me off guard. His notes are more like skeleton notes, I definitely recommend showing up to class to fill in the rest because otherwise they don't make sense. A lot of the time, the things he says are a lot more important than the stuff in his notes.

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: History of Biology is not the most interesting course, but Dr. Beaulieu made lectures fun. He was funny, passionate and such a nice prof that genuinely cares about his students. The course was lecture heavy, there was a midterm and final. Both weren't too bad as long as you attend lectures, take good notes, and study well.

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: I LOVE Greg!! Had him for both Bio 184/186 and although the courses are bland in general and pretty heavy, he did his best to make it interesting! I wish I pursued further in Bio just so I could hear Gregs sweet voice three times a week. Definitely recommend him as a professor:)

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: Greg is a great prof, yes he does speak like a robot but has a funny sense of dry humour that can sneak up on you. Knows his lectures inside and out and puts things into clear terms. He just taught a month of the course but have no complaints

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: Greg is a great guy, and always available to help. Him and Rossi have study sessions, so if you go to those, you will understand a lot better and be able to ask both of them questions. Tests were easy and fair, but the course itself was hard due to the immense material within a small amount of time. Go to all lectures and study a lot.

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: A really funny guy that undoubtedly cares about the material. We had 2 hour lectures that felt like a eternity, but he did a good job of making them as interesting as possible. No textbook, just a small course pack. Tests were a combination of multiple choice and written. However, whole mark is midterm (40%) and final (60%).

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: I had Beaulieu for BIOL 184 and 186, and yes, he can be boring and sometimes it feels like the lecture will never end, but that said, Beaulieu knows his lectures inside and out and can answer any/all questions. He's knowledgeable and funny (by accident) and I wouldn't hesitate to take him again. Tests could be easily passed, straightforward.

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: Made the summer semester exams fully written response- no multiple choice. The midterm had such a bad average that he made the final worth your whole lecture mark (60%). The scientific report was marked by your own lab instructors and very unfairly marked. Hard to make up marks in this class, and not many chances to do very well. (Bio 186)

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: The final exam was barely related to the textbook or class notes and straight up unfair. Knowing all the material they teach is not enough. If they even mention a topic, you need to know every detail from every random source in order to succeed (and there are hundreds of topics). If you don't need this class, don't take it, its very discouraging.

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: Very monotone and boring to listen to, hard to pay attention in class. Without going to class it's hard to understand his notes, find a buddy in the class to compare notes with.

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: This man literally talks like a robot. But his lectures are pretty good in terms of preparation and the things he teach. He seems like he knows what he's doing in the big picture.

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: Very insightful but very boring lectures. Such a sweet guy though - visit his office hours!!

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: Greg is AWESOME. This class is on the history of biology and he has such a vast knowledge of history and biology that he knows the coolest and hilarious fun facts. If someone else taught this class, it could be really boring. Go to his lectures because he tests on things he talks about in class that aren't in his notes, tests are very fair!

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: Greg is a great lecturer! The course is interesting and you don't need a background in science to excel. I enjoyed how passionate Greg was for this course. His tests are extremely fair, and as long as you study the lecture notes a few times you will do fine. This is a great 400 level science elective if you're looking for a GPA booster.

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: I didn't like Greg for the 100 level biol courses, but he is amazing for this course! He is obviously super passionate about the subject, he makes the content interesting and entertaining and he really knows his stuff. The tests are super fair, and he gives you notes that are fairly easy to study from. Highly recommend!

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: Greg is an actual angel. He's genuinely so sweet and gives really good lectures (though he lectures off slides so if you miss class don't panic). However, he does like to go off topic sometimes.

Name: Gregory Beaulieu
Review: exams are kinda hard but very fair, theres lots of textbook reading but i have never done them unless i really didnt understand something from lecture and its totally fine! go to your labs! lab instructors are super nice and helpful if you have questions

Name: Martin Smith
Review: I have taken psyc 100a/b and psyc 243 with martin and he is my favourite psychology professor. his lectures are super interesting and he is such an awesome dude! very nice and so smart. that being said, his classes are a bit of work. if you read the textbook and take detailed notes on each chapter and attend class you'll get an A+ but be prepared

Name: Martin Smith
Review: I took his Summer intensive course and let me tell you, the tests are awful. I calculated & in a 2hr long lecture we cover 5/40 pages of 1 chapter, you go home and spend 5 hours learning the rest. Tests are '80% textbook 20% lectures.' his questioned are so complexly worded w/ mostly examples not terms. Not even tested on facts just association.

Name: Martin Smith
Review: He tests 80% from textbook and 20% from lecture slides. But he tells you that and all his lecture slides that he is going to ask questions on are highlighted. Its pretty easy tests if you read the textbook and highlighted slides that he posts. Overall, going to class is not mandatory to get a good grade.

Name: Martin Smith
Review: Lectures and course content are are interesting but he doesnt get started until 10-15 minutes after class begins so a lot of time is wasted. Test questions are obscure concepts from the book and he asks about specific research and people involved. Grades are returned maybe two weeks after evaluation.

Name: Martin Smith
Review: His lectures seem unorganized and thrown together, and he does not cover a lot of course material. His tests are incredibly difficult and have a lot of ambiguous questions that lack content validity. Get used to memorizing the textbook, and even so, be prepared to feel blindsided with some of the questions he asks on his exams. Not an easy A!

Name: Martin Smith
Review: Very unclear, lectures are hard to follow and irrelevant to exams. Slides are online, but are pointless to look at. All of the exam material comes directly from the textbook, so going to class is a massive waste of time. He comes across as very unprofessional, is usually late, and uses lecture time to chat with students.

Name: Martin Smith
Review: If I wasn't so concerned with learning the material I would probably enjoy his lectures more. Last class he gave us a 5 min brake in a 80 min lecture, messed up both the videos he lined up and let us go 10 min early. there was no material he covered in lecture that couldn't be found in the text book. Hes a funny guy though.

Name: Martin Smith
Review: To reiterate the other negative comments: late every class, unprepared, and gives lectures that have very little to do with the exams, AND the exams are the hardest I've ever encountered. You have to memorize every detail from the text without any support from him. Doesn't bother answering questions about text content if you need clarification.

Name: Martin Smith
Review: Lectures were basically useless, you learnt nothing by going to them. Iclickers made you want to show up to though because lord knows you're going to need the extra 3% bonus at the end. This was the hardest I have ever worked for so little in return. I spent 18+ hours a week studying and reading for this class. By the end I gave up on this class.

Name: Martin Smith
