Review: Pretty much taught myself this course. Lectures generally a waste of time. Tests can be fair, but multiple choice might catch you off guard. Projects had potential but guidelines needlessly difficult. Unfortunate, cause he seems like a nice guy. If you don't get the text, you won't pass.

Name: Martin Smith
Review: Get ready to teach yourself! Or even the whole class as Martin will not be teaching you anything, he truly does not care!

Name: Martin Smith
Review: most difficult class I have ever taken, and you WILL need the textbook, it's your best friend. Exams are all textbook material, hard, and harshly marked. Lectures are utterly useless. He talks about the book he's writing and completely irrelevant material...I only went for the 3% clicker points. Would not recommend Martin.

Name: Martin Smith
Review: Late if he decided to actually show up to class. The only thing he did was get TAs to show videos. The few times I did see him he was extremely rude and even embarrassed a student in front of the entire lecture for going to the washroom.

Name: Martin Smith
Review: Course was structured in a way that sets you up for success (research bonus, forums, etc.), do the work and you're in for an easy A. Martin will waste your time. Get ready to hear about the books he is writing and be prepared for his infamous "Don't pack up early." Will waste your time and show up late every single day. Exams were fair.

Name: Martin Smith
Review: forums were difficult and unfairly marked, tests were odd and on pointless aspects of the texts rather on the actual important material, would always keep class late since he started class late, off topic, only motivator was the 3% for the iclicker participation

Name: Martin Smith
Review: I wasn't a huge fan of Dr. Smith or the class. He's a nice guy and obviously cares about his students, but I found that the only thing motivating me to go to class was iclicker points. The course is very general and was covered in an even more superficial way in class.

Name: Martin Smith
Review: LOVED HIM. Knows what he's talking about. Talks with passion. Is a bit disorganized.. oh and if you miss his class you won't pass. Really interesting class. By no means an easy one.

Name: Martin Smith
Review: This man is a great teacher. Although his classes are large (200+ people), he somehow finds a way to make himself personable. He is very encouraging. If you take his class, don't be afraid to answer questions out loud. This man really deserves the best. And those blue eyes...

Name: Martin Smith
Review: Such a bad prof, totally avoid, hes a bad marker and has so many assignments, you will have a quiz, forum and midterm all in one week. You have to to tests and quizes on stuff before hes gone over it, you will be reading chapter 6 studying for the midterm and be doing chapter 4 in class at the same time

Name: Martin Smith
Review: Martin was usually late for class and wouldn't start until 10 minutes in. Not a whole lot of value in the lecture make sure you read the textbook. Exam questions were heavily worded but very manageable if you know the material.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Bain is a phenomenal teacher; a breath of fresh air in an otherwise stale set of psych teachers at Uvic. Her classes are about practical knowledge rather than simply memorizing a slew of random facts, and she constantly tells stories in order to help you remember what was discussed. Highly recommend.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Bain states her opinions as though they're fact. Everything in the class is written, so if you're not a strong writer this is not the class for you. I found her grading on my exams to be pretty inconsistent. Class is a lot of work but I did learn a lot, and it was nice to not have my grade based on ability to memorize.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Jody Bain is easily one of the worst psychology professors at UVic. As a psyc major I have experienced lots of the profs and I would say Jody is the one to avoid. She assigns around 5 papers throughout the semester so if you are taking more than one of her classes you are in for a rough semester. Rubrics are unclear and marks are not posted online!

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Jody Bain is fantastic if you're interested in a standpoint from a successful clinical psychologist. She doesn't put any of her notes online, so class is mandatory, and she applies the learning material with interesting stories. Tests are all in-class written essays, but they are marked very fairly and are based on knowledge AND common sense

Name: Jody Bain
Review: You'll either love or hate Jody. She doesn't post slides so you have to go to class. I have taken 2 courses with her and find that I am actually learning the material instead of just memorization. She applies clinical examples to flesh out lecture. Had 5 papers to write for this class and exams are all written. Just write what she wants to hear.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Jody is the best teacher I have ever had. Yes, she makes you write many papers, but it prepares you for life, I am so much better at writing after taking her class. She is interesting, keeps you engaged, and will gladly help you. Her exams might seem difficult, but as long as you go to class and listen clearly to her concepts you will be fine.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Shes a bad prof. She doesnt outline things well at all, everything is marked on ambiguity. She left no feed back on half of my test and just scribbled over my work. Thanks for the great feedback Jodie! Uvic would be better without her, structure your classes better, give your students warning and relevant preparation for what will be on your test!!

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Great lecturer, poor instructor. If she likes what you bring to the table in terms of writing/ideas, life will be easy. Otherwise, get out immediately. Gives vague/insufficient feedback, even when pressed to elaborate, which made it really difficult to improve/adjust my writing. I got lucky. You either have what she's looking for or you don't.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Her ego gets in the way of her being a good prof. She is rude and short with students, thinks she knows everything and is painfully narrow-minded. Don't even bother with office hours. Content was interesting, but all over the place. I'll be avoiding her from here on out even though I did well.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Jody is my favorite prof at UVIC! She definitely assigns lots of papers, but I found with the feedback from the first attempt you were able to easily do very well on the second attempt. Not your typical memorizing facts, she wants you to prove you understood the material and with her amazingly interesting lectures the information is obtained easily

Name: Jody Bain
Review: A very interesting, highly educated prof, who knows how to tell a good story. Her classes are not too difficult if youre a strong writer, as there are several writing components, including exclusively essay-style exams. Write as much as you can for her exams! I use to think short and sweet was preferred by profs; but at least not her.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: I found lectures interesting to attend - she had cool stories about her experiences in the field. However, she was one of my least favourite profs that I've ever had. I found her to be quite rude toward students, often belittling those who challenge her. She sometimes also presents concepts completely backwards. Also has very unclear criteria.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Jody Bain is the best prof I have ever had. I have taken 4 of her courses, and if I could I would take so many more. She has so much experience and puts it into every lecture. Her exams are easy to study for and as long as you have paid attention in class and taken notes you can get a decent grade on exams, none of her test require memorization

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Unclear grading criteria, unorganized lectures and course structure, arbitrary marking scheme and poor feedback. Not to mention that despite being a health psychologist, she is (seems?) extremely narrow-minded and prejudiced. Not worth your time but it won't be a hard A as long as you don't express a view that's different than hers.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Lectures are very engaging and interesting. If youre not a great writer you wont do well, but she will give good feedback in office hours. Ill definitely be taking more classes with her.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Dr. Bain is a fabulous Prof for those who do well writing papers and personal logs (like journals). You must attend class as she gives numerous examples of personal experiences- that are frequently tested on. Bain is a good prof but not very engaging outside of the class room. Makes you feel like you are wasting her time if you approach her.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: If you struggle with writing, do NOT take a class with her. She values learning over memorization, loves a student that can relate things learned in class to their own lives and loves essays. She's fair, clear, always available for help (responds to emails within minutes), has hilarious and engaging lectures and loves what she does.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Jody is rude. I went to her office hours for clarification on her EXTREMELY vague and confusing feedback on an essay, and got essentially ridiculed and dismissed. Jody may be a good psychologist but is not a good professor. DO NOT make the same mistake I did and take her class as an elective!

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Had Dr Bain at Camosun. The lectures are really interesting, she knows what she is talking about. Grading is not always clear. You learn a lot, but you also have to work for it.

Name: Jody Bain
Review: Dr Bain seems like an excellent psychologist, and likely a wonderful seminar leader or supervisor. As a professor, she was inspired but unclear, vague, and expecting students to fully cater to her own opinions. No feedback was given on large (think 20+ page) assignments.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: Skelton is a good guy once you get to know him. He does have his moments tho as I'm sure other people have indicated.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: Skelton taught me to study. This is a difficult course. It is NOT impossible. I studied very hard and got a reflective grade. Meet people on the first day of class and start studying immediately. Take notes and record as much of the FITB questions at the end of every lecture.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: Skelton is a wonderful prof. He explains exactly what he wants from you and doesn't throw any surprises at you. The tests may seem like memorization to some people, however they are simple questions about important concepts he explicitly explains in class. If you listen you will do very well.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: For the first 2 months I couldn't stand him. His tone was rude and aggressive and deducted "attendance marks" if you were late and he just reads off his slides during lectures. Once I figured out how to study for his test I was able to do well. Go to office hours if possible, hes super helpful and do the experential learning...easy 10%!

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: AVOID THIS PROF AT ALL COSTS! His main priority is teaching students how to learn (specifically in HIS way), not the actual material! All of his tests are written only, and he will only mark it right if it is EXACTLY what he would put down himself. I got a mark off on a word because it was the plural form (even though it was the right answer)

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: Horrible prof. Incredibly rude and arrogant. Told his students to shut up after a test. Tests are SO hectic and stressful. Avoid like the plague!!!

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: This guy is hilarious, gives you bonus points for showing up to class and participating. Don't bother getting the text book never readit and got an A+, just study his notes. Test can sometimes be a little tricky but honestly this course is easy as far as biology courses go.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: I loved the way his lectures/notes/tests are put together. He is extremely clear on what he expects at the beginning of the semester and reminds people throughout. I found that the people who dislike him were those who didn't follow his very basic rules. Highly recommend!!

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: Rude, arrogant, and disrespectful to his students. However, the midterms are really easy coming from a science students perspective. Don't expect him to peak your interest in biopsych, lectures are not worth attending aside from 3% attendance bonus.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: Skelton says he tests on understanding, not memorization. However, obviously if you did not memorize his word choices then you don't understand.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: He's a little grumpy and can come off kind of mean but he does his best to make things easy to understand. As someone who isn't in Sciences I thought he did a great job explaining everything. Test aren't easy but I had much worse. Only complaint was how long it took to get our final exam marks back (not until we came back for second semester!)

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: TERRIBLE PROF!He seems like he does not want you to succeed, and will not do anything to help you if you are having trouble. He goes out of his way to be mean. His lectures are mumbled which make them impossible to understand. Definitely regret taking his course.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: He gives a good overview of the subject matter but he can be rude and the procedures surrounding the test are old fashioned and anxiety provoking. He would be a great teacher if he didn't make everyone so nervous!

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: Contrary to many people posting on here, i really enjoyed Skelton's class. His dry humour is lost on many (I personally loved it), but you can tell that through his gruffness he really wants everyone to succeed.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: Super easy course, he explains everything in class. Never opened the textbook and he gives students who arent late a bonus 3%. Final was hard, but he scaled everyone up about 15%. People who say Skelton is bad, honestly have not taken a real science course.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: It is a course I spent a ridiculous amount of time studying for, only to receive a bad grade. The subject matter is very interesting but his tests are unrealistic. The fact that the majority of the class doesn't feel comfortable asking him questions due to his rudeness and imminent embarrassment pretty much says it all.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: If you are a student who has taken a Biology course, do yourself a favour and switch out. His teaching style is horrid, referring to neurons as "mr and mrs"... Full of himself, condescending and lacks intelligence.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: Barely went to class and received a B+. Make sure to save his notes because he does take them down. But if you memorize his key points on his notes (they're bolded which makes it easier to figure out) you'll be fine. Not very approachable but again if you actually try to understand what he's getting at in his notes you will do FINE.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: Dr. Skelton took forever to send the final mark to the registrar's office. Over 2 days past the due date to submit final grades which was annoying. If you are strong in Bio you will do well in his class. He is slightly arrogant but not a horrible teacher. He scares you into studying intently for his exams but hard work pays off.

Name: Ronald Skelton
Review: Skelton is great. His analogies are a bit annoying and not always the clearest, and his humour beyond dry, but he is straight forward in telling you key factors to study. If you go to class and actually listen, you will do well and learn lots. For BIO students anyways, I highly recommend Skelton.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: There is no textbook, no practice problems, and no clear directions to what will be on the midterm or final. Your only lifeline is the class slides... which are too horrendous to put into words.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: Unfortunately Dr. reimchen teaches all of the courses that interest me most at university. His teaching style is unbearable and his slides are literally unreadable. On top of that, his lectures are horrible and he ends every sentence with 'etc' even when it makes no sense.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: I absolutely hated this prof. His lectures are dull and his slides make me physically ill. You MUST attend lecture if you want to succeed because it's impossible to try a make sense of his slides having not attended lecture. Be prepared to memorize specific numbers for his midterm and exams and be familar with the main idea from the abstracts.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: Was not a huge fan of Reimchen. His lectures were at a lightspeed of a pace and horrendously set up with pictures over the text and full abstracts that you were required to know. His tests were not an accurate depiction of your knowedge as they had four correct answers but you had to pick the "best" of the right answers.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: imagine multiple choice questions consist of correct answers as choices but you have to choose that one answer that arouses the prof the most. That's the exam. no part marks for choosing less-arousing choices.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: He's probably the least helpful prof in UVIC. His exams sucks with 80% of the questions being unambiguous and misleading. Posts lecture slides hours after lectures, so you kinda have to enter the lecture blindfolded. I'd never take any course taught by him ever again.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: I'm a 4th year bio student in UVIC and by far, Reimchen is the WORST prof in the university. Disorganized, incoherent, arrogant, and apathetic to students who visits him in office hours. Try your best to avoid his classes.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: Imagine you are forced to enter the lecture without any material prepared for the class since he posts his notes hours after his lecture. On top of that, his lecture notes are just a collage of abstract screenshots so sometimes the screenshots are on top of each other and you can't read anything on it. And all the blocked abstracts are examinable.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: I'm not even kidding. The note this guy hands out is 80% abstracts of other scientific papers. You have to memorize EVERY DETAIL on these abstracts no matter how minor the detail is. Each exam questions are worth different point 1  3 mark and are VERY subjective. just try not to fail this class.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: So hard to pay attention to his lectures, can barely hear him and usually just reads off the slides. Only stayed in this class because its required for credit. Lab component is the only good thing about this class, however assignments arent required to turn in so it can be easy to slack off.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: I admire his passion for ecology and his love for his own research. However, his lectures get depressing and are very, and I cannot stress that enough, mandatory. His lecture slides look like abstract picasso paintings with graphs, numbers, and pictures scattered in every which way. The lab component is super awesome though!

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: He puts his research paper on his exams and lectures and expect students to memorize the details in it instead of putting actual materials. It looks like he's awarding himself a medal for doing what he does, but that's just how it is. Avoid him if you can, if you want your first ecology experience to be enjoyable.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: I was fine with ecology until I had him. He discourages students by making intentionally challenging questions on exams. Also, he has a weird habit of just throwing numerous scientific abstracts at students to expect them to memorize the little details that are clearly not that important. He has unusual pride in his research paper he published.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: his exams are the worst. they are very subjective and unclear. His lectures are below average. he doesnt explain well and doesnt know how to speak up or to use microphone. Avoid any of his class at all cost.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: I really didnt enjoy BIOL 215 with him.. his teaching style doesnt help us at all. I still dont understand how he expect us to be good when he doesnt allow us to pre-read his lecture notes because he releases them hours after his lecture

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: Honestly, I took this class as the description sounded really interesting however this class was anything but. Thomas tests are extremely hard for no good reason and his slides make no sense. Hes also pretty rude if you get the answer wrong when you try to answer it in class. Avoid if you can

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: He is an extremely intelligent professor and is very passionate about the subject. If you pay attention in class and take notes on what he focuses on is fairly simple to figure out what he deems as important. For his tests as long as you read the question carefully, ie when he says "main idea" rather then give me an example of" youll be fine

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: He never posts the slides before class which makes it very hard to take notes as his slides are very messy. He is a tough grader with tricky multiple choice questions based on his opinion. He puts people on the spot when asking questions in class and just overall was not a good professor for me.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: Reimchen is my fav prof at uvic. His lectures are amazing, I did not take notes in class, I just listened and I did well.

Name: Thomas Reimchen
Review: he needs to speak up and learn how to make exams.... He asks questions that are extremely vague and forces us to memorize details that are not really helpful with the material. I would absolutely hate to retake any of his classes.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: Took Chem in first year and failed by a percent. This class was very difficult to stay focused in and there was very little help provided by the prof. I think he is a nice guy but his lectures were very boring.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: Thank god hes retiring now because ive never had a more boring, monotone professor. Test are way to short so one question can screw you over and there is only two midterms. He uses wileyplus which ill never understand why. Seems like a nice guy maybe he was just done with teaching.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: Sandy Briggs seems like he is probably an OK guy, but let me tell you - this guy is some next level boring. He is VERY monotone, and is often hard to hear. To be fair, the material of chem 150 is super dry, but Briggs did not make it any better. Midterms and the final were alright; you can pretty much get an A from pure, brain-dead memorization.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: Briggs can get very monotone and hard to focus in class, so I didn't find any reason to go to class when i can get better explanation online or from the text. He seems like a genuinely caring guy, and has a bit of dry humour but not a great lecturer. Overall, wouldn't take his class if i could, get ready to study from youtube and the textbook.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: This prof clearly cares about his material, but fails to pass on that feeling to his students. The course is difficult and made even harder by Sandy's inability to explain the concepts clearly. You have to attend this class for iClicker participation, but don't kid yourself and learn through the textbook and MasteringChemistry or even a tutor.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: Avoid this professor if you can, I was unable to focus at all in his class because of his horrible monotone voice. Doesn't explain the material well at all, he basically just rewrites the textbook onto slides.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: The most boring prof I've ever had. His voice is low and quiet and just drags onnn, making it extremely easy to fall asleep in his lectures.  He uses iClicker points as attendance, so you have to go to lecture (even though he just reads off the slide and you can get all the same info from the textbook). Textbook will save you! Luckily an easy read.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: If you're a quick learner and pick up on chemisty fairly quick, pick Wan. However, if you are intimidated or if you struggle with chemistry, choose Briggs. Briggs, although incredibly monotone, keeps track of electrons on the board and is very thorough. I had Wan for Chemistry for Chem 231 and found he breezes through so much, Briggs will elaborate

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: Seems like a nice guy, just has a very monotone voice and talks, not teaches.. he is clearly very intelligent and knows his stuff, he just feels to old to be teaching a class of 300

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: He takes down valid class information beofre it had even been up for a wekend, leaving anyone who hasn't copied it down in time because they were busy behind the rest of the class.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: boring, not specific.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: Going into this class, I was scared because I had heard  bad things about Briggs. However, I was SO pleasantly surprised. Yes, he is monotone and can be hard to listen to, but he is extremely passionate about the material and really cares about you doing well. His tests are SUPER fair (make sure to study old finals!). Overall, great guy.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: If you sit at the front, sometimes you'll see that he's pretty cool. Tests are hard as expected for Chem.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: If you go to his office hours, he explains a lot more then. Lectures are sometimes boring but sometimes you can't get all the marks just by looking at the course booklet we had to buy. Lots of it comes from WileyPlus I guess.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: I liked his character, since he tried to crack some random and twisted jokes, or he  just made us laugh without even trying. Though his lectures always made me sleepy and was sometimes hard to focus.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: Goes at a good pace to make it easy to understand what is going on during class, but still quite boring. Has a joke about once a week.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: Briggs is an interesting guy - monotone and seemingly bored at times (although perhaps due to the fact that  his knowledge of org chem vastly exceeds anything taught in 232) yet incredibly receptive to in-class questions and office hour queries. sit near the front of the class so you don't miss his incredibly disparaging and sarcastic jokes!

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: His lectures are not interesting and it can be easy to fall asleep during class, but he explains tough ideas and concepts well and has very fair midterms and final exams

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: Briggs is pretty monotone when he teaches, which can make it hard to focus in class.  You probably won't like him at the start of the class, but he grows on you over the term.  Surprisingly funny guy at times, and when he is doing review classes and not just lecturing he is much more concise and teaches the material well.

Name: Sandy Briggs
Review: Dr. Briggs does little else than read directly off the prepared power point slides.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: This 1st yr introductory course was much harder than my 4th yr courses. It requires ALOT of reading, wastes your time doing assignments, and does not prepare you for the exam! She deducts heavily for the littlest things and is slow to return them. The assignment/open-book quizzes take too long to complete for how little marks they are worth.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: She made what could have been an interesting course boring. Marked my project late when it wasn't. Later said to another class (my friend was in it) that my project (don't want to say exactly what it was here) stood out as creative but, "I had to give it a 'B' as it was late". Ugh! Lost all respect for her after that. :( Also had for His of Psy :(

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: Laurain Mills is the worst teacher I have ever had. She's given me 0 direction throughout my course and has LOST most of my assignments too. I often have to re-send things and follow up with her to make sure she got them. I've had to "nag" her to mark my work. Test materials are not related to study material and she offers NO FEEDBACK when marking.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: Least favourite professor (I've previously finished a degree and am in my last year of a second, I've had many profs) that I've had. She is rude, condescending and does not give clear grading criteria. When you don't do well, she will simply tell you to "read the instructions". I'm generally an A student, she graded me consistently below that.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: Average Prof - at best, enjoyable course content though. Comments on papers shallow and lack constructive element to improve. Slow in responding.. very slow..

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: Lourain contradicts herself and the course material. She doesn't answer questions via email, and seems to except a lot out of assignments. Thats all fine, but she doesn't seem to have very high standards when it comes to professionalism. Would not recommend.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: this prof never seemed passionate about teaching, or helping students learn. Did not return e-mails, or answer questions, or provide feedback. I don't know if she designed all the assignments for this online course, but they were really time-consuming without being very fruitful. I found them quite boring. I will never take her course, ever again.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: I really liked the class, but that has more to do with pre existing interest in the material, not her teaching. Laurain was alright, but I wouldn't say a particularily good prof. Read the assigned chapters in the textbook and you will get a good grade. The medica project was kind of fun.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: Super boring, but the material is very interesting. Make sure you attend every class and pay attention and you'll be fine, since she doesn't put stuff online. She shows a lot of videos which is really nice and relaxing. I didn't bother buying the textbook and I did well.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: Quite monotone, but does wear a mic because she has a soft voice. Her ppts are basically stats that are pulled from the textbook. The course is very textbook heavy, however, she does provide learning objectives for each unit (exactly the stuff that is going to be on the tests). If you study the textbook you'll ace this class!

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: She is very quiet, and gets confused about what is real or not. She mixes up topics and tests them wrongly. If you only listen to what she says you can get a good mark, but most of it isn't factual.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: She is monotone and quiet but she wears a mic so everyone can hear her. She is nice and fair and covers material well in lectures. Her exams test strictly on material and there are no word games involved in her exams to try and trick you. It is based on pure knowledge of course material. Overall I think she is a good prof.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: She is really quiet and hard to understand but she is a fair marker and her tests are pretty easy

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: This was a really hard class. I've taken several classes with her. I don't know know if it's the material or not but many of the lectures lasted 25 min? She also missed a lot of class almost 2 weeks. I can't blame her for being sick though.  She seems nice?

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: Mills cancelled 4 classes thru term.  Exams are purely based on her point of view (GO IN TO CHECK YOUR MIDTERMS I GOT MORE MARKS FOR EVERY EXAM AFTER CHECKING OVER THEM).  ended up teaching an entire unit to myself due to her cancelling classes.  don't need the text, read her slides.  she is nice, but not engaged in teaching.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: It was an interesting class! you must go to class when it's a debate date because she will test you on that. Plus, it is easy way to get a better mark. She makes jokes sometimes and she is pretty funny. Prof.Mills is genuinely nice. Yes, she speaks very quietly, so sometimes she might put you into sleep...

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: LOVED her. I was first afraid of attending her class because of the bad ratings, but she was such a sweetheart. The deate was fun, and she was funny as well.Her voic is very quiet, so you might want to seat in front. Overall, enjoyed it a lot.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: I can understand others frustration with Dr. Mills. I found her to be a nice lady but there is certainly some room for improvement as a professor. I found the lectures to be... tense. After a few lectures you can sort of sense the unrest of many of the students. I found the in-class demos/labs to be very helpful in learning the content.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: Constantly contradicts herself, monotone, only uses studies that support her point of view. Doesn't promote critical thinking whatsoever, if someone brings up an opposing viewpoint she may reply "that could be true" and move on. Her classes are very easy but if you actually want to learn anything, don't take her.

Name: Laurain Mills
Review: Thought I would give Dr. Mills another shot after taking psych 210 two years ago which was dismal. She has proven to be even worse in teaching psych 245... She disregards factual scientific information and uses her own abstract and absurd opinions instead. It is hard to sit through her lecture without tearing your hair out. AVOID.

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Bruce is a real gem. He records all the lectures but most still show up because he is such a great storyteller. Definitely have to work hard to get a high grade. Workload is very start/stop based on studying for the midterms/final. Barely any work for weeks and then you spend forever preparing for the exams. His favourite phrase: CORRECT?

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Bruce is a nice guy, but his expectations/setup for an intro course are too high. Don't have to read the textbook to pass the weekly quizzes (skim/search), or to pass exams (just read up on the topic assigned in the question). Hardest exams I've ever studied for (2 weeks straight). Great lecturer, though content in 100A isn't very interesting.

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Bruce is a great lecturer and is incredibly organized. His material is easily accessible outside class. You are marked on two midterms and a final where questions are given in advance, but they are incredibly time-consuming to study for. Not my favourite method of assessment. I was burnt out, but if you put in the work, the effort is worth it.

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Ravelli is awesome! Hes hilarious, engaging, and his lectures are always interesting. Hes also super cool to talk to about social issues and recognizes his possible ignorances. His main goal is to help you see the shades of grey. The midterms were tough and stressful but every time I do them I get better at them. Looking forward to next term!

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Bruce is the best! He makes the material interesting because he evidently cares about what hes teaching. The midterms are not an easy A, but hes clear about what he expects and if you put the work in theyre very do-able.

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Loved attending Bruce's class. He will make you work for your grade but appreciates your effort. His lectures were interesting and his stories helped you remember important theories. Labs weren't as interesting as lectures but that had to do with the TA not bruce

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Great prof. Really gripping lectures- forces you apply concepts to modern, relevant issues. Really helps with understanding. Overall, best course of my first year ! would 100% recommend taking Soc100A with Bruce.

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: funny man

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: I really love this professors cause he speaks very slow when he explain the ideas and events, and he will give us reminder when the test or essay due. And his review of test is clear and easy to read than the other classes I take.

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Very immersive as a lecturer

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Although Bruce is a great public speaker and story teller, he is a very political and biased influencer who is stuck in his own beliefs and unwilling to listen to other points of view. I wish I could like him more but I have very little respect for him.

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Bruce is hands down my favorite prof at Uvic and i think everyone should take a class with him . He pushes you to think critically about the worlds in ways that you might never have before . He records all his lectures and puts them online but still has a very high attendance rate as his lectures are engaging and fun .

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Lectures are fantastic and engaging. Exams are very difficult. You really need to critically think for this course in order to well on exams. Expectations are very high, but understandably so as Bruce makes everything very clear and tells you almost exactly what will be on the exams. I really enjoyed this class, despite much stress over it.

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: I loved how he made us think about the social problems that we don't usually notice. However, his expectation on students is very high so that it is hard to get an A in exams, even though we know the questions ahead of each test. if you're a sociology student and want to join CO-OP, you should take SOCI100 next year for good grades.

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Amazing lecturer, but tests were brutal. Expectations were very high often leading to disappointing grades, must work to get a good mark. Attendance was not mandatory although most show up to experience the lectures.

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Love bruce but he has very high expectations for his students. His tough grades are well worth the interesting lectures though

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: lectures are amazing, only work you have to do is online tests through online textbook. really enjoyable and funny guy.

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Bruce is hands down the best lecturer I've had at UVic. He is organized, technologically affluent, and really makes you think. That said, he is very committed to his ideas and it can be hard to begin a even-levelled discussion with him. The class is marked on tests where the questions are given ahead of time but marked hard. Take a class with him

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: My favorite prof in my first year. Amazing lectures!!

Name: Bruce Ravelli
Review: Bruce is an absolute gem! He is so inspiring and when you leave his class you will legit think about his lecture all day! I would 10/10 highly recommend taking this class with Bruce!

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: Great Professor!

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: Explains the material clearly. He makes the class interesting.

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: What a great professor. Dr. Al Nasser knows his stuff. He have a nice personality and he is around the students age. Highly recommended!!

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: Professor Omar Al Nasser is the best professor I had He is funny, witty, and an expert in his area. He really tries to help only if you put in the effort. I think they should clone him and every professor should do what professor Al Nasser does.

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: Best professor at UHV. He made a huge impact on my career choices. Definitely one of those people that you remember for the rest of your life. I truly feely lucky to have taken a course with professor Al Nasser.

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: Dr. Al Nasser was one of my favorite professors I have ever had at UHV. He really cares about his students and will explain things until everyone understands completely. He teaches great, so if you put in your part, you should be fine.

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: Amazing professor and lectures. Prof. Al Nasser presents the material in a clear and interesting way, very inspiring. Great selection of books to read for the course. Students are encouraged to express their views and develop critical thinking. Professor Al Nasser has a great positive energy, was always available to answer questions. Fantastic!

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: Professor Al Nasser obviously put a lot of thought into his lectures. He was very helpful and willing to take time to explain things. He also mixed humor into his lectures. He's a funny and nice guy.

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: Great professor !

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: My favorite professor of all time. at UHV. Extremely knowledgeable and a great personality. Keep up the good job Dr. Al Nasser!!

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: Dr. Al Nasser is an intelligent professor. To describe a professor like him with common terms seems too little. He is a credit to teachers everywhere and an inspiration to me. You will learn a lot from this man and more fun in finance than you ever thought possible.

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: Very useful class and some of his teachings and models for capital investment I have applied in my current role to make capital decisions. Highly structured and organized for a Grad School professor which is perfect for working professionals

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: By far the best Prof. I have ever had at UHV. Wish he taught everything. He makes the book come to life through his practical experience. Such a great Prof.!

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: Good spirit. To be critical, I think that if you are geared toward Finance in your career you should avoid him. He doesn't teach the necessary subjects for you to take advanced Finance courses. Doesn't means he's easy, not easy at all. The tests are just overly theoretical. No much application or case studies. Nice guy but the class is not good.

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: Dr. Al Nasser was always available to help with any questions or problems. He is very interactive and helps you understand the answer to the problem - doesn't just do it for you. I took four courses under his direction and was able to get through them with a better understanding that I feel I can take to the workplace and use effectively.

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: The best professor at UHV. Higly recommended to all students

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: REALLY IMPRESS ON HIS WAY OF TEACHING. YOU WILL LEARN EVERYTHING WITH NO PROBLEM. HE IS STRAIGH TO THE POINT AND MAKES THE CLASS GO BY FAST. DO NOT QUESTION HIM (I AM PRETTY YOU DO NOT NEED TO) THAT REALLY UPSETS HIM. BE ON TIME AND BE READY TO LEARN THAT'S ALL YOU NEED TO GET AN A. GOOD GUY!

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: He is a great professor !!!

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: The nicest and sweetest professor I've ever had. Dr. Al Nasser is truly amazing and his online class is well organized. Just follow his weekly directions and you will do great. TAKE HIM!!!

Name: Omar Al Nasser
Review: By far the best professor I have ever had at UHV. Wish he taught everything. He makes the book come to life through his practical experience. Such a great professor!

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: You won't regret it

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: Andrew made a dull subject like English 135 enjoyable. I was genuinely excited to attend his classes. He gives good feedback and he wants you to succeed. Andrew is so kind, and he has a less challenging, but fair grading rubric in comparison with some other professors my friends have. He is by far my favourite professor!

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: This guy is a charm. Makes English bearable.

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: I love Andrew, took engl 146 and engl 200a. Knows students by name, extremely approachable, lovely man. Great classes, fantastic lectures, do not hesitate to ever take a class with him you won't regret it!

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: very very very very good. Highly recommend !

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: Andrew is one of the best professors I have had thus far. He keeps class interesting with humor and his choices of reading material are always great. His discussions are very informative, and he does not force students to participate, though he does encourage them to. He does go on tangents quite a bit, but they are always funny. LOVED THIS CLASS!

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: Great prof. I miss his class!

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: Andrew was an awesome prof he loves engaging with the class and isn't afraid to try new things by stepping outside the curriculum. Super caring about his students; he even edited our drafts of our first writing assignment and gave us thorough feedback. Then we could resubmit it with his edits for a good grade. Speak in discussions to make class fun

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: Dr. Murray is a refreshing prof. Highly recommend!! Not only does he make lectures hilarious and fun, but he is always available to help.

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: Great prof!

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: Great guy. Very funny and approachable. Really knows his stuff.

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: Andrew Murray is the best prof I have had so far at UVIC. English has always been my least favourite class, but since the first day of 101 it has been my favourite. Andrew teaches an a way that makes you laugh. He reached in a way in which you dont realize you are learning (its so enjoyable) until you are tested on it and you actually know it!

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: A very mean and tough grader

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: Great survey course, picked a diversity of readings and explained them all with in detail and with clarity. Themes of class were connected to readings, building a context and knowledge of the zeitgeist of the middle ages. Hilarious personality, from LA so used to show-buiz and this Professor delivered on that! Prepare to be entertained.

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: Andrew is an amazing prof. By far my favourite English prof I've had, and I have never liked English as a class but this class was truly enjoyable. He cares so much about his students, gives great feedback, and often stays awake all night just to have tests/papers marked and handed back within just a couple days. Lectures are fun and entertaining!

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: best prof eva

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: Often Andrew would get off topic in his lectures and become distracted, thus giving us less time to understand/focus on what we were doing. Yet, he was an incredibly fair/easy maker and did not expect much from assignments (especially his midterm and final). Make sure you attend class because a lot is based off his lecture.

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: Andrew is the best English prof I've had at UVIC. He lectures in a way that makes some pretty boring stuff quite enjoyable. 10/10 would recommend.

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: Great prof who genuinely cares about his students. Would seriously recommend.

Name: Andrew Murray
Review: He has a tendency to take short breaks from his lecture to tell a funny story, or breaks into a song. Not a single class goes by without the class laughing.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: A dependable and warm character. Clearly dedicated to her profession as a university teacher. Maturely handles class progression and classroom events. Inspired and helped me a lot in calculus II learning (side material is Paul's online notes). I doubt that I will meet many math teachers as good as her in the future.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: I'm currently taking Math 101 with Svetlana . She has a great personality and is more than enthusiastic when she teaches, but after taking the second midterm today, it's clear that what is taught in class and what is tested are not equivalent. Personally, I make a habit of going over the online homework until my hair turns white, but it doesn'help

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Probably one of the best math instructors I've had so far.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Sometimes hard to understand in class and not super engaging to listen to, though clearly passionate. Also she somehow managed to accidentally email the entire midterm to the class the night before then rewrite a significantly harder one to replace it.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Teaches things that seem so straight forward and easy in class, and then gives us midterms and finals that are much more difficult and don't really match what we do in lectures. Wouldnt want her as a prof ever again

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Probably the most engaging math lectures you're gonna get.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: I would never take a class with her again. She teaches stuff that we never needed to know and then skips stuff that we need to know for finals and midterms. As well, she sent out our second midterm the night before it was to happen and then gave us a much harder midterm the next day and basically blamed the students. She never owned up to anything.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Svetlana gives some of the best lectures on Math that I've ever had. Be careful though, she can go through some material fast, especially if nobody speaks up, so do!

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Very awesome, amazing, and engaging prof. Every lecture was entertaining, despite the difficulty of the course. She would always be available for extra help and support with any issues.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: absolute gem! i adore her

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Svetlana is an engaging and overall solid prof. She made calculus not terrible and her lecture notes were fantastic. Would 100% recommend.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Svetlanas notes are some of the best I've seen, straightforward and easy to follow. She does a great job of explaining concepts without overcomplicating them. There are a few projects in this class and their instructions are a little difficult to follow, so they can kind of chip at your grade. The midterms ranged from a breeze to.. not a breeze.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Accompanied by her amazing personality, Svetlana delivers well-explained and thorough lectures that made MATH100 the easiest course I've taken to date.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Took Calc in high school & this was by far the hardest class I've taken in first-year sciences. Switched my major to avoid 101 as she ruined math for me. Her tests are constructed to determine the A+ students; so study the hardest textbook questions you can. I respect her as a person, but her tests do not reflect the difficulty gone over in class.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Love her. Not a difficult course if you've taken calculus 12. I really enjoyed her lectures and low key look forward to going to her classes actually. She's also very kind and caring, the kind of teacher who actually cares and want you to do well, though in Svetlana's class, you need to absolutely do the work. Not an easy A but you'll learn a lot!!

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Svetlana is an amazing person and is greatly respected by her students. However, she may rush through certain important and/or difficult topics and spend days on topics that are easy to understand for those who have taken calculus before. Get ready to feel bad about yourself on midterm #2 or #3, there's always one that will get ya down.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: She teaches well in lecture; however, midterms are not like the practice given. Will make you feel bad about yourself if you didn't do well.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Honestly one of the best profs I've had, in any subject, ever. I hate math, yet this class was actually one of my favourites. Going from her 100 class to someone else's 101 class was such a shocker, and if I could have switched into her section, I would have.

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Im not sure why Prof oshkai has such good reviewed, I am a hard worker student with very good grades however this iss the worst class I have ever take, the Prof acts like she cares on your effrots but will screw you over on purpose. Honestly this class made my life a living hell and i would NEVER take this class or any class taught my Prof

Name: Svetlana Oshkai
Review: Svetlana is hands down the best math teacher/professor I've ever had! She's great at explaining the "why" behind concepts before delving into them, which is crucial for a subject like calc. You can ask her the dumbest questions in the world and she won't judge you. Funny, genuinely caring, well spoken professor. Can't recommend enough! :)

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: She's great. The lectures are super engaging. I was always exited when Thursday came because of the group discussions. The material covered is so relevant and important. There is a lot of readings to do and if you don't do them you will be in big trouble. The body image and the sexuality lectures were the best ever. She's super caring. I recommend!

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Dr. Sitara was the sweetest and most lovely prof that I've had. She has so much passion for what she teaches and it makes it easy to be passionate about the material as well. HIGHLY recommend.

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Dr. Sitara is a gem. She is kind and approachable and has a deep respect for her students. Dr. Sitara challenged me to think differently and in the process made me a better student and a better person. I would love to study with her again - can't recommend her enough!

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Dr. Sitara is an incredible professor and a wonderful person. Georgias teaching is passionate, thought-provoking, respectful and brilliant. I always felt welcomed and supported in Georgias classes. How Georgia teaches, and the content Georgia teaches is of crucial importance. I wish everyone would take one of Dr. Sitaras classes. Love not fear!

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Georgia confuses me. I really want to like her as she is caring and refreshing from the regular "cookie cutter" ideas of university. She pushes you to think outside of your norms. However, she is quite disorganized which I found made it hard to do well. I also don't understand her marking criteria. Some papers received A's but they were not good

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Every class I have taken with Georgia has been life changing, and I'm not exaggerating. The quality of the material and the care and depth with which she presents it is unparalleled. Her attention to details you hadn't even considered is marvelous. She is approachable and incredibly supportive, a light in the dark. Highly recommend!

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Dr. Sitara is a an amazing person but as a prof has unreasonable expectations of students ability to read 100-200 pages a week. I learned so so much from her but assigning 7-10 articles a week is unrealistic and unfair, and creates such anxiety that many didnt do any readings. Good projects, crazy work on the midterm.

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Knowledgeable, inspiring, and engaging! In return for the hard work necessary to do well in her classes, Dr Sitara gives so much care and attention to the ideas of every student. She is an incredibly warm and empathetic person, but always prepared to challenge + push students further. Best prof at UVic, would recommend her with my whole heart!

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Dr. Sitara is an incredible educator and person. Dr. Sitara genuinely cares about her students and works hard to create discussion and invite students feedback! Also, she's just straight up funny, respectful and lovely human being. I highly encourage taking a class with her if you're interested in gender studies or history!

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Georgia is an amazing Professor and an amazing person outside of her profession as well. The academic and personal life lessons I've learned from Georgia are cornerstones in my life. I took Social Justice Studies, Women Studies, and History courses with her Georgia and she delivered excellent instructions, teaching methods, and critical feedback.

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Georgia is a lovely prof: passionate, caring, and kind to a fault. She learned all of our names and clearly genuinely loved teaching us. Although I had a few qualms about her heavy reliance on videos and films in our History class, her lectures were always well prepared and enthusiastically given. I would certainly take more courses with her.

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Georgia was a real gem teaching this class. She is one of the most empathetic and caring professors I know. You can tell she is really passionate about what she teaches and you can tell she just wants her students to have the same level of enthusiasm. She is very helpful and very fair with her midterms and grades. Def would recommend this class.

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Great Prof! Probably the sweetest professors I have gotten a chance to have, she really tries to make every aspect of the course as interesting as possible. Everything has a floating deadline so there's never much stress in the class. There is also movies that she plays which is nice on a long day.

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: This course was lovely. Sitara is such an inspiration and makes me feel like there is good in the world. I am thankful to have been Sitara's student. The readings were enlightening and the in class discussions brought a new perspective. Sometimes Sitara would push people's ideas aside if they weren't agreeing with the readings which was unfortunate

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Her lectures are very engaging and she really cares for her students. Very knowledgable and inspirational, one of my favourite profs by far! If you put in the work its easy to get a good mark. Would 10/10 recommend.

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Dr. Sitara is a brilliant, respectful and caring professor. The readings and lectures are fascinating and she gives thorough feedback on assignments. It has been a privilege to study under her.

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: Dr. Sitara is an inspiring and compassionate professor. She truly and sincerely cares about her students. Everybody has a chance to speak in her class freely without fear. She opens her heart to students of various backgrounds. She respects everyone's right of speech and provides students with a dynamic and democratic environment of learning.

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: If you think the same way she does then she is a good supportive prof, but if you have differing opinions she is very quick to judge you on that alone. The environment she says she aims for is that of an open discussion, but in reality it is an echo chamber of the same ideas which can be frustrating.

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: She is so good. So knowledgeable, so kind and so smart. Lots of reading, but super interesting. 10/10

Name: Georgia Sitara
Review: I love Dr. Sitara. She is consistently amazing, compassionate & brilliant. This is one of the best classes I have taken. Lots of reading, but she has compiled great materials! Take this class and expand your mind!

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: You can do optional assignments, if you do 4 or more you are more likely to get an A

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: Wonderful prof. Funny lectures, writes a free textbook, and gives 9 optional assignments you can do to lessen the weight of your tests. Tests are either all MC or MC/written, and are definitely difficult, but if you read his textbooks and come to class, you'll do just fine. He's easy and convenient to reach outside class too! Definitely recommend.

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: I really don't understand the hate for this guy. Hilarious prof, free textbook, optional assignments to lessen the weight of the tests? Sign me up. Easiest marker for the optional article summaries and digital poster. Even if you do not do well on his tests which most people don't because his MC section is trash, optional assignments can help alot.

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: There is so many ways to do well in his courses if you just do the optional assignments and apply yourself with the readings. He writes his own text book for a couple classes which you get FREE. He is very passionate and a very interesting lecturer. One of my fav psychology profs at Uvic !

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: I dont understand the hate on this guy at all! Favourite prof ive ever had. I hate school and have ADHD and he's the only prof that I can listen to for an hour without zoning out- maybe that's why I do better in his classes than with any other prof. Sure his tests are hard, but that doesn't make him a bad teacher. Hes great 10/10

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: Incredible guy, really passionate about the stuff he is teaching. Get ready to pay close attention to class details, they WILL end up on the exam. Has his own pdf textbook because he cares about broke students. very up front so don't expect all this formality with communication. Exams are HARD so do the alternative assignments

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: So kind and accepting. Happy to discuss questions and concerns, before, during or after class. Test are very fair as long as you are a little bit prepared!

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: Super enjoyable lectures (he brings his dog!!!1!); tests are hard, memorize every little detail for the multiple choice and prepare extremely detailed written responses (define everything, provide examples) and you should be fine. Easy marks for iclicker if you ctrl f the key words :^)

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: Have taken a couple classes with Jim and they honestly keep getting better and better. Although people say he's scatterbrained I truly think that if you do your readings and actually pay attention in class you'll understand that he stays more on track then people give him credit for. Do the extra assignments and you'll be sure to pass with an A

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: Jim takes a lot of slack for not being prepared and having tough exams, but if you make his long answer portions of the exam as simple as you can, and can put definitions to use in real-life application you will do well. He gives you his phone number to call him outside of class (he picks up), and has plenty of extra credit assignments available.

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: He can be nice and he's funny because he's clumsy and goofy, but he also has a real mean side. I've talked to a few others who have seen it and we all agree it's not something we want to see again. Very scary when someone does a flip flop like that and denies it later. Maybe he isn't even aware of that side of himself most of the time. Unprepared.

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: He has extremely poor social skills and doesn't prepare for lectures. It's just a fly by the seat of your pants kind of class discussion. You don't really learn much that you didn't already know. To me he's not entertaining or engaging, just kind of scatterbrained and ditzy.

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: Exams are tougher than usual for the psychology department, but u can end up with a really good grade if u do some optional assignments & SONA. His lectures are really entertaining and engaging but he sacrifices any semblance of structure for this, making it kind of difficult to organize knowledge and see relationships between concepts.

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: I love jim! Hes funny, inspirational, and what you learn is very applicable. Some say the MC part of the tests are too hard because it's best answer welcome to uni! You can get a decent grade if you do optional assignments and formulate concise and pithy essay questions on his tests (weighted equally to MC)

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: I have such a weird love-hate relationship with Gibson. It is impossible to do well on his exams without studying HARD (he said so himself). He is also very scatterbrained so it's hard to take notes. Adored the lectures and class discussions, he is hilarious. Exams were painful but satisfying if you have time to over-study.

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: My favourite professor of all time, hands down. I love listening to him talk!!! He is extremely charismatic, funny, and caring. His tests are notoriously difficult, i suggest doing the readings and showing up to class. He offers optional assignments to lift your grade. I'm in his 333 class now and doing much better now that i know what to expect!

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: Jim is a decent lecturer but only if you have a previous knowledge base on the subject. Read ahead of time and it will help you tremendously. His tests are very tricky: all MC but all options are potentially correct. It's about selecting the BEST answer which is difficult if you don't think the same way as him. If you apply yourself, you'll do fine

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: Jim's lectures are fine if you do the readings ahead of time - he's actually hilarious and his dysfunction keeps everyone engaged (not to mention his dog that everyone loves to cuddle). Just took this class as a prereq and it was fine, nothing amazing, but fine. Still an easy A. Do some extra credit assignments and you'll have an A+

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: As stated by others, disorganized lectures that don't reflect the readings what so ever. Subjective multiple choice exams, will not award you your full SONA credits unless you complete other extra credit assignments. Makes the content much harder than it needs to be, highly suggest taking this class with another professor if possible.

Name: Jim Gibson
Review: His lectures are very disorganized and all over the place. He is slightly unclear about many definitions and concepts in relation to the textbook, which can be confusing. His tests are short and can be very hard if you don't attend class. He's a nice guy, but not a fan of his teaching style whatsoever.

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: One of the best profs in UVIC. Always responds to emails and is accessible for extra help. Well prepared and gives exam prep class before final. If you have a choice of profs take her class. You cant go wrong if you attend and do the assignments.

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: Best teacher ever. Classes are tricky but she helps you all the way. She is always available to meet and go over things, especially ways you can get more marks. She does not want anyone to fail and the tests are exactly the same as the practice tests. She even goes through them in the week before to make sure you know it all.

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: nice teacher ever

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: Betty is a great prof and clearly in her lectures. She is fair in her marking and gives you opportunity to improve your marks. Her objective is to pass you, not fail you, so you have time to learn if you give put in the time. She responds to emails and appointments.

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: she is a good prof. you need to do the work and you will pass. She is fair. She knows her stuff and is available to help

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: she is really good! i love her!

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: SO GOOD. THE BEST TEACHER IN THE WORLD!!!!!!!!

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: Betty is lovely; she is such a sweetheart. Very few profs have a heart of gold but she does. 245/246 are some of the better econ classes because of it.

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: She was always available by email to answer any questions about the assignments. She truly cares about her students succeeding, the second midterm proved to be much harder than the first and she immediately scaled and asked for student feedback on how she could make the questions more clear for the final.

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: Betty is a nice professor for ECON 245. It is critical to come to class every day and fill in the blanks in her pdf slides, and attend all the labs as well. The labs are easy to get credits. She only has one midterm, but don't worry if u screw up on the midterm, if your final is higher, she will give u the ideal grades.

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: Betty is amazing. She is so caring and sweet. Go to her office hour, ask anything anywhere. Attendance is mandatory, and lecture slides are long long long and in PDF. Do the practice tests and you will do great. An intersting elective for those who take Math151 and Stat252

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: Betty's lectures are awful and her slides are totally useless, there's no other way to say it. Attendance is mandatory and she uses iclicker type questions. She's a caring and hilarious person though and can be helpful in office hours, plus her midterms are fairly easy. She's unavoidable for 245/246, but DON'T take 203 with her if you can avoid it.

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: Betty is amazing! She is super funny and caring. However, her lectures are a bit boring and slides seemed useless. If you want to do well, just try out practice midterm she posts and you should be fine (even though she makes a lot of mistakes in her solutions). Overall, easiest econ class I've taken. However, her exams are long and exhausting.

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: I dont know why some people have negative comments about her, but she is definitely an amazing prof. She is a free style professor, but shes funny and helpful, extremely easy-going. Exams are also straightforward and fair. If you take Econ courses, you should definitely take with her !!!

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: Betty is actually the closest thing to your mom lecturing you, you'll find being in University. Make sure you just attend the labs and follow exactly what the lab TA is doing, study exactly the practice final/midterm she puts out, and you'll get an easy A. Betty wants everyone to get highest grade possibly, fresh change for everyone.

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: She is the nicest prof in econ. really she has a huge heart and care about her student she desire so much better on rating. super beloving prof in uvic. a lot of calculation for exam but she is super good at teaching the material. and really she cares about student. would definitively take any class she teachs

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: Teaching: 2/5 Slides online: 1/5 Kindness: 4/5 Midterm Fairness: 1/5 The first midterm was on less than half the assigned content Overall: 2/5

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: Incompetent slides maker. Riddled with errors, and has blanks in them, that makes studying slightly harder, and a lot more annoying. In class the slides don't show what the blanks are, so whether you go to class or not the slides are terrible. She also goes way too fast, and sometimes all over the place

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: Betty's lectures are fill in the blank notes so it's really hard to learn actively. She also frequently gets distracted and will talk for up to 30mins about unrelated material. Avoid if you can, but beware the beast guards required courses.

Name: Betty Johnson
Review: This was so boring and easy. Betty's lectures are fill in the blank notes so it's really hard to learn actively. She also frequently gets distracted and will talk for up to 30mins about unrelated material. Avoid if you can, but beware the beast guards required courses.

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: He does not have the most engaging lectures but the overall structure of the course is great.

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: Zastre is a great professor. He is hard, so if you want your easy A tough luck. If (you want to learn lots)  Take Zastre;

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: I took CSC 230 and SENG 265 in the same semester with Zastre. It's undeniable that he has very time-consuming, difficult assignments. However, if you put in the effort the tests will be easy for you. The tests themselves are very fair in terms of difficulty and they're graded fairly as well. Zastre is a good lecturer. Would take again.

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: Awkward guy but he's a good prof. My first time learning computer science. Lectures are boring. The labs are good but I wish there was less automated marking. I found the tests and assignments to be easy, studied night before and completed assignments in less than a few hours (two weeks to complete). First time course is in Python, but it went well

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: Mike is a good lecturer but his slides should be sufficient for the class. Mike only marked one of six assignments when I had him and he gave great feedback on what you could do better even.

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: Just want to say, he likes to imply things by giving sort of examples but I don't usually make sense of those as he paces through slides. Hope you do!

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: Have done two courses with him until now(in second year right now). Easy to get through if you follow what he says exactly and pay attention in class,

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: I'll admit I skipped far more classes than I should have, but one thing I need to mention is how well put together his lecture slides are. I was able to catch up on the material very easily just by reading his in-depth lecture slides, posted online. The labs were terrible but that wasn't his fault. Homework assignments were tough but very fair.

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: I like this prof. I take SENG265 and CSC230 with Zastre, and the overall experiences are great. Although his assignments are pretty hard, you will learn a lot. The tests are not hard and very fair. One tip: start his assignments right after the assignments are posted, then you will have enough time to seek help from classmates or Zastre.

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: Mike Zastre is a tough no-nonsense prof who excels at explaining how code works visually at a low level. His lectures are well-paced and clear, his assignments are well-thought out and his exams are fair. I didn't feel like the class was particularly hard, just that it was well taught and covered all the material in good depth. Recommend!

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: The multiple choice on the tests are rough but manageable. Zastre is a great prof from a learning perspective; after this course I feel like I have a solid foundation in C and Python. Assignments are no joke, but start early and they're doable and are where I did most of my learning. Go to lectures, write his past exams, and you'll be fine.

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: It takes 2 days just to understand what the assignments are asking, his multiple choice questions are nothing short of vicious, and his notes require a great deal of deciphering outside of class. You'll do twice as much work, but you'll grow as a person, and never learn more. If you're serious about your future, choose Mike Zastre

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: The professor is on a crusade to root out cheaters. Likely someone in his past life got ahead of him in school by taking shortcuts. Mike invests much of his time to make assignments confusing so it would be difficult to find online resources. Other professors resent him since he does not share solutions with future course professors.

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: lectures are boring, tests are fair

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: Zastre is a really smart guy and knows what he is talking about. Assignments are fair and require a bit of extra work to receive 100%. Midterms are fair as long as you study. Textbook questions and his past final exams are a good way to study, as he takes questions directly from those.

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: Great Professor. He is funny, friendly and very helpful at office hours. He put so much effort writing feedback for each student's final paper (5000 words). Midterms were not bad as long as long as you understand the concepts.

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: Do you like writing code or seeing how to implement new concepts?! If so, don't take Zastre. He's what most would call a "diZastre". For those who are new to coding and learn best by seeing profs write code I highly recommend taking someone else as you will sit through boring lectures listening to him read off of a powerpoint.

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: hard homework but easy test

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: His lectures are pretty decent

Name: Mike Zastre
Review: Lectures were almost word for word taken from the textbook, so I ended up not going to any and just studying from the book. Assignments are difficult but not impossible, however don't expect more than an 8/10 unless you are a chapter ahead of schedule. Midterms and final had a mix of easy and difficult questions.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: Despite my initial excitement on the topic, he managed to ruin it all. Condescending to students, out of touch with local/present issues. No keys are used for marking, therefore he marks well his preferred style, not focusing on the content. My first experience with a Prof. who managed to make me hate going to class. Opposite of the others I had.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: A lot of people on here have given really negative feedback on this class. Bottom line, yes, it is probably one of the hardest geography classes, and you cannot walk out with an 'A' solely by doing the work he says you should do. You need to go beyond this, after all, an 'A' requires that you exceed expectations, right? Phil is great, and funny.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: GEOG 101A is such a great course. The lectures are always amazing and Dearden has a lot of experience in the field to share. The labs were great too and the TA was energetic and a fair marker. Mandatory for geography students but definitely a great class to take otherwise! Labs have quite a few assignments so be prepared for this.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: A brilliant and kind man and very passionate lecturer!! At times the lectures can feel long but that's expected with 80 minute lectures. The lab is decent, depends on the TA. Kinga is amazing! Midterm was hard but not impossible, especially if you study. At first it seems like the lab will be a lot of work, but it's set up so you'll do well.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: A class on the environment that everyone should take. I definitely enjoyed the lab component more, but lectures were interesting. Dearden is charismatic, has neat field stories, facilitates great discussions, and is occasionally condescending. Taking notes is important, although they won't be neat because his lectures are not organized for it.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: He is the best prof I have had so far at UVic. I hope he doesn't retire soon because I want to take some more of his classes. They are a joy and an inspiration to me. Each lecture were like a mini-conference. Dearden certainly is a great prof no matter what other people say. We also do a lot of fun labs (except for the natural areas project). Enjoy

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: Dearden is inspiring, but I found his teaching inconsistent. Many lectures were truly amazing, while others were confusing and dry. If you want to do well, read his textbook (the chapter summaries help, and use the link for extra practice Q's). He reuses questions from previous years on finals, so study old exams from Zap. The lab is fun but heavy.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: bad

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: Phil Dearden is an inspiration - I would take his class just to broaden my knowledge of the world. Lectures are engaging from start to finish as he tells stories and shows pictures from his life experiences. The exams were straightforward as long as you paid attention in class and studied the stuff he hinted at as being important.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: Easy lecture material, but tests sometimes included large sections on what felt like small, insignificant details during the lectures. Lectures were interesting, but slides consisted almost solely of pictures from his field work and little information. Facilitates lots of discussions in the lectures.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: If you take this class it will change how you view the environment and the world. Dr. Dearden is extremely passionate and engaging. You will need to take detailed notes and read basically a whole textbook but it is possible to do well if you put in the work - I got 53% on the first midterm but my final grade was a B+.

Name: Philip Dearden
