Review: Lectures are unbelievably engaging, as he is often speaking for his own experiences. 1hour 20min lectures are to long though, because you need to be able to pay attention every second. The class will give you a whole new outlook on life. The labs are SUPER easy, lots of group work, and worth a lot of the course! MUST read text book and go to class.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: The content he teaches is great and as a prof he inspires thought, however the Exam portion of the class is borderline impossible with many students completely BOMBING the middterm and many more with the final. The labs are great but dependant on the TA (Kinga FTW).

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: Lectures were engaging and lowkey life changing. He provides anecdotes that are interesting but also relevant to the course material. Phil is actually the coolest guy I know and has done so many things. He also really knows his stuff, he literally wrote the textbook. If u have any interest in the environment take this course!!

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: The grading is very very very inconsistent. Things my friends got marked right on assignments I would get marked wrong etc. Grill your TAs for the marks and make sure to look over your midterm carefully. Okay class overall. Dearden is very knowledgeble but the labs are tideous and a waste of time. Buy old exams and study terms from his website.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS! He claims that some students were able to achieve an A, I don't see how that was possible. His tests set you up to fail, literally. Unless you have a photographic memory it is very difficult to retain all the information you are tested on, it is not about broad concepts but rather fine details. He is a good guy, bad prof.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: Honestly, the course wasn't too hard. If you showed up to lectures and took decent notes, you probably did pretty well. There were a few questions on his tests that were really specific and not completely fair, but buy old finals and you'll be fine. If you're in GEOG you have to take this course, but otherwise it's an ok elective. The labs were fun

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: Really interesting guy and course material but he told the class that the midterm and exam would be on the lectures and they are almost all from the textbook. But again he had really inspiring stories if you're into getting out into the field and helping the environment.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: The worst course I've ever taken for sure.  I felt like everything (assignments to exams) was intentionally designed to punish students. Hard work will never be rewarded for this course. It is too bad because originally I had so much interest in the topic of the course, but in the end I simply felt defeated and lost interest completely.

Name: Philip Dearden
Review: I enjoyed having Dearden as a prof. That being said, he is definitely not for everyone. His lectures can be hard to follow, so be sure to take very good notes, and the labs are a lot of work for a first year course. On the positive side, the midterm and final aren't hard, as long as you study for them! I'd recommend buying old exams to study with.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Dr. Hutchinson is one of the best professors I've ever had, her lectures were fascinating and it was clear that she cared deeply about the material. Attendance was wildly low (<20% of people showed up) so every lecture turned into a great conversation between the prof and the few students who cared. If you go to class and pay attention, easy A+.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Emma is a great prof that is funny and gives relatable examples. Her lecture slides are hard to follow but her textbook is amazing and teaches you everything you have to know for the exam. She made a really boring subject not that bad

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: I had Emma for 103 and, like everybody, thought she was a bit of a joke. I could not have been more wrong, she absolutely loves this subject and it shows in her lectures, which are fantastic. Graded by three midterms, all of them very similar to her practice tests. Everyone should take this course, it was the highlight of my semester.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Everything is based on 2 midterms and a final, there is hardly any showing of understanding as its all wordy multiple choice. I couldnt enjoy Emmas lectures since she went off topic A LOT. I studied religiously for the exams and still did poorly. Considering its a mandatory class for business they should have a better instructor.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Emma is super entertaining in lectures, but can sometimes make simple topics seem complicated by over-explaining them. But if you read the textbook it clears things up and is super easy to follow. Also, do the extra practice questions she posts before the midterms and final, if you're confident about them you're guaranteed a good grade.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Emma is not the best lecturer as she tends to overcomplicate things confusing her students. However, her online textbook is super helpful and clear with the concepts. If you do the questions in it as well as the practice midterms and exams beforehand it is actually quite easy. Lots of resources outside of class as well which is also really nice.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: I can maybe see why people don't like Emma, but i think she's really great. She's funny (sometimes her jokes don't land but she tries), very helpful, and she wrote a textbook so you dont have to buy one!! By biggest tip: go to all your lectures and labs because Clicker Questions are free marks!

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: She explains the concepts very detailed, too detailed that most of the time she confuses me. I found it hard to understand her in class, but I can make sense of it when I learn on my own. She makes everything too complicated and that is totally unnecessary. Took this class in Grade 12, my teacher was way more well-explained than her.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Emma is great

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: A pretty good prof. Her textbook for the course is very helpful and contains many practise questions taken directly from past exams. Was failing the class the whole term until the final exam (worth 60%). Going to class is pretty much useless because you need to learn everything on your own.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Emma is always willing to help and explain concepts. Sometimes she overcomplicates material in lecture. The textbook is extremely helpful!

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Emma is a really great prof as she understands that a lot of the first years have no idea what university is like and ables them to do well. She makes the exams fair and the extra help hours that she sets up are great. My favorite prof so far and I really do not understand why people think her course is hard, she could make it harder if she wanted.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: A pretty good prof. The material can be quite dry so it's sometimes hard to pay attention in lecture. If you keep up with the material and read the textbook you will find it easy to follow along.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Emma cares a lot about her students and does a good job at helping students get the best grades they can. She is funny, passionate and relatable. She does talk about beer too much and takes forever to get scantrons back. But overall, she made the material interesting and provided enough resources to help anyone willing to put in the work do well.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Everyone finds this class very different. I got an A+ in the course but I worked very hard for it. If you read the textbook and do all the practice questions you will be fine. 20% of your mark is iclickers so use that to your advantage. Emma is not a bad prof but her textbook that she wrote is very helpful. There are mistakes on tests usually.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Class material is alright and at times interesting. The only problem is that Emma only talks about how rich she is and how much she dislikes president Trump. Lectures are useless unless you want extra marks from the iclickers which get tricky at times.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Emma is the most disorganized teacher I have ever had... on everything she wrote that she gave to us including both midterms, our final, her textbook, and every practice exam, she made multiple mistakes. She also spends most of her class off topic and rambling about trump. Uvic should look into getting a different micro teacher.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: shes cool- but not a cool prof.. like shes funny but can't explain her thoughts.. so no

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Emma is a flustered disaster of a prof. Unfortunately ECON103 is a required course for the BCOM program. If you don't have to take this course, don't.

Name: Emma Hutchinson
Review: Emma's class was great. I switched my major to economics because of her. You have to attend the labs (the have iclicker questions that are worth marks). She is very relatable and makes an effort to make a dry subject fun and engaging. Would definitely take again!

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: This professor is unforgiving, and her lectures don't match up with the online quizzes at all. Beware for the most time consuming course on your timetable, you'll be teaching yourself the course through MML study plan. If you bomb a quiz, too bad! No extra credit or redos for you! I feel like she doesn't understand different learning capabilities

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Jill Simmons is a great instructor. She helps sure you understand the course material and performs effective lectures consistently. Online quizzes are due every two weeks, and tests are of the right difficulty. Suggestion for this course would be to integrate the online questions into her lectures to learn from them, and add group tutorials.

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Jill is a great professor. I loved her lectures and how she delivers mathematics. She focuses on key points and is very good at explaining concepts. Yeah, she's that good. 100% recommend her class. I will take her class again for MATH 151 anyway. Just go to all the lectures and do all homework. You can easily get an A if you put in the effort.

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Very unclear on expectations until after it is is expected (textbook readings). Treats students as if we are dumb, because it is a upgrading class. 3 midterms and exam worth a lot. Weekly assignments that are never talked about and dont actually help in midterms.

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Jill was a great prof. Math is a very difficult course for many people, including me, but she does a great job explaining the work. Very positive person and always open to questions. I would hate to take math again, but if I had to, I would take it with her.

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: I love her! She is so nice, explains things clearly, writes on the board clearly. I have never had such organized notes in any class. Also, first experience legitimately enjoying a math class. She really encourages the use of the forum on coursepaces and participates herself. Also she uses an online, open source (aka free!) textbook. She gets it :D

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Jill is honestly awesome. She is really good at explaining key concepts, and is super nice. She is available pretty easily if you have questions. Overall, a great teacher!

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Jill is a really good math prof. She gives clear lectures and her exams are straight forward. If you study and do your homework, there's no reason why you shouldn't get a good grade!

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Jill was excellent at explaining in full detail every question that you may come across in the homework or on tests. Her examples were extremely useful and straight forward. Any questions I had she was able to answer right away and explain them in a way that made complete sense.

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Jill is clear, intelligent and an amazing prof. She could make the dullest material seem interesting and the hardest material easier. She explains things clearly with a step by step process and makes it easy for us to ask questions. Her handbook is more useful than the textbook, would 100% recommend getting instead.

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: One thing I wish Jill did more often is going over more tricky questions to help us feel more confident about the material. However, she is an intelligent, funny, and understanding prof who explains concepts very clearly. The online textbook was a pain to use. The course was not easy; I 100% recommend going to Math and Statistics Help.

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Jill is wonderful! Math is my worst subject, but she made things easy to understand and lectures were interesting. She explains things in the best way, is really kind and helpful, and her midterms/exams are fair in terms of testing only what you've actually learned in class! I am taking Math again with her next term and she makes it bearable :)

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Jill's lectures were engaging, informative, and even humorous at times. Her personality added flavour to a class I wasn't particularly interested in but required. Her midterms were very fair. Midterms are much easier than the question in the course workbook, so do them and you will excel. She made a boring class fun. Go Jill!

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Dr. Simmons is really judicious about what she covers during lecture and explains concepts very clearly. Her notes and examples provide a really strong foundation to do well in the course. Homework and quizzes are really well structured to keep you on track. I can't recommend Dr. Simmons enough, she's a treasure!

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: She is very knowledgeable and structures her lectures professionally. Very good overall

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Great prof - explains decently well. Use MyMathLab to learn through the study guide esp for the harder chapters. It'll help a lot. midterm 1 was harder than the second and the final was fair. Fair grading as well. would recommend Jill to anyone. Get the handbook.

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: The first mid term is very tough, the second not so much. MyMathLab can really bring up your average, so don't neglect it. Lecture's are worth attending for the examples if you don't read the textbook, but purchase the practice question book, and do the two example exams for practice before the final.

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Jill's lectures were very organized which made it easy to learn the material. Math isn't my best subject but the simplicity of her lessons made it easy to grasp the main concepts. She genuinely cares about everyone, even though she may not be able to help all 250 students. Great prof, I highly recommend.

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: Jill is amazing she is your mom as a prof. GO to class her notes are very clear if you copy them word for word (easy to do) and lots of the homework and exam question are directly out of her examples. Test were fair and very easy if you paid attention and understand material, watch the little marks though, the homework can make or break your mark.

Name: Jill Simmons
Review: I loved Jill for 151. For a first year course, she taught in a way that helped people understand. She took time to do examples in lecture, and she always used every minute of it. The tests were marked fairly and included all of the material she had covered. Would recommend her.

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: a blessing in disguise. if you do his homework, youre set. pretty hard exams and tests, but luckily for the midterm, we could choose between actually doing the test or handing in (it was actually soft) homework (and those who handed hw got 100% on the mt).. very friendy, and has great off. hours! "master and the slave" "PLEASE GIVE ME MY HOMEWORK!"

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: Great prof. Explains very well. Doing homework and lots of practice is a must in the class. He's accessible outside of class and cares alot about his students. He is caring and always helpful. Lectures are extremely important in this class he gives you hints and techniques which help

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: Absolutely amazing! As long as you do the homework and ask questions, this course becomes very manageable. Also, his YouTube videos are a godsend.

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: One of the best professors you will ever get at this university. Genuinely cares for his students and wants them to succeed. The course content can sometimes be difficult to grasp but he makes sure to help you every step in the way. Also, DO NOT SKIP THE HOMEWORK HE GIVES YOU. It'll help you a ton for the midterm and the exam.

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: His lectures really help get the point across with stories and humor. Don't skip class or you will be lost in future lectures. The prof himself is not difficult or inaccessible however the course material itself needs loads of practice. Doing the optional homework and extra practice is highly recommended (class averages are usually really low).

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: He is an amazing prof and really works to help you succeed if you're willing to put in the effort. Do the homework he assigns!!!! He'll bump your grade if you hand it in consistently. I was able to pull an A+ because of his lectures and online videos.

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: the prof enplane every point well and the homework that he give is really helpful even tho its not graded but my suggestion is to attend the class and do the homework dose really help me

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: Dr. Kaamran is the best professor, he is caring and very thorough in his explanations. This was definitely not an easy course. There are homework assignments given that are not graded for practice. If you want to succeed I highly recommend you do all the assignments and practice as much as you can. Trust me in this class practice makes perfect!!!

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: Arguably one of the best professors in engineering. He's very caring of his students and teaches with enthusiasm. He's willing to go to great lengths in order to have his students learn. This professor offers multiple resources that help students to learn. There's little chance for a student to fail this course if a student puts in effort.

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: One of the best professors you'll ever have at Ryerson. Genuinely cares about his students and tries to help them get a high mark. Although the material may seem difficult, he manages to explain it well enough to make it simple. Easy A+ if you show up to all the classes.

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: Best prof you will ever have, guaranteed.

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: Great proffesor super nice and caring and has great videos that you can watch on ele 202 as extra help and review. Very inspirational and knowledgable.

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: Easily one of, if not the best prof at Ryerson. If you go to class, watch his YouTube videos and practice old tests you'll do well. He also does a great job of recognizing and rewarding hard working students.

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: Very convoluted teaching style wasn't very conducive for me,  but open to any and all questions, and willing to put in work to make sure you succeed. Take advantage of office hours if needed. Amazing man

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: Amazing prof!

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: Amazing prof. The material is pretty hard but if you go to class you can learn most of the stuff with a bit of practice. He is very approachable and he teaches every concept clearly. He posted most of his lectures and lab material on youtube as well.

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: He is one of the most amazing teachers at Ryerson

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: If not the best professor, one of the best ones. This course is not an easy one, but not hard either. I managed to get an A+, and my suggestion to anyone who takes this course is: 1. Do not skip even one minute of his lectures. 2. Watch his YouTube videos and solve the examples yourself. 3.  For midterm and final, make your own exam and solve it.

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: Genuinely cares about his students.

Name: Kaamran Raahemifar
Review: Amazing prof. Really cares about his students and teaches in a way that everyone understands.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: kam is up there with the good econ ones like, pupato, kam, peng. good professor who keeps the class moving forward with a combination of jokes and humorous stories about his life and his family. he picks favourites really early as people have mentioned and if hyou sit in the front row you should watch out.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: 90 minute class goes by in what feels like 90 seconds. the interactive portion of the class is the best. its not as much a lecture as it is a discussion among kam and the class. i was terrified to answer at first but now i speak out all the time whether i agree or disagree with the professor.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: if you sit in the front row of the class be prepared to be treated like part of a sketch at a comedy club. it's kind of cool though. he has his favourites and calls them by name in all the lectures.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: Professor Kam has arguably the funniest lectures at Ryerson, but still manages to cover the important course content. He will go out of his way to help you out, so long as you ask him! No textbook required, his slides are sufficient enough to complete the course with.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: everybody said you have to take kam for micro and macro and i guess i know why to some extent. kam is hell bent on you understanding the material. he doesn't care about covering more than necessary and would much rather we understand less chapters but understand them better than just rambling thru the textbook quickly. i like it.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: i took kam for micro and now i'm taking him again for macro. i like his lecture stule and i like the multiple test and written question format for the midterms and the final test. easy to get a B, hard to get an A. really funny. really caring.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: after two years in uni i'm ready to declare this guy the goat. you need to work in this class you can't just come to lecture. the online quizzes are a huge help but you need to do the pre quizzes he gives out.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: I had him for ECN104 and 204 and I would take every class with him if I could. He makes economics fun, he is hilarious, and the class is easy if you do the practice tests.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: let me make this perfectly clear. i hate economics. i hate math. i hate graphs. i hate multiple choice tests. i LOVED this class more than words.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: KAM is the GOAT. Explains everything slowly. Gives lots of practice exams for midterms and finals. He wants everyone to do well and doesn't give any trick questions. 100% would take him for every class if I could.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: you couldn't ask for much more from a course director. he basically hands you the course on a silver platter and motivates you to try your best. our practice test had 109 questions, 60 of them ended up on the real test. if you did the practice test you could get perfect. if you didn't do the practice you were screwed.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: this guy is seriously the bomb. we had our first midterm today and it was 60 multiple choice questions TAKEN FROM THE PRACTICE TEST.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: if the tests weren't so difficult the course would be perfect. the 90 minutes flies. kam gives you all his notes and slides and stuff, and all you really have to do is study your butt off.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: Such a great professor and really shows that he cares for his students. Pretty easy to do well if you show up and listen to what he emphasizes as important because he'll use it for the midterms and finals. One of the best professors.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: so the class is a ton of work but it all works out in the end. you do 2 tests and get the mark on the better one. you do a whack of mylab assignments but he only counts the best 5. the lectures are legendary. good prof and a good experience overall. also if you email kam, he writes you back in like seconds.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: short lectures made it much more bearable. when kam said nobody wants to sit and listen to him speak for three hours he isn't wrong. that said, i'd rather listen to him than most profs at rye.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: i had dr. eric kam for both microecon and macroecon and i enjoyed the courses pretty much equally. very fair professor with a super fair grading formula. i would take more courses with him. study for tests, they are hard, but you get more % on the test you score better.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: professor kam is passionate about teaching economics to first year students. if i had to say one thing about the class it's that it was never boring. the lectures are only 2 hours long with a short break. you learn a lot. the online stuff really helps you practice the material.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: great course on money econ. more of a combination of economic theory and economic history but nobody complained. haven't got a final mark yet but very much enjoyed the lectures.

Name: Eric Kam
Review: this is an intense dude. take his 104 or 204 or hopefully both. the course really isn't that hard if you keep up with the lecture slides and do the old tests. the tests are similar to previous years. the math level is a little high. sorry he is not teaching 2nd year courses.

Name: Else Grech
Review: I had her for 100 and 200 and she was great but now its like she gave up on teaching? posts worksheets and makes us watch videos/read the book to fill them out but barely teaches in class or responds to emails and never posts solutions when she says she will even when the midterms 2 days away.

Name: Else Grech
Review: She teaches expecting that you already know the material. Focuses solely on the cases & overcomplicates everything (worth only about 12% including midterm) & expects WAY TOO MUCH. The course itself is content-heavy & requires a lot of work. Read the TB, do the work she gives (whether it's graded or not) & attend lectures to pass

Name: Else Grech
Review: Professor Grech is a great lecturer. she clearly cares about her students' learning as well. She helps you as much as she can and is available in her office hours

Name: Else Grech
Review: She is literally the best professor I have ever had in my life. She is so helpful and dedicated to helping her students understand all the concepts. Even if you dont understand something in class just go to her office hours she'll show you how to do whatever you dont understand.

Name: Else Grech
Review: Else Grech made accounting interesting and informative. Her expectations of her students are very clear. If you take her advice, you will succeed in this and other courses.

Name: Else Grech
Review: Else is one of the best accounting professors as she clearly explains accounting concepts while applying them to real-world case scenarios. Be sure to ask for feedback as it broadens your accounting knowledge and helps you learn from your mistakes.

Name: Else Grech
Review: Expects TOO much out of her students, not a realistic jump from AFA 100 to 300. Even after doing all the work she provides which includes pre quizzes, worksheets to do before class, homework assignments, extra practice and going to class every week still not enough to earn the marks from her that students deserve putting in so many hours and work.

Name: Else Grech
Review: if you think you understood concepts from textbook, think again because Else will over complicate things to the point that you'll question everything you just read. she makes up cases/problems which are merely theory based and has no application in the real world. they are full of errors btw. Not a fan of her attitude. frustrating. AVOID!!!

Name: Else Grech
Review: One of Ryerson's best professors. She gives you a lot of work but if you can manage to complete and practice all of her worksheets you will do very well in her class. Participation in her lectures is key and easy to do as she is a very engaging instructor

Name: Else Grech
Review: Study and attend her classes and youll get a good mark

Name: Else Grech
Review: In my two years at Ryerson, she has to be the most amazing prof I have had. She makes lectures interesting and involves students in the work rather than merely reading off of something and doing the work herself. Attend her class and you will definitely understand everything, and she answers questions very clearly.

Name: Else Grech
Review: Else is great in the classroom, if you are struggling, she is VERY HELPFUL during her office hours. She warns you about quizzes, there are daily quizzes so do NOT skip her class as it will affect your grade and you will fall behind

Name: Else Grech
Review: I originally had another teacher but acc100 wasn't a course i just wanted to pass i genuinely wanted to do well in it so as soon as i saw her name i switched because i knew she was gonna challenge me and make me work for my mark and she did exactly that. So inspiring and i am coming back to her for 406 .

Name: Else Grech
Review: You need to attend class and read the textbook ahead of time. You do daily in class quizzes that are based on the previous class and the current lecture. She sometimes picks people to go up and write down their answers on the board. The midterm and final were hard.

Name: Else Grech
Review: Else is the best prof I ever had. Makes you work so hard and you'll hate her at first but she's prepping you for a harsh world because she cares. And you thank her in the end. Do everything you normally blow off: read the book, do all the optional hw, go to office hours to check her solutions book. Else will make you a better person.

Name: Else Grech
Review: Absolutely amazing professor! She is so thoughtful and having her students understand the material is her #1 goal. If she is teaching a class you need to take it!! Best SAF professor! I was really worried when I took this class again! But she made it so easy and understandable! She is like an accounting GOD!

Name: Else Grech
Review: AFA200 is one of the hardest SAF courses. having taken it with two profs i can say else is Godsent. She provides weekly lessons (like high school!)) that you can only fill out if you go to class which is awesome bc her lectures are insanely helpful. Provides endless resources and makes it extremely clear she wants you to do well.

Name: Else Grech
Review: Else is a great professor and teaches the concepts very well. Even though she goes fast in class, as long as you review your material daily and keep up with the homework, you will do good in her class. She has high expectations and makes you work for your mark. Otherwise, I would definitely recommend.

Name: Else Grech
Review: Nothing to complain about. She forces you to do a lot of work but it is very worth it and teaches you how to properly prepare for any test.

Name: Else Grech
Review: I did not do well enough on the midterm, so I went to her office hours. She was very rude and judgemental because of my poor grade, to the point where I did not want to bother continuing in the course, even though I'm 100% sure I could have passed. However, she's a good prof and explains well, but make sure you do well before you talk to her.

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: Not my favourite professor. Has a thick accent which made it hard for me to understand him, especially teaching a finance course which is already not easy to begin with. Most of the time I didn't bother going to class because his lectures were more confusing than helpful, basically had to read the textbook and teach myself. Do not take him!!

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: this professor is the WORST, i repeat WORST ever. avoid him at all costs. His lectures are a waste of time, reading the textbook would be way better than listening to him. he has many "smoke breaks" and finishes teaching 1 hour early, which takes away from learning. the WORST

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: The worst professor Ive had yet at Ryerson. He doesnt care how his students do and will not bell curve under any circumstances. He doesnt teach any calculator functions and I would recommend taking any the prof but him if you want to succeed.

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: Professor Blinder has lots to talk about, unfortunately very little of that has anything to do with finance. It is not an exaggeration to say professor Blinder shows up a minimum of 30 minutes late to every class. He does not teach how to use the calculator, prefers to teach the formulas however, the textbook teaches everything you need to know.

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: Edward Blinder is ALWAYS late to class, despite the fact that the most students are here before him and ready to learn. His excuse is always public transit, but doesn't take accountability to come earlier to campus ultimately wasting student's time and money. P.S , FIN300 is a tough course with lots of material. Do NOT fall behind.

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: Worst Professor ive ever had, and thats coming from a student who has a decent gpa and is a hardworker. Comes to class most of the time late as if he doesnt care at all, doesnt go over any examples, lectures are absolutely useless, study the textbook for the midterm and the practice final for the final exam and you will do fine

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: The worst, doesnt teach calculator functions for finance and does not care how students do in his class. Switch out if you can

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: Been taught by many profs at RU and maintained a 4.0. This is the worst prof to ever teach me. He doesn't review the lecture slides prior to class so he's confused during lecture, literally is always late (ranges from 10-20 minutes), and he rushes through the slides to end lecture early. Genuinely don't believe he gives a damn. Avoid having him.

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: Edward is very old school because he only memorizes and uses formulas when teaching. It was super hard to understand what he was talking about sometimes because he would relate back to his experiences in the financial world and half of it I couldn't understand. I would not recommend taking him if you want to pass

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: Edward has a great sense of humour, and is a decent teacher. he goes through the material fast, so do the readings before class, and be prepared for a final that's way harder than the midterm.

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: Fin501 Ok so here's the deal. He flies through material. Do the readings BEFORE class and with minimal effort, and i truly mean minimal (you can't do less than me i didnt even do the readings), a B and above is easy Fin 401 Also flies through stuff. lectures are short and to the point. Must put some effort to understand concepts but tests are fair

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: Worst prof I have ever had. Does not help students at all. When you ask questions, he does not give proper answers. Easy midterm but final exam is nothing like the midterm or homework questions. Group project in this class that he does not explain and does not give feedback so you have no clue what you did wrong on it. Avoid if possible.

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: Above average

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: Terrible prof, does not teach, tries to be funny but isn't

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: His slides are more difficult to understand than just reading the textbook. He goes through very few examples. You're better off staying home and teaching yourself if you have this professor.

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: I cannot believe he is even a professor. He's a nice guy, but not meant to be an educator. he WILL NOT teach you the calculator, even though half the material can be done on it and makes the work easier. Doesn't do examples (Which you need in a math course) and confuses you during lecture. AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!!

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: He just lectures off the top of his head about 2/3 of what he says is just useless stories he tells that he thinks are funny. If you actually wanna learn anything hes useless. If you want to pass the class get ready to teach yourself everything. His group project where you buy and sell stocks is not explained overall class is a joke

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: lectures are useless, does his own thing doesn't go over examples. avoid.

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: Sooo this is one of these classes where you have to teach yourself using the textbook. 100% useless to me, annoying and tries to be funny but is not really funny.

Name: Edward Blinder
Review: very funny guy but horrible prof. i almost failed the course because of him. 10/10 would not recommend

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: This course was very eye opening, Pascal is very passionate about obliterating homelessness, and is an inspirational professor. Hes very knowledgeable, and takes time to really make you understand the challenges face by this population. The guest speakers are mostly interesting, and this class was very enjoyable, I would highly recommend taking it

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: Pascal is a wonderful instructor. He is understanding, passionate about the course, and will help you when you need clarification. He makes learning fun as he engages with students and doesn't just read off of slides. Not only was this course an easy grade if you attend class but it also opened my eyes to the topic of homelessness on many levels.

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: My favorite course, hands down! I took it because I heard it was easy, but also because I needed to credit to fulfill my major. Readings were insightful. Guest visitors were incredible, and an amazing insight to what's really happening to anyone who has experienced homelessness. Take it, its life changing!

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: This was by far the best course I've taken given that professor Pascal displayed genuine care about his students and demonstrated in depth knowledge about the course. The implementation of weekly guest speakers allowed me to better understand the course, it helped me gain a better perspective about homelessness in Canadian Society .

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: Professor Pascal is an inspirational person who is passionate about what he teaches. He demonstrated genuine cares about every student, and ensured to make himself available without hesitation. The manner in which he delivered every lecture made it a-lot easier to understand the material; one facet of the course (guest speakers) aided my learning.

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: Pascal is an incredible person alongside his exceptional teaching. He inspires his students to achieve the best and his guest lecturers are an aspect of his class that every Ryerson student should be subject to. He is extremely fair if you need accommodations and most of his marking is based on attendance, so go to class.

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: Pascal is passionate and empathetic. He truly cares about the course materials and the students taking the course.

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: Pascal's lectures are amazing and will have you hooked right from the start. His passion for the issue shows and his lectures inspire you to address homelessness and be an advocate. Attendance and participation are mandatory but it is still easy to get a good grade. The use of guest speakers with lived experience really enhance the class.

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: One of the best classes i have taken in a school. It is a very interesting class, and easy to get good marks. Pascal is a great teacher. You will not regret taking this class.

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: Pascal was truly an amazing prof. He genuinely cares about the course and educating his students on relevant topics. He grades very easily on the journal reflections and allowed students to create final exam questions as well as answers from the online readings, therefore, the final exam was pretty easy. I highly recommend this class.

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: Best class ever, and this is what i call a bird course. Easy A+ !!!!

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: Pascal is the best prof I've had at Ryerson. He is truly inspiring and you can tell he cares a lot about what he is teaching and the students he is teaching to. This class helped me to process through my own issues and reignited my spark for social justice. Best class I've ever taken, I would recommend to everyone.

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: Pascal was the best teacher I have ever had in my entire university career! Truly inspirational, dedicated to his class, his studies and invested in his students! I recommend this course to everyone, you will love attending and learning so much that it doesnt even feel like school!

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: Dr. Pascal Murphy is hands down one of the best profs I have ever had at Ryerson. Every class in INT908 was very inspirational and I would highly recommend taking the course!

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: This is a template for how all classes should be taught. It's literally my favourite class I've ever taken. Guest lecturers were compelling. I've never been so invested in a university course.

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: This was the most memorable course that I took in Ryerson. I do recommend this course to any student no matter what their major is. It was a great learning experience, and the lectures were inspiring and engaging. Pascal is very knowledgeable of the content and overall he's a great prof!

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: I highly recommend this course for everyone, regardless of the major/profession that they are pursuing. It is such an amazing course that delves deep into uncovering the realities of Canadian trauma, providing us with a wealth of knowledge on what is happening. Pascal is an amazing professor, who is so passionate and truly cares to ignite change!

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: Professor Murphy makes sure that you leave the lecture with more than just the theoretical component behind homelessness, but actually learn applicable ways in which to ignite change on your own accord. Murphy is a wealth of knowledge in this area, and every class you leave with the desire to learn more from him. Absolutely incredible professor.

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: This class was quite honestly transformative. I have nothing but amazing things to say about Pascal, and his ability to educate students on real-world, relevant issues. A class like this should be mandatory for university students; that's how valuable I believe it is! Cannot recommend this professor and this class enough!

Name: Pascal Murphy
Review: Pascal is the best professor that I've had at Ryerson. You can really feel his passion about homelessness, social justice, and change. Did not want to miss one class because his lectures are informative, interactive, and interesting to learn from. I enjoyed every class and came out wanting to promote societal change. Would recommend this class!

Name: Clare Chua
Review: really goood prof! for qms202 she has packages, she goes through the package and it has examples, she goes through all the math step by step. answers all questions. take her if you can!

Name: Clare Chua
Review: Literally one of the best stats profs at Ryerson. Prints out booklets, and goes over a lot of examples. Before a test or the final, she went over exact questions that popped up on the exams. Went out of her way to with booklets for everyone, and teaches very clearly. Just show up and write down what she says, review it at home and you'll get an A.

Name: Clare Chua
Review: Absolutely loved her. Had her first sem and didn't realize how lucky I was. She prints out notes for you and then we go thru questions step by step. I understand the concern for her flipping thru pages, I've seen her do it before but I don't think it's all that bad . She just references other pages a lot to show u where she got her numbers from.

Name: Clare Chua
Review: Isn't organized at all, jumps back and forth between handouts without titles. I found it harder to study without actual titles and jumping between 4-5 booklets. Also talks 1000 words per minute without even giving students a time to copy. Overrated in my opinion

Name: Clare Chua
Review: Pretty good, she gives out booklets which she explains really well throughout the class and in the booklet it has questions that she goes over which helps you a lot. Mystatlab was easy marks and I found it harder then the actual tests/exams . Overall would recommend

Name: Clare Chua
Review: just went with the flow & thats what got me a 4.33...

Name: Clare Chua
Review: Negative zero and other inventions by this professor makes Ryerson becomes the greatest university in Canada.

Name: Clare Chua
Review: Clare Chua should rewarded the Noble Prize. She created a negative zero in math. OMG, no one is able to believe it she has a PHD with no math sense at all. Students will be definitely super smart under her training.

Name: Clare Chua
Review: Great professor, as long as you attend the classes and do the readings and statlab questions, you will ace the exams. Unsure why people are complaining about getting good grades in her class as an end result!? several handouts provided in class. Not crazy about how questions are set up on statlab but an overall positive experience.

Name: Clare Chua
Review: Clare's great, she provided handouts every class which other profs don't do. Mystatlab prepared you really well for the tests and are harder than the actual tests. You don't need the textbook at all, however you basically have to buy it to get the code. Don't skip class or leave early because she hints at questions on tests and explains really well

Name: Clare Chua
Review: As long as you show up in her class, you will pass. Majority of the material for QMS 102 is very easy.

Name: Clare Chua
Review: She shows step by step how to do the questions and use the calculator. I didn't touch the textbook once. Going to her lectures and doing the modules were enough to get me an A in the course. She does run her lectures the full 3 hours though.

Name: Clare Chua
Review: WORST STATS PROF EVER!! her lectures were dry and boring, she rushed through the material, I had to take extra help outside of class to even pass her class. SWITCHOUT !!

Name: Clare Chua
Review: AWFUL! Constantly makes errors: in lectures, in MyStatLab, and in emails. You have to put the wrong answers into MyStatLab to get it marked right. SHE ASKED US what was on our midterms cuz she couldn't remember. No one knew what to study. Then she told us in an email to study modules that didn't even exist for the midterm. Disorganized. Avoid.

Name: Clare Chua
Review: Dr. Chua is the greatest. There is absolutely no one better than her to teach Statistics, which is not an easy course. I purposefully enrolled in her QMS202 class in the second semester of first year because I knew that with her I'd pass. Be respectful to her, don't talk in class, and she will be respectful to you.

Name: Clare Chua
Review: The best prof ever for statistics no doubt.

Name: Clare Chua
Review: Best prof at Ryerson! She truly cares about her students and explains every single step in her lectures. She ensures that students are taught exactly what will be on her exams. She truly cares about her students getting a good grade and will go over many examples in class. She distributes handouts at the beginning of each class.

Name: Clare Chua
Review: Many students believe Dr. Clare Chua has a PHD in English and not in Statistics. She taught a lot of incorrect statistics concepts in class. Her textbook has ton of errors as well her test papers. Overall, Dr. Chua is a very nice professor.

Name: Clare Chua
Review: Honestly, the only bad thing I can say about her, is that she starts class early and ends class late. Her in class practice questions are repetitive, but you will definitely grasp the material. Theres no excuse to not get an A in her course. If you get into her section, keep her! And if you arent, try to switch!

Name: Clare Chua
Review: She is a very nice woman. However , her textbook has ton of errors. I have a degree in statistics from waterloo. I have a sense that she has a limited statistics knowledge. Ryerson should hire professors who have strong statistics background to teach statistics courses.

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: Finance has always been a difficult one for me. He made it easy to understand and fun to learn.

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: Scott hands out worksheets during each class which he works through during each lecture. The midterm was easy as it was mostly based on in class examples. He also teaches the calculator functions in class, unlike other profs. However, his writing is really messy and his final was nothing like what he taught in class.

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: Not the greatest introduction professors as he just assumes you know everything that he does. After going to several office hours I was more confused then before I went to see him. When I asked him the steps to take for a practice question he replied with "You just solve it". Does not seem to care about your success in his class

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: Pros: Scott is the hands down the best prof I've had at Ryerson. His classes (210 and 502) have made me so much more prepared for life/job in finance. This is the one class where hard work will pay off. Cons: AFF502 assignments are way too long and only worth 5% even though it takes roughly a week to complete (and countless visits to his office)

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: Professor Anderson's slides are not particularly helpful. His midterm is based mostly off of class examples, so you need to take notes. The exam is general, so you do not need to attend class after the midterm. I went to another professor's lectures who I found easier to understand.

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: This prof saved me from my final exam or should I say, from failing AFF210. I was not in his class but went to his final practice class twice. He handed out practice handouts which I found very straight and helpful. The class was pretty small and he made sure everyone was following and know what to do. He was really caring and helpful. Bless him!

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: Had him for CFIN 401 the midterm like everyone states is similar to the handouts given in class but the final is totally different from anything he does teach and is way harder than the midterm. He also writes really quickly and sometimes his writing is unreadable. Good prof but just wished the final was similar to what he taught.

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: I never write reviews for anything or anyone, just wanted to say how amazing this professor is. He truly cares about his student's success and will help you with any questions you have. His method of teaching is amazing and will really help you do well on the midterm and final. Just make sure to go to class and take his hand outs seriously!

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: All I can say with this guy is a solid 11/10 prof who will bless you on the midterm and final, if you put enough effort in his class.

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: This man is a blessing, if you ever have the chance, take it with this prof. Honestly, he blesses us up with amazing reviews and the problem sets are very similar to the midterm and final. Easy A with this guy.

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: Concise and ALL IN-CLASS method of teaching by explaining the principles of finance and demonstrating the application of solving financial problems on excel. Releases final exam results late.

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: He's such a great prof, and cares for his students' success. Definitely will take again for upper year finance courses! Strongly recommended

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: His midterm consisted of all his class examples, as he mentioned it would be. The final was a carbon copy of the past final that he and all the other professors uploaded. Study from those and you will do better than expected.

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: He's not bad because he actually teaches since its an application course. However his way only applies to him, making it difficult to solve questions from other sections. Very unorganized always going back and forth. He tells you for the final study from the book cause what he teach is unrelevant, you'll have to attend other lectures. Tough midterm

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: He is one of the best professor for Finance. Midterm and Final is almost the same what we study in class. The problem set assignments are really easy. Just study his excel sheets and you will get an easy A-

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: Good, consistent, makes it very clear what will be on both exams. Older reviews that say his class notes are useless for final are now longer accurate, he writes the final exam now, so you know exactly what you're getting into. Don't skip class, take notes, be thorough when prepping your exam tip sheet (make it from his notes!) and you'll do fine.

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: Ryerson's Finance profs are almost all bad, but Scott is your best choice. He's pretty old school which can be annoying since calculator instructions are glossed over. He teaches everything in simple step-by-step ways though. In-class handouts are important since he writes the exams. Text is pretty much a must. He also looks like Bill Murray kinda.

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: Scott is the best choice for a finance course. I had him for both 300 and 401 and I did well in them, however he is mostly disorganized but if you study yourself and go to class and review his problems, you can get at least a B if you study well. The course itself is hard.

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: I was hesitant about taking it w/Scott but I am SO happy that I did. The exams are based on the EXACT examples he goes through in class so you better not skip. Literally what we go over in class is on the exam - text was of no use. He is willing to stay after class & help as lots of material is covered during the lecture. Found it easier than 300

Name: Scott Anderson
Review: Hes the best. wish he taught more finance courses

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: hard working, critical thinking, non-judgmental, with a touch of both humility and narcissism. Easy to get along with, cares about the students, and encourages discussion and challenging ideas. If you're looking to be treated with kid gloves, look elsewhere.

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: This was the second course I took with this prof and I absolutely loved it. I would highly recommend taking any course with him you wont regret it. Lectures are very engaging and he is very fair with grading the exams and paper. He gives lots of hints and tells you exactly what to study for exams.

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: Most amazing professor Ive ever had. Genuinely looked forward to lecture. Very funny. Even with ADD I never got bored or zoned out in his class. Wish he taught more classes!

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: Such an interesting class, Oren is a great prof if you show up to class and pay attention you'll get an A. You NEED to go to class as the test material is what he says in class. Hard to forget what he says as it's fun and interesting which makes the material so much easier to remember. Looking forward to taking another class with him he's GREAT.

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: Hes the best professor Ive had yet. He is so genuine, funny and you really do learn!

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: His class is without a doubt very entertaining. However, I've got to say that he isn't very organized or clear in what he wants for the assignment. Once you're enrolled in the class, you'll see that his D2L page is all over the place. He's clearly passionate about the subject, but he's kinda cocky... and his lectures are VERY subjective imo

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: It seemed that Oren covered at least one sensitive and controversial topic each class. He gave so much information about each of these topics and never told us what to think. He taught us HOW to think. And he did this with humor and compassion. He certainly has an "attitude", but underneath that you can see his concern and commitment to students.

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: Dr. Amitay is a great lecturer, he really knows how to engage an audience at 9AM on a Saturday. His tests are NOT easy however, you should write down as much as you can in class as knowing the context behind what he is saying is important. Also need to read the textbook on your own which was a bummer. Paper was graded fairly. Would take again.

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: I agree 100% with the last commentator. I've had Dr. Amitay for 3 different courses (621, 325, 335) and he promotes critical thinking in all of the classes, and touches topics no one else has the guts or honesty to discuss any more. And he always covers controversial topics from many sides, not just one. He's inspired me to be a better therapist!

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: Dr. Amitay is a rare bird in the crumbling culture of academia. He does not push an agenda but is committed to teaching his students to think critically. He is a heavy hitter in the Psychology of Sexuality community and is respected internationally. He really has a heart for people and I found him to be extremely kind and generous. Life-changing!

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: This teacher is friendly and really wants students to succeed in and outside of class. You can get a B by just attending the lecture, but you'll need to read the textbook if you're aiming for an A. The class is very relevant to my field of work, but also to my personal life. The prof. uses a lot of examples and encourages class participation

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: Out of all my 4 years of undergrad, this has been the best class I've taken. Oren is the living definition of possessing the ability to critically think while being open-minded to new ideas. Going to his lectures are fun and engaging, you will do well just going to his lectures & tells you exactly what you need from the textbook. Take. This. Course

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: (Hi Dr Amitay! I know you read these lol) excellent prof, great lecturer. He will give A LOT of guidance in lecture so you absolutely MUST go to class (which is tons of fun anyways!). Teaches a lot about how to be good psychologist/HCP. Would take more courses with this prof if I could. Easy to approach for help! Hope he releases his book soon c:

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: Dr. Amitay is top-notch. Time flies by in his classesthey are always so engaging, unique, and informative. He teaches to employ true critical thinking and integrates his clinical experiences with research and theory. Its obvious that he loves teaching and genuinely cares about his students, and that he is just a genuinely kind person overall.

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: I have 2 words: Life changing... one of the best professors at Ryerson. He's so intelligent and caring, I wanted to take another course with him but unfortunately its on a Saturday. Also in case you're wondering, yes you have to put in a lot of effort, but you get so much out of his class... highly recommend

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: I learned more about being a GOOD therapist (and researcher) from Dr. Amitay than from any other prof or supervisor at 2 universities, 3 internships & placements, & my current clinical job. I'm now in a position to mentor others and I teach them what I learned in 325 & 335 from Dr. Amitay, who was very generous with his time and knowledge.

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: Dr Amitay is an amazing professor, he is inspirational and his lectures are super interesting. Whoever said he is narcissistic, clearly missed the class on narcissism and has no idea what it means :D. He really cares about students and wants everybody to succeed! I highly recommend his classes!!

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: DO NOT take PSY335 with Owen Amitay if you're planning to go to grad school for clinical psychology. Amitay only talks about himself; even the exam questions are about him (e.g. "Am I the most practical person you'll ever meet?"). He doesn't teach anything valuable about clinical psych, which can hurt your score on the clinical portion of the GRE.

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: Amitay's a narcissist who plays favourites in class. It's easy to do well in the course by pretending that you're in awe of his abilities. He violates ethics by telling stories about patients. Easy grader if you play him right. Avoid him if you want to learn anything about research.

Name: Oren A Amitay
Review: Dr. Amitay was the best professor I have ever had. He can seem cocky, but hes honestly amazing!!! For PSY621 class average was 69 and 70 for both tests. But if you go to class and take notes, write down everything he says cause he gives all the answers and lotsss of hints. but also if you dont read and make textbook notes you wont get a good grade

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: he is extremely misunderstood. i thought he was a bad prof too because I came into uni as a punk highschool kid. after bombing the midterm i did every question in his book... killed the final finished with an A.. hes a softie at heart I know he bumped me. He can be rude but its because he knows people aren't doing their homework. mark = effort here

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: Go to class and Listen! very good professor, choose this guy over other stats profs.

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: Whoever said hes a good profs lying. His evaluation for tests do not fairly evaluate a student's understanding of material. So if you do get him, pay close attention to answer presentation: it matters more than the answer itself. He communicates poorly, writes messy, comes to class late, doesn't use blackboard/powerpoint; so go to class sit close

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: A great teacher!!I understand why some people may not like him. If you ask stupid questions, he will critisize you and if u don't pay attention in class you will get screwed. He goes over hmk as much as the class wants, and will show you the exact format he wants on tests.His tests are very fair, and directly from class work ,normally a hard app.q

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: hated him

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: graphinc calculator not necessary for class, but he only shows us how to use that. was too lazy to show us manually. seems un-interested in your learning. very cocky. class was yelling at him post midterm becuase of how unfair it was.

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: he's actually a good teacher, although he can be difficult to approach

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: the best thing about this prof is that he is crystal clear in his explanations. oh, he also bumped our final grades too. i'd say each of his tests have only 1 question that is tricky. i got an A in his class. just some tips.. dont miss any classes. do the homework he assigns. follow his problem solving method to the tee. i would recommend him. :)

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: Here is the key to this class: pay attention in class and DO YOUR HOMEWORK.  Trust me on this.  I did OK on the 2 midterms, but the exam was super hard.  Luckily, I think he belled it up so I went from an A- to an A+.  People say he's hard, but I think he's a softy deep down.  One more bit of advice: have EVERYTHING on your cheat sheet on your exam

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: He can teach hes just wayyyyyyyyyyy to picky with format.. if you leave out anything he'll take off soo many marks.. i do everything right and yet im still failing

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: He thinks he is better than the textbook. Deaf and has memory problem. Does not want to wark in the class. You will have to do everything and he will only answer if you have any question. Exams are harder. Give assignments with wrng data and doesn't wanna accept that that he makes a lot of mistake. He does not want students to pass.

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: This is the worst prof ever, he knows what he's talking about but he DOES NOT know how to teach. It's hard to read his writing, he'll get mad if you ask questions in class and when i went to his office he said 'thats not my problem'. He's NEVER clear about what hes teaching. Seriously best decision of your life is to switch out of his class.

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: tests are beyond your capabilities

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: not good

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: DO NOT TAKE HIS CLASSES!!! DROP THE COURSE AND TAKE IT DURING THE SUMMER WITH OTHER PROF. Prof Smith is nice BUT lousy teacher. DONT EVEN TRY

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: Prof Smith is not clear, does not care. Grade harsh, and most learning I have done from his marking. He did not teach us well, and then graded harsh, so we just learned from one exam to the other, and that is the reason I have got 85 on my final after semester with mostly 60's. AVOID IF POSSIBLE!!!!!

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: Nice guy on the inside, but not very good when it comes to teaching. The whole course revolves around using SPSS yet he does not show you how to use it. You can try to learn it yourself but you probably still won't get a very good mark. He has very specific requirements when answering questions. FOLLOW THEM DIRECTLY OR EXPECT TO LOSE MARKS.

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: WORST PROF EVER!!!!!!!!

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: Very straight forward and apprehensible during the lecture. Should be able to ace this course as long as you do every questions being asked and know where the mistakes often occurred. The only things needed to watch out for are rules like significant digit, formulas, etc.

Name: Darryl Smith
Review: Attendance mandatory if you want to pass. See him after class, he is VERY nice and helpful about EVERYTHING (project included, start early or face the crowd). Pay attention even if it's hard to. Do all of the work and keep up ALWAYS. Very hard marker (sig dig, format, etc count), hard course and needs a LOT of effort. Just give him a chance.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: He's a good prof &he wants you to well in the course. But, I personally believe this course is much harder than it's supposed to be. The amount of stress and work you have to put into this course is unbelievable. He's unorganized and puts the final presentation schedule 3 days before it's due leaving everyone to scramble. Choose your groups wisely.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: Where do I even begin? Expect late nights, lots of arguments in your group, and on top of that - dealing with the professor. Pray that you're not scheduled for the first week because this is consistent and you will always present first with last-minute information. By far the most difficult class. I'm not religious but I defs need jesus.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: In our first official group meeting, he verbally berated me in front of group members and said I was going to fail the course. However, only 1.2% of GMS850 students fail, and the course itself is not that hard. Don't let him intimidate you, even though he will try, just keep your head low and get through it.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: This was the hardest class during my four years at Ryerson and this includes my previous degree. Don't be away unless it's life or death, don't get stuck with a group - pick them wisely! If you are struggling (and you will struggle), make appointments to talk to him. He's more lenient if you show genuine effort and care to try and meet with him.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: I believe he is one of the best professors at Ryerson because he does not tolerate BS from students. He will not let students use fluff in their reports or answers to pass the course. In order to be successful in the simulation and his class, you have to do the work, understand the material and put put it into practice.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: I had this guy for my first year Management course in 1997. Twenty+ years later I can see nothing has changed. He's the same arrogant, useless professor. After graduating I looked upon his class with disdain, and I got a B+ in it too. Not a good example to first year students. You CAN be nice and successful in business. I'm proof of that! AVOID!

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: Too bad that the professor is our only option for GMS850. I asked simple questions that he refused to answer and made me feel like I am not allowed to ask questions. Is this not his job? Never had such a rude prof. I am in my last year, and this course has negatively impacted my opinion about whether Ryerson is a competent in hiring decisions.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: Lectures do not have value, and what he teaches does not really relate to the course. He is unnecessarily rude and defends his rudeness by claiming "this is what is is like in the real world". In the today's world bullies are not tolerated. He is not helpful and for some reason thinks that talking about hockey scores is part of GMS850 material.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: The only positive about this instructor is responding email within a day but he failed to provide high quality lecture. His teaching materials is lower than college level. But he gave very demanding instructions that have NO academically value. Most likely because his Qualification. It is the time for him to Go...

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: He had provided ZERO quality lecture in the past 27 years. Thousand and thousand students got NO VALUE lecture from an instructor who has NO QUALIFICATION NO PHD and no research publication. Ryerson is not a place for him.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: His teaching material is extremely low quality. I think it is due with his education. No PHD and no research publication. Ryerson should let him go for the sake of students.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: I know most comments say that he is bad for many courses but for GMS723 online, he is by far the easiest prof I have ever had. Literally, study his modules thoroughy and nothing else, and you will do decent on his tests. Easiest course and prof ever.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: This course was one of the best choices I made this summer. Although he tells you to buy the textbook, it is not at all needed for this course. His quizzes and tests require you to study but its all from his modules and there are no surprises. Even the project, put in some work and you can get a decent grade. Take him online!

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: No one could understand why Ryerson allowed Michael Manjuris to teach in ryerson. He did not have PHD. He also have Zero research publication.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: Had 3 classes with him & all of them were GMS but GMS850, GMS690 & GMS723. If I had a choice, I would not have taken any classes with him. He's straight up RUDE! He puts students down when they answer wrong and responds with "use your brain thats why you have one". Well I only have one thing to say to him, "use your brain and treat others nicer"

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: Manjuris is the real deal. Very knowledgeable and experienced, prepares you for the real world. I learned more from GMS 850 with Manjuris than I did any other class at Ryerson. A good group is essential for this course. This class makes you get out of your comfort zone. If you can't handle stress then you won't be able to handle success.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: Dr. Manjuris is a boss with a wealth of knowledge. I can understand why people dislike him but he's actually a really nice guy outside of class and will readily help you out if you show initiative & effort. You may hate every second of his class, but know that you will be better for it later in life. Call me crazy but fave Prof @ Ryerson hands down

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: Amazing prof who cares for his students. Skipping class or failing to meet with group members will result in a bad grade. Course is tedious, but do your work and you will get a good grade.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: This guy is one of the realest profs at Ryerson. Just show up do your work and be prepared and you won't do bad in his course.

Name: Michael Manjuris
Review: Micheal is an amazing Prof if you can get past his "role playing". He acts like a bit of an ass and will put you on the spot, so make sure you know your stuff. He is very clear and well prepared for lectures. Little to no slides! so make sure you pay attention or you're bound to miss vital information. Slackers don't do so well, you were warned

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: To me he was kind of non-approachable? The environment and atmosphere he put out was not my favourite as it felt like he was picking on people sometimes. He seems really knowledgeable and he really wants class engagement so definitely speak up cus he loves it. Assignments seem easy but are super vague, ask him for help on those if you need it.

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: I took his class on theories of crime at Laurier. Theory can be dry, however, Terry made sure every class was a learning experience and would ask questions that would make us think to get our brains turning. By far the best prof I have ever had, he made it easy and fun to listen to his lectures.

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: The reason you endure through the post-secondary institution is to have the chance to catch an ounce of insight. Terrys lectures are riddled with crucial life lessons which will influence, inspire and instil aspirations of growth and success in a future full of service and intellectual growth. Do yourself a favour, seek out his courses.

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: Terry is a solid guy who is an advocate against today's learning system. He tries to reach students on a personal level with his teachings and really cares about the bigger picture which is whether you find value in what he's teaching or not. For the most part, read the slides, jot useful notes down and you'll do stellar in his course. Amazing guy.

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: Terry is a awesome teacher, do your work, study for the exam and attend class regular and you are sure to pass the course. He is also very enthusiastic about the course

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: An amazing, insightful, inspiring professor. Refreshing & engaging. If you're looking for a bird course, this isn't it. If you are looking to increase your knowledge, engage in critical thought, expand your horizons & come out a bit better than you started, this is it. Show up to class, read the textbook, take notes (be a student) & you'll do great

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: This professor was very open and you have to go to his class to understand the lecture, but the textbook saved me! If you want to take his class, you have to read the textbook for this particular course (which is a lot of pages). But he doesnt put up the PowerPoints which is unfortunate! So you cant skip his class!

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: Professor Terry was my favourite teacher at Ryerson. He was very engaging and explained the content with a lot of enthusiasm and energy. It was really obvious that he was passionate about the subject and helped me to think critically. Definitely pay attention in classes and contribute to discussions to get the full experience.

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: Avoid avoid avoid. If there were any advice I could give is avoid. He'll ruin something you were actually interested in. Trust me.

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: I don't know if it's because it was a summer course or if he really wasn't into my class but he was very passive aggressive. Likes to make people anxious. I really didn't enjoy his style of teaching. Power points that he runs through/has favourites  & groups them together/kicked everyone out once cause he was mad we didn't read a chapter... DON'T!!

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: Terry is the most inspirational prof I ever encountered. I was fortunate to have some of his time. He challenged me to practice critical thinking. Lectures give more than what textbook offers. Approachable, respectful with amazing humour in lectures. I would highly suggest taking his class if you are interested in being engaged!

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: Terry is the best prof I ever had! Lectures are engaging and he gives more context than what textbook offers. Passionate about his work and expects your best effort along with critical thinking. Approachable and respectful with amazing humour in lectures. I would highly suggest taking his class however you can fit it class in your schedule!

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: Dr. Terry is an inspirational prof who wants you to leave his course having learned something. He is a very approachable and knowledgable Criminologist. The course content and structure are designed to make you a better citizen, and more aware of the issues plaguing Canadian society. Buckle up, show up, and you will have no problems.

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: tough grader, doesn't put slides, is very rude and extremely hard to approach.

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: worst prof i ever had, save ur money and time. He acts like his class is saving the world.

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: His class was based mostly on the textbook. We had only presentations after the first 4 weeks. If you don't speak in his class, he assumes you're uninterested or didn't do the readings. But if you talk to him, I'm assuming you would have a different experience with the class. If you're interested in the course, the text book is engaging.

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: There are a lot of group presentations! Make sure you pay attention to those and take notes. The textbook is very important; do read! He will go out of his way to really push you to learn and think. Take the initiative to learn and he will reward you. Wanna skip? It'll be much harder.

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: FANTASTIC! He has really high expectations; expects the students to come to class ready to engage. If you do the readings, and go to class you'll be fine. He does not post his slides, so you shouldn't skip his class; that's his strategy to penalize those that skip and reward those that attend the lectures. Goes out of his way to help students.

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: business kids don't take this class  1. doesn't post slides 2. very vague about his assignments and what he wants 3. gets upset if the class does poorly, critisizes students and states how he should've stayed home, or that he couldve stayed home.   4. negative and rude  SAVE YOUR MONEY AND TIME

Name: Terry Roswell
Review: He is an awesome lecturer - really makes you think about your own bias and helps you to grow and understand different perspectives. He answers questions and is very accommodating. He is a tough marker and expects people to show up to class, with the readings done, and ready to have an intelligent conversation. If you do that though you will do well

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: Not only is he probably the best mathematics professor at Ryerson University he is also probably one of the few teachers I can say genuinely taught me something. Kudos to Majeed for being so great!

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: Best prof. ever

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: No need to write anything down! He is the professor you wish you had for every course :)

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: Hands down the best math prof you can get for first year eng. Explains everything thoroughly and clearly and also has a great sense of humour. He made me enjoy coming to lectures and is the reason I had a good grade.

Name: Majed Alqasas
