Review: The Man, The Myth, The Legend. Greatest professor ever. I'm upset that I can only pick 3 tags because Dr. Alqasas is so much more than that. He's an amazing person to be around. He is the reason I passed the course. He's phenomenal at his job, he makes you WANT to learn. I will surely miss my best friend at Ryerson.

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: Excellent Professor, He let us understand the material and explains in detail. Dedicated, knowledgeable, awesome presentation and approachable

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: I know everyone here has already said it a thousand times, but Majed is a captivating lecturer. He brings some dry material to life and he treats his students with respect. In my opinion, he is everything a professor should be and I will sincerely miss him.

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: Do not skips this guys lectures. He is such a good prof. He is called a GOAT for many reasons do the HW and go to class

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: Majed is a literal GOD. Everyone shows up to his lectures, even if they have a different prof. I understood everything he explained in class and he does a lot of examples. Also, he does exam review in class, so another bonus if you actually show up. He is such a good prof, you could make some money selling your seat to someone.

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: Dr. Majed Alqasas is literally one of the best human beings you'll ever encounter at Ryerson. In fact, not only is he an amazing professor but also a very kind, pure-hearted person. His lectures are top-notch and he is such a kind person in terms of marking. As long as you put in the effort, and try to learn in his classes, you'll pass.

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: Professor Alqasas is the best professor Ive had at University so far. Hes one of, if not the most caring, and inspirational professors available. Every time I attended his lectures, I sat on the stairs, but it was worth it. His lectures helped me so much in my understanding of Linear, and I wouldnt know what to do without him. The greatest man.

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: best prof I've had this semester. Made what is usually a hard course quite easy, with exception of that final exam.

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: Dr. Majed is committed to providing his students with the best learning experience possible. He is very passionate while teaching, which allows his students to enjoy his class more than any other ones. He is the best teacher/instructor I have had in my whole life! Without him, I truly wouldn't enjoy math as much and I am so thankful.

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: Amazing prof, only reason I passed calc and linear. Highly recommend him even if youre not in his class, go to his lectures. Simplifies everything and makes sure everyone understands before proceeding.

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: Best Calculus teacher in North America. Super nice guy. Knows how to teach and is passionate. If you go to his lectures, you feel like you're actually learning and not wasting your time. If you go to his class and make an effort, its almost impossible to fail.

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: A LEGEND, Good luck finding a place to sit because even the floors are gonna be packed!!!

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: THE GOAT I swear, BEST PROF OUT THERE AND MAKES MATH FUN, been sitting on the floor for more than a month and absolutely worth it, such a great guy man

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: A literal GOD, you have to fight for space in his lecture, and no the floor is not an option cause its hella packed.

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: This man changes your life. I walked in and I swear to god I found a new opening, a new meaning. His lecture's are really in-depth and he explains concepts really well! He makes the math seem really easy to get done! Show up if you don't understand, and he's got you.

Name: Majed Alqasas
Review: GOD, whatever prof you have, go to his lectures regardless of which prof you have, he is amazing and will change your whole view on math.

Name: George Gekas
Review: 90% of the course is common sense, so if you can understand the power points he posts online you do fine. Lectures are usually a waste if you understand everything but he gives good practice problems to test you (not marked). However, he asks random fact questions @ the end of class for bonus marks so if you'd like an extra boost go to the lectures

Name: George Gekas
Review: Hes so rude and very inconsiderate. He needs to learn how to respect his students.

Name: George Gekas
Review: i had prof Gekas for 801 a couple of semesters ago. He cannot teach Accounting at all. He should bake cakes instead. He resembles uncle tetsu a lot.

Name: George Gekas
Review: he says he is a caring prof. i doubt it. avoid at all costs.

Name: George Gekas
Review: A simple no. Take this course somewhere else. Management- please wake up and replace these under performing profs and keep the Ryerson prestige alive. One of the best universities in the province and these type of profs put it down.

Name: George Gekas
Review: k relax, he was not that bad.  almost always ended early, at which point my friend and I would go for extra help if we needed from last week.  decent prof, not that hard to get a decent grade- i hate accouting and still did well.    just respect him and youll be fine.

Name: George Gekas
Review: He barely teaches anything, always talking about irrelevant things, expects you to do well when he doesnt actually help you with learning the material. He just talks about the chapter and then shows the practice questions and expects you to know. Horrible!!!!!!!!!

Name: George Gekas
Review: This Professor is a tough grader as well as he be littles his students for asking questions, insisting that we should already know the answer to. Kicks students out for just looking at your phone once or having a chuckle. Like my man please relax you wasteyute.

Name: George Gekas
Review: caring prof, no i dont think that's the case. Tough grader and very rude. The concept of partial marks is really a confusion that needs to be understood here- you get none.

Name: George Gekas
Review: Not as bad as people commented here. First I hated him but now I changed my view after speaking to him face to face. He is a straightforward guy but he is actually willing to help. You have to make the most out of his office hours.

Name: George Gekas
Review: He doesn't teach properly at all. This course has to be self taught because he can't teach in the lectures. Also, he's disrespectful of students and isn't helpful when you need help with marks.

Name: George Gekas
Review: WORST PROF EVER rude and doesn't mark fairly. HE WANTS YOU TO FAIL

Name: George Gekas
Review: He's not lenient when marking exams, i feel like he doesn't mark fairly.

Name: George Gekas
Review: Very rude to students. Too many errors on exams. Avoid him if u can

Name: George Gekas
Review: Not suited to teach accounting and also inappropriate. Please be advised, take another class if available.  I use this website to help choose the best courses taught by Ryerson professors as well. Cheers

Name: George Gekas
Review: a big nope. take this course with someone else. He has a very belligerent behavior and treats students with zero respect. plus there are errors on midterms and final exams with absolutely no partial marks.

Name: George Gekas
Review: Absolutely awesome professor, very helpful. He pretty much gives you the questions that will be on the exam, so theres no excuses to do bad. If you don't do the required homework and listen in class then obviously you won't do well in any courses you take.

Name: George Gekas
Review: Too many errors on both midterms and final exams. I learned nothing from this class but to memorize the math. No focus on theory. Ryerson has once again failed it's students by hiring this professor..

Name: George Gekas
Review: His lectures are horrible and he is very unclear. I would switch while you still can. The textbook will be your best friend because his lectures are not helpful.

Name: George Gekas
Review: Dropped the class after the very first lecture. Couldn't understand a word he said, he didn't use any lecture slides. He avoids questions from students and is very degrading, making students feel stupid. He makes students feel awful for asking  questions and can't take feedback himself. I don't suggest enrolling in a class if he is teaching.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Dr. Kislenko gives excellent lectures, he is extremely passionate and established historian. However, he is strict, if you want to do well in this class be prepared to put in effort. I met with Kislenko in his office hours and actively asked questions and finished with a pretty good grade. I learned a lot in this class but worked hard too.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Kislenko is one of the best profs! It is crucial to go to his lectures since he doesn't use/post slides. Make sure you're prepared to write, and write down everything he says! His exams are fair, seminars are fun and they expect a lot from your essay but he is willing to help you with it. You learn a lot, and he truly cares for your success.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Dr. Kislenko is one hell of a professor. I respect the man because of his passion for history but his class was a pain in my behind. I'm not here to degrade him in anyway but Kislenko's class is not for you if have trouble with class attendance and writing notes based off of what he says during lectures because he does not have written notes.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Dr. Kislenko is by far one of the best professors at Ryerson. His lectures are engaging and interesting. Attending class is important because he does not post (or really use) slides. He expects a lot, especially in terms of the essay, but if you make an effort to go see him in office hours he will help you do well.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Awesome guy, interesting class

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Words can't describe how incredible Kislenko is  I'm not religious but this guy is the messiah for the humanities. His lectures are fascinating, he's funny and engaging, but I've taken both his classes and they are HARD. If you show up to office hours, (and bonus if you go to IID lectures!), he will help you so much and you'll do way better.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Arne Kislenko might just be the smartest man I have ever met. Most interesting professor at U of T and taking his first year Trinity course is an experience I was really lucky to have. Get ready to work though. You'll maybe get away with not doing all readings as long as you're at least somewhat competent, but he's really tough with marking papers.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: What I thought was an intriguing course turned out to be an awful experience. Cant really elaborate more, just disappointed in the marking that changed drastically from midterm to final.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Dr. Kislenko is by far one of the best professors I've ever had. His lectures are amazing and he challenges you to do well (in a good way). He's also very accessible and willing to help out his students. As long as you're willing to put in the work, any class with Dr. Kislenko is totally worth it. You will learn a lot guaranteed.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: One of the best profs at Ryerson I've ever met. Amazing storyteller, his passion is infectious. However he failed my essay; re-grades are not allowed. So if you take this course, be prepared to commit and do your best and more. You will learn to fall in love with history but you won't do well in this course if you're careless.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Never ever take a class with him. He WILL FAIL YOU without a second thought. Very insensitive. Only good thing about him is that he is passionate but he does it in a way where he looks down on you.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Hands down one of the best profs at Ryerson. His intelligence is outstanding, and his ability to lecture without notes is astonishing. Come to class, write everything he says, condense those notes, study it, and you'll get at least an A-. For the essay, ask him for help and advice. Canada ought to clone this man, we need more profs like him.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Great lectures; not relevant to the course. He is all over the place. I received a grade of 0 on an essay, I did well without ease in all other aspects. Did not pass the course because he refused to mark my paper even though his TA's handed out "unapproved" essay topic outlines. For the material amount, this upper-liberal deserves 2 credits. Rude.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Fantastic professor, and easily one of the best at Ryerson. He's has amazing lectures and really wants his students to be interested in the subject matter. Show up to class, take down lecture notes, and you'll easily get at least a B. All of his marking is fair, and gives you help whenever you need it.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Dr. Kislenko is great at lecturing, highly knowledgeable, and who rightfully evaluates your work based on its merit. I would recommend taking him. However, if you are bad at essays, I would think twice because he truly marks it on merit, and isn't a weak pushover - you need competence and diligence.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: This is not a bird class. If you have any sort of accommodations for school and are a minority, don't take the class. Kislenko teaching's can be white-washed, has joked about suburban asians before. Even if you have approved accommodations, he doesn't do much to accommodate because he and his TA's 'aren't paid enough'. Do it if you aren't. Engaging

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: This was my first class with Kislenko, & this was definitely the hardest yet, most rewarding class I've ever taken at Ryerson. I didn't receive the best grade, but he was extremely challenging and I was happy with a decent mark. I recommend attending every class, and going to him for extra help on your essay, he truly does care about his students!

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Great prof. Tough, but crazy smart

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Absolutely amazing professor. I learned so much from him throughout the semester, and he is so inspirational. I did not miss one class, and loved all of his lectures. His passion for the subject is evident, and though he is a very hard marker, the knowledge that he provides his students is priceless.

Name: Arne Kislenko
Review: Great lectures and professor. You'll learn a great deal from his class. He is a hard marker. You have to put in A LOT of effort in his class. If you're willing to do that take the class. If not avoid at all costs as your GPA will drop

Name: Kelly Train
Review: Kelly is an amazing professor. She came off as rather intimidating at first. Shes very understanding and gives the questions to both midterm and finals. Easy paper and marker!! I am willing to take her Violence in the Family class!! Shes a gem!!

Name: Kelly Train
Review: Go to class! Take good notes! Essay was fairly easily marked but did have to put in a little bit of work. Midterm and final exam were practically word to word questions from notes in class. Did not use textbook at all except a little for the essay. Could probably find it online somewhere.

Name: Kelly Train
Review: will give you the midterm and final exam questions. easy participation and marks very easy on essays.

Name: Kelly Train
Review: I took this class in my first year and have waited until my third year now so I could take her again. Most interesting and informational class ever, she's blunt, to the point, and real. Not a class you can miss but she generally grades generously.

Name: Kelly Train
Review: Her courses are solely based on her lectures each week so if you go to class and take notes, you will do well. She's a little intimidating, but she's clear and honest, and gets right to the point. Easy grader too.

Name: Kelly Train
Review: She is great teacher! Not a hard marker as long as you follow her rules. Class is mandatory, she uses her lectures to create test/exam. Textbook not needed. Would definitely take her class again!

Name: Kelly Train
Review: Not going to lie, she is very intimidating. She posts literally nothing on D2L, so you have to go to class. She takes participation marks every single class. Very generous grader. I liked her, but I felt as though she tried to make her students agree with her opinions a bit too much.

Name: Kelly Train
Review: Kelly is amazing! Her lectures are so interesting. I would take her class again 100%. Marks very easy I would say and for the exams she gives all the questions in class!

Name: Kelly Train
Review: ive never been 1 to leave a review for a prof but i love kelly sm. by far my fave course taken in my 3 years. she seems scary at first but the way she teaches her lectures is amazing. at first i was worried cause she doesnt post slides but the way she speaks about issues is much more engaging than ppw. goes over midterm/final in detail.

Name: Kelly Train
Review: The BEST professor at Ryerson and one of the few people that have actually taught me something here. I love her. She is so smart, and she will teach you so much. I've taken 4 of her classes because she is that good. She is intimidating at first but once you understand how she works you will so benefit from taking this class.

Name: Kelly Train
Review: She's hands-down the best professor I've ever had. At first she seemed really intimidating but she wants her students to succeed and it shows. Doesn't have or post PPT slides so you HAVE to show up and take notes to be successful. I was able to fill out 80% of her detailed midterm review from memory alone because she delivers her lectures that well

Name: Kelly Train
Review: Kelly Train is easily my favourite professor. She doesn't sugar coat things and shell always be straight up with you. Don't be too intimidated by her and go see her for extra help because she is so helpful. Her lectures don't have slides but she is so passionate you will listen- trust me I have ADHD and I focus so well!

Name: Kelly Train
Review: She's an amazing prof, took two of her classes because I love the way she teaches. She seems very tough but she is a very easy marker. Don't buy any textbooks just show up to class and take notes. She doesn't do power points and she gives her lectures verbally. Everything on her exams are what she says in lectures. Great prof and great classes!!

Name: Kelly Train
Review: Professor Train is by far the best prof at Ryerson. She is such an amazing lecturer, and inspires students in class discussions. If you have her as your prof considered yourself blessed.

Name: Kelly Train
Review: The best prof I've ever had!! I have never been so interested or engaged in a class before!!

Name: Kelly Train
Review: I was super anxious being in her class since I took it for the first time. There's no lecture slides and she doesn't post grades or slides still, online. ATTEND CLASS - if you miss class, you're pretty much ruining your chances to pass the class. I didn't use the textbook and I did very well - surprisingly! Take it, it was taught very well!

Name: Kelly Train
Review: taking a class with Kelly Train was the best decision I've made at Ryerson. She is phenomenal. I did not care much about my general electives, but she made it not only interested but I learned a lot! Do not second guess taking her class!

Name: Kelly Train
Review: this is one of the most inspirational profs I have ever had. Make sure you listen and take notes, the book is really small so you don't really do a lot of reading. she also gives you the test questions to help you prep

Name: Kelly Train
Review: Kelly is extremely approachable and chill. Her lectures are very interesting but remember to attend every lecture as she doesn't post anything online. She provides the exact questions that will be on the midterm and final exam. She can come off intimidating at first but she's actually very caring for her students. Definitely recommend!

Name: Kelly Train
Review: Prof Train is an excellent teacher. Really cares about the students, lectures are clear and easy to understand. She does not post anything on D2L so you must attend class for notes (no slides used at all or anything). Lectures are entertaining and she is always available to help you with your assignments. Good grader!

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: It's best to read ahead and do the practice questions prior to going to her lectures. She gives a super quick summary of the chapters. She really values those who answers her questions, and will have a soft spot for you. If you ask her questions, prepare to have lots of patience and ask multiple times before she understands what you're asking.

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: Donna is an overall good choice. I learned the whole course by myself and went to class to see if my answers were correct. She uses lecture time to take up questions so make sure you read before. The textbook was free and easy to understand. Midterm and final were both fair. You don't need to attend class unless you want to go through problems.

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: The textbook doesn't actually teach concepts, neither does she. The textbook & her class is all practice questions and scenarios. Unless you learn the topics before class, you're totally lost. May as well learn the concepts online, and use the "textbook" for it's practice questions

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: She knows the material but is not able to teach properly. She presents the material as if she's teaching herself and doesn't even answer questions properly. A classmate asked a question about liabilities 3 times, the prof said something about iclickers each time and the question was left unanswered. Time stands still in that class. Don't take it.

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: Zathy is not that great of a prof especially if you didn't take accounting in high school. Her lectures are tedious and are mandatory as there are in class quizzes which are pretty easy depending on who you work with. I would recommend watching Else's online accounting tutorials to do good in this course.

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: How to ace the course: BE PREPARED FOR EACH CLASS! That means studying the chapter and doing some of the end chapter practice questions before class. Going to lecture is mandatory for the easy iClicker questions (worth 10% of grade), and homework answers. The midterm is FAIR, but the exam is HARDER - you must know/understand EVERY concept taught!

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: She mainly uses her lecture time to do questions but if you pay attention, they're helpful - so if you're not a fan of reading the textbook like me, make sure you do them with her. Had her twice and she's a great prof once you follow her teaching style. Her exam/test reviews will prepare you well so DO THEM!!!

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: Her classes are straight-forward and easy to follow. She only goes over practice questions and does not actually teach the material herself. If you are prepared by reading the content before class you will be just fine! There is also a bit of self-teaching involved, but if you have minimal knowledge of acc you'll still do well. Overall, good prof!

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: Donna is amazing, she knows her material well and will always answer your questions. Course is heavy material wise but Donna makes it really fun and easy to learn. You have to read the lectures before the class for a small in-class quiz but reviews the lecture and goes through a lot of examples. Exams are predictable and are forgiving when marking

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: This prof is okay if you read the textbook before lectures. She does go over textbook questions in class, however her explanations are sometimes confusing. She doesn't tell you the format of the midterm or final and lectures are usually the full 3 hours. Material itself is pretty boring, but if you read the textbook you should be fine.

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: Acc at Ryerson is such a course where you will have to read before class, the prof is really good. she knows her content and super at teaching. She does not like being asked questions, however when asked she answers them well. Would take again!

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: She's very patient, friendly, and means well. She understands the material she teaches, but *does* sometimes get confused or explain something wrong, which can confuse students who are new to the subject. I'd recommend taking her if you have had a little background in accounting prior to the course. Still, there have been new acc ppl who got 75%+

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: one of the worst teachers ( shouldn't be called a teacher or prof because she has nothing to do with teaching ). some people should realize that not everyone can teach. worst class ever  don't take any class with her

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: Amazing Prof. Will clarify or help you if you have any problems. Attending class is a must because she goes through the work step by step. Very approachable, cares about the success of her students.

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: She is overall a good prof. It is important to attend every class, as this is a course that can be difficult to understand. Her lectures are really good and really explains the content well that you don't have to read the textbook. You must do your homework in order to do good in this class, a lot of the homework questions are similar to the test.

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: Donna does not get the credit she is due on this. She goes through a chapter each class in detail, and will spend a majority of the time answering and solving textbook questions. Her midterms are very easy, IF* you actually do the questions she tells you to focus on! She will go through any question in detail if you ask her. Take her class!

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: Though she's very boring, she's a decently fair grader. ACC 100 is a heavy course to begin with. Hence, If you don't read the textbook and try the practice problems you're most likely not going to do so hot. Midterm and exam were fair. Iclicker quizzes before every class (easy marks if you read the textbook before class) which you can do in group.

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: When you ask her something she mumbles the answer to her self. In fact, she mumbles the entire lecture to herself. She never answers the question a student asks and is quite rude so flattery may help in dealing with her. she's an embarrassing excuse for a professor and embarrassing to Ryerson as a university. Must've had connections for this job.

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: Overall, I can't complain... I finished the course with an A, but that was purely due to reading the book over and over again. She's nice and if you forget your iClicker at home, she'll let you hand in the quiz on paper, but unless you can self teach yourself, she won't do you any good.

Name: Donna Zathy
Review: The Worst Professor EVER. The problem is with the university, they keep hiring people who can't teach, besides teaching the course now requires the students to complete WileyPLUS online assignment worth about 10% of the course. This is the biggest scam EVER. On top of paying for a course without a decent professor, students have to pay extra

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: Nice prof and teaches through examples in class. Very helpful in labs so definitely attend those.

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: I took moss for itm 305 fall 2019. His labs are extremly difficult and does not help much. His midterm was easy but the assignment is really tough as he grades hard and to his own standard. do not take this prof

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: Hard to succeed in his class unless you really try. He is hard to get a hold of outside of class (Office hours) but usually replies to emails promptly

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: he doesn't grade the labs, so its an easy 10%. But the downside to that is when it comes to a group project, you can end up with 10% because there were no prior feedback from labs. Lectures run off-topic most of the time, or he will spend half the class on 1 slide. I feel as if I learned more about his son than materials in the course...

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: Prof Moss is the one prof you do not want since he does not provide any feedback or answer any of your questions, but instead would find your questions laughable since you're expected to know the answer to them beforehand. Save yourself and swap profs, you will not be disappointed.

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: the prof doesn't help in the labs, so you will have a hard time understanding the content (how to do the diagrams) and will have to teach yourself or get a tutor. he will mark your labs hard. if you are reading this and are debating whether to switch to another prof, you should, you will be struggling and stressing - not worth the stress.

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: Asking this prof for help is pointless. This guy will try to sound super intelligent, but in reality he's just saying bs, so when you apply what was said to your labs or assignments they will be incorrect everytime. Also if you ask him too many questions he just gets annoyed and blows you off. Choose a different prof by any means necessary.

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: he goes off-topic way too much and talks about himself. I had to teach everything to myself. if you have the chance DROP DROP DROP THIS PROF

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: Knows the field very well, the course is just reading codes and figuring out the output. He teaches and explains the codes well and the midtem is super easy as long as you read the notes. The final is similar to the midterm but with more stuff

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: He is an average prof. You just have to show up for the classes and read your books. He marks fairly. Sometimes he makes cringe jokes which are not funny, but overall he does his job and marks assignments on time.

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: All his lecture materials are posted online, so you only have to show up to class if you have any questions or don't understand anything. Weekly labs which reflect material covered in the lecture. If you show up to class he is easy to follow along and explains everything in an easy to understand way.

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: The method he teaches is very dry his classes consists of him going over 20 lines of code then trying it in the lab. His marking style is very hard. If you take his class be ready to learn and try your hardest because he's very tough.

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: Ray Moss should be avoided at all costs. Its so sad that profs in ITM is like picking the lesser of two evils. This guy is terrible at teaching and marks pretty hard. You will be teaching yourself no matter what class you take. Don't be naive... just take another prof for your own good.

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: This guy actually blessed me

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: He is hard marker for sure. But , if you want to learn ,you should take him . You have to work very hard to do well in his class . So, if you are very serious student and want to learn , I will recommend him.

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: AVOID! This professor is one of those professors that makes what should be an easy class quite difficult. He doesnt give feedback or help. He made a final exam 65% diagrams and 35% SHORT ANSWER without giving a specific review of what would be on the final so nobody knew what to study. Awful. AVOID if you dont want your gpa to drop.

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: Never taking this prof ever again! Final exam was 65% diagrams which were hand written & 35% short answers which no one had no clue what they were going to be on. Lectures are whatever kind of hard to pay attention to what hes saying with this thick accent and labs are probably the only thing that will boost your mark ONLY IF you attend the labs.

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: I have no idea how he became a prof. He makes an already boring class worse. If you are taking ITM305 and are reading this, take the time to switch classes, it will be worth it in the end. Exam is 65% Diagrams and 35% short answer. Hes one of those profs that act like they care but make the course intentionally hard so you will fail. Switch Profs!

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: His lectures are boring and you can hardly understand what he's talking about. Labs are alright, just make sure you attend all the labs. Also, if you ask questions he wont give you the answers. Just gotta study and pray.

Name: Raymond Moss
Review: Very helpful when u need help. P

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: An absolute legend

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: jason is absolutely the best QMS 102 prof... period. His lectures are the full 3 hours but it passes by well. he explains the concepts very well. I never used the textbook, I solely depended on his notes and slides. the midterms and final exam comes from questions that are given on the review so if you do them abut 2-3 times you will be prepared!

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: This professor is great at explaining concepts. Engage students every minute.

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: Make you feel GREAT forever ...... The best motivator in Ryerson. Make you wanted to go to class every Monday morning at 8:00 A.M. Math is fun :)

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: The only Professor will make u Great forever Very energetic, Caring ; fun...

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: This professor makes you GREAT forever. He is the best math professor in Ryerson. He has a very practical teaching methods.

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: Jason is the most caring professor in Ryerson. His teaching is the best in Ryerson. U are super lucky if you are able to be his student.

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: Was the best stats prof at Rye wish he was back only got 2 questions wrong the whole year because of him.

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: Professor Jason Chan is the BEST statistics professor in Ryerson university. I took qms 102 with him in Fall 217. All of his sections were full. He left after that semester. Thousands of students wish to have him in QMS202.

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: Professor Jason Chan - A true legend .......

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: He is the best Statistics professor in Ryerson. I took QMS102 with him in Fall2017. I did not see him after that semester. Hoping he will be back soon and looking to be in his class in QMS202. Hilarious in teaching. It is a loss for Ryerson if he is not coming back.......

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: I took QMS102 2 years ago with this professor. No one can replace him in teaching QMS courses. I am looking to do QMS202 with him. The best QMS professor in Ryerson.

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: This professor went extra miles to help students. The best choice for QMS courses.

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: Don't take. The worst one in Ryerson.

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: AMAZING! Literally one of my favourite profs and definitely the best stats prof I've had so far (including Clare Chow). His lectures are incredibly useful and helpful. He answers questions and does his best to explain. Makes you laugh. I can't rave about this man enough. He made me love going to class everyday. He is truly a great professor.

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: This man is a LEGEND. HE is the BEST GIFT given by GOD to TRSM students. Take him if you want to learn statistics. He is the best statistics professor is Canada.

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: Would definitely recommend to the first year students. After attending his class, you will definitely thinking of changing your major to statistics. The best statistic prof is ryerson university.

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: Very engaging class . Take him.

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: The most caring stat prof . TAKE Him. He posts review questions that are harder than the test questions. The best way prepare u for test n exam.

Name: Jason (Chin-Tiong) Chan
Review: A true LEGEND

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: Is really funny and lightens the mood

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: Stand up guy. While others may find him quite intimidating and over-the-top, Joel is a great professor. His lectures are clear and concise and his thorough explanation of the topics gets you engaged in the concepts and makes you want to learn more. His tests are not the easiest but if participating and attending lectures, success is easy.

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: Provided us with an online textbook free of charge. the weekly quizzes were easy marks and a review of what was taught in class. the midterm and final exam was all multiple choice. he makes jokes and tries to lighten up the mood in the class so that students dont hate coming to class. caring and honest with you telling you what needs to be done.

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: WORST PROF/COURSE COORDINATOR EVER! AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: He sucks. Avoid at all costs. He will spend the first 20-30 mins lecturing your class about everything.

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: I honestly enjoyed his class. Definitely need to come prepared and alert if you want to do well. A fair prof that knows his material well. Attend class and actively listen and take notes.

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: I don't even know where to begin. Let's just say that.

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: Not saying anything personal because I don't want to slander online. But I will say, if you see you're enrolled in his ACC100, drop it. The good reviews are so so so far from the truth.

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: Joel isn't awful, but for sure isn't the teaching style I prefer. He is tough, he is aggressive and yells at you and is FAR from encouraging for his students. Although, from a course standpoint- he teaches well, goes through lots of examples and gives you all the information you might need.

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: The man is a living legend.

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: Joel was a very funny prof and made the information a lot simpler. 100% would take again

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: Although this prof looks like pierce from community he is decent for ACC 100. He is the course coordinator and his test are pretty easy. You just have to know how to do the content if you do not practice or do the questions on your own you will fail

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: Shapiro was a very knowledgable guy and definately knows his content. However, you must put in the work and do the practice questions before class as he only takes it up. He gives you some helpful tips to help u remember certain concepts. His explainations were great but his marking was horrible. Very tough marker and dont argue marks with him

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: easiest marker ever

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: Professor Shapiro can be loud and sort of mean, but if you do your homework and show up to class (the minimum of what is expected of you) he won't be mean to you. The class is an easy A if you're able to put in the required work. You MUST do the practice questions and read the textbooks before class to understand what Shapiro is talking about.

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: Horrible person and prof. Makes all lectures mandatory with clicker quizzes every lecture worth 10% of your grade. Ruthless marker that always goes on about how you're going to fail his class. There are a lot of practice questions in the textbook, and I recommend doing most of them to prepare for his exams. Avoid taking his class at all costs.

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: Funny dude, makes a lot of jokes in class, nonetheless he's a smart guy that knows his stuff, does a good job at explaining concepts and clearly tells you what will and won't be on the midterm/exam, he is a ruthless marker so be careful, one mistake and your entire answer will be wrong, classes are mandatory for marks, FREE TEXTBOOK

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: Amazing prof, teaches VERY well and gives you the tools to do well in the course. He will prepare you for the tests and exams and you will do well if you practice and study on your own time. Course isnt easy but he makes it understandable Will definitely take another course with him

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: He was strict and inconsiderate.

Name: Joel Shapiro
Review: Straight up rude, always goes on about how most people will probably fail the course instead of giving encouragement, tries to belittle students when he gets the chance

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: Professor Haddad is such a gem. She doesn't allow laptops in class though - so get your pen and paper and open your ears. She speaks slowly so you can take notes and her powerpoint are not available online so you have to be there! Standard final and midterm that is MC but is fair. She grades fairly, presents great examples and is available after!

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: Haddad is one of the sweetest profs at the school! She truly cares for her students and despite how large the classes are, she makes the effort to talk and get to know you. Her classes typically ask to take your notes by hand (accommodations can be made of course) but makes it super easy to follow along. If you can take her class, absolutely do it!

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: I cannot fit into this word count how much I love Haddad. She is an excellent prof, I had her for PSY1101 and 1102, great classes and the material was well presented. She only allows handwritten notes in class and does not post her slides so you have to pay attention. You can tell she loves her job and works to make you also love psych. Fair exams.

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: I'm only in first year, but Dr. Haddad is such an amazing prof. She cares so much about her students' success and she has very interesting lectures. If your program is psychology or if you're just simply taking intro to psych as an elective I HIGHLY suggest taking her! You'll love it.

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: I've never had a better professor or teacher than her and I don't think I ever will. Seriously, take this course with her if you can. She is the most caring prof ever and her lectures will give you a reason to wake up in the morning.

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: This professor is literally an angel - the sweetest woman EVER. Psych is sorta hard if you don't try so really make sure you study her lectures AND the readings. I sorta neglected coming to class after the second midterm and still passed w an okay mark

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: Professor Haddad clearly cares about her students and gives honest advice on how to do well in her course. The class overall was super easy, as long as you read the textbook youre guaranteed to pass! Her lectures arent necessary to go to, and she makes that clear. Study from textbook and go to her if you have questions :) shes such a nice lady

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: best prof i've had so far! She made psych my favourite class in first semester! Definitely get her for any psych class you can, you won't regret it. The reason my make wasn't higher was because I didn't study much in the beginning so make sure to read the power points she posts, the textbook, and her lectures! Shes great Sheas sgre

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: best prof i've had so far! She made psych my favourite class in first semester! Definitely get her for any psych class you can, you won't regret it. The reason my make wasn't higher was because I didn't study much in the beginning so make sure to read the power points she posts, the textbook, and her lectures!

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: Dr. Haddad is a must for people who are taking psych. She genuinely cares about her students and tries her best to make the material easy to learn. Her tests can be a little tricky but as long as you know the content from the textbook you will do fine. She inspired me to switch into psych, love this woman!

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: Good prof

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: Interesting lectures and she really cares about her students. She always tries to make her tests fair and simple.

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: She is the best psychology prof I have ever had! I absolutely love Professor Haddad. I cannot physically put into words how much I love this prof and her classes. I would recommend taking her classes to anyone who gets the chance to. She is like a ray of sunshine, absolutely delightful and is very passionate about her subject. LOVE HER <3

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: I can't stress how much I love her and her classes! Best teacher I've ever had in my life and the course was 100X more interesting!!!

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: Look PSY1102 and PSY2110 with her. Great professor, genuinely cares about her students. Makes you hand write notes in class which actually helps you remember the material much better but you have to go to class! A fair share of textbook material on exams but she focuses on the exciting studies and examples which are easy enough to remember.

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: Such a sweetheart, always has a smile on her face and greets everyone who walks in, super engaging lectures and time flies by in her classes

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: Peak of my freshmen experience! Best prof i have had so far. Makes you fall in love with psychology!

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: I LOVED HER, she was the sweetest and made the lectures interesting with lots of examples . You have to go to class because she doesn't post the lectures and doesn't allow you to use electronics in class! Going to class isn't enough, you have to put in a lot of work if you want a decent mark .

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: Haddad is an amazing and very caring professor. All she wants is for her students to do well and she does everything in her power to make this happen. Going to her lectures is the best/easiest thing you could do for yourself to succeed in this course as she gives hints as to what will be on midterms and most of her questions are taken from lectures

Name: Najwa Haddad
Review: Best prof of all time. Beware, do not go in the class expecting a good grade without studying. It takes effort.

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: Take notes (he's an amazing lecturer), do the readings, and make definitions for the keywords each week! don't fall behind with this, they're important. Study the keywords like mad and Do. The. Crosswords. If I could put it in bold type I would. DO THE CROSSWORDS. I had him again for Animal Form and Function and it's the same thing. I love him<3

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: I remember only ever getting a perfect grade on one key word question... I think him and Katie Gilmour have to be the most demanding professors you will ever have (even worse than calc profs). Unless you are a robot or lucky enough to memorize things instantly, they set you up to fail. If you didn't 'succeed' in his class, don't take it to heart.

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: I will

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: I was enjoying the course and doing well on the midterms and quizzes.... and then the lab exam happened :(

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: At first, Houseman is not going to be a great professor until you adjust to how he teaches. Everything you need to know he'll talk about in the lectures. However, when he tells you to review his keywords, DON'T, there's just too many. Just write super clear notes for every lecture, and use his podcasts to fill in blanks.

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: Do not take his class if you're looking for a good grade. His grading criteria is extremely tough, he's looking for very specific answers. To pass this class I recommend going over the keywords thoroughly a long time before the midterm/exam.

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: Honestly the best prof

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: The legendary Jon Houseman was the best lecturer I've had so far!  He is very knowledgeable about what he teaches.

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: Great lecturer but really really tough and strict when it comes to his marking schemes for midterms/exams

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: He's an amazing teacher, but the marking is really tough. Know 3 points about each keyword, they really come in handy, Go through the podcasts as a review tool, and make notes from it, final exam had 2 questions that he only talked about in the podcasts and was not in the text or on digital diversity. Go through digidiv readings, they help.

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: I loved Houseman. You'll hear a lot of negative things about him, but he's a real gem, especially for first years. His lectures were engaging, and he has a way of just keeping the class' attention for the whole time he has. The class was very organized, he was very clear in what was expected. It is sad to see him retire.

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: Great prof who is really passionate about his subject. Lectures are engaging and surprisingly interesting for a first year course. Midterms and final exam are hard because you are expected to know everything that was mentioned in class, but if you study early and take advantage of the resources that he provides then you'll be fine

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: Class was really interesting, and lectures were engaging. Expects you to know absolutely everything.

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: Such a great lecturer! Hard exams but very little homework so makes it manageable to stay caught up with readings and reviewing lecture notes. Overall, I really enjoyed Houseman.

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: Funny guy. Lecture material is EXTREMELY BORING. Podcasts saved my life. Study early or else you will hate yourself. Answers to questions are extremely specific, so don't try to guess.

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: His website is incredible, he gives you -exactly- what you need to succeed in his class. He's not easy to talk to, at all, but his lectures are top notch. Be sure you know exactly what is going on, because if you word a definition or mechanism weird or incorrectly, it is wrong, he can be pretty specific that way.

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: I was in his last ever BIO1130 class, I leave this review as a relic for future uOttawa students who have dodged this bullet.  He's extremely pompous. It's like he knows that the material is not hard so he fills his midterms with trick questions so that you feel like it is. He uses long words just to confuse people but they're not used correctly.

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: Dr. Houseman was the Prof I was warned about. Though his marking scheme is tremendously hard, I looked forward to his lectures. He is very knowledgeable in the subject, conveying the material in an effective matter. The course is very interesting, if you can take all the information in. There is a lot of work involved in studying but it is worth it

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: To pretty much summarize it, Houseman is an amazing professor, he really seems to love what he's doing and explains everything in his lectures detail by detail. BUT, his exams are the hardest things you will ever do in your entire life. You think you understand everything, and BOOM. Nope, you failed.

Name: Jon Houseman
Review: I was honestly very scared coming into this class because I heard so many bad things about him, but he is such a good professor who really knows his material and is passionate about what he is teaching. May be a little arrogant and all of the information tested is based on what he says word-for-word - so read his blurbs and pay attention in class!

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: HORRIBLE PROFESSOR. He honestly is the worst prof you could ever get. He never stays on topic. Going to lectures is absolutely useless cuz he never explains anything and he takes attendance and he won't mark your stuff if u don't attend. AVOID AT ALL COSTTTSSSSSSS...

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: Czajkowski is probably one of the best professors at the University. Even though physics is considered one of the harder sciences to understand, he well explained the topics. Assignments every week helped you to get a better understanding of the idea.

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: Andrzej Czajkowski is one of the best physics teachers Ive ever had. His explanations of concepts are clear, provided you introduce yourself to the topic first by reading the class notes/textbook. His weekly assignments are challenging, but are great practice for the exams. He cares a lot about his students, and his emails are hilarious! Easy A.

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: he is one of the worst profs I have ever had in my life. He does not explain well. He makes jokes out of the students. He forgot to teach us some concepts before the midterm and then he figured out that after we did the midterm and just did not care about that. Some people like him because he is funny!WELL! we are here to study not to hear jocks

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: Tough course but he is a quite good prof in my opinion. You do have to get used to a slight accent but it's nothing major. Note that midterms involve doing actual math and problem solving but the final exam is more theory based questions.

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: He is very intelligent, and does examples, but doesn't explain what he is doing and assumes the concepts are obvious. His midterms are also 6 multiple choice, worth 48% of the test, then 5 long q, worth 52%. He is very funny but rants and blames the class for poor performance results on the midterms. You'll have to teach yourself stuff to pass.

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: funny prof but not very good at teaching the content... I barely passed the midterms but did better on the final since it's all multiple choice. Take this course with another prof or in summer school if you can!! (He said he doesn't round grades up, but based on my grade he did, so even if you know nothing you can still get a decent grade lol)

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: Prof Czajkowski is a nice funny guy but he is bad at explaining Concepts and that makes the class 20 times harder. He is heavy on multiple choice. Each multiple choice is worth 8% on midterms and 50 overall. Exam is 33 multiple choice each worth 4% and the 2019 exam was unreasonably difficult. He has online extra credits but they are always wrong.

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: He's a funny guy so the lectures aren't completely boring. Explanations aren't the best. He wants his students to go to other sources to understand anything they didn't get from the lecture. In theory, this is easy but with a heavy course load it's hard (he expects that you prioritize his course over others). Final exam was unreasonable.

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: Czajkowski has been my archenemy for my entire undergraduate career. Was waiting for him to retire to take this course. Physics with him is the worst possible time you could imagine. He is useless and loves to go on tangents about how he hates teaching 1st year courses. Avoid him at all costs Ps: he repeats his jokes every year (hes not funny)

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: Funny guy but one of the worst profs at explaining concepts. He rambles on and on about non-physics related things and tries to rush through examples. He weights midterm MC questions 8% each, so you're screwed if you get 2-3 wrong. You get no cheat sheet (the formula sheet is horrible), even though every other PHY prof allows it. RIP your GPA

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: Possibly the worst prof at UOttawa. He doesnt even teach the content and thinks that making his students memorize 40 formulas for a midterm is a good idea. I would not have taken this course if it wasnt cmpulsory and i suggest taking it in french over having him as your prof.

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: I am not strong in physics, but he makes it even harder. Calls the class dumb constantly. Can't skip classes bc he doesn't post anything. Assignments take long but help marks. Gives extra credit quizzes. Funny sometimes and has demos in class. If strong in physics hes ok if not take summer school w/out him. (dropped phyII bc of him).

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: So. Professor Czajkowski is a cool guy. I respect him! And he's really funny and wants his students to succeed. HOWEVER. He will make you feel dumb for asking questions he thinks are obvious. My advice is to stand your ground and ask questions anyway. He likes student participation a lot. I participate a lot in class and he gave me extra credit.

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: Called us stupid and yelled at the class that we are dumb students in the class for answering an answer on the multiple choice on a midterm wrong. I think if a bunch of students chose 1 answer as a majority that is wrong, this proves that his lectures do not correspond to the lectures. We love unprepared profs.

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: Dr. Czajkowski is an amazing professor that brings energy to every lecture and shows you the true beauty of physics. The textbook isn't mandatory BUT it's insaneeely helpful, shows you step by step how to do those problems you have trouble with. Although this was a tough class, it was the class I've learned the most in. <3 andrzej

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: Bruh. If you've never taken physics before, good luck. He doesn't really explain what he's showing you in class. There's weekly assignments. He also has extra credit quizzes. You have to go to the lectures because he doesn't post anything online. Don't get the textbook, he has notes that he's written that you should buy. This was my hardest class.

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: Not easy to understand at all.

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: Let's just say... if you are taking PHY II with him then good luck...

Name: Andrzej Czajkowski
Review: Buckle up. This class is a rollercoaster.

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: I never took class with her but she is the lab coordinator. Orgo labs are a WASTE OF MY LIFE :(

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: Do yourself a favour and take a French class so you can enrol in the French stream with St-Amant

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: speechless

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: Not my prof but she was my lab coordinator. PRAY TO GOD that you have a good TA. These labs are ridiculous and so time consuming. They have barely anything to do with class material. The three hour lab sessions are a literal headache and they do not show students how working in a real lab in the future will actually be like. Major updates required!

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: Did not have her as a prof but she was the lab coordinator. Labs are elaborate and almost always taking more than the 3 hours allocated. Most of the labs are unrelated to the course material. Lab reports were only worth about 1% each of the course mark but was a lot of work and effort to complete.

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: Didn't actually teach. We were expected to teach ourselves the material outside of class and she would just go over examples in the lecture. Textbook is necessary since it is the only way to actually learn the material. Avoid if possible.

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: Way too much work given for lab reports...

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: People give Rashmi a hard time. She's not a terrible prof, though she does get side-tracked a lot. The class is pretty much all review from grade 11 and 12, so if you put the time in and do practice problems, you shouldn't have too much of a hard time. TAs often miss stuff when marking so bring your tests to her (my mark went up like 20% on one).

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: OPT OUT OF SAPLING. sapling did not help my grade whatsoever and it has questions totally unrelated to what you learn. Please, I'm trying to save you, opt out. Other than that shes a good prof, follow the previous year midterms and you're set.

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: She was a nice person, and gave us all her previous years tests plus the solutions. If you do past exams and midterms, her questions are almost exactly the same with new numbers. As for teaching, she does very simple problems in class that don't help. The online stuff takes more time than its worth, so definitely OPT OUT OF SAPLING!!! I wish I had!

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: Rashmi is kind, but also very disorganized. Her tests can be hard for those with less knowledge of chemistry. Labs are a pain to do, pray for a good TA. Opt OUT of all the extra hw as it's a MAJOR waste of money and time. She is accessible to negotiate test scores, however is very stubborn in giving you any marks you deserve. Would not recommend.

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: Really nice lady as a person, but as a teacher she is very disorganized. We did not finish 4 chapters by the finals and had to learn them ourselves. She records all of her lectures and posts them online, so if you skip a lot you can still get the material. Some pop quizzes on Reef through the course. Grade comes from online homework, labs and exams

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: if you want to save your marks and time opt out of everything including the online textbook its doesn't help at all , attend HER discussion groups instead of lectures since that's where she actually solves problems instead of uselessly rambling off. if you want to do good practice all of her past exams and make sure you understand those concepts

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: She was very caring and she wanted everybody to succeed, but she could not get through the material because she wasted time with stuff like purple mules, she explained why molar masses have decimals, why concentration can't be negative... we had way more sapling homeworks than other classes. make sure you are not in a class with 1301 people.

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: Dr. Rashmi is a very nice woman and she's a lenient marker. However, I found her lectures to be a bit slow and we were quite behind near the end of the semester. Also, there were 3 online homework which do boost your mark but can become tedious, especially since you have to pay. I mainly taught myself the content and did fine overall. Not good/bad

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: Rashmi does not teach anything. Everyone in the class shouldve gotten an A+ for teaching themselves the entire course. She is very unorganized and does not finish the lectures on time. We learned every chapter AFTER doing the lab so we had no clue during the lab. I would rather drop out of uni than ever take her again.

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: She wants everyone to succeed but will not bump your grade. you have to work for the grades you recieve. it is hit or miss whether the practice midterms online actually help with the midterms. Labs are easy and would suggest sapling/clicker/connect because it is good marks just takes a little while to complete.

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: Rashmi is brilliant and obviously genuinely cares about the success of her students. Exams are tricky but if you practice and master each type of problem you will be fine. She is always be readily available to help you with whatever problems you have in the course.

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: Rashmi goes through content at a very fair pace. She is a decent professor who knows her stuff. If you ever have her for chemistry, MAKE SURE you opt out of sapling online homework. It is NOT worth the amount of time it takes out of your life.

Name: Rashmi Venkateswaran
Review: thats about it

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: There is a course pak to buy at Rytek; Course outline is available in there at the front page. Readings are in sequence w the weekly progression- prof may be slow in lectures and speed through. ** To be successful in this class, do readings for discussion groups, don't focus on the quotes/etc. in slides- only the key components*

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: His lectures are dry, but if you can listen they are interesting. Other reviews are right that he has strong opinons, but its actual useful as it challenged my own ideas. Super friendly and kind outside of class and very helpful with any questions you may have.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: Loved taking intro politics with Dr. Grouev. He is truly a thought-provoking professor. Some people say that he only wants you to write papers that reflect his opinion - but that is absolutely not true! He is hilarious, very intelligent, and the grading is clear and fair. Absolutely recommended.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: He is a good prof. Those who are in disagreement with him shall look upon his biography and read some of his work. He has steady political opinion and not afraid to state it. Today it is an extremely valuable quality. He just try to make you think, not to repeat a generally accepted ideas.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: Lectures are very boring. He regularly has to stop, saying "actually, is anyone listening to me? OK laptops off". Discussion groups with the TA is fine though, but make sure you read the book before. The tests themselves have almost nothing to do with lecture content. Could probably just skip everything if you took politics in high school.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: Lectures don't make sense. He's extremely critical of all students & their opinions, and if you say something he disagrees with he's very rude.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: I've taken four courses with professor Grouev and would recommend them to anyone interested in international relations. I've learned more from this professor than any other at uOttawa. Expect to read and write lots, and study lots for the exams.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: Would ask for your opinion on a topic and then break down every reason your opinion is wrong. Lectures can be hard to follow and found powerpoints hard to read and too text heavy.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: Does not teach, just pushes his ideology. I didn't spend thousands of dollars to be indoctrinated.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: He does not teach. Claims to be "politically correct" but that's his term for exposing that America is taking over the world. Course is anti-capitalism, anti-globalization, anti-American. If you are a Communist then you will love this course. He puts on documentaries and anything he says does not make sense. Also has specific answers he looks for.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: I know he seems a bit mean, but he's actually not that bad. The readings are a lot but they are quite interesting. The exams are not tough, he basically gives the class a good idea of what to study.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: Your opinion in this class is irrelevant. His is the only one that matters.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: Not a particularly engaging prof. Furthermore, his personal beliefs bleed through in his teaching. But, if you do the readings, you will be more than fine on the exams.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: This guy is truly a gem at the university. As a prof, like "to teach", h is actually belw average. You can skip most of his classes and readings and still succeed relatively well. But what's great is he has the biggest balls of any poli sci prof. He goes where other dare not. That alone is 5/5 for me.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: Students in my class made these "I got an A" comments, before the semester was over. What does that tell you? that yes, he does have favourites. He's condescending when you go talk to him one on one and can be very rude. He gave me a poor mark on a summary we had to write because my opinion was different than his, not a joke. (i have two degrees).

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: Easy A class/Prof ! He gave us the MT and final questions in advance. 10 page critical essay on an entire book but it was easy to write. Accessible outside of class. 2 DGDs but his opinion is kinda biased and imposed on you. I never went to class and did well! Notes are all online. Don't by the course-pack, you're only gonna use twice. Good prof!

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: Professor Grouev is an amazing professor who is kind, knowledgeable, caring, understanding and genuinely wants his students to do well. I recommend him to anyone who is interested in Politics and Globalization, is looking an interesting elective or who wants a straightforward course. Also, he gives you a very accurate idea of how exams will be :)

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: He is very opinionated, not always accurate in the sense that he will only tell you half the truth around a specific topic. He is hillarious but this seemingly positive aspect is overshadowed by his bad manners. Be prepared to be lessened by the teacher whenever you give an answer . He is also understanding if you get to know him .

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: Easily the best professor I've ever had at uOttawa. Not an easy A by any means, his tests are solely long answer/ essay questions based pretty much entirely off of the course pack readings. He cares about his students very much and if you put in the effort and see him after class you WILL do well.

Name: Ivaylo Grouev
Review: I personally found the material interesting but his teaching style did not suit me. He lost my paper! he gives hints for exams in class. He is brutal in DGDs and hardly lets students speak.

Name: David Gray
Review: Best prof I have had at Ottawa. He genuinely cares about his students, if any mistakes are made on midterm or exam questions he gives everyone perfect on the question. Great guy.

Name: David Gray
Review: He's honestly one of the funniest and quirkiest professors you'll ever have. He also knows his stuff. You better not just memorize, you gotta understand concepts as his midterms are all short answer. You have to practice connecting concepts and thinking about why they are useful, etc. Love you, David lol

Name: David Gray
Review: I will admit I had a difficult time attending his lectures. Hes hard to listen to and doesnt let you leave early. Having said that, he posts everything you could possibly need on brightspace. Hes very fair when it comes to grading and his assignments arent hard. I rarely went to class and got a B. Read his musings! Theyre basically the lecture

Name: David Gray
Review: Get this man a raise. Golden professor of uOttawa.

Name: David Gray
Review: Prof. Gray is a really impressive person and he makes hilarious jokes in class, as well as connects economics to daily life in a comprehensible way. However, his lecture slides are very difficult to understand, which made it really hard for me (as someone who hates & struggles with math) to keep up.

Name: David Gray
Review: Really great professor! Super tough class for me, but 100% worth it because I understand the concepts really well now. Excellent lecturer who explains concepts slowly. If taking ECO1104, take his class!

Name: David Gray
Review: very caring and entertaining prof, but it can be easy to zone out sometimes. midterms are fair, connect assignments will save ur life (worth 20% and u can do them w other ppl) but his final was VERY HARD. study in advance, read his musings and do the practice final because that exam was no joke! Regardless, hes the better choice for an econ prof

Name: David Gray
Review: I personally didn't like his teaching style, though it was hard to pay attention. His slides are really hard to understand. He offered to regrade anybody's exam if they thought they deserved more marks. Study the past exams that he posts on brightspace! He reuses some questions. His final was tough, study hard for it. He's the better ECO prof there

Name: David Gray
Review: I am so sad to say that I have finished all of my first year classes that I could have possibly taken and can no longer take any more with him. Professor Gray is quite possibly the most entertaining and caring professors I have ever had. I hope he never changes! You rock Gray, keep being you

Name: David Gray
Review: Best prof I have ever had. I'll remember this guy forever. Such a nice guy and basically gives away marks if you show up and work hard.

Name: David Gray
Review: Dr. Gray is quite innovative in teaching style and keeps attention during lectures. His expectations are very clear and has many resources/material available for students. He is great help outside of class and is ver clear on what to expect for midterms/papers (history of econ thought)/exams. I would recommend him to anyone in economics.

Name: David Gray
Review: David Gray is a fantastic professor. Easily the most dedicated, above-and-beyond, passionate lecturer and by far the best you can do in first year business economics courses. He has awesome materials online; make sure to attend the lectures because he places HUGE emphasis on important topics. Read his musings, do the previous midterms, get an A!

Name: David Gray
Review: I loved his lectures. He is a brilliant man and changed my way of thinking. The Aplia quizzes really help you stay on top of things and study. Plus they are relatively easy marks. He is definitely accessible in office hours outside of class and is also willing to answer questions in class. He even holds review sessions before exams. He's great!!

Name: David Gray
Review: Professor Gray is absolutely amazing. His class is so funny and clear that it is impossible for you to misunderstand something. Also, his midterm exams are very fair considering that past midterm exams are given. Generally, he is the best prof you can get in your first year.

Name: David Gray
Review: He is an great professor and knows a lot. However, he marks hard and wants good short answers with lots of examples. Never study from the Connect Assignments, do all textbook questions. If you do that you can get an solid 70%.

Name: David Gray
Review: Genuinely cares about his students, always holds extra sessions or office hours, clearly passionate about his field of study, very entertaining, methodological in his teaching technique. I intentionally try to take his classes he's the best!

Name: David Gray
Review: If every prof can teach like prof Gray, then I would like to study for 23 hours with only 1 hour to sleep.

Name: David Gray
Review: just avoid

Name: David Gray
Review: He has an 'interesting' way to talking but he's a solid prof, would definitely recommend him! His midterms are all short answer and they're really not that hard if you understand the concepts. The fall 2018 textbook was really good, it easy to understand and 'fun' to read plus the Connect weekly assignments are really going to boost your mark.

Name: David Gray
Review: Crazy at times but keeps things lively in the classroom most of the time.

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: The best prof ever! If you're in her class, you will NOT fail! She's extremely clear about her expectation, and she's really good at explaining. Her Midterms were easy and expected, and the final was pretty fair.

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: TAKE IF YOU CAN. You will get an A even if you suck at math. Just go to the lectures. She hand writes the notes with you and is always ready to answer every question to make sure EVERYONE understands every math lesson. She is super sweet and loving and makes hilarious jokes. VERY EASY GRADER. She will give you marks if you write something

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: Sweetest professor you will have! She writes her notes in class and posts them online afterwards. If you have a question, she will gladly answer it without hesitation. Easies midterms, very hard to fail. Prepares you well for the final.

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: Probably the best teacher i've ever had! Really concerned with students, and always ask if we have any questions. Material is not that hard, and she try her best to make it as easy as possible. I would definitely take this teacher again in any maths class I have! Take it if you can !

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: Good at explaining, but she is annoying. I remember raising my hand and she made eye contact and ignored me. Another person puts there hand up right away and she answers them and they had the same question.

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: Termeh is one of the best professors at the university of Ottawa. She makes the course fun for her students, and is always there to support her students in anyway possible.

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: I am so bad at math and was nervous for this course but she made the material very clear and it turned out to be great!

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: She is really a good professor, highly recommended!!! funny classes and funny professor!!

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: Basically, she tells you whats on the tests just with different numbers. No textbook required just show up for lectures and DGD and your pretty much set. Very nice prof and cares about her students.

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: BEST MATH COURSE I HAVE EVER TAKEN IN MY ENTIRE LIFE. Termeh is such a genuine person and does nothing but care about her students. She is a wonderful teacher who takes time out of her own life to help students with what isn't clear. Exams are very clear, unintimidating, and very reflective of the course materials.

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: Great prof! Her explanations make the course so easy. She posts all the notes online but you need also to attend the lecture if you want to get a good grade. Easy assignments.

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: Great prof! Funny and really cares about her students. Lectures are content-heavy but easy material and easy to follow- I would probably attend even though she posts notes online. Exams are good, she gives an exact format practice copy beforehand so you know what to expect! Easy A and enjoyable too

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: Such a great prof - her expectations are very clear, and the exams don't deviate from class examples/homework assignments. Her notes might be a little bit difficult to follow if you don't go to class, but the material is really straight forward. Beyond all this, it is so clear that she wants everyone to succeed and she will help in any way she can!

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: She is an amazing prof!!! Her lectures are very clear and she does a review at the beginning of every class which was the best. She also gives you a sample midterm/exam. You need the textbook to do assignment. If you're stuck with the assignment go to the help centre they give you answers.

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: Awesome prof! You don't have to attend the lectures but she explains really well. The HW might be a little tough. Do ALL the online bank questions, that's where she gets her exam questions. Midterm was straightforward. If your final mark is higher than the midterm, the weight will be shifted over so you will get the highest mark possible.10/10 prof

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: yes. every character you want in a prof.

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: Really great person and informative lecture that allowed for easy interaction with the awkward atmosphere that is a giant cluster of university students. Though I may have learned this material before in high school, I appreciate the effort, openness and interactivity that the prof provided to the students paying attention to the course.

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: One of the best classes I have ever taken. Termeh is honestly the most caring prof I've had. She really prepares you for her exams as long as you put in the work. She tells you exactly what will be on tests and final. Long as you pay attention and look over previous years exams, easy A. She also dropped lowest midterm. 10/10 would recommend

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: Termeh taught the course excellently. Really enjoyed her teaching style. Light hearted but focused, passionate about the course and willing to answer any questions and taught the material in a logical and informative manner. One of the best math classes I've ever had.

Name: Termeh Kousha
Review: What I enjoyed about this class is that the teacher was the best teacher I have ever had in my life. Prof Kousha was stimulating, engaging, provided clear explanations, and was always there for her students.
