Review: He breaks down the material in a digestible manner that leaves no ambiguities. It also helps to participate in this class. It helps crystallize the material. There are no surprises on assignments or exams. Doing the suggested exercises (highly recommended) are a great way to get prepared for exams. The final is airtight, but not impossible.

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: Wayne killed it every class! Kept our attention by asking lots of questions and calling on people by name!! Very energetic at 8:30am thanks to his Starbucks lol

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: Wayne is an great instructor. If you have questions he answers emails quickly. As well, he gives practice problems sheets which help with understanding the material. His lectures are a must. He really tries to make sure that people understand the material and has great review sessions before the midterm and final.

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: Honestly a awesome prof, he went beyond expected with emails to the point he would ask for pictures. Mostly a day before the exam, continually monitoring his email to assist students. The only downside is that he wont give you a little boost but I understand since hes got to be fair. Overall a great prof! Take him if your taking stats.

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: Best professor of all time.

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: Best prof I've ever. Makes sure you understand everything and doesn't hesitate to help you. His lectures are detailed and helpful.

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: He is the best prof I have ever had in Carleton so far. You should really take his class if you have chance, you will not regret it!

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: He had a really good way of captivating his audience. He also goes over material a second time if asked to. He loves to answer questions and help his students understand as much as possible!

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: Excellent prof, his lectures are well prepared, organized. Wayne is the kind of prof who will make you work a ton but will always be there for you when you need help. Exams were hard but fair.

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: Took STAT2607 with him. Yes, class is very hard (content wise), but Wayne tries his best to explain it clearly. Very accessible outside of the class, and very caring for students. I highly suggest taking courses with him, because you will actually learn stuff.

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: Professor Horn was my favourite prof so far in uni! i had him for linear algebra and he was an amazing teacher. i really enjoyed going to class and he made me really love algebra. i wasnt so good at math in high school but if you go to class, do the homework, and study the practices problems and tutorials youll get an easy A.

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: The Horn! Very highly recommended! Super helpful and respond frequently to everything! One just needs to output effort to do well. As long as you proceed with the material taught in class and take that into the exams, then you should do quite well! Also, the man introduced me to Suzy Q's!

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: Currently studying for finals, and I had a problem that I could not figure out. When I asked him for help he insisted I send him a picture of my work. Took the time to read all of what I had worked on for the question and helped me come to the right answer. Haven't had any other professor do something like this and it really made a difference.

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: HIGHLY recommend! He is an amazing professor at teaching with passions and positive energy ! The class is so interesting that you can learn a lot from the lecture, and they are almost based on the textbook. The assignments are challenging but the quizs and tests are all basic and easy-to-solve! The BEST prof that I have met in the math faculty!!!!!

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: Best Stats prof at Carleton by far. Prof. Horn cares for is students and has a passion for teaching stats. Assignments can be fairly tricky, but he is always available for help (via email or office hours). Test are fairly straight forward and are based on material learned (not super tricky stuff). HIGHLY, HIGHLY recommend taking a class with him.

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: I took Dr. Horn's online Stat 2606 and 2607 classes. Along with Dr. Farrell, they provide amazing videos for you to watch on your own time. Dr. Horn was always available for help outside of class and responds quickly to emails. The videos are quite entertaining and funny. If you take the class as a lecture, make sure you don't use technology!

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: Good guy. Knows his stuff and is always encouraging students to reach out if they are struggling. That being said, both the midterm and the final needed to be curved which I don't thin should happen. It was either too hard or we weren't taught it well enough (if that many people failed both).

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: Very good professor who makes the course material fun. I have had him for 3 semesters and I don't regret it. However, despite is amazing teaching style, he is probably the most passive aggressive professors i have ever met and makes him unapproachable outside of class. That being said, he really cares about his lectures and I would recommend him

Name: Wayne Horn
Review: Wayne is my favourite prof so far! I loved his lectures he really made sure he explained things clearly and went into detail when needed. it's clear he loves teaching and he is so great at it! Would 100000% take a course with him again!!

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: Enjoyed the fact that he would show us documentaries, but if you're the type of person to skip class I wouldn't recommend it. Seems to talk about his personal life and goes off track about the lecture. If you don't like 12 page essays and 6 questions finals this is not the class for you. I didn't mind him but at the same time he wasn't the best .

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: The worst professor I have ever had. Spends his entire class talking about how much he hates the RCMP and OPS. He lectures about his opinions only and just thinking about going to his class puts me in a bad mood. Exam is easy but paper grading is extremely inconsistent. AVOID AT ALL COSTS IF POSSIBLE.

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: Although at times I find he can be overly critical of policing, overall he makes good points in regard to police corruption and he definitely knows his stuff. I'd recommend getting the textbook as the final exam uses theories from it. Interesting class overall and if you're looking to challenge yourself I'd definitely recommend it.

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: He talks a lot....... better listen or you'll miss half the testable lecture.

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: Davies is a great prof. He brings attention to real issues within our criminal justice system, and does a great job teaching. Doesn't post lecture slides so you have to attend class, but if you go to every class and take good notes you will do fine

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: He is a fantastic Prof, willing to help you and debate you. Extremely knowledgeable and respected. That said, his classes are tough, I retook both. Great Prof but try to schedule his classes during an easy term.

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: Professor Davies courses are as straight forward as it gets in regards to post secondary academia. Unfortunately hell be missed on his 1 year LOA. I highly recommend to everyone who has an option of taking his classes from Fall 2020 onward, register quickly before you miss a extraordinary chance. 5/5 professors are hard to come by.

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: Darryl was very well versed in the topic of criminology but he doesn't have lecture slides so you need to go to class, he speaks very fast and often goes off topic. Material in the textbook wasn't really covered in class so have to do the readings. Final was 6 long answer questions each 10% and was cumulative, midterm was a paper. Very stressful

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: He won't post his slides on CuLearn, so show up. Don't buy the textbook - you won't need it. Sure he talks about the RCMP a lot, but the reason why he hates them is because of sexual assaults that occur on the job, so at least he's raising awareness. Paper and exam were easy, literally just follow the outline.

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: Davies teaches maybe 20 minutes of content, plays a video, and spends the remainder of his 3 hour lectures ranting about his issues with RCMP and law enforcement. If you actually want to learn something during the course, stay as far away from Darryl Davies as possible. Guest lecture with Don Donovan, don't even bother attending.

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: the way he talks it feels like the course is an anti-rcmp course rather than a sociology of deviance thing. thanks for everything darryl

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: good guy

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: Professor seems more interested in showing how intelligent he is and how incompetent police are. Im not sure what to take from lecture, he mostely just goes on tangents about how he made the RCMP look foolish for wanting assault weapons or how his neighbours like to call the police. 3 hours is an awful long time to listen to his strong positions.

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: If you are sensitive then this is not your class, he will (rightfully) tear you apart if you try to dispute facts with your boo-hoo opinion. If you're a cop lover, this isn't your class. He talks about the facts and if you can't handle them then switch your program and stop being sensitive

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: No slides, he just lectures so class is mandatory. However, I have had him for 3 classes and his grading for essays and final exams stay consistent and very straight-forward. I really enjoyed learning from him, but I can see how some people do not like him.

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: I have come to realize that students either love or hate professor Davies. I absolutely adore him. His classes are so interesting - his view on crime and the way he teaches it is incomparable to anything I've ever learned before. He is one of the few professors that actually made me love my major and inspired me in the field of criminology.

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: Some people tend to get frustrated with him as he doesn't use slides or CUlearn but if you actually show up to class, pay attention and take good notes you will pass. His exams are worth 60% but they are very straightforward as there are no trick questions. Overall he is a great professor who is very passionate about the subjects he teaches.

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: Although I can understand why many people bash on Darryl, I think he's a great prof. Something I've picked up from taking a few classes with Darryl is take notes whenever he is standing at the podium/stand as it is hard to decipher between what is important or not as there are no powerpoints or Culearn for this course.

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: Also for SOCI2450. His lectures were interesting and covered the topics but with no powerpoint and no Culearn, it was difficult to decipher what was important lecture material and what was a tangent. He seemed to care more about showing the class compilations of his 5 minutes of fame doing tv interviews than answering questions regarding the exam

Name: Darryl Davies
Review: Interesting lecturer. Definitely do the readings, but he does a good job of covering the material. He refuses the use technology whenever possible, so lectures are mandatory because he does not post slides or anything online for students.

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: Worst professor I've had at Carleton. His slides? Useless. His lectures? Useless. DO. NOT. TAKE. A. CLASS. WITH. BRIAN. TANSLEY.

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: Sucks on candies while lecturing which is really irritating, especially for online students. Lectures aren't absolutely terrible but they are a pretty big waste of time considering that the final was impossible to do well on and the exams have nothing to do with the lectures. Extremely intelligent prof but horrible exams. Don't recommend this class

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: Midterm was fair but the final was ridiculous. The majority of the class failed the final exam worth 50%. If you don't have previous in-depth knowledge about neuroanatomy don't take this course. He taught WAYYY too much content to have a cumulative final exam. Had unrealistic expectations about how much students can remember...

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: I honestly think that that final was a joke. He gives everyone's grades on a document, so I can see how others did too and the amount of people who did well on the midterm and bombed the final is astounding. The worst prof I have ever had at Carleton, no psychology professor would release all the grades for everyone to see, goodbye GPA.

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: I can't say that attending his lectures is mandatory, because I did and took and used detailed notes, and that did diddly squat. Neither is reading and engaging in the two very expensive textbooks, because that too did nothing. Midterms are easy, the final was a joke. I left feeling okay having answered many questions with confidence, and got an F

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: Tansley knows his stuff - he's a walking encyclopedia. I didn't even crack open the textbook - just go to class. Midterm I found was easy. But that final was BRUTAL! I didn't even recognize some of the words on that final :S But something must have happened because I got a good grade. Only take if you need this class - otherwise avoid at all costs!

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: Agreeing with all of the previous comments, received 100% on the midterm and had the worst time writing the final, not sure how he gets away with giving students impossible finals. Everyone who considers the final to be 'good' has knowledge from other classes that they can apply. If you haven't learned neuroanatomy before this class.... STAY AWAY

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: Class is graded 50/50 with midterm and exam. Youll need to study hard, but focus on the review and youll be fine! Lots of opportunity for grades on both exams with extra questions! All questions get graded until they run out of questions or they hit 100%. Not difficult to get a good grade if you work for it!

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: Slides are horrible. Lectures are horrible. His classes are both an easy A+ and an easy fail. Beware.

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: Awful teacher. Extremely unorganized slides, some with no explanations or captions, skips over many, different version shown in class versus what is posted on cuLearn. Goes off on tangents all the time. He chews/sucks on lozenges or candies of some sort and if you are in the online version you can hear all the sucking/swallowing which is irritating

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: I never thought i'd say that a prof genuinely is setting you up to fail; but he does exactly that. Be careful taking any of his courses.

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: Hes not a bad professors, he knows the material very well. The thing is he gets carried away and goes into these long unnecassary tangents. He expects u to know alot for his exams, the good thing is that the test format isnt hard. What i didnt like was when he said we had to do a essay worth 15% but didnt give clear enough instructions.

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: He made many sex jokes, did not deliver info in a clear concise way, went off on tangents, and spent 3 classes on 1 lecture. I got 100% on the midterm easily, but if I had not dedicated a whole week on JUST HIS course I would have failed the final. He sets up the final to make you fail. I've taken science courses before but this is just horrible.

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: In lectures he talks about so many things that are maybe vaguely related to the slides. He expects students to do way too much for his courses (you should literally dedicate a whole week to study for his tests). He absolutely WILL destroy you in the final. Take his classes if you don't care about your GPA or getting a credit.

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: Got 100% on the midterm, failed the final. Asks to know too much specific information for the final. Terrible teacher. Terrible exams.

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: High expectations. Must know very particular details about the brain. Make sure to read the chapters multiple times if you want to have a chance to pass this class.

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: This course has A LOT of content and if you have never taken a neuroscience course before, you're signing a death certificate. I studied his material and got 100% on the midterm, I studied his material again for the final but the only reason I got a good mark was because of the NEUR2201 material I studied for another final. He's very misleading

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: Ive taken three different classes with Tansley. His tests are ridiculous, some questions seem to be about another class altogether and some he asks twice in the same test. The way he grades makes it easy to get an A+ but steer clear if you actually want to learn. The guy is a wack-job.

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: I have to agree with the rest of the comments here. Professor Tansley has very unrealistic expectations for how much time students should be spending on his class. There is so much material in this course and a ton of memorization. If you're taking this class DO THE COLOURING BOOK!!!!! It saved me.

Name: Brian Tansley
Review: He is a great and respected professor. This class may be a little difficult, but it no harder than other science classes. An A+ is perfectly manageable if you spend your time wisely and actually study! A 50% final and 50% midterm isn't for some people, but if you're good at memorizing and want to avoid useless fluff assignments, it's a godsend!

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Bob Burk's lectures are very short, doesn't explain the main concepts and HOW he does his work. He just says"you do this then this blah blah".For a decent grade you must read the whole textbook. I studied a month before the exam,it was nothing that we were told to study for. The new online system is terrible, I would not recommend taking this class

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Lots of content in course over exams and homework. Labs are easy if you follow marking scheme and read TA comments. Exams are very difficult. get grades where you can with labs and homework

Name: Bob Burk
Review: He's by far my favorite! Really made my 1st year of university experience worth while and he made me even more interested in Chemistry. His exams are fair, assignments are long but they force you to read the textbook so you get more practice from it. He gives students a lot of opportunities to do very well. Keep practicing and always ask questions!

Name: Bob Burk
Review: If you are willing to put the work, time and effort in, a good mark isn't hard to get. Bob puts past exams and midterms for both courses on CuLearn and they're great to use as study tools, however you can't only study off of them. Overall he's a pretty fair prof and you know what to expect from him, labs aren't too hard and help your mark out alot.

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Able to succeed well in the class if you stick to doing the previous midterms and exams he posts. Good to go to class but rarely used my notes for midterms. Lab portion sucks !

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Really wants his students to succeed and will help with any questions you have. His lectures are great and he explains concepts very thoroughly and easy to understand. I failed this class first time around in summer with a different prof but ended up with a decent grade with Bob. Helps that he wrote the textbook too - he really knows his stuff.

Name: Bob Burk
Review: He is a great teacher. The tutorials are the pretty importnant and the most helpful for exams and tests. His tests and exams are conceptual so if you don't understand and just meorize you will do poorly. Also, he gives you past exams and midterms which I studied for the final exam last semester and I got an A on the exam and an A+ in the course.

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Bob is the greatest man to have ever walked on this planet, let me tell you. His teaching is very straightforward and as long as you come to class, do lots of practice and do your homework, you'll do well. He's such a nice guy and will answer any questions you have after class or in his office. Also super approachable (and hilarious).

Name: Bob Burk
Review: He really know's what he is doing, his lectures are very interesting he gives opportunities to get extra marks, Although he assignments can be very long they really help to understand the course material, He is also accessible outside class easy to approach and very nice You would honestly enjoy this course

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Bob is an amazing prof he is really funny and answers all your questions in a nice manner He does give a lot of homework but the marks you get from it will be good He gives you opportunity to get bonus marks in the course Overall he is an amazing prof.

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Bob is the best

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Very good lecturer, explains concepts with absolute clearity. He has a very good course layout where homework, lectures, and labs are integrated together. The course elements seemed to fit together well.

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Hilarious, friendly, knowledge, and a fair grader. What more could you want? Course covers a lot of material, so don't fall behind!

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Bob is a great professor who can explain first-year Chemistry clearly with some solid real examples. His class is hard and requires a lot of work to do well in.

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Really good prof, super funny and pretty nice. Watching (VOD) or going to class is a MUST but he'll re-explain stuff to you if you see him in his office. Bob's VERY big on textbook readings, lots of midterm and assignment questions come from the textbook

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Fair grader. He means what he says. He WILL NOT, under ANY circumstances, round your grade. If you get a 49.9% in the course, he WILL fail you. No exceptions.

Name: Bob Burk
Review: I LOVE Bob. He talks a little slow in real life but if you watch lectures on VOD you can put him at 1.5X speed. He gives you ALL the resources you need to ace his courses - from previous exams to tutorials to hallway sessions. Tutorials have almost all info/knowledge you'd need, I binged watched them before my exam and did great.

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Great prof! Explains things fairly thoroughly and is explicit about what you will need to know and what you won't. Gives many opportunities for bonus marks. Posts previous midterms/exams for practice and to give you an idea of his style. You definitely need to put in the work and ensure you do all online practice.

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Bob's really fun and encourages participation from the class with demonstrations and explosions. Gives you a lot of chances to earn marks, but you've got to work for them and remember them since there's two assignment's each week.

Name: Bob Burk
Review: Great professor to have in first year. He puts a lot of emphasis on the learning process and what you have to do to succeed. He makes you feel guilty when I wasn't on top of things, but as a first year student that's a good thing because it pushes you to get into good habits. His tests are challenging, but fair. Put in the work and you'll do well.

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Matt is hands down the best professor I have ever had. His grading criteria are clear and he always gives you the exam material so there are no surprises. He is extremely passionate about what he teaches and could keep a full lecture engaged for hours, although he never runs longer than an hour and a half (even in 3-hour lectures)! Best prof ever!!

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Amazing lectures and easy to succeed if you go to the classes

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Prof Bellamy IS AMAZING! His lectures are interesting, captivating, and easy to follow. He makes history so much fun to learn, and there is only 1 test and 1 exam. I WOULD 100% RECOMMEND TAKING THIS CLASS!!! He cuts class short but always covers the material necessary. Best prof ever.

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Best Prof I've ever had, makes history interesting and engaging. Tells you exactly what you need to do to succeed.

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Amazing prof. Doesn't keep class longer than an hour and a half, very fun classes. No assigned readings either, and his lectures are always informative and engaging. He is a very accommodating professor as well.

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Energetic, passionate and down-to-earth. He makes Canadian history fun and  worth while. He is the best, doesn't assign readings from a textbook, cuts class short and makes himself available for feedback. His lectures are the highlight of the week.

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: He makes history fun! If I'd received any other prof, there's no way this class would be as fun to go to as it is with him. His boisterous personality along with his passion for Canadian history has you laughing and enjoying the time spent in class each lecture!

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Matt is the greatest, coolest, funniest prof ever. There was no textbook, 1 essay, 1 test and 1 exam. You'll have to be sure to attend his class because there are no online slides or textbook but his lectures are short, engaging and funny. He is always available to help his students. His only downfall is he talks quickly but his classes end early.

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Took his first year Canadian history course and loved him so I took him again in second year. Similar course but centralized around a few different major topics. Only 1.5 hour lectures a week, no text books, no reading. He's a really good lecturer and knows everyone's names. Probably the best prof I've ever had.

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: THIS GUY IS AWESOME! I had to take a first year history as part of my program and Matt made it so much fun! He is so passionate and he really knows his stuff! Show up, take notes on what he blatantly tells you to and you will pass with flying colours! He's also really approachable in and outside of class for help with the major essay!

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Matt's an amazing prof! Was supposed to be a 3 hour lecture, but never lasted longer than an hour and a half. Makes learning about Canadian history fun by joking around, but is still very clear on the material. Acts as though he actually respects students. Only one essay and one test aside from the final exam, which made it harder to balance marks.

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Matt's lectures are always around an hour, but he talks so fast they seem to go by even faster! The lecture info sheets/maps are super helpful. He gives you his cell # at the beginning of the year (always open to giving help). His anecdotes about history make the class so cool (even if you don't like history).  You can tell he loves what he teaches

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: The best prof/teacher I have ever had. His lectures are only 1 hour and the whole hour is extremely interesting. He's super funny and tells amazing stories about really boring topics. He's also super helpful and is only a text away (he gives you his cell number). If you talk to him he'll give you great feedback and bump your mark sometimes.

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Matt is an amazing prof and and even better person. His lectures are short and to the point, but full of memorable stories and you learn a lot. Bonus: never uses a textbook! My electives are precious but I'd use them all on him in a heartbeat!

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Best prof I've ever had! Amazing lectures, knows everything he's teaching in detail and can make it interesting. Shortens the lecture every class but you'll still leave having learnt more than in any other class. Easy A as long as you attend class, very fair marker. Very charismatic and super hot 3

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: This guy is such a beauty. If I could take all my classes with Matt Bellamy, then I would. He brings a topic like Canadian history to life. I don't know anyone who could make something that is seen as stereotypically boring into an exciting series of lectures.

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Professor Bellamy charges everything he does with the breath of his own spirit, this makes him bring history to life. And when we bring history to life, when we study it as a story instead of events, it makes it easier to learn.

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Never have I been so thankful to have an incredible prof like Bellamy. He made boring Canadian History a lot more interesting than I expected. Only one midterm test, an essay outline, a 12-page essay and a final exam was required, so workload was hardly an issue. If you have the opportunity to take this class, enjoy and take really good notes!

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: He's a fantastic lecturer - he does it all from memory, no PPTs. Very charismatic, and a fast speaker so class often ends an hour early. He gave me a 1-week extension due to an anxiety issue, and it saved my whole CGPA. Marks hard but fair  His Ph.D is in Canadian Beer History or something, so be prepared for beer-focused lectures once in a while

Name: Matt Bellamy
Review: Matt Bellamy has truly changed my perspective on history. Coming out of high school I had a growing hate for history and thought it was a waste of time to learn. But Matt truly changed my perspective. I smile every time I go to his class and I am proud to say that I really enjoy history and Matt has opened up my eyes to it.  p.s no readings!!!

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: Better than most people say she's, but not by much. Lectures are easy to follow and same with readings. She is very fast paced, intense, boarder line mean when people ask her questions. Her and her TAs are very hard markers and enjoy failing people. Teaches from a very liberal/anti-capitalistic POV which does effect how the class material is taught

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: Not my favourite. Very mean. This is a first year LAW class so should make students love it not hate it.

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: She literally took my phone away when it began ringing and answered it infront of the whole class. Turns out it was my mom, and what ensued was an embarassing conversation between her and JD. Never have I seen such unprofessionalism by a professor.

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: The textbook is hard to read, but should still be done. Great professor and really knows her stuff. She seems intense, but still really funny and wants you to do well. Things are marked by TAs and they're always willing to help.

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: I was extremely wary before attending her lectures because of everything I had read on here, however, I completely loved her lectures. Jane takes the time to really make the material digestible and easy to understand. The exams and assignments were very fair with no surprises. All in all, if you do the work and go to the lectures, you'll do great.

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: be ware, alot of people are clearly complaining for a reason. take it with another prof, unless u extremely have on choice, don't take her for any class

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: Extremely tough grader. Gave VERY low grades to intelligent and well-prepared students on final exam. . Not ideal for those applying to law school! Several students appealing grades. Answered all questions with detail and reference to her lecture + readings and still received an extremely low grade. Be cautious!

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: To pass her class you must go to the lectures! her exam was not hard and there was no surprises. as long as you studied your notes and lecture slides you are good. you do not even have to read the textbook but you must go to the lectures then because she explains more in detail. She is very knowledgeable and knows her stuff.

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: if I knew this website before hand, I would not have taken a class with her.. make use of ur resources. to avoid professors like her

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: This was one of my lowest grades.. and I worked very hard. her name describes her. she knows her stuff tho.. just shouldn't be teaching.

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: Really enjoyed her class. I am a science student and took Laws 1001 as an elective. You really need to understand the content and how it relates to the material in other sections of this course, regurgitating whats on the slides will give you a pass but not much more.

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: Was rude and entered too much propaganda into her lecturers. Also marked very hard, would not take her class again.

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: 100% would never take another class with this prof. If you want to take a class to learn about law as I did, you're not going to learn much about it from her. Virtually all of her lectures are hyperfocused on racism, sexism and Marxism. She seems to want to use her class to push her own politics on students instead of teaching them law.

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: ALL AOUND BRUTAL :( DON''T TAKE :( TAKE THE CLASS WITH SEBASTIEN!!!! :)

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: I had her for law 1001 & 1002. In the first lecture she acts slightly rude and sarcastic which can be offputting, however she is hilarious and her lectures are awesome. Theres 2 papers and a final. The final is extremely fair and there are no surprises. If you know the slides and lectures you will pass easily. Exam also has 5 give me bonus Qs

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: Honestly, if you fail this class you need to reconsider your priorities. ANY course requires reading and your full attention- reading how this class was "too tough" doesn't make sense. You literally will pass if you just do the slides and go over her lectures (through vod/notes)she's awesome and is huge about social issues. Best. Prof. hands down.

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: Best class ive taken at carleton. i did it in the summer and watched her lectures through VOD she was so interesting to learn from and great at explaining. Powerpoints were clear and you could pass from just watching lecs and reading slides but she makes you want to get a good grade and material is interesting. overall A+ prof.

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: Jane is a great prof ! Her exams are fair you won't find things that haven't been taught on there Her slides are very useful and filed with content that's relevant and makes things easier to understand. I personally didn't do the readings however she sometimes gives brief summaries of the readings in class .

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: Great prof with a lot of insight on the field outside of school.

Name: Jane Dickson
Review: The professor has an agenda of her own and expects the students to replicate her ideology in their assignments. If you do not follow this then expect your grade to be deplorable. I did reach out with questions but they went unanswered, maybe she felt they were beneath her intelligence.

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: Lots of quizzes, but easy enough to pass them. The teacher gives fair marking parameters to work with. You can attain an average grade between 60%-80%. The prof is easy-going. The bad reviews are not true. If you don't study then maybe you have a chance of getting a poor grade. Just listen in class and you will pass.

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: Kim is so caring about her students and ensures that the material is understood in order to succeed. If you attend her lectures, pay attention and take notes, you'll have a very positive experience. She teaches from the textbook as well but still make sure to read!

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: Perfect blend of fun/nice and knowledgeable/professional. A great prof, highly recommend. Marking scheme is pretty typical for PSYC courses, but the fact that it's not 100% tests is a nice change.

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: I did psyc1001 with her and she really simplified the material so the textbook was practically useless because it went into way more depth than she did and we didn't need to know it. she had 2 midterm (both pretty straighforward and mc), an in class assignment (it's the equivalent of a g5 reading comprehension so easy marks) and a hard mc exam

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: Average class, average teacher. If you like to read the textbook you don't really need to attend class. She likes to give some facts/stats in class that aren't in the textbook but are in the exam. She clearly knows her stuff she's just not very organized.

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: I took her 2100 social psychology class and it was pretty easy! All you had to do was attend class. The book isn't mandatory. I only skimmed through the book sometimes and got an A+ ! Definitely would recommend taking PSYC 2100 with her!

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: Took an intro class with her at MSVU. Nice person, not a great teacher. She gave no feedback on assignments, difficult grader, lectures were heavy and directly from the text. Overall, made an already confusing topic even more confusing.

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: Not a big fan of Professor O'Neil's teaching style. Very friendly, kind and funny woman but not a great teacher. I felt as if we had an In-Class activity (which is basically a quiz) every class. The activities were always done before she lectured on the topic. Her lectures were straight from textbook, not helpful.

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: Shes a very caring and nice professor. Her lectures were purely based on the textbook, so if you showed up to all lectures reading the text book wasnt even really necessary. Shes engaging and overall very knowledgable.

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: Gives a large list of things to study for the final, not even a quarter of them were on. Class is boring, however she does post the slides at least. Seems nice but wouldnt recommend.

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: She is a nice person but not the best prof. Her lectures were very boring but she had good power point slides. The class average was very low and gave us no room for improvement. Her exams are hard!

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: I hated that class. Its generally really easy and we have all learned it, however.. during her slides, she would skip ahead and then come back frequently. I also found that she would over explain something, or explain it differently and it would confuse the class even more. Definitely read the textbook.

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: The average of both her classes was 60% (Midterm). She also proceeded to say that if we had done all we possibly could to study but still performed poorly, it might be test anxiety - interesting. Found her hard to follow as she goes back and forth in her slides.

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: Worst prof I've ever had at Carleton. The textbook used is dumbed down so much that elementary school kids could understand. Dumbs down actual terminology to a layman term (fear of big words?). I learned more about research methods from my other classes then i ever would have in this class. Take it if you need an easy A without using your brain

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: The in class assignment is considered a "grade booster" but only if you're good at analyzing things, Multiple choice midterm and final. Good anecdotes throughout her lectures, make the 3 hours a little less terrible. Lots of videos but the content from videos isn't tested so it breaks up class as well.

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: Restates the slides usually, but adds important info when needed. Also gives lots of hints and points to areas to read in the textbook, so you don't have to read as much. Good teacher.

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: Make sure to read textbook thoroughly.

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: Make sure you study REALLY hard for her exams if you want an A- or above. She asks a lot of extremely specific questions in her exams. Pay very close attention to everything you read in the book . Also look at her lecture slides. That's very important too. They may have small bits of information which you may not have noticed while reading the book

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: midterm worth 40% and final worth 45%, so its probably a good idea to study as you go. Cramming wont work

Name: Kim O'Neil
Review: The prof is tough. but the big issue is with the material a lot of information to study .. getting a good mark in this course is impossible

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: I've been at Carleton for 4 years and he is by far the best professor I've had. I used the textbook so much and it paid off in then end. Go to his office hours and watch his online office hours before the tests. Over all, he is amazing, I highly recommend him!

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: I love Angelo! So fun, so nice. He always offers geometric/conceptual explanations of the ideas which is great. If you have a problem he will make sure you understand. You can get by without the text for 2004 at least, as he posts practice tests and everything can be googled nowadays.

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: Professor Mingarelli is one of the best lecturers I've ever had. He holds virtual office hours before each test and gives clear instruction on what will be tested. He is extremely dedicated and respects his students. The only flaw I could possible point towards Mingarelli is that he pushes his textbook a little bit. I would highly recommend. Cheers

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: His lectures are really fast but he knows the material. Really nice guy and boosts you on the final as well. Would recommend taking him as his tests and grading of the final is much easier than the other profs.

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: Mingarelli has been my favourite professor Ive had. MATH 2004 is tough and he teaches really fast, but his lectures are really interesting and he knows his stuff really well. Writes a nasty exam but its not impossible if you do well throughout the semester.

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: I honestly love Professor Mingarelli with all my heart. His lectures are such a joy to attend. I don't ever think I'll have such a warm and kind-hearted professor like him again. He's hilarious and so caring. He keeps the course interesting and is amazing at explaining the subject in a beautifully intuitive way. He's really one of a kind!!

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: Don't let his age fools you, there's a child inside Prof. Mingarellyi's heart. He shows a very good understanding of what he's teaching and curious about everything. He's running coffee in his veins, and his mind is controlled by aliens (If you had him you'll understand). One of the best professor I've seen so far. Oh, and don't forget the D Box!

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: Ive taken two calculus courses at Carleton before this, plus three calculus courses in high school. Nobody compares to Professor Mingarelli. Ive never had a professor so good at teaching in my life. If you have a question, hell answer it and he explains everything extremely well. His sense of humour is great as well.

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: Very average. He posted all his notes online, and the final used questions identical to old finals. Very straight forward course that I did not attend and did well in.

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: A real gem. His stories alone are enough to encourage me to get up for his 8 am class. He is proof heavy which worked wonders for me, but not all people learn the same way. He focuses a lot on the comprehension of the core concepts rather than just laying them bare. Get him coffee! A small black from Timmie's is good...

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: Angelo is one of those proffs that can be hard to keep up with. Sometimes he goes too fast with the subject and he can be a little confusing with his "boxes". However if you study enough and understand the subject well you will never have trouble with calculus again. Plus, his stories are just hilarious!!! You can download the book for this course.

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: He is really good!!

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: Angelo Mingarelli was one of the most amazing professors I have ever had. He is excellent at explaining topics and answering questions. He creates unique methods of solving problems  and memorizing concepts. I really appreciated his incredible stories which made it worth attending lectures, though they were essentially the textbook read to us.

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: Possibly my favourite professor I have had so far. As a first year student, I looked forward to going to his lectures. The course was not terribly challenging, (my friends beg to differ), but he made it look fun, (that we can agree on). Also stay for the entire lecture, when he tells hilarious stories. Also bring him coffee, he loves that.

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: The best prof ever. So smart. Very there for you. Very very very interesting lectures. To conclude, he is the best.

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: awesome

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: good teacher!

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: A great prof! Tests are very similar to the old ones posted online, along with the exam. Super hilarious prof! He will most likely say the word "COFFEE" in every lecture. You can get away by doing great in the class by not going to the lectures as the content from the book is pretty straight to follow.

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: A great prof! Tests are very similar to the old ones posted online, along with the exam. Super hilarious prof! COFFEE AND ALIENS!!! He will most likely say the word "COFFEE" in every lecture.

Name: Angelo Mingarelli
Review: Great, funny prof. Tests are fair. I suggest reading the textbook and attempting questions before going to the lectures so that the lectures are a useful review, because much of what he does is work through examples.   First half of course covers grade 12 calculus, second half integrals.

Name: Sam Dube
Review: Funny guy, but there was really no structure to the course, although this could potentially be due to the fact that this is the first time it's being offered. Goes on rants about MMA fighting, hard to tell what's actually relevant and isn't, and lets students text him if they need to get into contact with him. It was fun.

Name: Sam Dube
Review: Was not the prof but ran help classes on the side for student. 100% worth it. Amazing person and great prof. Makes sure you understand concepts, lots of examples, personable and helpful.

Name: Sam Dube
Review: Awesome person and a great teacher! respected.

Name: Sam Dube
Review: If you can get Prof Dube as your prof, DO SO! He simplifies difficult concepts and makes calculus interesting even early in the morning. He was always available outside of class to help. His lectures are fun, yes fun, because he is clear, funny and never makes you feel dumb even if you have a simple question. Prof Dube will always be my favourite.

Name: Sam Dube
Review: Formula for success=write some notes on theories that confuse everyone and you yourself barely have a good grasp on, give LOTS of examples to alleviate confusion, tell dumb jokes about your engineering wannabe days to distract students, give tests that are EXACTLY the same as examples, everyone gets A+, be showered with praise and bask in the glory

Name: Sam Dube
Review: Dube style: write some theories you have no deep understanding of, put 50 examples, tell lame stories, give tests and exams that are EXACTLY the same as the examples, --> A+ for everyone --> awesome reviews.  Meanwhile, nobody cares that they learn nothing from his courses , or the fact that he is an engineering dropout and got his Ph.D in 2007.

Name: Sam Dube
Review: One of the best profs at CU

Name: Sam Dube
Review: Great teacher, had a way of explaining things that anyone could understand. Had a unique way of keeping students interested in the class. (even though (Sorry Sam) Math is not a fun course)

Name: Sam Dube
Review: Very good teacher ;)

Name: Sam Dube
Review: this dude is awesome

Name: Sam Dube
Review: Really cares about his students and about what he does in class.  Probably the best prof. in all of Carleton!!! Every chance I get to have him teach me, I take it!

Name: Sam Dube
Review: No Comments

Name: Sam Dube
Review: Took 2 classes with him. His is one of the best profs Carleton has by far. Goes out of his way to help students. Really cares for them.

Name: Sam Dube
Review: He is an amazing prof. It's the only class i had which wasn't boring and everybody came to class because they loved it. He helps you out alot. His notes are the best which makes it easy to get A+ in the course. BEST notes ever. Make sure to take his class any course he teaches otherwise you miss out.

Name: Sam Dube
Review: No Comments

Name: Sam Dube
Review: Professor Dube is truly a gifted teacher that cares for his students. He will go out of his way to help you if you have any problems with the course work. Most professors should take a lesson from him on how to teach a university course.

Name: Sam Dube
Review: teaches you to learn, by learning to teach you.

Name: Sam Dube
Review: Takes forever to mark exams!

Name: Sam Dube
Review: yeah...he's cool the first year...BUT once you take a second course with him you'll notice that his method of teaching is basically right off the book...you can take 15 min and read the chapter or waste 2 hours in class...his jokes are funny the first time but he repeats them over and over...i stopped going to class...became bored by it...

Name: Sam Dube
Review: awesome!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Super awesome for lectures. Always keeps your interest. Makes learning fun. Class grade was based on three exams. Grading style is easy but you need to know your material. He's really great if you need questions answered and notices you when you do well. Overall 10/10 would take again!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: He is good at incorporating humor into lecture material, always keeping students laughing. However, his exams are quite difficult. The preparation he gives is fairly minimal

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Nick was by far my favourite prof from all of first year! He's funny, his examples in class are understandable and relatable, and he really makes the class enjoyable. Whenever you can, take a class with this guy and you won't regret it!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: The textbook is given online so you can save some money. Reading through the assigned readings and taking a few notes to look over before the exams worked for me (finished the class with a 90). Show up to class and follow the notes (don't try and take your own notes - he goes too fast) and you should be golden. Always enjoyed his lectures!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Nick is a great prof! Get ready to memorize because you have to memorize a lot of things so that youre prepared for the exams! Midterms and final wasnt that hard but the multiple choice was a little challenging so make sure to pratice the cerego questions very well. Overall, nice class and nice prof!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Nick is a great prof. He is hilarious and engaging throughout all of his lectures. Only 2 midterms and the final. Lots of memorizing and diagrams. Not too challenging, but you need to read textbook to understand concepts.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: First of all, I improved just by skipping his classes. I've learned everything by reading his slides at home. When I went to his lecture, he's always engaging, enthusiastic, and eager to teach. He also has a good sense of humour.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: This class made me enjoy psychology again!!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: 3 exams & lots of choices were given for each part. Label/explain the diagrams on slides (structure of the ear, brain) long questions "Explain in detail the Charles D Theory " "processes of long term memory" "explain bulimia or anorexia in detail". Overall , an easy grade if you are good at memorizing. Textbook needed for understanding concepts.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Nick was hilarious and engaging. My best class yet.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: the class was only graded on 3 tests but he was a great prof that keeps you interested even during early mornings

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: BUY THE PRACTICE EXAM BOOK. He takes the multiple choice questions directly from the practice exam book. So if you memorize them then you would get at least 40% of each exam completely right. There is a lot of material but it is manageable. He gives your best test grades the highest weighted percentage.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: I looked forward to every lecture with Dr. Carleton, he made even the dry material seem interesting and kept us laughing the whole way through.  He is incredibly passionate and charismatic and exudes excitement for the subject.  Exams were fair, he does not expect you to know everything but rather a few things well.  Can't recommend enough!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Overall really enjoyed the lecture topics and the professor. Course is very dependent on the textbook and lecture slides (which coincide). Reading the textbook is necessary for a good grade and understanding. Course is not very difficult, but is very note-heavy, and lots of reading. There was also no assignments, just midterms and the final exam.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Nick is great! You can really tell he cares about the students and the content matter. I was in a class with about 300 people in it, and he still managed to help everyone with questions. Real great guy too! Though he may have an unhealthy addiction to The Owl haha!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Got all 90s on my midterm and attended lectures maybe twice during the whole semester! Just memorize all the short answers and remember all the answers for the multiple choice on the grade aid book and you'll be golden. Easy credit but lots of memorizing.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: If you truly care about psychology and want the funniest, most hilarious prof in the world- take Nick. A mistake a lot of students make is thinking that psychology is an easy credit. IT ISNT. It is three full booklets of diagrams, charts, and memorization. HOWEVER, if you go to class, Nick makes it easy to understand and remember. Take psych & Nick

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Nick is easily one of the best profs at U of R. His lectures are hilarious, he incorporated fun things into his tests (Greys Anatomy, ect), and he truly makes class amazing. He gives you the resources that he gets the multiple choice from, tells you EXACTLY what will be on the test, it doesn't get easier. He is seriously amazing. Take his course.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Really liked him and the class.  Really clear about what will be on the exams and how to study. I did really well.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Very clear about what format the exams are. If you have any questions or need clarification, he will respond back to your emails. Gives lots of examples to help explain the topics.

Name: Sian Reid
Review: I had Dr. Reid back in 2003, and honestly, she is one of the few teachers I remember from university. She had a way of  teaching of her own, not easy, but insightful and memorable

Name: Sian Reid
Review: Fantastic!

Name: Sian Reid
Review: I attended every single class of hers, and could not have wasted my time or my money more. Extremely unapproachable as well.

Name: Sian Reid
Review: terrible terrible prof. never been so bored or not interested in a class more! she always sounded so angry when giving lectures, she did not seem to be approachable at all!  would never ever ever take another course with her as a professor.

Name: Sian Reid
Review: Great prof. Many students dislike her due to her very forward opinions, but honestly, disregard those comments. Anybody who says her class sucked obviously didn't come to class enough. She is by far one of the most interesting lecturers I've ever had. I would look forward to her class every week. She is amazing at what she does!

Name: Sian Reid
Review: really bad don't take this proff take any other proff for this course

Name: Sian Reid
Review: She is a good prof, but very Marxist beliefs that are seen in every area. Very nice if you go in for help. TA's are TERRIBLE! Marking of journals is inconsistant and unfair. I didn't find that her social experiment was rude or degrading, but didn't learn too much from it in relation to the course. Anecdotes about it were intersting though.

Name: Sian Reid
Review: Good lecturer, interesting content if your interested in sociology. Perhaps not the best class if looking for a bird course, like for Engineering, an essay every week that takes out of other studying. But if you're interested in the field, shes a good prof.

Name: Sian Reid
Review: The best lecturer I've had thus far!! She is real, engaging and knows her stuff. Doesn't spoon-feed but also gives you what you need. Very entertaining! The many movies that she showed just added to the course and they made me laugh and cry and wonder about our world. Brilliant set up of the course. Need to work but will come out a changed person

Name: Sian Reid
Review: I personally really enjoyed being in her class. Pretty interesting women. She doesn't beat around the bush, she's funny and she knows what she is talking about. I wasn't a fan of her weekly journal assignments, but I found that they got easier as the year progressed. She posts all of her lecture notes.Purchasing the textbook is a must.

Name: Sian Reid
Review: Super-clear, learned, passionate and one of the best lecturers I have ever encountered.

Name: Sian Reid
Review: could help out her students more

Name: Sian Reid
Review: Worst prof of my university experience. Im in my 4th year and have an A average - her class was the only C I have EVER got.

Name: Sian Reid
Review: Had her first year and she changed my life. I can remember crying, laughing, and falling asleep in her class. She gives a no-bull approach to everything, which offends some of the more uptight students. I got 80-90% on all the journals and I did them all the night before - you just need to know how to give her what she wants. AWESOME Prof.

Name: Sian Reid
Review: Third year student and found that your grade in this class is totally dependent on unqualified T.A's marking your journals.VERY inconsistent marking.The prof is very rude when you go see her for help or to remark journals and makes you feel that YOU are wasting her time.She'll stick close to the mark her T.A's gave you in show of support for them.

Name: Sian Reid
Review: This is my second year at Carleton and she is by far the worst teacher I have had. Provides very poor support if you go in to get help on the journals, shows a lot of documentaries and is not a good speaker. The journals marking is inconsistent and she provides no real guidelines for the tests. Is next to useless on Web Ct.

Name: Sian Reid
Review: Dr.Reid may be strict and may seem a bit abrasive but I found her very interesting and helpful.Respect her and her rules,and she will help you out for sure.The format of the class was great,a one page review of a reading every week or two,a midterm and an exam but no essays!Work is constant but not very hard.Great class,great prof.

Name: Sian Reid
Review: Dr. Reid is the type of prof you either love or hate. She does have a very left-leaning philosophy, but I personally found her witty, fun and enaging. Some of her WebCT comments made me laugh out loud, and the way she handled repeat questions was just amazing.

Name: Sian Reid
Review: Very good prof. She's hard but fair. If you do poorly in her courses, it's your own fault. What more can one expect?

Name: Sian Reid
Review: The journals ruin my life a little bit everytime one's assigned but if you go to her office during her hours she'll help you with anything you need help with including help with your journal. The lectures are interesting and she's sure to explain everything in understandable terms and throws in a joke once in awhile. Overall good prof.

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: He is the best professor I have ever had. Our lectures were three hours on a Wednesday night, but it was the best night of the week. He cares a lot and would always be willing to listen if I had to to ask him something or just wanted to chat. Somewhat of a tough grader, but if you work for it, he will give you the mark you want. An amazing prof!

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: He is the best professor I am yet to have. He has a great sense of humour, he's very engaging, learned, and so passionate about what he does. I'm not surprised to see that there's 150 reviews on this GOD. he marks fairly and knows when real work is handed in opposed to half-assed assignments. He's the professor you want to have a drink with.

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: Kevin Gildea is a favorite of mine. He cares a lot about the material and what the class is about. He is a bit wild, tangents, loud talking, and lots of old time jokes. Show up to class, pay attention like a reasonable human, put in the effort to engage, and you'll do well.

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: The best professor ever. If he gets to know you, he grades better to fit your style. I recommend taking his class because he actually does care for his students. However, he cannot stand when people come in late or are on their phones for long periods of time. He is honestly like a giddy science teacher. Great guy

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: Overall, a solid 4/5. His lecturing style is delightful and his humour was appreciated. The only critique I have is that he failed to provide sufficient feedback on essays. Sure he corrected grammar and stylistic choices, but I often found myself wondering what I could've done to get a better mark.

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: He tries to be as enthusiastic as he can but overall he comes off as condescending because of the way he talks down to students. Dumbs down his lectures to the point where it's demeaning, and on top of that he marks really tough for no good reason. I'd be wary--people like him for his charisma but that's the only thing he's got going.

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: A great teacher who loves to share his knowledge. Hes passionate about teaching and passionate about the subject matter. If you are interested in English literature, take this course!

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: amazing guy

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: Best prof i've ever had. Doesn't mess around, amazing lectures etc

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: Nice person, topical English professor. I did AP back in grade 12, same reading material Treats students like baby and spend much time on spoon feeding us writing advice & etc., lecture involves too many jokes and irrelevant info. Well-explained examples and analysis, but only when he does go thru the texts and not ranting about background info

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: Professor Gildea gives interesting lectures and has a lot of knowledge about the subjects he teaches. If you do not follow his format exactly and do not write in a way that reflects his beliefs you will not do well.  Although he does give good feedback and help in advance of due dates so if you follow his advice you will do fine.

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: during class he goes briefly through the short stories and briefly brings up topics we can write for the paper. he marks tough in my opinion. every time we hand in an outline or a paper he gives detailed feed back which helps with the next paper. I personally didn't like his style of teaching and I hated his assignments

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: Best prof ever he's so gem OG Kevin  Inspirational

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: Took this as a summer class for my English Minor between third and fourth year. Professor Gildea is funny, entertaining, intelligent, and actually knows what he's talking about. If you don't know how to write, you'll learn the basics. If you already know how to write, he'll teach you how to develop stronger ideas to get an A+ essay every time.

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: Extremely unhelpful

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: Really passionate professor. Knows the material and desires the students to get in to it as well. Really enjoyed his candor and teaching style. Take his classes, but they aren't bird courses so be warned.

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: AMAZING. His lectures were great, and it's obvious that he's incredibly passionate about what he teaches. Favourite class of first year by far!

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: Amazing professor, always looking to give feedback and to be the most helpful person he can be. Although he does not remember my name, he makes up for it by giving absolutely inspirational lectures.

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: One of the best profs I've had so far. Was it the easiest class? No. But I learned more about so many different topics that to simply label this an "English" class is a bit unfair.  Extremely interesting class and as a professor he keeps you very engaged. I skipped a couple of classes in the first semester and I regret it!

Name: Kevin Gildea
Review: Even though I'm not an English major, i enjoyed Gildea's class A LOT! very fun class and i learned a lot. He is a great prof!

Name: John Bryant
Review: Lack of computer science knowledge makes it very hard for him to explain easy data structure concepts. The notes are very confusing and convoluted since all concepts of C++ programming, data structure and algorithm and OOP(objected oriented programming) are not divided into well organised chapters and topics.

Name: John Bryant
Review: The worst Instructor. He is master in making you confuse. I am very happy I won't have to take any courses with him.

Name: John Bryant
Review: One of the worst instructors ever I met in whole my education. Just avoid this guy!!!

Name: John Bryant
Review: Had him for Ecor 1606 got an A, Ecor 2606 got an A+ and sysc 3600 got an A+. Very good prof, knows how to impart material into your head and go outside the box at times. You need to think outside the box for his exams. Had fun!

Name: John Bryant
Review: This is the type of course where you need to keep up with assignments to get good grades. He tells you this from the get go! People don't listen, which is why they do badly - and take it out on the prof. Lectures may not be riveting, but he teaches you exactly what you need to know. Go to class, take notes, do the assignments, and you'll do great!

Name: John Bryant
Review: if you want to drop out of engineering, pick this instructor. lectures are cmplete waste of time. somebody buy him a red bull please!

Name: John Bryant
Review: this guy teaches like as if he doesnt want to be there. slides are long boring and he just mumbles infront of the class. the first 2 rows are sleeping and rest leave one by one. also hes never in his office and doesnt reply to email. there should be an email policy for this prof

Name: John Bryant
Review: Very helpful during the lab sessions if you are lucky enough to have him. Clear cut lessons that quickly explained and provided sufficient examples to solidify the concept. He is a handsome man. The End.

Name: John Bryant
Review: Failed every single assignment and I still spent 1-2 hours on each of them. The lab work is okay, lectures are sleep worthy.

Name: John Bryant
Review: This class is just so hard you either get it or you don't. But he is a really good prof he cares about students and he wants people to do well.

Name: John Bryant
Review: I failed the course my first time around, but it was entirely my fault. I didn't pay attention in class and slacked on the assignments. Although the assignments are hard, they aren't worth much and are meant to help you learn. Now in my second try, the course is much easier. I pay attention, and John loves to help his students during labs.

Name: John Bryant
Review: this guy likes to make things more complicated, by far the worst professor at carleton and this univ will never get a better reputation unless they get rid of this guy. hes never in his office and gets sarcastic when u ask him questions.

Name: John Bryant
Review: worst of the worst profs he doesn't know how to teach only read the slides and give hard assignment not even that moreover, he  is very strict in marking he asked the TAs to tighten the marks as much as they can , makes me hate matlab and school.

Name: John Bryant
Review: Good prof and knows his stuff very well! I had Prof. Bryant for two classes now and have no regrets. VERY helpful if you see him and ask for it -- will work with you to make sure you get the material down pat. Just do the assignments and study from the slides / old tests, and you will be more than prepared for the exams.

Name: John Bryant
Review: assignments have nothing to do with lecture notes. Exams are easy, the dudes nice in my opinion but many others dont like him.

Name: John Bryant
Review: Knows material very well. This may be a dry course, but attendance and assignments help a lot. Study from the lecture slides and write your own code. Easy A+.

Name: John Bryant
Review: Really smart and nice prof. Easy exams but a little hard of the assignments(but best way to learn!)

Name: John Bryant
Review: Did anyone notice that Bryant wrote his own course pack instead of forcing students to buy an expensive textbook AND that he created a learning program (C--) to help people get acquainted with C++? This prof is an educator and not a businessman like a lot of other profs, and he has my respect. Just do your work, and you will succeed!

Name: John Bryant
Review: I got an A+ in this class -- just do the assignments (best way to learn) and you will succeed! Written tests are based heavily on them. Bryant spent half an hour in one lab just with me helping me debug my program.

Name: John Bryant
Review: I had no problem with this prof -- I don't know why all the hate below. If he sees you are putting in the effort and doing your part, he will do everything he can to help you with an assignment. Very knowledgeable man. This is engineering, folks -- it WILL require consistent work to do well. Would take another class with him anytime!

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: The best prof I've had at Sprott. This class has been one of the most demanding classes, but only because he wants you to work for the grade you want to get. We're the last class he taught before retiring, so I'm sad that the others won't have him as a prof. Can't get any better with Robert. Cheers to your retirement! We're truly thankful.

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: This course is really something special, but definitely a large workload. Make sure you get along with your teammates because there's so many presentations and 2 large assignments at the end of the semester that you have to do together. Robert is a funny, well respected and helpful professor.

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: Good professor. Helps you with stuff that's course-related and stuff that's outside of the class. Gives good life lessons and advices. Helps you understand the class contents in a friendly opening class environment. Overall the professor was like an older version of Wayne Horn, but the class content is like drinking from a fire hydrant. GLHF LOL

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: Ive never met a professor who is so focused on wanting to see his students succeed. Although he makes you work hard for a good grade, he will give you the materials you need to achieve. Great lecturer. I wish all profs were like Rob.

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: Goat, the best prof ive had so far. Its been a great semester and i hope you have a great retirment

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: The course has a lot of content to it. Which means you need to keep on top of your deadlines. Always read the textbook before each lecture as there is a quiz for it each week. Try your best to get along with the group members as there are presentations each week and 2 group projects at the end

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: What an amazing prof! He pushed you in his class but it's worth it. The skills you learn in his class go way beyond school. You cannot skip class and expect to do well. Whilst his class was challenging, it is probably the greatest class I've ever taken. He is staying one more semester I believe, so take him if you can. You wouldn't want to miss out

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: Rob is an amazing professor! He really cares if you do well. The classes were super interesting! I would definitely recommend taking a course taught by Rob before he retires at the end of the winter term! Really sad to see him retire as he is one of the best professor's I have had.

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: Easily the best prof in Sprott, greatest class I have taken and Im sad to see this legend go. You will be missed by the whole faculty.

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: Cool prof.

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: I seriously enjoyed every second of this class, Robert taught it well and he made sure we understand this course really well, whoever is taking this course in winter just get ready to do a lot of group works, assignments and quizzes. overall ill miss Robert and I would love to take a course with him again.

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: I was in one of the last classes he taught. Complex course with a lot of group work and assignments, but he has a great sense of humour and applies topics to real life situations. I would take one of his courses again!

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: amazing prof overall. He's a real gem as long as you stay on top of your work. Very passionate.

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: Robert Riordan is such a nice guy. The course in its self is a lot, as there are crew challenges, online class quizzes, and assignments. But, he makes you work hard. Unfortunately, he is retiring this year, but I wish him all the best. Love ya Rob

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: This class really challenged me and pushed me outside of my comfort zone but I loved the prof. Makes jokes, knows his stuff and really wants you to learn and succeed. Lots of group work, need to read the textbook to do well. Every week there's a possibility for you to present with your assigned group, and about 2 things to do a week but loved it.

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: Robert was an amazing professor. I really enjoyed his class even though I did not enjoy the course content. Textbook is written by him and is online (free) but it needs to be edited and fixed up. Participation and class attendance is a must. Lots of small assignments and activities but he makes the class engaging and enjoyable. AMAZING DUDE!!!

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: Love Rob and love this class. There are a lot of things going on in this course but he lays it out well and makes it hard to miss things. Very creative setup and a fun environment. The class is online next year so Idk how it will go but I know he'll make it great, gonna miss him!

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: Honestly one of the best professors I've ever had, really funny and he genuinely cares about his students. I loved the way the classes are structured it really engaged me and help me learn, there's a lot of work to do but i wouldn't say it's difficult it just requires a lot of reading.

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: By far the best course ive taken in university! its not an easy course but the prof is super funny and genuinely cares about his students. This is a must take and a resume booster

Name: Robert Riordan
Review: It's a really disgusting course...

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: I LOVE PROFESSOR BAIRD! My absolute FAVOURITE professor of all time! She is truly inspirational and passionate about her material. She is charismatic and hilarious too! She gives a LOT of awesome examples that make the content stick. I wish that I had known how amazing of a proff she is from the beginning so I could have taken more classes. A++!

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: Such a great professor! Her lectures are long but she makes them interesting and really explains the material! She also makes it very clear what you need to know for the midterms and exam.

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: She gives great examples, and offers time to help students before or after an exam. I liked her positive attitude and can tell that she loves her job. She has a good difficulty level - you won't do well if you don't study.

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: Focused too much on personal examples instead of fleshing out material's concepts; vague explanations. Reads from slides; frequently jumps between them without fully explaining; confuses terms. There were times where she DID actually explain things well but it was few and far between. I wanted to like her, but she's not deserving of over 4 here.

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: This class is taught so well by Brenda! It is really easy to understand the material as she explains it as she gives her own experiences. Im going to miss this class!

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: Brenda is a tough love kinda prof, she won't take nonsense but absolutely wants her students to do well. She is hilarious and this course was super interesting, also very helpful in real life! I highly recommend taking her, she's quirky and fun! Will definitely try and take another class with her if I get the chance!

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: Emotion&Motivation seems simple  for the class content. However, the midterms and the final is quite precise. A lot of the material that her talks is vague. It does not in depth and at the exam is hard to do it when you didn't do that before. Textbook is dry and quite fuzzy in some ways The teach style is fun, but not always helpful. No feedback.

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: I learned so much in a social psyc class about motivation and emotion, and she really did not teach the theories well. Doesn't have enough knowledge or teaching ability to do the theories justice. Avoid taking if you care about gaining knowledge. Dry textbook. You can tell being a prof boosts her ego. So annoying all the lame stories she tells.

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: A really good prof. Going to class is essential because the slides do not explain much. She basically tells you what the long answers for the midterms and exam will so make sure you pay attention. Grades come from 2 midterms and a final so you gotta do good on them since there's not another way to get marks.

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: 350 characters aren't enough to sum up how great Brenda is! I came into stats with so much worry and fear that I wouldn't do well because I haven't taken math in years. She lays the course out so that it is organized& easy to follow but you really have to take her advice: read the chapters, go to class (obviously) and do the practice questions!

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: She spends the majority of every lecture telling personal stories as if she's the most inspirational person ever.  She takes FOREVER to get marks back.  She talks down to you and snaps at you if you email her or say something during class.  Steer clear!!

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: Great prof! Great lectures, important to attend to do well on exams.. Very helpful and accommodating, had her for PSYC1002, and here I am a psych major. Definitely recommend taking any psych course with her!

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: shes great relates the course content to her experiences we can relate to.

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: Oh my, Dr. Baird is simply amazing. Listen during her lectures and this class should be a breeze for you. Her exams are right of what she says in class and her slides.

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: The class itself was not what I was expecting (a bit more science based) but the content wasn't extremely difficult. In order to get the A+ you really should get the book, because there are things that the prof will discuss in class in a confusing way, which will be short answer on the exams.
