Prof also goes off on tangents about her life a lot...

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: Amazing prof! Great lectures, she really knows what she's talking about. She uses real life examples to explain material. You don't need to study anything that hasn't been covered in her lectures, but you do need to be in class to take notes as her lecture slides aren't complete. Exams have short and long answer questions as well as MC

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: Goes on tangents. Often repeats things that are unrelated to class material over and over, especially if it's about her personal life. Lectures could be 30min shorter. Midterms are fair. Only tests on material covered in class, but her slides are useless, so take good notes. No trick questions.  Dull, boring lectures, fair exams. Overall, recommend

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: The material is difficult, but she does her best to hold your hand through it.

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: She's hilarious and excellent at teaching!

Name: Brenda Baird
Review: Dr. Brenda Baird is a great prof! Classes are mandatory if you want to understand and have clear examples about the material. The lectures can become dull on some topics but overall it was a good class!

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: His lecture slides SUCK so a tip is to create a good reputation with him and ask him to send you his lecture notes that he reads off of. Get ready to face the world's reality in this class but feel free to talk to him when needed. He is very helpful and understanding. He gives two papers and an exam. His papers are doable. His exam strain the hand.

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: I love Bill, I would do anything for him and have accepted him as my lord and saviour.

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: SPEAKS SO FAST YOU DON'T HAVE TIME TO TYPE ANYTHING. I am an extremely fast typer and I don't have time to type let alone comprehend anything he's saying. Passionate about his work. If you do the readings, you will do well. Class is pointless as he rambles on about everything and anything and when he DOES get into the material, you can't keep up.

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: Wonderfully inspiring and extremely wise. Courses could, however, be more valuable if they were more challenging.

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: So boring, lectures were long, useless and boring. go for the guest speakers. he was a good person but Jesus was he boring.

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: Bill is an angel, he is truly passionate about his work. He is very respectful of students and class content, and does everything possible to help students succeed. Gives attendance marks just for showing up to tutorial, participation not needed (lecture not mandatory).  He showed a lot of videos and drew upon his own experiences.

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: Being an international student at this greedy institution (Carleton), Bill's courses were worth every single penny i have spent! He has amazing lectures, is very caring and grades fairly. Defiantly recommend him! He is the reason why i'm majoring in Human Rights! I learned so much from him!

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: Bill is THE BEST professor i have had in university! He's so caring and very understanding. He is the reason why one of my majors is in Human Rights. Not only are his lectures interesting, but he has taught me that being a good person is important. I have learned so much from him that has helped me grow as a person. Defiantly recommend him!

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: Amongst the few of the most compassionate and caring professors Carleton University ever has. He is truly concerned about Human Rights issues and really helps to raise awareness and the gravity of the pertinent issues. Do not hesitate to take a class with him if you're passionate about Human Rights, you won't regret it.

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: The entire course was centred around this man telling stories of his personal experience. However, we never really learned about any ways in which Human rights could be actually tackled. More of a history lesson of this guys life. Don't bother taking notes because he literally just puts quotes up and reads from the slides. Caring guy, awful prof.

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: Boo hoo, the world is bad place. Bill cares more about feelings and what should be done rather than the reality of things. Lectures have nothing to do with the assignments so just stick with reading the material. Be careful if you have a different opinion than him. His class will slander you if you actually think outside the box.

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: Most genuine professor at Carleton! Bill is the mot amazing man, with the kindness biggest heart and so many worldly experiences and stories. He truly changed the world, and he just hopes he can teach these stories and lesson onto his students. Would recommend 10/10 you learn so much about different conflicts abroad. Show up and listen and learn!

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: BEST PROF EVER! Words can't describe how perfectly he's suited for the job

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: Love, love, LOVE this man. Hands down the best human rights professor at Carleton.  His lectures are incredible and get you really questioning human rights implementation globally. I've had a couple classes with him and he never fails to disappoint. Is there when you need help, or even just to talk about human rights in general. Take his class!!!

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: I absolutely love Bill. His voice is soothing but his lectures are full of interesting (but heavy) stuff. Is very fair with his assignments and the exam is very straight forward. Make sure that you actually do the readings though because the exam is entirely based on them. Such a nice guy outside of class as well, he made me appreciate human rights

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: Excellent professor.  Very knowledgeable.  Term mark consisted entirely of a paper, an exam and participation.  Focus on the readings and take good notes from readings in order to do well on the exam.  Once you do that and ask him for help for the paper (which he gives a lot of great help), you're golden and your mark will be great.

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: Bill was fantastic! I really enjoyed having him as a prof. He's definitely one of the profs you will remember forever - he's such a neat dude. Readings surely take a lot of time and are crucial for passing this course. His exam is solely based on readings. I would love to take another one of his courses! Would recommend to anyone interested in HUMR

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: Very lazy lectures. Drones on, and almost always videos. Certainly passionate about the subject matter but the class seems to center around 'boohoo the world is a bad place'

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: I love Bill's class! He is one of the kindest and most down to earth dudes that you will ever meet. His lectures are fairly interesting but can be a bit dry. I wish he had better slides, I feel like that would keep me more into the lectures. If you have Bill you 100% need to do the readings!! It essentially comes down to that for the final.

Name: Bill Skidmore
Review: Hes a great prof and very passionate about what he teaches. Lectures are not too important but I would still go. Exams he usually gives the questions and thus they are super easy!

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Kim is an amazing prof! Shes knowledgeable and explains things very well. The material can be difficult but Kim breaks it down for you very well. If you get the chance to take a class with her you won't regret it! We had a midterm, final and 8 mini assignments and there were opportunities for bonus marks (4%) in class!

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Kim is my favourite professor! She takes the time to actually connect with her students and makes sure they understand the material given some of it can be heavy. I actually enjoyed going to her class and she got me really interested in Neuroscience. If you have the chance to have her as a professor, you won't regret it!

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Kim is the most caring, passionate, and kind woman ever! Her lectures were very engaging and her love for NEUR was very clear! She makes you look forward to class every week, and she is very stylish and cool! I am very thankful that I had the chance to take her class and she made my first semester at UNI amazing! Get to know her! She is great!!!!

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: The most amazing professor and person. Her passion and incredible knowledge for the topics discussed make you love the class even more. Cares about all of her students and wants them to do well. Such an intelligent woman with a FANTASTIC sense of style. If you work hard the course isn't too difficult. I LOVE KIM!!

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: So smart and passionate. Her lectures were so interesting and fun, I always looked forward to her class. She explains things so clearly and makes difficult content much easier. I've since taken many other neuro courses and hers is still my favourite. Also I love her podcast and listen to every episode.

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Brilliant Prof. She cares about her job and students and it is evident. i Wish she could be my teacher every year :(((

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: You're marked on midterm (35%), exam (50%), and 15% for small assignments. Prof is amazing, but the material is heavy. Kim is very energetic and fun, she tries her best to help us understand. Sometimes its just hard to grasp the material because it is neuroscience after all. I am not majoring in neuro so it is a bit difficult.

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Kim once mentioned that many of her ratings were in regards to her sense of humour and fashion forward outfits and often not about her brilliance. While those things are true I cannot stress enough, Dr. Hellemans is BRILLIANT. I love her passion and could listen to her lecture all day. Sincerely, an inspired female future neuroscientist.

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Dr. Hellemans is not only funny and stylish but she clearly knows the material well and will make sure you do too. Very sweet prof that genuinely cares about her students.

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Kim is one of the best prof's I've ever had. You have so many opportunities to get marks you really can't fail. Assignments are your best 8/10 and are never more than a few sentences long. Exams are fair and extremely clear. Kim loves Neuro and she's sure to make you love it too.

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Absolutely love Kim, even though she is the chair of the neuro department she always gets back to you as soon as she can! She completely inspired me with her lectures and actually assigns readings that she thinks interest the class. Completely open to feedback. 15/10 would recommend, you will not regret it! Can't wait to take her upper year classes

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Neuroscience is challenging for those who do not have a science background, but Professor Hellemans made the material easy to understand and interesting. As long as you do all of the reading assignments, all of the bonuses, take good notes, and study hard you will do fine. Such a caring and nice person.

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Kim is an amazing professor. I'm now considering minoring in Neuroscience because of her. There is no textbook for this course, so attend lecture. The $50 VOD fee is also worth it. You will have opportunity for bonus marks, exam reviews, and she grades assignments on your best 8/10. Neuroscience is not easy, but Kim makes it enjoyable.

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Kim is a wonderful teacher! I came into her class with no science background but still managed to do really well, due to her lectures that are clear as day. Super funny too! Tests are fair, both in content covered and in marking. includes videos, polls and time for discussions to keep her lectures engaging.

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: I went into NEUR1202 with no science background and still managed to get a good grade. Its pretty easy, considering that its a first year course. Kim is an amazing professor and really loves what she does, she's extremely helpful and listens to everyones feedback. The assignments are easy and she gives out bonus marks as well, highly recommend

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Dr. Kim is honestly one of the BEST professors ive had so far in university, she makes her lectures so fun and interesting, shes straightforward on whats on the exam and what isnt. if you choose not to go to class youre the one missing out tbh. shes super hilarious and makes very relatable jokes for a professor her age.

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Dr. Hellemans is clearly passionate about what she teaches and clearly cares about her students. Theres lots of opportunities to earn marks through online assignment (readings usually, but sometimes podcasts) and even a couple bonus mark opportunities. Kim's class was the perfect way to start off my degree and I look forward to more of her lectures

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Kim is the absolute best.

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Kim has to be one of my favourite professors. She's so kind and enthusiastic and really wants her students to succeed. Would recommend her to everyone. She was the reason I'm now minoring in neuroscience.

Name: Kim Hellemans
Review: Kim clearly has a thorough understanding of the material and is able to teach it in a clear, to the point way. She is also down to earth, which makes her lectures very easy to sit through. I recommend taking as many of her classes as you can.

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: I don't understand how he does it

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: Aiman Hanna is an angel from heaven

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: Teaching is not something natural, only few people are really meant to become professors. Aiman Hanna has clearly a talent to teach, he's the best professor I had in my life.

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: HANDS DOWN THE #1 TEACHER IN CONCORDIA

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: He is the best teacher in computer science department!!!!!!!!!!!

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: Honestly, I am in computer science in Concordia just because of him. He gives me hope that i will graduate. The only teacher I will pray for from the bottom of my heart. He is absolute Genius and knows the material soo well, that he won't let students leave the class unless everyone understood the material. THE ONE & ONLY REAL PROFESSOR IN COMP SCI

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: With the way he teaches, this man single handedly kept the classroom full of students from beginning on end, which is VERY rare to see in the uni. This alone should tell you how amazing he is.

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: He is honestly one of the greatest teachers I have ever had. He will do everything in his power to make you understand. Definitely recommend, even if you're not in his section he allows you to sit on the sides and listen in.

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: He is truly the best teacher for computer science / soen students at Concordia. In my life, I've only met 3 teachers that truly made me believe in our educational system and he is one of them. He is an amazing person and anyone who takes him should consider themselves lucky. I wasn't even in his class but, came to EVERY SINGLE LECTURE.

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: He won't pass the material unless he make sure everyone understand it

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: He devote himself to his students and care about them like as a father

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: walter lewin level of quallity of lectures

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: His teaching goes beyond academics. Along with the coursework, he teaches very important life skills. He is one of the best professors that I came across.

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: He is truly a great professor. Other than giving useful and engaging lectures, he cares about every single student. I was not officially enrolled in his lectures but I attended almost all of them and he was very welcoming. I was struggling with this course at first but he saved me! Honestly, he cares about his students way more than most profs.

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: I have been going to Hanna's lectures for comp 352 despite the fact that I am not in his section. His lectures are great but his dedication is inspiring. He somehow learned my name and it wasn't until later I realized he knew the names of every single student. He will help you no matter what and you should attend his class no matter your section.

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: He is available whenever you need help. He knows everyone by name. I enjoyed my lectures with him.

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: This man is both a God and a Legend. The nicest man alive, he knows everybody's name by the first class. He is a solid teacher, with a thorough understanding of all the material. He really cares about his students and will take his time answering questions until everyone gets it. Best teacher at Concordia.

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: The Best Professor ever in the world

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: He is the best

Name: Aiman Hanna
Review: He is, very simply put, the best.

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: Dr Schofield is truly an amazing professor, very inspirational and passionate. However, you ll need to work hard (2x than an average 300 class) He is very helpful and available for his students and will do everything for you to do well in his class. Im scared of number and was afraid of statistics but now I am able to use SPSS easily

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: Professor Schofield is perhaps my favourite prof of all time. He cares about his students and will go a long way to ensure your success. However, you must put the work in to get good results. That being said, the assignments are interesting and rewarding. If you have a chance, take a class with him. You will not regret it!!!

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: Schofield is hands down one of the best teachers I have had at Concordia. Not only is he super understanding, he makes himself accessable to students to ensure their success in his class. Lots of assignments worth 1-5% but they add up. He doesnt have "strict" deadlines but don't wait till the end of the semester; it will bite you. Would retake 100%

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: Dr. Schofield is the real MVP of the department. The stats class was legit so SPSS heavy and everyone was lost with his unclear assignments. THAT BEING SAID, he allows for unlimited redos until you get 100%. You can see him and email him whenever, and he is super personable. Loved the guy and the class! Everyone does well, but do the work.

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: The best teacher I've had in my entire academic career. Passionate, knowledgeable and personable, Schofield will make you work for it. Weekly quizzes and assignments due, a maddening amount of reading to do (learn to skim, read headings and move on). He is approachable and not here to wreck your GPA. You must, however, put earn it. A true gem.

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: This course was the highlight of my university experience. The workload is immense and you are expected to read about 60 pages per week as well. If you put in the work, show up to class and read the material, you will do well. More importantly, however, you will a truly rewarding experience.

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: If you are looking for an easy class, turn away. On top of lectures jam-packed with information, there are weekly quizzes, multiple assignments, and a substantial final paper. Many students drop the class. The ones who don't are battle-hardened and experienced. If you work hard and put in the time, Schofield will do the same for you.

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: This class is very demanding but consequentially also very rewarding. You will develop your quantitative and qualitative methodology skills, and this professor is always available to his students through e-mail, with very prompt replies. If you are looking to challenge yourself and are prepared for a heavy workload take this class!

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: The course is only for hardworking. The course is not difficult BUT there is are many assignments. I spend for this course 2.5 times more time than for other classes. Do not be frightened by many assignments, do them all in time and do not leave for the end. An easy grader if you work hard, go to his labs, office hours. So far the best Professor!

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: Amazing prof! So passionate about the topic and he really cares about his students--he wants you to learn the stats and do well. But you need to be ready to work! Workload is VERY heavy so don't wait last minute. But if you do the work and show up to class it's actually fairly easy to get a good grade.

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: Scary-smart, passionate about his subject, cares about his students. Among the very best professors at the university. The huge work load would be unreasonable from another professor... Professor Schofield goes the extra mile (and then ten more for good measure) to make sure every student understands the material and can handle the assignments.

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: Schofield gives lots of assignments which are unusual for PoliSci such as stats and naval combat assignments, however always spends lots of time helping students in his office hours. This is the best class to learn about everything related to nuclear weapons and Schofield runs class simulations which are the highlight of my university experience.

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: 419 is easily one of the most difficult courses I've taken, the subject matter is dense, but it's quite fun. Interested in nuclear weapons and warfare? Julian knows everything on the subject, and he'll make sure you do do. There are a lot of assignments, but they're outside the box and fun. I can now write a 20+ pager inside of a week.

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: Math used to scare me, but he's a master at this stuff, and he'll go out of his way to make sure you come out of 302 as one too. I now do linear regressions by hand for kicks, and can navigate through SPSS in my sleep. Stats is so important in political science, and 302 demystifies it completely.

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: One of the best classes I've taken so far. If you're willing to put up with the amount of work, you'll likely enjoy it.

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: This teacher gives a lot of reading and assignments however he is always there to help and wants his students to succeed. He also makes the lectures very interesting! I would definitely take his class again even if it was the most demanding class I have ever taken! Amazing teacher!

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: Schofield is a great teacher! Would definitely take one of his classes again. You NEED to get involved with the course material and take the time for readings, assignments. The class is heavy in terms of material and very challenging. I recommend to not skip a class! But the teacher is very educated, funny and knows his stuff!

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: Most challenging but very rewarding class and professor

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: Amazing Teacher, but really makes you work for it- If you turn up to every lecture and follow his guidelines in the class guide and talk over your essay with him, you are guaranteed a B+ at least. A great class and Prof

Name: Julian Schofield
Review: Pleasantly surprised by this prof - wish I got to take more of his classes. Loved the amount of feedback from assignments. Prof. Schofield has a cool + informed perspective for sure. Learned a LOT during this class, DEF need to be committed + put the time in. Weekly assignments + a lot of reading, around 2000 pages. (Entire encyclopedia.)

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: Probably the worst teacher at JMSB. His lectures are useless and he tries to motivate students by talking about his philosophy in life. Avoid him at all cost, even though he is the course coordinator.

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: decent but doesn't answer your questions

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: Seems like a nice guy but isn't very clear when it comes to instructions or if you email him, even though he gets back immediately

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: Consistent and very smart

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: Great prof

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: You must work hard and you will learn. Prof Lay is a very smart man

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: He made me wanted to drop out of JMSB

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: Very happy that I decided to attend all of Ibrahim's classes. lol didn't attend one tutorial. Yes he is a strict grader but he really wants you to work for your grade. Always asked the class (5-6 ppl showed up) if we had any questions, and had office hours to help. If you have him, attend his classes because he talks a bit abt the exams

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: This is not a very difficult course to be honest. Practice Lots! It's ridiculous how he has a low score. I went to all of his classes and he always asked if anyone had any questions for clarification. He made us participate, try to think critically which is the basis of this course, not pure memorization. He even gave a few hints about the midterm.

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: Hes actually not that bad. You have to do all the practice problems and try to read the textbook (yes actually read the textbook, it will help you understand if youre having difficulty). Focus on actually understanding rather than just memorizing the concepts. He likes to use tricks to actually test your understanding.

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: prepare to work hard challenging course but great if you like to challenge yourself

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: Even if you learned the bulk of the central concepts he will make the final about the things that are in the textbook once and have no importance in the grand scale of the course. You will learn so much material and not even be tested on it, yet some random thing will be on the exam. actually so stupid.

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: Don't need to say a word because the comments say it all

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: worst teacher at JMSB. doesn't want to teach

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: Not teaching at all

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: If you do the work and listen to him You can learn a lot. A good teacher if you work hard

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: There is no way around it, Aly can give you a hard time if you are not prepared. On the other hand, if you read the textbook, his teaching style challenges you to think outside the box and be able to do any problems because you actually understand the content. I found his lectures weirdly inspirational from time to time. Working hard is the key!

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: Good teacher. Must work hard

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: Good teacher. Lots of work. You must work to pass

Name: Ibrahim Aly
Review: Great teacher. Knows his work. Got to be prepared to work.

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: weird because you wanna like him because he's trying to be relatable with the youth but its cringe af and has big OK boomer vibes. Don't take this class if you care about your GPA.

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: If you're taking COMM 220, do NOT take him. He has his own notes (literally just jokes). There's no book to follow, your homework doesn't help for the test. You have 2 Assignments (if you're 0.2 off you don't get the mark). You can't even attend SOS or tutorials because it's not even the same material. So if you start bad, it's over. Don't do it.

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: I really gave it my all. I went to his lectures, I took notes, I read ALL his Pdf notes, took notes of those notes, re-did the homeworks MANY TIMES, got a great grade on the midterm... but then came his final. It was very difficult even for me who did everyhting possible. Does not do problems in class. Horrible.

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: Pull a Usain Bolt on this one. Youll need to run as fast and far away as possible.

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: He's honestly a very fair teacher, and if you go to class and you actually pay attention, you are guaranteed a decent grade. Everything he says in class is on the midterm/final, and his homework's (which are optional) are representative of the midterm and final. I didn't read a single article of his and still got a decent grade by going in to class

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: With Lypny, you really need to listen and take notes during class. There's no textbook and you need to search for all the required readings online. The midterm was exactly like the practice one he gave plus the homework. Although, the final exam is fairly different and way harder (don't bother with the practice final, it's a joke)

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: Lypny is a very funny guy and has his own tests and material that is different from the other 220 sections. theres only 9 chaoters Vs. 13. Theres no need to attend class, as reading his pdf notes and doing the homework was enough to get 90%+ in midterm & final. midterm was almost an EXACT copy of the practice exam he provided. the final wasnt hard.

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: One of the best professors I have ever had. Traditional economics with a behavioral twist paints a great picture of the world we live in. Forces you to think critically about topics giving you a deeper understanding and the ability to apply the learning to real life. If you want to really get something out of your courses TAKE THIS TEACHER.

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: yoooo this prof is the BOMB lol. Take him and you'll see.

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: His classes are extremely easy if you study his lecture notes, past quizzes, and attend tutorials. If you complain that this class is hard, it is because you haven't tried nor put in effort at all. I was so scared to take him, but it was the best decision I made. You can easily get an A grade.

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: I was extremely hesitant and scared to take this prof, especially since his lecture is completely different from other profs. I must say i was pleasantly surprised by this prof. His exams are a copy paste of his quizzes and past midterms. Attend tutorials and you will get an easy A. He is caring , funny, and passionate. You will truly learn a lot.

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: What a guy! He is hilarious and a genius! Definitely a fair grader (you can get an A if you put in the work), but you must go to class and READ HIS NOTES (they will save you) because there is no info on the slides. The assignments are a bit tough but with the notes and the TA facebook page, it's very doable!

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: To be honest this is the best course (comm 220) I had ever taken in jmsb the teacher is caring if you put in the work, people complain that it's too hard, but if you go to class and actually do the homework it is a piece of cake, I finished the class with an A- 0.7 points close to an A knowing that I could have studied more, I simply loved it

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: Professor Lypny, is an amazing teacher! Very passionate in his lectures, it makes you want dive right in with him. Many students, don't grasp the message he tries to send out. He opens unusual doors to think deeper than the average teacher's do. Provides clear understanding and meaning of each aspect of the material. An inspirational being!

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: Professor Lypny is great and often very interesting. However, he rambles a lot and over-complicates the subject a lot. For this class, do all the exercises 2 to 4 times before the final and you will easily ace it. All the people complaining below have simply not studied. All tests are MCQ, there is nothing qualitative like COMM 210.

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: Hard grader, didnt learn a lot from this class. He focuses on the calculations more than on the theory especially in the exams. He still is a very funny teacher...

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: He doesn't use any textbook, rather he supplies students with his own notes which are riddled with typos and many math errors (he couldn't even do a cross multiplication properly). Do yourself a favour and take someone that will actually teach the course not their version of it. His section is diff from all the rest so youre stuck if you take him

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: Prof is funny but he doesnt use textbook and gives you notes that are half complete, wouldnt take again

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: If you are someone who depends heavily on textbook or powerpoint slides, do not take his. His concepts are more abstract and less number crunching based like most 220 classes. Notes are based on his lectures, although he is great at explaining and very entertaining. He teaches in a completely different way yet it is very refreshing.

Name: Greg Lypny
Review: By far my favorite teacher at jmsb. He's funny and makes class interesting. Take him if you want to learn something!! No suprises on the tests (everything is the same as from the quizzes and notes).

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: Course outline was unclear and contained false information. Assignments were poorly explained and graded extremely harshly. The course consisted of getting into groups and talking to people, no material from the textbook was covered in class. You would be better off studying the book than attending, but of course attendance was mandatory. Abysmal.

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: COMM205 is a dry course, but Mark finds a way to make it fun. He's a nice guy and gives practical real-life advice. His 5 minute meditations are cool. Takes attendance every class. Makes people get into groups and work together. Only thing is that he doesn't actually teach the course so either read the book or take a crash course. Fun class though!

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: Created an account just so I could write this to warn people just how poor Mark is of a professor. Unprofessional, poorly conducted classes, no clear lesson structures, doesn't even use his own slides, all over the place, rude and scolds students for using phones/laptops. In my 15 years of education, this is the worst module I have ever taken.

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: Didn't like him at the very beginning, but slowly find out his attraction! He's a very caring professor and willing to answer all kinds of problems. Gives you good feedback on your work and school life. It may seem that he doesn't know how to teach, but later you will find out that the things he's trying to teach you is so important in life!

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: An awful instructor at best. Mark is extremely incompetent with his emails (ironic since he teaches about effective communication) and is ridiculously harsh with grades. He admitted that he would fail the final exam if he wrote it- in other words, he is clueless in regards to class material. Save your GPA and avoid even if the world is ending.

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: This class is all about reading the book because thats what the final is based on. He is an easy grader, gives out the same grade to everyone. However he doesnt teach the material of the course, but honestly if u read one chapter per week and take notes youll be fine

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: after the drop deadline passed he changes to a whole new person, makes you feel like you're stupid for asking a question. He taught us nothing about what the subject was and he knows nothing about the subject either! he walks into class without knowing what to do that class. the grade you'll receive depends if he likes you or not. Also very rude

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: He yells if you use your laptop or phone in class and he talk about irrelevant things the whole class. His grading makes no sense and even though you will work had don't expect a good grade. Also you need to read the book yourself to pass the final. TBH even if he is the only option for comm 205 don't take him it will ruin your GPA

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: Worst experience ever

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: I found him good! For my first class at university, and with the experience now of other teachers, he was funny and I enjoyed his weird style of teaching! Would recommend

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: Mark is an interesting teacher and gives wise advice during his classes. As long as you're awake and ready to participate, his class is enjoyable and quite easy to pass! Of course, for the final, you have to read your textbook... But isn't that any university course?

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: Terrible teacher and very hard grader... Doesn't prepare us for the final whatsoever. He doesn't believe in perfect grades. Most of the grading in this class is papers and orals which he will grade according to his personal opinion. He will take off marks from your paper for little to no reason. AVOID THIS TEACHER

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: I actually ended up liking him even though i havent read one good review about him. He does teach you life lessons. His lectures are simple and very chilled out. I really enjoyed his lectures even tho topics were a bit boring. Hes a tough grader but does give As (just make sure u meet EVERYTHING on his rubric). Also,et ready to meditate with him!

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: Medicoff was probably the worst teacher I've ever had at JMSB (I graduated with straight A's except in a few classes, his included). He does not care about teaching at all. The only thing we did was to have class presentations EVERY SINGLE CLASS. His feedback were superficial and he doesn't care how much you work, he'll grade you as hard as he can.

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: Probably one of the worst teachers i took this semester. Final exam is based on book, doesnt touch it once. I know for a fact he skims through our individual project, so all the hard work you put in doesnt reflect your grade, its more on how he bases how you are. Stay away, ended up with a C+ , when this class is a easy B,B+

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: Avoid at all costs! Nice guy, fun lectures, but his grading makes absolutely no sense whatsoever. I am an advanced English student and received what he calls a "generous" 60% for our formal report worth 25%. After reviewing the report he said I was "lucky he didn't reduce my grade". Beware, this teacher will hurt your GPA!

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: Possibly the worst teacher. He is completely useless. He doesn't teach you the textbook at all and the whole final exam (40%) is on the textbook. Instead he teaches you about compassionate communication a boring subject that he is passionate about. He is an extremely hard grader on the formal report. Attendance is mandatory. Extremely rude. AVOID

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: easy class, all about the textbook (read it and get A-)  but don't expect medicoff to teach you anything about it,   Lectures are useless but he does an attendance sheet  rude and boring, would not recommend

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: He doesn't do anything during the semester and you have no preparation for the exam. You have to buy the textbook and teach yourself. That being said, the course is not that hard if you keep up with the textbook. As long as you put the effort to read the chapters on your own, you'll do fine. Finished with a B.

Name: Mark Medicoff
Review: Mark Medicoff is a horrible teacher. During the entire semester, he didn't open once the  book with us, and then at the end of the semester he said that the final exam is just about the book. He didn't explain any important material. It was really unclear how he wanted the presentation of the project.

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: Dr. Ornstein designed this course, and still includes his design and videos. I learned a lot!

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: This was an extremely interesting and educational class. However, It's very frustrating when you follow every guideline necessary and you do not receive the mark you're entitled to. I know i deserved a lot more on the essays than i got, and its ridiculous that the TA's are responsible to our marks. Its a good class to take, but a frustrating one.

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: This class was very informative and interesting. Dr. Ornstein was very interesting, easy to understand, and his lessons were very captivating. If you don't enjoy essays, don't take this class. I took this class as an elective and came out with an A.

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: Super easy class. Everything you need to write in your essay is in his video presentations. I barely used the book. Did get some helpful quotations from it though. The content was also very interestion. Take it! Seriously I got an A+.

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: Never before have I been so proud of the work I submitted. Never before had I gotten such poor grades, either. The course scheme is quite pathetic, and as others have noted, the key to success is to be unimaginative as possible. Regurgitate the professor's words, no matter how irrelevant, and you are (supposedly) rewarded. Stay away.

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS! The material was very vague.There was a lot of irrelevant and outdated content.The TAs were minimally helpful and the professor spent most of his time discussing his own opinions.The material is extremely redundant yet hard to sift through.The class is based on two 10 page essays and a final exam that consists of two essays.

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: Dr. Ornstein is a great teacher and a great person. I took his online biomedical ethics course and he definitely knows what he is talking about. He brings issues such as abortion, euthanasia, etc to you in a very logical manner for you to decide for yourself. Great course, would recommend!

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: HORRIBLE. DO NOT take this class. TAs are very harsh graders and it is NOT an easy elective.

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: Exactly what the previous poster said. I took this class because I was told it would be easy. Unfortunately my TA was an extremely harsh grader. In my papers I did not reiterate the prof's viewpoints, so I got a B. I did everything my TA had told me was missing in my papers on the exam, aka regurgitate the prof's words. Still got a B. Garbage.

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: Garbage course. Forced to regurgitate his viewpoints, lets T.A.'s run the entire course so if you get stuck with a harsh grading T.A. you are screwed. Avoid; I wrote exactly what was asked for and ended up with a B which ruined my GPA last semester.

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: Although I got an A+ in this class; I didn't like this class at all. No room for latitude or creativity whatsoever. If you don't follow what he wants and consider only his arguments, than you will fail. It's very easy to do well in this class, but there's no sense of intellectual integrity and objectivity. He passes his moral values as facts

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: The only issue i had with this class was with the TAs, when it came to grading. First paper, i received a B+, second paper i received an A. The issue with my 1st paper was that i didnt spend enough time looking at the other side of the argument, on the 2nd one i spent 1 whole page. My comment was: you didn't spend enough time on the other POV. Fail

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: Teacher was really funny and the subject so interesting.  Lots of work to do but worth it. This was my first online course and it was a really good experience.

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: very straight forward class and therefore, very easy to get a good grade. The video lectures are clear, instructions very clear...material is interesting. great course to take

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: The video lectures were extremely helpful and concise, more helpful than the textbook. The amount of reading required for this course was demanding. Having different options for our term papers was very useful. Overall, I enjoyed the material in this course.

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: Very good professor. The online class was easy; watching the videos helped to learn material and understand concepts with examples. I was very surprised at how easy this class was, but also how good/helpful the prof and TAs were. I recommend this to anyone for an easy elective!

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: I took his online biomedical class and i had no previous knowledge or interest to philosophy or biomedical BUT he really changed my perspective. I learned alot in his class and i really enjoyed it ! I would CERTAINLY recommend it. Honestly best online class i have taken (He was so clear in his lectures and in his readings).

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: Online biomedical ethics class; very interesting. I thought it was more demanding than this. I know the basics of writing an essay and when I chose my topics 2 days before due date, I was able to make a great text and get A+. Easy easy easy.

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: I took his online class and found it very interesting. It`s honestly very easy and straightforward. Highly recommended (and easy) if you are in University to actually learn something and if you know how to write an Essay properly.

Name: Jack Ornstein
Review: I AM A BUSINESS STUDENT AND HAD NO INTEREST IN TAKING A PHILOSOPHY COURSE, HOWEVER IT TURNED OUT TO BE EXTREMELY INTERESTING AND BEING AN ONLINE COURSE, VERY FLEXIBLE! THE GRADE DEPENDS ON THE STUDENT I GOT THE GRADE THAT I DESERVED FOR THE TIME THAT I INVESTED INTO THE COURSE. I WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS COURSE TO EVERYONE

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: Class is useless, he goes through the weekly chapter within an hour and do 2-3 exercises from the textbook. Break time is super long, sometimes a little over 20 mins and it's just a waste of time. Also, he came 15 mins late during the whole semester. Just stay home, read the chapter and practice on your own. Go to weekly tutorials, very helpful

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: Funny and Nice

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: COMM 305 is a very hard class but John makes the material simpler to understand! He's funny and the class is enjoyable even if you don't like accounting. He truly cares about his students and doesn't like to fail students. And, he answers his emails! But, you need to study a lot since the class is extremely difficult, no matter the teacher.

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: Would definitely commend! Use wileyplus instead of buying the textbook, all exercises are there

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: He REALLY cares about the students. I know I did bad in the class but I still ended up passing even though I probably had no hope haha! Pretty sure he curved it quite well to make sure most people pass

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: Jonathan is the best you can get for COMM 305. I am glad I waited for him - other options suck. Students in other classes even sat in his class. Despite teaching material quickly, he cares, gives examples, is funny, & makes it easier to digest. Go to class & tutorials, do homework & quizzes, do 10 past finals, & a decent grade will be achievable.

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: Really amazing prof, who makes sure students understand the concepts. Spends considerable amount of time problem solving, however should write more on the board because just visually seeing solutions is not the most helpful. Overall cares about students wellbeing. Would 100% recommend.

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: Jonathan is a very knowledgeable and funny teacher for this class and he makes accounting, a really boring subject, funny and interesting. I would highly recommend taking him.

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: One of the best that you can ask for accounting classes in JMSB. He is hilarious and he is caring. If you have any question, do not be shy and ask away!

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: Very good teacher! He made 305 easy!

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: good guy, he cares and you can ask him questions, dose not do to many problems

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: He wasn't even my teacher but I still attended most of his classes because I find him very interesting. He cares about his students and really tries to teach the material.

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: One of the nicest profs at JMSB. He really cares. He will do everything to help. Makes student's success his priority and is passionate about accounting which really engages everyone. Helps with assignments and responds to emails really fast. Would definitely recommend and I hope I can take him again!

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: the guys a champ, explains well, is helpful, funny and creates a warm and friendly atmosphere. Prob the best teacher for 217, i took him again for 305 this semester

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: Its one of the best profs I had at JMSB so far. He makes complicated things easier. He is ready to explain you same things again and again if you dont get it. Hes really helpful with the assignments. You need to remember that huge part of 217 is self-study and practice. But with his lectures its enough to listen to him read slides and practice.

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: He's as good as you will get for 217. Its a class that you must learn yourself and practice and practice and practice. He introduces it to you well, good luck with the rest lol.

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: the only bad thing i'd say about him is that he's very fast in his lectures but apart from that, a solid choice for comm 217 and 305. explains well the subject and always does 30-45 minutes of exercises for each chapter

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: tough class. Jon makes lectures bearable. he tries his best to make sure everyone understands

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: Jonathan is a solid choice for comm217. He explains the theory and does exercises during class step by step. He really cares about his students and its open to questions during and after class. Also, very funny. He is not very punctual but his lectures are worth attending. I would take his class again.

Name: Jonathan Schacter
Review: Approachable and genuinely caring guy. Will answer any question. Lectures are fun, enjoyable to attend. He mostly goes through slides, but makes efforts to make them clear. He seems to enjoy his subject, and makes you do so too. If they are available, attend as many tutorials as you can manage. The homework assignments are way below exam level.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: An excellent professor. Answers emails promptly, always helpful during office hours. Very funny - I never expected an accounting class to be so interesting. The class itself is very demanding - be prepared to work hard and study a lot.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: The best prof I have met in JMSB! I was debating if still stay in Accounting and luckily I met him. He made accounting so interesting and clear. He is patient, caring, and approachable. He respects his students and he inspires me! THE BEST!

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: I took him for summer semester and he really cares about students understanding the material. If you have any question his office hours are really Really nice person and approachable outsider class.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: Comm 217 is a very hard course, and requires a lot of practice. Read the chapters before class, practice the problems. Prof Mroz will help a lot and answer all your questions. He is also very clear and straightforward and by far the best choice for this class.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: He's just the best. Period!

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: The best teacher Ive ever had. He is an gentle kind,and funny guy who cares about his students and has really amazing classes. He makes COMM217 so clear. Would definitely take him again.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: he's super good honestly, take him and he makes it very clear, if you're unsure about something go to his office hours or even ask him after class, he's one of the best teachers at Concordia. He's also very open to email but, he wants his students to come to class although attendance is not mandatory, he can also help with any textbook problems

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: This is my first class with Professor Stanley Mroz. But so far he is amazing for me. This is because he makes us clear about the basic concepts of Financial Accounting .Therefore, in the future I wish I can complete my Accounting major courses if he teaches most of them.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: Stan is very patient and polite with clear explanation and great responsibility. Do not hesitate to take his section.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: Mr. Mroz is a super good teacher. He understands us and is always very helpful. He makes sure that everyone understands in the class. He is funny and genuinely a very nice guy. I recommend him in all of the accounting classes that you wish to take.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: Mr. Mrozs lectures are very understandable and he is hilarious. He explains every details patiently and doesnt mind if someone asks silly questions. Always replies my emails within an hour and always caring and encouraging. I got very good scores in exams because he made accounting so interesting.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: There's a lot of material to cover for this course, but Mr. Mroz explains it so well and do examples in class until he makes sure everyone understand. I would absolutely take him again.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: I took this class in the summer, assuming it will be easy, but it turns out to be quite the opposite. He is funny, but his exams are ridiculously hard in comparison to his assignments. Would not take ever again, also, for courses such as this, take it during the fall or winter semester, not during the summer.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: COMM 217 is a very difficult class however, Stan was very helpful outside of class. He answers his emails quickly and gives grades back pretty quickly within a reasonable amount of time. Great guy!

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: Absolutely the best teacher I've had so far.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: He's a great teacher, fair marker. Very helpful.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: One of the best profs I had in Concordia. He encourages questions (too often even), is very approachable and never misses an email. You do have to put in the work thou since acco230 is not an easy class. He explains clearly, but you need to have an idea of the topic beforehand (read the slides).  Will take again.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: Great teacher. He never lets an email pass and always attempts to answer all your questions. His marking is extremely fair and he is not out to trick you. Read the chapters prior to each class and you will understand whats going on.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: One of the best teachers I've had, explanations are clear and he takes time to go through at least one homework problem each week and (will take the entire hour and a half if he feels that the students need it). He is also really helpful, he answers as many questions as he can in class and will be more than happy to help during office hours.

Name: Stanley Mroz
Review: nice teacher.  has consistent office hours and answers email the same day usually. the above student saying he isn't helpful probably relied purely on the teacher and didn't study.   this isn't a class where you can just listen and ace it. you got to put in the work. he's a good Asset(cwatididthere?) to have to help you achieve a good grade

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: There's a reason his rating is dreadfully low on this site and from past students advice, just avoid this guy at all costs

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: ABI NADER IS AN ANGEL SENT FROM ABOVE. TAKE HIM HONESTLY HE IS THE MOST PREDICTABLE PROFESSOR OUT THERE. TAKE IT. HE IS THE BEST OF THE WORST.

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: not the best option lectures and final are very different!

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: Doesn't answer emails, condescending when asked questions, and only teaches theory in class without examples. His handwriting and notes on the board are all over the place. Outline said 4-6 pop quizzes, but he decided three weeks in that he would give one every week. At least he was true to his word about that. Laziest prof I've ever seen.

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: I found his exams fair. I know people will come @ me. I think that if you work hard, attend the lectures and do the assignments, his exams are doable and you can actually get a good grade in the class. I had read all the negative comments before enrolling in the class and got scared, but in the end I was pleasantly surprised.

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: If it were possible to give 0 out of 5 his rating would be 0.001. Avoid at all costs. Take another course and try next semester if he's the only one teaching

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: whatever happens, don't take physics with him, even if you have to, or risk losing your interest about physics for ever and ever. you have my word.

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: If you love yourself, don't take this professor, even if your life depended on it.

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: Just avoid this prof at all costs

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: At first you will be deceived by his smiles and theoretical explanation, but then you will realize why his rate is disastrous. He does not respond to emails. He keeps changing assignments deadlines. He just explains theories. He taught us two chapters literally before the exam day. Simply avoid.

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: Run before its too late

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: Probably the worst teacher I've ever had. Don't bother sending him emails because he'll never answer back. Try your best to avoid him at all costs.

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: He would not respond on time. He would change the deadlines of the assignment, I was not able to do one of them because he put the deadline on April 30th, 2019. Thinking you have until that time, he changes it a week earlier, and then tells you that it is your fault for not doing it on time. Please consider taking another professeur.

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: Personality-wise, I like the guy. He is smiley and pleasant to speak with. His exams are fair. The assignments are MUCH harder than what is taught, so get ready to spend hours and hours on them each week. As for his teaching: he doesn't explain the basics, so following examples without understanding the variables is impossible. Read the book.

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: If you want to save your life Take this class at cegep

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: Has very unrealistic expectations of the students. He has no idea how to run the online course, somehow he thinks that we are the only course he has. The material is not taught properly. The midterm was a joke because we didn't have enough time to finish the questions since we had an hour and 10 questions and one hour. AVOID AT ALL COSTS.

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: His explanations are okay but the material in the exams are nothing like it. The midterm was ridiculous ( 15 questions in less than one hour). The average is usually crazy low and usually everyone gets a boost to even it out. He also makes you buy the Ebook (for 150 ish $) so dont waste money on the hardcopy of the book.

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: run

Name: Georges Abinader
Review: Not the worst physics prof at concordia, not the best either though. Not great at explaining concepts but midterm and final were fair

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: Very organized class. Helps in giving you a good feedback to the real world. Interesting course

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: I learnt alot from this class about bring a professional auditor. Good simulated cases

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: One of best teachers teaching auditing. Gives real world situations. Teaches concepts very well. Tough grader but he makes you earn your mark

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: He is very good in how he communicates auditing to the students. He even gives you an idea how to prepare for final. Class assignments and quizzes good way to get high class marks. Textbook easy to understand. His slides excellant

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: Best teacher I had at JMSB. Made me interested in auditing

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: Goes out way to show how book material and real life events interrelated

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: Great teacher. Want him again for Acco 465

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: Passionate and caring instructor. Take him

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: Great course

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: I did not know what to expect from him. Teaching style all over the place

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: Teaches concepts very well. Brings in some of his own material. Approachable

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: Hard class. Good instructor. Lots of work. Likes student participation. Fair in marking assignments and exams.

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: Knows his stuff. You must be prepared for class.

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: All around interesting course. Better than what I expected

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: Teacher approaches the subject of auditing from a real life situation. You must work hard to get a good mark. Fair marker. You will Definately learn

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: He is an excellent master of the subject. He has vast knowledge and shares it with class. He goes beyond the text book and touches reality. You will understand auditing with him. Must participate and work hard

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: To get a good grade you must work hard. Participation will help increase your grade

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: Best teacher ever had. He gave me an enormous insight into profession

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: Really excellent teacher who cares how his students are doing. Tries to teach students how to be professional accountants.

Name: Stanley Schulman
Review: Great teacher. Case analysis he gets you to do critical thinking

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: Amazing teacher! he really knows his stuff and if stats aren't your strong suit he makes it really easy. makes a coursepack so everything you need is in there and puts the answers to the examples in class at the back of it, extremely efficient and would definitely take him again

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: I might be wrong about this prof, but he has some fundamental problem with assignment correction and grading!! you have to be very careful all the time because he misses or forgets to give a proper grading! try hard to explain in the simple form to students ,but sometimes it does not work well and confuses the student more.

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: He is one of thebest professors I had, I really recommend taking his class. He gives lots of examples and questions review.

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: This class didn't even start and I was sure I'll fail it cuz I was never good with numbers, but prof. Merhi explains the material so well that I received an A+. It is nothing out of the ordinary, you just have to be present and focused on what he's teaching. Good prof, fair grader. Took SOCI213 as well, but received and A-, cuz I was too confident.

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: He is a great professor. He explains very well and his midterm and final review is almost IDENTICAL to the exam. Easy A!!!!

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: Awesome teacher. His course pack is incredible. Very useful and the course was extremely well taught. Many assignments which help boost grades based on class material in lectures. Highly recommended

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: Awesome teacher. Very easy to follow and good at explaining. Helps you as soon as you have questions or need help ! Highly Recommend

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: I was worried about this class because I find math very hard to understand yet this became one of my favourite courses because of how well I was able to follow along. The course pack follows his lecture exactly which makes studying very easy. If you don't understand something you can ask him to reexplain it after class. He is very approachable.

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: Very easy A. he gives assignments for each chapter and all of them are similar to the practice examples we did in class. No phones allowed in class tho, and he takes attendance every lecture

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: Made stats really easy. For the exams just to the practice test and you will get a good mark

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: Good teacher, very efficient.

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: Absolutely adore this professor. He made me enjoy statistics. His teacher style for stats is more applied , he makes you do the problems in class and makes sure to review everything with the class so that everyone can understand. Highly recommend!

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: Math was never my strong suit, however professor Merhi made it VERY easy to understand. It's a fast paced course, however as long as you stay on top of your work and read through your notes prior to each class there's no reason to get anything below the A-range. Assignments are very straight forward & similar to textbook examples. Highly recommend!

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: Honestly, math related subjects are so NOT my strong suit. But, with Hussein it's never felt so easy. He works everything out with you step by step and explains several times if you don't understand. He makes his own coursepack which I find is better than a mathmaticians textbook. I regret taking Aaron for Stats 2 because he is NOWHERE near as good

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: OK so, I have never written a review of a teacher, nor have I felt compelled to do so UNTIL NOW! I have been a student since 2011 (and although I changed programs a lot) I put off taking stats cause I HATE MATH!!! Hussein Merhi makes it EASY! Seriously, if you need to take stats and you have him as an option, TAKE HIM!

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: He may seem aloof, but first impressions are often deceptive. He's a sweet man who wants you to do well in his course. No tricks on his exams; just do the exercises and you will get it. I struggled with math in HS, and am averaging a 96 in this course right now. I almost regret not being able to take his other course! He makes statistics so easy.

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: Fair course but i found him dry and very intimidating, not super appraochable but the text book is super clear

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: Hussein really is a gem and a prof worth an A+. you can tell he really wants you to succeed in his class, however you need to show up. his course pack is a gift sent from heaven that can make anyone understand statistics. fabulous teacher and even funny too at times. definitely recommend him.

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: Very thorough prof, great teacher and first math class I have taken that I enjoyed. He teaches clearly, and going to class is recommended but if you miss one his course pack has all the information.

Name: Hussein Merhi
Review: I was in LOW math for high school, but I got an A in this class! He is one of the best profs I've ever had! He is clear and concise and his course packs are REALLY HELPFUL! Make sure you attend EVERY lecture, do ALL the practice problems in the course pack and you will be fine. Try to sit at the front of the class so that you can hear everything!

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Best teacher ever. Took his class at McGill and Concordia and would highly suggest. He is a professor who genuinely cares about his students learning and will go above and beyond to make sure you understand the course material.

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: One of the best professors I've ever had in JMSB. You can tell he's a smart guy and he shares many stories about things he has done in his life. Just sitting and listening to him will increase your knowledge about the course and life in general. Extremely enjoyable class, my only suggestion would be to make sure you read the textbook on your own.

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Jeff is a very funny and nice teacher. His class is actually enjoyable to go to. The only bad thing is that I find he goes off topic a little too much and skims through course material. With that being said, you need to really study the textbook on your own time to do well. If you learn best from lectures, I would avoid.

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Sacksner's slides are gold, he tries his best to help students, sometimes give tips, and he is generous. The only hard thing in this class is remembering the concepts and exactly write the definitions and explanations in the exams. Jeff tries his best to explain and gives real life experience. I would definitely recommend.

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Great Teacher. Super clear grading system. He is super understanding and knowledgeable. Read his slides and you can easily achieve an A+. Definitely recommend taking him whenever possible.

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Amazing lecturer! Concordia needs more profs like Jeff who is hilarious & animates the class instead of put them to sleep. Even if they're full of themselves. Classes were super chill, especially for a boring subject like OB, which made it way easier to digest. Read the book & test yourself regularly or you won't pass final. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!!!

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Jeff is a great teacher, he has a strong character, makes his classes entertaining by cracking jokes, and is always energetic. He is demanding and expects work to be done, but can also be very understanding. Stay honest! His lectures tend to be shortened, and he doesn't focus on theory (no need) group work is where you'll get those grades

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Take this prof!!! He cares, is amazing, & is hilarious. His lectures & slides are also amazing. It makes the course material much easier to digest. This is a very theory-intensive course so you need to read everything regularly and test yourself. You won't pass if you wait until 2 weeks before exams. Definitely recommend & would take again!

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: He likes the work he is doing, not for the money i believe but to share his experience with the students. Never boring in the class, make classes lively and interacting. with hard work and participation, you'll definitely have a good grade with this guy.

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Funny guy very entertaining but just is not clear on what we have to learn for the final and just tells you to learn everything. but he did say though that hes curves most of the time

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: It was a great experience attending his class. Entertaining and funny (with dirty and offensive jokes) makes classes real fun. He is very vain and a few jokes were lame. I would not take him again as his grading is tough and he basically chooses a range (A- to B-) and puts you in one of those. He brings in outside speakers. Take him at least once!

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Jeff is funny and cares about his students, but he's demanding.  You'll have to work to get a decent grade. I loved his class but would not take again.

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: One thing about him: he thinks he's hilarious. Thinks he's the funniest and expects you to laugh at his (mostly) lame jokes. He's ok at teaching, although he thinks he's better than he actually is. Anyways, wouldn't take him again. I found him too full of himself, even if class material was quite interesting.

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Okay, real experiences

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Lectures are more entertaining than they are useful. He thinks he's the funniest guy in the room and it shows. That said, Jeff is a good professor who cares about his students. His slides are good and he prepares you well for the exam. Concordia professors can be a bit boring and distant - not Jeff. Worth taking at least once.

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Simply.. Amazing Jeff!!!! Tests are tricky and he provides great feedback on your report/presentation. I would pay to attend to his class, it is freaking entertaining..

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Literally the best and most inspiring prof I've ever had in my life.. simply caring and his powerpoint slides are so good... plus he's hilarious!

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: Amazing teacher! Very friendly and approachable and always willing to help students out

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: If you attend class, there shouldn't be any surprises on exams

Name: Jeffrey Sacksner
Review: By far the best professor I've ever had at JMSB. He's hilarious and very chill. Classes are really interesting he's a part-time businessman who teaches at Concordia. His exams are very fair and with proper studying and reading the book you can definitely do well. Would recommend him for any class!

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: crazy hard marker

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: Loretta always comes to class to give her best to teach the class in an engaging way. Although she seems to to be limited in 1h15 to give us the lesson, she will always welcome you with open arms to her office hours and really take the time to explain exactly what you don't understand.

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: she is a good teacher and wants you to learn and do well in this class. she might be strict sometimes but I think it is acceptable.

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: She explained things that are unrelated to the course material

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: she is strict for no reason. This is not secondary or high school. she makes preferences among the students. she is a tough grader for no reason - will force us to draw diagrams in pen!

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: She's unnecessarily strict. Her class is like high school; no talking, texting or even getting up to go to the washroom. Ultimately, for 220, as long as you go to tutorials, you'll be fine no matter the prof.

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: Good teacher but the tutorials are a must if you want to do well in the class. Classes are not enough to succeed.

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: Loretta Hung is alright. Not the best teacher I had but not the worst. She goes really really fast in class at times though and I might be difficult to grasp what she says given that she has a thick accent.

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: Great teacher! She really cares about her students and is passionate about the subject and it shows through her lectures. COMM 220 is not the hardest subject if you are willing to work (read the textbook, do the study plan & attend tutorials). She's really straightforward about what she expects from us.

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: The professor always sticks to the book and ask very minute details from the book for the exams. I really hoped that she put the course more in her own words and examples. All the examples and what she taught was right from the book - why should I then mandatorily attend the class? Make sure to read and ans to the point.

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: One of the best lecturers in my opinion. You want to do well because she makes class interesting. 2 in class tests (MC), midterm (easy) and final (pretty hard). 220 is a reasonably challenging course because there are lots of chapters and practice required but just keep up with lectures and youre fine.  Attend Matteo's tutorials.

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: Amazing teacher! Her lectures are interesting but it's true that she goes over the material pretty fast, so maybe read the chapters before each class and definitely attend the tutorials. She's very accessible outside of class and she truly cares about students and our success in this class! This is not an easy class so you'll have to work for it!

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: Professor Hung is a really good professor even if she is a tough one. You will learn and she is very knowledgeable about the course. She does have an accent, but if you can get past it she is a solid choice

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: She's a nice person but a tough grader! The midterm is very fair and easy, but her tests are tricky. The tutorials are great for extra practice!

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: I would honestly go to class and feel like I was dumb. Then, I would go home, read the textbook and go "ohhh this is all it is?!" I couldn't understand anything, goes way too fast. I would recommend simply going to a tutorial and reading the lecture notes posted. Nice person though, she does try her best!

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: What I heard about her was false, she is a tough marker only if you don't follow the rules (for example long answers MUST be in ink). She warns people well in advance and reminds people. The course itself is not hard if you put the effort weekly. Go to the tutorials and do some practice problems. The midterm and in class tests are more than fair.

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: Prof Hung is impeccable. She is funny, dedicated and a legend for Comm220. She loves the material and loves her students even more. Beware though: her exams are of EXTREME difficulty (40%-50% averages). She also doesn't drop ANY hints on the final. For some good practice and great reinforcement, go to tutorials, they are a MUST for this class

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: Good teacher, tough class. Go see her for help as she gives good feedback.  would take her again.

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: She is a very nice person and she tries to help you, HOWEVER, when it comes to exams, she gives a very tricky, hard test!(Multiple choice+long  ans + very very tough timing).She doesnt practice solving problems with you and I think thats the problem. I know students who solved almost all end of chapters problems and still didnt do well in exam.

Name: Loretta Hung
Review: It's true that the course is sort of challenging, but she knows her materials and is always ready to help her students. She speaks fast but understable. You need to attend her classes, go to tutorials and practices on the materials you learned to pass the course!

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: Really bad data for minicase RIP anyone who needs this class

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: Oh my gosh, the"minicase " which was 20% was beyond annoying. the minicase should never have been given as an assignment because BTM200 is just an introductory course. This teacher should eradicate the minicase assignment already. So to you dear student reading this, Please avoid this course , even the online course.

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: what...

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: he literally taught nothing. the online assignments are unclear and pointless. no feedback of why you got the grade you did, and the slides are a confusing mess. just do the practice questions a lot and try to find old finals to study off of. the questions are all the same

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: easy A but you don't learn anything completely waste of time, unless you are trying to boost your GPA

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: Overall pretty good class. I find the ebook we had to read was way too long for nothing and could have been much more condensed. The final is worth 60% and is computer generated so you really have to be familiar with all of the material.

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: final is worth 60%, mini-case worth 15% and pretty much everything else is 1% per quiz/ assignements. It requires a good 30 min to 120min of actual work for 1%. Really not worth it. videos are useless and need to be updated.

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: This class is an easy A if you practice his Eisel questions over and over for the final exam. I personally did not like the class but the TA s are very helpful.

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: I think he's great. the class is really fun. I have no clue about what grade I will get. He seems like a really nice guy.

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: You need to pay for various websites. It is an easy course if you study. For a first year course, it shows you that you are in a University and no more in highschool, so independance is key. Most people that complain are people that didn't study the right thing. Make sure to always go on the websites to get the updates.

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: AVOID AVOID AVOID!!!!!!! IF YOU ARE READING THIS, AVOID THIS CLASS AS AN ELECTIVE!!!!
