YOU WILL END UP PAYING $300 ON USELESS WEBSITES FEES YOU WILL NEED TO SIGN UP TO 3 DIFFERENT WEBS WHICH 2  OF EM ARE USELESS. You hvae to study 3 lessons for each quiz in Econcordia and the 3 quizes only count for 1% each. SAM23 and learninglab are useless! AVOID

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: This class is a joke. Had to sign up to 3-4 websites for the class and ended up paying around $300 in useless website fees. I learned absolutely nothing in this class. The class videos are decades old, the prof is impossible to get in touch with, and the TAs, though they probably try, are equally incompetent. Shame that it's a JMSB requisite.

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: Class isnt that bad, make sure you work with someone you know that's in your class.

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: Disorganized. Send your assignments twice or he will loose them and you'll get a zero

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: The WORST. You gotta avoid this one.

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: this class is a waste of money so you better get the grade you want from it lol cause you don't want to repeat it and spend hundred of dollars on it again. however, it is an easy class, it is not challenging. it is easy to pass it with a good grade!

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: Absolute joke of a course, textbook is apprx. 1000 pages (including excel and access), yet material on the final is not found in the textbook... Saade either has no clue whats going on, or chooses ignore everything (probably the latter). glad I got a 70 on the final mostly by guessing as i had not seen the material before.

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: You will have to learn how to use SAP by yourself. Study well for the midterms, he will ask basic multiple choice questions but harder long answer questions. Some of them even require some creativity, meaning that you will need to think outside of the box. Also, team project consists of a big part of your final grade so choose well your teammates.

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: Not recommended at all. Waste of time and money.

Name: Rafaat Saade
Review: The teacher does not help students for the class.

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: I have seen the reviews before taking a class with Mr. Wong, and I still decided to take his class (since I have had "bad" teachers in the past and pass the class easily). However, I would HIGHLY advise you to take another teacher. DON'T TAKE HIM. His notes are full of mistakes, and he doesn't even know how to mark properly. Avoid at all cost

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Really tough grader, exams are harder than what he taught us.

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: He is extremely rude, arrogant and condescending. Do not bother going to see him at his office hours because not only will he not give you tips on how to study properly for his exams but he will try to convince you to drop his course and make sarcastic remarks to bring your confidence down. He enjoys making students' lives miserable like his!!!!!!

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Avoid this teacher at ALL COSTS (even if this is your only class left to graduate). Reading his notes and handout problems will have you think that you are fully prepared for his exams but they are simply not sufficient. His exams are in a way that only straight A students and those with a lot of outside class knowledge will somehow manage to pass.

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Avoid at all costs for all the reasons mentioned below. I would never take this prof again in the future.

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Wonderful professor and a fantastic personality. Would definitely take him again!

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Took for 395 in the summer. Was good because he dropped the last chapter, but still tough grader. Notes are riddled with mistakes and he is hard to reach outside of class. Would not have passed if it weren't for itech. Avoid Wong.

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Stephen Wong was by far, the worst teacher I have had at JMSB. Rude, responded to questions by insulting students or telling them what they asked didnt matter. He also uses handwritten notes, scanned by somebody in the class uploaded as pictures, on the class forum. Nightmare of a course. Avoid Avoid Avoid Avoid

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Brutal. Brutal brutal brutal. Professor Wong's class is like taking a step back in time. Discourages students from using the textbook (which has up to date and correct methods) and will bog you down with outdated and flawed finance. Mistakes in his notes are too many to count. How is this man even allowed to teach?

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Its a shame that teachers with Mr. Wong's reputation are not held accountable for their work. This man's problems/solutions/explanations are are full of mistakes and yet students are dismissed for pointing them out. Studying for his exams is like a guessing game, and you'll never guess right because material is not restricted to topics covered.

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Oh man this guy. Usually a teacher is either 1) very knowledgeable or 2) will at least be kind, approachable and try to help. This man is neither. Will answer student questions with statements like "you should know this by now" and fail to provide an actual response - because he doesn't know. You're wasting your time taking for this class.

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: You'll leave his exams feeling like you've studied for the wrong test. Questions seem to be pulled out of nowhere. You could be able to do all of the course problems, textbook problems, and handout problems inside-out - you still wont do well. Doesn't matter if you study 2 hours or 200, you're walking out with whatever Wong decides.

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: It's a bad course made worse by an even worse teacher. Very rude to his students and gets completely flustered if a question isn't directly from his notes. Speaking of his notes, they are riddled with mistakes that he's too careless to fix. Knowledge and methods are outdated...

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Concordia should be embarrassed to still employ this individual. Complete disregard for students questions, regardless of how insightful. Will assign arbitrary grades with absolutely no criteria or commentary. Will not offer explanations, will not revise. Level of effort is not rewarded, cannot prepare for exams. Learning is basically discouraged.

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Absolutely horrible. You'll be spending more time trying to figure out what's wrong with the notes than actually learning something.  Forget about asking questions as if it derails a bit from his notes, he won't be able to answer.  After 35 years of teaching, you would think that he would have learned a better way of teaching.

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Funny teacher -exams are his notes but with tricks -nobody asks questions in class because he's mean -explanations are so bad, I'm sure even he wouldn't understand himself -M&A's are one of the coolest topics in finance and he manages to make it SOOO boring.  -first test is the most fair, so get your marks early. Often ends class 30 min early

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Stephen actually is not a bad as you guys mentioned.... I am an exchange student. His lesson is quite clear and straight to the point. It is quite to understand the theory which I have learnt in Hong Kong. It's my favourite course in here!! Sometimes he might be rude, but just for the stupid questions only.

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: He is an amazing teacher... most people hate on him, but for me he was quite easy to follow. His notes do have a bunch of mistakes, but his midterms and finals are carbon copies of his class problems, although with a few curve balls thrown in there. At least I never had to show up to class and just had to work my way through his notes. Fits w/ work

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: Worst teacher I ever had !! he is really rude ,does not respond to emails . can't say one good thing about this teacher

Name: Stephen Wong
Review: WHERE TO START? First, don't expect to ask him questions because he's very rude, next his lectures have many mistakes, his handwriting is very hard to read, he sometimes doesn't know what he himself is doing or saying. His tests are hard!! IN SUMMARY: AVOID ! AVOID! AVOID! AVOID!

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: bad

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: He's one of the best profs I had. Emails are always answer same day. Gives very good feedback. He's a bit on the tougher side when it comes to marking but the course has no exams and is simply weekly synthesis with two papers due at the end of the semester. I can honestly say that Pearce's class is one of the few that actually had an effect on me.

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: EXCELLENT PROFESSOR

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: Brent is hands down one of the best profs I've had at Concordia. I am so glad I had the chance to have him because he's an awesome man! Very knowledgable, gives amazing real life advice and he's also hilarious which is a plus. If you have the chance to take Brent, do not think twice! You won't regret it!

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: One of the most inspirational and "real" educators I have ever had. If you ever have the chance, sit in his class and listen to his advice on life. While his style of lecturing may or may not be for everyone, his advice comes from the heart and he teaches beyond the textbook. A true gem of an educator.

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: Brent is one of the best teachers I have ever had. You have to take him. It's that kind of teacher who's in his 60s but wants you to call him by his first name. Only bad thing about him is that he doesn't give As easily (out of a hundred of students, I'd say only 5 got As). So if you only want As for your GPA, don't take him. But he's worth the B.

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: Compassionate and caring prof. Easy quizzes, group project was long but you get a well deserved grade. Hilarious lectures, midterm was easy. The final (not written by him) was unnecessarily hard, read the book, know the examples and attend the lectures and you will get an A.

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: the most amazing professor i have taken in my 2+ years at concordia. Knowledgable, fair. i learned more with hi in 1 semester than in my academic career!

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: Loved class with Brent; so funny, uses real life examples and made going to an 8:30 am class on Fridays worth it. Doesn't give A's but teaches you a lot and is a fair grader. He also corrects exams really fast and is easy to get in touch with outside of class. Super nice guy, I would definitely take a class with him again.

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: Learn extra useful things and tips in life, the course content is straightforward but attending class is useful for real life reference and deeper explanation. Understanding is better than cramming for a better grade. He was nice and genuine, very straightforward. Thanks Brent.

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: He is an amazing prof! Cares for his students and jokes around, really helps you understand the material. Makes mistakes while grading so be careful. Never gives A's, so he's a tough grader. However, I learned so much from him about marketing and so many other things. You have a friend for life with this guy.

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: He goes off topic every single class and he is a tough grader. You can tell he doesnt want to give anyone A's whether that is for a test or project. If you're looking for a loaf class take him. If you want a fair grader, look elsewhere.

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: The best teacher at Concordia. If you even have a chance to take a class with them, take it!!

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: TAKE HIM!!! don't think twice!!!! amazing prof, keeps your attention during lectures, is very clear in the way he wants things and he is always there when you need help. you can do really well int his class but you do have to study its not an "easy A".

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: Very well organized and provides timely feedback on quizzes and and the midterm. He often starts class with an educational video that is relevant to the course material he is about to teach during a given class. Student participation is greatly encouraged. Although he is a tough grader, just put in a bit of effort and you should do just fine.

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: AMAZING TAKE HIM. He is an inspirational man and will help you. GIVES YOU HINTS DURING CLASS FOR MIDTERM

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: Don't think twice, just take him, he's the best!

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: Brent is a unique. The course lectures can be somewhat long and boring but Brent adds his own touch of humour and personal experiences which makes it more enjoyable. This prof loves teaching and is there for his students. Go to class, don't cram until the final week, and you'll do well in his class!

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: Took Brent for COMM 223 in Winter 2017. Great guy, super friendly, caring, and funny (even though he repeats the same jokes, just laugh again). He's a fair grader but he doesn't believe in giving A's. The highest grade in my section was an A- (which 8 students got in the class), but it's easy to get a B/B+ for sure. Study outside class.

Name: Brent Pearce
Review: Hes a really tough grader.

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: Great teacher, he gives interesting classes and doesn't only read the textbook. Definitely study his powerpoints to score a good grade on the midterm and for the final he directs you on what you should spend more time studying! Recommend!!

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: I really regret taking him for Comm 223, he's really good at cynical and condescending jokes as a part of explaining his lecture and also in treating his students.

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: AVOID AT ALL COST

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: He doesn't care about students at all and is also a bully looking down on students who didn't get the material (or try to ask him questions after class). Group project is a nightmare. Thanks to Robby, I truly hate marketing now.

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: He is a perfect example of a bad teacher. Attending lectures is useless. Read the book and the powerpoint slides on your own to prepare for the exam. Do not rely on him to help you prepare for the final. Try to avoid him.

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: A perfect example of a bad teacher

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: you learn a lot from bad teacher A perfect example of a bad teacher

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: the worst teacher that i ever had

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: I have to teach myself the book

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: Dont go to lectures. study all the slides on your own. Exams are based on that. There is a group project (pray you dont get a lazy group). The directions of the project are not clear so get ready to speculate your way Through it.

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: Finding the comments on here really misleading. Not such a "tough" grader, he grades accurately, you just have to work for this course. His lectures are interesting and fun.

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: Avoid at any cost. Class material is not bad but he doesn't explain it well in class, keeps on cracking up some jokes and magic tricks but at the end of the day, you don't learn much. Final was really tough compared to how he described it. If you have the option to choose another professor then do.

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: Let me get right to the point: TRY AND AVOID Professor Saks if you can. He is not an easy grader and I would go as far as to say he goes out of his way to look for faults in your writings/answers. I know very few who respond well to his teaching style. Sure he does magic tricks in attempt to keep the class entertained, but please try & avoid!

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: Nice guy, bad teacher !

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: The class was fun to attend and gained lots of knowledge that only helped me in the midterm. The group project was brutal and he was very discouraging about any idea we come up with. The final exam was very hard compared to how easy he made it seem. HOWEVER, he does curve up the marks and apparently always does.

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: trickiest midterm. harshest grader.

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: He goes off topic super easily (he once randomly spent 30 mins showing us a "magic trick" with cards during class without any marketing context whatsoever). His classes consist of him reading the power point ft. completely random jokes.

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: Most irrelevant teacher I ever had, didn't learn much midterm and final were brutal. Wer are talking about marketing class not engineering or political science!! And still, He makes the class extremely hard for what it really is. Avoid at any cost. Don't think twice, Drop it now! There are other classes with better teachers

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: Avoid at all cost. He is fun in class but does not prepare you for the final. He said the final would be easier than the midterm, to study less. The final was brutal compared to his midterm. Very tough grader. Horrible. Its all fun and games until you get your grades you will see.

Name: Robby D. Saks
Review: entertaining yet useless lectures with an easy midterm. he is a very hard grader when it comes to the project as no one gets over 75. If you go to office hours he always seems to enjoy talking down to you without really answering your question. He does not prepare you for the final what so ever. I would avoid him and just read the textbook.

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: stan Was the best prof ,I have ever had He inspired my interest in politics and influenced my work ethic. He simplified the world of politics, history and popular culture to make it relevant for students. His insight gave accurate context to his teachings.

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: One of the best teachers ever in University!  Definitely recommend him for his helpfulness, understanding and passion to teach and help us understand the subject, while adding some humour makes the classes interesting ! Keep up the great work Mr. Nachfolger

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: Very nice and helpful professor, but this course is difficult and the book isn't helpful. Make sure to go to him and outside resources for help. The course breakdown includes a midterm, 13 page research paper, and a final.

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: Most interesting teacher !

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: Best prof ever! If I could take him one more time I would! He is just amazing...no better prof than him!

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: lectures are the most important, but if you miss you can catch up with the textbook. wants you to pass, fair grader, makes class enjoyable and interesting

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: The teacher is funny and really helpful when you need him for the project or to study for the exam. You have to learn a lot of things by heart, but if you went to class and listened it is usually not a problem. the textbook is mostly used towards the end of the semester. I DO RECOMMEND him.

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: So at first I was intimidated. Turned out the best poli sci professor at Concordia and it is in his class that I got the best grade, too. Term paper was the longest, 25 pages, but enjoyed writing it a lot and learned something while at it. I highly recommend him. His lectures are NEVER boring and that is because he is passionate about it.

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: He is the best professor ever in concordia !! he know exactly what he teaches and his classes are very stimulating. I would take any class where he is the professor!

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: His explanations are very clear. He's such a funny guy that attending to his classes is a pleasure. His midterm is easy : you only have to learn by hearth (and understand as well)  your notes , but for the final READ THE TEXTBOOK

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: Prof. Nachfolger is great. I love going to his classes. He wont give any A's, only 1 was given out, and the majority of grades were between B+ - C+. Make sure you attend his classes as the tests are entirely off his notes. His tests are specific so make sure you study your notes well. He's a great Prof.

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: He has an extremely hard exterior. To this day, I'm not sure how friendly he is.  He'll answer emails with 2 words.  GO TO CLASS!  Textbook is not needed, we were never tested on it.  Easy class.  I got an A which was the highest mark.  There were no A+.  If you study, you'll do well.

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: Best professor yet! It is a shame that he is retiring and not teaching any other subjects! Gonna keep on visiting him at Starbucks; Only have to go to class, work (since he is very detailed oriented) and you will get a good grade

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: Amazing profesor, i am gonna miss his lectures, super approachable and available to students, makes the classes fun! attendance is supper important sincetheir content it is what is asked in the exams.

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: Well, he knows nothing, makes everyone think that he is very knowledgable. if you have learned anything before you will notice the countless mistakes that he made throughout the course. Has his own opinion and if you want to do good you MUST agree with it. Horrible teacher. People like him only cuz he gives good grades. I got an A.

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: This teacher is awesome! He gives the exam questions in advance and there is no surprise! If you do your work and come to class, you'll definitely get an A! Love this teacher!

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: Cannot go wrong, easy pass IF you GO TO CLASS. Follows the course outline exactly and is very detailed in his lectures. has a funny character, such a nice guy and helpful!

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: Great professor, likes to occasionally crack jokes. Must attend class, almost all the material for exams comes from class notes. Gives you themes of exam before hand. If you attend class and take decent notes, a good grade is very easy to attain. And he makes the information easy to understand. A+.

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: You must attend class. All the information you need to learn for exams and for your pleasure and lasting knowledge in the future is there for you if only you attend all classes. I stayed glued on my seat listening to all his lectures. Very interesting, very encouraging. Fair marking.

Name: Stan Nachfolger
Review: He's a very helpful prof. He sits in Starbucks for an hour before class to talk to students who have questions or give them advice for the final paper. He doesn't go into too much detail, but his lectures are still interesting with plenty of examples.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: He is a great prof with a lot of knowledge. He does tend to go off track but his exams are no surprise just attend class and write down everything he says in class and you'll do fine.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: Avoid this prof at all costs. His lectures are 99% personal anecdotes and 1% relevant information. Repeats the importance of class discussion, but will cut off or condescend any student that tries to contribute. Has very little grasp of what he's even supposed to be teaching on any given day. He is unclear, intolerant, and disrespectful.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: If you can avoid this teacher, DO IT. I took Critical Reading and he is the worst lecturer I've ever had. He repeats himself lecture after lecture. He said the n-word with the hard R in class and he justified that it was to be sure we knew what the n-word means. He wants participation in class but cuts and argues with every student.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: Worst professor ever. Gets off track with all his lectures, debates with students instead of teaching, cuts everyone off, acts superior, belittles his students. Has soooo many tests and essays and doesn't tell us what it's gonna be on or even the format of the test. All in all, horrible. Don't take ever.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: Terrific teacher. A lot of material and challenging exams but you will learn a lot.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: Covering a lot of material in a very short time, in-class essays worth too much and 8 page paper worth too little, vague grading criteria, unapproachable and not nice for no reason. To be avoided at all costs.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: do not take, you've been warned.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: no actual group projects- But do yourselves a big favour- form a study group outside of class to go over & discuss the material(that was supposed to be)covered in class- as this teacher doesn't do much teaching. Unprepared w/ a $100 + textbook that he hadn't consulted before class-all texts in the syllabus were avail online for free. Avoid.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: His teaching style is outdated: there are no visuals, just taking notes about what he says, and grading criteria are often vague. However, it can be adapted to. If you come to class, pay attention, and go to his office hours, he will recognize that you care about what he teaches. Note what he consistently repeats, it will likely be on the exams.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: I took this course because I love poetry. We barely talked about poetry, as he talks more about his personal life and irrelevant examples. Gets defensive when you ask a question and will never give you a concrete answer. It is impossible for him to give us proper instructions on what the final paper/exam will be. Do NOT recommend.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: Lectures are non sensical. Grades don't correlate with work provided. He made the class write a 12 page essay with 15 sources for 15% of the grade (without any useful instruction in poetry). Takes attendance, made us purchase $150.00 book that doesn't even have the sources we need in class (Google was more helpful). Not worth it.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: Nice overall. Outline can use some work. For example he should split the texts into Classical/Romantic/Victorian and not abbreviate the names of the works so they are easier to find. An interesting English class; Not the same approach as CEGEP (new critical). Cannot recommend if you have issues attending class. No class notes, traditional lectures.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: He glides around in lateral thought, having a lifetime of contemplating literature from multiple languages to use as Bernoulli machines. During one lecture, he began to glow a mixture of orange and beige. If you are into wisdom, take the class. The material you can read by yourself, it is rare you get to listen to a passionate madman riff.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: Dr. Moghaddam has a lot of experience of 30 years and plus where he has stories and hilarious jokes that he adds in the introduction of the course material in most of his classes. There is no space for you to relax in his class . You must earn your grade by simply listening to his classes and by participating to his class discussion .

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: actually the worst teacher i have ever had! very unorganized; rambles on for hours without any sort of lecture cues, isn't clear about expectations on exams; he does not teach; he rambles about his credentials ; his teaching style is not accessible and everyone in my class was constantly confused! will never ever take one of his classes again.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: When I began attending Concordia University, I was unsure if I was in the right place, if I had chosen the right major, a blizzard of uncertainty. I was a lazy student not willing to put in the work. Eventually I came across professor Mogahddam, his dynamic lectures brought me to have a passion for literature. Hard work pays off, you will enjoy it.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: The teacher is knowledgeable & passionate about the subject. I learned a lot. He answers many questions in class & his office hours. The research paper I would recommend talking to him in advance & continuing to ask questions to follow up. If you get stuck, he can help. He is caring & the support is there if you ask for it

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: Dr. Moghaddam has over 30 years in teaching experience and is a great professor to have. He has a lot of experience, stories, jokes and advice that he will share with the class to introduce the material. Every class, he'll do a recap so we gradually remember. If you're willing to put in the effort, he is an amazing prof and mentor to have.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: I would definitely not recommend this professor. He was boring and rude. He was also very disorganized. Took weeks to give grades back. All he did was talk, no visuals or anything of the sort. He stood in the front of the class and talked the whole time, that was all.

Name: Mahmood Moghaddam
Review: If you have any self respect, youll take my advice and steer clear from this teacher.

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: Terrible lecturer! She doesn't teach anything new, only repeats things learned from intro macro. She gets annoyed when she can hear people talking even though the class is pointless to go to. If you ever want her to get avoid a question simply state "can you do a numerical example to show this easier?" and watch her dance her way out of it.

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: econ is hard, she creates detailed overheads in class which helps to avoid information overload. found her handbook interesting and a different and useful perspective to think of the WHY in econ opposed to WHAT alone, encourages thinking. constantly moving, will make time to help in office hours or after class. takes and answers questions.

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: Not a good prof

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: Adomait is an awful professor. However. Economics was pretty darn easy. It was my highest mark last semester and is very straight forward. Did not need the textbook so save your money. Also dont read her god awful book bc you dont have too. Youll do fine dont even worry. Ps this is not a troll im just a genius

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: hard class, no lecture slides, just draws a million things and expects us to know what it all means. USE THE TEXTBOOK to teach yourself it really saved me and is much clearer. Also try to get 100 on all quizzes they are unlimited attempts and is worth 10% of grade can help a lot. Do not need to read her entire book she just wants you to. goodluck

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: Pls for the love of god, do not take this class unless you absolutely have to. The prof legitimately said, after a god awful midterm average to "drop the class, because you will do worse on the final". Absolutely the worst teaching style and prof, she scribbled graphs on pieces of paper and gives you no guidance. Rely on the textbook. dont do it

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: The material covered was not too difficult however she did a poor job at teaching it. Went strictly off in class notes which were very unorganized and sometimes incorrect. Also gave little/misleading info on what would be covered on midterms and the final. This was the class I attended the most this semester and by far the worst grade I received.

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: This was the most overly challenging class I have ever taken in my life. I left every single lecture upset and confused, her teaching was extremely confusing and nearly impossible to follow. Since i wasted my time attending her lectures, I didnt have the time to re teach myself the course. Absolutely awful.

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: This professor made this course WAYYYY more difficult than it needed to be. Going to SLG classes was more useful. Attending class is not necessary as she does not help you explain anything. This class is hard enough, and made the exam almost impossible to pass. Weekly quizzes were nothing like course material. DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: Prof. Adomait's Econ1050 class was probably the hardest class I have ever taken. Be prepared to make your own notes and spending hours outside of class studying as she only draws graphs in class. I failed the midterm pretty badly, so if you don't have to take this class I don't recommend taking it with Adomait.

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: Contrary to popular belief, not an impossible course. Lectures are difficult to understand but very helpful. Don't bother reading the textbook, use khan academy instead to teach yourself. Overall do well on the quizzes and assignment, prepare for a difficult midterm and final.

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: Simply put, this is an introductory economics class. However it felt more like I was drowning in work to stay afloat. The midterm is advertised with a 50% average every year. However, the book assignment and MEL quizzes will be your lifeline (weighted 20% together) as they are easy 80's in this course and probably the highest mark you will score.

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: Doesnt explain concepts and expects you to understand as she rushes through 20 chart examples a lecture. Even with reading the textbook beforehand, it is extremely difficult to keep up and take proper notes. Your time would be better spent reading the textbook and doing practice quizzes online, her lectures are pointless.

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: garbage

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: She not good

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: Adomait doesn't have a great reputation at Guelph, but don't let that scare you. If you enter one of her classes open minded, willing to read the textbook and practice, you will be just fine! I would certainly suggest attending her lectures (it definitely helps to read the textbook chapter first) as they often give clues for midterms/exams!

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: The worst prof I've had, makes the exams unnecessarily tough.

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: Absolutely terrible prof. Don't go to lecture she doesn't help at all.

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: She is a very tough grader and her tests are extremely hard. Be prepared to just pass to class and this yer she made a rule where basically she makes you fail the course.

Name: Eveline Adomait
Review: Although friends in this class were not a fan, I did not mind Adomait. To start, sign up for the real estate case comp, show up to most classes and you're given 15 percent free, rare in upper year classes. Firm but relatively fair. Exams are a lot in a short period. Lectures are done well. Frequent guest speakers. Good prof.

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: Dr. Kelley is easily one of my favourite professors. I think anyone could agree with that statement. His lectures are extremely entertaining and it is obvious that he cares for his students. I wouldn't suggest missing classes though, you will be missing a lot of important information.

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: I had Greg almost every year throughout university and loved it. The class that stuck out to me was presentations, he made overcoming my anxiety of public speaking way easier than expected and always had such a great attitude. He was genuinely passionate about everything he taught BUT wouldnt let you go to the washroom unless on break. didnt like

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: Very engaging lectures that actually make you want to come to class. A very fair and reasonable marker - definitely recommend taking his class!

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: By far the best professor I have ever had to pleasure to learn from, Greg is one of those profs you meet once or twice in university, he is amazing at teaching and I am really going to miss learning about folklore from him. Definitely recommend him for whatever course you are taking.

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: The best professor I've ever had!

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: Greg Kelly is one of the best profs at Guelph-Humber! Great lectures and very knowledgeable. I am really looking forward to having him as a prof again.

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: Important: You'll do better if you do the readings; Dundes DIDN'T write about the vanishing hitchhiker; and Happy Saturnalia!

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: I dont even know where to start with..... this prof is an absolute gem. Lectures are fun and not boring as in other classes. Fun assignments. NO LAPTOPS!!!! :)

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: Fantastic Professor overall! Great lectures taught with interesting stories, and exams fair. If you show up to class, review your notes, it's all fair game. There are no trick questions. The only thing that throws me off is his personal skills. When it comes to saying hello, goodbye, and thank you, he tends to ignore you. I find it odd.

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: Dr. Kelley is the best prof I've ever had at Guelph-Humber. He has a passion for his studies in Contemporary Narrative and actually enjoys being an educator. He makes 8 AM classes INTERESTING and ENERGETIC. He explains the work in a detailed manner. Would recommend taking his class if you ever get the chance to.

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: Greg Kelley is probably the greatest prof I've ever had! He is super engaging and his lectures are far from boring. I remembered every single detail because he makes you actually care for the information. His class feels less like you are being force-fed information and more like a conversation between student and teacher. Highly recommend

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: One of the BEST profs I've ever had! You'll walk out of his class actually learning something.

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: Greg is a great prof, very easy to talk to and always accommodating!

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: It is interesting to hear how this course is delivered. The curriculum is something you wouldn't expect but it is super intriguing and something I genuinely will remember

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: This course was such a cool opportunity to try new forms of public speaking that you never put attention towards but are so beneficial. Allows you to be creative and is an overall interesting class as you see your classmates and how they deliver their speaking skills. Brings people together after hearing their stories

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: Greg is an amazing professor. I never would've thought I'd be comfortable in a class about public speaking but he makes it so easy to do. He breaks everything down in a lot of detail in his lectures and makes it very clear what he's looking for which is very helpful. I would recommend going out of your way to have Greg as a prof for all classes.

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: I normally don't fill these out but honestly, Greg was the best prof I ever had in my entire school career. I'm not exaggerating when I say that his classes are interesting, engaging, and (wild concept) YOU ACTUALLY LEARN! I will be going out of my way in the future to take his classes. I recommend you do the same!

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: No matter what class you have with Greg Kelley, you will always be happy to attend his lectures. He makes them interesting and and he is really on the ball with what he teaches. I also appreciate his "no laptop" rule as it has made me focus more in class.

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: Greg is a great professor that makes classes very engaging. This may be the only class that I feel like I actually learn and retain information from because he has a great method of teaching. I was worried about writing notes without laptops, but Im glad he has this policy because I learned more. Hes also very nice and funny!

Name: Greg Kelley
Review: Super nice guy, very down to earth and genuinely cared about my grades and my struggles in the class. Had to write notes by hand but made the classes super interesting every week.

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: For all the profs of math1080, gismondi is definitely the best, but that doesn't change that the course is extremely difficult. His notes are very thorough and you can find him outside of class for help, but he teaches some concepts like he assumes everyone took grade 12 calc and has basic knowledge.

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Gismondi was a great prof and seemed like a sweet guy. Got off topic easily but I didn't mind bc it was a break from the course. Class  mandatory bc he doesn't post slides. The "textbook" was fill in as you go and he filled it out during class. Midterms were fair, not too hard. For me the hardest part were the labs and this one drug question.

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: This is a great prof that made 830 lectures bearable for an hour and twenty minutes of calculus. The final was a curveball but Gismondi was a good prof. Make sure to follow along with the modules and stay on top of it because it goes quickly.

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Gismondi was funny. He was really smart, and knew what he was talking about. I just found it really hard to understand him cause his teaching style was not my thing! I found it difficult to understand concepts the way in which he had portrayed them. I would however take him again over some other profs.

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Gismondi was a great prof! He got off topic and distracted often during class time, but always finished the notes on schedule. He really screwed us over on the exam this past semester. But the midterm tests were very fair, and almost identical to the ones online. Best of luck, cant say Im sad that this class is over for good!

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: I really liked his way of teaching and he's one of my favourite profs at this university. The term tests are very similar to the ones he posts online and are focused on material from labs.

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Gismondi is the, in my opinion, one of the kindest teachers at guelph. He really cares about you and wants everyone to succeed. He works through examples at a good speed but will stop at any point if you have any questions at all. Amazing teacher!

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Cutest prof you will ever have and he always has funny stories that help to make long lectures more bearable. He has office hours after each class making him easily accessible and answers all questions. Labs are supper important as questions are taken from them for tests/exams. I highly recommend doing practice tests as many questions are identical

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Great guy

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Super fun guy, makes lots of funny comments that make long lectures bearable. Although the lectures are pretty boring (I mean, it is calculus), he really does care about the content and always listens to students' comments.

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Loved this professor. He was so funny and a really nice person. Honestly, I do not like math but the way he talked about it and visualized functions and derivatives really spiked my interests and inspired me to learn more. Highly recommend.

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Really fun person but not a very clear professor. Really nice but spends way too long on simple concepts that everyone understands and then speeds through the new material. Labs are also extremely fast paced but they are run by TAs, not Gismodni. Practice tests are extremely helpful, so do as many as you can and keep up with the homework modules

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Go to the labs

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Doesn't explain lectures well

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Gismondi is clearly a good person and a nice guy, but for a calculus teacher he is not very good. Is very confusing when explaining and goes over things far too fast for students to grasp properly.

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: the 1080 class is a joke in comparison to the 2080 class. With 1080 i went to maybe 3 lectures total, did basically no homework, and finished with 90. For math 2080 You absolutely need to go to class, and suplementary extra help is really worth it. This really felt like an intensive, university level math class. Good guy, very accesible.

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Great prof but hard course

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: MATH1080 - Overall a good introductory course. Lectures are pretty structured but can get messy. Textbook helps, mock exams are good practice. MATH2080 - A significantly harder course. Notes are all hand-written and a lot more messy than MATH1080. People switch programs because of this course. Attend lectures and take notes, and OFFICE HOURS HELP!

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Super funny and nice but the hardest course ever!

Name: Steve Gismondi
Review: Need textbook and don't buy used. He wants you to succeed he post old midterm and USE them they are VERY helpful and very close to the one you will write. Must go to class but he makes lecture go by quickly because he's really nice and funny.

Name: Lori Jones
Review: She posts all her lecture notes online for you to print off and fill in the blanks and does problems that she breaks down In steps. Everything could be filled in from the textbook, but the textbook isnt need to do well. Lectures can be dry, but she genuinely cares about her students and is the only prof that sits in the chem help room to tutor

Name: Lori Jones
Review: It is so easy to zone out in her class, very boring and un-interesting

Name: Lori Jones
Review: Lori Jones is only a good professor if you learn by listening, and even then she is so dry, monotone and bad at explaining things that it is still difficult. She does not ever show step by step solutions for a problem, which would be helpful for a class with math and equations, and she often strays from what the question is even asking

Name: Lori Jones
Review: wasnt even in her section, just skipped my own lectures to take hers instead. shes absolutely the best prof that teaches this course

Name: Lori Jones
Review: Lori really knows her stuff and has awesome notes too. Always does examples that are on the final and midterm. Lectures can be a bit content heavy but she does a great job explaining! Would definitely take her again

Name: Lori Jones
Review: Prof. Jones' lectures might not be as entertaining, but they are very informative and clear. She tends to go over examples with high clarity. She's also super caring during the office hours and would explain in a very clear manner. 10/10 would recommend her for CHEM1050 prof.

Name: Lori Jones
Review: She talks FOREVER and does not know how to teach. I'm sitting in her class right now and have no idea what's going on. She is super boring and pulls so much out of her ass its ridiculous. I highly recommend a different prof... anyone... just NOT her.

Name: Lori Jones
Review: Physical Chem gets a really bad rep but it is not as bad as people make it out to be. Lori Jones is very reasonable and if you meet with her one on one she is more than willing to help you as much as you need. If you go to class she often has questions on the midterms/exams taken right from class. Exam is much easier than the midterms aswell.

Name: Lori Jones
Review: Notes are all over... she doesn't know how to properly teach a class! The worst part is she isn't even nice one on one... Thinks she's smarter than you and makes stupid sassy comments. Avoid if possible

Name: Lori Jones
Review: She is extremely bland and hard to follow as you get very bored throughout the lecture. Nice and clearly very smart lady, just not very good at teaching one of the harder first year courses for bsc.

Name: Lori Jones
Review: This course was much easier than CHEM*1040, but the prof was terrible. Almost fell asleep in most of the lectures because she paces through the hall and talks. This is very ineffective in this particular course, as it relies heavily on math and equations that must be manipulated. You're better off self-teaching the course to yourself.

Name: Lori Jones
Review: Lori Jones is a good professor and knows her stuff. The powerpoints are fill in the blanks/problems that she helps you solve, and also leaves extra practice problems for you to do yourself. Her lectures can be content heavy leaving you confused and sleepy, but this is just the nature of a chemistry course. Labs were better than in 1040.

Name: Lori Jones
Review: Lori was a fine prof for a first year course. She was not the coordinator and didn't write the exams but they were fair. She was a little boring in lecture and notes weren't the best but she did explain things well and was helpful when asked. Chem 1050 is a lot easier if you can pass 1040, which Lori often coordinates.

Name: Lori Jones
Review: She does not do good lectures at all. Could not concentrate through class

Name: Lori Jones
Review: The whole course is honestly a joke. Her notes don't match her slides, her voice puts you to sleep. I don't know what she's saying half the time and she's not helpful at all. Better off getting the filled in notes from a friend and learn it yourself.

Name: Lori Jones
Review: Joe pro is where it's at

Name: Lori Jones
Review: Love the prof! Very respectful and nice tries to interact with class and give lots of examples useful for the exams. Dr. Jones lectures based on presentations so if it's not your style of learning so it would probably be boring to you.

Name: Lori Jones
Review: The best way to go through this course is by teaching it to yourself Dr. Jones has amazing notes but she is not that good teaching them, to be completely honest I failed the first midterm but it was because I was too dumb to ask her for help when I needed it, I had to completely focused on this course

Name: Lori Jones
Review: Her lectures are aweful. She structures her slideshow projected on the display different from the lecture notes so half the time you spend figuring out where the example is in your notes. She gives minimal examples in class, and when she lectures she gives drawn out confusing explanations. Having a monotone voice is just the icing on the sad cake:(

Name: Lori Jones
Review: Honestly one of my favourite profs. She is extremely helpful and accessible outside of lectures. If you go to her office with a question, you will not leave that office until you understand it. Well organized lectures, the textbook also helps a lot. FInal was fair, midterm was a bloodbath though.

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Although most people taking a SOAN course don't want to hear about history Linda does a good job at keeping it interesting and engaging. It definitely benefits you to come to the lectures because she provides alot of extra ideas and connectivity. She has consistent grading as gives you midterms back to be able to look them over.

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Prof Hunter is such a good professor. She really cares about her students and wants them to succeed. Her classical theory though it was pretty boring she tries her best to make it interesting. I found the context to be difficult as I was not interested in it. Though, I definitely would take another class with her again amazing prof!

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Hunter is a really great prof who gives great lectures and slides and really helps us with great feedback on our midterms and papers! Really like the class!

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: She is a great prof who is very clear in her expectations for midterms and papers. Gives great feedback on our work and is genuinely interested in teaching and helping her students do well

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: literally just so bad. This class is like watching paint dry.

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Awesome prof! One of my favourite for sure! Very unique, fun personality, always keeps the class interesting and explains concepts really well.

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Prof Hunter is a great prof! The class is super easy if you go to class and study for her examinations! 10/10 recommend

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Great and Helpful Prof and Very Fair Midterm!

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Prof. Hunter makes her classes interesting by bringing in contemporary examples that relate to older theories and some great media clips too. She gives time for help for assignments too and helps us to do well.

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Prof Hunter is great! She makes theoretical material interesting and relatable to contemporary times. Shes also very funny and she helps prepare us for midterms. Great class!

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Prof. Hunter has a big personality which makes lectures fun, however, get caught texting or doing something she's not fond of, she will NOT hesitate to call you out. She is very caring in the sense that if she recognizes that you attend class and do your best, she will do everything she can to help (boost grade with good reason).

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Is a great, and engaging prof. Very funny, and interesting lectures, and she manages to make less-than-interesting topics very compelling. Reading the book helps preface her lectures so definitely would recommend. She is also a really nice, and compassionate person in general, so asking questions is not as arduous

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: She is great! She helps us become more interested in the material because she is enthusiastic . Midterm questions always cover what we talk about in class which helps. The midterms are Very Fair!

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Prof. Hunter is really enthusiastic when she teaches but sometimes speaks a little quickly. Still, always interesting - she cares about how we do in the class and provides really great feedback on midterms. Really liking the class!

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Her lectures are fun and enjoyable but make sure that you pay attention as she likes people who participate and this could come in clutch near midterm season if you need extra help. Definitely keep up to date on readings because there is a lot of information in the readings that will be useful.

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Dr. Hunter is an amazing professor who genuinely cares about her students. She is very organized and gives good information on class notes but attending class is important if you want to do well. Her lectures are always interesting and fun and brightens my day. I would 100% recommend having her as a prof.

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Very unorganized, not good at teaching the concepts, calls people out more than she teaches, midterms are totally unfair and way too specific, she seems like a nice person and has good intentions but I just would not recommend her

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: So bad

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Dr. Hunter is definitely one of my favourite professors. The level of feedback and care put into the course are unlike any other I take. If you go to class, and actually do the reading, you will have no trouble at all. She is a very very fair grader and is always willing to lend a hand to her students!

Name: Linda Hunter
Review: Hunter is a great Prof who explains theory really well with visuals and good notes. Enjoying the class very much !

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: Never expected to be inspired by a math professor, but found that I was. Took this class 15 years ago and still think he is the very best math teacher EVER. "Memories of Spirograph" when we did polar colar cordinates was a favourite. Wish my kids could be taught by someone who would actually make math interesting and tie it to real-life.

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: He responded to an email at 3 AM. Clearly a boss.

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: Jack is an amazing professor, I very upset I will not have the chance to be his student again. I have never met anyone so devoted to helping his students succeed, and I doubt I ever will. He has definitely made me believe I can succeed in any course if I try hard enough. He gave our class soo many opportunities to help us learn and raise our marks

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: An absolutely amazing person. Any time I don't have the initiative to get something done, I think about how I'd be disappointing Jack if I didn't give it everything I had. He gets under your skin that way. So, so, lucky to have met him!

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: Very caring, amazing person. Great overall teacher.

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: Great teacher - engaging, caring, smart, helpful - makes course content accessible and understandable - makes me a better math student - THANKS!

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: Way too easy, very clear prof, gave me my first 100 in university. Take his class instead of 1080 math.

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: This prof is absolutely amazing.

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: amazing, he's the reason Im now doing a minor in mathematics

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: This guy is passionate about what he does. He sincerely wants you to succeed, and if you follow his strategies it is hard to do poorly. Genuine good guy and good teacher.

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: In my opinion, best professor at Guelph. He really cares about what he is teaching and his main goal is for you to succeed.

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: Great teacher from all aspects, although notes could be more clear.

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: as others have said. i came to school and i didn't hate anything more than math. Jack made me actually love it. He is the best prof at Guelph (not sure if better than Anthony Vannelli though) but definitely one of the best instructors i have met in my life.

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: Fun, outgoing professor! I was in his first year caculus class for a year, and he is very prepared for every lecture!

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: The Best Proffesor at Guelph.

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: He will pretty much tell you exactly what type of questions are on the midterms which makes his class a breeze, he is really funny and approachable as well great teacher!

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: Jack is the best prof at Guelph. He actually cares about students and their learning. His exams/midterms are FAIR and he actually makes the class fun, this coming from someone who didn't particularly enjoy math, calculus etc.

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: Good guy and cares, pretty easy once you find out exactly whats on the exam. For some reason though, i always found him confusing in class. he made it seem like we should have gotten some stuff off hand and it's like "where did he get that from". Had to do a lot of figuring out on my own... the quizzes are veyr helpful.

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: Best math teacher ever.

Name: Jack Weiner
Review: best math teacherive ever had

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: Seriously one of the best profs EVER! He seriously makes class so much more enjoyable and will make you laugh almost every single lecture. He explains everything clearly and in great detail. Just do yourself a favour and pick him and it will make your first year chem experience so much better. Makes me sad he's not teaching other chem courses.

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: He's funny in class and makes chemistry more interesting. He give lots of example in his notes and goes through it very clearly. He treats his students like his grandchildren and even if you ask the most trivial question, he will answer it with care. You can clearly see that he's an amazing lecturer and is well respected. BEST CHEM PROF EVER!!

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: Joe Pro is the way to go!! Theres a reason you've heard it so many times. He explains everything in class as fill in the blank notes and he's very thorough. Also very funny, calls on people in class and makes jokes about everyone. I didn't realize how lucky I was to have him for chem1040 till i didnt have him for 1050...

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: I took Introductory Chemistry 101 or 102 back in 1971 with Prof. P. He was amazing back then. The halls were full of students eager for extra help after class. He was clear in class and explained things well to those who needed extra help. He was the best Prof. I had. funny - honest - entertaining - explained things in a variety of ways !!!

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: Prokipcak is an amazing professor. Chem 1040 is probably one of the most difficult courses because it is content heavy and a first year, first semester course. This prof has amazing fill in the blank notes with loads of examples. Beware, he does pick on people in the front row. He is an older gentleman who is deaf and is hilarious!

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: If you don't like being called on, do NOT sit in the first 4 rows. He randomly asks specific students questions, and will make fun of you if you get it wrong. Some of the information he teaches is unclear, hard to follow, or even slightly incorrect. Watch online videos (Khan academy!) as well as going to class. Textbook problems are essential.

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: Prokipcak is by far the best Chem teacher I've ever had. He's sweet, willing to explain concepts, and approachable after class. He's been teaching this course so long, he knows the way to success. I went to his office hours and he genuinely took an interest in me and encouraged me in the course. Sit at the front of the class. He keeps you on point.

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: He has some key catch phrases which are fun but have nothing to do with chemistry. I was bad at chem at the beginning and I was bad at chem at the end. Not really his fault im just generally bad at chem. Also it was in warmem so it sucked like 68% more than normal lectures already

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: If it wasn't for him, I would not have made any improvements in chemistry.

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: Joe is the best prof ever. He is funny, helpful and caring and always wants his students to do well. He loves the subject and loves answering questions, and his notes and lectures are amazing. He makes you want to come to class, and always makes you laugh. Definitely take his class if you have the chance!

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: Very specific in lectures, has a great outline that was easy to follow

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: Amazing prof. Funny, explains concepts very clearly, and always tries to help those who have questions after class . Do not sit in the first two rows unless you want to be picked on. Do not ask stupid questions or else he will openly roast you. However its all jokes and deep down he is an amazing prof.

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: He is an amazing professor who makes class enjoyable and understandable. Definitely one of my favourite professors. He's so funny and knowledgeable and honestly he's everybody's favourite cute grandpa. I wish he taught more courses!

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: He is so funny and is so good at explaining. his lectures help so much and he will help during office hours.

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: Prokipcak is an extremely caring prof who you can clearly tell is passionate about chemistry. He is the best option for first year chem and i would recommend getting into one of his sections over the others. He has fill in the blank notes for every class that you can print out and fill in/write extra notes. Good prof for a difficult course.

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: His does hand written notes and fill in the blanks which are really nice. He makes hilarious jokes and comments and likes to pick on people in the front row. He has hearing issues and can misinterpret your question/answer. He gives you lots of examples and teaches really well. Despite being a chemistry class, he makes it enjoyable. Cute old man

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: Best lecturer Ive ever had. He made learning so much better. I liked how he hand writes all the important stuff during lecture so we learn better rather than just listen to someone talk. He also gives lots of good examples in his notes.

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: By far one of my favourite profs first semester! Made chemistry enjoyable and I passed killer them with flying colours. Really wish he taught other chemistry courses in upper years!!

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: Very knowledgable in his field and can answer any question you throw at him. If I can offer any advice, it would be to read the textbook BEFORE lectures, as he assumes you already know the basics and therefore mostly covers practice questions. Despite the name "killer chem", his lectures were incredibly straightforward and educational.

Name: Joe Prokipcak
Review: He is hilarious and one of the best profs i had even though I struggled in the middle portion of the class. amazing at explaining things gave lots of extra work for help textbook questions, online quizzes). his class was always a joy with easy notes and an entertaining lecture. If you're taking chem 1040 you have to take it with this man.

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Best professor at Guelph. He is so charismatic, you feel like he's just another student teaching the class. He makes his lectures very engaging and funny, and his tests are always fair in the sense that hard work and grades can be perfectly correlated. He teaches in such a way that makes you look forward to studying for his class. Love him!

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Overall unreal prof.

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Matt is the best prof anyone could ever have. He is the most approachable and understanding prof, he makes so many office hours and tries so hard to have the content of the course completely understood. He cares a lot about each student and their success in the course. You are set up completely in the course and i whole heartedly recommend it!

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Matt is by far my favorite prof at Guelph. He's an excellent teacher, and makes complex concepts easy to comprehend. The one thing that stands out about Matt the most is his ability to connect with his students in a way where it feels like your're learning from a peer. He's one of the most grounded profs and truly cares about his students.

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Matt has been my prof for two courses now, he has been exceptional. love the way he teaches. His courses are structured beautifully. Great person.

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: First time having Matt as a professor in MATH*2270 and he has been great! His lectures are amazing, he's extremely supportive, knows his stuff, and really takes pride in his teaching. As someone who hasn't taken a calculus or math course in about 2 years, his warm-up test helped a ton to get me on track and helped me ace the first test!

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: A Living Legend!!

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Matt is by far the best Prof I've had. A really funny guy that makes lectures interesting and fun. Really willing to help out students at any time. Overall a fair market as well.

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Best professor at Guelph!

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Honestly such a good prof. he cares a lot and wants you to understand and do well. Hands down favorite prof so far

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: BEST PROF EVER!!! Makes it so easy to learn the content and really cares about all of his students. I wish all of my courses were taught by him. Gonna miss him when I graduate. Would 100% recommend taking his class

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Probably the most down to earth and relatable professor here. He's incredibly nice and caring towards all of his students. He always cracks relatable jokes in class and is overall just a wonderful person to have. The tests aren't too bad (class average 75%). But don't underestimate the material. I wish he taught all of my classes!

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Matt is one of the most gentle, caring profs out there. I tend to email profs over going to office hours and I've never gotten such timely and detailed responses from a prof before. He genuinely wants you to succeed. That being said, his tests are killer, definitely not cookie cutter questions.

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Matt is the best prof out there, he is so helpful and just amazing , hes literally the reason im still in fkn school and alive. Classes are amazing however beware hes tests are require alot of thinking, that means when u take a course with him u need be at 1000/10 level, get ready to think. Hes a amazing prof but looks can be deceiving.

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: All I can say is that other professors should learn from this guy when it comes to education. Matt nailed it and changed my perspective on mathematics. He really loves his job and really cares about his students, even if you're failing. 20/10 (or 2/1 for the math nerds ;) ). More professors should really learn how to teach from this guy.

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: A godsend for a first year professor. And I'm glad I've had him for other classes after first year(MATH1210, MATH2270). He makes his own textbook and sells it cheap. You do all the work in the textbook and you'll get A's. As for me, I struggle in school but still get by easily with this professor

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Such a good prof, super funny and engaging in class. Math 2270 is super hard math anyways but Matt makes it somewhat enjoyable, stay on top of the FYTTs, and do all the practice midterms and you should be okay. Overall amazing prof!!

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: The best prof I have ever had.

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Matt is easily the best professor I've ever had or will have. Hilarious, incredibly smart, great at explaining the material, easily accessible. His differential equations course is ridiculously hard by nature, not because he's a bad prof. Go to the lectures, do all the homework, go to office hours, and you won't regret a second of it.

Name: Matthew Demers
Review: Cares about his students. Makes the class as interesting as humanly possible. Tests are hard but fair. If you do all the homework and seek help during office hours, good grades are achievable.

Name: Al Dyer
Review: Had him as a football coach years ago when I was like 13.. Loved the guy. Complete nut when coaching.

Name: Al Dyer
Review: So, down in here, we have a pretty hilarious prof who is great for laughs. His lectures are kinda boring but he has an addictive laugh, and the class is super easy!

Name: Al Dyer
Review: Content was very easy. He knows his stuff but makes it feel like he doesn't because of his lecture and teaching style... East for good grades because content is very easy

Name: Al Dyer
Review: Basically down in here..he looks like Red Green.. mmmmmkkkayyy!!

Name: Al Dyer
Review: Ok down in here, we have this completely useless prof down in here, alright, and over in here we have completely useless rambling lectures and contextually inconsequential interjections associated with that. Seriously, my friend and I made a tally of how many times he said down in here in one lecture, and it ended up being over 100 (we lost count)

Name: Al Dyer
Review: mmmmmk

Name: Al Dyer
Review: Basically. Down in here, you get down in here. Not that he isn't a little bit off the wall but atleast he gives you the opportunity to do well if you want to. And it's pretty comical to listen to the way he speaks.

Name: Al Dyer
Review: AWESOME PROF.  Hard to follow at times...but he isn't teaching anything really hard, so easy to go learn it at home as well if you are confused.  Gave WAY TOO MANY bonus marks...I ended up with a final mark of over 105% in his class.  Pay attention, and do all practice problems and get all bonus marks and you can easily get high 90's, or 100%.

Name: Al Dyer
Review: Nice guy, terrible teacher. He means well but most of the "complicated" stuff he cant do himself routinely. Midterm (at leas this semester) was bunk, class avg. is failing. Marking is way off, following his constant example of "cut and paste" method i got half marks...probably great counsellor, nice guy...but shouldnt be teaching the class.

Name: Al Dyer
Review: N'ah kay!

Name: Al Dyer
Review: Easy course because of the bonus marks. Midterms were too long but easy!!! Watch out for exams cuz if u dont know java script u wont pass the exam

Name: Al Dyer
Review: A bit of a nut, but pretty generous when it comes to bonus marks - if you take advantage of them the course is a great GPA booster.  Lectures aren't worth it, but he grades you on class participation so i'd go.  Everything in the course is super easy until you hit JavaScript, where if you don't understand you're doomed.

Name: Al Dyer
Review: annoying teacher who looks like a biker and rants more than george carlin.  his exam would be easier if it wasnt PURE java script based. dont buy the text, its useless unless you wanna learn how to change the font size in microsoft word. assignments are easy marks cause the TA's who mark them are generally lenient. ok, ok, alright, alright, ok, ok

Name: Al Dyer
Review: He is a kool teacher to have... Gives out a lot of bonus marks.

Name: Al Dyer
Review: No Comments

Name: Al Dyer
Review: No Comments

Name: Al Dyer
Review: dyer cant accept his course for what it is -- a bird. no one would take it if they didnt have to. advised us to pick up malfunctioning laptops and DROP THEM in order to fix them. insane!

Name: Al Dyer
Review: No Comments

Name: Al Dyer
Review: Do not take this class if Dyer is teaching it!!  He screws up all the time. Is not nice to talk to, infact a little scary. Put him back into retirement please. He cant teach worth s***!

Name: Al Dyer
Review: OKAY! I didn't go lectures a few weeks into the semester having just found out that they were useless and a waste of time. Lecture material is on WebCT...word for word. Go to labs and do the assignments and you'll be fine. Share/buy a textbook with a friend. Overall easy class.

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: Amazing. My favorite professor and I was an English major.

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: All of you are so blind to her helpful sarcasm ....she is challenging you to examine what she is saying!!! She's not poking fun or asking you to accept it....she's asking you to analyze and put it into prospective....you all need to take sociology 101 over again if you didn't get this teaching technique of hers...Woodman Rocks!!!

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: Cool teacher. Very kind and fair. A bit less than organized however

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: Worst DE class ever! She was lates with marks, gave people back wrong papers, forgot to post things she said she would to help us study for midterms/exams etc. and didn't give any feedback on how to improve for discussion posts. Never taking her again!

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: Worst teacher ever. Someone so **** and classist should not be teaching sociology.

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: No Comments

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: Woodman's great- a but all over the place, but come to all of her lectures and read and it will all come together for you. I got 60 on the first midterm bc i didn't go to class a lot, but them i came to class and next midterm i got 80. so you NEED to go to her classes. she's funny and talks about controversial stuff. take a class with her

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: interested in how she explaned

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: Great professor!! passionate, helpful, engaging - everything a prof should be

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: This lady encouraged me every class. She made me want to change my major to Anthropology. Best decision I've made. She becomes passionate about her work and topics, and reaches out to the students, even if they are 400+ students.

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: Great professor, she encouraged the students to consult with her one-on-one and these meetings really helped me.  Our major project was interesting and I enjoyed completing it, while learning a lot too!  If you have a chance to take a class with her, do it, it will be the highlight of your university experience.

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: She is truly amazing.  She has inspired me like no other.

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: great teacher with interesting and provacative lectures.  easy midterms that were all mulptiple choice and only a-c that were easy enough to answer with just common knowledge. if you can get her

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: Deborah Woodman is hot. too hot. if you cant get along with woodman, somethin' ain't right. shes the bomb!

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: Hey I took he class last semester. This woman is an angel. She is so interesting, understanding and incrediby witty. I would recommend her to anyone, even if u dont like anth. I LOVE U WOODMAN!!!

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: Woodman is one of the nicest, coolest and most interesting profs that I have ever had. She understands that we are all human and that sometimes we need help. I highly recommend her.

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: awesome

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: Woodman is awsome! Im glad I took her class, she is funny and the way she teaches makes you want to attend her lectures. I would reccomend her to anyone, and I will look for more classes to take where she is the prof.

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: Awesome prof! Explains everything really well! messy writting, but reiterates alot and its great!

Name: Deborah Woodman
Review: Awsome proff! Very approachable and makes you look at life from different perspectives. Wants you to succeed in her class.

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: The hermanator is a great guy hilarious if you dont love him youre mean hes a great teacher but you do have to use your text book love ya hermann

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: best psyc prof out there

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: Pretty good prof overall and I was able to understand most of the material clearly. My grades are usually within the B range and didn't find his class to be any different. His jokes in class made the dry material a bit better.

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: the absolute worst prof i have ever had.

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: HORRIBLE> this man is a wack job. i mean his lectures were funny and all but he talked about food for almost half a class. honestly when ur paying this much for school no one wants to hear that. his exams and midterms are out there. i had an alright mark in the class but it was pure luck. they are pretty messed up... be prepared to guess

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: His exam questions come from left field and seem to have no relevance at all unless you studied the text for 20+ hours before the final. Definitly cannot slack in his class! The text is a lot more helpful then he is, but his story telling is amusing. I'm sure he's a nice guy, but he not a great prof.

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: HE SUCKS!!!!

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: Useless as a professor, I learned everything from the textbook. Not only were his lecture slides full of mistakes but so were his exams.

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: WORST TEACHER EVER! No, he doesnt even deserve the tittle teacher, because he doesnt teach anything. Everything I learned from that class I had to teach myself, because this guy just rambles on about nothing. The exams are ridiculous. You can study your a** off and still not do very well. The university and students deserve a much better professor!

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: Herrman is awsome, i go to the lectures juut to hear his stories. If ur looking to learn and prepare for the examn then read the text and a few key points he makes in lectures, other than that just laugh and take that cucumber out of your ass if you think he is a bad prof. He knows his stuff and keeps everybodies attention.

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: Funny guy, likes to go on weird little rants (perhaps minored in history of philosophy?) and has a really crude sense of humour ("I want to know how you do it" "I like little boys" etc..) which can make class interesting. Agreeing with most people tho, hard to tell what is relevant. Easy to daze off in lectures. Sometimes alieninates students.

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: he rambles ALOT and likes to tell stories of no particular relevance. this is the kind of class you dont go to because its "too cold" outside. true story.

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: He's the worst prof I've had so far. He's ****, offensive, can't spell, doesn't know basic grammatical rules. He makes fun of mentally handicapped people. He attacks people who put up their hands in class. He forces everyone to but some stupid book he edited so he gets royalties. Absolutely horrible.

Name: Thom Herrmann
