Review: Expects you to know material that isn't in the textbook. His lectures are totally useless, except for the random bits of important exam content he'll occasionally drop in the middle of his irrelevant ranting. Avoid him if you can.

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: the exams are super hard... and the questions come from left field, so you are expected to know WAY more than the textbook. the lectures are useless. he goes off on random tangents that really don't apply, and because we only have class twice a week he rushed through slides. so its a lot of independent learning, and very tough exams. not much fun.

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: herrmann is sometimes interesting with his cynical, crude and twisted humour. he likes to go off on tangents and tell stories, which is cool except for the fact that it becomes hard to distinguish between the stories and what is really important. you can miss important things when you're off in dream land, tuning out his dreary outlook of the world

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: Rambles, goes off-topic too much without being interesting, and can be very boring.  Sometimes he'll suddenly say something important and you miss it.  He's very funny sometimes, in a twisted, odd sort of way.  A lot of people leave his lectures in the middle, or just plain don't show up.  Certainly not the worst prof, but don't count on him.

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: No Comments

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: A brutally honest, cynical, and self-interested professor. This is good or bad depending on your own sense of humour. He is entertaining, but unclear enough to get a full education on the basics of psyc. Read the textbook, consult the TA's, and then rely on Herrmann for a laugh at the lectures.

Name: Thom Herrmann
Review: Horrible prof...his lectures make no sense, he rambles on about nothing in particular and he doesn't follow his lecture slides at all.  Random exams and quizzes too.

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Really funny, interesting professor! Lectures were always entertaining and he adds videos and activities to break things up. Easy to do well; there are weekly quizzes based off the readings, a MC midterm, and a MC final exam. He made question by question study guides for them! Definitely a prof to take again.

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Dan is a really great guy who, despite being american (jkjk), manages to make himself feel really one with the students, campus, and school. What I mean by this is that he makes himself available to the students, and his lectures are always stimulating and memorable. They are based off of the textbook readings, BUT going to chis class is important.

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: The midterm and final are mainly based on textbook material. He gives a very detailed exam study guide that says which textbook chapter or lecture each question will come from. He's funny but the lectures themselves can seem a little dull since they're similar to the textbook readings.

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Meegan is a great prof that really cares about his students success. his lectures are stimulating and entertaining, he can even make the boring topics interesting. I will definitely be looking to be in more of his classes in future years.

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Great prof! He's a really funny guy and makes lectures interesting. His tests are fair as they cover both textbook and lecture material. He also gave us a midterm and exam review that pretty much told us exactly what each question would be based on... Super helpful and definitely wants to see his students succeed. Recommend for sure!

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Meegan is a funny, engaging professor who is really clear about what he wants from you. We were marked on weekly online multiple choice quizzes, a multiple choice midterm, research participation, and a multiple choice exam. The quizzes aren't hard as long as you did the reading and he is very clear about what he expects on the exam. Fun class!

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: i am obsessed with him. would have him as a prof again in a heartbeat. super hot and hilarious, but also a great teacher with no surprises. ADORE HIM. have the biggest crush

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Very easy professor and good lecturer, however his tests get really specific and are based mostly on textbook readings instead of his lectures

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Great prof. Explains things in a way everyone can understand and gives good examples. Weekly quizzes keep you on track and aren't too bad as long as you can google and find things in the textbook quickly. No long essays to write!!!!! Exams are fairly easy. He's a really cool guy and wants to help you, loved having him as a prof.

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: There's a ton of reading and Google is essential for all of the weekly quizzes.

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Amazing prof, hes easy on the eyes and really connects with the students, and explains the material very well, overall just a really good guy

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Great Prof. Exam and midterm were what the hell is going on

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Lots of reading, but if you keep up with it- the midterm and final are very fair. I found the course interesting, definitely would recommend! :)

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Most amazing prof I've had in all my years at Guelph.

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Really awesome prof. Sensitive about certain topics, amazing at explaining. Really engages the class, always clear, funny. My favourite prof or teacher I've ever had.

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Meegan was a great professor going into first year. The lectures were really long, but his humour made the time pass quickly while still staying on topic and making the material clear. The videos he uses for class are relevant and interesting. He is a pretty easy going guy and I would gladly take another class with him.

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: He's an amazing prof! Made lectures interesting and enjoyable even though they were very long. Was always willing to help & gives great insight to midterms and exams. Very fair tests too! You can tell he has a passion for teaching. My favorite prof so far at Guelph!

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: Charismatic professor. He always kept it interesting and integrated relevant documentaries to his lectures. Exam was quite fair in my opinion. You definitely have to read the textbook thoroughly, as a good chunk of the exam is from the text.

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: I loved him in every single way. Super nice, cool, funny, extremely interesting. And HOT. Best Prof Ive had

Name: Dan Meegan
Review: I had him for a 3-hour night class, and literally learned nothing in the class that I didn't learn from the textbook. And the exam was really hard...

Name: Hank Davis
Review: Hank Davis was my favourite professor throughout my whole university experience. His lectures were well thought out and his communication skills exceed those of most profs I've had. I never missed a class because his lectures were too good to miss. Because I never missed, I did well. His classes are one of my fondest memories at UoG.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: Straight up the best professor I've ever had. He is  passionate about what he does and one of the most interesting lecturers I've had the privilege of listening to. I've heard rumours that his controversial lecture content has led to his forced retirement, but I so hope this is not true. It would be a huge loss for the university.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: Completely unreliable, changes due dates at random, marks taken off courselink and changed after given to students. Unacceptable level of professionalism, I would never take a course with this professor again.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: Slightly egoistical

Name: Hank Davis
Review: He is an interesting prof and has a lot of interesting stories but thats about it. his exams are very subjective and he uses very flowery wording, i have had him for both  psy1100 and psyc3100, the same in both. Its almost impossible to study for exams. stay awwaaayyyy!

Name: Hank Davis
Review: I thought he was really interesting and made it worth going to lecture although you mainly have to read the textbook. They were funny if you went to class in a good mood. I got tired of the inappropriate comments pretty fast though.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: Hanky Baby is the best teacher in the whole world. If your smart you will take every single one of his classes you possibly can. The only thing you need to do is pay attention and need the textbook to do exams i love him !

Name: Hank Davis
Review: He is disrespectful, ignorant and really dislikes the idea of helping students.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: Loved him! Very interesting lectures, although textbook reading is necessary. Lots of examples.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: He is smart funny and the reason I get up in the morning for class. He says things multiple times in unboring ways to drive the point across so you understand and get high marks. This class is also educational of life's many questions. Very Interesting. I'd recommend IMMEDIATELY! Snipe it quick before other people figure it out.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: A lot of other posters are coming on here saying he`s `disrespectful`, but he covered that on like the third day of class when he discussed the conditions for knowledge instead of just belief, and the scientific method. He talks REAL talk. No astrology, no superstition, just science. Mad respect to this man.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: Disrespectful attitude, useless digressions, covered some topics ad nauseum, some not at all. Likes to tell students they're wrong, but unwilling to discuss why. Got 91%, it's a bird course, just read the textbook, memorize his examples, and keep your trap shut.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: He has very strong opinions and expects you to agree with them.  He argues his position is correct to the point where any other position is "silly". He uses too much arcasm that comes off disrespectful.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: Hanky was amazing. Blunt, direct, and gave effective examples that made the class really interesting! Loved him.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: Just a really useless guy who tells almost completely useless stories. Just read the textbook.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: I did not like Davis at all. He went out of his way to put down any kids who were religious or held spiritual beliefs, and half the questions on the midterm/exam were about conversations held in class, as opposed to actual course material. You can understand 100% of the textbook material and still get a 70% because of this. Infuriating.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: Good teacher. Very Interesting and entertaining to listen to but often gets off topic and is sometimes hard to pay attention to. I loved his class until i say the final exam...very hard exams

Name: Hank Davis
Review: As myself and a few of my classmates believe, Hank's Teaching Style mainly depends on his attire for the day. When Hank wears colorful clothing, I seem to retain information better. Today however, Hank was wearing dark clothing and a ponytail. He ended up going off on a tangent multiple times and losing my interest completely. =)But he's awesome.

Name: Hank Davis
Review: evolutionary psyc prof, amazing

Name: Hank Davis
Review: AMAZING! Absolutely incredible professor. I wanted to go to class and was sad when lecture was over. Most interesting professor you will ever have. You NEED to take evolutionary psychology with him, it will change you forever.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: She's a great prof. Loved her lectures and she really made genetics fun and easy to understand.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: Funny, very dry satirical humor made her fun to listen to. However, she is kind of mean in person and not the most helpful. Maybe its just her personality. the course material is also quite difficult, but the SLGs really help with it. Also try and get your hands on an old midterm, that will really help.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: Amazing professor. Her jokes are kind of corny but definitely funny...i remember she made a comment once about a guide dog in class that fell asleep it was adorable! She's extremely clear and the midterm is fair albeit a wee bit tricky. Really nice outside of class, and seriously knows her stuff. Do the tutorial questions and you'll be golden.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: She explains things super clearly and knows her material inside and out. You cannot leave the class and not understand the content. However it's a good idea to go to SLG's to get some practise with the material.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: Schisler is awesome. Her notes outline concepts step-by-step. She is super helpful and genuinely cares about her students. The material is not that challenging, but it is very easy to be fooled on the midterm. Make sure you know your way around the trick type questions.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: She is WONDERFUL! Plain and simple! Maintained my interest and explained things perfectly! Should teach the whole course.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: Great and actually the best Prof! I would take absolutely all of her classes if she offers more.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: Good teacher, maybe less emphasis on cat/horse genetics.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: Amazing prof! She explained everything so well that even the more complicated concepts were crystal clear and maintained my attention for the entire lecture. She really knows her stuff, and makes herself available almost every day for office hours.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: MBG 2040 is a hard course but the way she teaches is REALLY GOOD!!! she explains everything and willing to help students. One of my favourite profs!!!

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: Awesome prof, really nice and very approachable! She's great at explaining things and her lecture notes are excellent. Probably one of my favourite profs ever! I found the course really difficult (I am not a huge fan of genetics) but I actually enjoyed going to her lectures.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: Amazing at explaining concepts in class. notes are very clear. made me love genetics and she was the only reason i understand pedigrees

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: Professor Schisler is my favourite.  She is extremely clear and enthusiastic during lecture and incredibly helpful during her office hours.  She makes herself very available through the semester for extra help.  It's not an easy course, but she definitely provides strategies that allow students to succeed.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: Dr. Schisler is probably the best prof I have had here at Guelph. She is extremely passionate about what she does & you can tell that she wants everyone in her class to understand and do well. I learn something new every time I attend her class. I really hope she can see this comment so that she knows that she makes a difference & does her job well

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: I think she is a fantastic prof, you have to go to her lecture to understand but she makes it easy to pay attention in class. Find that material very interest and find she explains things in a way that make it easy for you to understand.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: GREAT PROF. Some people said they didn't like her, but those were the people who didn't pay attention or put in an honest effort in their assignments. Do your assignments and it is a straight forward course. I wish she was around the whole semester, she is one of the best profs I've had here thus far.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: One of the worst professors you will ever encounter

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: Terribly boring lectures and awful lecture notes. She is also extremely erratic when answering questions.

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: Excellent professor. Had very clear notes. Midterm was challenging but fair, most questions were similar to those in the tutorials or on the quizzes in courselink. Was warned that the class had a high fail rate but if you do the online quizzes and go to lecture it is quite simple

Name: Christine Schisler
Review: Worst prof I have ever had. I haven't learned a thing from her. 6% of our class got 90% on the midterm. She makes the midterms ridiculously hard, when half your class is failing its time to open your eyes and realize you're not a good teacher. If you have her i feel sorry for you

Name: Lana Trick
Review: By far the worst professor. Class is very unorganized and you will have no idea what is going on because she jumps from topic to topic. The slides she posts online and shows in class provide no details whatsoever and therefore are useless. She actively writes the notes as she speaks but spells terribly and her handwriting is illegible.

Name: Lana Trick
Review: Lana Trick's toxic trait is wasting a whole stack of paper each time she lectures

Name: Lana Trick
Review: Worst professor I have ever had. She doesn't like to answer questions, and when she does she is very negative and will make you feel stupid. She constantly tells students to drop out of her course, and could care less if you are struggling. She words questions so weird, multiple people won't understand and she just continues to say she is correct.

Name: Lana Trick
Review: Dr Trick is very good at teaching this course. She knows that the material is difficult and she makes every effort to help everyone do well. You will need to attend lecture, do the readings, and do homework (practice quizzes) to do well in this class. Be prepared to work, but if you're dedicated you'll do well.

Name: Lana Trick
Review: Professor Trick's class had a lot of online MindTap homework, TopHats, in class and online quizzes, two midterms and a final. She moves very fast in lectures. Readings and class attendance is mandatory (attendance taken in TopHat). I went to SLG to understand course material from class because sometimes professor Trick was confusing.

Name: Lana Trick
Review: Horrible prof, shes the absolute the worst and is very rude. Class is mandatory or else you'll fail. Any course you take with Lana Trick, get ready to pull endless all nighters put in alot of work!! As a previous Comp Engg student at UofG I found PYSC*1010 with Lana harder than CIS*2750 and any course ENGG course with Julie Vale so Good luck!!!

Name: Lana Trick
Review: This prof was very rude and condescending. She baits you into thinking its alright to ask questions and then puts you down when you do saying you should know that already or refusing to answer. Her notes are also really messy and scribbled. She jumps from one idea to another and its hard to take notes or understand. Def avoid this prof if you can.

Name: Lana Trick
Review: 20 quizes, 3 quiz formats, 2 required subscriptions, in class tophat, 3 exams and everything is cumulative. Not to mention unnecessary short answer questions. The mean average for the second midterm was 49. If you can't do math then good luck.

Name: Lana Trick
Review: I did well in this class, but I believe most individuals, found Trick passive aggressive at best. If you can take this class with ANYONE else. I Highly recommend you do. (also tests and hw are all hot garbage).

Name: Lana Trick
Review: This is the worst class I have ever taken. When people say "dont take this class unless you absolutely need to", they're right. Don't take this class. Hardest grader in the world and she is unorganized. Her classes manage to be the most boring thing in the world and she isnt a good professor at all. Do not take this class.

Name: Lana Trick
Review: A frustrating and unorganized prof. All of her lectures are scribbled notes on a piece of paper she has projected. She regularly jumps ahead and doesn't explain things clearly. She responds rudely when asked questions. she has at least 3 quizzes due a week with tophat, mindtap, and courselink . Don't take her class unless you absolutely have to.

Name: Lana Trick
Review: The worst teacher I have had in my entire life. Starts explaining an example and suddenly changes to another one. Rude when you ask questions. Everyone in the class got a quiz back and the TAs marked so badly. When we asked her to give us their emails she said she did not know who marked what, so unorganized. DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS IF U CAN AVOID IT

Name: Lana Trick
Review: If you don't attend every lecture you will easily fall behind. She assigns MindTap homework every 3 days on top of many quizzes. Hard to follow along with her in lectures bc she scribbles down stuff on an overhead that is very difficult to understand. 10% of marks also come from tophat in class, and you only get marks if you get the question right

Name: Lana Trick
Review: Honestly, if you have a class and Lana Trick is the prof, DO NOT TAKE. She is so bad at explaining information and good luck getting clarification if you are confused and have a question, because she will only make you feel stupid. I've never had a more frustrating professor. I honestly feel like she does not want her students to succeed

Name: Lana Trick
Review: Made material boring and confusing Didn't post notes, only lecture outlines and would only write random drawings and words on the doc cam

Name: Lana Trick
Review: If it were up to me I wouldnt ever take this class again. She gives 2-3 quizzes, which on top of other work is very stressful, and when she teaches she uses a very sarcastic tone which can make you feel worse about not understanding tough material and makes you not want to ask questions at all

Name: Lana Trick
Review: You have to attend lectures otherwise you will miss important things. You don't use the textbook, but you use the online quizzes that come with the purchase of a textbook. She explains things very well and gives lots of examples. For me, I thought I would fail, but even if I fail the exam I will still have a 75 in the course. Make sure you practice

Name: Lana Trick
Review: PSYC1010 with Trick was interesting, I thought she was super weird at the beginning and I had heard bad things. I was prepared to do extremely poorly in this course when I started. About half way through the semester I realized that she was super predictable and she wants everyone to do well. YOU HAVE TO GO TO EVERY CLASS or you'll be super lost.

Name: Lana Trick
Review: Lana Trick is one of my favourite professors I have had. I have had her twice and both times found that she cared about students and taught the material effectively. This is a challenging course, however, she explains concepts clearly and goes through them with you during lecture, rather than just reading bullet points. She is very willing to help.

Name: Lana Trick
Review: Very difficult class. Only marked on two midterms a final then 10% on in class participation. Don't take this class unless you absolutely have to

Name: D Walters
Review: Took this class as and elective and I am so happy I did. One of the most enjoyable classes and prof!

Name: D Walters
Review: Best prof I ever had and I genuinely hated the course

Name: D Walters
Review: One of the best professors I've had in my four years at Guelph. Lectures are clear, engaging, and there are no surprises come tests/midterms.

Name: D Walters
Review: Amazing prof

Name: D Walters
Review: AMAZING PROF!!!! By far the best professor I have had in the years that I have gone to Guelph. He makes the lectures very enjoyable along with explaining the content with clarity. Of all my years of going to school, I have never had a better learning experience. His teaching style and enthusiasm made me love going to school and learning.

Name: D Walters
Review: Walters is an amazing professor. He is very intelligent and passionate on the topic he is teaching and he makes all his lectures fun and informative. he really cares about the well-being and success of his students - which is very refreshing. He is a great prof. I really enjoy his class and he has made statistics an easy subject to learn.

Name: D Walters
Review: Prof. Walters was amazing. His lectures were crystal clear. He was able to describe every concept, encouraging questions and going over concepts multiple times, until everyone understood and still managed to end class early almost every time. Mark dropped a bit because of the final project, but not his fault! And he's hilarious.

Name: D Walters
Review: David is amazing. He made me enjoy this class and the way he taught the material made it very attainable to get a good grade if you studied. The math was very easy, but he put it on the midterm and exam as bonus marks because he found that it gave a lot of students anxiety.

Name: D Walters
Review: Prof Walters is amazing. Really great prof but make sure to do all of your readings and go to class! Always willing to help when needed! Go to office hours, they help!

Name: D Walters
Review: 100% recommend, David's a great teacher. He has a strong support system in place for students & ensures lectures/resources are as comprehensive as possible. Throughout the course I developed an appreciation for research methods and am confident moving forward in my studies. I even enjoyed the math(math scares me). The force is strong with this one.

Name: D Walters
Review: Walters made this class so much better for me. He is the most encouraging prof ever, he made me feel like he honestly cared about my grade. His slides are amazing and the music he plays before lecture is always uplifting. Super professional and very smart. Can't go wrong with Walters. The material was tough but if anyone can make it fun, it's him.

Name: D Walters
Review: One of the best prof's in Guelph. If you go to class you'll definitely do well.

Name: D Walters
Review: Professor Walters was by far the best professor I have had here at Guelph. He made intro boring stuff interesting, and I loved going to his class 2 times a week!

Name: D Walters
Review: Amazing prof. He genuinely cares about his students' success and makes every effort to help you learn the material. Adds little things to each lecture that make even the most boring topics more interesting. He's interested in seeing his students succeed beyond school and takes the time to help his students prepare themselves for the job market.

Name: D Walters
Review: honestly most amazing human and guy. cares genuinely about his students passing. SOAN 2120 can be intimidating to students unfamiliar with stats and numbers, but he makes the transition easy and knows some students take the course as its mandatory. Answers emails ASAP, great lectures, clear rubrics, provides help whenever needed, and tests fairly.

Name: D Walters
Review: By far the best proff Ive had, he  truly wants to see you thrive in his class. He makes the tough material really easy to learn with his great sense of humour and his understanding of what he is teaching. I would recommend taking this class specifically for the his teaching style as he likes to jazz up every lecture.

Name: D Walters
Review: I had this class with him during my 4th year, and he's definitely the best prof Ive EVER had. He has so many students, but still manages to make you feel like he cares about you as an individual. He is a true teacher in every sense of the word - this is definitely his calling. I hope he reads this, he deserves to know how great he is.

Name: D Walters
Review: I have never had a prof who has had such a concern for each of his student's performance in the course. Walters is really good at making a course like this interesting and engaging.   I wish he taught all of my courses.

Name: D Walters
Review: Absolutely amazing. I wish that he taught more than just the one class. We need more professors like Walters that actually care about their students. Makes class engaging and this encourages you to WANT to show up to a research methods class. And believe me, it says a lot about him to make me want to show up to that class.

Name: D Walters
Review: Walters is one of the best profs I've had so far.  He is very clear in his lectures and what he expects from you regarding assignments.  When it comes to assignments he is always there for his students and ensures that you understand the material.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Not for graduate teaching, that is for sure!! He seems popular in undergrad course, but he seems to be learning to teach graduate students.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Has good book on basic statistics (Am thankful I understand basics now). He tries to talk in statistical way but... If your first language is not English, then don't take this course (finds every single way to grade you lower than the ones with English mother tongue), i.e. Origin and the last name matters. His expectations in tests: Only he knows!

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Great prof. Well structured courses, always willing to help you learn. Nobody can complain about the quality of teaching.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Dr. Balka does his best to make his lectures engaging, especially since this is a mandatory course for many, but he isn't amazing. I found his lectures didn't help me at all, and I had to teach myself using his videos. I did all of his practice questions and tests and studied hard, and was left with a mediocre mark. His tests are ridiculous.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Balka is amazing. His videos are extremely helpful for concepts you may not understand, but his lectures are almost always good enough to understand the concept. He gives you so many practice exercises and old tests which help immensely. You MUST take advantage of all his resources because they make the evaluations simple.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Great guy, although he does occasionally yell if you're being loud. His notes were great and if you went to class you didn't need the textbook (which he gives you online for free anyways). Weekly tests helped me keep up with the material which ended up being super important. Note: you cannot cram for these exams, trust me, I tried.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Gives you the textbook for free but you probably won't need it because he writes good notes, not hard to get a good grade if you do the practice exercises he provides. Gives videos, good notes, good practice exercises- can't really ask for more learning tools from him. Good teaching voice.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Prof. Balka is fantastic. I took 2040 five years ago and his lectures were incredibly effective at simplifying what most biologists find the hardest part of research. His online videos are a lifesaver, even now as I am in grad school trying to re-learn ANOVAs. Take ANY class he teaches; if you're willing to do the work, you'll learn tons.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Great professor! Tests were a bit challenging.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Iconic voice. So many youtube videos (used to teach DE). Great amount of content available. Midterms looked just like the examples. 10/10

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Amazing at teaching. Seriously there are so many pathways to learning he offers, from his lectures, to the textbook, to his videos on Youtube. Extremely helpful after hours too.  He made me fall in love with Statistics.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: AMAZING Prof!!  Explains the material in a way such that all students can understand the basics of statistics. He writes his own textbook so you don't need to buy one. The textbook is VERY thorough, so if there is something you're confused about from lectures, you can often find a helpful explanation in the text.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: I'm so glad I took this course with Prof. Balka. He gave out a free PDF of a textbook that he wrote himself, posted notes so we could follow along and fill in the blanks during lecture, and is funny in lectures. He also has many Youtube videos that explain the topics very well if you did not make it to a lecture or need to review certain topics.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Awesome lecture

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: He is so tall

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Great prof. Really cares about his students and loves statistics. He makes you do quizzes every week which help you stay on task and really master the material. Ended up not going to class all semester and learning straight from the textbook he wrote, and it worked out really well.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Great guy, very thorough, he made a free online textbook with tons of support videos, lecture notes are printed off and brought to class for simplification. One of my favorite profs yet

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: He makes his own youtube videos, so that if you don't want to go to class you don't have to. He explains things so clearly, and if you want to know more he wrote the textbook he provides, and it goes into more depth. Classes are a lot of work, but if you put in the time it's not so bad. Highly recommended, you won't find a better stats prof.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Best math professor I have ever had. This man deserves a pat on the back for actually teaching like it'2 2016.

Name: Jeremy Balka
Review: Doctor Balka is the easiest prof to watch lecture in the University. Lots of life, energy and humor he's great.  And he made his own free textbook.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: She is one of my favourite profs! Her class was extremely organized and clear. She does everything she can to provide real learning opportunities because she clearly cares about her students, which in turn makes them respect her. The class makes it easy to participate in discussions and speak up if you don't fully understand something.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: A lot of people have bad things to say about Keenleyside but she is one of the best profs I have ever had. Extremely helpful and accessible. If you need help she's more than happy to help you. her exams are hard because she wants you to actually learn rather than memorize. has a passion for teaching and is a great person, def do the learningoutcome

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: She bases her teaching methods off of a video that suggests including active learning to supplement teaching with things like clicker questions helps understanding. But, she takes this to mean asking questions is a substitution for teaching. Even when proven by her students time and time again that this is ineffective, she is unwilling to change.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: Disorganized lectures, exam questions are super complicated and not based on anything in the lectures or textbook. Didnt allow me SAS accommodations for disability and accused me of using them to cheat. Rude in emails and condescending in class. Worst prof ever!!

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: The lectures are very hard to follow and are extremely unorganized. She is knowledgeable but is unable to present this in a way students can understand and when asked questions she contradicts herself.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: I have tried to enjoy having her as a prof and follow all direction she gives (readings, articles, homework practice) and even though I do all those things, the answers to her questions can't be found in course resources. If you ask her for clarification to a question that can't be found anywhere, she acts like you're wasting her time.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: -knowledgable about what she teaches -free online textbook -gave good opportunities for getting marks. -she used a group quizzing system that did not allow me access to my accommodations provided by SAS -sometimes I felt her email correspondings were less than friendly -was not always helpful when I had questions or administrative issues

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: Very messy lecture structure. Really all over the place. Material consists of a collection of random and seemingly unconnected facts. Hard to study for. Can't really say it lays a foundation for understanding rather than just makes you (try to) memorize a ton of information. Would try to avoid her as a teacher but it will definitely be difficult

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: Her method of teaching just doesn't work. She makes you do a "case study" for probably a third of the semester that's strictly group work. She does little to no actual teaching and expects you to come to class having already taught yourself the material. Definitely the worst prof and class I've had. I like micro but she makes it hard to like.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: Talks more than what is on the slides, taking notes is important, but she records the lectures. It is hard to tell what chapter she is teaching and when there is a transition to a new topic.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: She thinks she has a superior method of teaching but it's downright bad. She puts only "higher level thinking" questions on the midterm & final and tries to make you think in lecture but it leaves you confused. Her slides have little content making textbook readings a must. You can tell she's trying to teach but it doesn't work.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: She tries very hard and puts a lot of effort into her teaching style, it just doesn't work. There's usually at least 3 things due a week because there are so many little assignments and quizzes worth like 1%. She does little to know actual teaching and expects students to learn it all outside of class which just doesn't work.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: DO NOT LISTEN TO ANYONE THAT SAYS SHE IS A GOOD PROFESSOR. I warn you not to take courses with her. She is extremely confusing during her lectures, and is terrible at explaining concepts. If you have any questions, I suggest you keep them to yourself as you will end up more confused than you already were. If you have a class with her, good luck.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: This is by far the worst prof I have ever had. The midterm was based on extremely specific information that she talked about in class, but can't be found anywhere in her lecture slides. The first 30min of her 50min lecture is spent explaining a REEF polling question that has nothing to do with the actual material of the course. :(

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: Lecture slides were sparse and disorganized with little to no supplementation through her lecturing. We were told not to learn off of the textbook, yet she asked us questions that we could only know if we had memorized off of the readings. She was not supportive in our learning and her lack of clear teaching negatively affected grades.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: I liked her. But now, I love her and Microbial Ecology. Her passion for this field is contagious. There are few opportunities to get easy grades while exams are the usual toughness and group project was the usual easy-going. It is fundamentally important to do what she says; i.e. Read articles she assigned. Makes life easier.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: Amazing prof, great teaching style. Her tests and questions make you think but will never go out of context from what she has taught/said in class. Really need to listen carefully in lectures, make notes, and do all that she says. Keeping up with the weekly stuff is essential to do well, but really inspiring! She's very nice even outside of class.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: Spend $130 on the textbook and keep up with the work if you want to have hopes of getting a good mark. The reviews listed here say it all. Going on vacation the weekend before the class writes an exam is also not the smartest idea. When going into this course, form a study group, read the textbook and make sure you know the lab manual inside-out.

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: The course layout is confusing and the questions asked makes you sit in the room thinking "why am i here". The textbook will always be there to answer your questions whereas she can sometimes disappear

Name: Wendy Keenleyside
Review: She thinks her teaching style works. It does not. The assignments and lectures are incredibly convoluted, she condescends to the entire class, and she does little to no actual teaching. Someone should really tell her sending out a list of 50+ terms every week does not qualify as teaching. Can they take away PhDs?

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: Bryan Puk is by far the most chill prof I've come across. He focuses on discussions rather than giving you the info. notes are minimal and exams are fair. i would 100% recommend this prof if youre looking for a class to enjoy going to.

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: It was an awesome class and he was an awesome prof. I love how he writes his notes on the board and not through a powerpoint! So much better and easy to follow. Participate lots as he give you lots of chances to speak so do it. Pretty much my best summer class.

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: I enjoyed coming to class every day. He is such a funny dude and makes the class very enjoyable. His midterm was really easy, just show up and take notes. I would definitely recommend him. He is also really into class discussions.

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: took this course in the spring and Bryan is one cool dude!! Just show up, take notes, and study them for midterms and a good grade will result from it! Brings in interesting guest speaker, and really tries to make class enjoyable and interesting for his students.

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: He is the best man and professor at u if s! All other instructors should follow his path! He loves what he does and put more energy to make it interesting! If u want to upgrade your marks, take him u will never regret!

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: Horrible professor who doesn't know anything about the subject matter at hand. Spent two classes talking about prison lingo from the 60s. 90 questions for 100% of your grade. Easiest class you'll ever take, but you will learn absolutely nothing.

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: Professor Put is a kind, funny man. His lectures are very straight forward. There isn't as many notes as in other classes I have taken. Study your notes, and you will do fine!

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: He's funny and nice to students. Very lenient.

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: Focuses tons on sex and his show and tell but easy class to follow!

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: Bryan is a kind man. I honestly was disappointed in his lectures. I wanted to learn more about sociology .

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: Nice guy but painfully slow giving lectures and half of the notes he gives make zero sense. Midterms were super easy but the essay component of the course was brutally marked and no feedback was provided.

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: Really awesome professor! Shows lots of character and is absolutely hilarious! Take a class with Bryan! Does show and tell for half the class and writes very slow so he is easy to follow when taking notes!

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: Good prof don't buy the textbook. He is very friendly and approachable. If you get the chance and are interested in sociology take the class with Bryan!

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: Readings were unbelievably dated, many of them 20 years old, even the module on technology. No current issues, no current material. Exam questions were from the self-study notes and if you've taken SOC111/112 they're the same questions. Easy marks but you won't learn much.

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: Don't bother with the text, he'll take exam questions from the notes only, and if you've taken another class with him they'll be the same questions. Lots of videos, some interesting but nothing is connected to the course content. Same with class "discussions". Easy exam marks but you won't learn anything in this class.

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: AMAZING PROF!!! If you get the chance to have this prof take it! The most inspirational man I have met and seems to care about how his students do!  He knows what he is talking about and usually dumbs it down for the class so it is very easy to understand!

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: Class material was boring enough without being forced to listen to his boring lectures. Just the whole class was not for me. Managed to force myself through it for the pass, but will never seek a class with him again. Way to unprofessional of a prof for what I enjoy at the university level. Be prepared for his incredible lack of charisma. Blah

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: A passionate professor...

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: By far the best prof I have ever had. He is nice, funny and genuinely cares about his students and wants them to do well. Easy as long as you attend class. Write down EVERYTHING from the smart board. No need for the textbook. Only one essay. TAKE HIS CLASS YOU WILL LOVE IT AND HIM!! :)

Name: Bryan Puk
Review: a Professor par Excellence

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: his final was very surprising in the tu/th lecture. completely unexpected and screwed me

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: Class is not mandatory due to his notes being posted on his website. He has an easy section (0.2/0.3 on MWF) and a difficult section (0.1 on Tu/Th). If you used the practice exam on his website to study for the exam in the MWF section, the given exam was an exact replica of it. If you are in Tu/Th good luck cause these midterms are always harder.

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: Amazing Class! I was not sure what I would be getting myself into with University and this class made my time at school more enjoyable. I always looked forward to his classes. He has good stories!

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: Don't even show up to his class since his lectures are not even useful with all of his notes posted online. Lectures always go off topic and will confuse you. Easy class, as long as u study the online tests and the mock test you will get either a pass or a 100.

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: The lectures are nonsensical and he usually does not stick to one topic for more than a minute, making it extremely hard to keep up to and take notes on. Lectures are honestly not great and I learned everything through the textbook and a bit from his website. USE THE PRACTICE AND ONLINE TESTS! some of the questions show up on the midterms.

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: This was my first econ class and I went in expecting it to be horribly boring but Harry makes it fun. He makes great analogies for the students to understand. He does only grade on tests but he puts up practice tests that are almost identical to the real test. Midterms were pretty easy as well.

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: Solid prof, especially for first year economics. Pretty strange guy but it makes class interesting. Also had fair midterms and final. final was curved so much that some peoples marks went up 10-15%.

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: He the laziest prof I have ever seen. I have emailed him some times about class information and percentage about online test and midterm, what him replied was only ,"see course outline". Different question, same answer always. His very unfriendly and disrespect to students. I think he is too old to teach econ classes, it's time to retire for him.

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: Read the textbook and you won't need class. "Secret" study guide hyperlinked on his website. OT's are near identical to real exams.

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: Don't go to class and just read the textbook and you'll pass easy. Do lots of practice tests because he recycles lots of the questions on midterms and final.

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: Frustrated to have this prof. There were 2 sections of econ 111 this semester and he gave one of the sections a final exam that was almost identical to the practice exam, but the exam in the other section was much more difficult. Just study the textbook and try to make it through class without falling asleep if going to class is a thing you do.

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: his website seems confusing. he had two classes this term, but he use different finals, one is super easy, just a combination of 5 online tests and 3 midterms. the other one is really hard.

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: I passed this class solely by reading the textbook and completing the practice and online quizzes. The online quizzes are free, easy marks and you get 5 tries so take them until you get 30/30. You can find old midterms and finals on his website you just have to look for them because he hides them at the end of notes etc. Final was super easy for me

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: post notes on his own website so even if you're not in his class you can still look at them. some question from the online test will be on the midterm so before you go into the midterm see where you went wrong, same with the final.

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: Don't bother going to the lectures, everything he tests is from the textbook. Look over old midterms and read the textbook and you'll do fine.

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: Harry's classes were honestly super easy. He only tests on material in his notes (posted online) and the textbook so attendance is far from mandatory. He actually is impressed if around half the class shows up. I have a 98 in his class right now and i put in less effort than i do in any other class. Honestly, don't know why the class avg. is so low

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: you don't need the book since he has his own website but most people don't understand his website. his exams are just multiple choice

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: A nice guy, but really not the best prof. I found his lectures kind of confusing, so I decided to just skip classes and read the textbook and his online notes he posts. I did just fine in the class as the material isn't that hard. I would highly recommend studying the textbook and the online and practise tests he gives you!

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: His humor isn't for everyone! Personally I LOVE this professor, it is a bit confusing but he is most certainly approachable and wants to help you. His website is VERY useful and classes are NOT mandatory. you can totally pass this class by reading the textbook & just taking the Online tests and practice tests and studying the questions. EASY A

Name: Harry Hillman Chartrand
Review: I didn't go to one class other than the three midterms and got a 90. If you read the textbook, you will do just fine.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: Definitely makes you work for your grade. He has the hardest multiple choice I have ever written. Reads almost word for word what is in the textbook. Multiple choice tests only, but questions come from entire textbook, small things he says in class, and videos he shows. He has general questions and very specific questions, so hard to study for.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: He basically reads the textbook for you in the lectures. If you are good at reading the textbook yourself, skip the lectures and utilize your time reading and understanding the topic. You will likely do well because all the questions on the exam are application based.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: A straightforward prof. Basically just recited each topic from lecture slides/textbook from memory and then gave examples so that you understood it all. The content wasnt too hard, anything you didnt get you could easily find in the textbook. Showed up almost every class wearing double denim and an earring in one ear, an absolute legend.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: Not a terrible prof at all. Buy the textbook! He reads directly from the textbook which is nice because then you don't have to show up. I found he would put small details from the text on the tests, making them hard. Put in the time to read over the textbook to study.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: reads from the textbook, useless prof.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: Boring

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: Martin was a great professor. His content was interesting and he was light hearted and funny. However Martin reads directly from the textbook so attendance isn't neccesarily mandatory. The use of Revel helped a lot and the online quizzes helped get a better understanding. If you have a choice I suggest taking one of his classes!

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: He's not a very good lecturer but the class is easy, the exam questions are right out of the slides and textbook so just do your readings and you'll be okay.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: Rempel was a pretty dry professor even though he tries to be hilarious. He would typically read straight off the slides and take examples from the textbook directly. It's as if I'm listening to an audiobook. Everything from the videos he shares in class to the content in the textbook is on the exam so make sure you know all your stuff.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: Martin was a nice guy and considering he took over for another prof at the beginning of the semester he did a pretty good job teaching us the material. However, I don't think the exams were a good representation of what we learned in class. All of our class averages were high 50's and 60's.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: Martin was a good professor, considering he took over for MacGregor. It would of been more helpful if we kept using the launchpad, but there was no chance of that. His slides are basically right from the text book. Midterms  trick questions. Overall Class average was pretty low, showing the difficulty.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: Took over another profs class so did good considering. Some weird questions on tests but overall good. Wasn't hard but was hard for psych. Difficult to judge as wasnt using his usual textbook

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: Awful. This class is ridiculous. Lots of interesting material but the exams are a joke. He puts tons of tricky questions in or ones that just make no sense. I have a final coming up and I don't even know if there's a point of studying. He does curve the marks quite a bit as well (cause everyone does so bad cause his tests are WHACK)

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: Midterms and Final questions came directly from the textbook. There is no point in attending the boring lectures. Do yourself a favour and avoid this prof.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: TRICK. QUESTIONS. STAY AWAY

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: Hes funny and approachable. His material was all from the textbook, so theres a lot of reading. There are some questions in the exam on things that he says in lecture that are not in the textbook so I would recommend going to the lectures.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: I thought he was a good prof and had reasonable exams.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: During lectures he literally reads off of the textbook, it's like listening in audible basically when you come to class, he would occasionally make jokes or tell a story which he draws from past experience that relates to the topic but it's really nothing important to be honest. Would not recommend him.

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: notes are all posted online which is good. read the textbook!!!! There will be questions on the midterms and final that will require knowledge from reading the textbook!

Name: Martin Rempel
Review: Martin Rempel is a disagreeable dude. I found him opinionated and provoking in a bad way.

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: I really loved Nutr120 and I think the main reason was because of this amazing professor, she is so passionate about the material she teaches and presents information in a logical and clear way. I recommend doing the discussion groups for 10% and taking the time to read the textbook. Memorize everything in the notes and what she says.

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: One of the best profs I had in my 1.5 years so far. Her lectures are really good and the class itself is pretty interesting. I pretty much find every single class ever insanely boring but this one is okay. The material is really hard though, and it seems that stuff we never talked about appears on exams. But still a good class and good prof.

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: Melanie is passionate and knowledgeable about nutrition. I personally believe that her nutrition lectures are changing the lives of some of her students each year. This class will change your life. Exams are 100% multiple choice, there are easy weekly online quizzes that boost your grade. Also there is an option for extra credit.

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: Man. Prof Rozwadowski is a tough one. BUT... she delivers the material so well (which is a very broad science) and wants her students to do well. very meticulous, too. although the class was no doubt very tough, i thoroughly enjoyed it and i did learn so much from her. I read the text through and through, studied hard, and got an A. you should too

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: Melanie was a really good professor, she was well prepared and really knows her stuff. However at times she seemed to be kind of ignorant when student asked questions and so on. I found her tests to be extremely difficult, you need to work extremely hard in this class if you want a good mark.

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: Melanie was my favorite prof that I encountered at the U of S. She does not just read off the slides and makes notes that students can follow. She uses lecture capture which is very useful. She can seem snarky towards the students and does expect that students are quiet and not on their phones. Held really helpful midterm review sessions as well.

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: Lots of quizzes and assignments. The quizzes were helpful, but the assignments were hard to follow and figure out. Prof had very strict rules and didn't back down on anything and at times seemed very condescending towards the students.

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: Melanie is an absolutely amazing professor! I came into the class not knowing what to expect since nutrition has never been a science studied in high school. But after taking this class, I can guarantee that you will love it. Her lectures are so captivating and interesting, and she gives room for questions in class. There is lecture capture too!

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: She's the best prof I've ever had: enthusiastic, passionate, and knowledgeable! I was already somewhat interested in nutrition but her class turned my interest into a passion. It was by far the best class I've taken and very applicable to life, every class I would get my mind blown. I would HIGHLY recommend this course to anyone.

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: First of all, Melanie posts video recordings of all her lectures on BB, so attendance is not mandatory & you can do your notes on your own time. She is VERY knowledgeable & has a passion for nutrition that shows in the amount of detail she provides in lectures. This class isn't "easy" per se, it's very science-based, but you can get an A for sure!

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: Melanie is a great prof! i loved taking nutrition with her, although her tests and lectures are heavy and the textbook is mandatory! if you put some work in it you can get a good grade.. make sure to do the 10% discussion groups it helps so much since the tests are heavy!

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: She is great how there is 20% possibility for extra credit. DO THE DISCUSSION GROUPS! she is ruthless with the less lecture learning and needing to read the whole assigned readings for the test! never had a 100 level class take so much out of class time with the textbook! she will test non covered material! seems very rude and stuck up.

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: Melanie is super passionate about nutrition, and makes her class very interesting and easy to apply to your own life! The textbook is needed, reading it definitely helps you understand everything a bit better. The discussion groups are DEFINITELY recommended, easy 10%. Her exams can be difficult, especially the final.

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: Melanie is extremely knowledgeable in the subject of nutrition. A bit easily irritable, but it's understandable in a 500 student class. Definitely a tough class, not an easy elective. You have to work hard for a good mark. The quizzes are a mark booster, as well as the optional discussion groups are an easy 10% HIGHLY recommend opting into those.

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: I never went to class (sorry Melanie!) BUT I watched all her lectures online. If you pay attention and learn from her lectures/take notes you will do well in the class. 95%-98% of exam material is covered in the lectures. She actually teaches the material, does not read slides! Passionate and makes you love learning! 10/10 !

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: Professor Rozwadowski is so passionate about Nutrition, which makes it easy to get excited about the content. She is very clear with what she expects of her students. I took NUTR120 as an elective in my 4th year and personally I think it's pretty heavy for a first year class, but definitely do-able.

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: Melaine was a great instructor, she is very passionate about nutrition and makes the course enjoyable and interesting.

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: So as iI sit here in class (with only 2 left to go), i've realized the best thing i could have done was: bring loose leaf paper and a good pen and write my notes out. Melanie writes all of her notes out in front of us, so theres no way you could fall behind. She draws graphs and jumps around, so hand writing notes is beneficial. Her exams are hard

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: Melanie is very a very nice women and she knows everything there is to know about nutrition. Her lectures had almost nothing to do with the midterm/final and they're lecture captured so no need to show up. DO THE DISCUSSION GROUP for easy marks and the quizzes are all online. Hard class if you don't understand something

Name: Melanie Rozwadowski
Review: Melanie loves teaching, and has great engaging notes. Read the text book to fill in the blanks from lecture notes. Textbook is basically another prof, learn from both. Quizzes are online, and easy. If you email her with a problem she'll reply asap. Quick teaching style. Pauses for questions so use that to your advantage. Would take again.

Name: Scott Napper
Review: Dr. Napper is by far my favourite prof. He's so engaging with his lectures and often leaves you wondering "what is this man going to say next?" Great sense of humour. Loved his class and would take any class that he is teaching in the future.

Name: Scott Napper
Review: Scott is such an amazing professor who cares about and listens to his students. I went to him with concerns about a severe concussion I received and he was very caring and made sure I was able to get help studying or access to notes if I needed it. The class was hard but he made it so much easier! Best prof I've ever had!!

Name: Scott Napper
Review: An overall great prof. Super charismatic, everyone loves him. His enthusiasm makes you enjoy the content. Really smart guy, but explains the material so anyone can understand. Does a midterm and final review session, which are great. Only problem is that he talks pretty fast when he gets into it, and you can get lost if you dont pay attention.

Name: Scott Napper
Review: I don't care for this subject, but Scott had me genuinely interested in his lectures. Great guy, amazingly passionate about what he's teaching. Lectures are recorded so no need to show up to class as long as you're up to date with the material.

Name: Scott Napper
Review: Best prof

Name: Scott Napper
Review: Napper is the greatest prof I've ever had. He took a very difficult class that I normally would have hated, but explained it so well that I actually enjoyed it. His reviews are exactly what will be on the midterm/final, and you can tell he loves what he does as he puts so much care into his teaching. Watch his review lectures and you'll be fine.

Name: Scott Napper
Review: Napper has been one of the best profs I've ever had. He keeps lectures as interesting as possible and doesn't just read off the slides. He elaborates and gives as many examples as possible, and allows us to participate in class. The course is also very manageable as long as you study and understand the content! I recommend this prof!

Name: Scott Napper
Review: Best professor I've ever had! He is very passionate about Biochemistry, and his lectures are very inspiring. Loved this course and definitely recommend it!

Name: Scott Napper
Review: Scott is the best Professor Ive had. He takes such a difficult and complex topic and makes it seem so simple. His lectures are amazing and although he uses lecture capture I recommend going to class because hes so great. Midterm and final were both fair and he provides you with all the tools of success. Loved this class.

Name: Scott Napper
Review: Somebody give this man an award. He takes the trickiest biochemical pathways and describes them in laymans terms, and facilitates the understanding of concepts rather than memorization. I'd recommend taking the class online because being able to pause/rewatch the lectures is SO helpful and really helps if you fall behind . he will change ur life

Name: Scott Napper
Review: Best prof I've ever had. Goes over material many times until it becomes tatted in your mind and material is fairly easy with video guides provided.

Name: Scott Napper
Review: He is amazing!!! The class isn't an interest of mine, but it made a small part of me want to study this full-time haha he posts his lectures but I recommend going to class. So easy to follow and understand. And so entertaining! You can tell he lives his job.

Name: Scott Napper
Review: Wonderful professor who makes class interesting. Tests are fair and results are quick. Would definitely recommend taking any class with Napper!

Name: Scott Napper
Review: Scott is an absolute legend, best prof I've had so far. He's more passionate than any other prof and he genuinely want's his students to succeed. His lectures are phenomenal

Name: Scott Napper
Review: Took BMSC 200 online with Napper, yet he is still one of my favourite profs ever. Guy cracked a lot of jokes and made the class interesting. If you have terrible attendance, the online course is the way to go. I would highly recommend taking this class if you have good rote memory, as it is possible to get a 100 in the course

Name: Scott Napper
Review: Professor Napper is amazing! Explains concepts thoroughly & makes good analogies. Slides were well organized and contained all needed material - don't need to read the textbook but definitely helps considering the difficulty of this class. Interesting class but very hard if you don't stay engaged and caught up.

Name: Scott Napper
Review: One of the best profs Ive had so far! His tutorials are worth watching as he gives a pretty good idea of what will be in the exam. He really wants his students to do well and he is passionate about what he teaches!

Name: Scott Napper
Review: He's an amazing professor and you can tell he loves his job and he truly cares about his students... not only the student's grades but his or her wellbeing in general. His lectures are memorable and most importantly enjoyable. I've got lots of respect for this guy.

Name: Scott Napper
Review: By far my favourite professor at this school. He makes the lessons intriguing and I actually want to come to class. He seems to really care about his students. His class is just like any other and you still have to put in a lot of effort to do well.

Name: Scott Napper
Review: One word he is the "GOAT"

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: Susan is the most boring prof I've had. She goes off-topic frequently about random stuff that isn't even on her slides. Revel assignments every week but are very easy. If she posted her slides I wouldn't attend. Very hard to pay attention to what she's saying because she spends 15 minutes per slide. Good 50 mins for candy crush.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: She does not post notes before class and says lots that are not on slides but is difficult to listen to what she's saying while furious trying to get the notes. She often rants in class and does not explain the concepts from the textbook. The pace of the class was so off that the last lecture crammed 4 chapters into 50 minutes. Awful learning space

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: Dr. Robertson is an overall great gal and prof. She sometimes goes off topic but it is always a great discussion.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: She tends to frequently go off-topic and ramble for the majority of the class. It is hard to pay attention in class and hard to understand new concepts as she does not explain them in simple terms or provide examples. The chapters for the weekly revel assignments and chapters done in class do not correspond. Avoid taking her class if possible.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: She was the worst prof I have had by far, she didn't email back, we didn't get any feedback before the final, she didn't show up to the final, and the final was very hard and having no feedback going in, you don't know if you know the material. We got 2/3 of our papers back one week before we got our final mark. DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: Took this as a summer class. Reading materials required a high level of comprehension. There's a research paper, 2 assignments, and discussions. Take time to read all the academic articles and you'll be fine.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: She is a very smart person but she goes off topic quite a bit which I enjoyed, but made it quite hard to understand the main points of her lectures. Her outlines for assignments were long and rambly as well and she marked extremely hard as well. I enjoy theory but she barely touched on many important sociologists. Wouldnt take again.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: She always goes off topic in class. Made me buy expensive textbook which was useless for the course. I would not take her class again. Her class was also hela boring!

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: Susan was a bomb prof. if you show up to lectures and re-read your notes you'll do great on the exams! I had her in SOC111 and the only surprise on the midterm was memorizing a diagram but everything else was multiple choice

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: Susan is a very respectable and caring person. She gives revel assignments every week which help you understand the content a bit more. Her notes aren't posted so you should attend class. She is good at giving examples and her final was fairly easy. Final is 50% of final grade. Overall I would recommend taking this class with her.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: I had to take SOC 111 & 112 with Susan and enjoyed the lectures she gave, she wont post the lecture notes so you have to attend. If you have a choice SOC 112 was more interesting than 111. There is RevelStoke assignments due every week which were relatively easy worth 25% of the grade while the midterm was 25% and final was 50%.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: She seems to be very friendly and kind, but her lectures are very hard to pay attention to. I don't find her lectures to be very engaging at all. I found I got more out of reading the textbook then attending the lectures, however there are questions that will be specific to things learned in class, so it is important to attend often.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: Susan is a funny, passionate prof who seems to be misunderstood. This class is lecture heavy, but it is tough to have a stimulating discussion with 150 plus students. The outline was well explained and grading was fair. As an intro to sociology, I may recommend a smaller class where she could engage in more class discussion. Very smart lady.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: I took this class as a mandatory course and I hated it. Her lectures are very dry and she doesnt post slides so you must attend. She makes you buy the textbook but doesnt lecture from it. Midterm is easy if you study but the final was hard. Never would take her class again. Dont take it if you want to boost your average.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: Susan's lectures were extremely hard to follow and barely related to the $110 textbook at all. She doesn't post her notes on blackboard so you have to go to class. Midterm is very hard. Final is easier but you need to really study. Saving grace is the Revel quizzes cause it's easy to get 100% on them. Take the class with someone else if you can!

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: Susan is painful to listen to and goes off on hour long tangents about nothing that relates to the course. Her midterm was very difficult and her slides don't make any sense, she'll write single word bullet points with no context. Reading the text is essential to passing. Final was easy enough if you study really hard. Would never take again.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: Took her class as an elective to boost my average, but it ended up being my worst class. Tests arent fair at all. Midterm was 50 MC questions, 2 short answers, but the weighting was 50/50 so most of the class failed. Her short answer questions are hard unless you read the whole textbook. Avoid this class with her unless you NEED to take it.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: Susan does not post marks or lecture notes on paws. She talks to you like a colleague rather than a first-year student. She tells you what will be on the tests and then changes everything on the test day. Online revel assignments are easy, however, that's only 20%, the other 80% is tests. Regreting taking this class with her, Hope I pass!

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: She isn't engaging whatsoever. Very boring lectures that tend to go off topic - slides from class are not posted online. She graded pretty tough for a 100-level class, however you can get a decent mark if you can stay awake in class to copy down her notes and have the motivation to get through an entire textbook and understand it on your own.

Name: Susan Robertson
Review: Susan is a friendly person however, she does not give good notes at all if any. Her midterm is extremely difficult and she often goes off on tangents. In order to do well in this class be prepared to read the corresponding textbook chapter from cover to cover and learn on your own.

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: Excellent professor; you can tell that he cares about what he is teaching and about his students.

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: Awesome guy. One of my favorite teachers. Makes class interesting, lots of interactive videos and I love the assignments he gives us weekly.

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: Dr. MacGregor is very monotone and not very personable. His lectures don't add too much to the class. The textbook is actually a great resource for information, but the assignments are way too easy. You can get the answers straight from the ebook, or you can just google the question word per word. Pointless, no critical thinking.

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: Dr. MacGregor is a solid lecturer and uses lots of different methods to get information across. Class is entertaining and helpful to attend but definitely not necessary. Could pass the class just by studying the textbook on Launchpad.

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: Awesome prof. Lectures were a lot more interesting and engaging than I expected, it was honestly a really enjoyable class. Would recommend showing up though, what he covers is a lot more focused than the text, studying is way easier when you know what's actually relevant. Would definitely recommend taking psych with him.

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: This was my first ever psychology class I took in University. I can truthfully say I enjoyed the class and was engaged throughout the whole lecture. I am taking his psych 121 class next semester and I am looking forward to it.

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: Overall he is a goof professor! He talks about what he needs to talk but you need to read everything in the text book and he is quite slow with teaching everything! Make sure you do learning curves as they will help you out extremely! And try answering the chapter objective questions. I realized that helped me out on my third midterm in this class!

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: I really enjoyed his class for a number of reasons. He is very organized as he posts all of your grades for everything in the class, he provides each powerpoint for each lesson and his assignments on the launchpad are extremely helpful when studying for tests or to just better your understanding of the material. He was by far my fave teacher so far

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: Michael tests on very irrelevant information which makes studying for tests extremely hard. His lectures usually just briefly go over what the text already tells you and he can barely be heard even in the front row. Study the textbook as he barely tests on his lectures. USE LEARNING CURVE when studying! Overall would not recommend :(

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: He seems like a nice enough guy but I found his lectures very dull, he looks at the screen when he presents so you can barely hear. There's a few quizzes per week online, if you don't do great on them they bring mark down but if you do good they barely affect it. Tests were tricky because multiple choice options were so similar

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: MacGregor is a real gem of a guy. However, his ability to teach and engage the class is almost non existent. Almost always he will get off topic and begin rambling about something that really has no importance to what we're learning. You are much better off just reading the textbook front-to-back if you are planning on passing this class.

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: I read the ratings here before taking the class and everyone is right. He's not a bad guy, is clearly intelligent and knows his craft. I just think some of his knowledge is outdated, and the things he says to the class as random bits of information can be a little controversial, sometimes even just incorrect. Attendance definitely not necessary.

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: He basically copies his lectures out of the textbook, did not really further explain or add, I did not go to class at all in the last two months and still ended up with an 85, there is homework done every week, but it is online and you are able to pull up the textbook while answering the questions and see the answer. Super easy A, but boring.

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: Prof MacGregor is a really great prof! Attendance isn't mandatory, but he likes to sneak one or two questions on the test that you would only know the answer if you attended class. Homework due weekly but it is all textbook based and super easy if you read/skim the chapter before or even during the assignment. Do the assignments  pass the class!

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: Never found myself bored in his classes. His general awkwardness adds to his lectures to provide a little comic relief. He is very approachable and cares about his students

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: His lectures are pretty much useless(in the first year, not afterwards), I skipped over half and still got an 87 in the class.

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: I studied from the textbook only and did well. I find that the extra stuff we talked about in lectures was not on exams. Michael is great and adds videos and humour into class to make it interesting.

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: He is a very kind and funny professor. His lectures are pretty interesting and go by quickly. There are a lot of online assignments, especially at the beginning of the year but they are simple. Read the textbook in depth as this is what the tests are mostly based on.

Name: Michael MacGregor
Review: He was a really nice prof but I just found that some of his lectures were hard to follow and I found myself getting bored. The material was very interesting, but get ready for tons of assignments and 3 midterms.

Name: Michael MacGregor
