Review: He was very easy to understand and tried to make his lectures interesting, this made it easy to see that he knew what he was talking about. Quite a few tests that include questions from the textbook so it is important to read through it.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Lectures are hard to sit through, especially if you have a 3 hour night class. Often goes off on a tangent and then scraps what she was just saying, which is confusing. She gets her content through the textbook, so it's not too bad to keep up on the content which I do like about her class.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Wendy is a very knowledgable Econ prof. She has 2 tough midterms and a tough final but read the textbook for a good, thorough understanding of the material. Online assignments are good mark boosters. Her lectures were kinda hard to follow so like not super necessary to attend. Her notes are helpful.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Wendy was pretty ok. Her lectures were kinda hard to follow so class was useless but like notes were good and helpful for exam prep. Midterms actually weren't too hard but did have a couple tears in the final. Online assignments are good mark boosters

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: She is really confusing and often contradicts herself. There is no need to even go to the lectures because she will just confuse you and you can do well with just reading the textbook. The midterms are the seams as the online quizes so it is easy to study.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Wrote this 5 minutes into class two! She looks lost when shes up giving the lecture and loses track of where she is multiple times during the class. Very difficult to stay engaged in the course due to her monotone voice. Accent makes understanding her lectures difficult. Seems as if she doesn't know what she's doing. Read slides word for word.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Hard to understand with her accent. But, she lays out very clear expectations for the class and also hints at some of the long answers on the exams.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: I quite enjoyed having Wendy as my professor as she tries relate everything she teaches to real life examples which makes it easier to understand. There are online quizzes you have 5 attempts and she will take the highest mark (10 questions 20 min) worth 10% easy mark booster. She takes questions for her exams off of those online quizzes.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Wendy is an amazing prof! She cares deeply for her students (inside and outside class) and she loves to answer questions! I had her spring class which is extremely fast pace but she did her best to explain all the materials. Pay attention to her lecture, do the quizzes and you dont need the textbook at all. Highly recommend!

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: If you get Wendy for econ, do yourself a favor and just read the text at home. Not only does she move through the material at the pace of a snail, she makes it as hard to follow as possible (no whiteboard management, thick accent, strange off-topic discussion). She doesn't add anything that you can't get from the text, faster, and more clearly.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Wendy is excellent at describing challenging economics concepts, while using real world examples. Although the three hour night class can be long, she does her best to make it interesting. She cares deeply about students and quick at responding to emails. Make sure to do the online quizzes, as many test questions come from the quiz bank.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: She was always available to help, remarkable at responding to emails, fast marker. If I saw her in the hallways she stopped to see how I was doing and how classes were. Econ is a drab subject, and she did her best to brighten it up. Love her, would take her class again

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Well planned out lessons and clear expectations.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Wendy is a good professor. I had her for Econ 111, and you always know what to expect with her class. She has class notes derived from the textbook, however has her own twist on them and tries to explain the concepts as best as possible. I had no trouble understanding her. She responds to questions/emails quick. Very caring, and test isn't too hard

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Wendy is a good prof. She was very good at explaining herself and hints at whats on the test by emphazing or repeating herself. The best economics prof I have had.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: I really enjoyed Wendy's Econ 111 class. I found she illustrated all the concepts well and has a kind personality. Sometimes I did find myself struggling to pay attention toward the end. However, Her lecture notes were very clear and helpful.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: "Um, ahh" is a common phrase you'll hear Wendy say if you take any of her class. She basically just reads from the textbook, so if you can dedicate the time to read the textbook yourself, and do all the online quizzes, you can do pretty decent in her class.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Wendy Doell was a pretty good Prof. I can honestly say I didn't enjoy the material of the course but Wendy tried her best to help you understand, even though the textbook was more clear than she was. Be prepared for chapter quizzes! The only good thing about the quizzes is that she takes questions directly from those for the midterms and final!

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Awful, couldn't understand her at all.  Opportunity Cost okay, right .    basically all you will here all  year.   Read the textbook its your only hope with her

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Wendy is one of my favourite professors! Her exams are predictable and she takes all her questions from the textbook bank. Her final had tons of questions that were from the online quizzes that are worth 10%. Read the textbook and do her quizzes and you'll do fine.

Name: Wendy Doell
Review: Right, okay, so let's say you need to take an economics class. Don't take it from Wendy. Going to her lectures are so pointless. She can't teach a slide without jumping back to 50 different ones just to get a point across. Better off to read the textbook.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: His accent is so thick you cannot understand anything he says. Goes off topic quite a bit. Plays classical music at the beginning of lecture which is amusing.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: A little hard to understand but is very passionate about teaching and the material.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: He's a bit difficult to understand, and his lecture notes are sometimes confusing. However, he is very helpful when approached after class with questions about the material.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: Absolute unit. Almost sounds like he is saying garlic toast when he says galactose. exotic.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: Had Jorge for bio 120 and 224..... definitely would say avoid him at all costs. His lectures are very disorganized and his exams are a complete disaster. Biology at u of s would've gone so much better for me if I had a different prof.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: Just such a thick accent that if you dont have a textbook and dont get the notes the class will be impossible

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: Jorge is a great prof! He is very kind and wants you to do well. He is a bit hard to understand at first but you get used to it. I found sitting near the front of the class really helped. If you attend all of his lectures and read the textbook it is easy to get a good grade in this class!

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: Dr. Chedrese is a very kind person... but not the best prof. He wasnt that hard to understand but his slides didnt make much sense and I struggled with his portion. Again very sweet person, but unfortunately not something I need in a Prof.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: Great guy who creates a positive learning environment. Can be hard to understand for some, but I didn't find his accent to really be a problem. Very knowledgeable Professor who gives useful heads up as to testable materials on exams. Fill-in notes can be hard to follow because of the language deficit, so use the text to your benefit.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: Jorge is a great prof, he can be slightly hard to understand but he is aware of this and is more than willing to repeat himself and try to be more clear if you ask. All of bio 120 is fill in the blank slides so it's a good idea to attend the lectures, he also gives good hints about what will be on the midterm.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: Language barriers make it extremely challenging to understand the professor. His skeleton notes often have language-related errors and are confusing to read. Jorge will not communicate via email with students, but he is very passionate about what he teaches and easily approachable.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: has a thick accent, but is a very good professor. A very friendly teacher, to be around

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: He has a bad rep because of his accent, but I honestly did not find him that bad. Everything that will be tested on is in the slides, the textbook is a great resource as well as the peer tutors. The concepts are not that hard but there is alot of material that you NEED to understand, not just memorize, to do well on the midterm and final.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: It was hard to understand him through his thick accent. This wouldn't be so bad, if he created cohesive slides, but he was lacking in this. The slides were all over the place with material, and it was unclear what was important. The midterm and final were nothing what his course objectives said it was going to be, and it had multiple spelling error

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: Even though at times I could hardly understand the man, I have come to realize what a blessing in disguise he was. His thicc accent only forced me to pay attention in lecture more, and I performed fairly well because of this.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: He is hard to understand but once you get the hang of it hes a really good professor!

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: Jorge's accent can be difficult to understand at times, but his lecture slides go hand in hand with the textbook. I found him to be an entertaining prof, and he often asked questions to the class to keep us engaged. If you don't mind doing some extra reading from the textbook, Jorge is a decent prof.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: Hard to understand and slides are confusing. Reading the textbook really helped me and I recommend using MindTap to study.

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: Can't understand the guy at all. Notes were decent but wouldn't recommend him

Name: Jorge Pedro Chedrese
Review: Lectures were awful and hard to understand. Never seemed to cover what was in the labs. Learned more in the labs and on my own time than I did from his lectures.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: Susan is BY FAR the worst prof I have ever had. Avoid her at all costs. She goes on monotone rants about the importance of raising your hand. Skips over slides because she doesn't know what's on them. Leaves out big chunks of the lecture because "that's good enough." You will be teaching yourself from the textbook if you ever have a class with her.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: When a student has a question... "I'm sorry you're confused. I'm confused. Let's move on." Hands down the worst prof I have ever had. Another timeless classic- "rather than tell me what I'm doing wrong, just tell me what I'm doing right. I am feeling so discouraged."

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: Probably the worst prof at the uni right now, avoid at all costs!!

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: Her slides don't make any sense, and she goes off on tangents after every sentence. Did not learn a thing, so dropped her class so I could take it with a better prof. She doesn't give students support and will not give you make up midterms if you have to miss-for any reason, and will call you out in class. Get out while you can.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: Openly talks down to get student. Often talks about ex husband.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: Incredibly rude. Always goes on random tangents about unrelated subjects. Didn't even cover all of the topics and let us know the last day of class we'd have to learn a chapter on our own because she didn't cover it. No student will want to continue in biology after having a class with her. No idea why she teaches a first year bio class.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: I got a horrible grade in biology, mostly because of her. She made me never want to take another biology class again. Is there an option to give her a zero?

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: Avoid her at all costs! She has no time management skills and taught us the same slideshow for 3 weeks, and then tried to teach us our last chapter in the last 10 minutes of the last class before the final. She does not treat her students well, and most of the time she doesn't even talk about things relevant to the course!

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: She actually repeated the same set of lecture slides for 3 weeks. 6 lectures of gel electrophoresis on repeat. That was bad. So no, her lectures hold no value, but I was able to get more than decent marks by reading the textbook chapters and studying from online sources.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: AWFUL...

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: Worst Prof ever. So hard to follow, there is no keeping up with her constant sidetracking and babbling.  I think my learning decreased from sitting through her lectures and I know myself, as well as many others proceeded to stop attending.  Apparently it would be "ridiculous" of her to test on any type of facts about Biology.. aka brutal final.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: Do not take this class! Wait a semester if you have to, unless you want to learn nothing about Biology and everything about her fungi research and listen to long winded useless info that has nothing to do with this class. Avoid this prof at all costs.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: Attendance went way down when she took over, not many people want to listen to her. She talks down on students a lot. She gives you a lot of pointless information, just boring to listen to. Avoid her if you can.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: Her notes were full of pictures with little to no information. When you would ask for help, she would refer you to Wikipedia as an "excellent source of information." Easy to understand and knew what she was talking about, but was more interested in her own research than teaching. Afford taking her section if you can.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: HORRIBLE PROF. If you can switch into a class with a different prof.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: Terrible class to begin with. She didn't make it any better. Just be prepared for the vagueness of every assignment and final essay.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: I think he is probably a nice person, but as a prof she is horrible. She only uses pictures in which she goes into so much detail that you only need to know maybe 1/4 of. The text book with be your lifeline in this class. I would consider finding another prof.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: HORRIBLE PROF. JUST HORRIBLE. SO MUCH SO that the department sent out an apology email for her confusion NEVER AGAIN!!!!!!!!!!!!!! GET OUT. BUT the text is your life line and will earn you a high mark if you put the time in.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: An OK prof. Her slides are just pictures and not very helpful but she covered course materials thoroughly. She's really nice but I would not take another class with her.

Name: Susan Kaminskyj
Review: I would not recommend this professor! She talks about stuff that is above a Biology 120 level sometimes!

Name: David York
Review: interesting and an overall wicked prof

Name: David York
Review: The lectures were a little dry sometimes but due to the content of the class that was understandable. He applies real-life situations to content which made it much more interesting, relatable, and easier to understand concepts. Much easier if you attend class and don't just rely on notes and slides. He is a fair marker, you get what you work for!

Name: David York
Review: I took this class with York based on a friends recommendation. However, I did not find him to really be all that. the course material was kinda dry which really didn't help. It's better to just read summaries of the chapters than spend money on the book

Name: David York
Review: Professor York's lectures are hard to understand. I highly recommend the textbook for this class. Assignments are very difficult. As a person, Professor York is charismatic and engaging, but is also very biased in what he teaches, and actively shamed right-wing students in class. Talked more about American politics than Canadian for some reason.

Name: David York
Review: This was the fourth class I have taken with Professor York. If that isn't a testimony to the quality of Professor York I don't know what is. Make sure you attend class, take good notes, and engage in the class discussion. Textbook is optional as long as you are understanding the course content. Everyone should take a class with Professor York!

Name: David York
Review: Slides are minimal as most of the content is from what he is saying. make sure you can differentiate his opinion, the opposing opinion, and facts or definitions in his lectures. getting early feedback on work will help you do better on your papers and forming your opinions.

Name: David York
Review: David is a real gem of a professor. He's very easily accessible outside the classroom. He gives good feedback on papers and even the midterm. He'll tell you where you can improve if you ask and go over rough drafts. Class participation is big with him. He's also quite hilarious.

Name: David York
Review: Awesome lectures! I found him super engaging and very helpful outside class. One of my favourite profs in the pols department at the U of S for sure. Make sure you attend and youll do well on the final and in the class. He does minis to take attendance, usually right before a break, so make sure you go! Overall great choice!

Name: David York
Review: the lectures and power points are extremely dry, and rather opinionated. The paper seemed easy enough, but he deducted marks because he disagreed with my point of view (and that of my scholarly sources at that). The final is extremely difficult and gruelling as there is no multiple choice, just long answer ( about 12 pages of writing in 3 hours).

Name: David York
Review: David is a pretty nice guy and his course sounds pretty easy and not homework heavy which is true but once it comes to exams and term papers, if you don't have the exact same opinion as him he will give you really bad marks. Majority of lectures were one sided and about Donald Trump and no other important global issues.

Name: David York
Review: Lectures can get dry every so often, but he keeps his class engaged always through humour, and intriguing scenarios. Participation is key for this class, doesn't post his slides online, so attendance is mandatory to understand the content.

Name: David York
Review: This was the second time I had a class with Professor York and he is consistently my favourite professor in the department. Professor York intentionally tries to get to know individual students. He wants to see his students succeed, and gives feedback to help that happen. He used an online textbook (YAY)! He does love teaching theory, so be warned.

Name: David York
Review: Dry class? I don't think so. Dave made this class an absolute joy. Definitely attend class, participate in the discussions, and take good notes. If you can do those three things that is 90% of the class. Spend a little extra time applying the theories learned to real world cases and you'll be set.

Name: David York
Review: Good lecturer.  The material is pretty dry but he does his best to make it interesting.  You don't need the textbook, just show up to class and it's pretty easy.  He really encourages class  participation so be ready to speak up

Name: David York
Review: Great prof - he's engaging in his lectures, and he does a good job of expounding on the material covered in the textbooks, using real-world examples to drive the points home. Not an easy marker, but he provides good feedback on essays and assignments. Attendance is a must - he demands participation during his lectures. Would definitely recommend.

Name: David York
Review: York is hands down one of the smartest and most thought-provoking professors I've ever had. His lecture style is basic, but he relies heavily on participation to keep the class going. Personally, however, I had a difficult time in this class because he often uses vocabulary that is too complex for me. But overall, he is a fair marker and good prof.

Name: David York
Review: Great Prof. Classes are mainly discussion based, but he does a great job of facilitating discussion. Posts a lot of relevant readings/ goes through them in class which is helpful to understand the relevance of the topics. Textbook readings and attendance are very much needed to understand course.

Name: David York
Review: Found that nothing was ever explained clearly in understandable english. It honestly sounded like he was reciting a scholarly essay whenever he talked. He is very knowledgeable about the subject, but I found the class very boring.

Name: David York
Review: York is an absolute beauty. Best professor I've ever had, hands down. He genuinely cares about the students and wants them to do well. If you ever get the chance to take a class from him, I highly recommend it.

Name: David York
Review: York is a good professor. Funny, engaging (though can get frustrated when the class isn't participating), and a skilled lecturer. Marking is fair. I have taken 3 of his classes and enjoyed all of them. Warning - he is quite theory-heavy.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: He is a good prof, and cares about his students. He gives good examples and tries to make the information clear. Physics 115 itself just has lots of homework, so you don't really have time to do practice problems on topics you actually need help with.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: 10/10 great prof. all of his examples are done on the board in class. is aware that most of the students in class were first years, and lectured in a way similar to high school teachers so that you could transition to uni lectures easily. was very easy to understand and didnt overcomplicate anything

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: Brian is an amazing prof! I did not do well in 115 but his teaching was very clear and I was able to understand topics much easier with his explanations. He is very accessible outside of class and does everything he can to make sure that his students succeed.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: Physics isn't my favourite subject, but Brian made it interesting. He does a lot of examples and demonstrations in class that really help put the material in context. His use of TopHat is also very beneficial in understanding concepts and earning a few bonus marks.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: Brian is very kind and cares about his students and will help you if you approach/email him. All his lectures are recorded and he posts the notes online but going to class is worth it because he is very entertaining

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: Best prof I've ever had hands down. I've always loved science but didn't connect with physics in high school. He made it exciting, so I rearranged my schedule to take his 117 class. Highly recommend!

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: I loved how Brian taught, he was an outstanding professor. Things always made sense even when the content was very difficult because he is so good at explaining. He also seems to really care; he gets genuinely upset at himself when the class doesn't do well on top-hat questions, and always makes time to meet with you outside of class.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: He made me love physics again. Honestly wouldn't take this class with any other prof. He is very good at explaining. If you email him doubts, he will respond back quite fast with detailed explanations. He makes sure you are prepared for the tests by hosting extra study sessions. His lectures may have gotten a little dull at times but he's great.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: Amazing prof. 10/10 would reccomend if you need to take Physics 115 or 117. Lectures are worth attending as they are interesting and helpful. Brian is extremely approachable and helpful as well. He is the definition of a great teacher

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: Super great prof! He is engaging and fun and makes the material really easy to understand.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: Great prof. Great explanations. Great class.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: Awesome prof! Was willing to meet with me one on one although he has many other students.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: Great prof, makes physics as interesting as possible. Very clear expectations. Physics requires a lot of effort but all the assignments he gives helps understand the material. Labs are hell but lectures are made fun with humour. There are many quizzes and assignments (both assigned and optional) each week (along with the lab). Very time consuming

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: He is very nit. You don't need to research about the course anymore. This is BZ, prob the best in UofS as far as I know.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: Very professional and efficient.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: One of the best professors I have ever had in my first two years of university. Amazing choice for first year physics professor. I will be taking him next term in Phys 117 without a doubt.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: Good teacher

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: BZ is an awesome prof. I would highly recommend taking first year physics classes with him. He uses clickers so you do have to go to lectures. If you miss a lab just go talk to him he will most likely give you another day to do it. Overall BZ is helpful, nice and good at explaining.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: Zulkowskey was one of my favourite profs this term. Mid term and final were marked fast and he would let us know on blackboard even before they were posted in the "my final grades" channel. He is super clear in explaining things and goes through examples well. This is not an easy course, but with him it was one of my highest marks.

Name: Brian Zulkoskey
Review: Very good prof, explains things very clearly in class and does a lot of demonstrations. Homework and tests are a bit difficult but if you just go over all of the old tests that he posts online you will be fine

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: I feel like people our giving him a bad wrap, I took the 3 week summer session and it was hell but not because of the prof, he does tons of examples on the board, and also answers everyone's questions, his English is lacking but it is a math class so that did not really seem to make a difference , he puts in the work so you have to too!

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: Professor Yang provides a simple learning experience and makes it aware of what is required of students. His lectures often jump around a lot but they are relatively easy to follow. Weekly quizzes handed back quickly.

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: Great prof I love his teaching style and i bet his class average is atleast 20% higher than other profs , even thou u need to adapt his accent for a couple classes. but it worth well for the extra knowledge and good gradesyou gain from his class :)

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: Pretty thick accent, but you catch on quickly. Lots of his examples, especially the ones he does the day before an exam, are often on the exam. Has lots of examples on his slides which are very helpful

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: he provides slides with important examples all explained in classes and labs. He is very helpful with assignments and other problems if you approach him. overall, great prof if you can get his accent, maybe will take 2/3 classes. be prepared to complete assignments on time, be responsible and you will get a good grade.

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: Lectures are pretty dull and he tends to over acknowledge minute details. Make the effort to show up, otherwise its hard to tell if you are doing things correctly. Overall the Quingde is a statistics-loving lad. I hope you have the opportunity to see the most contented version him on Pi Day (he wears a dope Pi shirt).

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: great prof who does lots of examples in class. He tests are full of examples from class. Would recommend for stats 103.

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: I can't understand him at all since he has a thick accent, so I had to do self study just to pass the class. Definitely would not take a class again with him.

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: While you do need to be there for lectures in order to understand the content (I found, anyway), he does explain things well. Hes a super sweet person, and made statistics easy to understand and interesting. Somewhat thick accent, but writes everything on the slides or on a whiteboard, so you can decipher everything well enough. Would take again.

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: really really disliked this class. I coulnt understand what was going on and felt like i left the class even more confused than i had been when i first walked in. Tests are fairly hard (but i could just be stupid). Overall, worse class I've ever taken.

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: I really didn't like this course. I could barley understand the prof and he moved way too quick. I was the type of person to do really good in math and enjoyed it, but I did not do good in this class whatsoever. The outcomes were interesting, but I couldn't fully understand what was being taught.

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: Dr. Yang's accent is pretty tough to understand, but is manageable. He definitely enjoys what he does, is good at it, and cares about his students. He mostly just does examples in class, so you'll have to learn and practice on your own. Overall, very fair grader and posts great resources online like past midterms, all slides and practice problems

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: nice guy. all he wants is for his students to do well and is really passionate about statistics. he does have a thick accent which makes it hard to understand at times but he is a very nice instructor

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: He is great! he has an accent, but is very understandable! You can tell he loves to teach stats and just wants everyone to understand. Its a good idea to keep up with the optional homework assignments and make sure you understand because if you fall behind and don't understand 1 thing, it will be harder to understand the next thing!

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: His accent is thick and all he does in class is examples--He expected us to know the material before he went over it. Frequently goes over time, and is hard to understand.

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: I had this prof for Math 264. Showed up to the first week of classes, realized he is very difficult to understand and never went again. I read the textbook at home to learn all the concepts. If I didn't understand something, he was very accessible during his office hours. He is a very inconsistent grader.

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: I had him both for Math 110 and for Math 116. It was difficult to understand his verbal explanations due to a language barrier. However, he gave excellent notes which helped me master the material.

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: He was always in his office after hours and I went to see him for help more than once! The material was easy as long as you don't overthink it. Practice a lot and you'll be fine. His accent is thick but it doesn't affect the lecture that much.

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: Talks about Math 116 a lot. Constantly tells us we need to spend all our time practicing math because we're weak in math. Took me an entire day to realize when he said "joo" he meant "rule". DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS IN THE SUMMER. I worked and took this class and barely passed. It's extremely time consuming and fast paced.

Name: Qingde Yang
Review: Took the spring Math 100 and he was great!! Can understand him just fine, makes himself as clear as he can and explains how to do the math with multiple examples. If you struggle with math like myself, I still recommend a tutor as there's a lot to go over. He allows cheat sheets & calculator and gives out old tests for examples :)

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: easiest and most fun class I have ever had

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Terrible teacher and a terrible human. NEVER responded to emails faster than one week later. She lost my final, then gave me a terrible mark on my final (for late marks even though she lost it??) when I emailed her to find out why, I had to email twice and she responded SIX WEEKS LATER. DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS SHE IS HORRENDOUS.

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: great prof, explains information well and properly prepares you for the exams. as long as you go to class and listen even a little, you will pass.

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Lisa is an amazing prof and really cares about her students. Her TAs are also very helpful! engaged lectures and easy to listen. Ill be taking more of her classes!

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Lisa is the best professor I have ever had! She has worked in the field, knows how to apply the material and is caring about students! Loved her class!

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: This is my first sociology class and Lisa is easy to listen too and makes me want to attend. There are groups and 2 exams so easier that way. Awesome professor!

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Awesome class and LIsa cares about her students. Her TAs are also good and are helpful during group. Would definately take more of her classes!

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Made me want to switch my major to Sociology! Great class and relevant material!

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Lectures are relevant and interesting! Lisa is knowledgable about criminology and she adds in anecdotes and her personal experiences into the lectures which make them way more engaging than just reading from a powerpoint. Also a very nice person and very approachable. Would take again!

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Super interesting lectures and while there is some group discussions, which is not for everyone the topics are engaging. Id take again for sure. Lisa is an expert in the field.

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Engaging, interesting - definatley take it - better than many boring profs!

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Im taking Lisa's class right now and its awesome! she is so engaging and fun, plus she takes the time to get to know the class through group discussion - i highly recommend! Love it!

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Learned tons and changed my major to sociology and now taking crime class. Very interesting to listen to and expert in field. Need to watch exams though and study!

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Great class and knowledgeable prof! Easy to listen too and do well. I'll take more classes from this prof!

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Lectures do not reflect a lot of the questions in the midterm and final. They are also very strictly graded: 50% for final and 40% for midterm. No room to compensate for lost marks. Questions on tests are ambiguous and confusing. Instructor doesn't seem very invested in teaching the class and not much interest in improving student performance.

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Death by copying powerpoint slides, the final exam did not feel like an accurate representation of how the material was presented in class or tested on the midterm. Grading is way to steep Midterm 40% 40 m.c, final 50% 80 m.c, group discussion 10% . It felt like teaching as was a weekend job as she didn't seem very invested.

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Although Professor Broda is very knowledgeable in Criminology she did not feel super invested throughout the term. Between the class cancellations, in-class videos and group discussions she didn't do much teaching at all. If you are new to taking social sciences you might find this enjoyable.

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Lisa was very nice but class was cancelled lots. Lots of class was spent watching videos and doing group discussions that didnt seem very applicable to the lectures. Lots of work given to TAs who were very annoying. Only one midterm and 5 class discussions and one final. Classes were pretty dry but its still an easy class

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Taking SOC with Professor Broda was the biggest waste of time. She constantly cancelled class and gave the work to her TA's. Her notes are disorganized and she makes the class watch so many videos. There was only a midterm (40%) and final (50%) with 5 group discussions that made us miss even more class time. I learned nothing in this class.

Name: Lisa Broda
Review: Best class ever! Recommend taking if you want to have some interesting lectures!

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: This was the sixth class I registered in during the semester, which means I went to only a handful of the lectures. He marked us on one paper worth half our grade and then the final exam. I studied both textbooks a lot and still passed the course with a grade high enough for honors. So in short, this class was not bad.

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Jason is an amazing prof. Managed to keep me engaged for a whole three hours, which is a miracle. Really charismatic and awesome speaker, and really knows his stuff. I would definitely reccommend him to anyone looking to take a history or pols class.

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Jason is awesome. He is able to bring character even into online lectures. All of the content was divided into reading modules, and he was able to describe concepts simply and add relevant examples. I would love to take a class of his in person!

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Great teacher. The only night class that you can actually stay involved/focused for the entire 3 hours. Keeps you engaged with some awesome debates!

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Mr. Zorbas is an excellent professor, I would definitely recommend him for a 1st year class! He is a fair grader and gives good final exams that are fair for first year classes. Highly recommended, I have one degree already and have had many professors so have seen it all. He is top notch.

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: The best proff I have had. Keeps class engaged for the whole class. He doesn't really have notes/ post notes, but his knowledge on a huge assortment of topics makes up for it. This was the first class I actually looked foreword going to!

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: honestly just unreal. first thing I think about when I wake up

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: I took the online course of Hist193 and found the material both interesting and boring depending on the module. Prof seemed really uninvolved in the class and only marked on two written assignments and final. Did not receive a grade for the main essay even after emailing about it. Avoid online course but possibly try his in person classes.

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Dr. Zorbas is one of the best profs that I have ever had. His lectures are well structured, which keeps students engaged for the entire 3 hours. He has a great sense of humor and you can tell he is very passionate about his subject. I would recommend him to anyone taking first year POLS.

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Best prof I have had in university so far. Very engaging lectures, provides relevant supplemental materials to keep material interesting. Fair grading on midterm and paper, if you go to class you will not have a problem. Highly recommend taking a class with Zorbas if you have the chance.

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: I learned a lot about political science in his class.  It was quite interesting and I am glad I chose this class for my elective.

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Not bad at all, but definitely overrated. I took 2 of his online classes and the material was very straightforward in both of them, but he was very late for returning grades on his papers. Maybe he was having a bad year, but I felt that waiting over a month to get my grade for a 3 page paper in a small class was a little unprofessional.

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Great Professor! I would definitely take another class of his!!! Not often do you find professors who care for their students, he is top prof in my books!

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Jason is an amazing lecturer. He takes an old style approach to lecturing and keeps you engaged. He is clear and consice with all  course content.

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: He is friendly and engaging, keeps your attention during class and often ends class early. However, he takes forever to return assignments and has little to no feedback on them, which negatively impacted my grade in this class. There are a lot of assignments in this class and it was way more work than what it was worth. Would not recommend.

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Dr. Zorbas is hands down the best prof I have had at the U of S. RCM was a night class and somehow he managed to keep my attention for the whole three hours, something no prof has ever done before. He also gives great feedback on the assignments, and really helps us understand the material. 10/10 would take his class again

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Professor Zorbas is a GREAT lecturer.  I highly recommend attending every class.  He is very good at engaging his student and promoting discussion. He also has a very good sense of humor.  His marking is reasonable and I look forward to attending another class of his.

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Amazing lecturer, one of the best professors I've had.  Very clear with what he wants. Only had one big paper and a midterm.

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Amazing lecturer. Only had a big paper & a final. Participation matters as textbooks are supplemental to his lectures & it makes it easier to scroll through important stuff in a book during preparation. If you lack political knowledge, like me, don't worry - he'll unhesitatingly tell you all - even basics - just ask! He lets everyone contribute:)

Name: Jason Zorbas
Review: Though this Jason uses the old style "I talk and you write down what I say" sort of lecture style, it is very easy to keep up and write notes. It was easy to be engaged in his lectures and is very easy to reach if you need help or clarification on a term. Definatly recommend him for any political studies class.

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: Honestly? What a legend. What an icon. He loves plants and cares about his students. What more could you ask for? In all seriousness, his exams were fair, his lectures were engaging, and he's willing to make an appointment with you if you need further explanations. Best prof I had this year.

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: Ken was my favorite professor by far last semester. I had long Tuesday/Thurday classes with him but never had trouble paying attention because of his sense of humor. Always willing to explain any questions you might have after class. If you have the chance, take his class!

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: I had Ken for Bio 120 and he was great. Very straight forward, wants everybody to do good. He can be funny sometimes and he just loves plants. Ask him about plants. I think he wants to be a plant. 5 stars

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: Loves plant biology and is proud to see his students motivated to succeed. Gives tips for his exams and the textbook is good for clarification. There was a lot of genetics/mitosis repetition from high-school. Enjoyable course overall and not too difficult if you actually studied frequently. Lots of high-achievers in this course.

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: Amazing prof! He always adds humor to the lectures which make them a little more interesting. He records his voice and uploads it with the powerpoints, so if you miss class it isn't a big deal at all. You go through a lot of info in the lectures but it is a very busy course so that can't be helped. Usually lets you out of class early as well!

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: Ken is great! His dad-jokes lighten the atmosphere and make it comfortable to speak up and ask questions. I would recommend going to lectures to get his explanations on the slides, but everything is online if you miss a class. The class is pretty straight forward as long as you attend and listen, I barely used the textbook and still did fine

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: -entertaining prof who is available outside of class if you need further explanation, but his lectures are pretty thorough and are interesting most of the time.  Great prof

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: Dr. Wilson openly admits to not knowing a lot of stuff that people ask in class, which is great because he's honest, but kind of sucks cause sometimes answers are nice. His lectures are fairly heavy, but good. Lectures, OLI quizzes, Mid-terms/finals, and labs all have different information, so you have to study all around. Be prepared to study.

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: Ken always tries to make his lectures funny and interesting. He made great little side jokes to keep the class attentive. Make sure to focus on what he is saying and study the material, you'll do fine. He responds to his emails very quickly and is always really helpful with his replies; don't be scared to ask him for help! Great prof, recommended!

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: He's cool

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: Kind of monotone and if you are not careful you will fall asleep in his class. Overall a good person and very funny. The class is a lot like BIO30 from high school

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: His lectures are awesome! He wants to make sure everyone understands what he is teaching and he will go over it several times. He really loves what he does and it shows. His classes are always a really great environment.

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: One of the best profs I've had.

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: Ken was amazing, though the final exam was more difficult than he made it out to be, it was fair. Would take more classes by him if ever given the chance.

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: Professor Wilson is by far one of the best professors I have had! He keeps the classes interesting and typically cuts them around 10 minutes short. He also really highlights what you need and don't need to know for exams, which is really helpful! Highly recommended!

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: Strong educator. You understand everything he says in lecture just by the way he explains things.

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: Awesome professor! He definitely understands and cares about his students. His final was kinda hard, but he explained concepts in a simple and interesting way. Would definitely recommend!

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: The best biology prof their probably is. He is genuinely interested in the course and does review questions in every lecture to make sure his students understand the content. He is always there for you and genuinely wants his students to do well. Would definitely take another class with him.

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: Dr. Wilson is one of my favourite profs! He tries to make dry, boring concepts as interesting as possible. He is very funny and uses a variety of learning methods to help instil the important objectives. He is very clear on what you do and don't need to know, which is so helpful. Would highly suggest taking his class.

Name: Ken Wilson
Review: He explained difficult concepts as clearly as he could. He also reviewed what we learned from the previous lecture at the beginning of lectures, which helped to reinforce said concepts.

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Attend the lectures, do the examples that he gives in class (the long answer questions are of the same difficulty as his longer examples), keep up with the SMARTWORK assignments, and do the sample tests he posts. Pearson sets you up for success. Doing the end of chapter questions is not necessary unless you have trouble with the in-class examples.

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Pearson is an amazing chemistry professor. He makes it very clear what will be tested on, gives good examples in class, and tries to make his lectures interesting. He can be slightly intimidating to approach at first, but he is a kind person who will do his best to help you when possible.

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: He was very engaging in his lectures and always put emphasis on what topics were important.

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: You need to attend lectures to pass because Professor Ahiahonu explains difficult concepts very well, and solves a lot of questions in class.

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Pearson is the best science professor I have ever hard. Thank you!

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Pearson is a very good Professor, explains concepts very well. I will take more chemistry courses with him

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Found him enjoyable at the beginning of the course until you don't understand something and ask him a question. He is very rude when it comes to answering questions and has no problem ridiculing students in the lecture and during his office hours. Very unprofessional considering its literally his job to clarify the subject.

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Pearson is okay but if you've never taken any type of grade 11 or 12 chem, there's a very good chance you'll struggle a lot. you won't be able to follow the course if you haven't taken any type of chemistry before.

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: It was very hard and the way the lecture was structured, in my opinion, made it hard for me to follow. I did not find his explanations for students' questions sufficient

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: He is the worst professor I have ever had! Hard to understand , too much yelling , spend too much time explaining the first 4 chapters and rash on the last ones!

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Pearson isnt that hard to understand and he is very passionate. His notes are very well organized especially for the online assignments and labs. I didnt find Chem 112 and easy course, but if you do practice problems, it is manageable.

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Pearson is a great prof, not as hard to understand as everyone says. He is enthusiastic about what he teaches and is very educated in his field. I don't have any bad comments about him, he's very approachable and cares about students. Chem112 however is an awful course that you really have to bust your butt to do even okay in, even with a good prof

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Took his CHEM 112 course as a first year student and was very happy with the outcome. Pearson would show up every class very happy to teach. Although he was difficult to understand at times, he made sure that students understood the material. He would often go over examples in class for students to better understand concepts. Overall, great prof.

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Prof. Pearson Ahiahonu in a very good teacher, cares about the success of his students. I will recommend him to everybody.

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Was very challenging to understand the prof from language barriers, was either yelling or mumbling while lecturing, never responded to emails throughout the entire semester and had difficulty answering questions after class. Time is better spent reading the provided notes and studying the material on your own. New textbook required.

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Had him for Chem 112 first semester, this class in honestly very easy if you go to class and pay attention during all his lectures. He gives pretty clear instructions, a bi t vague on some topics but good prof for the most part.

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: This professor is a very funny guy, likes to try and make chemistry interesting. He really knows his stuff. however, he talks incredibly fast and if you can't really understand his thick accent you will struggle to know what he's saying By the end of the term he rushed through three chapters way too fast and I ended up having to teach myself a lot.

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: He is a very good professor, explains concepts very well. I recommend you to take his class

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Best chemistry professor I have ever had

Name: Pearson Ahiahonu
Review: Dr. Ahiahonu definitely is difficult to understand for the first few weeks but it gets easier as you go. He's very passionate about chemistry, and this means lots of homework and practice questions are necessary to do well. He's not the best at explaining his answers so you'll be studying lots after his classes. Lots of work, but rewarding.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: Doug isn't the most exciting lecturer, but his notes are helpful and if you go to class, listen and review the notes you will do fine in the class. Midterm was a lot more difficult than I expected, and the final was a lot easier. Listen to his tips about what to study in the lab or lecture exams.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: Terrible, I loved biology going into university it was my favourite thing to study and learn about, then came that professor. Absolutely terrible, sooooo boring will put you to sleep, will cause you to skip class which is last thing you should do, all I gotta say is take the class just not with that prof otherwise good luck passing.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: The only reason to show up to class is to fill out the powerpoint slides. He does give a good explanation of them if you're interested. The tests are just regurgitations of said slides.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: He is quite monotone, but after some time you get used to it because the information is important. His notes are fill in the blank, so attend lectures. If you can manage to pay attention, he is actually telling you everything you need to know. I still used the textbook just in case (first year). He is very knowledgeable if you have a question.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: He is a good professor, if you have any questions he almost always has an answer. Very knowledgeable, lectures could get boring and overall he is a pretty average prof but there could be a lot worse.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: Dr. Smith was okay. He was kind of boring at times, but I enjoyed his portion of BIOL 120 quite a bit in comparison to the earlier stuff. In general it was alright. I probably would look for different profs to take BIOL 120 from.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: Will put you to sleep; bring a pillow and a blanket with you to lectures. Gives skeleton notes, so attendance is mandatory. Does not post notes, and is not very accessible outside of class. Lecture slides are very wordy, but they do go hand-in-hand with text chapters. Lots of reading.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: Doug is a very monotone lecturer. His comments are often condescending, such as saying how the whole class will fail the final and he embarrasses students in front of the entire class for asking questions. Lecture attendance is required in order to fill in the skeleton notes to study for the final exam.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: He ruins my Biology 121 lab. He is arrogant & continuously talks about how students are not smart enough and lazy . Stay away from him , he makes me hate showing up to labs I use to love.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: Doctor Smith is a very straight forward professor. Knowing his notes inside out will definitely land you a 100 on the midterm, but his one-dimensionality makes it torturous to sit through lectures. He is the epitome of a monotone professor, with a dry and non-existent humour. Notes need to be filled in, so show up for class. Think twice before emai

Name: Doug Smith
Review: Very detailed and precise lectures and note. If you pay attention and recap the notes you'll have no trouble doing well in his class.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: Dr. Smith isn't the most dynamic lecturer, but he is able to teach his subject clearly. His skeleton notes make coming to class essential but make the final a piece of cake. He is approachable to students outside of class and really seems to care about their learning.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: his portion on final exam was fully based on his fill in notes. He is very monotone and not very nice to students that ask questions after class. very boring lecturer and took too much time (3-5 days) explaining genetics and only spent half a day on photosynthesis. Final exam was mainly photosynthesis and cell resp. avoid if possible.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: Have to agree with the other comments about being monotone because yikes he puts me to sleep. But, his notes are easy to follow and great to study off of. You could probably skip most of the lectures as lo as you got notes form someone else and studied off those.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: He is a very boring prof to listen to and not very kind to students that ask questions. Most importantly, he "forgot" to show up to lecture one day and sent a long rambling email about it. Then he spent the rest of the semester rushing through the material to try and finish. Make sure you do the online quizzes- they taught me a lot.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: Reads the lecture slides in a very monotone, unenthusiastic voice. Refuses to put blanks online, so make sure you know someone in the class. You can easily read the textbook in lieu of attending lectures.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: Doug was brutally monotone as a Bio 120 lecturer and as a Bio 121 Lab TA. He is arrogant (despite trying to refute these claims), and it seems like he wants to see people fail. Always telling us we are doomed, and that we have no chance of succeeding in the course. He gets very off topic and rambles on for hours when you ask him simple questions.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: Very monotone, but very excited about the topic.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: Lectures were dry but clear cut. They had a more uniform structure to them. At the end of the term though he rushed really bad to get through the material, which made the last bit really confusing. While the fill in the blanks was nice, it often became a wait for the next blank, text friends while waiting because he was so monotonous.

Name: Doug Smith
Review: He is a very straightforward professor. His lectures were somewhat boring, just the usual skeleton notes, but he said everything as is. He speaks in a somewhat monotone way, so he is easy to understand. He's also an avid basketball fan.

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Brian was a fantastic professor and made complex material accessible. He used real-world examples, things that he encountered and things he's read about, to illustrate points.

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Highly recommended Professor. Very respectful, humble, great sense of humour. Great presentation delivery given dry content. Reading the text book would be helpful but understanding will be learned by doing the spreadsheet work in class.

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Super helpful. Challenging class, but committed to helping students succeed and work through.

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Easy to follow along in class, throws in the classic dad joke. Assignments are time consuming and often tedious for marks. Midterms and final had difficult short answers. They weren't similar to what was taught in class or seen in the textbook so you have to understand things pretty well to apply it in the test. Can be tricky, but use what you know

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Great guy, very funny, and apparently well respected however, his exams make no sense. His long answer are majority theory based where as his lectures are entirely math based. His multiple choice are the hardest thing Ive ever done in my life. Feels like hes giving you questions with missing values so you cant work out the formulas he teaches.

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Really nice guy but good luck to anyone thinking this class is gonna be a mark booster. Very difficult exams and a very rushed class. By far the hardest class of 2nd year BComm

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Whatever he says is on the midterm do not study you will waste your time to find out only 1 out of the 10 things he says is actually on it. His tests are extremely difficult compared to his in class questions. Using excel for problems does not help on exams because we do not know the step we only know the "functions". Felt very rushed the whole tim

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Brian is an awesome guy and you can tell he loves what he does. however, he does teach this class like it is an upper year course meaning lectures are very heavy, moves on quickly, and he expects you to understand. His tests were very fair and the assignments were super hard. Good prof but even better man

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Clearly describes concepts. One of the best finance professors you will find.

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Brian was a great professor. Finance is a very hard course, however Brian made it more bearable with a stellar sense of humour. Assignments are easy marks if you put some time into them. Midterms are very tough, about half theory and half calculations, so be sure to know the theory just as well. Overall, would highly recommend Brian as a professor.

Name: Brian Lane
Review: You really need to dive deep into the course practice questions to fully understand the material, there are practice problems in class but most require more time. Financial calculator highly recommended, can't imagine doing this course without it.

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Brian is very knowledgeable on the subject. He is one of the best finance profs at this uni. He is very clear with material  be ready to do a lot of practice outside of class  you will suffer if you do not. He is open to meeting outside class as well. Overall would def take a class with him again ( I did not do amazing as I didnt spend a lot of

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Brian really cares about finance as his dry humour displays. Used excel for all of examples, he didn't teach us how to write out the problems for exams unless you have a financial calculator which isn't mandatory. Overall, LOTS of content covered. Worst class I have taken in all of my university experience. Avoid.

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Brain Lane is a very nice professor, although this course is extremely heavy for an introduction course. The examples on excel are helpful in real life, but DEFIANTLY does not help on exams; if anything, it makes the class that more confusing. The questions on the exam are moderately harder than the ones in class, but he gives partial marks.

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Brian Lane himself is an exceptional human being. The class however, is pretty hard if you don't plan on taking any finance classes after it. The assignments are nice grade boosters, but the midterms were hard. Get ready to work and study hard if you want a good grade because you will be disappointed if you don't. As a lecturer though, he's great!

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Definitely one of the heavier classes of second-year business. Brian finds a way to make his lectures fun and exciting for such a dauntingly difficult course. He does tend however to skip over a lot of variations of problems that tend to show up on the exams. Great teacher, but setting aside a decent amount of time for the class is super important.

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Brian somehow makes finance seem entertaining with his many dad jokes. However, the exams were very difficult compared to the excel sheet we used in class. Would recommend Brian, but would let them know that it is a heavy course.

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Brian was a great professor but his midterms are very tough. The assignments are not a good guideline in what to expect on the tests. The midterms are worth a substantial amount compared to other classes. He is a great guy and his lectures are interesting but he teaches a tough subject. Would recommend for a finance class.

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Brian is a great prof. Finance is a hard class and he tries his best to help you understand it. The assignments are fair, but the midterms are hard and you have to prepare for them and stay on top of the course work. Overall I would recommend Brian to friends .

Name: Brian Lane
Review: Brian is one of the best profs I've had yet. The assignments are rather easy, midterms are tough so study hard for them! It is important to tend lectures as attendance is taken & Brian goes through quite a few examples during the class. Also shows you real life examples. Very sincere prof that cares about his students.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: A legend

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: Overall excellent prof; she offers lots of insight on academic topics. Additionally, she seeks out input from colleagues to better cover the subject matter she's presenting.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: Dr. Stamp is a wonderful professor. super cool

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: After transferring to Dal this year, Dr. Stamp has become my favourite prof EVER. She outlines exactly what you need to succeed in her courses and does it in an entertaining fashion. I'm very grateful to have a prof in my department that cares about her students success like she does. I look forward to taking more of her classes in the future.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: Stamp is an awesome prof. By far my favorite of the year. Her lectures are interesting and she's very enthusiastic.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: Jen Stamp is an absolute gem. I was not fantastic at this course (it was actually really difficult) but she made learning things that I find boring, like neuroscience, fun. I found the quizzes and exams really hard though.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: Dr. Stamp is a very funny, considerate, fair, and organized professor. She puts lots of effort into her lectures and her powerpoints. Powerpoints are a tool for many students that helps them take better, more detailed, and faster notes, so I really like her organization. Her test was very fair and relatively easy.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: Stamp is one of the best profs I've ever had. You genuinely are excited to come to her classes. She makes all topics very interesting and you can tell she cares a lot about her students!

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: Loved Dr. Stamp. She is a very engaging prof and makes the lectures more fun and interesting. Very good at explaining topics to students, you can tell she is very knowledgeable. Her exam was also relatively easy, all of the questions were from her lectures.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: Stamp is literally the best prof!! She genuinely cares so much about her students, and tries her absolute hardest to make really boring material interesting. She always uses real life examples and makes sure everything is clear for everyone! I would definitely recommend and I hope I get to take a class with her again!!

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: Absolutely love Dr. Stamp, her classes are by far the best I've ever taken.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: Dr Stamp was a lot of fun, very quirky and eccentric, but is very easily accessible and approachable, I will definitely seek her out for future classes/research

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: I took this during my 3rd year. Let me tell you, THIS HAS WAY TOO MUCH READING!!! I'm in MedSci and all 3rd year courses are hell but this was honestly harder than anything else. Most of my time was spent reading through the book and memorizing useless facts; during exams, we were tested not on actual material but on these random little facts.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: Stamp is a babe I love her. Lectures were awesome and so interesting. Made learning difficult material more fun and interested me in otherwise boring material.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: Super glad I got to have Dr. Stamp again this term. Her lectures are clear, her lecture recordings are a blessing and she sets the course up so that students do well. Dr. Stamp is super knowledgeable about the course material and you can tell that she cares about her students.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: I have taken three classes with Dr. Stamp throughout my degree in neuroscience. She's hilarious, flushes out concepts very well, passionate and a critical thinking professor. Her tests are more than fair, with no surprises, and reused quiz questions. If you are struggling with her tests, that's a reflection on your study habits.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: She is such an amazing prof! She posts the lectures online so if you miss a class, you can easily catch up but definitely go to class. She explains difficult concepts in class and uses examples outside of neuroscience to ensure that students understand. She really puts a lot of effort into the class. ALWAYS read the text book!!!

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: She's an awesome prof! Super interesting and clear of what you need to know. There were quizzes every week that was a great grade booster. Interesting class too.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: She cares a lot for students and is very approachable. Her exams can be difficult so make sure you read the textbook and go to class. If she offers Activity sessions make sure you go.

Name: Jennifer Stamp
Review: Moodiness and drama and can be dry. Guilt trip that class is ungrateful and sometimes intimidating but them speaks self-depreciatingly of herself sometimes with revelations. Retentive memory and repeats memorized information in class. Boils as believes has greatness the world is too dumb to recognize. Keeps reminding the class to rate her.

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: I love Gadbois so much that I decided to take his animal behavior class. Any issues with him relating to PSYO2000 is because the material itself is weird. I find his tests difficult with some very specific questions and the labs are what helped my grade. You need to attend class for specific examples that will appear on test but lectures are great

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: Dr. Gadbois is the best prof Ive had so far at Dal. One of the few profs that is actually engaging and makes class enjoyable, even when the material is dull. Attendance isnt taken, but if you skip class you will fail - as his lecture slides are supplemented by what he says in class. Hes also hilarious which makes class more enjoyable.

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: One of the best profs I've had by far. Really helpful and is patient and happy to re-explain concepts that were misunderstood directly in class!

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: best prof at dal. very caring of students but you MUST attend class to do well.

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: If you dont show up to class, I guarantee you will fail his class. No doubt. That being said, Dr. Gadbois is by far one of the best lecturers not just in the department, but at the university, so youd be a fool to skip class anyways. Hes not teaching PSYO 2000 anymore, as he is moving on to other classes. Glad I got to take the class with him.

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: Extremely knowledgeable and passionate, and pretty nice once you get to know him! Exams are quite in-depth, but if you study the slides really well and pay attention in class (he's an engaging lecturer) you're going to get a good grade. You just need to be willing to put in the time. Be sure to note any examples he uses!

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: Professor Gadbois is super interesting and is very knowledgeable about the field. His exams are VERY detailed. So takes lots of notes during class. Need to write down examples and minor details that may seem insignificant if you want to be well prepared for the exams.

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: I was unsure of Gadbois due to having taken PSYO 2000 with him the previous semester, and wanting to cry during the final. My unease was put to rest when I attended his lectures, his pure enjoyment and expertise in the field was evident, and it was a pleasure to be a part of his class.

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: Gadbois his hands down one of my favourite professors. He is so passionate about his field of study, and if you're actually interested in what he has to teach and say, there's no reason why you shouldn't do well in his class. He is hilarious and may seem unapproachable at first, but he's honestly a real swell guy!

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: for PSYO 2160 Animal Behaviour, it was rough. Simply put, i would not recommend him as a prof, teacher or tester. He is knowledgeable and no doubt a good researcher, but some profs need to learn to teach and test on relevance to the topic/ course.

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: Gadbois is a good prof and tries to make the material more interesting by adding a lot of anecdotes. He can talk about one slide for 20 minutes and you really have to pay attention to what he is saying in order to do well in the class. The exams were slightly difficult, more so if you don't attend class and take notes. Will not use textbook.

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: Gadbois' exams focus mainly on the lectures so it is important to attend class. That being said, I attended every class and still found the exams difficult. You really need to pay attention and scribble down every word he says because the slides alone with minimal notes are not enough. Don't bother getting the textbook because it isn't helpful

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: Gadbois is a great guy and great prof, although I wasnt fond of his approach to this class as Im someone that likes to listen rather than viciously scribble down notes. His exams are very lecture heavy and if you study the textbook you will fail. Hes funny and approachable yet intimidating but Im still going to take more classes with him.

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: One of the best profs Ive had! He is hilarious. Attendance matters in his class & exam grades definitely reflect this. Online slides have minimal information. He makes it very clear what you need to know & uses lots of psych/neuro related examples. Textbook suggested, not required. Exams are easy/fair if you go to class. Takes attendance for bonus.

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: Okay, whats not to like about Gadbois? He is hilarious in the kind of way that only an expert in the subject matter can be. Youll find yourself laughing about story he told in class when it Johns your memory during an exam. He is so good that I almost didnt take the advanced class when I heard he wasnt teaching it that year! Absolutely amazing

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: Honestly Gadbois is a great prof. Lectures are funny (makes material easy to remember) and he's very clear when explaining. He can come off as arrogant but he's actually very helpful and approachable. Definitely recommend!

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: Great prof, but this class was based 100% on exams and midterms. Going to lectures is mandatory because he puts a lot on the exams that is only in lecture .

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: Such a good prof! If you review your notes you'll do great on tests. He's hilarious and engaging and that French accent isn't hard to listen to

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: Professor Simon Gadbois is a fantastic teacher, is caring, and is extremely humorous  during his lectures. Makes the course very interesting and the tests were fair. Be prepared to take excellent notes,and reviewing the slides helps. Do not skip classes. Brings his research experience to the class and this adds depth. Recommend this class.

Name: Simon Gadbois
Review: Best prof I've ever had! Amazing at teaching the subject, class itself was very interesting, and overall a funny and nice guy to listen to. Highly recommend any class with him!

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: nice person but i always feel like shes rushed or unprepared when in lecture.

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: She is honestly nice if you approach her and if you do the work you will get the mark you deserve

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: Very bad lecturer. Never seemed to know what they were talking about, everyone I've talked to failed/did poorly on the final and in the class. Specifically said not to memorize a certain section there would not be questions on the final about it, yet there were. Awful class experience, I expected a lot more from an experienced university-level prof

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: I just got a high 90 in the online version of Human Physiology. It's not really that hard. I'm not some sort of genius. Something that would have saved me a lot of time: ignore the nonsense they throw at you. Ignore the text, ignore the videos, ignore the extra resources- study the slides they provide you and you will have everything you need.

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: This prof schedules midterms on days of other midterms that is overburdening. Worse, they scheduled the final exam during "study day" ( a period of time where exams are not allowed). However, because it was the online edition, she was exempt from these criteria, booked it anyway, and REFUSED to work with students, even if that meant failing.

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: AVOID. TAKE ONLINE. FR. SHES TERRIBLE. Cannot teach to save her life. Dismissive, cringy, disrespectful towards students. Treats you and talks to you like a child.

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: She's very enthusiastic about the material but she CANNOT teach at all. I had no idea what I was learning throughout the entire semester and had to attempt to teach myself the course material. I highly suggest Khanacademy for extra help. Her lecture material is very minimal and basic compared to tests and exams which are very in-depth and difficult

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: I have absolutely no clue what Im learning in this class.

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: Very boring, unengaging, doesnt explain thoroughly, tries to be funny but fails.

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: Im sure she is a brilliant person. But she is not a teacher. The amount of work put into the labs and quizzes means basically nothing. The midterms/exams are incredibly specific and difficult.. this course covers A LOT of info. Spent the most time on this course for my lowest grade. Do not take if you dont need to.

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: Exams for this class are ridiculous, many questions are based on super tiny details which were not mentioned in class. Labs and quizzes are worth nothing but take hours. Cindy's slides as well as presentation are very unorganized and only a small amount of what is presented will be on exams and tests. Overall unenjoyable and difficult class.

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: People struggle with grasping the course material and blame it on the prof teaching ability. This is a very challenging course but Cindy is available outside of class if you need help, shes great. All quizzes and labs are easy A. however, exams are made way to hard. Very tricky questions and all answer options very similar. Study like crazy.

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: This course is tough. Labs and quizzes take a long time and worth nothing, tests poorly worded and very specific for the amount of content, boring lectures/disorganized slides, requires hours of work outside of class. Studied harder for this course than every other course and it is my worst mark and I already have a science degree.

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: Labs take a very long time as well as the weekly quizzes and are worth next to nothing. Cindy is very knowledgeable in her field, but her teaching abilities can use a bit of work. Go to the exam reviews and meet with Cindy outside class, one on one she is great.

Name: Cindy Penney
Review: Amazing in everything related to the course. Exams are very easy and straightforward. If you study lecture slides, you are guaranteed an A. Watch the videos along with the slides and you'll easily get that A+. She holds an online review session and gives weekly announcements on what the course is covering on that week, along with due date reminders

Name: Cindy Penney
