Review: Andrew really gives you everything you need to succeed in statistics. The practice midterm /final questions are plenty, the tutorials are there for any additional help as well. In lectures, he goes through questions with you and might even give free iClicker marks. He is very clear on what you need to remember; very organized and professional.

Name: Andrew Morris
Review: Pretty good teacher, explains his slides thoroughly and takes the time to make sure you understand. Lots of practice questions but do them and you'll pass

Name: Andrew Morris
Review: Amazing! Best prof Ive ever had. Hes hilarious and a great lecturer. If you do all the assigned questions and go to class, so should get an A.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: When I took the class, it was considered to be among the easiest classes to take. Very poorly taught. Everyone gets an A just for showing up.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Very inconsiderate person. Will not listen to questions. Rarely available.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: I did not like the class. Very easy but not well taught.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Take another class if you're a serious student. If you don't care, take this.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Too easy to be even a high school level class.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: I didn't like the class. The lectures especially were not good.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Among the worst classes in the university. Maybe the worst taught. It's very easy though.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Hilariously easy class.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Belive me you won't learn anything and you'll get an A. It's that easy. Just don't ask questions. He won't answer them and will only mock you. Ha ha.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Read the book. Skip lectures. The teacher was compelled to confuse more than teach the students.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Not well taught. Well known as a very easy class.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: It was in easy class.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Nearly impossible to learn in this class. I'm happy altemeyer didn't expect us to learn much. Tests were simple.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Really about the worst teaching that I have experienced.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: I had a few classes by Dr. Bob. I regret them all. I cannot imagine how someone as incopetent as he could ever get tenure. It is a very sound example of what is wrong with the Canadian educational system. We should demand excellence not liberalism.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Weird teaching techniques were not useful.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Easiest class I can imagine. I didn't learn anything, but it was easy.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: I agree with most of the comments here. The class was poorly taught and much too easy to be considered a university level experience.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Stay clear if this one.  Not for serious students.

Name: Robert Altemeyer
Review: Easiest class you'll ever take.

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: She is a great professor!! Slides are on point and she emphasizes important notes on the slides that will be on the exam!! She gives great and fast feedback via mail, which we stan and she runs an extra lecture after every unit for those who are interested in a briefing for chapter summary!!! Overall one of the best professor hands down!!

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Smirnova is an amazing professor. Chemistry is hard in general but she has lots of jokes to make the class bearable and shes very sweet. She brings props to class to help make her students understand the class. I would definitely take a class of hers again!

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: She is a really great professor! She can get strict at most times solely because she wants her students to really pay attention to what she is saying because she really wants everybody to succeed! I admire her for providing an hour and a half of her time on some evenings going through and summarizing the chapters in our class! Overall really great!

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: She goes out of her way to give extra lectures before tests and exams. She tries to be available and have as much office hours open to students as possible. I really appreciated her going above and beyond in this way.

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Teaching way is good

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Amazing professor, really cares about her students, takes extra time outside of lecture hours to do example reviews not the best at explaining the concepts but its the math thats the hard part.

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Amazing Prof who really cares about her students. Will always be free for students seeking extra help especially near exams. always gives very good feedback when asked questions relevant to the course material. Lectures were always good and her online notes really helped.

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Online Lecture Notes are very helpful. Office hours also very helpful. Lectures, however, are not very engaging and I found myself falling asleep often in her class. Her accent was relatively easy to understand. Overall, if you really apply yourself outside of class, Smirnova gives you the tools you need to succeed. Very hard material though.

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Amazing prof!! I definitely recommend, chem 1300 is a very challenging first year course and she tries to help in any way for her students to succeed. Her lecture notes are amazing, she is very easy to get in touch with outside of class. Attend SI sessions if you can and read the textbook, it is helpful along with doing a lot of practice questions.

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Lets start off by saying that chem is EXTREMELY hard but she is a chemistry GOD. She is such a nice, caring person. She has so many help sessions and always has good office hours. Please don't skip class, lectures are heavy! She reads off the slides a lot but it's ok since there is so much on them. The course was very tough but she is amazing!

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Smirnova is very helpful and thorough in her lectures. She tries to prepare you for the final and goes through old exam questions in class. The exam was still horrible and all of us were surprised by the material on it. She adds humour into her lectures and tries to demonstrates the material when possible.

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Smirnova is an absolute sweetheart and a really great prof, but that doesn't change the fact that this course is just terrible. I got straight A's on all assignments, labs, and tests. But then the exam comes along and just completely screws you over. The questions are like nothing you've ever seen before. It was the worst thing I've ever done.

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Smirnova is very approachable and wants her students to succeed. She takes time out of her schedule to prepare help sessions and meet with students. Her lectures are boring however informative. The exam is very difficult, use the textbook to study and prepare!

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Really funny prof, but her accent is hard to understand and be ready to study. The labs also suck and are very stressful. The exam is nothing like what you learn in class, it is more so based on grade 12 stuff that you never actually learned. Only take this course if you have to. As for the prof she is okay and very intelligent and accessible.

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Hard to follow in lecture, notes bounce around a lot and goes very fast. Explanations weren't very clear. I ended up teaching myself by reading the textbook (which is only online by the way).

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: She is super nice and super caring. Her accent can be a bit hard to follow. Honestly, her notes are super confusing and messy. Most of the class is her reading off the slides. Overall, the content is difficult, and even though she is very nice, 90% of learning for me had to be on my own, I didn't really get much from going to class.

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: great prof

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Took course in fall 2017. Very smart lady, has a pretty great sense of humour. Sapling assignments had little to do with course and the site did not mark fairly - it was very hard to get grade changed. Her lecture slides were chuck full of words but told me absolutely nothing. The exam was worth 60% and the MC questions were not fair. Labs sucked

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Her accent can be extremely hard to understand in class, especially when she is speaking really fast. Her notes are hard to follow and often bounce around. She definitely cares about what she is teaching and wants others to share her love for chemistry.

Name: Elena Smirnova
Review: Good lectures that usually help you understand well.

Name: Alok Dua
Review: Avoid him for SCM2160. Puts as little effort as possible into teaching and grading. Ill-prepared disorganized lectures, both those given in class (opens a word doc. on the projector and types strings of words) and those online. Punctuation, formatting, and titles/section headings don't concern him. No feedback on assignments. READ YOUR TEXTBOOK!!!

Name: Alok Dua
Review: Thinks he is the best prof at asper, but he's the worst I've ever had. He doesn't explain anything thoroughly and gives very few examples to understand concepts while expective mastery of the material. Brutal professor avoid at all costs.

Name: Alok Dua
Review: His notes are very disorganized but the textbook will help you make sense of them. The multiple choice on his tests are a bit outrageous but you can make up for it in the group presentations, negotiation simulation, and class participation. He is clearly a mess but kind of entertaining. The problem is I dont think he really has a background in HR.

Name: Alok Dua
Review: The last class I had with him was 3 hour HRIR class that started at 8:30, he made the class really funny and engaging, and helped to wake you up in the morning and keep you engaged. Assessments for this class were easy, a significant portion of the grade was participation, and easy group work. ill try to be in as many classes with him as possible!

Name: Alok Dua
Review: FIN 2200 is one hard class. There isn't much good profs that teach it. I took in the summer with Alok and he is one funny guy. He was good for all the concepts for the midterm and then rushed everything after the midterm which screwed me over. I still got the required grade though but that's because I put in a lot of work for this class.

Name: Alok Dua
Review: He is an excellent prof. If you wanna pass Corp Fin2200 take it with Dua just ace the midterm as final is difficult and you will pass the course with DECENT GRADE

Name: Alok Dua
Review: I had Dua for FIN 2200. When I saw that he taught FIN 3450, I decided to take this course for my international business requirement. No regrets. He was even better in this class than in FIN 2200, since he didn't have to deal with the finance department's draconian governance. Instructions are clear, lectures are engaging, and grading is fair. 5/5.

Name: Alok Dua
Review: Took two courses with him, one of the easiest professors to deal with. Finals are twisted but overall if you attend all the classes, take notes, and read your slides you will get an easy B. Cracks jokes (some lame) but keeps the class entertained. If you can then take courses with him, can't guarantee about knowledge, but yr cgpa will thank you

Name: Alok Dua
Review: He is Horrible. His mind is not organized. He does not use slides at all and makes you write even tho he can easily give the notes before the class. He does not teach you anything new. He gives grades but depends on if he likes you or not. Overall very poor performance.

Name: Alok Dua
Review: I guess it depends on what course you take with him but I thought he was hilarious and his lectures were informational, you could say he's a bit of a clown. Take it with a grain of salt since international business isn't nearly as daunting as finance or supply chain where he seems to get lower ratings on this site.

Name: Alok Dua
Review: He is the worst prof I have ever had. He is all over the place and makes no sense. The stuff our exams were on were completely different from what we were taught it was terrible. Also, he thinks he is the best person ever (lol).

Name: Alok Dua
Review: His final was insane! Can't find the key points. He made the tests easy and it's totally different from the final and final accounts for 45%!

Name: Alok Dua
Review: Dua is a funny guy and his lectures are entertaining, but he simply doesn't write the final exam and therefore doesn't teach what's on the final exam. He literally emphasizes that for his midterms, don't read the textbook and focus on his lectures, and for the final to read the textbook. Stay away for SCM2160!!

Name: Alok Dua
Review: Alok Dua is one of the best professors in U Manitoba and tries to make his lectures as interesting as possible. A good teacher and only gives what he teaches to you on exams(concepts and all) TAKE SCM 2160 WITH HIM!

Name: Alok Dua
Review: Professor Dua is the most incredible prof I have come around through the University, He is amazing, his lectures are fun and Philosophical from his experience of all those years of teaching. He Understands the modern era of teaching, you just need to come around and understands him with open mind. Best professor in Asper!

Name: Alok Dua
Review: This is a class in the evening and is once a week so there were lots of things to take notes in every class. Dua would post the notes on umlearn but there were lots of typos in them :( Also for this course he won't give sample questions for your final. Multiple choices in the final were kind of tricky.

Name: Alok Dua
Review: The things he taught weren't tested on. He would only show you one example in class then expect you to have a deep understanding of the topic.

Name: Alok Dua
Review: The final exam featured 3 questions, totalling about 35 marks (out of 90) that were never mentioned in class or in the textbook. Every single person that walked out of the exam room said "well, I failed that exam." I attended almost every single class and read through the entire textbook and had never seen some of these questions before. Avoid Dua.

Name: Alok Dua
Review: Dua is probably one of the worst professors at the University of Manitoba. He never explained any of the cases very well and almost every time put a question up on the board and said "you have 25 minutes to complete this for class participation" and then would walk out of the room until the time was up. No explanations, no questions. Useless class.

Name: Alok Dua
Review: Definitely one of the best profs I've had. genuanly a nice caring person and doesn't have that bitter teacher attitude. the tests are not easy but the classes are very enjoyable.

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: overall a good prof. has easy non cumulative tests and no final exam for SOC1200. shes funny and very clear with what we should take in our notes. downside is she doesnt allow technology in class, but honestly that should just motivate you to go. its an interesting class and an easy A if you just show up and listen.

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: Nothing online, so you have to go to class and take notes. Sometimes spends the whole class talking about current events rather than the course material, which is frustrating because you're tested on none of it. When she does lecture though, they are easy to understand and she repeats important points. Read the textbook and study and you'll do fine

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: Although she is fairly strongly opinionated, this professor is very respectful with her words. And despite the fact that it is entirely lecture based, she will slow down and repeat all of the necessary definitions and details. She is also able to use humor in her lectures.

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: My biggest problem is she Doesn't allow technology for note taking. Very off topic ranting about Trump consistently. I did not buy the textbook, I just had someone send me a picture of chapter summaries because that's all I needed to study. I go to just under half the lectures and I can't even tell I've missed class since we move so slow.

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: Overall, she's a very good prof. She is very humorous, and her lectures are mostly class discussions about ongoing situations in the world. There are no exams, only the occasional multiple choice test and one group video project.

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: Class is enjoyable only because its controversial. Talks about her personal beliefs far too often which leaves you with a not so clear understanding come test time. If you absolutely Must, its not a terrible decision to take it with her but get ready to read the textbook. If taking out of interest there are probably better options.

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: Super left-wing. Would give her lower but she gave easy tests and if you read the textbook it is an easy A

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: Always talks off topic and would complain about Donald Trump for entire classes. When she is actually teaching the material she gets the point across well, but I spent far too many hours listening to her ramble about stuff that we weren't getting tested on so I didn't care about. Honestly get a friend in the class and rotate going

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: This prof is extremely liberal and likes to talk about her political views far too often. She is blatantly rude when speaking of political leaders and if you're religious at all, makes you feel extremely uncomfortable and makes it obvious she doesn't like you. Always talking about herself. Tests aren't too hard, though and she is a people person.

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: I had been worried before I took this class because of previous reviews and unfortunately they are accurate. I took the first two weeks of classes (one was cancelled, which is a common complaint) and learned absolutely nothing. She talks excessively off topic about her personal problems and views (Not in an interesting or inspiring way)

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: Mary Anne is an old school professor that does not rely on technology. If you are a student that doesn't go to class, she is not the prof for you. That being said, I enjoyed her teaching style and she kept class interesting. She challenged her students to dispute what mainstream media tells you. Very interesting lady with a wealth of knowledge.

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: She's a great person who has a lot of pride in her work but very difficult to reach and very set in her ways. Talks about personal stuff lots, she's inspiring. She hasn't marked an assignment from 2 months ago and we didn't know our marks before going into our last exam. Exams are kind of hard, can be based on the textbook or her lectures.

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: Love her! Great class, she is absolutely amazing. Loved her lecture, would definitely recommend her.

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: she's an amazing prof easy to understand. make sure you attend classes regularly.

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: Horrible professor, does not teach any content. You do not get a sufficient portion of your grade before VW. She is incredibly disrespectful and will not show up to classes without notice. Never on time,makes outrageous and false claims and expects you to agree with them. Worst experience Ive ever had at the U of M

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: A very interesting prof who's vocal about her opinions and how she's feeling. Sometimes wasted a lot of class time talking about things not related to sociology; taught right out of the textbook so going to class all the time wasn't necessary. Had three non-cumulative in-class tests and a group project and they weren't too bad.

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: Best prof so far in my opinion

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: waste of time, don't take this class with her.....

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: Kandrack is quite the character, she is extremely Left- Winged and will try and drill your head with her beliefs. She goes off topic almost every day for 25 minutes straight. She'll cancel class whenever she feels like it so check your emails before every class. That being so, her lectures are interesting, for the wrong reasons though.

Name: Mary-Anne Kandrack
Review: introduction to Sociology? more like introduction to Radical left wing ideology. She's an example of a an extreme leftist. you can call this class "Socializing with peers in regards to global events 1200 " Really easy class,, but all we do is talk about Mary anne, Trump, and global events.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: Not exactly sure what I even learned in this class. I didn't read the text book, so that was probably why I only got a B. But overall it would be hard to fail this class. The class is heavily focused on writing. He doesn't explain what he wants, so the course requires you to think more independently instead of just writing his opinion.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: The most unorganized prof ever, didn't even bother to explain his assignments to us, all he would say is to read it and ask if we have questions. Never followed syllabus or even used the textbook. Would ramble on about other things and would never get to the study material. Had to study on my own.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: Great prof who cares about his students doing well. You dont really use the textbook to much so just listen to his lectures. Attendance isnt mandatory but I would recommend it since the class is so small. His lectures were actually pretty interesting and I learned some new things. Not the easiest marker though

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: Great professor. Really teaches you how to critically think, will engage you in arguments and pick at your points. Overall course is not too difficult, final and midterm are easy as he is very straightforward with what will be tested on them. Essays are alright, require some work and make sure to follow instructions.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: Harmatz is an absolutely brilliant professor and is one of the beams of light in academia. This course is intellectually rigorous and uncomfortable to make you justify your existence(especially your place in university) like no other. If you take the discussions seriously, you will be able to THINK, WRITE, and SPEAK much more articulately

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: This professor is one of the handful of instructors that legitimately care for your education. It's important to know the book and the dozens of papers he wants you to read, but the fundamental goal going into this course should be to get the mindset and ability to argue needed of a business student. Debate/philoso. exp. helps, but not necessary.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: Good guy. Leave your ego at the door; he will rip any argument you present to shreds--not out of malice, but because he's trying to help you think a bit more critically. We didn't use the textbook ever, but the final exam did include some material from it. Attend lectures with an open mind and you could learn some real-life applicable skills.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: Has often called kids stupid for providing a wrong response during lectures. Rambles on and on for an entire lecture. Very very opinionated. If easily offended, do not take a class with Harmatz. Hard marker and doesn't teach anything in class. Buy the textbook if you want to pass a course with him.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: Great Prof, very opinionated, rewards those that show interest and put in the effort. Two large papers and essay exams.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: Harmatz will have you questioning the state of the world and your power to change it. He teaches you to be more introspective and a REAL crititcal thinker. I leave EVERY lecture awe-inspired by his well-articulated words of wisdom. Your understanding/definition of a REAL teacher/prof will change after taking a class with him.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: Harmatz is the absolute best. The people who dislike him are people who are not capable speakers or intellectually competent enough to handle his discussions. If you talk to the guy and attend his classes, you will leave as a better, smarter, wiser person, not to mention a better writer and thinker. Wish I could take another class with him.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: I couldve gone my university career without this prof. Hes rude & makes you feel dumb. Wouldnt recommend.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: One of the most dividing profs at asper, you either love him or hate him. You will learn more from him than any course at asper, but he will make it work for it. If you have good writing and critical thinking skills his course is no problem. Fantastic lectures regardless of course taught. He will challenge you using the Socratic method.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: To be honest, he is a nice guy but not a good prof. Could not find the relation between in class discussions and textbook informations. Have to study yourself.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: The absolute best prof in Asper. Super insightful course, you learn a lot. If you've never taken a class with him before, he isn't afraid to grill you or challenge you, but you're a better student and person after his class. Lots of writing for the 3 papers, and 1 video that is kinda silly. All together, the best. Highly recommend it. Best prof!

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: Every time I went to a lecture I regret it. He talks about stories/events not related to the text and what we need to know for the exams/papers. The exams were all essays, and he gave us no indication to what the questions would be.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: He's an amazing prof! He knows a lot and can talk forever!! I agree that he makes it seem like your answers are never correct, but he's probably one of the few profs at Asper that prepares you for the real world. He doesn't really put an emphasis on grades, but helps you to enhance your critical thinking and ethical approach. I highly his class!

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: Professor Harmatz focuses on discussion in class, and writing for graded material. He genuinely cares for students that take an interest and will make you a better academic not just help you get a good grade.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: Howard is amazing, I wish he taught more courses than just the few. He cares about his students and wants to bring out the best in everyone. He does tend to call on people that sit from the middle to the back of the class. He has a little dry sense of humour and wears bow-ties  almost every class which is a great touch.

Name: Howard Harmatz
Review: You either love him or hate him. Seminar with Harmatz is an extremely laid-back class. It's a seminar class so be prepared to talk. I don't think anyone took a single note in the class. You write 4 papers and make a short video, no final. You get out what you put in, I recommend this class.

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Diana is easily one of the best professors in the sciences. Her lectures are very interesting to listen to as she consistently ties in relevant real world information to the lecture topic. She also explains things in a way that is easy to understand, rather than simply telling us to memorize things. Exams are pretty fair and test alot on concepts.

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Professor Milnar is absolutely brilliant! She finds the best analogies to simplify course concepts. She also provides practice exams that will reflect what to expect material you'll expect on the midterm and final. Overall, she probably is the best professor I ever had at UofM.

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: best prof ive had. very easily accessible and will email back about any questions about science related topics. extremely smart and explains lecture material really well. BUT, exams are tough. there was always multiple questions on exams where you really have to think about and they're hard to prepare for.

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Excellent educator. A real gem. One of the best instructors I ever had and ignited my love for mbio. Very good at elaborating with the notes and excellent at giving real world applications. She makes good connections and makes the content very easy to learn. Exams are meant to test your understanding but as long as you put in the work, you are good

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: biggest blessing in u of m.

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Professor Mlinar is the best teacher you can ever have. Her slides and lectures are well explained. She is easily accessible outside the class. If you pay attention during the lectures you wont have to cram the material. Her exams are practical so you need to understand the material and not memorize.

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Favorite prof ever! her lectures and explanations are amazing. Exams are difficult but fair at least. She definitely does not give out free marks. Genuinely cares about her students and will put in a lot of effort to see them succeed. She is very helpful when you ask the right questions. I've had her for MBIO1010 as well!

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: AMAZING PROF. Her existance in the institution has helped me realize uofm isn't so bad.

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Super prof, really good lecture but hard examiner. You realistically dont have to go to class if you read the textbook but she will give hints in class what is going to be tested. Mid term and exam was hard.

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Lectures are content heavy but this professor is very friendly, passionate and uses many humorous analogies. She is very good at addresses topics she knows students struggle with and goes over in class questions and quizzes thoroughly.

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Diana is a wonderful prof. Shes very enthusiastic with her teaching and she replies to her emails quickly! She is willing to help her students. BIOL 1000 was super easy as long as you know the material! Her midterms/final is fair (most likely is to apply your knowledge), so if yall taking it with her make sure you really understand her material!

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Diana is an amazing prof! Her passion for micro keeps your attention during lectures and makes you want to study. Her exams can be challenging so make sure you read the questions very carefully, but they are manageable. Probably my favourite prof at the u of m so far and would hands down take another class with her :)

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: amazing lectures and notes. super easy to follow along. makes the material easy to understand by using analogies. for sure recommend taking her class. the midterms were tough but fair, the final was also fair. for sure do the practice exams and tests - they are laid out similar to the real test!!!

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Professor Mlinar is the best teacher you can ever have. Her slides and lectures are well explained. She is easily accessible outside the class. If you pay attention during the lectures you wont have to cram the material. She is quick to reply to emails. Her exams are practical so you need to understand the material and not memorize.

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: The course itself is heavy and has a lot of material, but I really enjoyed her lectures. Her slide presentations are easy to follow and she uses a lot of analogies to help you to understand what she's talking about. She is also easily accessible, if you email her with a question you will have a response quickly. She is also always up for meetings

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Intelligent and fun prof, TONS of material. Exams are wild! Make sure you reread questions and multiple choice options several times because she will try to trick you. Use the textbook lots bc it has best explanations. Worst part is how hard her exams are, compared my exam questions to a friend with a diff. prof and my questions were MUCH harder

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Diana is a great prof and really made hard concepts easier to understand as she broke them down! Pay attention in class and studying will come easy. She is great with office hours and will meet you at basically anytime. The exams are medium in that you have to apply your knowledge to most questions but she does throw in a couple easy ones!

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: I'm lucky that I had Diana teaching me, she was really thorough in her lectures and made a difficult course it a heck of a lot easier. She was enthusiastic and taught the material well, I'd really recommend you show up and pay attention. The exams are not an easy pass though.

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Great professor and is willing to answer any questions. Tests are worth a lot, but if your paying attention and reviewing your notes, you should be able to do it.

Name: Diana Mlinar
Review: Diana is by far my FAVOURITE prof at the UofM. She shows true passion for what she teaches and she always finds ways to make the lecture interesting! Dianas exams are always based on understanding the material rather than memorization. You should always attend class AND TAKE NOTES of what she talks about

Name: William Korytowski
Review: He's probably the best professor in u of m. He explains the course material clearly and concisely, which makes reading the textbook an overkill. The course materials he provides are very important to learning the course. He pays attention to his student's needs and can tell when people don't understand what he's teaching and sometimes start over.

Name: William Korytowski
Review: The best prof at the U of M. There are no others like him. Simply a gem. I wish he taught math 1700 in the summer as well. I think he is the best math instructor in Manitoba in my opinion.

Name: William Korytowski
Review: TAKE MATH DURING THE SUMMER WITH HIM!!!! Professor Korytowski is amazing. He is so helpful and funny. His notes are clear and concise and he provides them all printed. His tests are easy but you need to work hard to earn your marks. One of the best U of M profs by far.

Name: William Korytowski
Review: Had Prof Korytowski for both Math 1500 and 1700. Excellent prof. Likes to answer questions that students have. Very friendly. Genuine interest for all his students to do well.   Would be nice if he taught Math 2130 :(

Name: William Korytowski
Review: Kind and experienced professor I ever see in my life. He gave us the best notes, the best explanation and the most relaxed lecture. By the way, I always felt the time of his class went by faster than any of my other courses.

Name: William Korytowski
Review: Very good prof had him twice. Very funny too

Name: William Korytowski
Review: Funniest prof ever, also the best prof I have ever had in my life. I got A+ thanks to him.

Name: William Korytowski
Review: Best prof in the history of the world. Has some funny stories and jokes a lot. But he doesn't move on until he's satisfied that he's taught you to the best of his capability.

Name: William Korytowski
Review: Awesome prof! Take Math 1500 with him if possible. I heard other profs for this course are not as good as him. You do not have to buy the textbook if you have him. You only need to buy his notes for and youre set. He tells you that math is not note-taking, instead youre in class to learn and practice problems! Best prof Ive had!

Name: William Korytowski
Review: great prof

Name: William Korytowski
Review: great guy

Name: William Korytowski
Review: Best prof ever

Name: William Korytowski
Review: Amazing prof

Name: William Korytowski
Review: Amazing prof, probably the best one in the school or mathematics.

Name: William Korytowski
Review: This prof is amazing. He has printed notes so students can focus more on the lesson instead of writing. He uses humour to check if that class is still with him after a hard/long lesson. He genuinely cares for his students, and wants all of them to pass. He states what is to be expected on the exam. I would definitely take a class with him again.

Name: William Korytowski
Review: This professor is amazing!! If you have the option to take his class, do it! You will not regret choosing this prof!

Name: William Korytowski
Review: You will defo pass any course you take with him. If you don't, then you must be really dull.

Name: William Korytowski
Review: Amazing professor!! Definitely recommended!!!!

Name: William Korytowski
Review: Love this professor!!!He is the king of math 1500~!

Name: William Korytowski
Review: great prof. You will get a good mark and he is funny. Explains things so well.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: Foui was the most ridiculous profs i ever had. Gives you three days to write a 10 page paper, you have to do this twice in the semester, and his material is not updated and did not give us access to anyone he had referenced in his commentary and then he tests you on it and then docks marks because you didnt reference someone he brougt up once.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: Took online during the summer and found that course content was difficult but that wasnt so much the profs fault. Graded by 2 25% 12 page essays and 1 50% essay final and his grading style is very fair with clear feedback, if you work hard you will get the grade you deserve. Prof is doing a great job at trying to explain the tough course material.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: Raymond was one of the toughest graders I have ever had. I needed this class to fulfill my Sociology minor and I regretted it right when I read the syllabus. The class consists of three 8-10 page essays and one exam. I did not learn anything from this class. Do not recommend.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: I took this course online and there was a lot of information covered. He gave the occasionally notes for chapters, but not for every chapter. There was 3 module tests and a final. he marks long answer easy, study lecture notes, and readings. They took me roughly 8 hours of prep work for each test. STUDY everything for the final, EVERYTHING

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: Relied on the textbook for the most part of this class. The exams are 50% text and 50% lecture. His exams are tricky, but you can tell he really cares for his students. The paper is an easy 5 page review. Can really give a good lecture. He encourages class discussion to keep the class awake which is great for a class like this.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: Worst professor I've ever had, hands down. I am taking two courses with him and when I emailed him about 2330 he gave me feedback on my work from 2460 and then asked how I got information about 2330. Also spells my name wrong in emails when it is right in front of him... he is rude, vague, and unhelpful. Do NOT recommend.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: This is the 2nd class i have taken with Dr Foui. He gives a lot of great feedback and his lecture notes help connect textbook to material.  But it is hard to know what all to study.  He does give example/practice quizzes which do help a bit.  Overall I would take his courses again.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: The first term test was the worst I've written in many years. I dropped the course immediately after. I had to guess on most of the questions and I never have to do that. Very obscure questions that went into more detail than the textbook did, it was very unfair. Avoid this class!

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: Absolute worst classs I ever took. He was so vague with the questions and then marked really hard. I also found him rude when I emailed him. I would not recommend this class to anyone.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: Worst class I have ever took online. He was not helpful. There wasn't really a CLEAR outline so you had to study the entire text. AVOID THIS PROF. He literally picks out the tiniest details in the text.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: Possibly one of the worst classes I have taken. The reading material was confusing and beyond the level of many second year sociology students. He assigns 7 page essays 48 hours before they are due, and over weekends. Takes a while to respond to student questions on the class forum, if he chooses to respond at all.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: Has literally discouraged me from Sociology.  Avoid if you care about making the world better  Worst  online class I have ever taken at the U of M.  I have a good GPA and study habits, writing skills - I'm a strong student and know what it takes to get A's or higher.  His commentary said I should have done many things I clearly did.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: Makes the class lively with his teaching style. Actually liked this class. However, he talks to you like you are not quite intelligent.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: Lectures are very easy to follow and interesting. Doesn't ask much from you. Just don't miss the classes often and know what you have to study. To be honest he's one of the professors I've learned a lot from.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: I love the subject and content of the course but this prof pretty much sets you up for failure, then rubs it in your face. His guidelines are non existent, which makes it that much more ridiculous when he criticizes for not reaching a word count that was not assigned. I would not recommend this prof, he's unhelpful and quite frankly, rude.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: My grade was based on 4 multiple choice tests that were extremely difficult and tricky. Didn't use anything online, didn't have slides. Just talked and you have to hope you wrote down everything relevant. Got a C+ so I'm taking it again and just wish I had a different professor the first time.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: One of the best profs that I have had. If your looking for an easy A you shouldn't be taking his class. I found Foui to be very passionate in his speaking and lectures and would most definitely take another class with him. Maybe not the easiest prof to get a grade from but you will walk out with a lot of knowledge.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: Great Prof.  Although his multiple choice exams were hard I found that you needed to attend class all the time in order to pass this class.  Awesome teacher down to earth.  He is very real.  This would be one of the most exciting class I have ever attended.  This class makes you think about things we take for granted.Thanks Foui!

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: The material in the class isn't hard, but Dr.Ray doesn't give you a guideline of what you really should know so you're stuck reading the entire text and deciding what you think is relevant - Which SHOULD be theories and arguments, but tests you on details that didn't seem important. You can get a good grade if you really try, but he is no help.

Name: Raymond Foui
Review: This class & prof was ridiculous. His tests are very hard, he will ask the most detailed & unimportant of questions. Make sure you attend every single class, he doesn't post his notes so it sucks when he asks questions on the test on something he said once, but you will not find in the textbook. And he makes you write an essay with a partner.

Name: Darja Barr
Review: She made math much easier and enjoyable. I had switched profs half way through and she taught the concepts much more thoroughly. She is a fair grader and grades more on comprehension than correct answers. Highly recommend if you need your math credit done.

Name: Darja Barr
Review: Darja is probably one of the best profs I have ever had. Math 1500 is a lot of work and often can be difficult but if you take it with her she makes the class ten times easier. Make sure you buy Grants tutoring book and do the questions on there because the questions in the book was similar to the questions on the tests.

Name: Darja Barr
Review: Calculus is not an easy course. However, Darja helped me so much!!

Name: Darja Barr
Review: AMAZING! take math 1500 with her 100% she's incredible. this course has a reputation for being very difficult but she literally makes it easy. her personality and humour keep you engaged and focused during long lectures, but you'll still need to practice a lot since concepts move quickly. i love math and really hope ill take another class with her

Name: Darja Barr
Review: Darja was AMAZING as a professor. I loved math coming out of that class and I got an A+. The class itself is easy, but you still need to do your homework (obvs). She really is such a sweet lady and so interested in what she's teaching. By far the best prof I've had since I got here! Highly recommend.

Name: Darja Barr
Review: I took this class because it was required for my major and was dreading taking it so much because I'm not very good at math. Darja is the best prof I've ever had... she is why I did not fail this course and actually did way better than I thought. Would 100% recommend to any one needing to take this class.

Name: Darja Barr
Review: Darja was one of the greatest math profs I have had. You can tell she cares about the students and teaching. I feared calculus going into this semester, but she made it clear. As others have said, our section average was always higher than the other sections, so that says something about her teaching ability. Would highly recommend.

Name: Darja Barr
Review: Very helpful lectures, especially if you print out and take the notes she provides online. Clear and understandable explinations of each concept. Our class consistantly got 10% higher average mark on each test compared to the average of all the calc1500 classes. Would highly recommend.

Name: Darja Barr
Review: Amazing prof! She explains things very clearly and genuinely wants students to learn the material. She was very helpful in office hours and responds VERY quickly to emails. Strongly recommend this prof! I'd love to take another class with her again.

Name: Darja Barr
Review: Darja is definitely the best prof I've ever had in university. I'm not a huge fan of math but I actually enjoyed this class because she explains everything so well. Take this class!

Name: Darja Barr
Review: Hands down the best prof I have ever had! She really cares about her students and wants the class to do well (our section was always the highest in every test). Shes very organized and speaks clearly in a good pace. Shes also super nice! Anyone who would rate her anything other than awesome clearly did not put in the work. Highly recommended!

Name: Darja Barr
Review: She's the absolute best!! She replies to emails super quick and is is overall really good at teaching. Wish more professors were like her. Take her course if you get the chance!

Name: Darja Barr
Review: The best prof (period)

Name: Darja Barr
Review: Darja was the best professor I've ever had! She really cares about all the students doing their best and she made this first term very enjoyable. I was actually kind of sad when it was the last day of class :( I may even try and take another class with her! Would 100% recommend!

Name: Darja Barr
Review: I've always been fascinated by Math, but Darja has managed to make me like it even more. Darja is everything you could want in a professor: intelligent, funny, extremely beautiful, and genuinely caring. Her explanations are clear, plus she replies to emails very quickly. Darja also gives you the chance to participate, which is lots of fun!

Name: Darja Barr
Review: Easily one of the best if not the best professor at U of M. She should get paid more! It is obvious that she enjoys teaching and pushes her students to strive for nothing less than success in this course. Also, if you happen to have any questions on a problem youre stuck on, she always replies to her emails right away.

Name: Darja Barr
Review: I am not fond of math, but this course has been my favourite out of my four courses this term because of this prof. She teaches/explains the notes thoroughly in a way that is easy to understand; and she will even tell you what exactly from the notes is to be expected on the test. Overall just an easygoing prof who genuinely wants you to succeed!

Name: Darja Barr
Review: An excellent prof that I wish I could have for all of my math classes! Great lectures. Moves through the material fairly quickly, but then takes time to review everything before each test. Textbook is helpful for extra practice, but she provides notes in class that are comprehensive and available online.

Name: Darja Barr
Review: Such an amazing teacher. She is so easy to understand and her section had a way higher average on Calculus tests than the other sections.

Name: Darja Barr
Review: As long as you keep up with work and attend lectures you will do fine (no slacking off!!!). Has good office hours and cares about students.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: So far my favourite first-year prof. Tons of iclicker. Tests were fair and should be nothing too crazy if you go to lecture and do the sample exam questions. For short answer questions on her exams, you can lock up a good portion of your mark, as you can pick 5 of 7 questions to answer. She is a sweetheart and a clear lecturer. Take her for sure.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: I LOVED taking Bio 1020 with Dr Stacy. The material was easy even though i didn't dedicate enough time to memorization (C+). i was an involved student and spoke up often during lectures. Going in i was concerned about her bad rating but found out quickly that was due to her course being a dvd lecture the previous year. SHE IS AWESOME!

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: Notes and lectures were very unorganized, tests were graded unfairly compared to other sections. Would not recommend if you have a hard time teaching yourself materials and understandings from textbooks.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: I went into the course hearing how she was a Prof but when I had her for bio1020 she was completely different. She really helped me get through the course. Her test are not hard, preparing for short answers questions helped with understanding the material. Her lecture and notes were straight forward and all you needed to pass. Would take her again.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: WORST PROF AT U OF M MY GOD

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: I really like her as a prof. You need to prepare for the lecture before class because the note is not very helpful if you don't understand what's going on.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: I like her lectures. Notes are useless out of the class, just a bunch of phrases. Don't mind the mandatory attendance, think it is beneficial. Tests are absolutely horrible! I believe that it is not equally fair that only our group had short answer questions! The answers that she wants to see require more time. Do not recommend this professor.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: Hands down the worst professor. Stupidly unfair exams. Uses iclickers so you have to go to class. Unorganized and easily falls behind. Lectures are hard to listen to and are scattered. Exams contain multiple long answer questions in comparison to other profs giving group work exams. Questions do not match content covered. Wouldnt take again.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: Literally the worst prof I've ever had. Had to read the entire textbook on my own bc her lectures were so confusing and a waste of time. Her office hours were no help, her exams asked abt stuff that she didnt even mention. Every class I left feeling more confused than I did walking in. The notes she posts are useless. Would give a 0 if I could

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: This is the first time I had Dr. Stacey as a prof. I heard very mix reviews of her for other courses but for Biology and Society she's great. I highly recommend taking this course, it has presentations and debates, both of which I haven't done since high school but they aren't complicated. Its an easy A for a 4000 level course.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: Joy is a great prof who is passionate about her field of study. Everything you should know is on the slides; she does the explanations in her lectures. The key thing about her class is conceptualization. Joy really wants you to grasp and understand her material. If you are confused, she has very accessible office hours. Really enjoyed her class.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: Mediocre at teaching. Nice person. Stupidly unfair exams. Seriously, the content needed for this lab is already ridiculous but the exams she makes are needlessly hard because her questions ask for basically everything. Yet, she'll look at the 47% average in our section and say "ya'll didn't study enough". Maybe your exams are a bit unfair?

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: Joy's is honestly a laidback prof with very basic and boring lectures. Her notes are very disorganized, but if you have somewhat of a good understanding of Bio, it'll be an easy A with minimal effort.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: Joy is a terrible prof. Her lectures are dry and boring. There are quizzes due at the beginning of each week and pop quizzes in class (5-6 of them) but luckily they are open book. Joy's pdfs are very disorganized and have many mistakes. Her exams are very hard with many trick questions on them. I would suggest picking a different prof if possible.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: Despite her slides being the bare minimum and containing quite the abundance of typos, I feel that she did a pretty good job at teaching the material. You could collaborate on pop quizzes, and weekly guided reading quizzes forced you to review before coming to class. Highly advise adding notes to her slides, she emphasized likely exam questions.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: Joy really wants her students to understand the material, and not just memorize. Her exams are definitely not easy, they require you to actually think and be able to apply your knowledge. That being said, Joy does prepare you for those kind of questions, so you know what to expect in the exam. Her lectures are great too!

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: Joy Stacey is knowledgeable and friendly but her courses are very poorly taught. She is terribly disorganized and her notes aren't helpful and are difficult to understand. Notes and exams had several crucial typos. Impossible to learn from her lectures and notes. Do not take her if you are a first year student. Used many trick questions in exams.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: Her lecture slides are often incomplete and have typographical errors in them. It makes them confusing. You really need to attend class to elaborate on the slides . Its unfortunate because I have very successfully used complete slides in other courses and with hers being so light, you really have to make your own notes and study off of those.

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: she is literally so bad, i heard biol 1020 isn't video lectures anymore and honestly i can't imagine having to see her face everyday in person and listen to her blab. avoid at all costs there are so many better profs to take this course with

Name: Joy Stacey
Review: Do not rely on her lecture notes and study beyond her notes for assessments. Her part of the course is much more difficult make sure you keep up and truly understand every concept with detail.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: He is a great professor! He made the 8:30 am lecture really interesting by adding stories and humor. He is very clear on the grading criteria and what to expect. You can get a good grade if you take notes and attend classes.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: Overall a great professor. Midterm is pretty easy and final is mostly like his review although he marks hard on the term papers. He uses a lot of examples in his teaching and is very passionate about HR. You must attend all classes because he doesn't post anything on UM learn so you have to take notes.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: Funny guy, however gives no visuals in intro HR, solely talks and writes on the board so you have to essentially make your own notes. He is a tough grader on papers and exams so make sure you know your stuff. Attendance Is mandatory because he posts nothing on UM Learn and he uses examples from class directly on exams and finals.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: He didn't strike me as really friendly, but he's good at teaching the material. He tries to make the material applicable to real life and tries to keep the class engaged with humor, which is helpful for studying purposes

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: Really funny and best for this kind of subject

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: Terrible. Rambles on and on for the entire lecture and doesn't write anything down. Must go to class though because he does give info about tests and assignments, but read textbook for all quizzes. Overall, he doesn't really teach you anything and assignments aren't explained or taught how to be done.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: Would recommend taking HR with Sean. Very knowledgable and passionate about the subject. Learned more about the REAL business world in this course than all other GMGT courses combined. Sean clearly puts effort into his lectures which I appreciate.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: He is awful try to avoid him at all times

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: If you don't submit your term paper to him for feedback before it's due, you will be making a horrible decision. People do well on the exams, but the paper is where they mess up. His lectures are interesting and interactive, and useful because he goes over EVERYTHING you need to know for exams. Take detailed notes and work hard on your paper.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: Has a great sense of humour that keeps you engaged throughout the entire lecture, and doesn't take himself too seriously. His stories are great and relate to the subject material. Show up, participate, start your paper early and get him to look over it and DO THE BONUS MARKS HE OFFERS. Exams are pretty fair and he's VERY CLEAR about what to expect.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: Really unorganized and simply not a good professor. Tries to challenge students but is not intelligent enough to do that.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: very good teacher. focuses on everyone individually. tries to get everyone to pass. very considerate of international students.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: His classes were awesome and funny. As long as u pay full attention in class and write notes, u can get good grades ! Do not be late for class or being distracted by phone, he will be very angry and u are disrespecting him.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: One of the best profs I've had. Given that the HR lecture was 3 hrs in the evening, he made it much more bearable with his funny stories. Doesn't post notes online but he's very clear about what he's going to be testing on. Paper is long but GET HIM TO REVIEW IT and he will give you valuable feedback! Textbook was only used to help write paper.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: Very unorganized. Not only does he not post notes online, the only notes he provides in class is what he writes and his writing is very difficult to read. Likes to give exams that students will struggle to finish in-time. He makes a class that shouldnt be too hard very difficult. Real nice guy and funny during class, but he isnt an ideal prof

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: Represents everything Asper is trying to move away from. You will not learn anything in his classes as he spends the majority of lectures trying to relate bad sports analogies and stroking his ego. He seems bored with the actual course content. He is liked because courses are easy, but he has a forced grade distribution to meet his quotas. Avoid.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: Be prepared to be called out in class! Don't show up late or use your phone. Interesting lectures, uses examples from his previous work experience. Long tests with lots of writing. Majority of tested material comes from what was discussed in the lectures, so take detailed notes. If you skip class regularly, don't take his class. Overall great prof

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: I thought Sean was an okay prof. Be ready to be called out. I thought the best way to pass was to take good notes and follow up with skimming the book. He talks a lot so make sure just to write the important details. Exams are fair but very long, you have to write very fast. Make sure to particpate as it is 5%, you will later regret if you don't.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: Interesting lecturer, he's very intense, and even intimidating at times. Do not go on your phone or show up late, or prepared to be roasted in front of the entire class. Lots of work; had 10 tests, a midterm, a 60-second pitch, a whole entrepreneurial start-up plan and presentation (group project) and then, of course, a final. The course is curved.

Name: Sean MacDonald
Review: Professor Macdonald lectures are always interesting and he tells lots of personal stories. Tells you what will be on Midterm and Final, so it isn't too hard to perform well. Lets students hand in draft papers although his input is not very helpful in improving your paper.

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: NEVER AGAIN

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: Honestly, I have taken 3 classes with Zapp because I had to. For second year students, he uses "big words" that you may not understand till your 3rd or 4th year or even till a work term. He challenges you with bizarre and interesting problems but you'll appreciate him in the end. It's hard to get a B+ or even a C in his class, so study HARDDD.

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: You will either love him or hate time

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: I always used to dislike zapp in my 2nd year. But now I realize why he teaches the way he does. It's because he wants us to truly LEARN the material. I can safely say that I learn more from his courses than any other professor. Yes, this is because he sometimes makes it very difficult, but I think it's done on purpose so you can learn a lot.

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: Great passionate prof who really cares about teaching you how to self learn. Only down side is that his notes aren't posted online. Zapp gets a lot of hate, but I'm not quite sure why. He's very helpful during office hours and does his best to ensure that you learn the material. The last assignment for this course was honestly the funnest ever.

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: He thinks that everyone learns the same way (auditory). Notes are useless, will confuse you even more, and not even posted online. Took marks off for using acronyms on test, without warning us beforehand. Thinks everyone can read his mind. His way or the highway. Discourages you from asking questions. Tuition fee should've gone to Google instead.

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: Took 2160 with him a while back and it was the worst experience ever. Will reply sarcastically and embarrass you if you ask questions. This will not be easy. Your will and drive will be tested. As he always says " We can't all pass, some people have to fail". Passed the course with a B+ but he really made me work for it. Prepare to self-teach

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: He knows his stuff, but has major flaws as an educator. He doesn't post his notes, students are expected to hand copy from a projector. It's not a big deal but as you write he'll mention assignment/test info. It's hard to process all of it at once. I prefer to not ask questions in class as he has a tendency to act bothered and responds rudely

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: You suppose to know everything before taking his class one of the worst teachers I ever met......................... My suggestion is DON'T TAKE HIS CLASS unless you have no choice Not a good teacher

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: Simply put Michael Zapp does not deserve the hate he receives for his teaching. His lectures are often filled with humor and are engaging, his notes are pretty solid, and he literally tells you what the exam questions are in class if you actually pay attention. The main challenge is his assignments which made me a better programmer in the long run!

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: His notes are a bit disjointed as he hand-writes them in class. Sometimes will switch between code and comments with no indication. Thinks suffering is the best way to learn, which is honestly sad. Gives few examples and one has to scour google or wait for the sample solution to figure out wth. Nice but elitist; doesn't understand diff values.

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: His notes are a bit disjointed as he handwrites them in class. Sometimes he will switch between code and comments with no indication. Thinks suffering is the best way to learn, which is honestly sad. He does not give many examples and one has to scour google or wait for the sample solution to figure out wth. A nice guy who acts elitist.

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: By far the worst Computer Science proff at the U of M. He is very racy and be assured that everything is going to be super hard. Also he doesn't accommodate students from different backgrounds. He is kind of low-key racist and would treat different students differently

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: Most of the students do not have an idea of what is going. I wanted to learn so much out this course but never could because of Zapp. He might be passionate about Computer Science but he is definitely the worst teacher out there. Please avoid his class at any cost if you want to learn. I repeated this course with Randy Cooper(A+).

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: very good professor, the best one I've had with

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: Michael Zapp is a very tough grader. Very meticulous about things which don't even matter. Does not actually help you learn the course material but instead you have to learn on your own. The inter-webs will be your closest friend for any course you take with this guy. Also becareful on theory questions. He takes every meaning of words literally

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: Zapp overall is good. He knows so much about this field, and it shows in his lectures. He makes his lectures more enjoyable by using his quirky humour, which is good. However, he can be very particular in his grading methods, sometimes edging on being unfair to his students. Overall, this course is difficult, go to class and study hard.

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: By far the professor who knew the most and cared the least. Michael Zapp does not care about his students or his courses. He simply wants to tell everyone how smart he is. This is apparent in is digressions from the course material and his completely anti-empathetic course structure. If you can take this course with ANYBIDY else, do it.

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: He's very passionate about the comp science field. Lectures are solid, though more examples of topics after midterm would be beneficial since there aren't many resources out there other than notes and textbook. Assignments were very difficult, start them the day they come out if possible.

Name: Mike Zapp
Review: This was my first time being taught by Zapp. I had successfully managed to avoid him throughout my University career. I must say "The Legend" is true. He is a very stingy grader who doesn't really give you anything to go on. It's hard to know what he wants in order to actually get marks. It's was difficult to get course material as well. VW'd

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: He does a lot of these things that waste lecture time and so lectures end up being pointless. I wish he could stop with all of that jargon and actually teach content material. He is very good at explaining but can be condescending when you ask questions. Not very approachable. But seriously... TEACH some content and stop wasting learning time

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Teaches the material well, and makes fair exams (with bonus questions!). He's quite passionate about math too, and seems like a nice guy. As other reviews have said, he does take questions at the beginning of lectures which in a smaller class like this wasn't a big deal, but with a big class like 1240, this might take up too much time.

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Rob is really accessible outside of class and cares about his students. He does host beginning of class discussions, yes, but I think that's only an issue depending on the class you are taking and if he needs to rush it or not, mine was not rushed at all. He gets bad ratings because 1240 is so hard but it is not his fault. I found his class fun

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Terrible. No office hours but uses telegram, quite rude when I tried asking questions on there. Ridiculously unfair marking. 75+% of my class failed the second test and he didn't seem too bothered by that. Wastes so much time and doesn't hesitate to remind everybody about 'how hard this class is'. Terrible lectures, very hard quizzes/tests/exam.

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Lectures were tough to learn from because of how rushed they are. We spent a lot of time learning how hard this course is and how we don't have a lot of time but that wasn't reflected in the lectures. I stopped going to them and spent the time just learning on my own from the textbook and just talked to him when I needed specific help.

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Rob is a really nice person but just doesnt know how to present his lecture materials in a presentable way. he spends a lot of time chitchatting at the beginning then throws a math problem in for us to solve. Then we start rushing over the lecture material

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Rob is a great teacher. Needs to digress at the beginning of class. The pace of the course is extremely fast but you'll pass w/ an A+ if you work for it. He is very accessible outside of class via Telegram. The reviews that say he's bad because they did better in Track B are likely biased, Track B gets to relearn/study ENTIRE units again.

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Robert is an okay professor and that's me being nice lol. I failed the second test and switched to track B with Angel and ended up getting a 100 on it. Rob just rushes through the units and isn't thorough enough. I don't recommend him but if you do have him, just voluntarily switch to track B if you want to pass.

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Wastes so much time the first half of each lecture. Not accessible after class is over. No office hours really. Not super nice either

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Rob is an absolute Beauty! he is super funny and energetic which keeps your attention. He does waste a lot of time talking at the start of class but e would always have enough time to get through the lecture. He teaches the course very well and if you do the practise questions you will have no problem getting at least an A

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Rob is good with his lectures. He uses Telegram app to make it easier for students to contact him and typically replies within the day. One thing I don't like having him as a prof is that he would almost spend 20 mins of the class asking students for questions (which is good) and add stories not really necessary in class. Too much time wasted.

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Rob is without a doubt the most caring professor Ive ever encountered but also the least helpful. Office hours are non existent. At the start of every class he goes on these 30 minute inspirational spiels and wont start until everyones asked their questions. You could have so many classes with all the time he wastes talking.

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Rob was the only reason I was able to pass this course. His lectures and notes (which he posted online without examples) were clear. He was fast on getting back to any questions I had from his class and he seemed like a nice guy that cared about his students. I would take a course with Rob again.

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Rob is different from my other Math professors such that he is readily more available and willing to whenever you need help. With regards to the material, he teaches you all you need to know - there really isn't a lot. It's really up to the student to know the proofs and techniques and concepts beforehand and practice them on their own time.

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: He really stresses on having to do most of the covering topic on your own. He is very accesible outside of class, and would answer your question right away if you email him. If someone asks a question in class he would answer it in details but it does take most of the class time. He really does care for his students and want them to do well.

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Sys he loves teaching, but dont be fooled, hes not really helpful outside class.

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Rob is really a great prof, I dropped 1500 when i failed the midterm a couple semesters ago, and after taking his class i had a 38% jump on my midterm mark. He really tries to explain things in different ways to help it click for everyone, and is available almost 24/7 with skype calls and hell answer any question, no matter what level (even HS)

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: This course is way too easy and Rob is such a cool prof! Would definitely love to come back to another of his courses.

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: Really cares about the students

Name: Robert Borgersen
Review: overall, ROB is an okay prof, he can be really slow at the beginning of the class and rushes everything towards the end of the class which is super annoying. And he literally takes extra time out of his class hours after wasting time asking for questions. a pretty easy course if you study hard . office hours are never available which makes no sense

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: The negativity of many comments is incomprehensible to me.  I lament his leaving as he was the most interesting/mentally challenging prof. at Asper. You never looked at the clock in his classes.  Always tried to make points meaningful and personal for students with occasionally outrageous examples and stories.  Edgy but I remembered them.

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Very intelligent prof. Very unique teaching style,he does not rely on the text book. All his lectures are coming from his real life experience.One of the best lectures I've attended.  Also very knowledgeable in many aspect of business, not just marketing. One of my favorite profs, you can learn a lot from him.

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Just the worst prof in the world...

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Very strange teaching style to get used to, but if you attend class and participate you will get a very good grade. I got an A and spent almost no time studying outside of class.  His lectures are crucial to the exam (almost no textbook use) I really learned a lot from this prof and would definitely take a class with him again.

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Content was interesting enough. Midterm was mostly all class stuff. Skip the rest of the classes since final is all textbook with the occasional class question. Wasted so much class time with random stories. The ones that weren't random were helpful though. Has clear favorites in class. Ignores everyone else. Still the best prof to take this with.

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: I don't like his teaching style. He could be really rude and it's extremely hard to take notes in his class. The midterm was hard so be prepared.

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Do not take any of his classes. He has the worst teaching style. Does not stick to the class material, and goes on and on with pointless stories that has nothing to do with the class. Does not know where to draw the line with his "humor".

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: He has a really different style of teaching than most profs and it was not the kind i like at all. His notes were just a disaster and very unorganized but most of the exam questions were from the lecture so you have to go to every class and study your notes a lot. I do not recommend him at all.

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Lectures are MANDATORY. 85% of what is tested comes from lectures. Lectures are interesting but at time difficult to determine what is important and what is just a silly story. Quite opinionated and can be inappropriate. Personally he isn't my style of professor but I can see how some people would like him.

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Incomprehensible notes (usually a few random scribbles on the board which DO NOT help you at all with future studying). Pointless tangents, inaccurate information, stupid ideas of his that he likes to work into the class ('ya-but birds' and 'a slog on the bog in the fog'), and unfair marking on the midterm. Everything makes for an awful prof.

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Lots of great stories to tell. Very interesting man.

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Very fair and reasonable prof, really enjoyed his lectures and teaching style.  I would definately recommend this prof for ob

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Very interesting prof. Tells great examples in class that are very relevant. Fairly easy tests and you get 5% pretty much for free for attending 3 subject pool classes. ;)

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: I love this professer!! I find him hilarious, and his lessons are GREAT. What I learnt from him will definitly be an asset to me in the future when working in an organization. Very relevant lectures to apply to real world settings. If you learn better from memorizing a text book, this is not the prof to selcect.

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: I don't know what the last guys problem was but this professor is quite good. Not only do you get the course info but you get real life experiences as well. This helps with comprehension of the subject. If you are like the last guy to rate this prof (have no common sense and can only memorize a textbook) then don't take this class with this prof.

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Prof talks a lot about his life. Talks every class about stocks, and goes off topic alot. He is humerous. Hard to learn from. Hard Marker, expects you to be very technical on exams. Gets way to into detail about examples. All over the place in lectures.

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Very interesting prof. Made great examples to learn from. Fairly easy tests and you get 5% pretty much for free for attending 3 subject pool classes. ;)

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Tom is a professor who is hard to come by. He captures your attention with his witty humor and interesting stories. He encourages you to use your brain, something not many profs do. Most importantly, he is the only professor I have had so far who has faith in his students; he wants you to succeed. Don't be afraid to talk to him!

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: Grainger is an enthusiastic professor who kept class interesting and moving. He likes to get his students involved in class discussions. Its worth going to class (tests reflect lectures). take his class!!!

Name: Tom Grainger
Review: I learned a lot!!!! Honestly I looked forward going to his classes. Make sure your attentive  Grainger was always approachable and helpful. You can totally tell that he loves what he does..... He wants to see students do well.

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: Dr. Scott is an absolutely amazing professor! If you ask him one question he will explains it to you until you actually understand the material and really deeply cares about his students. His tests are pretty hard and you DO HAVE TO STUDH FOR IT at least 30 days advanced!!! The questions on the test are much MUCH MUCH harder

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: He's so great. Everybody loves him and he really knows his stuff.

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: Dr. Scott is by far the best prof I've had yet. He runs his class in a very interactive way, with the help of Learning Catalytics (like iClicker), past year's students to help with questions, and two-staged exams to relieve some exam-stress. 1020 is a fairly heavy class, but Dr. Scott makes it bearable! One of UoM's best!

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: Kevin is a good professor. His lectures are really good and he covers all the important material. However he spends a lot of time on LC questions and he expects you to be well prepared for the class (textbook readings and videos). He is very nice and accessible outside of class and seems to care about his students.
