Name: Kevin Scott
Review: He always incorporated humour into his lectures. Sometimes posted online lectures which were helpful as you could rewatch them multiple times. His exams focused on applications of concepts and a lot of information required came from attending his lectures.

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: Very captivating and does not teach in the typical lecture method. He has quizzes in class and posts highschool topics online rather than wasting class time. He also assigns homework that is helpful but easy. My only issue was that I did not have time to do all of the homework. - posts notes - Easy to understand - read textbook and attend class

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: Cares about his students and hes funny. He also tries to capture your attention in lecture by using learning catalytics to get you engaged with actually learning the material (answering questions in class). One of the best things I found was on exams he writes little motivational messages and little things to stay calm, very helpful and kind

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: Although there is a lot of material covered in lecture, he explains things well and is very helpful when asked questions either inside or outside of class. Class technically isnt mandatory but he uses learning Catalytics during his lecture which is worth marks.

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: Awful prof. Half the questions on the exams are stuff that was never covered in class. Speeds through his lectures and wastes a ton of time in them doing online practice questions. Posts super long video lectures on top of regular lectures because he doesn't have time to cover everything. Literally pick any other prof.

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: Kevin genuinely cares about his students success and wellbeing while taking his class. Participation in class is mandatory because he uses learning catalytics, but it prepares you for exams and is an easy grade boost. He manages to make intro biology interesting and prepares you to preform well on exams even with more complex topics.

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: By far one of the best profs at U of M took three courses with him. He makes Bio so much more fun and interesting his way of testing also teach you a lot about the course. Would definitely recommend.

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: I don't really understand the people complaining to this prof for hard exams, because for me who took BIO1020, BIO1030, and BIO2410 from this prof, the exams asked for BASIC concepts. If you take everything he says on the slides and review them every day, scheduling efficiently, you will get A+. Preview things as well. I got A+ for all those three.

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: Even though his exams were very difficult, amazing prof. Always willing to sit with you outside of class to go through material. Makes boring information seem fun and interesting! Though you may not get the grade you want he is a great prof! Would highly recommend

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: Took both human physiology 1 and 2 online and got an A for both. This class is super overwhelming as there is TONS to read and you are given no formal notes to study off of so you make your own. Although, if you study very hard for his exams you will be fine.

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: He is a smart man but teaches at too high of a level for an introduction first year course. His exams and lectures included information that other Biol-1030 professors did not even cover.

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: still love this prof, took bio 1020 with him and it was good. He's very knowledgeable about his field and explains in a way to help you understand the material. Very easy to make appointments with outside of class and a very caring guy. Although there's just lots of assignments and quizzes that take up some time.

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: He is a very tough grader. There is no clear rubric to base your assignments off of. He takes days to respond to e-mails. His assignment questions are not specific enough for you to get full marks. There is a ton of guesswork on your part. Distance-ed is different than real lectures with him. A lot of hardwork put in to get a bad grade.

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: Kevin Scott is unfair when it comes to grading assignments. You can put a lot of effort into a response and get deducted for "explaining too much". You can also lose marks for not adding enough detail that wasn't asked for. He only gives you your mark right before your next assignment is due giving you no time to digest the feedback and improve

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: he's awesome! he really puts a lot of time and energy into making the material accessible, and tries to equip everybody with tools to help them through the course. he's prompt at answering emails, and has even answered some of my dumber questions lol. he's also really funny, i enjoy going to class. thank u for being a professor!

Name: Kevin Scott
Review: He speeds through lectures in class and releases video lectures on top to finish units regularly

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Best prof I've had by far. Funny, makes lectures interesting, draws diagrams to help with understanding, and is always willing to help students outside of class. The class is difficult and there's LOTS of material to learn, but if you study you'll pass. Highly recommend taking the course with him

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Paul is a nice prof overall, he tends to go at a decent tempo up until the evaluation forms. The day after we submitted them, he sped through chapters to the points that he was incomprehensible. He also finishes class 10-15 minutes early for questions, if he explained it slower the first time, there wouldnt be so many questions to begin with.

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Awesome professor who made the course fun! Basically all tested material comes from notes and lab manual. Definitely a course to maintain a consistent heavy study schedule as it is a lot of material, and should never be left till the last minute. Exams are for the most part straight forward and easy. Do the work and you will get the grade you want.

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Best prof! he's really good at teaching and I have no complaints about his class. The midterms were pretty straight forward, easy. The final tho.... Lol yikes I studied lots and that shi was something else man

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Firstly, he is HOT. Second, he makes a tough course a lot more enjoyable and less dreadful. He is hilarious, and draws a lot of diagrams which helps you memorize the concepts better. He is very friendly and replies to emails fast. Also, throughout lectures he will say"I can ask you on the exam..." or "students in the past have gotten this wrong"

Name: Paul Messing
Review: He is very honestly about what to expect on the exams. He won't play mind tricks on you. He really encourages the class to ask questions. He makes lectures enjoyable to go to at 8:30 in the morning

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Great lecturer and a funny guy. Would recommend!

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Paul is great at explaining concepts in a way that you can relate it back to your own experiences and knowledge and helps make understanding the concepts a lot easier.

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Best professor you can have for Anatomy. 10/10 recommend him, he dummies it down to simple terms so it is easy to understand a hard course. He is available outside of class and gives hints of what will be on the exams. Take it with him if you have the opportunity.

Name: Paul Messing
Review: He makes class fun, teaches tricks to remember things, emphasizes on exam material, clear and loud, can sometimes be fast but encourages students to let him know and adjusts accordingly, had amazing notes. Awesome prof for a hard course, would recommend him.

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Very knowledgeable, threw in some comedy to keep the lectures interesting. There is a TON of material, but lecture exams only tested on what was in his notes. I would suggest reviewing frequently and adding to the notes, as the course moves along quite fast-paced with many names and descriptions that you're expected to have memorized.

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Paul is a super funny and nice guy who makes the boring lectures easier to sit through. The best thing about Paul is that he's VERY CLEAR on what will be on the exam. I attended all lectures but his notes are so detailed and contain all the information you need, so really attendance didn't feel mandatory. An incredible amount of info so study hard!

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Great prof. Good speaker, accessible outside of class, has clear and detailed notes. Is a prof who wants to make sure all the students understand the material thoroughly. Sometimes doesn't have clear answers to questions but most of the content is pretty straight forward and very well taught.

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Paul does his best everyday to make anatomy tolerable. The class has a ton of content, but Paul is great at tying concepts together to help you understand as much as possible. Hes got great jokes, energetic, and heck Id even be down to grab a drink with him. Hes all around a really good guy!

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Talks a little fast. Doesn't answer questions properly. But has very good explanations in general lecture. Just study the notes and practice HARD. The practice exam is way more confusing than actual exams and so go to bugs.

Name: Paul Messing
Review: Paul was awesome and one of the best profs I've ever had. He made lectures fun and interesting. Explained things well. His notes that he posts are perfect and is all you need to know for the tests and exams. Occasionally he talked super fast or slurred his words together. Other then that he is fantastic!!

Name: Paul Messing
Review: He is ok. Speaks loud so everyone can hear clearly. Makes a lots of students laugh if you consider yourself one of the people who can't take class seriously because of some random thing that happened.

Name: Paul Messing
Review: He's a good prof, super nice, easily found at the hub prior to lunch lectures, not my style of lecture notes but they cover what you need to know.

Name: Paul Messing
Review: The class itself is not hard, but his grading is SUPER picky. The majority of the class was taught by guest lecturers (half of which didn't seem to relate to ecology) so now I know more about birds than ecology. When Paul did teach the class, he would race through multiple lectures in a single class. Do not underestimate this course.

Name: Paul Messing
Review: We had more guest lectures than course material on the exams because he didn't teach very often. Made for interesting lectures, but we didn't get through all the material. Labs are quick but a lot of marks come from lab reports, take the time to do them well. Very approachable, ask questions about anything you're unsure about before handing it in.

Name: James Xidos
Review: Boring. Monotone. Lifeless. He is very nice but the combination of the depressing Armes lecture halls and his teaching skills - not a good combination. I found it very hard to understand his elaboration of the course content. Never answered my questions properly and had to seek help from other profs. UM Chem department faculty is the worst

Name: James Xidos
Review: Xidos was a really good prof, he related a lot of aspects of chem to the real world and showed many physical examples of theoretical stuff that was hard to visualize.

Name: James Xidos
Review: Not the best teacher. He rambles in lectures and rarely does example questions. At the U of M, first-year chem students aren't important.

Name: James Xidos
Review: Chem 1300 is a really hard class and Professor Xidos does a great job of explaining the theory part of the course. - Passionate but sometimes rambles/is boring - Does not spend enough time on the math questions- which are the majority of the test questions - Easy to understand - Read the textbook and attend every lecture or be lost - Posts Notes

Name: James Xidos
Review: He gets boring very quickly. Didn't go a week without falling asleep in one of his classes. He explains some stuff really well, but straight up doesn't cover others. He spent 2 classes on Schrodingers equation which didn't show up on any tests. I respect him for trying to be interesting, but not everyone finds chem as interesting as he does.

Name: James Xidos
Review: Chem 1300 is super hard, and I think thats by design as a huge demographic needs to take it in their degree. Xidos was friendly and went slow, and gave solid advice about what was important and what was not.

Name: James Xidos
Review: Probably one of the worst teachers I have ever had. I personally do not like his teaching style and there is material that he never covers in class that are on the tests. I learned more from Khan Academy than I did from him.

Name: James Xidos
Review: This guy is a big time nerd. His teaching methods are really lazy. He does not give you the tools to succeed. Just figures people have unlimited time to study. Often rambles about stuff that doesnt matter. Tests you on stuff that isnt required for the course like organic chemistry structures. Take chemistry at the u of w.

Name: James Xidos
Review: He seems to know the material well but can't explain it in a way that actually teaches anything. Isn't very clear on what you have to know and what you don't because he keeps talking about more advanced things. Teaches in a very slow boring manner. I started going to the other lectures which was the greatest decision I made for the course

Name: James Xidos
Review: I got an A+ so Im unbiased. So boring, fell asleep every single class. Not a passionate prof; take it with Kuchison. He brings an energy drink to every lecture because he puts himself to sleep. He can't explain concepts, and goes through unrelated calculus b/c hes "nerdy"; seriously, he needs to stick to the material and get a better way to explain

Name: James Xidos
Review: This course is very hard, no matter who you take it with. Hes not the best prof but hes definitly not the worst. He can be monotone at times but tries to be enthusiastic. Go to class and SI, trust me itll help. Hes also very accessible after class time if you have questions.

Name: James Xidos
Review: chemistry was hard , xidos knows his concepts but is not so good at conveying them! FInal was hard, and made no sense and nothing we'd seen before. It was worth 60%.

Name: James Xidos
Review: chem 1310 is a very difficult class no matter what prof you take it with but im glad i had it with him. he does lots of example questions and is always available for extra help when you need. the final was nothing like the midterm and they dont curve grades at all anymore. take this class with him but be read to die anyways chem 1310 is hell

Name: James Xidos
Review: The best Chem prof forthis class hands down. I recommend taking James Xidos he is a nice a funny guy.

Name: James Xidos
Review: He is a nice person and funny guy but as a prof, I can say he is just a bit higher than the average. His standard is high, thinks everyone knows everything on final  final is hella hard. But I dont regret having him as my chem prof.

Name: James Xidos
Review: Dr. Xidos is clearly excited about the material he teaches and makes it understandable for students. While CHEM1310 is by no means an easy course, taking it with Dr. Xidos makes it manageable and fascinating. His students are his first priority and he does all he can to help them. I highly recommend taking first-year chemistry with him if you can.

Name: James Xidos
Review: Pretty good prof. Super funny guy and clearly loves chemistry and teaching it. Probably the best choice for chem 1310

Name: James Xidos
Review: Super kind prof and you can definitely tell he's very passionate about chemistry, but his lectures can be quite boring as he's very slow paced and takes 10 minutes of the class reviewing what we talked about last class. Unfortunately, he doesn't give many examples. He has very good powerpoint slides though!

Name: James Xidos
Review: it's very easy to tell that he loves to teach and is very passionate about chemistry however the lectures can be extremely boring from his slow pace which bores many people. Although the man puts in 110% effort to clarify questions students may have so your use of him mostly comes from there. Next best thing if you cant get smirnova

Name: James Xidos
Review: Xidos is a great guy and super funny but is an incredibly confusing professor. He over complicates nearly all concepts and teaches you more than you need to learn. You would think that would be an advantage but it truly is not. Spends countless lectures going over meaningless information and skims through important stuff. Take with smirnova!!!

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: Took PSYC 2250 and PSYC 2260 with Steve in my third year of undergrad. Seriously one of the best profs I have ever had. Lectures were very interesting and labs were pretty fun as well. Make sure you show up to class and review often! Exams were straight forward.

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: Best professor I ever had hands down. 2250 was easy and 2260 was one of the hardest classes Ive ever taken and Steve took time to see me outside of lectures, before tests he gave us review time and was so funny with all the lectures which made the math interesting. MAKE sure you get Steve for 2260

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: He's super nice and a great prof

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: steve is one of the best profs i have ever had. PSY 2250 - super easy. PSYC 2260 - very hard. and this is because of the content material, but steve does everything from labs, to practice exams to reviews classes to help. During his lectures he pinpoints things that we should know! he never makes anyone feel stupid for questions. He is hilarious

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: The labs are simple and really help to boost your mark. Lectures pull straight from the book (you could get away with not going). You'll have to read the textbook cove to cover whether you go or not. Boring subject but mandatory for a psych major.

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: I absolutely loved this course with this professor . you have to go to class to get the notes but his tests are really easy and you can get a good grade by simply listening in class and reading a textbook. His lectures were hilarious and he knew how to keep the class engaged. The lab at first seemed hard but its easy marks.

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: Professor Hladkyj is awesome! This course is mandatory for PSYC majors and he totally understand not everyone wants to be there. He provides extremely clear lecture material so there is no surprises on his exams. It consisted of three (non-cumulative) MC exams. There is also a lab component of the course. All in all he is a great professor!

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: Huge fan of Steve. He's super funny and really wants his students to do well! You don't have to come to class since his lectures are basically summarizations of the textbook but he does add some specific 'Steve notes' (as he calls them), which he sometimes asks about on tests. One of my favourite profs so far!

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: Steve is a very exceptional professor. His course notes are well organized and his teaching style is good. He shows up his slides but he doesn't read what's in it but he explains or breaks info down. Would love him to be my prof

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: Steve is a really funny prof. He makes this super boring material at least kind of interesting (considering these courses are mandatory for psyc majors). He does not put lectures up online so you must attend class, tests are fair, studying is still needed.

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: Hilarious Prof, made going to class interesting. Gave good reviews before tests, and told you what kinds of questions to expect. Would for sure take another class with him.

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: Do not miss class if you dont want to fall extremely behind. Pen and paper, no laptop. Lab with this class, absolutely cannot miss them either. Put your cell away during his class, dont even touch it, he will freak out at you infront of everyone. Class is very fair. You get to write your own cheat-sheet for tests which is a life saver.

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: He's very clear, uses enough examples so we know how to do labs.

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: Gave a lot of hints to test question. Doesn't post slides but if you don't want to go to class he follows really closely with the textbook so you should still be able to do fine. If you do go to class don't bother studying the textbook. He lets you use a cheat sheet in 2260 and it is more than possible to fit the entire course on the page.

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: great prof. exams are fair and labs are made to boost your mark as long as you follow all the instructions. content is meh but he's a funny guy. gives review classes and hints at important things to know.

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: One of the awesomest profs ever! Love how he rants about technology, and one time, he spazzed in front of the class about how every piece of gadget that could be used for lectures weren't working (laptop, desktop, no overhead film, etc). Such a funny guy!

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: Steve is great.  Lectures are funny and interesting.  Most questions are from the text-book but he will include questions that are from lectures so while it's possible to get A+ not going most of the time (as I did) you WILL NEED to get notes from someone.  Happily rephrases  explanations and genuinely enjoys questions for the class.  Best Prof yet

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: One of the best and well respected professors at the UofM. Funny and Clearcut to the point. Very helpful and is always willing to meet with students after class. Has great respect for his students.

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: great prof! funny and really helps understand the very dry content. he basically spoon feeds you everything for the lab. Tests are fair. Read the textbook, go to class and you'll do just fine.

Name: Stephen Hladkyj
Review: Best prof I have had so far at university. He really cares about his students. Emails you the labs early so you can start them ahead of time. Test are fair. Textbooks are very helpful for the course.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: This was an excellent course, I really enjoyed the content, applying the content and the nearly instant feedback on posts makes you want to continue working hard. Would recommend this course to anyone looking to further develop their knowledge in this field.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: I especially appreciated how quickly Dr. Glassman responded with his positive, constructive feedback. I also enjoyed that the course was self-paced. I will absolutely recommend this course to others.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Dr. Glassman was an excellent professor for my Ed. 6647 course! He was always very quick to respond to postings, and gave positive and constructive feedback! Also, he allowed us to work at our own pace throughout the course which was so helpful to me! I would definitely recommend doing any course with him!

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Dr. G is very quick with his feedback and he gives students an opportunity to do very well in his courses if you are willing to work for it. I would take more classes with him again.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Dr. Glassman is an excellent professor. I thoroughly enjoyed this course with him, and if I weren't done my Masters this term I would surely take more. The course load is very fair and you can work at your own pace. He is always available and very fast to respond to questions and provide feedback/grades. Awesome course and prof!

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Dr. Glassman is one of the best prof's in the Faculty of Education. If you have the opportunity to take a course with him, don't think twice - do it! He is knowledgable, approachable and takes the time to establish a rapport with his students. I was disappointed that he is not teaching in the winter semester - he's simply amazing!

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Great feedback and quick to answer questions! Great course!

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Dr. Glassman is a phenomenal professor who cares about your progress. So much so that he provides opportunity for his students to improve their marks by providing extra credit. His feedback is almost instantaneous and thorough. I took two grad courses with Dr. G and would definitely do more if needed! He is the best prof I had during my Masters.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Prof. Marc is great. Whenever I asked questions, he usually provided me with prompt responses. The flexible schedule was also excellent.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Dr. Glassman is truly a blessing! I highly recommend taking his courses. He provides details regarding everything required to be completed in the course at the start of the semester and permits students to determine their own time schedules in completing what is required (online). He also invites bonus postings/points. He is very responsive. Great!

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: I enjoy Dr. Gs classes. I wish I could take more of his classes! His online courses are well laid out and the opportunity for extra credit helps if you struggled with a topic. I would recommend his classes to anyone without hesitation.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Dr. G is very prompt with his feedback and he is a fair marker and gives ample opportunity to improve your grades. Content was useful and interesting. He really wants you to participate and he respects your opinion. I hope I have the opportunity to take another class with Dr. G.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Dr. G gives prompt responses/feedback and marks. He answers questions thoroughly and ensures comprehension of his expectations. Very supportive. I would happily take another of his courses.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: This is my first course with Dr. Glassman. I heard so many wonderful things about his courses. I would love to do another one. He was very prompt and feedback was really good. I liked that he gives you the opportunity to earn extra marks. Also, the postings can be done on your own time rather than a set number required per week.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Just completed ED 6642. The course material was relevant and the work load was very manageable. Dr. Glassman provided prompt and good feedback. Would definitely register for another one of his courses.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Just about to finish Dr. Glassman's Ed.6642 course. This was my first web course, but now I am hoping to get into the other two online grad courses that Dr.G. teaches. Hopefully, he will be teaching Ed.6641 and 6647 online before I graduate. This course was excellent and should be taken by all literacy grad students in the Fac. of Education.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Professor Marc is great. He gives prompt feedback and he knows well how to motivate students to learn. He is open-minded and respects students' opinions. He is so popular that his classes are full as soon as soon as the registration begins. I believe that he is one of the best teachers in education department.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Dr. Glassman is very quick and provides quality feedback. He is a great marker and allows for you to do additional postings for extra marks. He is comical and is genuinely interested in his students and their wellbeing.

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: Dr. Glassman provides very quick feedback. He is a fair marker. I enjoyed the opportunities for extra credit. Definitely would take a class from him again!

Name: Marc Glassman
Review: No weekly deadlines which allowed for flexibility in submitting online discussions. Bonus marks given for extra postings. Three postings were on specific topics but other mandatory postings were up to the students

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: every class all he does is write on chalkboard (EXTREMELY small font)after class I asked if he can write a little bigger as everyone around me was using their phone camera to zoom on the board.. his response "no. your just gonna have to get a seat in the front" I have perfect vision.. he doesn't care about your education or if you pass his class.

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: If you dont understand the material, and cant find outside help, good luck.

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: Worst prof.

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: I am taking a class this semester, and will fail for sure but I am trying my best. He tells students who are failing to drop courses instead of encouraging to do the best. Very rude.

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: The worst prof Ive ever had. Cant teach to save his life, condescending, so rude that its genuinely malicious, and grades so hard you can kiss your chance of passing his class goodbye. Never take his class.

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: Dr. Suvak was the worst prof I've ever had. He was extremely unapproachable and was often extremely rude with students. I had actually done the same course at Western University and received an 80, meanwhile Suvak completely butchered my assignments and exams as they were not done with methods he had taught. Definitely skip signing up for his class

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: Definitely can see where some people are not too fond on this guy but if you put the work in and attend classes, then passing should not be too hard. One thing is that you have to answer questions specifically to the way he tought it or most marks will be lost, doesn't use D2L to post notes so going to class is a must.

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: Dr Suvak expects what should be obvious, respect. Be respectful, attend ALL classes, take good notes, do all work and passing is easy. Work hard and use what he teaches, an A is guaranteed. Ask intelligent questions, he does not bite. He is generous with marks on exams if you actually TRY to solve things how he shows. Skipping class means no notes.

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: Explains clearly, but only once. You won't want to miss class or you'll miss a lot, and he doesn't post any notes or grades. Voice sort of reminds me of Winnie the Pooh, if that matters to anyone. Incredibly smart but makes comments like, "this is common sense!" than can be disheartening to students who may need help. Gives weekly assignments.

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: Fair marker, his practice tests are very similar to his tests. Show up, take notes, do the assignments and you will do well in his class.

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: Jack is an easy going prof who is very straight forward. His in class lectures are full of examples and his assignments are straight forward. Go to class and follow along and you should have no trouble getting an A

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: Dr. Suvak knows what he is talking about but does not know how to relay the information to those who do not. He gets very frustrated when you ask him to clarify examples. If you approach him after class with questions he becomes very agitated and makes you feel like an idiot for ever asking. Doesn't understand that not everyone has a Ph.D in math.

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: Doesn't use the textbook and doesn't post any notes. If you don't use his techniques, he won't give you any marks. Make sure you go to class because you won't get any notes otherwise.

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: His teaching method is to have his back turned and write on the chalk board the whole lecture, I don't learn this way personally. He takes days to answer emails and was never helpful. He expected the class to catch on to things immediately and became very frustrated if we didn't. He made me feel very stupid when I asked questions.

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: I didn't find him as bad as some people. He is bearable and his notes are good, and he explains pretty well. He does not call out students however he can make you feel bad if you don't know the answer. He does not post notes online, so you must attend every class. You have do do everything his way - he won't take another method, even if it's right.

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: Horrible prof! You have to do everything exactly his way, no extra workings or you will be marked wrong even if the answer is right. He makes you feel dumb if you don't understand his "absolutely trivial" questions. Wouldn't recommend him even to my worst enemy. On top of it all, he doesn't post his notes online and scribbles on a chalk board :/

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: Weekly Assignments arent terribly difficult but if you dont understand something, dont bother looking for help from him. Old Fashioned chalk board used, dull lectures and often raises his voice at the class and makes you feel like you are dumb

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: He seemed to be an okay professor at first. He knows his stuff. If you go to class, write EXACTLY what he does and dont ask questions, hes for you. Hes not as bad as people make him out to be, but he laughs at the class if you dont know an answer. My biggest problem with him was he talked at you, not to you, and I really dont learn like that

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: I found Suvak to be a very good math professor. He was very thorough in his teachings and taught at a very good pace. He is a bit particular on methods and how things are done, but if you heed his instructions and attend all of his classes, it's easy to get a good final grade!

Name: Jack Suvak
Review: Doesn't care about what you have to say. You need to solve stuff his way, even if you do it correctly in another way he will consider the whole thing wrong

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: Loveless is legendary.  Goes out of his way to help every student he possibly can.  Great professor.  Teaches difficult material but will help you as much as he possibly can.  You cant go wrong choosing Loveless as a prof.

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: Although I only had Loveless for a couple of classes, he seemed like a really great guy who honestly cared about his students! He was very clear on the subject at hand, but the lectures were a bit slow going!

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: Ed Loveless is an exceptional math instructor. Unlike other math profs at MUN, he is a gifted teacher and genuinely believes that his students can achieve.   His lectures and examples are clear and understandable.   He also has respect for his students. Something I wish I could say about other math instructors at Memorial.

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: BEST PROF OF LIFE. i wish he taught every single course at mun.

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: Prof Loveless was one of the greatest profs I have had. He was super helpful, explained things different ways to make sure you understood. Had tons of office hours and was willing to go over mistakes you made on previous assignments so you could improve. He even helped me with my calculus when I wasn't in his course. Highly recommend.

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: Great instructor and easy to talk too. One on one he is very helpful, easily the best math teacher at MUN

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: I LOVE THIS MAN

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: Mr. Loveless is the most amazing professor at MUN. I'm so glad I got the opportunity to have him for 1090 and 1000. He made class enjoyable and its an easy A if you put in the effort to learn the material. Take advantage of the tutoring he is now offering since he is now retired. He is truely meant for teaching, the reason I'm doing a math major.

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: took 1090 & 1000 with loveless.. he is the sweetest man alive and really cares for his students. My favourite prof of ALL TIME. God love his sweet soul. I hated math until I had him and I received A's in both of his courses. If you have the chance to do tutoring with him, use the opportunity!!

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: Absolutely AMAZING prof. truly the greatest math teacher there is. Loveless is a saint and he truly cares about his students and will go to great lengths to help them pass if they try their best. Loveless has changed my life.

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: The best prof ever!

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: One of the best profs I've ever had! Actually made calculus easy and interesting! His notes are eloquent, and provides you with great examples and handouts.

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: Best prof ever! He gives excellent examples, is super helpful and friendly, and actually makes calculus a breeze. Reminds me of my grandpa!

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: WICKED PROFF if you want to pass math go to loveless hes da BOSS :)

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: Class act.

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: very nice, funny, comprehensive and helpful. Best prof I've had so far

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: Amazing. Crystal clear. Will make you like calculus.

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: Awesome professor!!! He gives great notes, is super helpful, and the weekly assignments really help you understand the material. This man was born to teach! He doesn't trick you on tests/exams, he just wants to see if you know how to complete the problem. I wish he taught all my courses. Highly recommend him!

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: Awesome prof, I would definitely recommend him to anyone! His course is very organized and not hard if you go to class and do the work! You can tell that he really enjoys teaching this subject and is willing to help you with anything if needed! :)

Name: Edmund Loveless
Review: Best prof ever....Made math bearable. i passed because of him :)

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: If you put in the work and pay attention to feedback, you will do just fine. Fascinating selection of material, great lectures, flexible. Always look forward to class!

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: Took Nolan's 1090 class in my first semester at MUN. Definitely helped me transition into university-level writing; I improved a lot over the course of the semester! He can be a tough grader, but I thought he was fair and my grade went up at least 10% after each essay revision, so listen to his feedback! Entertaining lectures, really funny guy!

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: I found the lectures dull and uninformative. There was no discoursive element, and having student input rather than summarizing the text section by section would have better prepared me for the assignments and granted me deeper meaning into the texts. Also having 45% of our grade be on assignments about the same text felt unbalanced.

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: Nolan is really entertaining in class. You will learn a lot from him about essay writing if youre willing to put in the extra work to do the revisions and take his advice. Is a very tough grader though so Id be weary taking him if you need a minimum grade in the course to get into a faculty. He also makes himself very available in office hours.

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: Nolan made the lectures fun and interesting. Clearly explains what is happening in each book we studied. tough grader but is helpful in improving skills in writing.

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: He's hilarious and his lectures are the absolute best! If you come into the class expecting 80s because that's what you had in high school- don't. But, if you genuinely want to improve your skills, he's the one to take. I will 100% be looking for him to teach my next English class.

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: Nolan does make class interesting as he is a funny fella but he is an extremely tough grader. I have done every assignment, every revision, I have went to him in is office for help but no matter what I do I cannot get over a 60. If you have a question he often wont answer it, he will say "I just explained that", "figure it out yourself"

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: Nolan was probably my favourite prof I've had a MUN, I have to take a bunch of English courses as electives and I always try to get in a class he's teaching! He's not really a tough grader but will help you improve and gives very blunt advice. He's hilarious and insightful, and can keep an hour and 15 min class from getting boring.

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: He's a tough grader, but it's possible to do well if you listen to feedback and participate in class discussion. He allows you to do revisions on two out of three of the essays, which was super helpful; my mark went up at least 10% for each essay revision, so make sure you listen to the feedback he gives!! Really funny guy too, entertaining classes

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: I have put in an honest work trying to pass this course by passing in every essay, going to every class, and by going to the help center for help with revisions yet despite this the prof will not give me over a 60% on any essay even though ive visited him multiple times to show how hard im working. Goodluck if you get stuck with him like I did XD

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: He is not a professor to go to for an easy grade, though if you're good in English he won't cause too much trouble with his marks (60-70% usually). Probably the finest lecturer I've had in the department. A great sense of humor, and an infectious passion. Works his hardest to get you as excited as he is about each and every work.

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: He is a very fun person but an extremely tough grader.

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: Professor Nolan is a tough prof, and takes some getting used to. Your first grade in the course is usually the worst, but listen to his advice and the marks will generally improve. Don't expect to have a high mark in his class, but if you put the effort in, passing isn't impossible. His lectures are funny, but overall take someone else if possible.

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: Michael Nolan would have to be professor at MUN. Don't take this class if you plan on doing well. Nothing is good enough for him. You will spend the entire semester on edge wondering if you are going to pass the course. The first assignment mark is probably the best one you'll get the whole semester. It only goes down from there. He's awful

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: Michael Nolan is brutal. He is such a hard grader. No matter how much you improve or revise essays he will not give you a better mark. I will never take another class with him again. Ive had an English teacher go over my essays and he still gave me a 55. Do NOT take him if you can avoid it.

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: Absolutely hilarious except for when grades came back. Basically came in and read to use cause he thought we didn't understand the texts. We called him hobbit cause of his pocket watch that he used in exams. Don't ever expect technology to be used in this course, we couldn't even use online sources for the final paper.

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: He doesn't care about his students. The first mark you get in the course is the mark you will have for the remainder of the semester. I will never take a course with him again.

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: His lectures were basically him reading the book to us for the majority and then mentioning one small detail that would pop up on an exam. He lets you redo certain essays but very hard to determine what exactly he is looking for as his feedback is not always clear

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: I would not recommend doing a class with this prof. Whatever the grade is you get at the beginning of the course will be what you get throughout the course regardless if you succeed in your writing. Bad for emailing back on time and have a very odd choice in books. Lectures are pointless, he only reads the book to you and gives essays on the book.

Name: Michael Nolan
Review: If you're not an English person and you're only taking English because it's required for your program you should probably look for a different prof. Nolan is a hilarious guy but a really tough grader. Essentially most of what you learned in high school English is useless.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: Did both psychology 1000 and 1001 online with this prof - digitized lectures are boring, textbook is a great help. Most of the online quizzes' questions can be googled and found on study sites online (seriously almost 90% of them.) Final and midterm have a lot of questions but they're honestly simple to pass if you study.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: I thought he was great, and I really enjoyed the lectures.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: Taking this online and most brutal thing Ive ever done spending over 20 hours a week on this course,barely passing. The timed assignments are hard and our upcoming final has 150 questions. I do not recommend , he seems like a good prof but it is very hard and time consuming especially for a first year course.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: His online lectures may be funny however do not rely on them. Only way to pass the course it to read the textbook thoroughly. His tests are extremely hard, the tests are also almost too long for the given time limit. I would advise you to take another prof for this course as their tests are easier and lectures are more enjoyable.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: Digitized lectures were boring. Online quizzes are difficult and the midtermfinal exams were brutal. Textbook is essential for passing since lectures aren't very helpful.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: You have to work for your grade, but it's worth it. One of the only disappointments I had is that he insists on using psych portal, and is otherwise aloof. Furthermore if you are on-campus the syllabus provided on the portal is not the same as the one received in class. I could see him being a great distance prof, but the hybrid class is a letdown.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: Definitely do not recommend him. Taking this course online and his digitized lectures are brutal and relatively long. His notes are horrible, do not rely on them and the Timed Assignments are brutal and usually have questions on stuff that he didn't talk about. Horrible prof but he seems like a good guy.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: LOVE this prof. The digitalized lectures were awesome and very easy to watch. He's very kind and replies quickly to emails.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: He loved to spice up lectures

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: Worst prof I've had to date.  His notes are useless, his lectures are pointless.  The online quizzes don't relate to the material he talks about in the lectures.  He isn't very helpful, and makes the TA's whenever he feels like.  Doesn't follow the course schedule one bit.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: Nice man, would not recommend though. Notes are useless and he tends to go off on tangents.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: He is a very comical man, very interesting and so are his online lectures. Very informative and ready to help.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: Extremely funny. Was actually a pleasure to watch his online lectures. Guaranteed to make you laugh.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: Great prof, everything is online even though it counts as an on-campus course!

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: The online lectures suck, very little info in them. he is so rude, emailed him to ask where to find something and I got a reply "everything is on portal" avoid!!

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: Horrible! the online lectures are useless, they teach you nothing, and he is very rude. emailed him asking where to find something and his reply was "everything is on portal" Would not recommend to anyone

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: Great prof! You don't actually have to attend class because he tapes all his lectures and posts them online. He's good for explaining and giving examples. He's a pretty funny guy. His tests are not hard, as long as you study. You have to do timed assignments which are great for making sure you know the material before exams. Recommend him for sure!

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: His exams can be tricky, but the timed assignments are an excellent way to get yourself ready.I am very disappointed that his Psyh 1001 class is full.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: I do not understand what all the hype is about this man. He is arrogant, condescending, and incredibly egocentric when it comes to his ambiguous "modified matching." His pre-taped lectures are tedious and unhelpful; study the book. But do beware and read his slides afterwards--he slips in a few Q's that aren't in the text.

Name: Rick Maddigan
Review: really nice professor, very helpful!

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Dr. Mercer was a good prof! She tries her best to make some dry psych lectures accessible and relatable to real life and shows fun videos to help with engagement. Approachable and clear expectations. Lectures fairly similar to powerpoint notes but refers to text often for testing. Overall a great educator who is passionate about her subject!

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Hands down the rudest prof. Does not care about her students. AWFUL.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: You have to attend this class to do well and this is made very clear. If you have a background in biology this course is a good choice, otherwise it may be a bit overwhelming. Read the textbook, go to class, and youll do fine. Practice quizzes online for bonus marks, and she basically tells you what the long answer test questions will be in class.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Course was an all around MESS. All the course material is taught to you by ANOTHER teacher via videos that cover the bare min of the text chapters. You literally need to memorize every detail for the chapters (40 pages each) + the minor and "unimportant" things. Exams were WAY too difficult, phrased complicated and confusing af. No study guides.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: You need to go to this class to do well. The format for both the midterms is multiple choice, fill in the blanks and long answers. The long answers come directly from her lectures. Her chapter notes are helpful but, could use some re organizing as there hard to follow sometimes. However, she does allow 5 extra percent if you do online quizzes.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Very easy class with a buddy, find someone to ask psych questions to in prep about a week before each exam and youll be fine.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Dr. Mercer is a good Prof. her lectures aren't overly interesting but she is knowledgeable and can teach the material. Her slides aren't amazing so a textbook is recommended. Prepare for long tests that are comprehensive and test the entirety of the units covered.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Dr. Mercer's lectures are not the most interesting, but you can get the majority of the information from the textbook and her posted lecture powerpoints. She wants her students to succeed and provided us with the opportunity of getting an extra 5% through extra credit work. Would take again.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Michelle is a great prof. She tries to engage students with fun games in lectures. Two midterms and a final. She gave everyone an extra 5% on the first midterm, and she offers bonus online quizzes that can boost your overall average by 3%. For this alone, I would recommend taking her. Read the textbook, and go to class and it will be a breeze.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Taking psych 1000 online. She posts the bare minimum on D2L, you really need to read the textbook, you won't do well on exams or assignments on just her notes. Not very responsive to emails. But the course is pretty easy

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: This woman is by far the best prof I've ever had. She is super entertaining, classes are fun and she really helps break down course material. U will have to read to pass but she does help you gain extra percentages by quizzes. I just love her!

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Great slides given. Doesn't use the textbook. Puts practice on WileyPlus but it isn't for a grade. Lectures are eh, she only reads from her slides, but her stories and games are cool. You could easily stay home and study and do just as good. Tests and final are all multiple choice and very straightforward ones at that.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Michelles da bomb. She wears a different color pair of pants everyday. Course was a tough one, wish there was more things available to boost marks.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Michelle is a sweet lady and tries to get the class involved with her lectures. I found the lectures to get boring at times and many people would fall asleep in her class. Ive never had the desire to fall asleep in a class until hers. She posts her power points online so attendance isnt mandatory. All you need is a large coffee and your laptop.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: LOTS of material, which requires a lot of time studying. She gives bonus quizzes that give extra marks and they are great help for the exams. Not too hard if you go to class and take notes. She gives a lot of relatable examples. Shes very interesting and intriguing so I love her lectures. Makes boring concepts fun. Didn't use textbook at all

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Exams are all multiple choice, easy if you read her slide shows. Everything posted online and take advantage of the bonus points offered. She easy to listen to and makes the heavy load of material enjoyable to hear about

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: 6 quizzes (out of 8) worth 2.5% each, midterm worth 40%. Average psych course.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Michelle is a great professor. She is very on-topic during her lectures, and her slides are pretty easy to read. She posts them ahead of time, which helps as you can know the content you're about to learn ahead of time and allows lectures to just reaffirm the concepts you've already learned. Would recommend taking her.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: Mercer is very knowledgeable of Psyc. She is nice and caring but her lectures could put you to sleep while you are drinking a coffee. Her voice has a weird tone which also makes her hard to listen too. Overall she is a okay prof.

Name: Michelle Mercer
Review: This prof is very knowledgable about psychology and gives many good examples to help with understanding. Also has lots of very simple tasks that make bonus marks easy. Makes lectures interesting. Strongly recommend

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: Todd was often unclear of what he wanted from His students. Often times he was ignorant towards his students. The selections he chose all had the same theme about sex which made me uncomfortable, even the film at the end of the semester. Im usually a 90s students but I could barely clear 70 even when listening to his suggestions.

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: I found Todd at times to have a pervy tone to the course. Every novel we studied had a theme of sex, included the film at the end of the course. No one else I know who has done 1090 experienced this. At times I felt uncomfortable. Normally an A student, struggled to get Cs in his course. Would apply any and all feedback given but it was usless

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: Todd, was the worst professor I have ever had. He did not give any instruction or notes, he only read off of slides and changed them after 30 seconds, so you could not copy down anything. He was not helpful at all. He doesn't give feed back on anything he grades for you of post the correct answers the things you have handed in or done online.(1090)

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: Todd Karnas may be the most difficult and unorganized prof I've had so far and this perhaps explains his hard grading. He simply is not that stellar at answering questions and giving feedback. He tends to give theoretical answers and never answers questions directly. Not a prof I would take a course from again. He is too Difficult.

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: Very hard grader. Feedback is arbitrary at best, and opinions have no place in his course. Do not try to relate to content, anything outside the assigned text is not allowed. Takes a long time to answer questions, and when he does his answers are usually vague and not very helpful. If you struggle with english this is not the prof for you.

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: I found this prof to be very happy he definitely put a positive atmosphere around the course and criteria. However; I personally have struggled to do well in this course even after attending every class, doing all the assignments, and applying feedback. I wouldnt reccomend this prof unless you have a strong understanding of English.

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: By far the worst prof I have ever had at MUN, he is rude and does not show any compassion for his students. In the class, it feels like he wants you to fail. I watched him make another student cry and leave a lecture. AVOID AT ALL COSTS.

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: This guys classes are more trouble than what they're worth. You're going to hate your life if you take one. Trust me!

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: I had him my first semester at MUN and I had to drop the course and take it the next semester with another prof. The worst prof I've ever had my 4 years here just really not a nice person and thinks his opinion is the only one. Avoid him at all costs.

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: Todd picked books that were way too hard to understand. He picked a book that I literally had to google half of the words in the sentence. He would ask a question to the class and if nobody raised their hand he would pick someone. If they didn't have the exact same view as him he would tell them they are wrong and make them look stupid. AVOID!!!

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: Todd Karnas is the definition of a terrible prof. I don't know why he does it. There is not one thing interesting about his lectures and the assignments do not relate to the course content. I would warn all students to avoid him as he gossips way to much.

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: Very tough grader.

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: Todd is one of the most undoubtedly unfit human beings for the profession of teaching. Instead of attempt to listen to a students opinions, Todd would rather search for what he wants to see in your essay or in class discussion. I no longer feel confident in my ability to even formulate a thesis. My average university English mark  87% TODD  54%

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: While he's a tough grader and definitely makes you work for your marks he cares about his students, he'll learn your name, get to know you outside the classroom if you go see him during his office hours or email him questions

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: Terrible teacher. Never join his class. Very inconsiderate. Will always call you out in class. Family member passed away and still made me read a book and complete an online assignment while i was at his funeral. AND had a test the day i got back.

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: No... just no... you might as well just wait till next semester to do the course. If you do not exactly follow what he says to do, you're gonna get at best a C. Also, very rude man and you cant have a different opinion from him unless you want to get "roasted" in front of your class.

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: Honestly the most disrespectful person I have ever met. I agree with the comment on trashing his students!! This semester is almost over, and after sending him three emails with questions regarding assignments, he has replied to neither. He's not a tough grader in my opinion, but do not recommend unless you want to be in class with rude person.

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: Todd Karnas in the worst professor I have ever had in my post secondary education. He does pick good books but his ego gets in the way. He trashes students on a personal level which borders on the unprofessional. It's fine that he is a harsh grader but he does not trade it off with anything useful other than asserting his dominance.

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: I got a decent mark in this course but I really had to work for it. Todd is an extremely hard marker and he assigns foolish work. We had to do an art project for one of our essays. If you aren't willing to put in 500% effort in this course then enjoy getting a 50!

Name: Todd Karnas
Review: You start the semester thinking he's a pretty good guy, but he changes. Very opinionated, and if you don't have the same opinion as him, you might as well not speak. You'll maybe get 55-60's if you're lucky. Coming from someone who finished 1080 with an 80%. Also calls people out for things beyond their control. Genuinely not a nice person.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Great prof, really tries to help you, you just have to be willing to go and ask for help. If you put in the time and effort, you will be rewarded, he notices (extra credit)! He always is willing to meet out of class. GO TO CLASS. it's not mandatory but how else would you understand the material? Book isn't required but super helpful nonetheless!

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Rick was a good prof overall. This was the first time ive ever done physics so I expected it to be difficult, and it was. He definitely makes his students work for a good mark. but, if you go to class, do the homework questions and put in the study time you will do fine. His assignments and midterms were hard but he wants students to succeed.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Really good prof for a first year student, does anything he can to help you get through the course.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Richard is a great guy who means well, however his lectures are very hard to follow and too many weekly assignments that are 3+ hours long. It's a lot of work, especially for a student with zero background in physics. It was a tough class, and his tests were much harder than questions done in class. They were very long, and impossible to finish.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: He's a great guy and means well but there is so much homework in the weekly assignments and his lectures are very hard to follow. When reviewing his notes, his workings are very messy and unorganized. Exams tend to have harder questions on them compared to what is covered in class.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Richard is a nice and funny guy however I would not recommend him for physics 1020. His exams are difficult and so long that you have no chance of getting them finished. He posts practice on d2l however they never compare to the questions he puts on his midterms. I came out of high school physics with 90+ and barely passed his first test. Avoid.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Rick is a good guy. He means well but does very few examples in class. Assignments are very long and tests are very lengthy and a lot of the substance on midterms is much more advanced than the examples done in class and in the textbook. I would probably not choose Rick again.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Dude is awesome. Lectures are a bit dry (it's physics so what can you do?) but he makes them as interesting as he can with demonstrations and videos. Posts his completed notes online but they're hard to follow if you didn't pay attention in class. Tests are very fair and he's always eager to help. Would recommend to anybody!

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Amazing professor! Makes lectures interesting but does fly through material! Posts notes on D2L and gives good feedback to homework. If extra time is needed on Mastering Physics he will give a few more days. But tests are very difficult and extremely long. Is very understanding and wants all students to excel. Overall great experience.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Few examples done in lectures, goes very fast, unorganized notes

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Rick is a great guy that really cares about his students. His tests are fair (but long - beware of time) and he helps you prepare for them. He posts everything online, including tons of practice material. He is always around if you need him, and makes an effort to talk to students. His classes are fun and easy to follow. He made me love physics!

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: He is really good and super hilarious in his lectures. There are lots of opportunities to get some extra marks like QR sheets, Assignments and even take home problems. The only negative thing I would say is that he can tend to write super tiny and kinda messy, like his solutions are hard to follow and are just a mess.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: There are a lot of assignments in the class but he is great for giving easy marks with his QR sheets and Mastering Physics assignment book. He is very funny and engaging in his lectures.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Amazing prof. Go to class and do your assignment and you will do great. He is always accessible to students if help is needed.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Rick is really funny in class and lectures are interesting. I took the course in high school so didn't find midterms difficult. However assignments were very long, difficult and frequent, but a great grade booster! Sometimes when I approached him outside of class he came off a bit cold, but it may have been an off day because he's awesome in class!

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Plenty of demonstrations in the lecture hall. Assignments are time consuming but are amazing prep for tests. He makes sure people understand the material and is willing to replace a bad quiz mark if the rest are good. Best prof I had in my first year and I looked forward to his lectures. Makes you collect tests from his office to discuss marks.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Dr. Goulding is a nice guy, but very unorganized in his teaching. His notes were handwritten and very messy/hard to understand. The online assignments would be 30+ questions long and would take most people upwards of 8 hours to complete. Tests were nothing like what we learned in class. Overall, would never recommend.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: My favourite prof by far this semester. He is so caring of all of his students even though he has a lot of them, and takes the time to get to know you. He is very fair about marking and will help boost marks if you go to see him. He makes lectures interesting. Overall, he's an excellent prof and I can't wait to take his class again next semester.

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Great prof, will help you as much as he possibly can!

Name: Richard Goulding
Review: Rick is a tough grader and expects a lot from his students. There is a lot of work to his courses but he is a nice guy and makes lectures fun. Hes a prof there for a love of teaching and he genuinely cares for the success of his students. He will curve tests and help you succeed if you try.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: She was nothing but encouraging and supportive. She makes her students push themselves. Very helpful when it came to suggesting extended reading material. Very knowledgeable lady.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: Comment?  No comment.  Not me.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: She knows her stuff really well, but is a very intimidating woman. All the comments are talking about how hard her course was, but I'm a psych major and I managed an 'A' in it, and I suck at english. She's probably not the easiest teacher but she prepares you very well for other english classes or any class that requires essays.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: Horrible proffessor! I would not recommend her for any course. She picks on people in class and even if you try to answer a question she often says your answer is wrong. Also she doesn't want people yawning in class. If you do bad in an essay and go see her she is not nice about it. Highly reccomend avoiding her!

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: So she started the first class off by saying we were all zeros, and then held the opinion that we were all going to do bad. You deffinately have to show her that you are paying attention in class and work extremly hard... if you're lucky enough she wil pass you. And I suggest not yawning in her class. Best of luck!

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: There were 42 people in my class at the beginning of the semester and only 18 were left for the final as most had dropped out. most of the remaining 18 also failed including myself.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: Ok...wow...this truly was a horrible class to be in, i'm not gunna lie there were times where we had fun debates but other than that it's horrible. Very subjected to her own opinion and a very tough marker expect 50's and low 60's. Gave lots of information but didnt deliver it properlly. Does pick favourites. GOOD LUCK

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: Avoid like the plague, because she probably conjures it out of her boiling cauldron. Seriously the worst professor ever.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: Avoid this professor! She is unable to comprehend any opinion other than her own. I attended all her classes (attendence is a MUST), Read all the material and wrote papers that would have earned me good marks in past courses. She failed me.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: I was in an accident, could not go to class, this isn't an excise with her though. Wrote an excellent paper but since I don't go to class she failed me. Went to talk to her about it, her response was "How do you expect to know what is in the books if you don't come to the lectures?" I was pissed so I just told her because I read the books and left.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: Never in my life have I ever come across someone with such a "My way or the highway" attitude. No matter how well you do on an essay, she will NOT take any opinion but her own..She has much to learn about opening her mind up to new and fresh ideas. She is the absolute worst professor in the school.. Avoid her at all costs.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: The single most close minded teacher Ive encountered.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: Worst Prof i ever had!!! that is all, don't take her for english.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: She is the hardest professor i ever had!She doesn't open her mind up at all when it comes to other peoples views on a story and the only way to pass a test is if you use everything that she thinks the story is about and do not add any of your own thoughts because they are wrong or you didn't get the point as she would tell you!

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: Shes honestly not as bad as some people are saying. Yes, attendance counts with her. If you go to class, she gives you so much information on the novels there are no surprises on her tests. Read the novels, pay attention, and you'll do fine. Shes not cold-hearted when you show an effort. If you don't go to class, don't expect to do well.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: Good prof, always in a good mood. Showing up for class is a must! She never did poetry in this course, which was a plus.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: Dr. Baksh is wonderful! I look forward to English every day. She is always in a good mood, always pleasant to her students, and very helpful. You will be put on the spot sometimes, but if you read your materials and prepare for class (like you should anyway) you will be ok! P.S. I hate English, but she is making it manageable for me!

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: Ok, here's what you need to know about Stella.  Show up to class!  Read the books before you start them in class and think about the text.  She's actually an amazing woman and if you work har enough to get an A from her, it really means something.  She'll make you a better writer and reader so please, don't let your fear of her get in the way.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: Every negative comment said so far is right. She is the most cold-hearted woman I have ever meet. I actually was scared to go to class. The class would go silent as soon as she walked in and everyone would be petrified. I tried very hard in this course. She picks people that she will give bad marks and sticks to it no matter how hard u work. AVOID.

Name: Stella Algoo-Baksh
Review: A waste of life. There is no pleasing this woman. I worked harder in her class than I have worked in any course EVER, and still almost received a 70%. However, she marked my class so bad that someone stepped in and jacked our marks up by 10%. Overall, she has a vendetta against human life and makes students feel terrified to share their opinions.

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: He does have an accent so people tend to not like his course, but he is very straight forward. He gives examples and they will be on his test. If you need a prof for math 1000 take him, his assignments are easier than any other profs.

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: I really liked CZ, he's a funny and kind man who's always willing to help. However his class instruction could be very confusing, and he simply wouldn't hand back assignments or exam papers so sometimes we were left with no resources to work from to study for upcoming exams.

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: It's a difficult course regardless. He's a friendly, funny man. Gave a difficult second test this semester, with only 2 pages and questions which a few math majors were shocked to see given to us. Overall, not bad. Slight language barrier at first but within a week or so you can understand him fine.

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: He is a very funny and nice. But His writing is very hard to read, and he uses very weird explanations of how to solve mathematical problems, he doesn't give notes only examples. Would NOT recommend this prof. His accent is also hard to understand. He makes so many mistakes while doing the notes

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: He's pretty chill, great proff and funny

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: C.Z. is a funny guy, and a great professor. His lectures are informative and well organized, and he's always willing to answer questions. He does have an accent, but it's very easy to get  used to quickly. I found his assignments were simple and his midterms a bit more difficult, but nothing too hard for intro calc. He's very funny!

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: He's my favourite prof since coming to University. Although he is sometimes  hard to understand and doesn't answer questions the best, he has hilarious analogies and says really funny jokes at the end of classes that make it all worth it. Tests are fair and he is very reasonable. Final was very hard though. Grade dropped over 20% for most people.

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: My favourite prof last semester! You can tell english is not his native tongue but his notes made up for what was lost through speech. Lectures often flew by and he ended class 5 minutes early most days to crack a joke with the class. Oh, and he stopped often to ensure everyone understood the topicanswer questions.

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: Hilarious and adorable man! His Chinese accent is thick, but you get used to it and you start to understand him after the first couple lectures, but he won't easily understand you. His tests are doable, but not easy either. He uses analogies to explain different mathematical processes that may be helpful or not, depending on how you like to learn.

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: C.Z. is a funny guy. Do note that he makes use of pretty weird analogies that some may find to be not helpful at all. Also, he does not use powerpoint slides. Rather, he teaches the course through pen and paper. He is approachable, but sometimes he fails to understand what students are asking him. The tests aren't bad and he is an easy marker.

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: Kuo is a very nice man and is funny in class. As someone who struggles with math I found this course very difficult with him though. He sometimes doesn't understand what you're asking when you ask a question and though his analogies are funny I didn't find them very useful in remembering what I was doing . Material is difficult but tests were fair.

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: He make math interesting

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: Was about to give up on math until I had him. He has the weirdest analogies but you will find yourself using them after a while. Has an accent but is pretty easy to understand after a couple classes. Easy marker. Writing is very messy sometimes but if you ask him to clarify he doesn't mind at all. And is the funniest man I've ever met!

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: math is math, if you dont go you arent going to do well, he is hard to understand at first but easy to catch on to. there are 3 tests and an assignment every week. i failed once because i didnt go and didnt do assignments. re-took course and actually did the assignments and attended.

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: Such a great guy!!! Gets the job done but jokes around, too. Although English may not be his first language, he's not all that hard to understand, you just have to get used to the way he pronounces things. Recommend this guy!!

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: Awesome professor. Very funny and makes the class extremely enjoyable. He sometimes trips over his numbers and gets something wrong but it's usually something small so it's not that confusing. Other than that he is very clear and provides tons of examples. Marks fairly, if a bit on the hard side. Not very approachable or helpful.

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: Fairly decent prof.

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: Found him very confusing to follow in some classes, for example he would get half was through an example and scratch the whole thing out and tell us to forget it, its wrong. Very little in regards to notes. Went over many examples, skipping steps and not explaining what he was doing (assuming everyone could follow)

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: so disorganized and confusing. He hardly knew what he was talking about and he would do examples and not know how to do them so he would skip it which was super frustrating. Avoid him     if possible .

Name: C.Z. Kuo
Review: Awesome Prof! at first there is most definitely a language barrier but you pick up on it very fast! you don't need a textbook and you don't have to attend every class. if you miss a few classes in a row he will lend out his notes for you to copy! best thing is jokes on Friday!

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: Henry is a down to earth kind of guy, who puts everything on the table. He was very blunt about people not putting effort in. Do your assignments or he will hate you. Henry teaches VERY fast paced, and makes many mistakes that he doesn't notice in the notes making it very hard to study. I would recommend this course, but NOT with Henry Andrews.

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: Henry Andrews is the sweetest man on the earth. He has been my favourite prof I have had. He cares so much about whether you do well or not, He would always recommend students going to his office for help for assignments and stuff and would not care if you went 10 times a week. He's the best!!

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: I would not recommend him. He is funny in class, but he puts people down, and takes no notes what so ever. Not a fan.

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: I had Henry Andrews for my Math 1000 Prof during Fall 2011. I did not do Pre Calculus in High School and I came out of the course with an A, and math is not my cup of tea. Yes he may be rude sometimes but if you go to his office for help he really do care and explains it so well. Overall, he was one of my favorite Profs at MUN thus far

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: As my first (and only) math course taken at MUN- I'm glad I got Henry Andrews as my math prof, he makes everything clear and he is very understanding when you're late on an assignment or whatever. Yes he can be "mean" but he just cares and want you to do your work. If I needed to take math again, I would def pick him!

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: Would not recommend approaching Henry for help unless you like feeling like an idiot. He is cruel when he jokes and his assignments are terrible. I go to every class, write detailed notes and have a tutor and I can barely get through them. Likes to prove that he knows what he is doing. If you don't understand what he is teaching, too bad! AVOID!

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: Knows his stuff and is willing to help those who want to do well but you will know that because he will talk about it ALL THE TIME.
