I would never suggest his course to people as he is very rude and talks very negatively about students. Avoid if possible. Especially if you're not confident in math. If not be sure to attend EVERY CLASS.

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: I'm not Henry's biggest fan. I would not recommend him as a prof but I would recommend the course. He seemed so rude and arrogant. He has a very big ego. Just not the best learning environment.

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: Best Prof I have ever had at MUN! Really nice man and really great prof. you just have to do the work and ask questions!

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: His rants about having to work hard in the course can be a little redundant but it's only because he cares about his students. He takes a hands-on approach and tries to give students as much extra credit as possible. The pressure he puts on students to keep up with the course can certainly pay off in the end.

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: Absolutely the RUDEST prof ever. Laughs at students who hand in tests who've done poorly. Lectures students about how they're going to make bad teachers if... AVOID at all costs. And i got a 75 in his course, so i'm not hating because I failed! Just being honest. RUN AWAY FROM HENRY!

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: An excellent prof and a sweet man!  Very approachable, just expects you to do your work.

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: He taught the material simply and was easy to understand. I do not think I would've done as well with any other professor. I will agree that he was arrogant and I would not want to approach him for help.

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: AVOID. Should not be teaching at university level, under-qualified, cruel, self-righteous, discouraging and malicious. Mean mean mean.

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: I'm taking math with Mr. Andrews this semester. So far, I think he is a great prof.  He is clear, concise and requirements of us are clearly stated. He can be tough on you, but he should be.  This isn't high school! Be accountable for yourselves and stop blaming him because you do poorly but don't put in the work needed.

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: I have heard pretty bad things about Professor Andrews, so I was weary of registering for a course with him. So far I find him great. If you pay attention and contribute during class. He will like you and you will understand better. Overall I'd recommend him. He will call you out though

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: Overall he is a pretty good prof, he grades very fairly and basically tells you what will be on your tests plus most of the questions are from your assignments anyway so no surprises. I would recommend this prof to anyone whether you are strong in math or not he gives you everything you need in your notes so doing assignments are a breeze.

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: Useless prof. 3 years at mun, and he is the worst prof. I have ever had so far. Avoid him if you can and pick another math professor who can give you an A+ easy!

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: Worst. Teacher. Ever.

Name: Henry Andrews
Review: Horrible. Disrespectful. Malicious. I enjoyed math before this course, and due to his methods I doubt i'll be able to continue onward with a positive attitude towards math. Everything he says irritates me.

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Nice guy, he's a bit odd but overall he is good at explaining concepts and uses great analogies. Doesn't post his notes so attendance is necessary but his assignments and exams are very similar to the examples he gives in class. I'd definitely take a class from him again!

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Best math prof I've had. Great at explaining concepts and is eager to help your learning.

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Dr. Sullivan is a great professor who is very good at teaching the material during lectures. Very professional and knowledgeable. Notes are very well done and organized. Only drawback is that he does not post notes online so attendance is mandatory.

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: He's a good guy. Very smart. Doesn't post his notes so showing up to class is mandatory. He doesn't mind helping but gives plenty of assignments. Tests are very fair!! He posts great content such as previous year's tests and assignments which is a really good help. He's very friendly and approachable.

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Shannon writes a lot of notes (none of which are posted online), so prepare to show up to class. He also gives lots of resources for studying (old assignments, tests, scatter worksheets) which better prepares you for what he'll ask on exams. Courseload is heavy, but he does his best to teach the material and is always there to answer questions.

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Dr. Sullivan is definitely the best choice for a course like Maths 3202. He conveyed topics in an easy manner. Not for once I felt that I am lagging behind. If you put up the required which is not that high, you will do great with him and tbh he is one of the best professor in the maths department at MUN.

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: He doesn't post his notes, but his lectures are very good. usually, he posts assignments and solutions from the previous semesters. recommend!

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: good prof

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Dr. Sullivan is by far the best professor I've had in MUN. He is always available for questions and can always explain in an understanding way. Notes are not posted anywhere so you need to attend class in order to pass. Would take these classes again just to have Dr. Sullivan again. Also had him for MATH 1000

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: He is the best professor in the Math department according to my opinion. He has amazing notes but he only gives them out during lectures. The lectures are very informative and interesting, he makes you want to take Math as a major. He also explains all the concept from a very basic and understanding point of view. I would take him for every course.

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: The best prof Ive taken so far without a doubt! The course itself isnt easy in any way but Dr. Sullivan made it easier to learn than any other course Ive taken.

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Not understanding. He will not change your grade even if its a small amount. He wasnt very friendly during office hours, was a tough grader, often talked about random topics during lectures and didnt give you time to practice during lectures. Went way too fast. Everyone was confused, many dropped the course. Hes very smart but I dont recommend

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Best math teacher i ever had!!! His tests are on the difficult side but his ability to twach math makes up for it.

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Amazing professor! Would highly recommend taking him for any course. He is great at explaining new concepts to students. Also, he spends loads of time on the important concepts and just brushes over the non-important concepts, so you are well prepared for the final. As with any Math course, attendance and practice are necessary to succeed!

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Professor Sullivan explains concepts so well, you probably wont need to study. He does a tonne of examples and answers a lot of questions well. A draw back is that he doesn't post notes to D2L so attendance is a must. - 2 Mid Terms - Final - 8 Assignments -

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Super nice and cares about his students ! His notes are good! However, he's more into the proofs more so then examples. And he doesn't post them, so go to class! The text book is great too, he follows his notes from it.

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Dr Sullivan is an incredible Prof who gives excellent explanations, provides descriptive notes, and works through useful examples. Not only is Dr Sullivan excellent at teaching the course material, he also cares about his students and how well they are understanding the material. I would not hesitate to take another of his courses in the future.

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Good prof, definitely recommend!! You need to go to class because he doesn't post notes online! He's really great outside of class, and easy to talk to! Genuinely cares about his students and wants you to succeed.

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Absolutely incredible prof. Math 1001 was a very difficult course, but Dr. Sullivan made it much more easy to work through. I would highly recommend taking his courses, and I definitely will be if I need to in the future.

Name: Shannon Sullivan
Review: Bit of an odd guy, but great prof. Tries to do his best to make class interesting. Gives helpful examples, and assignments are a fair indicator of the test. Post helpful video tutorials for a practice final exam towards the end of the year. Very approachable outside of class. Attendance is not mandatory, but is very helpful.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: One of my favorite profs. Solomon's always smiling and he's hilarious without trying to be. Had him for 1001. He gives A LOT of assignments, but they were pretty much the only practice I did besides night-before-test review, so I was actually thankful for them. He uploads his notes online but they're not filled out so skipping lectures isn't wise.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: I would recommend Solomon to anyone, he's a solid choice but i wouldn't choose him again if i had the option to. He is happy to help you in any way but he is not the greatest at explaining abstract topics, possibly due to his foreign accent/language background. Very sweet man who is always smiling and loves his job. Does not do lecture capture.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: I'm super bad at math anyways so my mark doesn't completely reflect on him. He's a very nice person but I found him very difficult to understand with his accent. His final exam was pretty long and a lot of students didn't finish it.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: Lectures are dry. Tests are ok. Is an ok grader. Make sure you do extra work as this course takes practice if you want to be good at it.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: Dr. Soloman is a very caring prof and really wants his students to succeed. He is very helpful if you go to him during his office hours, as he will help you in any way he can with assignments.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: To many assignment I mean he gives an assignment every good damn week. What are we in highschool.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: I would 10/10 recommend solomon. You have to go to class and pay attention to get the notes as the ones he posts online have blanks. Overall a very fair grader and tester. We had weekly assignemts that were much tougher then the exams. Always willing to give extra marks if you go to see him about tests.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: Very nice professor, gave great in class notes and examples. Was always looking to give extra marks if you went to see him about tests.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: I loved Soloman all term but his exam was TERRIBLE. We were told to practice with old exams, and our actual exam was nothing like them. 13 questions on the old exams, 18 on ours, nobody finished it. I guess that's just a reflection of math 1090 itself because every class had the same exam. Oh well, he's okay.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: Notes are not online. Accent makes notes hard to follow. Spends very very little time on the hard material. Sample questions in class are nothing like whats given on the tests, which are pretty horrible to do given he doesnt show how to do those questions. Hes sweet but as a teacher I cant go it.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: Solomon is super sweet! No prof is perfect and hes got his flaws, but hes still a solid choice. He provides really good notes and lots of examples. He also has lots of worksheets, assignments, etc available for practice. (Only issue is that he has a habit of brushing over confusing topics and spending too much time on the simpler things.)

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: This guy makes a difficult course enjoyable. He is hilarious and such a sweet man. His notes are great but not posted online so if you miss class you must go to his office hours. Assignments are difficult for practice reasons, but tests are extremely short & easy & very predictable. MUN is lucky to have this man, he truly brightens my day.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: Seems like a nice guy, he really cares which is very refreshing! Makes classic dad jokes so classes are not tense. He gives great practice and it is easy to predict what is on the test! His assignments are your best friend!

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: If you enjoy math he is an excellent prof. If you go to his office he will explain any question in detail as long as you have attempted it.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: I am currently taking Solomon for math 1090, and while it is sometimes difficult to understand what he is saying with his thick accent he is very helpful! He is almost always in his office and will help you whenever you need it! He is really great one on one and will always make sure you understand what is going on. Friendly, funny and kind person!

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: Goes way too fast. Notes are not posted online therefore class is mandatory. Part marks are very rarely rewarded.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: He really does try his best, and he is a nice man. His accent does make it slightly harder to follow and his notes aren't online either so class is required. He often teaches simpler sample problems compared to ones given on assignment and tests.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: Posts assignments online with no warning, won't even be up for a week and once the date passes you can't change it. Also difficult to understand, his accent is very thick so some information doesn't get understood at all.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: He is one of the best Prof's in Math Dept. You can always access him even without the office hours and is very helpful. Very approachable. He will do everything to make you understand and his notes are amazing. Exams are a bit tricky but he marks fairly.

Name: Afework Solomon
Review: Professor Solomon is one of the best profs I've had at MUN. He's super nice and really cares about his students; if you need help with assignments, GO TO HIS OFFICE HOURS, it helps a lot considering the assignments are tough. Make sure you go to class; his notes are great, but he doesn't post them online.

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Dr. Fridgen teaches you what you need to know. He often rambles into way too much depth. He posts old tests which are extremely helpful. His tests for the most part are fair. There has been the odd question that I had thought had come up out of no where though.

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Makes you so well prepared for evaluation! Lectures are mostly based off practice questions on learning catalytics, write them & the answers down actice them before midterms/final & do his practice tests & you'll get an A. Teaches this course in the best way possible. Take him over anybody else, you won't regret it. Study the book, he wrote it

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Make sure you go to lectures as he uses learning catalytics every class which are easy participation marks. Lectures are good and exams are fair. Overall a great prof.

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Awesome prof. You need to attend class as Learning Catalytics contributes to your grade. Posted practice tests that were similar to term tests. Explained concepts well in class and gladly answered questions. Would definitely take again.

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Travis Fridgen is great! He explains things very clearly and Learning Catalytics examples really helped me to retain information. Hes great at using technology to make chemistry easy to learn. He regularly answers questions on Snapchat and gave a fun Instagram video project for extra credit! Hes so kind and helpful, Id recommend him to anyone:)

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: I would definately take courses from Fridgen, especially first year. He is kind and very good inlectures. you can't get any better.

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Really great prof!

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Very good lectures. He is good at explaining concepts in ways that are easy to understand. He uses learning catalytics basically every lecture and you need to answer for participation credit in the course. Gives lots of examples for you to do in class which helps you practice and learn better. Great prof overall.

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Dr. Fridgen is such a kind man, he cares about his students succeeding and will ensure you do so without babying you. Hands down the best prof.

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Love Dr. Fridgen for a prof. He doesn't baby his students but doesn't make things much harder than they need to be. For the most part, gives very fair tests and assignments. Does learning catalytics in class for participation marks. Is very understanding and knows what he's talking about. Textbook is very great also!! Would 100% take Fridgen again!

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Hard course but awesome prof. Interesting lectures and really explains things in detail. Notes are hard to follow on their own but he always answers questions thoroughly in class, and he's also very accessible and helpful outside of class. Review assignments and tests mirror his actual tests. Overall great prof. Would take him again for sure.

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Fridgen doesn't sugar-coat things and makes you work for your grade. That being said he is very kind and helpful if you see him after class. Learning Catalytics is used every class, so be prepared to show up. LC and class examples are close to the textbook so reading ahead will save you. 1051 is tricky, but Fridgen made it pretty good.

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Fridgen is a great prof, would definitely recommend for first year chem! His lectures are awesome and he uses Learning Catalytics almost every lecture, which I personally liked. His notes aren't great imo, but the textbook is good, which made up for it; study the textbook, do the assignment and pay attention in class, and you should do great!

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Dr. Fridgen is a good prof and his midterms and finals are very fair and just like the samples he posts. I didn't find his notes very helpful but it would probably be better if you were taking them on an ipad. The course is heavy and you need to show up for learning catalytics

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Very passionate about chemistry. If you go to class and do the work youll do well.

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Travis is a decent prof, his lecture notes did not help me at all I would just go to listen and for the learning catalytics (which he does every lecture). I just read the textbook and did the assignments which got me an A. I would take him again for the sole fact that his tests are super easy, exactly like the practice/old tests he puts on D2L.

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Fridgen is a great prof and clearly enjoys teaching. You need to participate in class to pass.

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Doesn't know basic math skills. Messes up more than he knows what he's talking about. If there's units in a problem be prepared to watch him struggle on how to cancel them out. Doesn't really explain any of the concepts just does examples that he messes up 24/7. Would say depend on the textbook but he made that too so it can't be very good.

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: Dr. Fridgen is a great prof, and seems very passionate about chemistry and the success of his students. Uses Learning Catalytics every lecture, so class is very focused on problem-solving, which I personally liked. Tests are fair, but the notes aren't that useful, so definitely use the textbook (it's a good learning resource).

Name: Travis Fridgen
Review: On the positive side, his tests are very fair and you'll pass as long as you study. Besides this, I found the notes to be fairly useless. I thought the course content was dull and the lectures made it worse. He tended to come off as rude and tended to treat students like children at times. He made me feel dumb and didn't really seem approachable

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: O'Dea is a fantastic lecturer with a distinct knowledge of his course material. He makes an effort to involve students in group discussions, and ties these discussions very well into his own lecture. He will be very particular in his grading, but he will be fair. If you struggle with writing essays avoid his class, otherwise highly recommended

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: Hes an esteemed English professor, he knows what hes doing. That being said, I dont think hes a good choice for first years. His course includes a lot of heavy reading, and his grading is much too particular for students just starting out. He is very difficult to please and doesnt offer clear explanations of his expectations.

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: This guy is out of the boundary tough for getting a good grade. I am usually 75 in english but I just passed in this course. He is experienced and do try to put his effort in lecture. CAUTION: But only take his course if you are a 90 grade student and can afford to go downhill to 65-70.

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: Overall very arrogant. Even more so for a person who lacks a doctrine. Full of himself, makes up for his own lack of educational background by marking hard.

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: I always got 90s in English before O'Dea. I got As in every class but this one, despite trying very hard. Basically, you need to write like the prof to get an A. I took this course a 2nd time to try to get an A from him and got a 76 again. I loved his lectures but he is a VERY hard marker. do not take if you want an A. I liked him but he is tough.

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: Shane is not an easy marker and often calls students out. I was so scared of him at first I wanted to drop out. However, as the year progressed he became one of my favourite profs. He is so intelligent and I truly learned a lot from him. He really cares about his students as well.

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: Will call you out in class, very hard marker, expectations unclear

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: Shane is such a nice professor. In order to get your grades back, you have to schedule a meeting with him. He gives amazing feedback and is very positive and encouraging.  However, you should attend class because at the end of the term there's a make-up essay that you can only do if you didn't miss any more than 5 classes.   Loved him!

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: Tough grader but will help you if you ask! NOT an easy A!!

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: He is a great prof if you are looking for someone who truly wishes to help you improve your writing abilities. He will have meetings with you after each essay in order too help you understand your mistakes and to make sure you get the most out of the course. However, he does not give away grades easily. You're going to have to put in effort.

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: Very intimidating, has a strange sense of humour... if you don't like being called out, stay away. You have to go for interviews to get your paper marks back, but the feedback isn't very clear. EXTREMELY HARD MARKER

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: O'Dea is a genuinely nice man who is interested in the well being of his students. In class he is funny and sarcastic but expects everyone to speak up and participate (does call on people). However, would not recommend his course if you're not willing to handle a big mark drop. He grades excessively hard for a first year course.

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: O'dea is a very tough grader but does give good feedback, and is fairly helpful.  However would not recommend if you don't like getting called out in class. You have to make appointments in order to see your marks on assignments, however he does go over the whole assignment with you which can be helpful

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: Calls everybody out, is very confusing with the way he explains things

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: Takes attendance every class. Very hard marker but leaves good feedback on papers.

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: If you are genuinely interested in learning about English, take this course! O'Dea is a good professor who will teach you how to be a better writer. But, if you don't want to take a chance with getting a low mark, consider a different professor. O'Dea is a tough grader but he is more than willing to help if you ask.

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: Tough grader, but more than willing to help. I don't reccomend this to anyone who doesn't have extra time in their schedules, because there are no marks put on papers, you have to meet with him to get your mark. make sure you attend class or you'll miss out on assignments because of lack of attendance.

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: He is the hardest marker! DO NOT take his course you WILL regret it

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: Tough grader, isn't always clear with what he expects from students. If English is your weakness, I would not recommend taking his class, though he is willing to help if asked.

Name: Shane O'Dea
Review: By far the toughest marker. Would not recommend to anyone taking an english course. Lectures are long and dragged out and not very interesting. Is a nice guy outside of class, but drop all expectations of getting good grades wether you attend the classes or not.

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: She is hot!

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: THE hardest English course offered (IMO) but Iona is a wonderful prof. Comes across as a little intimidating but she is so approachable and ready to give you extra help.

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: This is the best prof at MUN. Even though the course is hard, Dr. Bulgin is available for help whenever you need her. You have to attend class in order to pass and make sure not to get behind in the course. There is a lot of material to cover. Don't give up if you're having trouble, go talk to her about it and she will help you.

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: Wonderful teacher and person! Very clear, enthusiastic, and helpful! Best teacher at MUN

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: Bulgin really is a reasonable and helpful prof. I don't understand why she doesn't give worksheets with answer keys, or even worksheets with the exact styles of questions that will be on the tests, but pay attention, study, and go see her with any questions or uncertainties and you WILL do well. She really is a good prof.

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: Great prof! Friendly and nice. The tests are a bit long but the course itself isn't bad. Take a course with her!

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: She is the bees knees. Grammar can typically be boring but she makes it tolerable.

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: Dr. Bulgin is perhaps one of my favourite professors since coming to MUN. She is funny and makes a course like grammar seem fun and much easier than others would. I cannot wait to take another course from her. I would recommend this course taught by her to anyone (even if it isn't mandatory towards an English degree anymore).

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: Amazing prof!! If you attend all her classes, ask if you have any questions or go see her and review your notes once a week you will do well.  I found that she really wanted to make sure you did well. People might say that she is tough but those people prob want to be slack but still get good marks, that dont happen at mun!!

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: Dr. Bulgin is, perhaps, the greatest prof I've ever had. Attendance isn't mandatory, but is crucial to the learning of he material (as the text book is used very little). Lots of opportunity for improvement, as there are frequent tests. I liked grammar before this course, now I love it! Can't wait for the chance to do another course with her.

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: Dr. Bulgin is very fair and extremely friendly. She makes everything she teaches clear and easy to understand, especially for grammar, a class that one would expect to be boring and unbearable.

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: An amazing prof. I would recommend her to anyone. She takes every student to heart and does everything to help students. Just study the material and know your stuff and you will do really well.She is a very fair marker and if you study the material, the tests are easy!

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: Dr. Bulgin is an amazing woman who has true compassion for her students. She is somewhat of an old-school styled professor and does not give many notes in class. She supplies countless handouts,and speaks quite fast in her lectures. If you show up to class, and apply yourself intensely, you will pass the course.She is very helpful and approachable.

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: She makes grammar fun to learn and is concerned about how well her students are doing in the course! I took it as a summer course to be able to finish my first degree next year, and she makes me want to get up on a sunny day and go to school for an hour!! I would recommand this course taught by her any day! Best prof i've had in 5 yrs at MUN!

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: Iona is an outstanding professor, and has genuine respect and concern for her students. Between her fluid, direct lectures and impeccably designed tests, she makes learning the material almost impossibly easy. She is uncompromising in her expectations of students, but extremely helpful if you put in the effort any student should. Dead brilliant.

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: love her !! such a great prof. knowledgable and friendly. she gets to know everyone and it super helpful. her tests are straightforward and easy to prepare for. you either get it right or wrong. youll have fun in her class and its important you attend.

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: She definitely knows what she is talking about. The way she formats her tests are extremely helpful if you want to improve your marks throughout the course. Very helpful if you do not understand something in her class and she gives practise sheets, overall tough but an excellent prof. Recomend her to anyone with respect for English

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: Just finish the 3020 Course and although the material was difficult to understand at first, Bulgin kept my interest and taught me more than any other prof I've ever had! Very much willing to help if you're trying in her class and extremely pleasant to talk to. thanks for a great experience in a diffuclt course

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: Amazing Prof! in order to pass the course you have to attend class , as she does not rely on a textbook and you are tested on what is covered in class. She is very helpful and approachable outside of class! it is a hard course though so GO AND TALK WITH HER!! if you are having trouble understanding!

Name: Iona Bulgin
Review: Dr Bulgin is passionate about what she teches, knowledgeable, deserves a regular gig at MUN.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: Gray was a very difficult marker, didn't post any online lectures and his tests were insanely difficult.  I wouldn't recommend him.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: Worst prof I've ever seen, can't understand a word he says and all he does is graphs and you have to teach the course to yourself, then his mc are so hard you fail anyway.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: I found his explanations to be very clear. I found him to be very helpful in general.  Read the textbook. I also found the Study Guide to be important for getting good grades.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: Gary is so sweet and nice but his methods are terrible.  There are so many random graphs on the board and the tests are brutal.  The multiple choice is unfair.  Two answers can be correct but you have to choose the 'better' one.   I barely passed.  Get the textbook, it's the only reason I did pass.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: Biggest waste of money. Worst professor iv ever had. Draws graphs all class and doesn't teach you anything that will be on the exams. Do not recommend.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: Horrible. I wish I never took a course with him. All his notes are graphs and doesn't explain anything. His exams are brutal. Would defaintely not recommend him to anyone. He is also VERY boring to listen to.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: Took the course online this semester. Tests are easy, study the study guide. MC answers are right out of that book. Also gives a list of questions to study which are very helpful. He lectures graphs because the ENTIRE course is based on graphs!! There are only a few to learn, easy A if you study! He's a sweet man, willing to help you anytime :)

Name: Gary Riser
Review: Perhaps one of the worst professors out there! He is useless, his lectures don't make sense to anything that will be on your tests! Honestly I would run from his class, never learned a thing! All that was received were graphs... lots and lots of graphs, no actual notes.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: 1010 would NOT recommend. Also graphs. Lots and lots of graphs. I didn't learn a thing.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: An all around terrible class. Boring, misleading lectures followed up by heavily weighted, difficult exams. Please avoid, under all circumstances, taking his class - you will regret it. I will say, however, that he can be helpful if you catch him in his office hours for some extra clarification (this is imperative because lectures are useless).

Name: Gary Riser
Review: Horrible. Very monotone, hard to pay attention in class. Does not answer questions effectively, even over email. He beats around the bush and makes you even more confused than before you asked the question.. Exams are painful.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: I took the online class with him in Winter 2012/2013 and found the course easy and fair for an online course. Read the textbook and do the practice problems in the solutions manual, the midterms/exams are entirely multiple choice and similar to problems in the SM. I found this class quite easy and the Prof ok regardless of what everyone says here.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: Gary Riser is in no way a good teacher. I have no doubt that he knows what he's at(where he's been at it so long) but he is very unclear in lectures. Instead of pointing out useful tips or giving little side notes, he just keeps drawing graphs. I'm finished his course and can say that I literally did not learn a single thing because of his teaching

Name: Gary Riser
Review: I took Gary Riser's class my first semester at MUN with. Without any exaggeration, he is a terrible teacher. Hardly anything he did in class was on the tests. Tests are long and difficult. In order to pass his class you must teach yourself from the book and study guide and use my econ lab. If you can't study or teach yourself material dont take him

Name: Gary Riser
Review: This is technical course.  You are required to arrive at percentages for analysis of some graphs.  It will require a lot of your time.  Best tip I can provide you is to study the learning objectives for each chapter and carefully analyze the figures (graphs). Dr. Riser is great professor and he promptly answers questions online.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: Didnt learn anything off the prof, 100% unclear and learned everything from the book. "In terms of".

Name: Gary Riser
Review: Terrible, terrible, terrible course! I've had good experiences with distance courses to date however this course completely lacked structure and organization. There was no textbook and the manual provided was garbage. The material did not adequately prepare you for the exams. No sample problems were provided.  Do not take this by distance!!!

Name: Gary Riser
Review: Terrible instructor. The course notes are completely useless - they are written for economists, not for introductory students. Painful to read. The exams are really tough (60% class average? Something's not right) and there are no assignments, just exams. Exams focus on small details, not overall concepts, so know the appendices and sidebars well.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: The notes painful and incomprehensible. Answers provided are not clear.Over all a horrible experience.

Name: Gary Riser
Review: This is a tough course, but professor was clear on expectations and what would be covered on exams. I did this by distance in winter 2012, which was a challenge as you didn't have the day to day class interaction, but professor was online most days and relatively quick to respond to questions. Exams were as advertised. Important to know your graphs

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: Not a fan of her teaching style. Class notes are vague and too casual. Lots of unsupported statements, her notes don't correspond well with text material. Testing does not reflect what is covered in class. Read the text carefully and pay attention to her nonsense notes - she tests on them directly. She is an interesting person!! Too Bad.

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: I liked her, but I didn't love her class. I found her classes a little boring. The content was fairly interesting I just found it hard to pay attention in class. Overall, really wasn't a bad course.

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: Ms. Hannah was a great prof! I would recommend her to everyone! Maade the lecture very interesting and gave great class notes.

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: This prof is pretty awesome. I will definitely take another class with her. She is very nice and tries to make the lecture interesting. Would definitely recommend her! Exams are pretty easy.

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: She is a great prof! One of my favouites professors, I will definitely take another class of hers. Her slides usually include summarized information from the class. She is always specific to what information the exams will include and is great at answering questions, she loves feedback.

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: Great prof. Sounds like the bat on Anastasia. Go to class because some slides are in her lectures that do not need to be studied for the midterms. She appreciates student feedback about her course and is very helpful. Read the text though, this course covers a huge amount of material.

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: Kept me entertained, very high energy, kept everything interesting. She took a lot of feedback from the class, the exams were very specific to what she taught and told us to read. Excellent prof, can't wait to take another class with her!

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: This woman is like, 60 or older maybe and has no shame. She is so funny it is impossible, read an email a student sent her about squirting (didn't identify the student of course) but the entire class was crying with laughter I'm sure. She tells you what classes you can just read the book and not come to. Brought sex toys to class. Enough said.

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: I found this Prof to be alright but nothing special and I found she was very bright but I didn't really enjoy the class material

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: EXCELLENT prof! She knows her stuff and loves to share it with whomever is willing to listen. In order to get a 90 in the course you must read the book and attend class. She mentions things in class that are not in the text but do pop up on exams. Highly recommended course!

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: She isnt the friendliest teacher ever! VERY intimidating, and she's an old woman.  The tests were fairly easy, very good notes (although sometimes very confusing).  Interesting course overall, but she could have made it a lot more fun!  She is very cranky & god forbid you have to leave during class or your phone goes off.

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: Highly recommend this prof. She does go through slides fairly quickly, a good idea to print them before class, and she makes it clear that they are a supplement to the book..not meant to follow the book exactly.Very interested in student opinion, esp during class. Exams are difficult, but fair and reasonable for a 3000 level course. Great class.

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: Very good professor,  lots of examples, went through concepts in detail. Emphasizes major course points. Dislikes interruptions to class in the form of ringing cell phones, distracting computer screens, and people disrupting the class while leaving the room.

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: Attendance is mandatory in this class very little comes from the text the notes are everything. If you want a proff who respects students and speaks to them as peers and equals, look ELSEWHERE.

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: she made sexual behavior boring..ugg i hated going to class cause i was always so bored

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: good prof, clear speaking and good notes. come to class as alot of random stuff can be onthe test. the tests/ exams are fairly hard so make sure you study.

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: Great psychology prof! She's very funny, and the class is very interesting. She's clear. Print off the notes beforehand because she goes through her powerpoints VERY quickly. Exams were quite difficult. I reccommend her, though!

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: nice person but extremely boring and makes REALLY hard tests. boring prof for a boring course

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: She's sweet, and always cheerful. I dont know why people say she's mean, she never once got mad. The class is really interesting, and she's really funny! You need to read the text and notes, but it's easy because it's all so interesting!

Name: Elena Hannah
Review: She Does not seem to want to teach .... out of three hours a week we were with her she had "discussion" group one day and "presentation day" on another. A Teacher is supposed to TEACH! She expected us to write on everything that was in the book, despite that her questions were specific and directed towards one topic. I wouldnt reccomend her.

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: Worst professor I ever had. Only do a course by him if you absolutely have to and even then beware. As others have said, arrogant, patronizing, and petty. Worst experience ever at MUN.

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: Easily the worst professor I've ever encountered, at Memorial and elsewhere. I was deeply disappointed by Dr. Sweeney. The subject matter was incredible, you couldn't ask for a more original and important history of this country. But him? He is  arrogant, condescending, vindictive, and petty. Unbelievable and inexcusable behaviour.

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: I will admit that there were a couple moments that I did enjoy Sweeny as a prof, but those moments were very few and far apart. Majority of the time I found him rude, condescending and uncaring. Although, he doesn't believe in exams which was a plus, he made up for it by being a hard marker. Take if you have to but be ready to work.

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: He's really interested in and loves what he does in reference to history, but teaching is a no. One of the worst courses i've taken at mun. He told me specifically what he wanted on a paper and when I got the paper back he told me i should have spoken to him about what he wanted? The man is all over the place. Avoid it if you can

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: Everyone gives Professor Sweeny a hard time, but he actually isn't a bad professor at all. I've had him for three classes, and I find that while he is a challenging marker, he really pushes you to think about history in a different light. I've learned so much from him. Despite what people think he does care about students.

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: Not the best teacher I've had. He rambles a lot and when he wants to be mean, he can shoot you down like a pro. Didn't feel he was very supportive at all. I only give him some credit because he gave us wine and cheese during our last class and there was no exam.

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: This professor is by far the worst I have EVER experienced in my whole three years at this university. He is VERY unclear of what he wants. If you do not have EXACTLY what he wants in a paper - forget about it. He does not care or help students AT ALL. His lectures are POINTLESS. The online quizzes and discussions are ridiculous . AVOIDDDDD

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: Sweeney is by far the absolute worst prof I have had in my whole undergrad degree. He does not give one concern for his students, he expects way too much from a second year course, and assignments every week is a bit much. This man literally made me contemplate dropping out of university all together. Simply the worst,  get off your high horse!

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: Great prof...  don't believe everything you read online.

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: AVOID if possible. Lectures are very dry, there's quizzes every week, and it was NEVER clear what this professor wanted from his students.. Major thumbs down.

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: Avoid him at all costs. His lectures are dull and his assignments extremely unreasonable.. He is not clear with what he wants from you on assignments and I wonder if he even knows what he wants. I am a fourth year history major and had I taken this my first year it would have been enough to turn me off of History for good.

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: Robert has sincerely good intentions and challenges his students to become better historians, often succeeding. However, he's saddled by an intermittent temper and his occasional nasty, excessively personal comments to students can be upsetting. Be prepared to stick up for yourself, but a class with Robert is an experience you'll cherish- trust me!

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: I'm in my fourth year at MUN, and he is the worst prof I've ever had to date. I would have never taken this course if I knew how terrible this class was.

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: You know what, this course is a commitment. If you are the type of student that gets lazy half way through the semister, don't take this course. I also don't recommend him to new students, even second year students. If you are willing to do the required work every week he is reasonable and most definitely not horrible!!

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: He loves the textbook and D2L, if you're going to take this course from him might as well take it as a distance course because it's basically the same thing. Hard marker, rude if you don't agree with him and rambles a lot. No exam but lots of quizzes. Wouldn't have taken the course had I known how dull he was.

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: He easy to get along with.helps his students whenever he can but only help you if he thinks you will fail the course.Hard marker,very cynical,critical of the text, be careful what u say on D2L discussion .He  walked out of class one time. take him if you need to nothing else

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: worst professor ever, his the poster child for quebec serparation. well if life so better there then why don't you move back!!!!

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: The reviews seem to follow a consistency of favoritism to those who do well in his course. Not necessarily a bad trait were it not for the fact that to do well you have to follow his own opinion to a t! He takes anyones lack of interest or success in his course personally and penalizes students for it. NOT RECOMMENDED AT ALL!

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: This is my second time through a course with Robert, and my opinion of him has only improved. He is considerate, kind, helpful and constructive, he has comprehensive knowledge of his field, and his emphasis on method is invaluable to any student of history. He can be demanding, but is never unreasonable. The definition of a great history professor.

Name: Robert Sweeney
Review: horrible proof. Really made me question if I wanted to continue a history degree. Wasn't helpful and very rude. Dropped the course half way though because I could not handle him anymore. seriously.. dont take him!!I wish I would of taken his reviews here more seriously!

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: Took this class online (ECON 201) and received over an 85%. Listen to the SAPling and do your assignments. Literally the SAPling assignments are the same questions on the exam (just in different wording). If you are not prepared to teach yourself then don't take the online version as most of it was listening to the videos. Great class!

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: Taking a class online with Shaun has been disastrous. He does not actually build his own lectures online, just relies on Sapling to deliver assignments, leaving us to read the textbook. The textbook barely helped me out and I was forced to go to the internet for a lot of help. His midterm and final exams were tragic.

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: Shaun was pretty good in general. Sometimes the grading felt unnecessarily nit-picky and expectations were not always as clear as they should've been, but nothing so bad that you couldn't manage.

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: As long as you plan out when to do the assignments in time for the deadline its easy He helps you via email as long as you genuinely attempted the questions first. The only critique I have is that the textbook has very basic examples but the assignments are significantly harder so you have to teach yourself through trial and error most of the time

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: Excellent professor, that knows the subject very well.  I like that he has job experience and relates his lectures to real life examples.  Very fair when grading and he makes sure that he does everything he can to make his students understand his lectures and learn during the process.

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: His exams are hard and long. One short question is one page long. I wouldn't recommend this prof and will avoid him in future!

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: Good prof.  Does his best to engage the class.  The 3 hour class would go until a bit over 2 hours which was nice.  Exams are simple (do the in-class examples and you're good to go).  Only issue was the "assignment".  Was always called assignmt then at the review he said "most treated this like an assignmt, it was supposed to be a research paper."

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: If you are an econ major, this is a good prof to take as he actually makes you do the math which is a huge part of econ, yet so many profs skip over it. It does mean you will have to work relatively harder, though, as you must truly learn and apply concepts. If you are not an econ major and/or don't like math and/or want an easy grade, avoid.

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: Very knowledgeable about the subject. He explains the material well and makes it relatable. The assignments were not difficult and helped my understanding. The tests were difficult and he expected you to know the material very well and was not very forgiving with the marking, but it was not unfair. Would take another class from him.

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: Of all the economics classes I have taken, this one has been the best. He clearly explains concepts and applies it to real-life situations. The assignments were easy, but helpful. 80% of the course was midterm and final. I would recommend.

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: Shaun is very passionate about economics. Goes through a great deal of material. Expects students to be able to grasp concepts rather than memorizing material. Weekly assignments are easy grades, midterm was tough but good studying and preparation make it easier. Very long classes with no breaks. Assuming the textbook would help but didn't buy it.

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: I think he is a great guy and loves Economics! I was intimidated at the beginning with the course load. But if you put some time to it it is well worth it and you WILL LEARN A LOT! He marks very fairly and puts in a lot of prep work to his classes - it is evident through and through.... Will recommend!

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: Shaun has a day job, so his lectures are always evenings. He is passionate about economics and it shows in class. He had notes nearly every class which are NOT in the textbook, so don't skip class. His exams are real-life examples and not similar to the assignments on MyEconLab. The best way to get extra help is to email him; he responds quickly.

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: Tough prof and a tough class. There are 17 assignments online that reflect the textbook well but don't help at all with the exams. Shaun is good at answering questions but he expects you to know material way beyond the realm of a 200 level class. Your grade will not reflect the countless hours you spend on homework for this class.

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: I felt the course info he reviewed at each class was not helpful when it came time to complete the midterm and final.  He lectures the entire 3 hours and there is no interaction, boring!! His exams did not reflect the weekly tests we were given. Worst class and Prof so far!

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: He is a very good speaker and can keep your attention for the entire three hour night class. Explained the concepts clearly and was approachable. Would recommend to anyone who hasn't taken an econ class

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: I wouldn't recommend him.

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: I found this class to be extremely frustrating!!! Even though I passed, I found the prof to be very hard to approach and favoured the engineers in the class always making jokes about how smart the engineers are. I was very discouraged.

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: Shaun covers a lot of material in his lectures so make sure to attend class. The class requires hard work as the exams are difficult. Overall I enjoyed the class and Shaun explained everything very well. Quickly responds to any questions that you may have.

Name: Shaun Augustin
Review: Probably one of the worst prof's at the university. Goes way to fast through the notes, uses whiteboard markers that don't work and won't get new ones. Tells the class if your not smart you will fail the class. Doesn't help when you ask questions regarding assignment or test. DO NOT TAKE A CLASS FROM HIM! Drop the class if you have him!!!!!!

Name: Lori Walker
Review: I've taken Lori's in-person lectures and they are great, her online classes are a different story. SOC 312 had so much reading that it was almost unrealistic. The content was very informative and interesting but there was SO MUCH! Lots of assignments that aren't explained very well but easy enough. Not hard to get a good grade in this class

Name: Lori Walker
Review: Lori's class was fully in person, she doesn't use online resources with in person lectures. Make sure you pay attention during the lectures because she likes test answers to be her definitions, word-for-word. Fantastic prof, loved listening the her

Name: Lori Walker
Review: I dont know what shes been through, but it seems like she gets pleasure for eating peoples souls. I worked so hard on my term paper and my two other smaller papers and she graded them like they were written by her ex. Ive had her before, but something in her mustve snapped in 2019. Btw Im 80% average in my major, but this class is 56.

Name: Lori Walker
Review: really bad professor, no feedback no comments , only one short sentence, and when you ask her question. she will provide no help

Name: Lori Walker
Review: TERRIBLE just TERRIBLE

Name: Lori Walker
Review: DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS. UNBELIEVABLY TERRIBLE INSTRUCTIONS!!! EVERYTHING IS ALL OVER THE PLACE AND IF YOU MIGHT THINK YOU CAN EMAIL HER TO ASK A QUESTION OH BOIIII YOU IS WRONG! SHE WILL GO OFF ON YOU! MAKE YOU FEEL STUPID! AND THEN YOULL BE LIKE OK ILL FIND IT AND NOPE ITS NOT THERE SO YOU JUST SEND IT WITH THE ASSIGNMENTS!

Name: Lori Walker
Review: DROP WHILE YOU CAN, SO UNFAIR, SO UNREASONABLE, MARKS SO HARD, IF YOU WANT YOUR GPA TO DROP THEN TAKE HER CLASS. SO MANY ASSIGNMENTS AND TERM PAPERS ALL 10 PAGES AND HER FINALS ARE SO HARD. DO NOT TAKE ANY OF HER CLASSES

Name: Lori Walker
Review: HORRIBLE! super tough, is not clear on assignments whatsoever, replies to emails but doesn't help at all. Super rude and gives horrible marks. DO NOT RECOMMEND taking her class unless you are looking for 50s and 60s.

Name: Lori Walker
Review: Do not take this class! The grades given on assignments and papers are well below average even if you are a good student. If you do take the class then expect grades in the 60s or lower.

Name: Lori Walker
Review: The best prof I've ever had. She is caring, passionate, and very well educated. She makes her expectations clear and explains the concepts well. She also tells you exactly what is going to be on the tests. You do have to go to the lectures as she does not have PowerPoints and does not post notes. There is no urcourses either. Go to class.

Name: Lori Walker
Review: Lori is an inspirational prof, one that makes you want to make a change in the world. She has no textbook and no urcourses for her class, so you MUST show up. Her lectures can be quite unstructured as she goes back on forth on points and goes on story tangents. She also marks very tough, write as much as you can for every question to get full marks

Name: Lori Walker
Review: Lori was a very knowledgeable prof. Her lectures were very opinion based. There were no assignments but 3 Midterms and a Final. Gave very detailed review but expected WORD for WORD answers. If defintions were not her words from the lectures, she would not give full marks. Start studying for exams early

Name: Lori Walker
Review: Lori is incredibly inspirational and I absolutely loved her class. She tells you exactly what will be on the exam and what to study. If you actually show up to classes, study what she tells you, and remember key words, you're golden. I would definitely take another class with her.

Name: Lori Walker
Review: Super tough grader, hands out grading criteria after assignments are handed in, and the gives little feedback on assignments.

Name: Lori Walker
Review: I've taken two classes with Lori before and loved them both. This class was online and I definitely prefer a face-to-face class with her. This one was hard to reach her, she didn't engage with the class. Didn't really give good instructions or feedback on assignments. Wouldn't take an online class with her again.

Name: Lori Walker
Review: Lori is a really nice person but her lectures are very hard to pay attention to as she has no pps or notes. and to make it harder she goes off on rants 100 times every class so you never know if the rant is a part of the class or just her telling a story. her exams are regurgitating definitions so hopefully you read the text book a bunch of times.

Name: Lori Walker
Review: Lori is obviously very passionate about the topics she teaches. She is very opinionated and rarely uses the textbook. She relates theories to personal stories which I find helpful. She tells you exactly what will be on the exam, however you need to know word-for-word, the definition she gives you. When in doubt, write more!!!!!

Name: Lori Walker
Review: Lori is a great, but opinionated prof. You are graded on a midterm, 10 page paper and a final. She tells you EVERYTHING that will be on the tests. The research paper wasnt to hard because you pick whatever topic you want. Go to class as she points out important topics. Memorize her defintions since this is what she looks for on tests.

Name: Lori Walker
Review: A strong and disciplined, yet understanding and caring and empathetic person. She wants her students to succeed, and will help you do that, if she sees effort on the students part. A human rights activist, and former crime analyst, she uses real world examples, while explaining formatting of an essay. Makes it enlightening and not so boring.

Name: Lori Walker
Review: I loved Lori! She was so passionate. She followed the textbook nicely and highlighted only what you needed to know. The material was very interesting. Lori told us everything to know for the midterms and final and there were no surprises. As long as you study you'll do fine, I got over a 95 on both midterms. Just memorize definitions and concepts.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: He is not a good "teacher". This isn't a judgement on him personally but of his ability to teach you economics. He writes notes that are unclear and does not spend time explaining concepts so that one can understand them. He is one of the professors that I would avoid at all costs.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: Terrible, Avoid taking him if possible.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: If your goal is to learn something but not just pass the class, avoid this old prof. If you wanna pass the class with a good grade, ask for pass paper, i consider myself as a good student, so i didn't use pass paper than i got 60% . I know myself deserve so much more than that.... I went the wrong way, now is your choice.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: These people are all lazy buisness students. If you take this course its an absolute breeze. Make sure to take clear notes and reread them in full before Exams. I think people do badly in this class because they dont know that theres a good amount of math involved in economics.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: He shows up 10 minuets before class and  begins writing on a CHALK BOARD, so even if you show up on time good luck getting all the notes. His assignments are very unclear and marked very hard for an intro economics class. His lecture covers SO MUCH MATERIAL that ins't present in midterms. I would not take this prof again, to old school.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: Midterms similar to his old ones which were decent, but tough final. I would recommend to stay away

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: Offers little to no help or assistance with assignments or exams. I attended class everyday, read the textbook, and still cannot decipher what he wants to see for answers. No part marks given, and assignments and expectations are grossly unclear. Avoid this professor if at all possible.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: Went to class everyday and still sitting at a low mark.  Still uses the odd question from old exams but not identical anymore.  Assignments and Final not reflective of notes.  TA gave me answers to assignments yet I still only got 50%.  AVOID THIS PROF

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: I found this class to be not very difficult if you went to all of the classes and read over your notes. The textbook was not used at all the the assignment tutorials were useless.  Exams are on URSU and the assignment were pretty easy except they had nothing to do with the exams.  Overall not a bad class just be sure to get the notes if you miss.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: Awesome. Most people do not realize that he only has 2 assignments which are in the library and he has 5 different midterms which are all on URSU in the old exams section. I never went to class. If you don't want to miss class take it with a friend and go on alternate days to accumulate notes. Text book is not very useful.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: This is the best professor, I have ever had.  Students must understand that they must attend every session and take notes.  He has always answered my questions.  While in the class, don't go on to the social media websites and do texting.  He will ignore you for the rest of your days.  He had clear this rule from the day one.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: Alright class. Lots of notes, but only two assignments and two midterms. You have to go to class everyday but they go by pretty fast. Don't bother with the textbook - I never used it. His notes are enough to study from and do well.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: I recommend avoiding this teacher. Take the class from someone whom is more understandable and reachable. He tells students he will not answers questions or return emails the week before the exam. Very unhelpful and everything I have learnt has been self taught through the textbook.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: Absolutely awful. So far I've kept my grades up, but only because I went to the SI to do the assignments and found practice midterms with the exact same questions. Do not take this prof if you can help it. You waste an hour every class just writing notes instead of learning the subject.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: The worst prof. He is a very hard to understand,never use textbook or projector,or the urcourses webste. He just write 30min. The explain 10 min. Then keep writing. Very poor class.   ECON201

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: Just be loud and clearer! and talk about assignments before hand.... also assignment should contain material that we covered in class

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: The easy A grade ever.  I took the advice from senior students.  I attended every class, and took notes.  Yes, I got tired by writing his notes.  His exam questions were straight forward, and came right from the notes.  So, no tricks were involved  Thanks Prof. Dar.

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: horrible prof, doesnt teach just writes notes, assignments are hard and the final is very hard! do not take!

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: I'll give you some advice.... don't take a class from this guy!  Trust me

Name: Fazal Dar
Review: The easiest going professor ever.

Name: Harold Weger
Review: You will write constantly for the whole lecture. Writing is quite messy so show up to lecture so you know what is going on. Practice quizzes on UR Courses are VERY helpful for the midterms. Cracks jokes sometimes. Final exam was quite difficult

Name: Harold Weger
Review: Harold is a real gem! Had him for several courses now and he's by far my favourite prof. He writes his notes on the board so it's fairly easy to keep up. However, those are just the skeleton so you do have to listen to what he says while he's writing for everything to make sense and to take good notes in his class. If you do that you're golden.

Name: Harold Weger
Review: He writes his notes during lecture super fast so if you're a fast writer/typer you'll be fine. He does post them after his lectures though in case you miss anything. The exams are all based on lecture notes so if you study the info and do the practice quizzes that he posts, you'll be fine. Studying is important to succeed in his class.

Name: Harold Weger
Review: Not the worst prof i've ever had but he was incredibly hard to learn from. posts the notes online but in his writing and it is so terrible that if you don't show up, you will have no idea what he is trying to say. He is very specific which is a plus but i struggled to learn from his teaching style.

Name: Harold Weger
Review: Harold knows the material and makes lectures interesting. Despite this, his notes are scattered and full of bizarre diagrams. His tests are also difficult, and his lectures must be learned down to the smallest detail.

Name: Harold Weger
Review: Throughout 9 years of university of moving on the U of Sask, Harold Weger remains as on of the best professors I had (and Ive had many).

Name: Harold Weger
Review: Harold Weger is a good choice if you need to take BIOL100. He makes things clear and as easy as possible. However, it was still a fairly difficult class with lots of memorization. He was fair and made the course as easy as possible considering the subject matter.

Name: Harold Weger
Review: Accessible outside of class but his lecture notes can be confusing without the lecture. Only tested on material covered in the lectures. Tricky multiple choices questions. Uses URCOURSES successfully to answer any questions you have and provide abundance of resources including practice quizzes, lecture notes, additional notes and online textbook.

Name: Harold Weger
Review: One of the best Bio profs in the university, I have had him for 3 classes so far. very fair grader, but attendance is a MUST and you have to be able to take good notes beyond what he writes on the board. Dr. Weger definitely knows his stuff about plants, and is fairly decent at teaching about it

Name: Harold Weger
Review: Terrible

Name: Harold Weger
Review: I found this class very difficult for my first year of Biology. In high school i loved Biology and passed all my tests with flying colours. Although i understand University is much harder, i found Weger to be my worst prof. His notes are insanely messy and all over the place and the course was very disorganized. Hope i don't EVER have to take again

Name: Harold Weger
Review: notes are all over the place, jumps back and forth between topics, too many random messy diagrams. awful.

Name: Harold Weger
Review: Dr. Weger is a great person, but his writing can be very difficult to read and his notes, I find, are quite unorganized. He'll refer back to topics multiple times (which is nice for reviewing purposes) but I'll have a few headings for the same topic, which can be confusing when reviewing for a midterm/final. Overall, a funny and nice prof.

Name: Harold Weger
Review: He's a good prof and explains a lot of things well. He's a pretty good guy to take as one of your profs, especially when trying to make the transition from high school to university with all the 100-level classes. Make sure to study the diagrams and use them on the exam- he loves those.

Name: Harold Weger
Review: Harold is a good guy, but at times his lectures were disorganized. To pass the exams, you need to put a lot of time into studying (Diagrams had to be detailed on tests).

Name: Harold Weger
Review: Amazing prof! I love his diagrams and after this class I actually enjoy plants! I wish there was a plant physiology two it was so great.

Name: Harold Weger
Review: Don't waste your money buying the textbook. Everything you need to know for the tests are in the lecture notes so just show up to class. Do not leave studying for the last minute or you won't do well. If you study hard you can do well in this class. Sometimes the lectures are not well organized but if you take all the notes, you'll do fine.

Name: Harold Weger
Review: His exams are pretty easy, but so much content, which makes studying pretty hard and not something you can do last minute. As a prof, he makes way too many useless diagrams and is very unorganized. Jumped back and forth between topics and goes very fast when writing them down. Okay for first year but wouldn't consider him again

Name: Harold Weger
Review: Nice guy but his lectures are hard to follow. Not very organized when it comes to his lectures, lots of jumping back and forth. Didn't use the textbook at all. There was 2 midterms and a final which were all fairly easy if you paid attention and studied. Looking back at your notes was confusing but he posts written notes that were extremely helpful

Name: Harold Weger
Review: I can see that he is a good prof. However in bio100 the lectures are somewhat unorganized because the topics goes back and forth. Also, in the midterms you dont get to know exactly which topic will be given because he wants you to know it yourself and end up studying all of the context thats not even in the exam. No homeworks at all.

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: Always made class interesting. He did his lectures almost like he was performing on a stage which I enjoyed. 1 paper, 1 midterm and a final exam. He makes sure you are prepared for exams - tells you exactly whats on it and no surprises. He gives specific instructions for the paper and exams. Easy credit. Would recommend.

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: His lectures were good and he clearly know what he is talking about but Roberts weird way of grading exams makes it incredibly hard to get a good mark. You must attend class, he does not accommodate if you miss and he is no help if you ask questions via email. Refused to put text on reserve at library because he believes we should have to buy it.

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: Not a terribly hard class but the midterm is sort of ridiculous. There is simply not enough time to properly answer his questions. There's also a 10 page paper but isn't that hard to do well on. He's also probably the most arrogant professor I've encountered in university yet.

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: -he tells you the subject of exam questions (which are all essays, so try not to take the M/W/F 50 min class, because you will run out of time and it's a tough grade scale) -DO NOT SKIP or you will fail because it is mostly lecture based and he doesn't use slides or URcourses, also i would suggest taking notes on a computer because he goes quickly

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: Robert's lectures are very interesting and he is passionate about what he teaches, but you have to be ready to write down everything he says word for word. He only uses essay question tests and he doesn't even mark them the TA does and they have a master copy of what he's looking for and if you don't basically have it the exact same, you will fail

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: Doesn't use UR courses, and the lectures are super heavy. It's an interesting class, but not one you want to pick to be your last class on a long day. It's very intense. He's a tougher grader, and the assignments are weighed heavy. But he's interesting to listen to, and explains things really well. There's a 10 page research paper, so plan well.

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: This class was terrible. Would definitely not recommend this class as an elective. You have to regurgitate all the information he says in class (on broad topics) or you will not do well. The midterms and finals are only essay questions and it is almost impossible to bring your grade up if you do bad on the first midterm. 10/10 do not recommend!

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: He is the worst professor. If you are taking sociology as an elective and you desire to better your gpa score then i must say he would be the wrong choice for you unless you like the old fashioned method of teaching because he would never post any materials on u r courses and would make it more difficult for you. i am regretting

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: get ready for writing in class, easy lectures,

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: Don't take Robert's class if you're looking for an easy elective. It's difficult to do well because so few things are graded, the midterm and final require you to regurgitate all the lecture notes and readings in a history timeline fashion. The first two thirds of the class was good but he has outdated research, especially on exercise + vaccines.

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: Pretty hard to do good in. Not enough things graded to increase your mark so it's almost all or nothing. Midterm/final should be marked on how well u understand material but instead was marked on how similar it was to his sample key which is pretty hard when its long answer and on a VERY broad topic. Hard to do well, not worth it. I'd avoid!!!!!!

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: Show up for half the lectures, or if you really want, just the ones the week before the exams to get the exam q's. Regurgitate what you read in the textbook and what he says in class and you'll be fine. He grades the term paper harder than the exams. If this is what an average sociology class is like, majoring in it must be a joke. Steer clear.

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: Easy to take notes in class because he repeats what he said. Textbook is definitely necessary for the final. Overall, decent class.

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: Be ready to write in his class, but he is very easy to listen to because he knows his stuff. Very theory based. He is really good for repeating his sentences in lecture to make sure you get down the information

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: Robert is an awesome prof! This class is so interesting and super worth taking. Take lots of notes and study hard for the exams and you'll do well!

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: Robert for sure knows his stuff. But if you want to pass you will have to go and actually write down everything he says as it is quite lecture-heavy. Also be prepared to read as his essay based tests may contain topics not covered in class that you will have to read. Overal he is a great prof that I would take another class from again.

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: If you like challenge you love him. His midterms and Finals are essay based. Meaning he does not do multiple choice, short answer etc. Only essays. But he gives a clear outline on the topics of the questions so you have a more directed time studying. Lectures are interesting and heavy. Pay attention and show up! Hes a great prof.

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: Love his lectures, talks slow and repeats himself for the important stuff and writes key words on the board. Gives a good outline for the midterms and final

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: He's good in that he really knows his stuff, and I found his lectures really interesting BUT keeping up with his lecture is difficult and he's a ridiculously tough marker - unless you say WORD FOR WORD what he wants you to say on the midterm/final/paper you're screwed. He's right, you're wrong, period. The essay outline is also extremely vague .

Name: Robert Biezenski
Review: This class is one of my favourites, and prof Biezenski taught very well. He repeats himself which helps when taking notes and his lectures are definitely interesting!

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Dr. Sharpe is an excellent prof. Ive taken four of his classes and would recommend them to everyone! Lectures are interesting and tests are relatively easy. Just show up to lectures and take good notes. Hes one of the best PSYCH profs at the University.

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Don is an incredible prof, his lectures are hilarious and keep your attention. No computers allowed and he doesn't post his slides. Literally write down everything the man says, all examples, all names. His tests are MC + short answer Review notes the night before and you'll be fine. Easy assignments. Accommodating & really cares about his students

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Don is a great prof "and so on and so forth". He posts nothing online so show up to class and write down absolutely everything. As long as you show up and write good notes, the class is a breeze. MC questions on midterms can be challenging if you missed class as all the questions are based exactly on what he mentions in class.

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: I enjoyed his teaching and the things he taught, he is also a pretty funny guy. but the multiple choice on his tests are impossible and hard to understand.. There were two midterms and a final. 5 assignments worth 1% each, just for participation. He puts the examples that he used in class on the test. make sure your write everything down!!

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Don makes stats easy! Just take a breather, and listen to him and follow the formulas. He does an excellent job at explaining and applying real examples.

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: He's a nice enough guy and means well by his students, but his testing criteria needs serious review. His tests are littered with questions pertaining to obscure stories and random anecdotes he shares in class. You better write down everything he says because anything he says could be on the test. Not a very valid method of testing. Oh the irony.

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Two midterms and a final, all noncomulative. To do well on his tests, write down literally everything he says in class, even if it may seem irrelevant, and then study all of that for the test. No textbook for the course. He is one of my favourite professors. There are five mini assignments worth 1% each but they are just for completion marks.

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Loved this prof and course! Don is funny and and tries to make things as easy as possible so his students can succeed. He doesn't post notes online so come to class and take good notes and you will be fine for the exams. Final is non comprehensive except for one question that was very general and easy to answer if you attended lectures and such.

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Most incredible professor ever!

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Don is a nice and accommodating professor, but his class was unexpectedly very difficult.
