He does not post slides online, most of his test questions are based on class examples/videos (and minor/all the details of them) I wrote all the key concepts in class, examples, and studied lots and still managed to get a bad grade. Don't recommend.

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Entertaining lectures, such a funny and witty guy, keeps you interested on the topic. He is very passionate about Psychology. Make sure you listen well and take good notes, all info is from what he says (slideshows are just pictures and titles). Mini assignments worth 1% each and non-cumulative midterms/final make up your mark! :) highly recommend

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: He's a nice guy and I usually like him as a prof but not for this class, especially for the lab! The lab was the hardest thing I've ever done since he gives no instructions. The paper was bad to but he marks easy. The midterms and final were LONG and difficult. He also gives lots of readings to do. Definitely not planning on taking him again.

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Don is a really nice guy but is one of my least favourite profs. He spends a ton of time making jokes and telling stories but he doesn't do a great job of explaining concepts. I'm a psych honours student and Don's class was my worst mark ever (out of ALL of the classes I have taken). Do the readings and know all of the people's names he talks about

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Don is amazing! He is practically a celebrity amongst the Psych majors as he is able to take any content and make it funny and enjoyable to learn. He is very witty and kind. He makes coming to class not a waste of time and is always very accommodating to meet outside of lecture. If you want a prof who can brighten your day, take his class.

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Great prof. Would definitely take another class with him. Although I don't appreciate how questions about random stories he tells in class or examples he shares show up on the exams. You never know what he might test you on so jot down everything he says unless he specifically points out not to write something down. Hilarious guy though!

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Don is a decent prof. 2 MTs and a cumulative final exam. He did not have a required textbook and had us refer to his notes therefore ATTENDANCE IS A MUST! I think he's pretty straight-forward when it comes to his expectations. But he does ask a Few "trick" q's and he does ask questions about the examples he shares in class so take some notes.

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: Dr. Sharpe is fantastic! He was hilarious in class and made the notes and material interesting.  Attendance is a must as he doesn't post notes, but if you do miss you can copy his lecture notes (basically just copies of his slides).  Weekly mini assignments, midterm and non-cumulative final.  Great class, greater prof!!

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: He's the funniest prof I've had! Psych 204 really isn't that interesting a class, but he actually made it better than I thought it would be. His tests definitely require studying, but there are no surprises or trick questions on them. Unfortunately he doesn't post notes, so you have to go to class.

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: He's hilarious! I found his assignments interesting, his tests were clear, and I actually enjoyed his lectures! The only thing I didn't like was that he gives a lot of examples instead of definitions, and he asks for definitions on his tests so you'll have to look many up on your own. But really great prof!

Name: Don Sharpe
Review: He is a very nice guy. He is funny and make the class so much fun. However, he does not explain the math part of the course thoroughly enough! the theory part of the both midterms and final was brutal! Overall, you need to do some self-teaching if you wish to pass.

Name: John Conway
Review: Pretty good prof. Definitely knows his stuff. Reading was a bit excessive - 4 books for the class - but that is expected in a 400 level course. Gave midterm questions out in advance for you to prepare, which is nice. Speaks in a very monotone voice sometimes so can be hard to pay attention, but pay attention to the material, it's interesting!

Name: John Conway
Review: I don't know why people are saying this class is hard/boring. Dr. Conway is one the most intelligent people at the university. He puts everything you need (including midterm answers) online, and all your readings too. You pass just for trying to write the midterm. He also has many interesting stories. He also answers questions, but you need to ask!

Name: John Conway
Review: Great professor, had him for soc 100 as well. If you aren't a soc student his 299 class will be weird for you but if you are, you are in for a helluva class! SOOO good. SOOO interesting. I took it over a year ago and things that I learned in that auditorium still float through my mind on a daily basis. Great man, great prof, great class.

Name: John Conway
Review: Conway is truly one of the old masters at the U of R. He has a wealth of experience in his area and uses it tell useful related stories. He will not give you the answers but he will give you the tools to come to the answers yourself, isn't that what university is about?

Name: John Conway
Review: The class is like a puzzle. He throws puzzle pieces at you during class and then you have to try and put them all together for the midterm. Gives seemingly irrelevant info. Hard to follow. Theory class, yet has only one correct answer. 1/3 of class failed first midterm. 6 textbooks. Final worth 50%. I have a 3.7 GPA and am almost failing the class.

Name: John Conway
Review: Sociology of Mental Illness. This is the first time this class has been offered. I was very interested prior to taking it, but am currently almost failing and not from lack of trying, had to follow, very hard for a 200 class. Never take this class with him. If it is offered with someone else teaching go for it.

Name: John Conway
Review: Great class. He pratically gave you the midterm/final questions and the answers. No term paper, but a few essay questions on the midterm and final. Very interesting content, I actually liked going to this class. I would definitely recommend Conway.

Name: John Conway
Review: Boring and hard to follow. Knows his stuff but doesn't care enough to make it interesting.. If it weren't for the seminar leader giving us the answers not many people would pass

Name: John Conway
Review: Professor Conway was an awesome prof, he was also very funny when he wanted to be. Class is easy if you take notes in class and take his hints on his website. Lectures for the most part were boring, and the case study sucked; but overall it was a generally good class.  I reccomend it.

Name: John Conway
Review: Conway was very enjoyable. Not always clear during lectures, but if you're always there, it'll eventually make sense. No online component to the class. Marks are easy to get, but TAs can be strict. He will re-read if there is an issue. Text is a bit of a bore, not necessary to pass, but read it if you want 80+. Highly recommended.

Name: John Conway
Review: I really liked Conway he was funny and really new his stuff. Tests are easy as long as you read the hints. The seminars were good too.

Name: John Conway
Review: Decent prof. Knows the material well and cares. I got along with him good. Like everyone else on here said- take the hints off the web and in class lectures. Lectures suck- but a couple were pretty cool. He is an easy marker compared to interns, so get a re-read on tests. Final was easy- go to his office, he will give you more hints and shortcuts.

Name: John Conway
Review: NEVER take a class from him. His lectures were completely pointless, and you had no idea what to take notes on because his teaching was all over the place. Take the website hints, skim the texts, but don't even bother with the classes and you'll be fine. But yeah, the classes sucked HARD.

Name: John Conway
Review: I spent most of this class doodling in my notebook, or not even showing up, and I still managed to get good grades. The seminars sucked so badly. Tests were easy if you took the hints, a lot of reading outside class and a LOT of notetaking involved because it is all lecture with no aids.

Name: John Conway
Review: Conway loves his subject and has all aspects of the material down by heart. Class averages were very low (50%'s), but that's due to the T.A.'s hard marking. Conway will re-read tests and often change those marks. Class requires some critical thinking & textbook reading. I would reccommend this class, lectures were thought provoking.

Name: John Conway
Review: Conways is not terrible. It's the TA's that are ridiculous. They mark like drill sargents.  The amount of resubmitted exams was insane, and thank goodness Conway always increased the mark upon his own judgement.  Class lectures were interesting though.

Name: John Conway
Review: Meh. Pretty  boring. But the tests are pretty easy if you study and TAKE THE HINTS OFF THE INTERNET is the biggest thing. I managed to get a 90% on one of his tests. Just read the text book for sure, and take his hints.

Name: John Conway
Review: OK, not a bad prof by any means, he goes off on tangents sometimes, but for the most part you will understand his main ideas. Only problem is all oral lectures so get a recorder or a laptop, no WEBCT. Also start reading his case study the minute you get it. NOT terribly tough but not extremely easy either. A solid Meh

Name: John Conway
Review: Honestly, I showed up for 3 classes and finished with a 78. Read his hints on his website and study the stuff he tells you to. If you do that you'll pull off good marks easily. Also look at past exams on the student database, he likes to re-use questions. If you follow these steps there's no reason you shouldn't at least pull a 70.

Name: John Conway
Review: Warning: this class requires you read Conway's massive piece of garbage, "The West". Possibly the worst thing I've ever read. Utterly biased, dense and incredibly dull. Far closer to propaganda than an objective treatment of the material. I'm not sure if he actually calls Romanow the spawn of Satan, but he gets close.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Dr. Weir's lectures were always fun to attend. She told a lot of stories, and made lectures fun. The course was of 44% final, 28% midterm 1, and 28% midterm 2. The exams weren't comprehensive - once an exam was over, you could forget everything about it. This sounds nice, but there is a LOT of content in each, more than an intro course should have.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Susan is such a great prof, she really cares about her students and her lectures are hilarious with the stories she tells. I would take all of my psych classes from her if I could. Exams are easy IF you study for them. As with all psych classes, memorization is really the only key part of getting a good mark. Great feedback on her term papers.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: She is a hard marker, sometimes unfair and her midterms and final are tough. She gives good lectures and her course is interesting.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Really great prof. Her classes were always very interesting and she is super funny. She teaches from her own notes and doesn't require any textbook reading. I suggest showing up for class because a lot of the things she mentions that are not in the notes show up on tests. Overall, her content is great and she is definitely never boring.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Does not explain assignments well. You will not be given any information about what is on the midterm. Falls behind in lectures and expects us to pick up the slack while she just makes us do group discussions instead of teaching. She has a lot of experience in the field and shares interesting stories but I would not take a course with her again.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Susan is awesome! She teaches a lot of real life lessons and her exams are clearly outlined by her. You can literally talk to her whenever and she'll always boost your mood. EXTREMELY UNDERSTANDING!

Name: Susan Weir
Review: She has funny stories, but doesnt keep track of time and falls behind in lectures. Never sure what will be on the exam, can be a pointless detail that she mentioned once and if you didnt hear it or was not there good luck getting it right

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Susan is a treat, hands down one of the best profs Ive had the pleasure of learning from. Is very clear on what is expected in the class and is available at any time to assist with any sort of clarification you may need. Makes rather dry content a lots more interesting through personal stories and experiences, which is helpful for science students.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: She was so funny and made the hour fly by without fail. Used lots of detailed examples for everything. Posted study guides for everything that you needed to know for exams before each topic so you could do them as you go. Overall extremely helpful and fun to listen to.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Dr. Weir is very funny, but also has had many life experiences which she refers to often in her lectures. She is very knowledgable in psychology and the lectures are very easy to follow along with. The exams are also clearly laid out for the most part, which is very nice and helpful. I would take another class taught by Weir.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Amazing prof, had her for two psychology class and its an easy way to get good marks. Psyc 220 you only get to do 1 paper, 1 midterm and a final and the final is usually on the last 5 chapters and is pretty easy. Would recommend and her slides are really good

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Susan is very dedicated and knowledgeable. She tries really hard to show everyone how "wild and kooky" she can be, and what a non conformist she is, maybe a bit too hard. Mentioned a history of abuse in her early life. She may be compensating by trying to be "larger than life". Impressive to the impressionable. All around a good prof.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Susan tends to get off track during her lectures but every rabbit trail is peppered with valuable knowledge. She will straight up give you test answers during lectures so SHOW UP TO LECTURES! She genuinely does care about you as students so its worth reaching out if youre struggling/need assistance.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Worst! boring lectures and tough grader. Took the same course with Nicholas Carleton and got an A.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Amazing prof! Would recommend 100%. Yes, you have to put in the work but I mean, you are in university...

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Amazing prof! Her lectures were hilarious

Name: Susan Weir
Review: She's funny but goes on irrelevant rants. Exams were not hard, but strange multiple choice and vague long answer on final. Major paper was disappointing -unclear expectations and no helpful feedback just notes on wording preference. Came off as rude/arrogant when answering students. Easy material but my lowest psych mark due to her marking methods.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: tough grader. 2 midterms and a final. In one of the midterms prof said the class avg was less than 50. If you are passionate abt psych, don't worry abt the reviews just give it a shot. make sure u study small definitions and hints she gives in class and it'll definitely be on exam. mcqs are mostly definitions. "people"important for fill ups

Name: Susan Weir
Review: This was the worst class I have ever taken. Although the material was intersesting the prof would often get off topic and talk about irrlevant life expierinences that didnt relate to class context. Exam were very hard. Only used power point slides and "recommended" us a text book, but said she would never refer to it.

Name: Susan Weir
Review: Had to take susan for Psych 102, psych 210, and psych 230. Found her to be very condescending even to students who always showed up. Tests seem to be half content and half trying to make a spectacle of students that were not present.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Super awesome for lectures. Always keeps your interest. Makes learning fun. Class grade was based on three exams. Grading style is easy but you need to know your material. He's really great if you need questions answered and notices you when you do well. Overall 10/10 would take again!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: He is good at incorporating humor into lecture material, always keeping students laughing. However, his exams are quite difficult. The preparation he gives is fairly minimal

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Nick was by far my favourite prof from all of first year! He's funny, his examples in class are understandable and relatable, and he really makes the class enjoyable. Whenever you can, take a class with this guy and you won't regret it!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: The textbook is given online so you can save some money. Reading through the assigned readings and taking a few notes to look over before the exams worked for me (finished the class with a 90). Show up to class and follow the notes (don't try and take your own notes - he goes too fast) and you should be golden. Always enjoyed his lectures!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Nick is a great prof! Get ready to memorize because you have to memorize a lot of things so that youre prepared for the exams! Midterms and final wasnt that hard but the multiple choice was a little challenging so make sure to pratice the cerego questions very well. Overall, nice class and nice prof!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Nick is a great prof. He is hilarious and engaging throughout all of his lectures. Only 2 midterms and the final. Lots of memorizing and diagrams. Not too challenging, but you need to read textbook to understand concepts.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: First of all, I improved just by skipping his classes. I've learned everything by reading his slides at home. When I went to his lecture, he's always engaging, enthusiastic, and eager to teach. He also has a good sense of humour.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: This class made me enjoy psychology again!!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: 3 exams & lots of choices were given for each part. Label/explain the diagrams on slides (structure of the ear, brain) long questions "Explain in detail the Charles D Theory " "processes of long term memory" "explain bulimia or anorexia in detail". Overall , an easy grade if you are good at memorizing. Textbook needed for understanding concepts.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Nick was hilarious and engaging. My best class yet.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: the class was only graded on 3 tests but he was a great prof that keeps you interested even during early mornings

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: BUY THE PRACTICE EXAM BOOK. He takes the multiple choice questions directly from the practice exam book. So if you memorize them then you would get at least 40% of each exam completely right. There is a lot of material but it is manageable. He gives your best test grades the highest weighted percentage.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: I looked forward to every lecture with Dr. Carleton, he made even the dry material seem interesting and kept us laughing the whole way through.  He is incredibly passionate and charismatic and exudes excitement for the subject.  Exams were fair, he does not expect you to know everything but rather a few things well.  Can't recommend enough!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Overall really enjoyed the lecture topics and the professor. Course is very dependent on the textbook and lecture slides (which coincide). Reading the textbook is necessary for a good grade and understanding. Course is not very difficult, but is very note-heavy, and lots of reading. There was also no assignments, just midterms and the final exam.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Nick is great! You can really tell he cares about the students and the content matter. I was in a class with about 300 people in it, and he still managed to help everyone with questions. Real great guy too! Though he may have an unhealthy addiction to The Owl haha!

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Got all 90s on my midterm and attended lectures maybe twice during the whole semester! Just memorize all the short answers and remember all the answers for the multiple choice on the grade aid book and you'll be golden. Easy credit but lots of memorizing.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: If you truly care about psychology and want the funniest, most hilarious prof in the world- take Nick. A mistake a lot of students make is thinking that psychology is an easy credit. IT ISNT. It is three full booklets of diagrams, charts, and memorization. HOWEVER, if you go to class, Nick makes it easy to understand and remember. Take psych & Nick

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Nick is easily one of the best profs at U of R. His lectures are hilarious, he incorporated fun things into his tests (Greys Anatomy, ect), and he truly makes class amazing. He gives you the resources that he gets the multiple choice from, tells you EXACTLY what will be on the test, it doesn't get easier. He is seriously amazing. Take his course.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Really liked him and the class.  Really clear about what will be on the exams and how to study. I did really well.

Name: Nicholas Carleton
Review: Very clear about what format the exams are. If you have any questions or need clarification, he will respond back to your emails. Gives lots of examples to help explain the topics.

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: Here's my take. She isn't a bad professor. She sure seems dead inside though. How can anyone get through one class with a dead fish eye, I missed Bingo at my retirement home look. She is teaching right, but she rarely gives any eye contact. I would really prefer someone who is more engaging. At least she is organized. Good luck!

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: Dr. Sherry Klein explains everything in all her classes, even though it is vague. Dr. Klein does follow what is in her Syllabus as she should. There are 4 major assignments in this class and the handout she provides is everything you need to know to pass that assignment -- make sure you read it carefully. Want to pass?you have to work for it.

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: Do not take English 100 with Prof Klien. Her lectures are boring as hell. She marks so bad and gives everyone below 60%. Going into her class made me want to jump out of the window and die (Literally). Do not take it with her. If other English classes are full and you have no choice then I wish you the best of luck.

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: Sherry Klein more like scary time! Avoid taking english 100 with this prof. Her lectures are very dry and boring. If you try and answer a question in class she will make you feel stupid. Sherry might be the world's hardest marker. Highest grade I received on an essay was 60% and I spent many hours editing and revising. DO NOT TAKE ENG WITH SHERRY!!

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: WORST PROF I HAVE EVER HAD! She grades so unfairly. Sherry once deducted me 10% off of an assignment for paper clipping it instead of using staples, and again deducted me 10% for double siding my paper without specifying that either were wrong in the criteria. She takes pride in her almost failing class average and is very unapproachable. She sucks

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: makes every student in class feel stupid when students have questions

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: I've cried so many times dude. I had 90's in English throughout elementary, middle and high school. I have a low 50 in this class, I'm risking failing. Extremely rude, always late, hates technology and doesn't use URCourses. Impossible to study for the final. Impossible to get over a 65% on an assignment, seriously. Run as far as you can, dude.

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: I thought the bad reviews were no big deal... I was wrong. Do NOT take this class with Sherry. If she is the only option, wait until next term to take English. She refuses to use URCourses, so you never know your grades. It is not possible to get higher than 65% on an assignment. If you choose to take her class... good luck.

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: This doctor is the rudest lady I have ever encountered. She does not use any form of technology. She is rude, if you ask questions she will most likely not even give you an answer. Comes late everyday and keeps you late. Hard marker, most of the class fails all assignments. She will tell you first day majority students will fail her class

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: Dr. Klein is intimidating but kind. My classmates complained about her and yet they never once participated in lectures. She feels you're not paying attention when taking notes from a laptop. Read the books, know your stuff. Answer her questions. Don't be offended by her behaviour, she is odd. Tough grader however she will answer your questions.

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: Do not take an English class with her if you can help it. Her lectures are boring, there is too much material to read, and she gives awful feedback. She refuses to use URCourses, so no one had a clue what we were going to do each day and reviewing for the final was very difficult. I used to enjoy English but now I'm glad I'm done with it.

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: very good , polite and great teacher. You just need to work hard.

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: JUST RUN

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: Do not take Sherry Klein if you can avoid it. She was very rude to our class-she wanted us to participate, but when you did she would shoot down your answer and make you feel stupid. Vague on what she wants for assignments. Rude when you ask general questions about assignments.

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: Very hard marker. I would never take her class again. She makes you feel small. She demands that you answer her but then belittles you when you do.

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: She hates technology, so don't buy any of the material digitally or expect to take notes on your laptop. She is very specific in what she wants and you will likely never be able to reach her expectations. Expect to fail or barely pass assignments. A 75 is the new 100. She is very rude and condescending to students.

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: Sherry is not easily approachable, she marks incredibly hard and expects a lot from you. In my experience, i would say take any one else for english 100.

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: Dr. Klein refuses to use any technology within her classroom and course which makes it very difficult to pull up old assignments and review for exams. She also refuses to make eye contact or look up to her class at any point. She shows little respect to her students by talking with her head down & makes you feel absolutely stupid when participating

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: This class was a very difficult English course for me. The professor is a very hard grader, and certainly does not give out easy A's. She does really know her stuff though, just doesn't make it easy for the students

Name: Sherry Klein
Review: She is an incredibly tough marker and will scare the bejesus out of you.

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: She is one of the best proffesors here. Very kind and always approachable outside class. Great class for boosting GPA. My grade was 93 and the class average was 79.12! She used to give lots of chances for extra credit (for students who didn't do well or, want to do better). I recommend this class with Dr. Laura Ambrose. She is the best!

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: She is one of the best professors I have. She is easily approachable, her lectures are easy to follow and she gives chances for extra credit

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: hands down the best prof !

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: Great teacher, really wants you to do well and provides you with reviews before tests! Go to class, take notes and study a bit you have an easy A

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: This is the second time I was able to have Laura as a prof. I would take her courses again and again. She is very kind and caring towards her students. Her courses and expectations are at just the right level. No textbook for this class as all resources are free online. It was her first time teaching the course for my group, but she did awesome!

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: Someone was complaining about how if they speak, then she will look at you and make you feel uncomfortable... honestly, people shouldn't be speaking while she is teaching in the first place. It super disrespectful. Plus, its a distraction to other students trying to learn. She is a really nice person. Super easy going, and very accommodating.

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: Laura makes you buy a $37 app for attendance and says it's mandatory then stops using it after the first week so you pay it for nothing. She also tries to hard to be relatable and it just ends up wasting class time and no one cares about what she's saying. If you talk even the slightest bit she'll stop talking and stare you down. Easy content tho

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: I loved her so much the final and labs were so easy and she is so helpful

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: She is just amazing, and also made Biology very easy. I'll definitely take her if I ever get a chance again. The best part is she made study guides almost similar to exams and she also gives chocolate or candies sometimes ;)

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: Awesome prof. Easy to get a 90 if you try.

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: I loved Laura. She's easily my favorite professor so far. If you have the opportunity to take a class from her, do it.

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: Amazing prof!

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: Laura is fun and funny, with a killer dry wit. She loves her job and it shows. She makes a potentially complex subject enjoyable and easy to understand . I would happily take another of her classes anytime.

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: Laura is an amazing prof. I would recommend her to anyone! The course has many different aspects to it including a lab, but you don't feel overwhelmed. There were 2 midterms and a "final" (3rd midterm) and an in class assignment. She is extremely understanding and just a really good person.

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: Laura was an amazing prof. You never felt like she was trying to trick you or make your course more difficult than it needed to be. Five labs, two midterms, a final. . This class and prof is very fair, you get out of it what you put into it

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: Amazing prof, really knows what she's talking about. Her notes are awesome and she makes the class really interesting and enjoyable. Uses a mix of lecturing, videos, and interactive learning. All in all great prof, would definitely take a class with her again.

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: Laura has been such a wonderful Prof, I would highly recommend her to anyone that is looking to take a Bio class for non-Bio majors. She really explains things so well and is very welcoming to all questions in class, in office or via email. Would take another class by her for sure.

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: Laura is a great prof. Her lectures are amazing and her writing down the notes as you go really helps you understand the material. Tests were easy and the study guide was extremely helpful. Would recommend her to anyone and gladly take another class with her

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: Laura is a great prof. I had to take Bio 150 and wasnt too sure how I would feel about it but she made the class fun. It didnt feel like a chore to come to class or to do assignments. I would recommend any class by her!

Name: Laura Ambrose
Review: Laura, is a great professor, two midterm, one exam, pre lab questions for lab, top hat and packback, online book, two assignment snork and inheritance assignment quite intresting, she is very caring, gives study guide question which comes in exams, easy marker and very helpful in class and after class. I would recommend all to take class with her.

Name: Glen Larson
Review: I have no idea how I had such a poor mark in a different class (Math 110) and a great mark in this class (100 on final!) from the same instructor.  Material is dry but the instructor was up to the task with real life  examples.  Exams and work were tough but fair.

Name: Glen Larson
Review: Tough tough tough... I never rely could get my head around the subject matter but the instructor was fine.

Name: Glen Larson
Review: He will eat your soul while wearing a tropical Hawaiian shirt. I don't know how I passed this class with such a decent mark. He's in love with Stewart(textbook author), and I'm sure he would marry him if possible.

Name: Glen Larson
Review: The best math class I have ever taken. The class is not that easy but if you study and do the problems in the text you will A's it.

Name: Glen Larson
Review: Best math class ever, I learned a lot and it only took 1 try

Name: Glen Larson
Review: loves to see students with that "what the hell is this!?" look on their faces during exams. I sware its what gets him up in the morning every day. Horrible prof, but i think he tries to be nice sometimes, in his own..weird.. way... anyways.. i think he retired already but if not.. STAY AWAY.. i am not kidding

Name: Glen Larson
Review: "We discovered an integral of secant x... Hahaha, now we just make a check in our mental checklist" You probably going to hear something like this during his lecture. But what makes it so comical is his robotic voice. Exams are ok, better than some math profs trust me on this.

Name: Glen Larson
Review: WHY DO PEOPLE STILL TAKE HIS CLASS AFTER READING THESE????? HE IS THE WORST RATED PROF AT THE U OF R PEOPLE.

Name: Glen Larson
Review: Horrible Horrible Class!  The worst monotone speaker I have ever come across and he always made mistakes in his boardwork!!  I went to get help once and he laughed at me.  Who does that? I would never take a class from him again.  EVER!!!

Name: Glen Larson
Review: stupid and lazy teacher. he likes to talk to female students instead of male students. and his voice will make you sleep because he speaks like a robot. he dont care if he fail half of the class last year

Name: Glen Larson
Review: No Comments

Name: Glen Larson
Review: has the most boring voice EVER & it is hard to stay awake. he repeats himself & will spend a long time on the easiest parts & little time on something hard. only have to hand in 5/9 assigns. watch your grammar &let statements- he marks those too! assigns are pretty easy & short BUT knows his stuff!!

Name: Glen Larson
Review: Boring! Difficult to get and can't really help you out much if you have a question. He goes fast, and it's easy to get confussed, especially with Him teaching you. Read the textbook if you want to pass. Also be forwarned about marking. ENGLISH is a must. If your grammer is wrong then your two

Name: Glen Larson
Review: Very very boring guy, went for lunch all the time instead of going. But you only have to do 5 assigns if you want, and just watch how you word things on his tests. The final is the same every year so just study old ones

Name: Glen Larson
Review: NOPE

Name: Glen Larson
Review: Really quiet and boring, but he'll take and entire class to explain a single point.  He is very thorough, and does on the board everything you'll need to know how to do on the exams, so write down everything he writes on the board.  He'll say that he may put definitions on his exams, but he won't.

Name: Glen Larson
Review: he will take marks off for gramma from his mid terms and exams, come on larson, this is not a english class and please dont rate yourself as a good prof here

Name: Glen Larson
Review: Boring as hell, but he explains everything thouroughly.

Name: Glen Larson
Review: Oh grow up people!  He's only "boring", "tough" and "stupid" if you are idiots and slack off and talk throughout the entire class instead of doing your work like real students.  Glenn Larson is as easy as they come, he is an incredibly easy marker, what more do you want?

Name: Glen Larson
Review: HORRIBLE!  AVOID!  HE'S STUPID, AND THINGS THAT COULD BE SIMPLE ARE MADE TO BE IMPOSSIBLE!  WAIT FOR ANOTHER PROF!  I'M GOOD AT MATH AND I FAILED!  SAVE YOURSELF THE TROUBLE!

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: She's a cool cat

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: Just don't do it. She is unclear, unorganized, and very rude. She is the most disrespectful prof that I have ever met.

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: Just the worst. Simply put.  I took her class well over 4 years ago and came back to write this because she was so awful.  I do not think we discussed a single reading assigned. I visited her during office hours to discuss a poor grade - she said I should have gotten a higher mark and did not change it or give any feedback.

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: Criteria is unclear and, in some cases, completely contradictory. Refuses to accept differing opinions, no matter how well they are argued. Grading seems completely haphazard. Made my semester stressful and miserable. Avoid at all costs.

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: She is a  really engaging proff who is passionate about poetry.She likes to see students interested in the subject matter so participate if you can. I noticed a lot of the negative reviews come from first year students. ALL Eng 100 classes are hard. If you are struggling, talk to her and she will be more than willing to help you out.

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: After taking her class I thought about dropping Eng. as my major because I took one of my first upper level classes with her and it went horrible.  After taking other upper level classes I realized it wasn't me but her.  Her grading system would be okay if it made sense but grades reflect her mood and not your work.

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: Very Hard Class, class average was 55% in a 100 level class, 15 people dropped the class.

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: just a bad prof who gives undeserving marks, i got 58 on my first essay rightfully so but we allowed to rewrite it and I made much much better yet got a lower mark than before... also the final was 4 essays which seems like she's tests us on how much we can write in an amount of time

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: If I pick worst 5 profs among 21 profs I experienced in UofR, she is doubtlessly on the top. She frequently cancels classes. And replaces them with useless outer lectures such as "how to use the library". Marks are so much subjective. She never accepts different views.

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: She is rude and does not teach you what you need to know. She also expects you to know everything, which is impossible, seeing as she won't teach you anything. STAY AWAY FROM THIS TEACHER!

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: Before taking this class, I read the comments on this site and AFTER taking this class I want to say how wrong most people are. Cindy is knowledgeable, helpful, and sometimes rambles but has a sense of humour. I loved this class, and if you put in effort, you will do well. It's all about attitude, and if you want to write better,  she can help you.

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: Horrible prof.  From day one she picks favorites in the class, if you are not a favorite then you have no chance in passing the class.  Walking into this class she mad a comment that most students wont pass, great way to boost you students desire for the class! I would advise taking this class from any other prof.

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: Waste of space. I'm an English major and among other majors and profs she is kind of a joke. And she doesn't make you a better writer, I used her advice and other profs say it takes away from my papers. Approachable but full of nonsense

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: Worst prof at the University. Lectures lacked direction and grading was unfocused. I asked her about my grade, she said it was worthy of 80...I got 58. Almost changed majors just cuz of her. One good thing so, she was always more than willing to discuss in her spare time....just wasn't helpful

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: Worst teacher ever. Random ramblings and no clear sense of direction, grading makes no sense, said I deserved an 80 and gave me a 58. Almost changed majors just because of her. I personally think it's a disgrace she has a job. In her defense though she was more than willing to consult students outside of class... Just wasn't very helpful at all

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: Don't take her class!!!!!!

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: Great teacher. You have to pay attention to what is going on in her class. And build portfolio. Also, do all the assignments she gives in class. I would definitely recommend her class.

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: I did't know what it is she wants most of the time.

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: MacKenzie is quite interesting and I get that she wants participation; she craves it. I am only through a 1/4 of the class right now. Has anyone written a paper on the Suzuki book, 'The Sacred Balance'? If so, what exactly is she expecting? Any help would be very apprecciated!

Name: Cynthia MacKenzie
Review: So many things can be said.  Don't take her class.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Professor Maidorn is an ELITE prof, his ability to explain difficult concepts quickly and effectively makes him one of the best professors at UofR. He moves at a fast pace because the curriculum requires it, if you show up to class and do the assignments you're set for his straightforward exams/quizzes. Also has a good sense of humour

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Patrick is an awesome prof, I learned LOTS in his class. Hes super organised, very clear with expectations, and is a straight-shooter. There is a lot of coursework that is not graded, but I recommend you do it to stay on top of the subjects. His lectures are clear, concise, and hes a funny and interesting lecturer. Work hard and you will do well.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Awesome, awesome prof. If you're a hard worker you will do well, definitely, recommend keeping up with the quizzes. If you don't do well, GO BACK and make sure you get it. It'll help so so much when midterms and finals roll around. Really fair marker, funny, stays on track.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Math has been a subject I have struggled with for as long as I can remember, which made me worried about university math. This professor was clear with explaining and answered questions in a clear way. I actually learned a good amount of math in this lecture. There are assignments but they aren't for marks, they just help prepare you for exams.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Great prof makes class enjoyable with his great and funny examples. Very clear on what needs to be done to succeed. Midterm and final are very reasonable and if you study you will do well.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Signed up for stats terrified of the class but Patrick made me love it! He goes over lots of examples in class so skipping isn't a good idea, but he's really quick at answering emails and is very easy to meet with during office hours. One of the best profs I've had so far.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: great prof, easy to understand

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Great guy, sometimes teaches a bit too fast. Sometimes thinks that everyone knows the concepts and moves fast. He shows little tricks here and there to help students with problems. Get to use a cheat sheet for every exam including the final which is huge. Make sure you complete the practice lab questions as they are similar to the quizzes.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Funny, compassionate but lots of material and course moves quickly. Easy to fall behind so make sure you keep up with the homework. Very accessible outside of class.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: This guy is an excellent prof. He does his lectures so clearly, so swiftly. He is also humorous and smart. If you need to take a math class, do it fromt this guy. Really good.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: I actually loved Pat. He is very knowledgable about math and explains things well. He is very approachable and understanding. There are often weekly quizzes that are pretty easy but his midterm was a lot harder. The final wasn't too bad if you study good.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: AMAZING teacher! The course work is somewhat difficult but he makes being in class enjoyable and he makes it relatively easy to understand! Easy to get ahold of if you have any questions! Goes above and beyond for his students! During one of our quizzes a person had a seizure and he talked to the dean about getting the quiz omitted if we all agreed

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Patrick is one of the few profs that genuinely cares about his students and is willing to help. He explains things clearly, and if you do the homework you will score high on all his quizzes and the midterm easily.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Patrick is a great prof. It sucks I had to drop his class because I suck at Math, but he did make math fun for someone who hates it.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Patrick is awesome! If you enjoy math, he will make it even more fun to learn about, and even if you don't enjoy math, he strives to make it fun for everyone. He is accessible outside of class, and is very helpful with any concerns you may have. Would definitely take a class from him again!

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Patrick cares about his students and is a fair prof. He has regular office hours and will do anything to help you succeed as long as you take the first step to talk to him. The class isn't anything crazy hard, there are no tests instead weekly 4 question quizzes worth 20 marks. He has a sense of humour and makes the class entertaining to be in

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Great teacher! Will make the effort to help you, even if you can't make it to his office hours. If all else fails, you can email him your question and he'll get back to you pretty quickly. He's the most caring professor I've had so far. Definitely recommend.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: I found his class very difficult because he didn't explain where he got a lot of numbers from so if you are bad at math do not recommend.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: One of the most caring professors that I've ever met. He's really helpful and clear to understand. Very engaged with students when he gives questions to solve, plus that he's that kind of professor that won't let you fail as long as he's teaching you (lol but yeah you've to put effort into it too). I'll highly recommend him for everyone.

Name: Patrick Maidorn
Review: Amazing prof! if you go to class its easy to pass. really cares about his students. would definitely take a class from him again.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Romulus is the best!

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Great prof. Very nice guy. It is so important to go to class to learn the concepts. Also if you don't understand something, book an office hour with him. It really helps. Midterms and the final were very similar to all the questions he posted.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Romulus puts a heavy focus on the numerical portion of the class, and he teaches it well. The exam questions look very similar to the ones done in class, there will be no surprises. I personally found him to be rather boring though, and that made it difficult to pay attention in class. Multiple choice can be hard, read slides don't bother w/ book.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: The numerical section of the class is well taught, and very easy to grasp by doing the tons of additional questions. Romulus is a nice guy and a fair marker with a very clear outline in the class. Only difficulty is his multiple choice ends up being quite tough.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Best professor Ive had. Very professional. He wants his students to do well. If you do all the questions he posts on urcourses you will do very well on the midterms and final exam. Also if you go to his office hours he is very helpful. Its very important to go to class to learn how to do the problems.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Romulus does a good job explaining quantitative problems. His exam short answer questions are exactly like they are shown in class and are quite easy. He also marks them quite easy. The multiple choice is difficult and may need to be changed. Less abreviations in class would be helpful.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Romulus is the best prof for 275. He explains the calculations part very well however you have to understand the theories on your own. Exams were ok but the multiple choice section was challenging. I recommend doing all the practice questions to do well on his exams.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: He does not care to help you pass at all! Makes final impossible to pass and the midterms are hard. Multiple choice you'll never pass as they have nothing to do with what he has taught.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Very organized, class is structured clearly. He spends most of class time on the calculations (which can be good) but his midterms & finals require you to also know a-lot of concept materials. Textbook is not required, but definitely helps when studying for the multiple choice concept questions. All in all a good prof, can be pretty funny as well.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: simple grading criteria like 2 MTs and a finals but man, this class is tough, I was so lost with the entire class, did not know what was going on . and what he was trying to get us to learn. I understand the quantitative part, however, qualitative stuff are so confusing he focus more on the calc than concepts but exams have MC and know nothing abt

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Romulus is great prof does not try to trick you in any sense. If says it will be on the midterm you better know that stuff. He as two midterms and a final.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Romulus is a very knowledgeable man when it comes to OM. He goes through examples very quick so it's important to pay attention. The course consists of 2 midterms and 1 final. He gives useful feedback on exams, and he's very approachable. The class tends to be boring at times but his sense of humor makes it all that better. Highly recommend him.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Boring lectures but he explains things very well. He hates technology and forces you to write notes on paper which is unfortunate, but with how well he explains things it's not the end of the world.  Would take again.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Romulus is very nice. He sometimes goes quick in class so pay attention. Definitely do the recommended homework! You only have 2 midterms and a final to get your marks!! If you pay attention and do your homework you will do will. Don't skip questions you don't think he will ask, b/c he will ask them!  He is very helpful when you go to his office!

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: He is a nice guy but classes were very boring and the tests were okay, he weighs the multiple choice very heavy and its very hard to know what will be on there and he picks very random things you wont use again.. He knows the math stuff and you can tell he enjoys it more because he explains it better.. just not a huge fan but not a bad prof.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Once you figure out Romulus' expectations, the course is very straightforward. The material is not difficult, but as with any mathematics course, it takes a lot of time and practice before you can do well. Do the recommended homework problems and you will be good with 60% of the exam. Multiple choice is challenging, but definitely not impossible.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: This prof have two exams and one TOUGH final. The class is very helpful. I asked other friend who took the class (other prof) also give TOUGH final. so try your best to get mark on midterms. If you have 90% after two exam, then after final exam you may have 78%? haha

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: I liked Romulus, I thought he was very knowledgeable. You have to pay close attention in the lectures as he moves through the material pretty quickly. It was pretty easy to guess what the long answer questions would be on the exams, but the multiple choice always got me!

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Rom was a really great prof. His lectures were long (night class) and he takes EVERY minute available for his lectures. He is very good at explaining things but you have to guess what he will be testing you on. He gives 2 quizzes (10% each), a midterm (40%) and final exam (40%). You must read the textbook to do well.

Name: Romulus Cismaru
Review: Don't take this class with him!

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: Ian is a great professor, who always takes the personal life of a student into consideration. He always makes lectures fun, would totally take another class with him.

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: Ian is be far my favourite prof!! He's so understanding towards students regarding other class work loads, and give great explanations if you have trouble understanding a topic. He doesn't assign a ridiculous amount of homework, and grades fairly easy

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: The lectures would never be directly from the slides or the textbook. He would use the slides as a guideline but would use his own experiences to flesh concepts out and make it more interesting. The workload and the grading was extremely fair and reasonable and although class attendance isn't mandatory, I would encourage others to attend!

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: Ian is a very great guy, and a good prof. I really enjoyed his class. He grades only on three tests and a small assignment. He will stress that his tests are easy and "you have to TRY to fail," but they can actually be a bit tough. The first test is definitely the most difficult, so if you do bad on that one don't worry. Overall he was a great prof

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: I would take this prof again in a heartbeat. He is funny and makes lectures relatable and as interesting as he can. The library assignment is easy marks and as long as you read the text you will pass!

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: Ians a very caring individual. He's always mindful of students circumstances and stressors in their personal life and semester course load. My favourite professor by far, lectures are memorable and if you put in the effort you'll get a good grade which you can't always say with university professors. He'll always fight for what he believes is right

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: great prof, loves to try and make the class laugh with personal stories, really knows what he is talking about and seems to care about his students success. attendance isnt mandatory just read the textbook, mulitple choice section on exams can be kinda tough but other than that straight forward class

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: Wonderful professor!! Hes very chatty but the stories are relevant (mostly) to the content. Years of experience goes towards his lectures, yeah he uses PowerPoint to guide himself but he knows his sh*t! 100% one of my absolute favourite profs!

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: An okay professor. Just read the textbook and you'll do fine. Really, you don't need to go to class. He talks a lot about his personal life when it is only tangentially related to the lecture topic. He seems bored, maybe? One time the power went out and he told us to go because he didn't want to teach. I would take another class from him. 6/10.

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: Ian is one of the most caring profs you can have. Don't be afraid to talk to him he will make sure you succeed. He puts all of his students first.

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: --> 3 Midterm --> Difficult multiple choice based on application of knowledge --> 1 easy assignment (basically free 10%) --> Attendance is helpful if you want to know whats in the test --> Attendance is not manditory --> Entertaining Lectures (I got unlucky, some students couldnt shut up) --> Note: He's a liberal (Although he doesnt push it on u!)

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: The only thing difficult in this class is the multiple choice in the midterms, That's it. Only 1 assignment that takes you no more than 3 hours, and its easy. Attendance is not mandatory but if you do, you will see the slides with info in the midterms. I got unlucky and some students cant seem to shut up, but besides that, Ian has "fun" lectures.

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: what a great prof. real sweetheart and very funny! makes class fun and tests are easy enough. library assignemnt is 10% of free marks

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: Psychology 102 the best professor I have had the opportunity to learn from. He is a great lecture. Tests are a bit tough, pay attention to detail.

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: He's so great had him for PSYC 102, he really tries to engage you into the class. He tells lots of stories and tries to apply all the knowledge to real life.

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: Ian is an amazing teacher, the lectures are full of jokes and stories that make learning much more fun. He provides lots of online resources such as TedTalks and Crash Course Psychology videos on youtube. There are no papers and three midterms each worth 1/3 of your final grade.

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: I mean, good prof & all, but he tries to hard to incorporate humor into lectures! Definitely needs to make better exam preps because most of his exams are filled with questions either, never heard of or very rarely talked about in class.

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: Hes a good man. Definitely in the top 10% of all profs at the UofR. The multiple choice questions on his tests are tricky, so watch out for those.

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: Ian is awesome!! He is so funny and he would make the lectures interesting. He uses modern day examples to help you understand what is going on and is always available if you need a further explanation or help with anything. Only one small assignment and 3 midterms (class is non-cumulative). If you're looking for an easy class, take this one!!!

Name: Ian MacAusland-Berg
Review: Ian was a funny prof but beware of his tests. They are very tricky, even if you read all the assigned readings. Lectures aren't mandatory as he just talks about everything but the actual PowerPoint. All the class consists of are powerpoints with minimal information. The class is very boring and I feel like I didn't learn much.

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: she is a mediocre prof, knowledgeable on the material. You need to know the entire bus 260 textbook for the final. Lectures are useless, she uses the textbook provided slides which go into little to no detail. You're better off skipping class and studying each chapter in the textbook. Midterm and final are easy as long as you read the textbook.

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Sandra was a great prof for 260. The class structure was simple and the weekly online assignments were straight forward. One midterm and it was all MC, straight from the book, there are practice multiple choice questions provided on the online textbook, which made the final and the midterm very easy. I would definitely take this class with her

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Sandra really cares about her students, and she is a very respected and typical Human Resource professional! She takes time to explain each slide at her lectures, and she made what could be a boring topic, engaging for the students. Participation is low, but pay attention and try your best and you will earn a great mark!

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Sandra does a good job for a tough class. Participation was low but she still always came prepared and organized. The class is not graded on many assignments so if you pay attention you can get a really good mark or you can do very bad.

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Sandra has a clear grading criteria. Midterm is only based on multiple choice, One group project, you don't have to write any project just power point presentation and a take home final exam. Overall a easy class.

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Sandra is a great prof, highly recommend. For the midterm, I just studied her ppt slides and got a decent mark. The group project was easy but make sure you pick the right (hardworking) people for your group. Take home final was okay too. Goodluck.

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Sandra is a great prof! She does her best to make the material interesting and tries to get the class involved as much as possible! One midterm, one group project and a take home final! Also, she puts the slides online which is super helpful if you miss a class and the notes on the slides are from her textbook. She is awesome!!

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: She is such a great teacher and really wants you to succeed! Her tests are good and her class is interesting. Loved taking her class

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: I can only say that not everyone likes reading, her book is knowledgeable for sure, but reading word to word to answer the mid-term and final's question seem unnecessary to me (must be exactly words in the book if you want full mark). her lectures are too boring for me, can't sit there for even a minute, lost focus for the rest.

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Sandra is a nice lady and is always happy and cheerful. But I personally felt really bored in her lectures. The assignments were graded by TA's so beware. One Midterm. Buy the textbook and read it word for word and you'll do good on the final. Attendance is recommended as some of the questions on the midterm will be based on class discussion.

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Its an easy class but very boring. Its difficult to know what she wants from you in the assignments, you just kind of guess.

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Very easy class, stopped going after the midterm. Buy the text, Midterm and Final have the same questions as the textbook online quizzes (she wrote the text).

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Sandra seems nice enough but she made what could have been a relatively interesting subject pretty boring. 3 small assignments, 1 of which has to be done with a partner. Grading criteria isn't very clear. Textbook is a must. Go to class because some of the group discussion content in important to know.

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: She is nice but classes are pointless since she just goes through lecture notes already provided. There was no midterm which is great but very unclear what is expected for the final. The reflections were graded brutal and it is hard to figure out what is expected.

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Sandra is an Amazing lady and professor! You'll be fine in her class if you study her textbook and give citations in your assignment. She's your typical HR Person! Awesome! Would Recommend anybody!

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Sandra is a very good professor, her class is easy if you read the book. She is very clear and gives a lot of examples to clarify what is in the textbook. I really enjoyed her class

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: There was no teaching involved in either of these courses.  There were readings assigned, and some papers, a horrible group project. There was great emphasis on your forum entries, which can be a challenging if you do not want to re-iterate what others have already said.  My advice get on those forums early so you're not competing for air time.

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Very easy, almost 95% of test and exam are MC. Nice teacher, willing to help, presentation are easy, gives good grade. Just remember to read all material from classes, nothing from tests and exam are unexpected.

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Very good prof. She is very nice. Two tests and a group project make up the majority of your grade. Read the textbook and pay attention to the definitions and youll do good.

Name: Sandra Steen
Review: Honestly one of the best profs i've had at the u of r. Friendly and helpful if you have a question. Class material is boring but the workload is easy if you study a bit. She wrote the Textbooks for both classes I took from her (bus 250 and 260), so read the books a bit and you'll do well

Name: George Hoffman
Review: Hoffman's HIST 113 is composed of 10 tutorials, with a paragraph written on each, a large essay, and a final. Grading was unreasonable - he takes marks off for not answering questions not asked by the paragraph prompt itself. There is a TON of content to learn. A plus is that there are a lot of choices for questions for assignments and the final.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: Gives you everything you need so you don't need to purchase a textbook. Gives you a fair amount of time to work on assignments and the paper. As well as gives you useful tips on how to write a history exam and a paper. 10 assignments, 1 paper and a final exam. Lot of online material reading. Would recommend.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: George is beyond knowledgable in Canadian history. This being said, his lectures are a bit dry and you HAVE to show up to pass. He assigns a ten-page paper that is brutal but doable. Overall, not the best, not the worst.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: he is a real gem. I used to hate history before I took his class, but now I have started to develop an interest in Canadian history. His lectures are amazing. I would recommend attending his lectures on a regular basis if you want a good grade.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: I would never take a class from him again. His lectures are boring, CANNOT read his handwriting. I repeat, CANNOT read his handwriting. What we did in lecture was never on exams , he marks papers unfairly. Almost didn't pass the class. Would suggest not taking a class from this prof.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: His enthusiasm for history makes his lectures easy to listen to, and his repetition of points is very helpful for note-taking. Always lets you know what due dates for assignments are coming up. Make sure you attend every class or get notes from someone. Bit of a tough grader, but not too bad. Lots of topic choices for essays and on tests.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: Hoffman is very passionate about history and that shows through his lectures. He wants everyone to succeed and gives more than enough warning time for due dates. He will meet outside of class to discuss any assignments and will give good feedback. There is no textbook. He lectures as a story, so being there is a must! Exams are straight forward

Name: George Hoffman
Review: Definitely lecture heavy, for that reason showing up is super helpful. He's an interesting guy to listen to, his lectures aren't boring. I find him to be a pretty easy grader, and I genuinely look forward to his lectures.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: George is an excellent professor. His online class was well structured and spaced out, and he gives extensive feedback for all assignments. The readings were interesting and easy to read. I read them all once for the tutorial questions, and once again before the final. You could get away without the textbook, but it will help to push your mark up.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: George Hoffman is a great professor. His lectures are amazing, very interesting and his explanations are very good. If you don't miss classes and take notes, you will find easy to pass. He is always available to answer the students questions. He makes History even more interesting in his lectures.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: Lectures in the class are pivotal and the key to a good grade. He doesn't post any notes online so you must attend and take down a good set of notes. Lectures can get a bit dry but he tries his best to keep them entertaining. There is an essay, 11 online articles to read, a midterm and a final exam. Class is easy as long as you show up!

Name: George Hoffman
Review: He is a very knowledgeable professor who is willing to help his students by answering their e-mails on time and giving them extra office hours. The actual class was actually quite enjoyable for the most part, but it can get boring if you don't like the subject. All in all, this is a class where it's easy to pass but hard to do well in.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: No textbook in the class, just lecture and online articles. His lecture gets a bit dry at times. The exams are pretty much just memorization so pretty easy. Only caveat is he has TA's mark the essays and they mark considerably harder than he would. Not really a GPA booster but you can get a solid mark with only the midterm, essay and final exam.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: pretty good teacher, he knows what he's talking about. Willing to answer any questions, but lectures are pretty boring. If you miss class, good luck getting any help from him on what you missed. He expects you can ask someone else in the class but not always are strangers willing to give out their notes

Name: George Hoffman
Review: George was a great professor to have. He didn't request a textbook for the class and gave out online articles, but he does expect students to attend, mostly because he says things that he doesn't post online. It can be tricky to get a good mark, but that is reliant on your ability to pay attention.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: Really knows his stuff, but is the hardest marker I've ever encountered. When it comes to exams be prepared to put in some serious work and not get anything above a 75, in fact, I'm sure he goes out of his way to make sure nobody touches 80. Wont be taking another class of his.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: Mr. Hoffman is a great Prof. he really knows his stuff and understands first-year students and the struggles that they face. no textbook for this class, he only uses online articles that are posted on UR Courses. He doesn't post lecture notes, so attending class is essential to doing well.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: Very good professor who loves what hes teaching. Really good class for first years as he takes the time to explain everything he speaks on! No text book which is nice and a mid term, essay and final! Take his classes if you can! You wont regret it!

Name: George Hoffman
Review: Not a good prof for spring sessions, or first year. His expectations for papers are what 3rd year students would be able to write. Expects complete memorization of terms and concepts which is impossible. Expectations simply to high unless you are taking ONLY that course. DO NOT challenge him, very defensive and marks u accordingly afterwards.

Name: George Hoffman
Review: Dr. Hoffman is an outstanding professor in terms of quality of his lecture and teaching material. He gives amazing lecture with full depth of the topic and expects his students to answer his questions in full details without missing out a single point, that makes him a tough grader. But overall, he's the "History's Heisenberg."

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: I absolutely love Tom! Hands down the best professor I have had in the four years I have been here. I usually find an excuse to skip my morning lectures but Tom kept me interested and motivated to show up. First midterm was only out of 35 marks and he pretty much tells you what the long answer question will be. 100% take a class with Tom if u can

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: Hands down the best prof I've had in my entire 4 years in UofR. Not because the materials were easy but his teaching style is great. I don't remember having any other prof in UofR as good as him. I always recommend him.

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: Loved this class and prof. Would recommend studying a week ahead of the midterm with focus on definitions, theories, and experiments discussed in lectures. One midterm, one paper, and comprehensive final. Attend class, takes notes, and you will do just fine! He is a super nice guy and I would recommend taking him!

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: I hate mornings, But i love morning lectures with Phenix

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: One word to describe him: A.M.A.Z.I.N.G.

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: Tom is a great prof and he is very approachable if you have any problems. His class is very interesting and fairly easy to get a good mark if you study. The only downside to his teaching style is that he goes through the slides very quick so it is easy to get lost during his lectures. He bases all of his exams off of the lectures! No extra reading!

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: Tom is awesome! He is hilarious in an awkward sort of way that makes coming to class enjoyable. He explains the concepts in this class (which can sometimes be dry) in a relatable way. If you show up to class, the content will make a lot more sense. His passion for psychology is evident. This class will make you think differently in day to day life.

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: You need to come to class in order to do well, but, he's an amazing prof! Drops hints about exam q's all the time, and teaches the material amazingly! Easy class in general and very interesting, take Tom if you can, highly recommended.

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: He was super funny and very good at teaching. He was very organized and hrlpful. All the people saying he ducked are just salty cause they didn't study or come to class so they failed. COME TO CLASS AND STUDY YOU'LL PASS !

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: Tom was an excellent teacher. There are two journal summaries, two midterms and a comprehensive final. Overall easy class because he makes the lectures interesting and engaging. After every lecture he will have you leaving feeling confident about the material learnt in class.

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: He is obviously very passionate about psychology and it makes him very easy to listen to. I always leave his class having actually learned a lot without having to go back and retract myself right after.

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: Psych270 is a hard and heavy class in general, but Tom made it interesting and great to learn. He explains the material in a way that clicks with you, which is always a good thing. There was one midterm, a paper, and a final - which was cumulative. He marks reasonably and gives excellent feedback.

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: Tom is seriously one of U of R's best. He is extremely passionate about what he lectures on which makes learning enjoyable. He is truly an EDUCATOR unlike most profs and is so kind. His tests cover the content from lectures only. He also gives great examples to help you. If I could have Tom for every course like elementary school, I would.

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: hilarious guy! often uses his experiences to relate to the material which is very interesting. Easy marker,if you work you'll definitely get 90's don't skip classes. Text.B definitions are easy to follow than his notes. Im impressed on his ability to come up with MCQ's. Take this class and you'll know Y. Would definitely recommend!class average:70

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: He loves psych but he talks to his students as if they have a PHD in psych - his exams are hard to study for because he doesn't narrow down what you need to know. If you don't solely focus on the lectures he gives it is hard to understand lots of the material. Nice guy but not the best prof

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: Great at explaining, you will understand if you attend class and pay attention. 1 midterm, 2 short assignment or volunteer essay and a final that was comprehensive. Tests include stuff discussed in class. I studied a fair amount and finished the course in the 90s. Put effort and you will do great! He also finishes class early very often!

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: This is a heavy course. He is very easy to talk to and open to appointments and helping you study. The course is basically graded on a midterm and final which is hard for non test writers to do well in. The powerpoints he gives you are super informative and easy to add onto with class discussion. He wants you to do well in the course, simply ask!

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: i liked Tom! he was funny and made sure you knew what he was talking about, he sure knows what he is talking about!! didn't use textbook though! his slide shows are very easy to read and follow, study off of them!

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: I found Tom a good prof except his communication with me was very bad. I would email him about some questions I had about an assignment and he would not get back to me till the assignment was way past the due date. His lectures are extremely heavy and a lot to study for the exam.

Name: Tom Phenix
Review: Amazing prof! His lectures are so easy to understand, and he makes them interesting with his examples and knowledge he has about research studies. Midterm was super easy but studying is required. If you show up to the class it's way easier to understand the material. One of the best professors I ever had.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: Kenneth Cramer is fantastic. At pretending. The intro course with him consisted of poorly formulated jokes which he just couldn't help making sensual. PSYCH1150? More like BIO1105. The man would be on his phone more than his students, showing how much he truly cares. Fantastic actor - you will hear it in his tone. Best wishes.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: I'm not going to lie, Cramer's class isn't an easy one. He is, however, very engaging and gives a lot of breaks, so make sure to show up. He also asks questions from lectures in the midterms and final, so be warned, it is both textbook AND lecture heavy.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: Honestly, idk why people say PSYC 1150 is hard... all assignments are curved like at least 8%, the exam was curved 12%. Yes, the midterms are hard and specific but honestly study and you'll do well, he asks stuff straight out of the textbook and lectures, plus if you do the study pool you get an extra 3%, I finished this course with a 98%.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: If anyone can keep me awake during a 3 hour lecture, it's Cramer. He knows how to keep the class involved and he is hilarious. The midterms are extremely hard and the text book chapters are very long, but it is a university course, what do you expect. It is is difficult to get a high mark in his class, despite how much you study, but overall okay.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: In to what he is teaching but the four midterms have out of the box and difficult content that at times will barely pertain to what you've learned or read. Lots of reading and lots of useless info on the midterms.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: Fantastic. Loved coming to his lectures, because he was so interesting. He knew what he was talking about and it shows. He is really funny and walks around during lecture which keeps you involved. He's got some interesting examples that make you laugh and that help you remember things for the exams. Can't wait to take another class taught by him!

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: Do no take this course, Cramer is good guy but his course only has 4 midterms (25% each) no assignment, no papers. The tests are designed to make you fail, and he expects you to know too much info - His slides and the textbook, then tests on the smallest info that you wouldnt remember. DO NOT TAKE

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: Cramer is a great prof. His lectures are super interesting and engaging which makes you actually want to go to them. He's pretty good for giving you hints on what lecture material you will be tested on. You must thoroughly read the textbook as most of the exam material is on that. I showed up to most classes, read the textbook, and I ended 73%.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: great :)

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: Dr. Cramer is the best! He's by far the fairest prof at the u, has clear grading criteria, and his lectures are engaging! It's a university class, you need to read/study from the textbook - it's a given. There were no surprises on his exams as the questions came directly from lecture/textbook. STUDY THE BOOK. ATTEND CLASS. THAT'S IT.
