Name: Ken Cramer
Review: Talented lecturer but I get the impression he's not really that bright although he thinks alot of himself. It was uncomfortable being around him when I saw him in office hours.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: He's a tough grader but he's fair. Anything from the textbook is fair game. He gives lots of opportunities for marks and is clear in his expectations. Don't slack off, go to class, read the textbook, and you'll be fine.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: I average mid-high 80s, i worked my butt off in Cramer's class and walked away with a 79%. I studied at least 20 hours per exam, NEVER missed a class, and yes the material on the exam is ridiculous and unfair. When i approached him to bump up my mark to 80% he re-routed me to his G.A, who was very rude. I would never take his class again.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: worst . prof . ever . i am not kidding you have been warned & if you can swap the course you need with a different prof, please do it

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: Alright, il keep this brief as possible. Is this a prof you want? No. Pretty much useless in every aspect of teaching, and when it comes down to exams, nothing that he teaches on the power points are on the exam. Is he generous? Il give you an example. I needed a 60. He gave me a 59 and pointed that he was generous from bumping my mark from 58.89.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: This class was like legit the worst class I have every taken in my entire life! The prof is creepy, the course was awful, and the final made like no sense!! We didnt even go over half this stuff in lecture, so stupid! Prof always looked at me weird to, so gross. Never taking a course with this prof again.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: Ken Cramer is a mentally ill person. He is exams are designed to fail as much students as possible. His lectures are boring and full of useless information that he is going to ask about in exams like what was the name of the magazine that published some article ?

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: I took this course upon recommendation of a fellow student, and I have to say that I was utterly disappointed. I found the lectures simple-minded and unimaginative and the final exam felt disconnected from the the course material that was covered. Very disappointed with the professor, and on top of that he made me feel very uncomfortable.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: Hardest exams. Friends be warned his exams will haunt you forever.

Name: Ken Cramer
Review: Just finished the final exam tonight, thank goodness this class is over! Exam felt so random, TBH I am not sure where he got the material from. I would not recommend this prof to anybody. That's 4 months of my life that I can't get back!

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: Very relevant course material which includes a lot of very recent required reading articles to keep the course fresh. She is really accessible and response to emails quickly.

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: Loved this prof! She was responsive and caring. She knew the content in and out, offered weekly tutorials (which I participated in almost every week), returned assignments quickly (and the exam the same day!). TAs sometimes marked hard, but she resolved any issues fairly and quickly so both the TA and I learned through the experience. Fantastic!

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: I have never had a professor this terrible, her grading my be very clear but just when you think you have a good paper she goes and screws you over and marks as hard as I have ever seen. I have never seen a prof this picky on marking. Sure she says use APA format but I have never seen a prof dock me marks for putting th in 5th for the date.

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: Love the flexibility to work at my own pace. I was able to sprint through most of the material before my other courses back logged. As has been said below she is really fast to reply to e-mails. I had a fried that had never used social media in the class and she was so patient. Highly recommend her and the social media class.

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: Im in the class now. She is so responsive - I always get an answer within a few minutes - at most in a few hours. Sends helpful reminders and shares the entire term so you can work at your own pace. Wish she had more classes!!!

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: Seriously follow the instructions and you will do well. The study sheet is exactly like the exam. If you have any issues reach out to her - she really cares.

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: Easy class online, great professor!

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: The most caring professor I'v e had. Her assignments are fair, she gives timely feedback, and is accommodating when the crappy technology on campus acts up. Highly recommend her!

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: Verner is overall a good teacher. She is very clarion hat she is looking for and makes it easy to get a good mark if you complete all of her assignments. There is a new assignment due each week which makes it easy for you to gain a high mark. She gives greta feedback and responds to emails within the hour!!

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: I have taken 209 and 305 with her. Both times she has been responsive and always accommodates the students when there are any technical issues with the UofWs systems.  Her study sheets are directly related to the exam and come from the material either in the books or that she shares over the course website - NO SURPRISES! Wish she had more courses

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: Professer Vernor is the best professor I've had throughout my university experience. She actually cares about her students succeeding.  I had her twice. She answers all her e-mails immediately. The most I'd have to wait is 5 hours for a response, while all my other professors would get back to me in a week. Her grading is so fair. AMAZING WOMAN.

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: Awesome professor. Very helpful. She wants you to succeed. A few lengthy assignments.

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: She was very accommodating and responded quickly to emails. The final exam was an easy A+ as she gave an outline of exactly what we needed to know. The course work consisted of long essays and had nothing to do with the final exam. Absolutely needed the textbooks for the final. There were no formal notes which I very much did not enjoy.

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: It was an online class, and there were times where I E-mailed her for help, and she replied back within 15 minutes! She cares about her students doing well. There's a lot of writing in the class, but as long as you follow rubric, and learn the exam study guide (that she gives you), there's no reason you can't get an A in this class.

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: It was an easy course, the final exam was a take home and it was very long but overall the course is easy.

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: Assignments GALORE but the assignments have strict guidelines and if you follow them, you will get a great mark. She is so understanding of every situation, I turned in a couple of assignments late due to personal reasons and she did not penalize me. She is very helpful. This is my first ever review ever and I had to because she is that great.

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: Great and Easy Class Got an A  But you have to write a lot of essays

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: This is the easiest A+ you will ever get. 4 essays and 3 one-pagers. Do not buy the textbook, you will never use it. Verner responds quickly to emails and helps clarify any concerns.

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: Great Prof. Almost instantly answered any e-mails and was always able to help or clarify anything that I needed help with. 1010 would take again

Name: Kristina Verner
Review: This is my second time taking a course with Verner. Amazing as always. No final in this class, all forum discussions and essays and a final report. You better not mind writing a lot for this class because it's all 2000-3000 word essays - but it's not hard material. Recommended for sure

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: For a first semester freshman English course, Professor Johnston expects way too much from his students. Hes respectable as a person since he cares about the material, but he does not clearly outline what he wants for assignments beforehand. He only elaborates on criteria after. Quizzes will boost your mark, but the essays will hurt you.

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: A very calm and approachable teacher. Quizzes are based on readings and lectures so you need both but if you put in the effort it's worth it.

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: Hard to follow in lecture and a lot of reading but quizzes were fair.

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: Dr. Johnston was an overall great professor! His passion makes lectures engaging, he is very approachable, and is clear on his expectations. I would advise doing all readings and attending classes, as the quizzes are based off of both. There are not many papers and he is a fair marker. You need to put in effort to do well, but it is worth it.

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: Dr. Johnston is an extremely confusing professor. He said he would not test on dates, and the very next quiz he tested on dates. His assignments are made extremely difficult as he only tells you part of what he wants for assignments, which requires you to go to his office hours to actually know what he wants on assignments. Good luck!

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: Johnston definitely cares a lot about the subject and has fast-paced, enthusiastic lectures. His office hours are great, and I would highly recommend going to them (even if you're doing well). Do the readings, record words/terms and research definitions, pay attention in class, and his course won't stress you out too much!

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: short and sweet quizzes but you gotta do your readings to do well. he loves what he does but talks way too fast and expects us to understand what he is saying and meaning. he references other historical things in his lectures assuming we all understand resulting in my notes having a lot of "?"s. He's a nice guy but his lectures are WAY too fast

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: Professor Johnston is an amazing lecturer and I really enjoyed all of his courses! His lectures were always engaging, eye-opening and inspiring. His extensive knowledge of the course material and passion for English was truly apparent. He is also always available to help and his office hours inspired a lot of my work! go to them :)

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: He's a cool guy and is really passionate. The only things I disliked was the inconsistent marking and that he uses such an extravagant vocabulary so when you're in the middle of a fast paced lecture (they always seem to be) it is really hard to write notes especially if you're bilingual.

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: Excellent professor who is passionate in what he teaches! My only concern is he gives you the awnsers to the quizes when you do not have them returned, therefore you are not given the opurtunity to correct your quizes. I also wish the TA's were a little more consistent in their marking. In conclusion, the course was very interesting & enjoyable.

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: Fast pace in lectures but over all he is very funny and enthusiastic about what is being taught. Class isnt too hard but make sure to do readings and study for weekly quizzes

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: Mark Johnston is a very enjoyable professor to have. He is hilarious and makes the lectures interesting. This man will crack you up! His quizzes are medium diffuculty, but his assignment are challenging. READING HEAVY. He is willing to work one on one with students to help us improve our work and holds lots of office hours. He is a great guy.

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: Such a nice guy and I appreciated was how passionate he is. He definitely brings a good energy. But, if you're only looking for an elective, beware that his class may end up as your toughest. He doesn't use blackboard or give any review/help in terms of testing, for which the questions seem really random. Lectures are all over the place.

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: Enjoyed the class, learned a lot.

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: Floored by the lectures. Casually summarizes Lacan or Hegel and applies their ideas to Euripides or Shakespeare like its no big deal. Ive learned so much, and am leaving the class with valuable foundational knowledge. Would recommend his Tragedy class to anyone, impossible to walk away from this course the same person.

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: He's the most iconic prof I've ever had- If you want to be pushed to the next level I recommend him. I've never had a prof that was so difficult to please, yet genuinely wants his students to do well. He is hilarious, enthusiastic and this alone sparked my interest in the subject. Group project was not bad at all, maybe it should be weighted more.

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: I would literally go to the grave for this man. No other professor has challenged me to deepen and explore my ideas the way he has. He has always pushed me, engaged me, and helped me grow. I cannot stress this enough: I would die for him.

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: He is a fun, engaging, insightful and unusual lecturer. Having taken 326, I thought I knew what I was getting into with the group project. It will be worth it (I said), think of the lectures (I said), but it was like forgetting what pregnancy is like, and then having another baby. As long as you keep that in mind, the course is definately worth it!

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: Johnston's enthusiasm for the content is contagious. The grade distribution could be adjusted though. 25% of the mark comes from a group project, that takes the entire semester, is only 5% more than the 2 page scansion essay. 30% for the group project and a 30% final seems more reasonable.

Name: Mark Johnston
Review: One of the best English profs I have ever had. Although, I think that the course was geared more towards drama students than English students. The group project was a pain, but it was still a good learning experience. Shakespeare classes with this prof are definitely something that I look forward to. His enthusiasm and personality are amazing!

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: Adolescence was hands down the worst course ever structured. An outdated movie every single week for participation points. How is this even allowed? I learned absolutely nothing in this class. What a waste of tuition money. Take this course with someone else.

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: Doesn't answer emails and barely teaches. For our Tuesday Thursday classes, he taught on Tuesdays (which was mainly him veering way off topic from the curriculum) and Thursdays we watched movies, every single week. Very disappointed. If you want an easy A, this is the class for you. If you want to actually learn anything, don't take it.

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: Lectures can ramble and ramble. Agree with previous statements - not sure the reason for mandatory movies for extra credit? Seems like a complete waste of money and time. Avoid!!!!

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: Dr. Mattson is a great professor. He is passionate about his teaching. His classes are interesting. You must attend classes to get the password to access your homework. Attend the class, read the text, do your homework and you should be fine.

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: He talks about the Placebo affect like it is the cure for cancer when really its just a sugar pill. I do not recommend taking this class with Dr Mattson.

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: We watch a 60 min movie every week - every week! There is nothing interesting about this class. The participation grades with the password are a complete joke. I've learned absolutely nothing the first month. Try and take this course with someone else.

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: Rambles a lot in lectures.

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: I learned you can kill time by using outdated videos for an entire semester. The department needs to look into this.

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: People complaining about and attacking a prof offering extra credit in over four different ways. That should be in the DSM under as Lack of Gratitude Disorder. Be sure to rip him apart for caring too much, too. I learned a lot from him. If he teaches nothing new, why was the class avg not 100%? Cause thats a bunch of Maybe come to class?

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: Best prof ever. Love this man!

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: You need to go to class in order to receive the extra credit opportunities. The videos are so outdated and useless. He responds within a week to emails which is annoying. You can meet him during office hours if necessary. I would prefer not to take him again.

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: I pay thousands in tuition. Why am I being told it is mandatory to attend class to have a chance at extra credit? The videos are so bad, he takes a week to answer emails.

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: Lectures are boring, and he doesnt teach any new information. Most of the lecture time is used for outdated and terrible videos that he shows. Lazy prof who uses the same slides and videos from another course he taught. Makes you write 3 essays per exam. Makes you show up for a password. Dont waste your time taking his classes.

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: never had a course where attendance was pretty much mandatory for extra credit

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: Cons: - Too much homework - Good chunk of every class is spent on watching out-dated and boring videos - Emailing him is useless - Can get a bit off topic Pros: - Homework makes up a good chunk of your grade (so it's harder to fail) - Really passionate about what he teaches - Tries to relate topics to current events - Punctual

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: Dr. Mattson seems very passionate about the course, however, I found him to be very disorganized. We had a take home exam and two days before it was due, he realized that he hadn't taught an entire topic. He also shows a film every week/class, which I feel like is lazy teaching. He also has 3 take home exam questions and an actual M/C exam.

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: I really like him! He's so nice and has a lot of knowledge to share if you listen and pay attention! Ignore the negative reviews. They don't reflect his teaching style at all! He's great and I highly recommend him!

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: He's very passionate about the material and clearly intelligent. Definitely don't skip class! He packs a lot of material into his lectures. Super interesting stuff to learn about, and he conveys his enthusiasm to his students.

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: The participation for extra credit is ridiculous.

Name: Scott Mattson
Review: I enjoyed his classes and found the topics to be interesting and he's very knowledgeable about a lot of areas. Also go to class because (a) that's the whole point of taking a class and learning, (b) tuition is expensive so make the most of your degree and (c) that's adulting. Grow up and stop whining and be grateful that you have this opportunity.

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: Really nice caring cool amazing proffesser ddddddddd

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: Really nice caring cool amazing proffesser

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: Amazing best teacher ever

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: Dr. Thistle tends to tell stories rather than teach. It's a really good class but I ended up teaching most of the concepts to myself.

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: great

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: I enjoyed his lectures, course itself was easy.

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: Time for Retirement!! Class could be useful but NOT with Thistle as your teacher......

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: His lectures are absolutely useless, he is too old to be teaching. I do not mean to be rude but he was just such a frustrating professor. His lectures go on tangent and most of the time do not relate to the course. Yet when the midterm and final exam come you look at it confused because you learned  nothing from him. THIS IS NOT A BIRD COURSE

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: Great Prof, Easy A

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: The course was a bit more dull and "historical" than expected but easy assignment and midterm marks. The final though- tough- need to go to class because most of the material was from lectures not in book. He can be harsh at times and tends to pick on people. Very intimidating.

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: This is for anyone that is  registered in the course:                            (1) Do not buy the HTML book, the course website has the HTML code and class lectures help.(2) The Internet Book is very important. ~55% of tests are based on it. (3) Look at previous year's class list webpage assignments for ideas. (4) MTs = EZ

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: Fresh new graduates can deliver the material better than him without using bad words in class and back bite students. no slides, u have to attend his class because he wont post a summary or info about what he said in class, hid class isn't interesting at all

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: Surprisingly not bad. I received perfect on the M/C section of midterm and 35/40 on coding. He basically gives out a free 8% for file upload and index page. The only thing that is hard is the final (worth 50%). NEED TO GO TO LECTURES, HE GIVES OUT A LOT OF HINTS!

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: He doesnt take up the internet book in class but its fallowed to the letter in lecture. He talks about his personal life a lot but at first it seems irrelevant but its related to the course

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: This man seriously needs to retire. He is way too old to be teaching. The lectures are pretty useless, therefore I only went to about half of them and just read the text..but once I got to the final I realized I probably should've gone more often haha. Still got a B though! KNOW YOUR HTML CODES!

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: Very rude person and he will single you out if you talk in class(even if your at the back of the class). Lets put it this way, if you study hard and do the work you will get a good grade. It is hard tho

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: This teacher is a slow in teaching and does not teach. All he does is talk about useless things about his life which is completely useless to everyone. If you do not know how to write HTML language then never take this course because it is completely useless with this teacher.

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: okay...

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: Mid-term: 100 fill-in-the-blank; Final: 60 M/C, 2 short ans., 1 long ans., 60 HTML Coding fill in the blank. He gave out exam hints during class, as people never showed up to the night class!!! You'll get an A+ if you study everything :)

Name: Doug Thistle
Review: This guy is hilarious. "I'm not shouting!" cracks me up every time. If you're not "into" computers then don't take this class. It's somewhat more difficult for those that just cannot stand anything to do with computers and software. Mid-term and assignments were straight forward and easy. With normal studying, I managed an A+.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: Overall great class that is structured incredibly easy to follow. Would highly recommend.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: I was in his Child Psych class and I loved it. He posted his Powerpoints online before class and would post updated ones with audio files of him explaining each slide. I got a perfect mark on the research paper and the rubric was really easy to follow. The midterm and exam were multiple choice and he was clear on what was going to be on them.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: Overall great class and great prof. Everything is laid out for you to do well in this course. Take advantage of the materials and you will be fine.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: Dr Beliciu is a very great professor who takes time teaching concepts instead of reading them from a screen. Lectures are mandatory and expect a lower grade on exams if you dont go to lectures. For papers, they mark EVERY word. If this class is not required for your program, I would recommend taking something else, its just a harder Psych class.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: Daniel is a great prof and Child Psych is a very interesting class. You are graded on a midterm (35), Paper (20) and Final (45). The midterm is probably the easiest assessment so do well on that. Paper is not difficult but FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS WORD FOR WORD. Final is a bit tricky though. Make sure you attend class as all MC comes from lectures.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: Professor Beliciu is an engaging teacher with knowledgeable skills in the realm of developmental psychology. His lectures are very entertaining and he brings real-world examples into the classroom. I would recommend showing up to class though, most of the topics he covers are on his slides and are mostly fill in the blanks. Overall, amazing prof!

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: Professor Beliciu ensures that his students are engaged in the material he is teaching by giving real life examples as well as being funny as hell. I genuinely looked forward to each of his classes. He is very approachable outside of class and wants to see his students succeed! The tests are a little tricky; Focused more on lectures than textbook

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: Had him for child psych. Very good speaker, engages students and gives really interesting information about the topic. Super kind and gives really clear and great instructions for papers and exams !

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: I have to thank Professor Beliciu for being so caring and fair toward his students. He is a fantastic professor that help students during office hours, the best professor I ever had so far. He shows dedication and compassion for his students. The material and lectures are straightforward. If you show up to class, you will get a good grade.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: Took child psych with him over the summer, great guy. Exams are very fair, and slides are heavy in content. Loved the guy and his style of teaching. Didnt do as well as I wanted to but more studying could definitely have been done on my part. Some profs really do make a positive difference :)

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: He tells you exactly how to study for the final exam. Put the effort in and you will get an A.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: Wednesday night class that is structured to have a midterm, group project, and final exam. Each week he meets with the groups to make sure everyone is on task. The specifications for the paper are simple. Follow the sample papers and you will do fine. He was a good prof, and definitely helped out our group throughout the semester.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: He was a really awesome prof! He basically took questions for all of the lecture slides, and the exam isn't cumulative! I really recommend, and I suggest going to class because he gives really important hints for midterms and exams. The text book is recommended, I did use it however, and it helped me understand examples and concepts a lot better!

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: Final exam was done at 2pm and final grades were posted by 9pm same day. You have to appreciate this. He's a good prof and is very structured. Go to class, study the slides, and follow the sample paper. If you do all these steps you should have no issues. I would recommend him for sure.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: I had a really difficult semester in general. A lot of personal issues back home that put a strain on my academics. Whether it was during office hours or just after class he would sit and just listen to me. He probably doesnt realize how much that actually meant to have someone listen to me. Sounds crazy but he really helped me out this semester.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: I am an SAS student and employee in the office who has taken three of his courses. I feel it is imperative to indicate how he is extremely accommodating and helpful to all students especially SAS students. There is a comment here that states he does not help SAS students. This is far from the truth and should be removed. Thank you Prof Beliciu!

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: He basically helped our group each week reach our goal. Very helpful and responds to emails instantly. As a parent it was nice to learn some reasoning behind things I dealt with growing up. I enjoyed the class.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: Great guy, no issues at all.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: Overall, you can't go wrong picking a course with him. He knows his stuff, and he's friendly. I'd recommend going to class because the slides posted are missing info you'll only get from in-lecture slides. He only tests on content he has taught, and his paper criteria are super clear. In class examples show up on tests too. A solid course choice.

Name: Daniel Beliciu
Review: He's a little cocky but super funny and approachable. He tries a little too hard to be a 'cool' and relatable prof. Overall he is pretty good, he knows his stuff and gives a lot of examples. He is a fair marker and doesn't test anything he didn't cover in lecture. He's a nice guy and a good prof.

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: Super nice guy and overall good teacher. He's a little boring but some of the material was interesting. Easy class I recommend it as an elective if you want a good grade!

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: Guy has tenure for a reason. Knows his stuff and knows how to deliver a lecture great prof

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: Eh.  The few times he didn't go off topic, the lectures were interesting...all the other times, though, lectures were filled with sexual jokes and digressions to the point that I didn't feel the need to go to class.  Most things he lectured on was in the book.  He was, however, approachable and a fair marker.  Wouldn't recommend though.

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: Knows his field. Slides avail.online if you miss his lectures which just explains in DETAIL (too much detail sometime, goes on and on). Hard to focus with his monotone voice. Too many conversations with front row students when they should be private(not everyone can hear)and continue with course content-holds us back and whole class gets restless.

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: Booth is a good teacher, but boring one in my opinion. He is the type of guy that is very interested in discussing the sexuality and gender in a broader sense... that's cool! He jokes alot with women as well...

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: He also taught me 102. I think he is an amazing professor, although he is mono-tone he is an amazing lecturer. Booth is very knowledgeable on most of the material in any course he teaches. I would take any Soci course he teaches. :)

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: Very boring prof.. he's monotone, tells irrelevant stories.. all his lectures entale are the notes he posts online (he just reads them).. horrible class, but make sure you know your facts (statistics are key)..

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: Very good prof. However, he was very monotone and the lectures were quite boring. He is very fair with marks and gives plenty of hints.

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: He was a bit monotone at times and made some not so funny jokes. However, the class was fairly easy that I took. His lectures went by the textbook and the exams in my opinion were of decent difficulty.

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: Unlike everyone else, i thought he was a HORRIBLE professor.  Definitely the worst i've ever had in my 4 years of university.  He made horrible comments about religions (had i been religious, i would have been extremely pissed!) and he made rude comments about women.  I was not impressed with him at all.

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: HOT!!

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: He is the best professor I have met yet!!  The only sane one on campus, please don't leave us all behind!!

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: Awsome professor! Very caring and helpful!! I am taking 48-102 next semester because he is teaching it! His mid term and exams are fair, and he actually has notes on the website for his clases, which makes life MUCH easier. Take him if you can:) but I think he is retiring soon.:((( that's really sad/....

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: Take Soc of Sex.Its a very good course. . Intro to SOC. course was really boring though.It Simplified many concepts to the point of stupifying you. I feel  less intelegent after taking first year intro to soc.

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: This was one of my favourite classes ever. Possibly one of the most compassionate and caring profs I have met. Very informative and interesting lectures.

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: Good guy, lecture notes are on the website, has another prof teach with him. Really easy class to forget about though, I didn't go often because when I did I didn't feel like it was worth my time, the text has a webpage where you can pretest yourself along with summaries.

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: Great Prof.. really knows his stuff!  Doesnt like Catholics much, but hes not a PHD in religion!  I think he may be an athiest though.  But itdoesnt matter, hes a good teacher, and a very intellegent man!

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: No Comments

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: I love Prof. Booth.. He made all my first year sociology classes good.. He was a good prof.. he knew what he was talking about!  He was always so helpful and understanding...  He was fair.. The test werent the easiest sometimse but he gaves us hints and he taught the material well!

Name: Gerald Booth
Review: excellent guy

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: Never Again.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: Letteri is the type of Professor to put his Twitter in your syllabus. He will read to you out of the book(s) he expects you to read, in a gruesomely slow and monotone manner. As if he's reading a bedtime story. 'Accommodating' comes to mind. As in he will accommodate himself to as much of your time (money) as he possibly can.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: he was good. make sure to read the books and really understand them and you will do awesome!

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: Books were essentially read to you in class. He wastes a lot of time listening to student's anecdotes and rushes to finish the material. This class should only be used for people who like to read or philosopher majors. It does not count as a language credit, just art. Be careful with this class - it's a waste of time.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: It's clear he knows a lot about the subjects he teaches, but he manages to explain concepts in a way that make it more difficult than it has to be. Very tough grader and each of his exam only has a handful of questions, often not the topics we spent much time discussing. Failing one question its a huge ding in your mark. Would NOT recommend.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: Does not really explain concepts well. Has a disdain for technology. Talks down to class constantly. I would not recommend taking his classes; he posts no slides or any online material, and is very unclear about what will be on exams. Nice enough guy though.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: He is very knowledgeable and interested in what he teaches. There are no electronics allowed in class (all notes must be written) but I found it to be helpful and made studying easy. You need to be able to make connections to the different topics he teaches in order to do well on the exams. I really enjoyed his class.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: Letteri has amazing lectures and is very well spoken, you will never be confused about what he is saying. Enjoys class discussions, friendly and passionate about what he teaches. LOTS of reading, but got by with a decent grade from just attending lectures. You MUST attend lectures. I would only recommend this class to people who like to write ALOT

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: I'm assuming those who are complaining below never actually went to classs and took notes, or understand philosophical ideas. Sure, you have to apply yourself a little more (by actively taking notes) but you do that and you'll be fine! It's really not that hard. I find taking notes then re-reading them on my own really help me understand!

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: I was afraid to miss lectures, I feel as though youd miss too much. I didnt quite understand what the point of this class was, or what to expect on exams, I did really enjoy though how he does his lectures, he knows very well what hes teaching which makes it nice to listen to. I did not read the first of the books but the lectures were enough

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: Don't waiste your time with this prof. You can tell teaching isn't calling. He just does it for the pay. I took 3 of his courses before. I barely passed one and dropped the other two.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: Prof is knowledgable and passionate about PHIL. Sometimes tough to follow, scrambling to take notes down, but worth it. After re-reading my notes it all makes sense. he uses a lot of sources to help you understand better. he engages the class but doesn't force you to speak for points. no electronics - love this idea! you really focus more this way

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: Great engaging lectures. If you attend class and take notes + read text you should do great.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: Lots of readings but I didn't do them and still got a good mark based on the lectures. Very monotone voice so I fell asleep in class a couple times. Other than that he's an alright dude.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: If youre in his first year year philosophy class it has a lot of reading and does not like giving out good marks on the mid terms and exams. He is a fair marker if you know your content but dont expect to pass if you dont do the readings because his lectures are pointless and boring and dont help with the testing.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: Lectures were very unclear, all the teaching consisted of was talking. Very minimal visuals or information given to us. Basically taught myself and still had an unsure idea going into the final.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: Although graded by only 3 things, he only includes information that is assessable from his lectures. So while it's helpful to read the books, it's not needed. However, his voice is very monotone, and while the lecture are all you need, they do get very boring.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: Terrible prof. Extremely boring and drags on. Relies on the TA for information from the course way too much and doesn't allow laptops in class. 10/10 would not recommend.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: The worst professor. So boring and monotone. It's absolutely ridiculous to expect anyone to sit and listen to him ramble for that long.

Name: Mark Letteri
Review: I'm a philosophy major and found the class to be very bias towards his own opinions. However, if you take good notes and actually pay attention in class (can be difficult because he's kinda dull) then you will get a decent mark. Incorporate your own knowledge from other classes to get an A. You MUST attend class but I don't recommend for non-majors

Name: William Altenhof
Review: 4th year had him for LabVIEW. Kicks students out of class if they are reading labview course material that isnt apart of his current lecture. During the first midterm, test didnt even start yet and one student went back to his bag because he forgot his calculator.. instant ZERO and kicked out the room. Enough said.

Name: William Altenhof
Review: In terms of teaching fundamentals and teaching the basics, Altenhof is great. Puts emphasis on KNOWING the material and not just knowing how to do it. The tutorials are a bit unfair as multiple long questions are assigned but in the last 15 minutes, he tells you what one is being graded. Exams are challenging and graded very rigorously.

Name: William Altenhof
Review: Had him for dynamics, machine dynamics, and now LabVIEW. For LabVIEW my review: He isn't a bad guy but makes the course extremely difficult by not posting the notes. He emails us assignments. The average on 1st exam was 25%, 2nd was 60-70% (dont remember). Only final project. He curved me by 25-30%. All notes you can find on LabVIEW site.

Name: William Altenhof
Review: awesome

Name: William Altenhof
Review: If you expected it to be easy why go into engineering? Don't worry, chegg will help you get your paper that you don't deserve. Altenhof is the gate keeper (kind of). He still passes too many people that don't deserve it. For machine you read his notes an do the tutorial problems and understand them. Then you'll do decent

Name: William Altenhof
Review: He is a very tough and strict proff, but he is fair and respected. At first you might not like him and feel lost, but at the end of the day you will learn alot from him in all aspects. If you wanna pass make sure you work you butt off cuz he is a very tough grader but always cruves alot since his exams are hell

Name: William Altenhof
Review: Dynamics was very hard; Machine Dynamics was not as hard. He thinks that everybody is a genius like him.

Name: William Altenhof
Review: Very strict.

Name: William Altenhof
Review: I feel like going to class is useless. Use the textbook, just remember his marking scheme during exams. The midterm was easy, but he marks tough. You expect a 70 but get a 30.  For the group project don't pick lazy people.

Name: William Altenhof
Review: He'd be nice if he weren't so mean

Name: William Altenhof
Review: This Professor is solid. No talking, no cell phones, no laptops in lectures or tutorials. He really understands teaching fundamentals. All the cheaters and slackers fail his class, the hard workers pass. He emulates what is needed at the University of Windsor in regards to professionalism and ethics.

Name: William Altenhof
Review: Great person to talk to in person. Always full of energy and willing to teach. Doesn't post much online because all of it is written, which forces students to learn the material.  Even recognizes people who show up to class often.

Name: William Altenhof
Review: This is the hardest class in the entire syllabus, do not miss a class. I solved all the questions in the book and I still find it hard. The question on the exam were from the book but he marking scheme is pretty hard. DONT forget the RTF

Name: William Altenhof
Review: amazing lecture but he is a tough grader

Name: William Altenhof
Review: To be honest.... the best prof ever ... He explains everything and he seems tough but actually he is really nice prof if you go to his lecture you will earn more than you expect.

Name: William Altenhof
Review: Awful prof. not helpful and marks harder then anyone I have ever had. Do not take his course unless you really want a bad mark

Name: William Altenhof
Review: very bad class

Name: William Altenhof
Review: He is a really bad professor, he is very scary and intimidating making you unwilling to learn. If you have a chance DO NOT take his course.

Name: William Altenhof
Review: He sucks

Name: William Altenhof
Review: Altenhof has a pair & that's admirable ! Producing useful, dedicated engineers is a tough gig, but somebody has to do it. Just do your work and all will be well.

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: Quickest prof at answering emails. Everyone says this class is hard but the material is straightforward. Labs are an easy mark booster, and he even allows for extra credit on both exams and labs. Explain everything well and you'll get an A+. Also buy the SOS package. Was scared going into this class, but this has been my highest mark to date!

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: I barely passed math in grade 11 and never took any math in grade 12 during my years in highschool. I passed the his stats class with over a 90% and I didnt even work that hard to earn the grade. This class is a breeze if you actually go to class and pay attention. The kind of math you do in this course is grade school math. People just dont try.

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: Skip class and study by yourself. Bad lecture notes, bad at teaching all he does is shout hello hello, GA should get paid because I learn more in labs. Study from the past papers and labs. MAKE SURE YOU DO PERFECT IN THE LAB

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: PSA FOR ALL STUDENTS WHO NEED BQM FOR THEIR PROGRAM: The course is extremely easy, the prof just makes the material seem VERY confusing in class. If you study the material on your own and do the practice exams the prof gives you, the class is an easy A. (I read all the negative reviews before I took this class BUT its really not hard!!!)

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: You learn more in labs than you do in the lectures, However do not miss the lectures. Hes a fast talker so its easy to get behind if not paying close attention. It actually haunts me with how much he says hello or yeah? I do not recommend taking his class if you dont have to

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: Bruh. This guy is just bad. Did not learn a thing from his 3 hour lectures, learned more in the lab. He's honestly the worst, and I'm still having nightmares about how often he says "hello". Straight up no point in going to lectures, go to labs and make sure you know how to do everything on the past midterms and exams to prepare for the exam.

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: Although his lectures are heavy and can get confusing at times, the actual work he asks you to complete is not hard at all. The lab reports really boost your grade, and the midterm was a breeze if you actually studied. People who don't get good grades are the same people who don't show up for class. Don't get discouraged by the other reviews!

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: The hardest class I have ever taken is Basic Quan Methods with Alan Phipps. He does not take his students seriously and expects his students to know the material. He does not teach well at all!! Do not take this class unless you absolutely have to!!

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: Phipps is a terrible teacher. He is ignorant and takes joy in seeing people fail. His tests are hard to finish in time and are repetitive. He does a terrible job of teaching and collects his own data for the class (very boring). I wanted to cry in the exam.

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: Stats class was difficult, he does not explain anything. Had to teach myself and my lab instructor was more informative than him. Labs and clicker marks does help a lot but when it comes to the exams you know nothing

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: Hard teacher who barely teaches or explains anything. His exams are difficult and never gives you enough time to finish. If you want to pass, you need to get 100% on all labs and clicker questions.

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: He is very rude. Does not care at all about his students. He makes fun of students in class and calls them stupid. In addition, he does not teach or even make sense. His questions on the midterms make no sense but if you can find a way to de-code what he is asking you should be able to pass. Only help was the SOS.

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: Is there a rating of 0 available? He designs the midterms and exams so that you fail. He gives you only 1.5 hours to complete it, even though the class itself is 3 hours long. Rushes through every class. Makes no sense at all, and says "Hello" WAY TOO MUCH. Hope for a good TA in your lab- it is your only hope to pass the class.

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: Very enthusiastic professor. He's very knowledgeable in what he teaches, and he explains everything good in class (waay better than the book). I recomend to go to class and to memorize the slides and you'll be good. 1 midterm, 2 mini assignments and 1 final which were all easy and straight forward questions (no trick questions). Good overall

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: Phipps was by far the worst prof I have ever had. He doesn't teach at all, I learned everything from my lab GA who was fantastic. He makes everything extremely confusing and way too wordy to even decipher what the question is asking. Tests are way too long and repetitive. Overall a 0/10.

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: Dr. Phipps is a decent professor. He wants students to pass, but his lectures are horribly confusing. He says "hello" far too often. We had a girl break down crying in our midterm so that'll tell you a little bit about the course. Overall though, you can pass if you do the assignments and are half decent at test taking.

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: After 4 months of Alan's class he has become my dad. I love him so much. He always says hello to me when I don't answer questions. Also gave me a great grade , and plays sweet jams during the break.

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: As long as you attend class, answer the clicker questions, show up to the labs, and do the labs you should be able to ace the class. He's somewhat hard to understand at times, but if you attend the SOS help offered by the University of Windsor for midterm and exam help everything should make sense.

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: I hate stats. It's hard for me. This professor; however, designs the class in a way so you can pass. Everything is practical. He is the only prof that understands we pay so much, and he WANTS to pass us. Doesn't even use textbook. Buy a clicker, do your lab reports, and show up to class! This prof CARES.

Name: Alan Phipps
Review: Phipps is quite the character. This stats class was super difficult but there's lots of opportunity to succeed between clicker marks and lab assignments. Overall the lectures weren't horrible but he's sometimes hard to understand.

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: The content of the course makes you want to saw your head off with a calculator, but he's not a bad professor. You can tell he knows the content and makes it as bearable as possible.

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: Stevens is an awesome prof. Although his lectures are as dry as toast he is super easy. He gives you exactly what you need to know before exams, no tricks. He is a slow marker but who cares you'll get an A anyways.

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: Jim is such a passionate and caring professor. Yes, accounting is already boring, but Jim really tries to make it interesting for everyone who attends. He is always available for extra help. I strongly recommend him over any other accounting prof.

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: Knows how to code which is always a well respected skill. Developed a system himself and is very qualified. Lots of good examples, he is monotoned but overall a great, approachable guy

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: Prof. Stevens is THE best choice for Audit, if you are lucky enough to find him teaching it that semester. He has REAL experience and very deep knowledge of the process and the industry, and you can tell he is very passionate about it all. Straight-forward marking scheme: midterm, final, 15% assignment. Go to class + follow his hints  get an A!

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: Prof. Stevens is a very good professor and overall a really great guy. AIS is honestly just a boring course and he tries his best to make it interesting with mixed results. He tells you exactly what to study and his notes for the class are top notch. If you want to actually learn something and not just get an easy A take him, otherwise avoid him.

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: Good Professor who understands that students have other classes. Always looking to benefit his class and always there to help you if you come to him. Really Good guy and made me choose accounting as something I want to pursue. Build your time table around his classes.

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: Jim has to be my favourite prof! I've taken him for AIS and into to intermediate accounting. I received A's in both classes. I do have to say that he can be boring at times it takes a lot of attention not to daze off. If you listen to him and review slides prior to the exams you'll do fine.  He will throw in a joke to see if you're listening. 1010

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: Professor Stevens is passionate about accounting. His online lectures are hard to follow, so much extra information. In reading passed comments about him I am surprised at my experience. Class average is very low, was very inconsistent & unhelpful. Did not provide old exams. And on the final 3 major problems were based on one concept. Discouraged.

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: I'm very surprised at how high his rating is. I'm taking his online class now and the class average is a 43% . No need to explain further.

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: Took the online Managerial Accounting (70-255) section with Jim Stevens. Really great professor. Very understandable prof for those not strong in accounting. Made an incredibly boring mandatory course very easy to follow. Recommended for sure

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: I HATE ACCOUNTING! But Jim Stevens made it SOOOO EASY AND UNDERSTANDABLE! no wonder he gets "prof of the year for accounting department." I had to take this course twice because previously some idiot prof didn't make sense and I only got 8% on the midterm...yes only 8%. With Jim Stevens, my final mark was A-. Amazinggg prof

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: Jim is incredibly kind and helpful. He loves what he does and it shows with the high quality of his teaching. I admit, the class can get boring, but it is audit after all. Jim also assisted me outside of class with a dilemma I had with the ICAO. I'll never forget how hard he worked to help me despite being incredibly busy. Highly recommended!

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: he tries really hard to crack a joke and have some fun but he fails terribly. he also lectures with his eyes closed ? so it's hard to pay attention. he reads off slides and makes students feel dumb if they dont understand immediately.

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: He tries to make the class fun, and will bring relevant material in the exam. Just don't dose off, you can tell he really likes what he does.Pay attention , read the textbook, and you will be fine!!

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: Gotta give him credit for trying to make accounting interesting, but this class honestly is soooo boring :( On exams, he actually makes u feel stupid cuz u dont know wats going on.

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: decent teacher I guess. Classes are long and boring. m/c way too hard. exams and mid terms rather fair. gives sample exams which  are basically the same questions on the exams.

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: Great professor.  Really helpful if you don't understand the material.  Uses lots of examples in class.  Multiple choice questions on the exams are tough, but will give you pointers on what to look for on the exams.  Best accounting prof I've ever had!

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: Prof Stevens is a very helpful teacher in a very boring subject. he will do whatever it takes to make sure that you pass. I strongly recommend taking him if possible.

Name: Jim Stevens
Review: best prof for accounting.

Name: James Winter
Review: If you're looking for a class with lots of interesting movies, a kind prof, and 3 of the easiest exams you'll ever write, Id suggest you take film studies. Just make sure you're there at the very start of class or he won't accept your paper.

Name: James Winter
Review: Okay

Name: James Winter
Review: Nice guy, but not so great as an instructor. Sounded a bit full of himself. Thinks that he knows everything, which is not true. I expected more from this class, but sadly paid for 6 credits and did not learn any valuable/new information.

Name: James Winter
Review: A good professor and an interesting class, watched lots of good movies and it is important to your exams.

Name: James Winter
Review: if you know someone who took the class before you, you dont even have to show up. Just watch the movies at home and read their notes on his lecture. exams are multiple choice and all the questions are on blackboard. all you have to do is google the answers and memorize.

Name: James Winter
Review: Winter is an old school prof with good intentions & a sense of humor. No phones & no laptops in class. Lectures were unorganized but interesting & he sometimes shuts down opposing views (unintentionally I think). Tests were fair M/C based on specifics from lectures & readings. Paper was heavily weighted but on a related topic of our choice.

Name: James Winter
Review: He taught me intro to film studies. he honestly wants the students to do well unlike a lot of other profs. Even if you disagree with his views it doesn't really matter. He doesn't mind discussing opinions. And if you don't care that much then just memorize the MC and you're guaranteed a good mark on the tests

Name: James Winter
Review: So condicending when students participate in class. Says the class is to build an understanding and opinion for film and be able to analysis for a full appreciation. But everything is based on his opinion on the film (usually feminist). His exams are all multiple choice but usually "what is the most right" but all answers in the question are right

Name: James Winter
Review: Dr. Winter is one of the most unique and interesting professors at the U. He was the first prof I encountered in University that took the time to learn our names and ask us every day for feedback. He is very eccentric but he is so full of knowledge and quick wit. I only wish I could have taken more of his courses, truly my favourite professor.

Name: James Winter
Review: I had him in 2014. While he is still a "my opinion is always right" kind of professor, he's completely bearable, especially since he's honest enough to admit that he wants the whole class to become feminists. He is a decent guy, the course is easy, just do the work. Ignore the feminist indoctrination, listen to what he says, and enjoy easy marks!

Name: James Winter
Review: I emailed the professor asking for clarification - he replied with a sarcastic and unhelpful 3 word email with lots of exclamation marks. I called him out, and he reported me to the provost. It never got better. I have no idea how he is teaching. Avoid if possible.

Name: James Winter
Review: Stupidest class ever. Don't take unless you must. Makes me question teaching. This class is so bad, all I can do is laugh to keep from throwing things at the prof.

Name: James Winter
Review: Two rules of thumb - know his opinion and don't stray from it (even if you disagree), and never use a cell or laptop in class! He makes his opinion known and, if you don't agree, you're wrong. Tests even have "in professors opinion..." as questions. Has called out students for cell phone use, and thrown them out. Knows his stuff, but, wow...

Name: James Winter
Review: Each professor has their own way of teaching. We should put our bias away in the very beginning. I am not a big fan of him in the very  beginning, but I changed my mind later. He is so helpful and very kind. Anyway, I think he is a great professor!

Name: James Winter
Review: Didn't teach us anything. Just put on a movie and then went on about his opinion on the movie afterwards. All the actual learning was Independent and in the text book. Wasn't open to personal opinion and made people feel dumb for having one.

Name: James Winter
Review: Surprised the class and his ego didn't clash as much as I thought it would at the beginning of the course. Seemed only to be teaching to spite the dean. Does not allow any computer or cell phone use so if that is your thing stay away.

Name: James Winter
Review: If you are closed-minded you will rate this great professor poorly. He is brilliant and unique. His classes are fabulous. He presents an unusual perspective and lets you choose your preference. BUT, you have to demonstrate an awareness of alternative views to the mainstream.

Name: James Winter
Review: Preface on the final read "This class is not about regurgitating the teacher's opinion...". Fully a third of the questions than began with "In the professor's opinion..." That's all you need to know. He's a windbag, plain and simple. Just choose whatever answer most bashes the media or the mainstream in general and you're good to go.

Name: James Winter
Review: Very disorganized. His midterms were largely based on his opinions. Interrupts students, and argues if he disagrees. Not professional, in the very least. His lectures are hard to sit through. Save yourself the headache. Don't take this class.

Name: James Winter
Review: He is opinionated and arrogant. You have to use the textbooks he wrote as class texts and no opinion is correct but his own. Tests are easy if you know to pick the answer that shouldn't be correct. Don't disagree with him or an argument ensues. Class is always entertaining though for that reason.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Theres a reason everyone wants her classes. Shes so kind, helpful, brilliant, and beautiful. Absolutely one in a billion.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Shes a superstar to us! Exams are focused on lectures. Everyone adores her because she is always willing to listen and she is so respected but it doesnt get to her head. Very beautiful and very smart and she knows it.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: She is such a sweet and caring person! Her lectures are engaging and she will answer any questions and will talk to you during office hours no problem. Tests are fair, as long as you listen to the lectures and take notes! Definitely suggest this class to anyone who needs a grade booster or a little break from work overload (:

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Awesome prof, never gets upset and answers your questions even though she is constantly surrounded by students.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: what a thoughtful professor, she is understanding and is really nice to students. if you have a problem she never gets upset. my assignment was late and she was supportive. lectures are awesome and her classes tend to be huge, a gem.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Classes are enjoyable and go by fast. She makes it interesting because you aren't only evaluated by exams.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Pretty awesome prof. Organized and thoughtful to students.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Very kind and thoughtful and sure students love her but she expects a lot for an intro class especially if you dont major in the subject. You had to read 16 chapters of a textbook which is alot. Her book was a great read though, she is a great writer.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: I used to like her... I took a class with her before and her lectures were so enjoyable and as long as you took notes you could easily pass with a 90. This semester she was moody, unapproachable, gave unclear guidelines and seems to hate her students and want them to fail. Took this class a grade boost and it's bringing down my GPA... avoid

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Best prof. She is so funny, I take any SOC class that sh is teaching. She makes class fun and is so chill. You can go to her office hours to literally talk and chill with her. Her exams are super easy if your nice to her and show her you care about her class and your grades. Easy to study for, and a class I actually looked forward to!!! best. prof.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: An overall amazing prof. Super sweet, funny, and approachable. Her midterms are more than fair and she doesnt expect too much from you. I wouldnt recommend buying the textbook for her class, it is not needed at all. Only issue is her notes can be a little disorganized. Other than that, keeps me very interested and love her personality

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Class gets boring and you will want to nap. Very disorganized. Don't buy her book; it is useless.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Easy first year class. Just follow the syllabus. Textbook helped.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: a soft spoken profesor with a powerful and beautiful presence. Her classes end and students dont get up to leave! She delivers lectures with ease and fun but boy does she know her stuff... so don't be turned off by her youthfulness. Hard final exam, must study.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Professor Renu is fantastic! She is so knowledgeable about the different topics of social life, she is so young but has a ton of wisdom snd experience which makes her lectures the best I ever had. It is obvious why everyone loves her, and she has such a lasting presence on students, cant forget her beauty and stylful appearance.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: So much of hype over this prof, and while her classes were interesting and engaging, there was alot of material to cover. Presentations were awesome and really made learning fun but lots of work. Dr Persaud is an amazing professor, but people need to focus on her skill as a professor not her beautiful appearance.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Dr. Renu is an outstanding professor. She is very intelligent and cordial. Most of her instructional content will resonate with you due to her teaching style. I had a very pleasant experience this semester and I will definitely take more classes with Dr. Renu in the near future.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Knowledgeable, passionate and an organized class. You need to study for exams. Attend classes. It's a great experience to have a class with this great prof.

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Amazing, very inspirational, very approachable, very smart, very beautiful! Cannot ask for more in a prof, best at U of Windsor

Name: Renu Sharma-Persaud
Review: Gives many hints towards midterms and exams in lectures, and often makes her own slides focusing on key ideas. Go to class to get the insights!

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: This prof got through like 3 slides per lecture. If you have no interest in politics, you will get bored during his lectures. If you do not show up and stay on top of your readings, you can finish with a good mark. He uses the textbook he wrote and does refer to it when it comes to the 2 midterms and the final exam. Each is worth 1/3 of your mark.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: Good teacher. Had an obsession with Quebec though.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: Really enjoyed my time with Dr. Brooks. Had two courses with him, and wished I had more time with him! Great textbooks, and Brooks provides updates to the text in his slides. 3 exams, following the same pattern, and multiple choice questions tend to be tough and very specific. Great prof, very impassioned. And very unbiased to political ideology.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: If you attend class and listen to him, he gives you every opportunity to succeed. Exams are on what he talks about in class, not the readings. Great lecturer and an overall great prof.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: Wow, Brooks has his classes down to a science. Lectures are impassioned and clear, you can tell he genuinely cares about teaching politics in a understandable way. No assignments other than readings and three exams, he gives great hints and has amazing online resources, even his own podcasts. Windsor is lucky to have him. Will take his other class.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: Ive taken many courses with Dr. Brooks and I feel that hes by far the best poli sci prof at Windsor. You are graded very fairly and on few things. His lectures are fantastic, and anyone with an interest in politics will look forward to them. An A is very achievable if you study your notes and do readings.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: Very dry lectures. Gets through like 3 slides a class, so deep dives are all it is. Very informative, but very boring. Tests are mostly fair, but some MC questions come out of nowhere, and I had to rely on what I knew from other courses to answer them. Writes a fantastic textbook though. First class that I consistently skipped in university.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: Really good prof, shows a thorough understanding of the topic and can teach it effectively. Lectures were helpful and informative but VERY dry. Only other issue would be that a few of his multiple choice questions felt too specific, like you had to know every detail of the course, but he gave bonus marks so it's not a big deal. Would take again.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: absolutely love his classes. had to take 6 polisci courses as a minor and unfortunately only have him for 2 of the 6. Would have loved to have him for all 6. great teacher. very intelligent.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: Brooks offers a very clear and concise lecture that offers you straightforward and pertinent information. Furthermore, he utilizes a variety of transcripts and articles in order to present literal excerpts as verbatim. He is careful to express his rather fair opinions and indicates when doing so. His marking schemes are also greatly reasonable

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: Dr. Brooks is a very kind, down to earth guy. Very approachable and open to questions during class. But I found him boring, and it was easy to lose focus during his lectures. He rarely, if ever engages with the class by asking questions to keep students interested and spends a lot of time reading long paragraphs off his powerpoints, to my dismay.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: About the best prof I've studied under at Windsor. Extensively knowledge, approachable and fair. His lower level courses are meant to be enlightening and informative, not punishing. You could survive without attending lectures, but you'd be missing out. If you genuinely care to learn poli sci, there's no better man.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: Favourite poli sci prof at the U. Enjoyable lectures, midterms are reasonable and grades reasonably. If you don't want to read the books just come to class.  The only downfall is that he is not reachable outside of class, even via email, will not discuss midterms with you and does not have office hours.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: Brooks is engaging and explains topics well. You can tell he's passionate about his work. The entirety of your grade is made up of three tests though, so its easy to fall behind. You need to be disciplined with keeping up with the readings and paying attention for a good grade!

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: Dr. Brooks is a great professor. His lectures are structured exceptionally well and also follow the textbook. It is important to attend his classes, as he does elaborate on many issues, politicians, etc. The exams are fairly good-be sure to stay caught up on your readings and you will do well. Overall, he is one of a kind and very kind!

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: Brooks is a very good prof. Sometimes he can go off on a tangent and forget his point, but overall he is a very intelligent man and wants the best for his students. He is very approachable. Midterms and exams are easy as long as you do your readings or show up to class; he posts all powerpoints online, which are basically the textbook word for word

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: Brooks lectures were awesome! It's clear that his lectures are super thought-out and organized. He has a story behind every concept and term, which helps you to remember. (Beneficial during an exam) With OCD, his repetition to say "ok" after every sentence is aggravating.  His exams are challenging. If you don't like attending class, don't take it.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: I highly recommend Stephen Brooks, great professor is there for his students and is very approachable for additional help. Be sure to read the chapters he assigns, cause they will be on the exams he provides throughout the semester. Very knowledgeable, and you can tell he enjoys what he teaches. Take every class you can that he teaches, GREAT PROF

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: I am an engineering major, but this class isn't that bad. It tends to expand your mind about general issues, as the first midterm gave me a more clear eye about the world. Come to every lecture and read the chapters he specifies. Understanding politics and history and a good grade is guanteed in this class.

Name: Stephen Brooks
Review: very good teacher

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Although extremely good looking, Bajic has no understanding of how to properly teach a classroom, with lessons going on for what feels like ages, at the end of class, after having drawn 50 graphs, I still don't understand what i'm looking at. The only thing saving me in this class is my Econ lab, which is easy to cheat on, which i would recommend.

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Bajic is the worst teacher I've ever had in my 15 years or so in the education system. His lectures will put you to sleep, but at the same time you wanna stay awake and look around all the confused faces around the classroom. Going to this class is a waste of your time. If it's required for you, read the textbook. Don't go. SOS - STAY AWAY

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Bajic's a good guy and I feel like he'd be a decent prof if you go into his class with a pretty good understanding of Economics. But as someone who didn't I only find myself more lost after every lecture. He just draws graph after graph and when i open my notes to study i don't know what any of them mean anymore. Just study the textbook instead.

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Don't take his class. Save yourself some pain. Worst prof I have ever had. Aside from his references to beer, I enjoyed no part of his class. I think if he taught Econ in Serbian I would have a similar understanding to his English teaching. #ItsMillerTime

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: I came to university with a good knowledge of economics. Going to his classes has somehow managed to REDUCE my overall knowledge of the content. How is this possible you ask? Through his thick accent, he managed to complicate simple examples with ease. When I leave class I feel like I just finished banging my head against a wall. Dazed and confused

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Bajic is the worst teacher I have ever had in my life. I have never seen someone take a simple equation and make it so complicated. His lectures are confusing and non-sensical. Graphs he draws are abysmal. The more lectures I attened, the more my marginal utillity for rope goes up. He is a good human being, but God help all who take his class.

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Dont bother coming to class, you will not understand any of his lectures. Use the textbook to learn the material.

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: A very good Prof. He has a great understanding of the courses he teaches.

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: worst teacher! old fashion. no ppt and other source. class is really not good. test, class, homework have no relation. don't choose his class!!!!

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Vladimir is tough. Classes are useless and hard to follow. Exams are not from anything done in class. For online assignments that are weekly he only gives one attempt while other profs give unlimited.

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Such a lovely guy, but the course is kind of all over the place. He is quite hard to follow and his maths examples aren't in the textbook. Have to pay close attention in class to really grasp what he is talking about, very lenient grader though so I guess that works in students in students favours.

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Avoid, avoid, avoid.  His lectures are all over the place and not worth going to.  Hard to learn from, you're better off taking another professor.

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Really nice guy but you will never have a clue what he is talking about. Was better off skipping class and teaching myself from the textbook. He is very old fashioned and does not post anything online therefore he does he give you a chance to do myecon lab extra credit assignments.

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: He is not a very helpful or approachable person, and most of his examples in class are confusing because he doesn't take the time to explain them.  You're better off just learning from the textbook and finding videos on YouTube rather than going to his class.

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: If you are looking for a professor that offers no EconLabs, No real lectures other then copying off paper the whole class, and who will not interact with the class you found your winner. He only offers marks off midterms and finals which is unfair seeing as everyone else gets 20% from econlabs. He never tries to involve students. Should of switched

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Dr. Vladimir Bajic is an epic story teller when it comes to the NBA. He also takes interest in castles and castle moats.  I was intrigued from the first class when I saw his deadly combination of yellow hair and white moustache. He also has a very nice set of sweater vests. I also learned that he does not like McDonalds but his grandson does.

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: One of the most uninteresting professors I've ever had. Confusing. His accent doesn't help the content become any more clear, it's honestly a rough time. Avoid at all costs if possible.

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Ugh I already suck at math WHY DOES HE HAVE TO MAKE SIMPLE MATH CONFUSING :'(  Good luck if you take him.  I just don't attend class and teach myself out of the text, there is no point in going.....

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Altogether, an awful class. Bajic makes it 10x harder/way more confusing then it needs to be. First, midterm was easy, second everyone fails. Exam was alright (will probably have to curve though). All he does in class is briefly go over a concept and then draw 2-3 examples for it. Essentially, class attendance is useless.

Name: Vladimir Bajic
Review: Bajic is a hard professor and expects a lot from his students. Sometimes he tends to make simple concepts too complex but if you pay attention and study you will be fine. He is also very friendly and extremely helpful during office hours. Hard work will pay off in this class. Overall not a bad teacher but really loves math and uses it a lot.

Name: Jill Jackson
Review: Several assignments to help boost your grade. Tests however often aren't based off of lectures but instead are very detail oriented and from the textbook. Definitely buy and read all the chapters she goes through (even read the captions on photos) if you're looking for a decent mark on the tests. Otherwise, her lectures are enjoyable and welcoming.

Name: Jill Jackson
Review: Dr. Jackson gives very interesting and informative lectures, however, they only cover maybe 30% of what is on the midterm and final the rest comes from the textbook and test banks. Overall a good professor and a good class to take for a FAHSS credit.

Name: Jill Jackson
Review: Literally the worst prof I had this semester. I attended all the lectures like a fool only for her to use test banks as her exams. Biggest slap in the face. Being fluent and confident with the course material but having to endure questions with no correlation to course material. Just awful.

Name: Jill Jackson
Review: Very boring and all exams are test banks and have nothing to do with lectures. Also takes forever to give marks back

Name: Jill Jackson
Review: I love this prof. Be aware that you'll have to use the textbook, as lectures don't cover everything that is tested on exams. Lots of info and reading for an elective class.

Name: Jill Jackson
Review: Her lectures are always very interesting. However, she does not cover everything needed to pass- only about 30% of total course knowledge. But, she is such a sweetheart and her accent is divine. If you actually read the textbook and put in the work, you will succeed. Her tests are fair.

Name: Jill Jackson
Review: Super personable, makes the class a lot of fun

Name: Jill Jackson
Review: I was very disappointed in the way she carried out this course. There is a ridiculous amount of work that needs be done which is very stressful. She can test you on any little, seemingly worthless detail in the textbook and you have to study it all. The lecture is just a waste of time anyway since she only covers a fraction of the chapter.

Name: Jill Jackson
