Name: Sean Kennedy
Review: Best professor I've had so far here at UNB. Syllabus is detailed, organized, and incredibly easy to follow. If you do not take a course with him you will seriously missed out. Unfortunately, he is not teaching next year, but if you're here in 2014/2015 you'll be able to see for yourself.

Name: Sean Kennedy
Review: Sean Kennedy is an excellent professor. I don't know how many times I've asked him for help but every time he's there to help.  He really has a passion for the material and I highly recommend him.

Name: Sean Kennedy
Review: I've never been a history fan, but last year ended up in Kennedy's class as an elective, and it became my favourite class. Now I'm seeking out as many of his classes as possible. He makes the material interesting and is hands down the best prof I've ever had the pleasure of learning from!

Name: Sean Kennedy
Review: Lectures were easy to follow, he really knew his stuff. Assignments weren't extremely difficult, but challenging enough for the average student. Great learning experience overall! An ideal History prof.

Name: Sean Kennedy
Review: Such an amazing prof! I took this class in my first year and it helped me incredibly. Everything is layed out and essays have a detailed syllabus. I was really disappointed that he's not offering any courses I can take next year.

Name: Sean Kennedy
Review: By far one of the best professors at UNB! You should take at least take one of his classes! Such a positive and fun learning environment and experience!

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: Regina is a real beauty on the inside. She is a a caring person that loves her students. She previously suffered with cancer and struggles with health issues because of that. People are very mean to her and need to ease off. She makes it so that everyone has the opportunity to pass. Everyone gets B's in her class and at least its not a C.

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: Poor Pro, cancel almost all the classes, talked about her dog for whole class! useless!!!!

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: 20% participation marks based on no record, just on memory, that is cool! Also, no one I know got a better mark than B+, even they already had an A- or A+ for the first project.

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: so you do 2 group projects that are worth 25% each, a test near the end of the semester that is worth 30% and there is a 20% "participation"  mark. only got one mark out of all of those things before classes ended. marks using letters, no percentages for some reason. cancelled class all the time. worst class i have ever taken.

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: One of the worst profs I have ever had. She canceled class all the time and was extremely disorganized. Good luck getting your marks back, and don't bother following her syllabus because she doesn't either. She is nice, but it is hard to care about a class when the prof doesn't take it seriously herself. Also, a hard marker.

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: Alot of her bad reviews are old, these days, she's very nice and wants her students to succeed.

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: She should not be teaching anymore... over half of the classes were cancelled. Out of all of the book we only covered 3 chapters in class. She picks her favourites, which reflects on the grading. She will not reply to emails, no way of getting hold of her.

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: strict prof, but only expects what a prof should in an HR major course. lots of work but you gain alot of knowledge

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: No Comments

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: I think she's great! She tells you what you need to focus on for the test and then she delivers what she promises! She's always smiling when she's teaching and you can tell she loves the subject, I really want to pay attention to her when she talks. Very interesting assignments too :) I have nothing bad to say about this prof!

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: One of the best classes I ever took!  Lots of hard work, but worth it.

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: i thought she marked fairly, and classes are well planned out and made fun. she follows the text book, but uses class examples and alot of participation to make it more fun. excellent prof.

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: Horrible marker on essays. This isn't an english course! If we wanted to take english, we would have. She seems to base her essay marking more on grammar than content. Its unfair. This class shouldn't be required. On top of everything, she plays favourites really bad! Not a good experience!

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: She's not that bad

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: No Comments

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: She's not that bad, but a tough maker for real

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: This is awful course and teach. Should not be required or they should require better teacher. Everyone wants out of it but have no choice. Scares me.

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: very help. And tough

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: Another clear example of the poor teaching and students here. No one speaks english and she slows down to spoon feed foreign students. I wish I had gone to Fredericton administration while I should have instead.

School: University of New Brunswick - Saint John
Name: Regena Farnsworth
Review: Only ones who like her class kiss up to her. This is a bad seen.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: One of the most awful professors/humans I have ever met. He is incredibly rude, for instance he will interrupt and scream at you during your presentation. No amount of preparation will prepare you for his dumb and irrelevant questions. This is supposed to be an easy A, but his marking and awful teaching abilities make it very difficult to succeed.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: Hands down one of the worst professors I have ever had. Classes are mandatory but he only talks about stupid and irrelevant stories throughout each and every class. His slides are useless. His marking is unfair. His texts and exam are created so poorly. He expects you to memorize numerous figures from the text book and recreate them on the test.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: He can be condescending. He's very wise but not approachable. Marks harshly. You'll learn a lot from him though but I would avoid unless you have too.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: Really unclear with instructions; if you ask him a question he will give you an unclear answer but expects you to 'clearly state' everything you are saying to him. Although he does have good and entertaining stories, that is the only upside to the lecture. You are better off switching off to another teacher. Not very accessible outside of class.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: The kind of guy you would love to have a beer with but would never want to take a class with. Extreme energy; all over the place; when he says THIS COULD BE AN EXAM QUESTION - it's probably an exam question. Exam questions can contradict book & a tough grader. Final exam covered a chapter not even mentioned in class. A+ is 96-100; A is 91-95

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: Seriously though, his online lessons are pratically useless. There are no online lessons at all and we were just told to read the textbook. He gives out a 30% paper which requires you to write a 15 pages marketing report which he gave almost 0 guidelines for. It is almost impossible to do and I honestly learnt nothing from this module.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: Reg is one of the most polarizing people at UNB. He is incredibly knowledgeable in his field, and make a point of getting to know each of his students names. He asks his students lots of questions during the lectures and will make you look dumb if you are not prepared. Some people don't like him, but he is one of my favourite profs in the faculty.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: Reg is a great prof who gives great lectures (lots of stories). If you put in the work and attend he will be fair with you. A tough grader on tests but he takes into account your participation. Be prepared for class because he will call on you to answer a question.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: Although he is certainly a true expert in his field, his grading is brutal and he throws tough questions at the class. Beware that he may confuse what he said in another class (or section) with yours. Unclear deadlines, assignment details, and he doesn't use e-learning. Don't take his class if you have a heavy courseload.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: Have the pre-requisite. Read the articles before class and be prepared to answer questions. Lectures are fast paced but informative so take notes. Assignments must be timely and done according to specified guidelines. Exams are fair once you have done the required readings. Participate & attend classes regularly. Accessible for help.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: Worked my butt off for the B+. Don't expect to have your hand held through this one. Reg expects you to know the material inside and out. He'll call on anyone at any moment, 90% of the time you will be wrong. He will continuously question your presentations, shutting you down when wrong. He is an easy presentation marker but a hellish test marker.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: Reg is a tough prof. You need to read your textbook before going to class or he makes you feel stupid. No matter how you answer a question, it will always be wrong. He likes to hear himself talk, and spends time telling irrelevant stories. During presentations, he will interrupt you mid-sentence. Read the textbook, class notes are not enough.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: He gets to be confusing in class and goes fast. He will tell you to stop him if you don't understand, but if you actually do it, he'll look at you like you're the dumbest thing on earth. He calls out on students, so pay attention. Tests are the insanely hard and too long.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: DO YOUR READINGS OR HE WILL MAKE YOU FEEL LIKE AN IDIOT. Very engaging class, you will learn a lot. Always pay attention, he will ask questions at random. Middy/final are hard but fair,& very much textbook based! Can come off a litte arrogant but is overall a nice prof, respect him and he will respect you.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: Great prof! my favorite for sure!

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: Probably my favorite prof at UNB. Had him for Principles of Marketing and M. Research. He's not afraid to pick you out so I hated missing class. Relates to students and you learn so much! Best part is he is easy to understand.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: By far my favourite prof at UNB! I took two classes with him (marketing management and marketing research). He was one of the most challenging profs I've had but I learned the most from him. Come to class prepared because he'll call you out all the time. Take really detailed notes too and you'll do great! :)

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: There's going to be times where you will be very stressed out with him because he isn't the most helpful prof. He is a tough prof but you end up learning a lot. Don't expect an easy high grade.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: Sheppard's exams are not a fair assessment of classroom learning. The exam used the textbook, which was never used in class. The final was 10 essay questions over 80 minutes: no time to think about answers; he expects you to be a machine when writing his exams.  You should expect that his mark will drop your GPA. Avoid if you plan to do a masters.

Name: Reginald Sheppard
Review: Challenges you. I had a blast with the course. Love him!

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: All around terrible professor

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: Prof doesn't care at all about student progress and class room structure is left in shambles. I was really looking forward to this class, and though the material was interesting, the frustration and boredom experienced towards to the prof left a sour taste in my mouth.

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: Class averaged a borderline pass on the midterm, and he spent the entire next class calling us stupid, lazy, incapable of writing a coherent sentence, and then said we all clearly cheated off each other, but he wouldn't pursue any legal action because we did everything wrong, anyway. I don't comprehend how the university still allows him to teach.

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: An all-round terrible prof. He wasted a quarter of a practical exam trying to fix a clearly broken piece of apparatus, then refused to give extra time.

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: Impossible to understand, extremely intimidating.

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: Well well well ... where to start... The might sam ghosh was quite the prof... between the golfballs i think he managed to fire out about 4 words that i understood all year, the poor guy doesnt have a clue... worst teacher... worst course...worst everything... lol just avoid this guy... although he is actually friendly:)

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: No Comments

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: terrible prof.  can't understand a word he says. as some1 said, it's like a heavy indian accent + mouthfull of something.  he writes stuff on the board and then immediatly erases it, so useless. exhibits favourtism towards science students. im surprised he was ever hired @ UNB in the first place. It's extraordinary he has worked there for 20+ yrs.

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: Hmmm well lets just say the average on the midterm was 42% for the engineers and 34% for the sciences.

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: Impossible to understand between accent, lisp and volume.  Also, has wordy overhead that he spontaneously removes when you are halfway through trying to copy them down.  Nice guy, approachable and well meaning.

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: Good teacher

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: he's got the india accent plus it sounds like he's got a mouth full of golfballs when he talks.  I think i understood 3 words all semester "It's easy right?".  Genius, but can't understand anything he's saying.

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: Enjoyed this course with Dr Ghosh.  He is very smart and he likes Physics students!

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: Lets put it this way he took attendance the first day in the lab and nobody knew what to do because we couldn't understand him. So if you can't even tell when he is saying your name how the hell is he suppose to teach you physics?!!

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: We made a "Hello Ghosh" Doll. CRAZY HARD. Good thing the course isn't offered anymore

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: class is a definite waste of time, tutorials are very beneficial, don't slack off because you won't want to take it again. the final was identical to the assignments

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: No Comments

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: he's just horrible

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: impossible to understand this man. class was a waste of time, but the tutorials were good.

Name: Sambhu Ghosh
Review: Put it this way, he's from india (strong accent) and he has a speach impedement. Pray!!

Name: Don Lyon
Review: Heavily example-based lectures, just like 1082. Make sure you actually do the comp. labs on your own. Coriolis will mess you up big time if you fall behind Overall solid prof who has some hilarious stories to tell. I loved every course I've taken with him

Name: Don Lyon
Review: The Don himself. The man, the myth, the legend. A lot of work, but you get used to it. You'll drop 20s on his midterms but it's all good because his 100% final is ridiculously easy. A true beauty . He'll be talking about bridges and before you know it you're listening to him explain how the world would be a better place without Arts students.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: I truly enjoyed Don's lectures and sense of humor. The only unfortunate aspect to this course was the "adult education" notebooks which were incredibly distracting, frustrating and poorly thought out. Despite this, he tells you exactly what is expected and the 100 percent final made up for getting thrown through a loop.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: He comes off quite intimidating and you wont like his lecture keeping policy, but in the end it does help you learn the content. He knows what he's talking about and when you respect him he'll respect you.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: Dr. Lyon has many stories related to material, extremely funny, goes very quickly through material, almost to a fault, where he seemingly sometimes thinks students know more than they do. But Lyon is very assertive and makes it clear what he wants from his students.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: You will have lots of homework to do, but he teaches the course really well. He provides many examples and explains problems clearly. Lectures can get dry, but he tries to keep things fun and interesting with jokes and (relevant) stories. It is clear that he cares about the success of his students, which is why he asks a lot of his students.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: Don Lyon is a hilarious and effective prof. This course is a LOT of work, but it's because of all of the work that was assigned that I did well in the course. Would definitely take this prof again.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: Take good notes in lecture, and be ready to put time in on your own

Name: Don Lyon
Review: Try and avoid him if you can. I find him very frustrating and from what I can tell he cares more about how funny he is than how much you learn.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: Explains topics in lectures well, tells you exactly what you need to know for exams, very much a no-nonsense kind of prof. Some dislike having to hand in reworked lecture notes and homework, but I'd much prefer that to something like MasteringEngineering.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: He's pretty par for the course. If you're easily offended, his jokes will upset you. But he clearly doesn't care. Not a bad mechanical engineering teacher. Knows the concepts.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: The Donald Trump of UNB.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: A lot of work and tricky midterms. Lecture notes need to be redone and handed in; NOT COPIED; to pass ENGG1082. There are many ways to fail the course, but if you do  the work you'll be fine. Final is easy as long as you study and outcomes are very clearly stated. Dr. Lyon has a crude sense of humor at times, but he's quite funny, and he does care.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: Tries to intimidate at first, but stay on track with the lectures and you won't even have to study! Take good notes though because he piles on the homework for midterms and exams.  Lectures can get repetitive with the same routines of short explanations and then lots of examples and note copying, but his strategy worked well for this class.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: No one cares more about the student than Dr Lyon. He had us take an anon survey for feedback about the mechanical program. As a 4th year I can appreciate him trying to fix things in an honestly cancerous ME program. That aside he's your prof and not your friend expect some work. Assignments can be a challenge. Exams are fair though.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: I went from really not liking him and his teaching methods week 1-3 to absolutely loving them after the exam. Really fair, tells it how it is, has great lectures probably my favorite prof so far. He's kind of like that strict coach that after the season you wouldn't know what you'd do without. Unfortunately I'm in EE so I can't take him again :(

Name: Don Lyon
Review: Definitely knows how to teach a class and make it interesting and easy to understand when the concepts aren't necessarily the easiest to comprehend.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: He has a very frank approach.  He lays out the expectations he has for the students, which are designed to allow you to succeed.  You have to attend class regularly if you expect to pass the course.  He's tough but very fair, and makes the topic enjoyable.

Name: Don Lyon
Review: Put a lot more effort into the course than just the curriculum. He included "real world" context and anecdotes which made this engineering econ course feel complete. Understand the way money moves and the notation (AP, FP, PA, GA.. etc) and you'll do fine!

Name: Don Lyon
Review: Midterms were pretty solid the exam was not difficult, if you understood 80% of the material you'll be fine.

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: Definitely knows his stuff, the lectures sometimes lack focus but so long as you do the readings it correlates. Best advice is to take down key points in his lectures and then study up on them by your own initiative.    If you show genuine interest in the subject, and you actually make an attempt you will be fine.

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: DO TAKE every course offered by this man! Best prof, bar none. His passion for his craft allows students to better recall and interpret information. Furthermore, his real world experiences allow him to relate to course material, allowing for a better and more complete understanding of the topic. Do the work, participate in class, and enjoy.

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: Rezun's a great Prof. Some ignorant students might hate him for his military past or ethnic backround--- but at UNB he is number ONE. Heads above the rest!

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: DO NOT TAKE ANY COURSES FROM THIS MAN. The worst prof, bar none, I have ever had. He's beyond scatterbrained - he spends no more than 30sec. on any topic before drifting into one of his spy fantasy anecdotes. Essay questions were bizarre and unclear. Everything he has to say of value is in his textbook - avoid this class!

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: One of the best profs at UNB, he is real speaks what is on his mind, very entertaining, you will look forward to going in class everyday, tells amazing stories

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: There is a manageable amount of online material. The course is also broken into manageable sections. I would recommend his Poli-Sci 1000 course to anyone interested in Political Science. In fact, I regret not taking any other political science in my undergraduate degree. Once you take this course, you will see...

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: Rezun's Spy Course is awesome. Highly recommended Prof. His Middle East class is a pleasure; you'll learn a lot, but you have to come to class. Top Professor at UNB.

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: Best Prof ever. Great lecturer; cares for his students.

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: Hilarious, love his class!

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: Great prof!! Interesting and teaches "out of the box".

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: reasons why they get paid so well?Not many professors could hold a candle to Rezun!Yes, being unorthodox is a good thing...it's university for heaven's sake!He cares about his work and about the students very much. Pay attention in class and do your readings (I prob. sound like a broken record) and put a little bit of effort and you will do fine.

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: A great professor, a real gem at UNB in the ECON(...pols) department.  You don't get profs like him everyday.  What a life!  I wish more professors had more experience than just being caged up in a library somewhere writing articles and crap they know nothing about in reality.  Aren't profs supposed to travel, isn't that one of the reasons why they

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: Not a good teacher. The course is easy but you will learn nothing at all

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: Great political science professor!  Incredible person who has lived an incredible life.  No matter what course you take from him, you will definitely learn a lot.  I wish more professors were like him.  Truly wonderful, good-hearted and caring.  Speaks his mind and allows you to speak yours.  Other profs on campus need to travel&open their minds.

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: This Prof is awesome.  His lectures are interesting and he doesn't waste your time in class.  He expects you to have your readings done and builds upon the knowledge with interesting discussion.  He allows you to have your own opinion and makes sure you have the facts to make your own conclusion about the material.

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: Hands down, the most interesting Prof I have ever had. So easy to talk to, LOVES the subjects he teaches, understanding, approachable & just wants his students to succeed. My experiences with Rezun have been some of my best at UNB. I love that he posts notes on BB so that you can follow along - something more Profs should do. Highly recommended.

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: Big waste of time. He knows a lot about the world, but when it comes to teaching he repeats himself over and over. I didn't learn a thing in his clas.

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: I just wanted to let everyone know that is checking out this site that Rezun is by far the best prof I have ever had! I have learned so much about the world from him and becam intersted in matters that I once knew little or nothing about. Rezun cares about his students and wants to see everyone in his class do well. It would be almost impossible to

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: He boldly announced at the start of the sixth week of class that we were finally going to be starting the material, and still told us nothing. I've taken half a page of notes in a total of 13 lectures. Definitely a waste of tuition dollars. Also, there are no text books, but there are 28 recommended texts. Sent us 3 different syllabuses. Fail prof

Name: Miron Rezun
Review: I regret Dr Rezun is a terrible professor. Taken several courses from him - never got less than 'A'. From comments he wrote - did not read my term papers. Doubt he marked exams. If he likes you - you get an A. Average about 10 pages of notes per semester. Repetitive and rambles. Ignorant, No Quality education. Employed because of power of tenure.

Name: John Mitterer
Review: Good lecturer, but you can't skip either class or readings. Entertaining if you are interested in the course material.

Name: John Mitterer
Review: A really amazing professor. He is very nice and passionate about psychology. He often shared personal stories which made the lectures very interesting. I will miss having him!

Name: John Mitterer
Review: wonderful professor. knows what he's talking about and makes lectures interesting. going to be missed.

Name: John Mitterer
Review: Confusing lectures as he likes to combine lectures and teach half of one lecture and half of another. Usually lets us leave early though. A lot of reading to do to be able to understand the lectures. Lectures can get kind of all over the place and confusing. But he seems like a good guy who really is inspired by psychology and loves his work

Name: John Mitterer
Review: He's a great professor! Lectures can seem a bit monotone but stick it through, it's worth it! If you go to lectures and listen you'll do fine in the class.

Name: John Mitterer
Review: He's a good guy

Name: John Mitterer
Review: Sometimes hard to follow in lecture, but gives great hints for the exam if you show up. Textbook readings very important to understanding lecture material. If you're going to do anything, READ THE TEXTBOOK!

Name: John Mitterer
Review: Dr. Mitterer is the nicest professor at Brock. He is pretty monotone but makes good jokes and is so friendly and makes you want to do well in his class.  It is stressful because everyone says the exam is so hard but it wasn't that bad and he gives a lot of hints! The one paper is really long and tedious and a huge pain but overall John is great!

Name: John Mitterer
Review: I really liked John, he seems to really care about his students. He managed to make intro material interesting (which is usually not the case). His exam was extensive, but he gave lots of hints in lecture about what was important to study. I loved his lectures, and enjoyed the readings he assigned. I hope I get to take more of his classes.

Name: John Mitterer
Review: Honestly such a sweet man, a lot of reading but thats okay.

Name: John Mitterer
Review: Makes complicated content digestible by putting it in context using examples from everyday life   More organized than the other professors I experienced ( uses the digital platform, posts materials on time and follows schedule)  All around good guy who engages students after class and seems passionate about Psychology beyond publishing

Name: John Mitterer
Review: Mitterer has a very monotone voice when lecturing. He seems to be very sweet and would regularly show us cool pictures at the beginning of lecture. Despite this, when he went through course material it seemed to be irrelevant on the exam and any assigned work. I probably could have gone to no lectures and passed the semester with flying colours.

Name: John Mitterer
Review: Great guy, just hard to follow along in lecture.

Name: John Mitterer
Review: Really nice guy but explanations of course material we're very confusing. I barely attended the lectures because I felt I would learn more by reading the textbook than by sitting in class listening to him. Still received good marks though (the textbook is definitely key.)

Name: John Mitterer
Review: Very cute professor but lectures are long, boring, and not sure whats going on half the time. Wish he would speak up because this class could be very interesting! Also, get the modeuls done when assigned... they are a lot of work if you leave them till the end.

Name: John Mitterer
Review: He does a good job summarizing key points of readings and keeping the class attentive. However, I still found that the readings for the classes were far more useful than the lectures.

Name: John Mitterer
Review: He is a fantastic human being. He really knows what he is talking about and for the most part is very good at helping us understand the content. But definitely do ALL the readings in the textbook because sometimes he can be confusing. Can go off topic sometimes, and get ready to watch TED talks in tutorials. Overall pretty good prof!

Name: John Mitterer
Review: very boring and just dull

Name: John Mitterer
Review: Dr. Mitterer is a very experienced, He really knows what hes talking about! He welcomes all his students, hes great with communicating with us, the lectures are so fulfilling just VERYY long!

Name: John Mitterer
Review: Not helpful. Would start talking about one topic and then would pause and discuss a completely different topic in the class (makes it very difficult to make notes).

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: really misleading rating. she's funny, open-minded, tests arent hard, it's not demanding, attendence isnt mandatory. very misleading rating

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: Brock is very theatrical at times but it makes the class easier to stay awake in. Notes are online and she makes a study guide, attendance is not mandatory. She is really nice and willing to help if you have questions. Easy A if you go to class and study.

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: easiest science i have taken in college. no attendance and barely showed up ans still made an A. Everyone complains because they wait till the last minute to do their online tests and the server locks up. Not the teachers fault.

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: This was her last semester, so she's gone...but i missed one online test b/c the server was overloaded and she wouldn't accept my email submission, ruined my grade.  I got a 92 on 1st exam and 104 on 2nd exam (best grade in class)...and this one online quiz ruined my grade. not fair, she's really funny, but not very understanding.

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: Brock is a horrible teacher. HORRIBLE. HOWEVER, if you go  to the master reviews of the Student Instructor then you will be fine. Overall easy class if you use the SI & can tolerate Brock.

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: Very disorganized, the student teacher Christina is extremely helpful and in order to do well in the class you must at least go to her out of class major reviews.  She's enthusiastic and interesting yet classes seem to teach nothing.  6 online tests, 3 in class, one other quick easy assignment.  Not bad if taken w a group of friends.

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: Brassy and from the Bronx

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: This lady is crazy! In a good way though- she will definitely keep you laughing in class because she is so off the wall. She goes off on tangents about random stuff. Attendance is not mandatory. The test are kind of hard but not too bad. :)

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: She's pretty awful. Her lectures are political and make absolutely no sense. Although, she does not require attendance and you don't have to turn in labs. Thankfully, we had a great SI that gave us her notes and study guides. Otherwise, I would have failed this class.

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: Boring class, however Brock is very lively and crazy. Keeps the students entertained with her wild rants. Ended up with an A only because I went to every single study session outside of class. Five online tests and 3 in class tests. Notes were just jibberish and extremely hard to read.

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: Loved Professor Brock, I could not stand science before taking her, but she always kept my attention and was never boring.  I really enjoyed the videos she showed in class.  Easy class if you go to the SI sessions.  I made a B, but that is because I didn't do well on my Physics test (did not attend the SI session for that test).  Take her. Awesome!

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: Awful! She just yells at you for an hour and 15 minutes. She's not a approachable at all!I signed up for her class back in 2007 and dropped her after 3 weeks. The smartest thing I ever did. Avoid her if you can!

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: AWESOME! idk what the complaints are about shes quirky but she is an INSANELY !! i meen INSANELY easy A i attended her class rarely. Half the grade is online and the Si leader will make it a guarantee that you make an A on the test. take it if you want an easy class

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: She is a pretty easy professor. She posts all of her lecture notes online. She gives you a review guide that has all the information that is on the test. Her points system makes it very easy to get a good grade in the class. The major reviews in the SI sessions also help for the test. She has extra credit points built in the test.

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: I dont know why everyone is complaining...she is a little crazy but its intertaining! she puts all of her notes online. there are only 3 in clas exams and 1 final. all other stuff is out of class! online quiz..not monitored..hello people look at ur notes and u will get all 50 points!if this prof is ur last option..take her. u will survive! :)

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: Don't take her unless if you have to. She doesn't use the book at all, and her programs that she uses are awful

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: Unorganized professor.  Just read straight from her notes.  Did not really "teach" us anything.  And what she talked about had nothing to do with the course.  Labs were boring.  Avoid her if possible.

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: she's not that bad. She's hard, but if you study, you're fine. Gives study guides, attndence not mandatory. Lots of opp. for a good grade bc she takes so many. she seems like she doesn't make sense, but if you actually READ her notes, she says everything important. This class is hard in general, stop whining people.

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: HORRRIIIBBBBLEEE!!! DO NOT take her class! if you do go to SI or you will fail.. i got a B but only b/c of Jesse in SI. She doesn't teach and goes off on tangents b/c "everything in the world relates to science." She is ridiculous. Can't stand her!

Name: Joanne Brock
Review: Very disorganized.  Not able to communicate info well.  Goes off a lot on info not related to subject like politics (very conservative) and health science.  Does give you opps for getting a good grade.  Take class with another prof.

Name: Dot Miners
Review: I was never interested in Statistics before taking this course. After being taught by her, Statistics became my favorite subject of all time.

Name: Dot Miners
Review: The Prof is the best prof anyone could find on campus. She helped a lot to develop my interest in the subject and also helped me outside class. She is the best

Name: Dot Miners
Review: Lovely Lady, such a sweetheart. I would love to have her as my professor again.

Name: Dot Miners
Review: Extraordinary prof, very helpful, kind, and friendly. You will get a good understanding and a high mark.

Name: Dot Miners
Review: squirrely

Name: Dot Miners
Review: Miners is SO CUTE. She really makes my day. Makes math so simple and easy for everyone.

Name: Dot Miners
Review: Super helpful. I was very nervous about taking stats upon entering this class. But she laid everything out so well that it's easy to learn. Dot is the best!

Name: Dot Miners
Review: She is amazing! Explains everything well, helps out if you need it, and her tests / assignments are fairly easy. Dot Miners is awesome!!!

Name: Dot Miners
Review: She is the best math teacher. She is very approachable and more willing to help you. She answers email pretty quick. Her tests are easy as long as you practice the webwork questions and do the practice tests.

Name: Dot Miners
Review: sometimes difficult to understand but very helpful and very fair on her tests. she will answer any questions regarding the webwork and is very approachable

Name: Dot Miners
Review: She had a great way to simplify the material and she is very helpful.

Name: Dot Miners
Review: Dot Miners is a nice lady, she makes math fun.

Name: Dot Miners
Review: Course material can be tricky if calculus is new to you. This course is pretty much a repeat of high school calculus. Dot is VERY helpful if you need additional aid. Can be a little tricky to understand.

Name: Dot Miners
Review: She is very hard to understand initially but as the course progresses you get use to her clarity and volume. Course is quite easy and Dot is EXTREMELY helpful if you fail to understand a concept.

Name: Dot Miners
Review: Really sweet, very helpful, and tries her hardest to make sure the students understand the material. Often brought sweets and timbits to class to explain her material better, and then handed them out, which is always a positive

Name: Dot Miners
Review: She is a really good teacher and she is really cute.

Name: Dot Miners
Review: Dot Miners is a special kind of person....she actually teaches. And not only does she teach, but she explains everything in such a way that there could be no possible way for you not to understand. She's brilliant and her enthusiasm is infectious.  I have never ever....EVER understood Calculus...until I sat in her class.

Name: Dot Miners
Review: Want a good mark in her exams overall 80%+. Do webwork's start early easy 26%. Midterms to finals exactly the same year by year from the ones she posts. Understand the concepts by doing her practice problems then near exam time just do her practice exams. Easy 90% there is no surprise, those who rate her low never studied hard enough!

Name: Dot Miners
Review: She's a good teacher overall, a nice person, but I rated her low because during lectures, I would have absolutely no idea what she was saying. I would sit in the front row at times, and still not understand her, all I could hear was mumbling.

Name: Dot Miners
Review: Great Professor. Extremely helpful outside of the classroom. Sit near the front, she talks quietly sometimes.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: Brock is an old school prof. He doesn't allow technology and simply rants all class without any structure or relation to the course content. He is very entertaining, and is a great guy. The material is easy enough to just learn on your own.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: fairly easy grader, 15% of grade is simply for showing up. However, we learned almost nothing about marketing .. I had high hopes to learn specific strategies for crafting marketing campaigns but what I got was endless rants about American politics and random screeds against "technology". No laptops or phones allowed.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: Attend class and read the textbook for all exams. You must follow the course outline for each of the case studies, if you do, there is no reason why you can't get 9/10. I have taken many classes with Brock and hands down this guy is full of knowledge that will help you in the real world.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: Brock is funny to listen to in class, but was always 2 minutes late to class (didn't bother me). He specifically stated if you attend no one should fail. There was a group presentation with no direction what so ever. Marks back on the quizzes were quick (all MT q's) but written assignment from mid March has still not been received.. Great guy tho

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: Terrible prof. Gives no instruction as to how to go about doing assignments, doesn't give feedback on anything, 5-12 minutes late coming to class everyday. Currently studying for my final exam, and only know 20% of my grade up to this point. He did not grade and give back any of the papers or projects that were due months ago. Absolute scrub.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: not a bad prof care about student a lot but yall need to be careful about the marketing cases the formatting is very straight and i dont think he out line it very clearly on the course outline with the right format u can get like a 7/10 with really bad content. need to do a lot of reading tho

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: Great Professor, with so much knowledge. Cares about his students and gives great lectures with the use of his own background in the business world. He is a very successful well presented individual is very punctual and quite the nice guy! I HIGHLY recommend taking a course with him. Favourite professor at U of M.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: I liked him as a teacher. He taught me marketing. Everything was very close to the textbook which was great. His questions for exams were a little weird. Very example based but ultimately pretty fair. He also graded my class on a curve which was great. Attendance was for marks. It was a good class. I'm thinking of taking another with him.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: Brock is not well organized. On the syllabus it said one due date for the case studies but he chooses another day. He swears at his students and is not very helpful. He gives attitude and is just not ideally. His lectures are very long. He doesnt talk about most of whats written in the slides. He rambles on about useless things.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: Brock is engaging in his teaching. Well, he does go off topic lots he does make his grading not too hard. He rewards people that go to class by taking attendance. Very interesting prof to listen to. The textbook is not mandatory in my opinion but could help for the group project or maybe the quizzes if the slides aren't enough for you.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: Brock doesn't teach you explicitly what will be on the test. However, if you read the textbook chapters and study them properly, you'll be JUST fine. The tests aren't that hard, and if you've read the textbook you can obviously see that's where he gets the questions from. Marks you for attendance, however, so skipping isn't really idea

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: Good guy and obviously passionate about the course. However his lectures dont contain any info you really need but they are mandatory. Also, gives absolutely no feedback on essays and projects. Didnt appreciate this because I went into the exam with no idea what my grade in the class was

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: I wouldn't recommend taking this class with Brock. He can certainly talk but he cannot teach! Very difficult to figure out where he takes questions from for tests. He takes a long time if he ever does reply to your emails. Will be mainly textbook reading. He doesn't seem to care or try to help students. Overall not a terribly difficult class.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: good guy

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: I developed a new love of Accounting after taking this class with #Brock. With up to 30 years of experience in various business ventures, his insight on relating marketing concepts to the balance sheet as well as the personal sales process in calculating year and quarterly dividends for stakeholders. Make sure you go to class, and dont eat in class

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: If you skipped every class and read the textbook you could still get a good grade. Participation matters, but lectures are boring and irrelevant. Overall grade is heavily curved, no feedback on group projects.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: Professor Cordes is a knowledgeable man, who wants to motivate his students. His lecture does not cover the tests. Read the textbook and tests shouldn't be difficult. Marks papers and group work fairly easily.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: By far the easiest class I have ever taken, I crammed both quizzes the night before and got As on both of em, they were graded on a curve too. Although he is passionate about some debate topics his lectures are fairly pointless. If you didn't have to attend class and only studied the textbook you would do fine.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: Lectures are completely pointless. READ THE TEXTBOOK. This is one of the classes you NEED the textbook since the exams and papers are based on it specifically and he doesn't teach what is in them very well. Attendance is mandatory for participation grades which is very annoying since the lecture is useless. Exams aren't bad, as long as you READ.

Name: Brock Cordes
Review: Hes there to talk, not to teach.  he markers on a standard curve so you have to compete with other people to get a good grade.  group presentation - make sure you try to outdo the other groups because he marks based on how all the previous groups did.   never walk out of class early !! he will tell you to sit back down. 3

Name: Paul Brock
Review: Great Professor. Knows the material and is very clear in explaining it. Oh yeah, Hes funny, definitely makes class interesting.Showed up 10+ minutes late to class almost everyday. Four Exams including Final Matches your lowest score with your final grade if higher. Allows some sort of cheat sheet for exams.Tells you exactly whats on the EXAMS.Easy!

Name: Paul Brock
Review: Dr. Brock is the man. His lectures are worth not missing class as he explains what will be tested on while also telling sometimes funny jokes or really lame ones. If you’re above decent with math you will ace the course especially because he allows 2 pages of notes. Ican only imagine how cool it would be 2 take another upper division class with him

Name: Paul Brock
Review: Funny professor who made class interesting. He went over elementary stuff in mathematics while keeping it simple and clear. Only 3 exams and one final, all of which are straightforward. Would take a class with him again.

Name: Paul Brock
Review: One of the best professors! Sad that the budget cuts affect him because he is not able to teach other math courses. I really to take him for Cal III because I like things explained crystal clear. Brock is funny, energetic, and ready to make my day. Sometimes hes late but we feel him for his busy schedule.

Name: Paul Brock
Review: Love this prof. I've had him a few times & he makes everything seem so easy! Makes class enjoyable. Take any class with him if you get the chance!

Name: Paul Brock
Review: He is AMAZING. Seriously, I wish I could have him as a professor for all my math courses. His only flaw is he's constantly late to class, but other than that, I highly recommend him.

Name: Paul Brock
Review: This class is a joke. Professor Brock knows it, that's why he tries to make it as interesting as possible for everybody. I've taken him for other Calculus courses though, and I highly recommend him! For ANY math course. Best Math teacher i've taken in college .Coming from an Engineering Major and math minor that means a lot! Do homework and EASY A

Name: Paul Brock
Review: This teacher is hilarious and the class is awesome! there were times that he would go off on tangents and talk about random things, but it was hilarious and i recieved an awesome grade. i would definitely take this teacher again.

Name: Paul Brock
Review: I love this math class. He knows what he's doing and makes it fun! Honestly, I've never got bored in his class. The materials are easy to follow and his lecture is extremely helpful! As long as you go to class and take note, you can walk out with BIG FAT A+.

Name: Paul Brock
Review: I really enjoyed his teaching style.  The tests weren't too difficult and he let you use a full page of notes on each exam.  And I'm pretty sure he curved the final a lot.

Name: Paul Brock
Review: Im a polysci major that was forced into this class because my scholarship required me.  His classes were so interesting that he has seriously made me consider on switching to a math major. I am math challenged but even I was able to walk away with a C+.

Name: Paul Brock
Review: He's the funniest teacher I've ever had. You go to class wondering, "what's going to happen today?" The exams were easy and predictable, but at the same time, I learned a lot of information that I won't soon forget. He's the Mary Poppins of math professors, making disgusting math taste good with comedic sugar.

Name: Paul Brock
Review: I love this class because the professor is extremely helpful. He is always go over the previous lecture to help the students understand on materials. His midterms are fair, plus he gives a day free to go over the homework before the midterm. For whoever actually try to do the homework and cheat sheet, you would get a minimum a B in your midterms.

Name: Paul Brock
Review: This class will give you an opportunity to think in another way!I really enjoyed this class and learned a lot!

Name: Paul Brock
Review: Best Professor I have had at SDSU. Knows his stuff and makes it fun. Great sense og humor. Highly recommend!!

Name: Paul Brock
Review: Great professor, does not collect homework, and although he might stray off the topic he finishes lecturing on what you need to know. This class is actually fun to go to. I really recommended.  3 exams and if you do good you don't have to take the final which means you can be done with the class 2.5 weeks before the school year ends.

Name: Paul Brock
Review: Brock is a pretty chillin' dude. Funny, so it gave me incentive to go to class at 9. The homework isn't graded but I would say that it is essential if you want to know the material. Some test problems taken directly from the textbook. Helps if you know some physics too.

Name: Paul Brock
Review: He's funny at times, occasionally rambling on a joke. However, he know's his stuff. 3 midterms+1 final. Go to class, do the HW, even if it's not graded.

Name: Paul Brock
Review: Good teacher, really clear on everything you need to know

Name: Paul Brock
Review: I enjoyed this class. The exams were moderate, but Brock is awesome. He does a really good job explaining confusing concepts, especially in his office hours. 3 midterms, 1 cummulative final. (lowest not abused) SO there was 8 questions on a midterm and 14 questions in the final. So go to lecture, do the HW problems, go to the TA´s office hours, a B

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: She only reads from the slides and lectures get really boring. She, on the other hand, was pretty entertaining with her costumes and music

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Good professor although her lectures are sometimes scattered all over the place. Does not follow the textbook and if you want to pass you need to attend tutorials (hopefully you get a good tutorial leader). She does not post anything online so if you miss lecture you won't get the 10-30 pages of notes you'll need per lecture.

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Great personality but lectures are very boring, but are necessary

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Amazing prof! Super cute and funny but taught the material in an excellent way. Lectures were a little boring.

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Loved her! I did great in the class with minimal effort, just make sure to attend tutorials because that's where all the concepts are demonstrated! She is also hilarious, her dancing and dressing up make the class a lot less dry! I miss being in her class!!

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: she's great but you have to review your stuff and go to tutorial!!!!

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: The lecture is extremely boring, she reads directly from the slides so if you can get ahold of the slides like I did then don't bother going. She is not helpful at all. The content of the class was outdated. She was always late to lecture and always changing her office hours so it was confusing to know when her office hours are. Use the workbook!!!

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Prof C is great because she is very etnthusiastic. but she is very disorganized and we got too far behind. but she is funny and makes class fun.

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Overrated as a Professor. Multiple Choice is usually the hardest part about the course but Tutorials are good even though the TA's  are basically doing the same problems from the workbook. The workbook helps a lot but it would be nice to have more problems to look at. Lectures are really not interesting.

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Such a nice lady!! Her grading criteria is clear and shes always there for you. If you work hard youll do well, if you dont well..... you should drop out.

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: One of the worst courses I have ever taken and so many irrelevant formulas that can be done on a simple computer. An economics course should develop theories on how to apply the teachings in the real world. Being someone who works in a corp, there are simple concepts used in this course, but in way simpler terms. Change this course, its a joke

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: She's honestly one of the sweetest ladies you'll ever meet. Tests aren't hard if you work for it and she's always available for extra help. Going to class isn't necessary (Ive gone to maybe 8 classes and have gotten 90's) but it is helpful because she does tell you what will be on the midterm. Best of luck!

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Good prof. Easy tests. No need to go to class, gimme to many accounting students. Ive gone perhaps three times and pull mid 90's. Use the texbook tho... Seriously worth the money, oh yeah workbook know that in and out

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Professor Cottrell is the best! She really tries to help students as much as she can. Will go out of her way to help! Never feel shy to stop by her office because you'll likely leave with a smile.... she gives candy!

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Her lectures were absolutely useless. I taught myself the entire course using the textbook. Her multiple choice questions can be difficult and misleading but if you put the time into understanding the material you should do alright.

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Very clear explanations but notes may be confusing at times. Attendance is quite important because she does not put her notes online. Does some funny stuff from time to time.

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Nice lady, not easy on multiple choice.

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Useless professor. Unclear instructions and very misleading in regards to questions on midterms and exams. Appears to be friendly and laid back, but over time she turns out to be moody and lazy. Midterms and exams are filled with typos, misleading language, and information not taught in class. Literally reads of her a USELESS power points.

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Very very nice. This being said, lectures were disorganized and a waste of time. Very very confusing as she dives right in expecting you already know the information. Uses terms that you won't know without reading the textbook ahead and doesnt give you set formulas. Does irrelevant examples that confuse you. Advice: Learn course online use workbook

Name: Marilyn Cottrell
Review: Some of her lectures were somewhat disorganized but she was easily the most caring and helpful professor in the department. She knows how to deal with troublesome students (sleeping/listening to music in class) and that makes her even better. If you actually care you will do very well. She rocks.

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: amazing prof. so funny and chill. easiest bio course at brock, passed even tho I skipped alot

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: Best. Prof. Thus. Far. If you have a class with this guy, you're in for a real treat. He makes a lot of dad jokes but theyre GOOD dad jokes and he explains the content very well. I love this guy i miss him

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: One of the best profs I've ever had. Very clear, and makes the class very entertaining and easy to follow. All multiple choice midterms and final. Super easy if you study.

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: Dr. Bruce is a great professor who clearly loves the subject matter. He really tries to make difficult concepts more fun and clear, and I appreciated his enthusiasm and sense of humour (though cheesy :)).

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: Lab reports are challenging, study lots and get help if needed and you should do well!

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: One of the best profs from first year. His midterm and exam were absolutely fair and he is really passionate and knowledgable about the material he teachers.

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: Enjoyed his lectures a lot, he makes it a fun class, would definitely recommend this prof/class

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: great prof, uses clickers and marks are counted from them so come to class

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: I enjoyed having Dr Bruce as my prof he was funny and informative however, I thought the exam questions were very specific compared to the lecture notes which were very broad, both exams were difficult.

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: Bruce is a very good and friendly prof. He makes biology a breeze!!! The only things that I did not like was sometimes he seemed to rush through a few topics and also I found the midterm to be very little like what he told us it was going to be. Other than that, amazing prof. Course is very similar to grade 12 biology.

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: Makes the lectures very interesting and intuitive but it is hard to pay attention because it is the same material from grade 12 biology. He cares about his students and is not trying to make you fail, very approachable and relatable. Mid-term and final exams were quite tough so 's it's best to know everything in the slides and textbook

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: He's funny and he's kind and super approachable but his exam was hard

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: I am so happy I had Bruce as my prof for first year biology. His lectures are great, informative, and he is hilarious. 10/10 recommend !!

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: He's just flat out awesome.

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: Great guy and amazing teacher

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: AMAZING!!!

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: Bruce is the best

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: Explains things well. Entertaining lectures, though obviously biased towards a teenage audience. Friendly and approachable, available for help.

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: Really great! So funny!! absolutely enjoyed his lectures!

Name: Douglas Bruce
Review: Best prof ever!!

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: GREAT GUY, RELATES TO YOUR INTERESTS, IS ALSO A PILOT AND 3 DAN BLACK BELT

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: What a great guy. He wants you to do great, go talk to him when you need help and he will clarify anything you need. I recommend his upper year classes, he is a great guy.

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: I got to know Daryl over my 4 years at Brock. If you care about the material he is more than willing to chat with you over any topic.  He's friendly, but if you have no respect for the material he will have no respect for you.

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: Daryl is amazing. He is honestly so funny.  He get's low ratings because a bunch of first years are taking this course as a mandatory science credit.  If you are interested in the subject, you will love him. He relates everything to beer.

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: This is the worst professor at Brock University. He is inappropriate during lecture  and acts as if he has no knowledge whatsoever about the course. He is very unfair about grading as well, DO NOT take this class.

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: He is a very funny professor but he doesn't post anything online, his lectures are VERY scattered and the labs make absolutely no sense. If you are thinking about taking physical geography, try taking accounting. It will be way easier than this course

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: His lectures can be really boring and repetitive.

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: He did not teach me anything. Everything I know is from the textbook. Brutal.

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: Daryl is jokes! He is super funny but he jumps around a lot, and although his examples are really funny and often about sex and beer, they don't necessarily explain the actual course content.

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: He is good

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: I enjoyed having him as my professor he was great and really funny!

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: Loved his half of this course! He explained things so clearly and made things make sense! He's a funny and enjoyable prof - and he's great about responding to emails and helping when you need it.

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: Loved his corny jokes. The way he explains things is for some reason hard to forget

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: I had him for physical geography and by far the worst prof. His lectures are stupid and pointless to go to. Doesn't not explain anything well. He jumps from different chapters constantly and is very unorganized. Did not enjoy this class in the slightest. I would not bother taking this course, it will bore you to tears.

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: Such a good professor!! Highly recommended!!!

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: Worst prof ever.  Would not except my paper as it was 1 minute late due to the bus schedule.

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: His exam review: |Study all 21 chapters we have done this year. The exam could be on any of it." I HIGHLY recommend if you land this teacher, you should drop the course or start sucking up

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: Worst class ever.  Reviews are not helpful and he does not seem interested in the material and it seemed like he did not care about the majority of the class.  He played favourites.

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: TERRRRRRRIBLE PROF!gave me the worst experience of my life. dropped the course because he was so useless. his instructions were never clear and his lectures were spent talking about beer and his stupid dog.

Name: Daryl Dagesse
Review: I have a geo major now and have had this guy a bunch.  I have gotten great grades with him but it was not thanks to him, it was from the authors of the books i used.  Worst prof i have had..  very self indulged and self absorbed.  I feel he totally picks favourites.. especially good looking gals... personal observation.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: Does not care at all about his students success, absolute GPA killer

Name: Greg Brock
Review: Dropped the class early in the semester because I was unable to make the one class where the syllabus quiz was due. Talked with the professor about turning it in late and told him my legitimate reason for missing and he did not care. The Syllabus quiz is 10% of the entire class grade. Would not recommend taking.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: Requires you to come to class every day. He will only give you two unexcused absences no matter what. You better take advantage of tutors and make sure you study every day. It is best to knock out the online homework immediately. He grades online work by the completion rather than if you did well on it.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: Tests are nothing like the lectures but more of the textbook, so good luck.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: I would not take this class again. The grading scale although it seems easy to get a good grade as an 87 is an A. The class is very difficult. Tests are barely based on lectures and are much more about the texts. If you miss anything, do not ask to retake it or any help with it as he will not help you. I was discouraged from the start.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: Greg is an alright professor. His lectures are really boring but he is really passionate about what he's teaching. Grading scale is set so that an 87+ is an A.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: he is not helpful through email, gives half ass answers and then when your grade suffers from his poor communication, he again doesnt care at all. DONT take this dude...

Name: Greg Brock
Review: Listen...I never write reviews about professors but this is the ONE time I feel the need to. IF POSSIBLE DO NOT TAKE HIS CLASS!!! He does not care about your grade. You probably get 5 grades in total. His lectures are boring and he got them from online. He doesn't teach the material, its expected you already know it. He makes everything difficult.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: Be prepared to take a test that only looks at one or two formulas. Lectures are a chore and are not clear or well designed. If you can take someone else, do it. I've never had a problem with understanding economics until I took him.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: Final format matched none of the other test formats. Was WAY harder. Grades on a scale so an 87 is an A. Offers extra credit, do it because the final is ridiculous. Can skip class whenever. All powerpoints are online. No tests are cumulative. Kind of boring to listen too. He loves economics. Shares some fun facts.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: My partner yelling, "Too soon, don't do it! Reconsider, read some literature on the subject You sure? Forget it . . ." This guy teases you with a lighter grading scale while reinforcing stiff grading criteria. There is an extra credit assignment I suggest you take advantage of if ECON is not your thing. Don't miss any assignments cause he wont care

Name: Greg Brock
Review: DO NOT take this professor. He could care less about his students and their grades. He is rude and does not care to offer the slightest bit of help to his students. The fact that he still has a job amazes me. I failed his class and had to retake the course with another instructor. With a different instructor I have an A in the course.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: He rarely responds to emails, and when he does, they're one word answers with the "sent from my ipad" signature. He's very uncaring towards his students and clearly does not put much effort into the class. He teaches by reading off of powerpoints from the book company. If you go to office hours, he says "this could have been done over email"...

Name: Greg Brock
Review: If you want to pass, don't be lazy, wipe away your sass, and read the book! Dr. Greg Brock does not make up his tests, but rather, the author of the book sends him test. Attendance is not mandatory. Online homework assignments are due every Sunday. He cracks jokes and they are so funny.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: This class was not what I expected at all. He's very dry and boring. He reads off powerpoints the entire class and the information is not on the test.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: So I have never rated a professor because I have never seen a need to but I couldnt let this one go.  Dont take him. Please just dont.  He could care less about helping students. his assignments are due @12:01 AM so if it says its due the 15th, really its due the 14th. If you talk about grades in office hours he will lower your grade. not helpful

Name: Greg Brock
Review: All he does is teach off of his powerpoint slides, and he doesn't really make much sense. Not to mention his monotone voice makes class even worse. He gives learning objectives before tests but none of that material is even on the test and the tests are much harder than what he teaches. Only nice thing is that he considers an 87 an A, 77 a B, so on

Name: Greg Brock
Review: I barely passed when I took Micro and easily made an 80 on his tests. He gives entertaining and good lectures in class. He is very helpful if you go to his office hours. If you make an 86 in the class, it's rounded to an A and he drops your lowest test. There is a class to review for every test and he gives a study guide; final is not cumulative.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: I took his class simply because I needed Econ for core, and he made it absolutely ridiculously confusing. He went too fast on topics that needed to be discussed in further detail in order to understand other concepts not to mention you only have three tests and one is the final. He grades way too hard and doesn't make clear what you should know.

Name: Greg Brock
Review: If you value your GPA don't you dare take this professor, his test are supper hard, and for extra credit you have to present in front of the entire class just to get 2 stupid points. I repeat don't take this professor.!!!!

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: very kind guy! he tries to make it as simple as possible. very helpful when you don't understand things. he also tries to make his lecture notes as close to the textbook as possible so then if you get confused by him you can use the textbook and vice versa. keep up with weekly homework, it makes a difference.

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: I swear to god he is the only prof at this school that cares about you as a person. Having difficulty with the content? He's there to help you. As well as the TAs for the course. As difficult as this course was, and the unlikelihood that I'll ever take it again, I would love to have him as a prof again. He doesn't treat you like a number.

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: One of my favourite profs

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: literally my fav prof, he makes things clear and he is very funny. he honestly made stats my favourite class when i thought it was going to be the death of me.

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: I'm currently taking second year stats with him. He is an absolute gem of a prof. He makes stats enjoyable and is always willing to help you outside of class by making sure you understand the material. He has a good attitude and his dog is the cutest thing ever.

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: Fun guy, interesting personality. The material is hard but he's willing to help. BUT like most professors at Brock he has an arrogance to him. He also, likes to check his phone so much for student questions that he often doesn't check to look for the people that don't mind raising their hands to ask. Overall though cool guy.

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: great professor, made lectures more interesting, makes an effort to help you do well

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: He gives very clear expectations, he spells everything out as easily as possible, he has plenty of office hours (plus is accessible by text) and will take all the time you need to get a concept. If you want to pass, Tim wants to help you!

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: Amazing prof... Literally gives you his cell phone number to text him if you have any emergencies, even if it is the night before the midterm... Material taught well and is super helpful if you don't understand something... class is relatively easy as well

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: Amazing prof, easy to find after hours to ask questions, supportive and gives the tools needed to succeed. Funny, makes statistics less boring and overall amazing prof and individual.

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: Makes statistics as enjoyable as possible. He's very caring and wants you to succeed. Provides "homework helpers", which are excel spread sheets where you can plug in a problems information so you can check your work or see where you went wrong, very helpful.

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: Amazing professor, makes Stats easy to learn and fun using examples and past experiences

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: He's really funny and friendly, will take the time to help you when you need it!

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: He makes stats not so scary

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: One of the best professors I've had. Cares so much about his students and is always there to help! Go to his office hours, they are a life-saver!

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: Tim is likely the best professor I've had so far. Goes out of his way to ensure the success of his students. Great lecturer and very much willing to help.

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: Great prof!!!

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: I love Tim! Amazing professor, makes math tolerable. If you go to lecture and pay attention you will do well!

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: He is alright. Hard to concentrate because I took the night class, but he is actually really funny. Seminars are quite helpful as well. What can I say? Tim is love, Tim is life. :p

Name: Tim Murphy
Review: I've taken another stats course in the past and this experience was far superior. Tim really has the students' best interests in mind and you can tell. He makes stats as easy as it can be and gives students every opportunity to get ahead. Consider yourself lucky if you find out he's your prof.

Name: John McNamara
Review: Great prof. Really passionate about the subject and easy to listen to. No exam, just papers. Easy participation grade by just showing up to class. Very approachable and overall just a nice guy.

Name: John McNamara
Review: A real G, super funny. Love him

Name: John McNamara
Review: Love having John as a prof. He cares about his students and wants them to do well

Name: John McNamara
Review: John thoroughly explains lecture material and course expectations. Very passionate about course material and makes lectures easy to follow along with. Textbook readings are interesting and relate to lecture material.

Name: John McNamara
Review: By far the best prof I have ever had. Every lecture felt like a motivational speech. So engaging. The TAs mark hard on the papers in this class so get participation marks in seminar.

Name: John McNamara
Review: Definitely my favourite prof at Brock, he understands that not many students actually want to be in class on a Friday for 2 hours so he makes sure to end as early as he can. He made the course material interesting and tries hard to be personable. 10/10

Name: John McNamara
Review: Fantastic prof, interesting course material.

Name: John McNamara
Review: Lectures were important, if you didn't go it would be a struggle. Readings for the class were flexible and I normally read them after the lectures. John was funny and seemed like a nice guy. I would definitely take one of his classes again

Name: John McNamara
Review: John is awesome to listen to in lecture. He does a great job of not just lecturing off his slides but instead tells stories and makes most of the material applicable to his students in their life. He is funny and cares about students getting a good grade! All of his assignments are interesting and easy to do well on!

Name: John McNamara
Review: The best prof Brock has in the CHYS department hands down!!!

Name: John McNamara
Review: such a great prof! easy to talk to talk and explains/ relates course material in such an amazing and helpful way! great guy! very understanding!

Name: John McNamara
Review: John was by far one of the best profs I've had so far at Brock. I found myself always wanting to learn despite how early it was. Great lectures and pay attention to the examples he gives as they back up the material very well.

Name: John McNamara
Review: Lectures are confusing (and not mandatory or helpful), but follow the textbook and you're in the clear. Assignments are straightforward and are easy marks. Final assignment is difficult, and expect no help or feedback. On the bright side, you can get the right answers from other students if you don't understand.

Name: John McNamara
Review: Such a nice and genuine prof. Really made me look forward to 8am!

Name: John McNamara
Review: This was the best class I have ever taken at Brock. Professor McNamara is so clear with his lecture material, uses many examples to clarify, is actually INTERESTING to listen to in class. He made me want to go to lecture and learn. This was the highest mark I have received in University so far.

Name: John McNamara
Review: He is so nice and helpful, he really makes 8 am lectures fun and understands that none of us want to be there. So he never lectures for the whole 2 hours. Favourite prof so far.

Name: John McNamara
Review: John is the best prof I've ever had in CHYS, he is super easy to listen towhees he lectures because he is so passionate about this course. There was no textbook, just a few assigned readings. There were no assignments but there was a midterm paper and take home exam. Take this course if you get the chance, you'll love it and John!

Name: John McNamara
Review: Greatest professor!

Name: John McNamara
Review: awesome teacher

Name: John McNamara
Review: He is honestly by far the best prof I've ever had! he explains concepts so well it's impossible to not understand lecture material! Even when he covered genetics and science of the brain, it was so clear-- I have zero background on these subjects and fully understood. He always worked hard to make class interesting and inspiring.  Love him!!

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: You have to work for your grades, but this is one of the most rewarding courses you can take! Barker explains concepts clearly and provides real-world advice that is useful in the future. He rewards participation with bonus points, and is knows what he is talking about! Just ensure you follow his in-class rules and you'll do fine.

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: There is generally one pop-quiz per week. Ensure you follow his etiquette rules or you may lose marks from your final exam! He is strict, but generally fair. His anecdotes are what make the class, and he is one of the wisest profs you'll encounter. Ensure that for long-answer questions you follow exactly his notes, not the textbook's description.

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: Very good Professor. Examples given when teaching are very helpful . Just be prepared for a quiz in almost every class and pre-read your chapters. Prof Barker gives bonus marks if the answer given in the class is worth.

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: no

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: He is the nightmare professor, very ironic to students. You need to take unlimited notes in his class, and he will randomly pick you out to ask you some ridiculous question. If you cannot answer it, he will criticise you and fire his angry bullets on you.

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: If you want a taste of how the real world works and become the best and toughest business person, take his class. Your boss won't always be your best friend and let you coast, enjoy the reality check.

Name: Tansu Barker
