Review: OMG, EVERY WEEK IS A NIGHTMARE. I feel so stressful when I took his class. Unexpected quiz and in-class exercise drive me crazy lol

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: The most real professor at the university. Took his class nearly 4 years ago and have never forgotten his lessons. He expects professionalism (we are in business people!) and won't be satisfied with answers that aren't thought out or just key termsdefinitions; he wants some thought. Take this class if you want to be ready for the real world.

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: he sounds like a truly great professor, but not quite one. tough marker and belittle people, always try to make sense out of nowhere.

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: Worst ever, he thinks we are in the 50's wants to control everything and everyone, stay away, I learned more from the book that from him.

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: Probably the worse prof I have ever met. In summary you are basically in a concentration camp if you stay in his class. Do yourself a favor (if you want a good grade) switch to another section of the course.

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: Good professor, although he seems though. if your want to learn real knowledge about MKT, choose him.

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: he gave me a 70, let me pass, thus i think he is the best professor

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: although some of them says he is hard in reality he is good.

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: MY FAVVVVV Prof at Brock! Dr. Barker is one of the smartest and kindest profs at Brock. He is very knowledgeable and teaches you what you NEED to know for your future! He inspired me and pushed me to do my best. He is tough and can be intimating but he is absolutely amazing!!!!!

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: Great prof if you want to actually learn and leave with an understanding. Read the syllabus thoroughly and follow it strictly and you will be fine.

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: worst ever

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: A good prof if you actually want to learn something other than key terms, Barker makes sure you take it to the next step of thinking. The students that don't like him are the students that think the world is easy and should be handed to them...

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: For those getting ready for the real world.... this is the only Prof that will do that for you. Stick it out, hold your own and for God sakes dont cry infront of the man it only please him.

Name: Tansu Barker
Review: this guy is really something else! he must not realise that we pay big dolla bills to go to school there, cause he just treats us like we're babies. he is very hard on people and waste no time to point them out and make them feel embarrased for a simple mistake. and there was the fact i was once kicked out of a class for yawning accidentially.

Name: William Thurber
Review: Horrible Teacher to have.

Name: William Thurber
Review: Teaches the wrong way to do something first, then the right way. Entertaining but horrible teaching style. Openly picks favorites. Told us before the exam he already knew our marks (gives you whatever mark he wants!)He might be cocky in front of a class but approach him one on one: he's timid!  He ran a paper business into the ground before Brock.

Name: William Thurber
Review: I had Thurber 6 years ago, and I still think about his class to this day. He was an awesome prof, knows and tells it how it is. A lot of students get thrown off by that, and it's understandable. I don't know why Brock didn't renew his contract, that was a huge mistake.

Name: William Thurber
Review: One of the worst prof's in terms of teaching you anything.

Name: William Thurber
Review: He's now teaching at UOIT. Participation is worth 30% of your final mark, and, like someone said before, he plays favourites VERY HARD. Doesnt care if someone puts up their hand, will choose someone else if you are not one of his fave. Don't get me wrong, he's a good person, his teaching style and method NEED TO CHANGE.

Name: William Thurber
Review: Overall Ok prof, plays favourites hard though

Name: William Thurber
Review: Greatest professor i've ever had to this date. I had him in first year, and since then i've had 2 more years of school. still the best prof in brock university history!

Name: William Thurber
Review: good prof, too bad he's not at brock anymore, he made everything relateable

Name: William Thurber
Review: Best prof in brock university history. Too bad brock is dumb and could care less about what the students want and let him go. This man is a self made man, and knows more about the real world than any text book prof will ever know.

Name: William Thurber
Review: textbook seller!

Name: William Thurber
Review: He's a nice guy but he really needs to work on his clarity. His assignment outlines are unclear and leave students cinfused. His lectures are pretty good though.

Name: William Thurber
Review: Thurber is the best prof. I've ever hd.

Name: William Thurber
Review: Basically what Thurber does is judge what type of student you are through the semester and marks your assignments/midterms/exams accordingly. If he THINKS you should get a C then you'll get it whether you deserve it or not. He's horrible to approach too.

Name: William Thurber
Review: GREAT PROF. This guy knows his stuff and wants you to learn what you gotta know.

Name: William Thurber
Review: Lectures are more interesting than other profs'.  It feels like he words things to purposely confuse students (ie. Porter's lecture).  Helpful outside of class.  Overall, good prof.

Name: William Thurber
Review: Difficult for a first year prof, he is far better in upper year classes, very approachable if your in year 3 or higher, he even brought our class out to cats caboose for free food and drinks. He freelances with lectures but gives you a better understanding of content then other profs.

Name: William Thurber
Review: thurber's style is to teach through failure... i've learned the what not to do in business. Not only did he screw up our on-line tests... he based our major assignment on a faulty business idea that had nothing to do with the course... AND IT LOST thousands of dollars. What an idiot

Name: William Thurber
Review: I think peoples problem is they get mad at their own incompetence. Prof Thurber rocks... He has the right to be cocky because he knows his stuff. Buisness is not supposed to be easy.  There is a difference between cocky and confidence. Thurber is approachable and will help you if you ask.

Name: William Thurber
Review: Full of himself. Thinks he has the best business experience while a random family friend or your bank manager can teach you better "business". Some ppl associates themselves with academia to market themselve, not sure if Thurber is one of them. Survival guide: get good notes, do well in your seminar and get on the TA's good side

Name: William Thurber
Review: If you want: a good mark; to not be humiliated; to not be confused about material and whats expected on tests/assignments, then don't take his class!! He's full of himself, and doesn't give you a better understanding of marketing.

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: She has a wonderful mix of research and clinical experience, so she provides topical anecdotes that clearly explain the point she is trying to make.

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: Really enjoyed lecture and she explained things really well

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: Lectures are very easy to follow along and they aren't boring

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: Professor brings a depressing atmosphere to many lectures, regardless of the topic at hand. Lectures feel longer than they are, and tend to be rather boring.

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: Definitely one of the best professors I have ever had! Unlike John Mitterer's lectures, her's are actually useful and go over lots of useful material for tests, assignments and exams. She also teaches with lots of passion and engages with students. Readings are still required, but for her classes attending lectures are absolutely mandatory!

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: WONDERFUL prof! Has such a passion for what she teaches and is able to make it easy to understand. Extremely organized. Make sure you go to lecture as you need to fill out lecture notes to do well on the exam!

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: Very interesting women. She knew a lot about what she was talking about. Got carried away sometimes with her stories. Going to class is mandatory, Lecture slides aren't helpful since you are given a hand out and then need to fill in the blanks with what she says in lecture.

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: i loved her lecture technique!! made note taking very easy

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: She's a wonderful lady. She's helpful and so easy to talk to. She genuinely cares about her students and the work she does.

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: I love the class except the fact that you are too busy writing throughout the class.

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: Amazing Professor who is very interesting to listen to!

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: What a sweetheart this woman is. I was very intimidated about asking a professor for a letter of reference but Kathy was more than happy to give me one. Her expertise in clinical psychology makes her lectures profoundly easy to understand as most of her 1/2 of Psyc 1f90 related to clinical psyc. Do not be afraid to approach her, she's a sweetheart.

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: Loved her! Amazing prof

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: Great teacher, but hard exam

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: Kathy is so sweet! You can tell she loves to teach and is very enthusiastic. I love her teaching method and she is very organized. She has alot of office hours and is always so happy to help! Excellent prof! Gets you very interested in the course. She completely changed my opinion on things!

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: She's tough and expects a lot from her students, but it's worth it. She's an excellent professor whose passion for her work is evident through her teaching. Overall, she's a very kind, intelligent and insightful woman.

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: awesome prof.  Made class really interesting and had great lecture notes.  Loved her teaching style.

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: Kathy was my Behavior Mod prof way back in 1984 or 85 at York U. I'm a practicing PhD and a prof myself now, and she STILL stands out in my mind as one of the finest instructors I ever had.

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: Keeps you interested throughout the entire lecture, not boring and has a good sense of humor!

Name: Kathryn Belicki
Review: It's a tough course but I love her teaching style.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: In university you take control of your own education but this man did not want to help anybody in anyway, when asked questions in class he would say you should know this by now and laugh about how we would fail the exam. Tried to take advantage of office hours laughed at me and told me to read 18 chapters of the textbook to prepare for the final.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: Trash. Lectures are so general and all over the place, you never know what the main theme is. Yells at you for asking a question and claims that, "you should know this already" when going to office hours. Absolute trash.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: Does not post notes. Puts up a figure and talks about it for a while. Best advice is to type like crazy as he speaks and have your phone ready to take pictures of the lecture slides. If you go to his office he is very helpful. also record every single figure he puts up and go to the textbook to look at it and understand it. Textbook is essential

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: Terrible teacher. Barely learnt a thing and he made 8am classes mandatory. The class was all over the place. He would just ramble on with only pictures on the slides. It was impossible to know where he was going with each lecture and what the main point was.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: I was hesitant about Dr Skandalis after hearing feedback from other students. I made sure to take advantage of his office hours almost every week to ask questions and he would quiz me. Very pleasant and friendly one on one and gives fantastic feedback. Went through midterms with me and explained things I didn't quite get. He is a great resource!!

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: The midterms are easy if you study from his lecture notes, but the final is where everyone fails. He assigned the ENTIRE textbook to study, which I did, and my mark still dropped four percent after the final. He doesn't want his students to succeed. He makes fun of and laughs at everyone who isnt as smart as him.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: hard to follow in class

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: If you skip this class I can guarantee you won't do well, but if you go to class and pay attention, the material is actually pretty interesting. The topic is a little complicated but put in a little effort and it should make sense. The textbook and youtube videos help a lot. He calls on students which can be scary, but he is a great lecturer.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: he laughed when people got answers wrong in class and told us that theres no way were going to do good in the class. thanks bud

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: He's a great professor and a well respected. People complain because they want a degree handed to them, but his tests were fair and his lectures were really interesting. If you hate him because you got a bad mark, maybe try harder.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: Avoid at all costs. By far the worst professor I've ever had. VERY unclear about expectations; essentially tells you the exam is on the whole 800pg textbook (minus 2 chapters). Seems to enjoy making students anxious, talking about how hard his exams are, how you're going to get stuff wrong, bragging about how his own son failed his class, etc.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: Very condescending, dry lectures, slides are just figures from the text that you're expected to memorize (you are expected to memorize the entire textbook..). Exam and midterm questions are very unfair (midterm was 25MC worth 30% of final grade). He also enjoys walking up and down aisles to put students on the spot.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: This course seems like it should be something that you could succeed in with enough determination, however his lectures and the exam questions are incredibly convoluted. He assigns the whole 800 page textbook as reading and seems to expect you to know all of it. Also, expectations on labs are not clear and marking is inconsistent.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: He puts stuff on the tests that he never covered in lecture. Very condescending and does not care about helping his students' learning and success. If you actually want to learn, lectures are pointless because he tells you that you are "on your own" for most concepts. Do not take this course if you don't have too as it was my worst mark all year.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: oh gosh, terrible prof i asked him questions after class and he told me to google the answer. His lecture style is terrible and expects you to memorize everything he says. Honestly dont know why hes a professor he obviously hates teaching. Should only do research, he made life hell

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: Hardest course Ive ever taken at Brock. Lectures are hard to follow because he rambles on about nothing. One of the most inconsiderate profs. He wants students to fail. Dont get me wrong, hes smart... but very over qualified for this job position. Get the hell over urself and try helping your students pass.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: I really wanted to enjoy the course. I believe he knows his stuff, but he doesnt have to put down students to prove it. He will ask if anyone have questions, but no one wants to ask because to him there is such thing as 'stupid' questions; asking for a clarification will risk in him saying something like "werent you listening to what I just said".

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: loves to make the simplest things very difficult to understand. Ask questions to the class and will explain the wrong answers as if they are right. He uses intimidation to teach; helps no one. He will always refer to the textbook when realistically no student has time to check the things he doesnt explain in class. Pros: looks like Jeff Goldblum.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: Normally, I dont hate people I personal dont know. Skandalis is an exception. I attended all lectures minus like 2-3. I did all the reading from the book and his notes yet the course was a total disaster.  Honestly, he manages to make the easiest material the hardest thing in the word.

Name: Adonis Skandalis
Review: Worst prof I have ever had and I am in my third year at Brock. Does not post anything, very rude when answering questions about midterms . Does not explain what to study from the book, does not tell you what will be on the midterm "material wise". Tell you to go through lectures and you are there like thank you captain freaking Obvious. Very ruuude

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: Dr. Ashton is a great professor! He adds subtle humour to his lectures in a unique way. His tests are difficult but extremely fair! He provides a review sheet before the test which is exactly what is on the test - no surprises! His course outline is basic and the workload for the course is light. His expertise in the field of personality shows.

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: This guy sucks. His multiple choice questions on the exams are next to impossible, and..... nope that's it. That's all he has on his exams. 90! multiple choice that will ruin your week.

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: So witty! It's great. He loves to add random interesting facts when he sees the class falling asleep. I f you pay attention to his hints and ask questions, you'll do great in this class!

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: It was his first time teaching this course but his assignments were fair and he gave tons of bonus marks out. The midterm was all MC and a bit tricky but the dec final was so easy, he provided review sheets for both. Hes super funny in a cute awkward way and is also really approachable outside of class.

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: Difficult course but if you go to class and study the textbook, you should be fine. The multiple choice questions can confusing sometimes, so you have to read the questions carefully and make sure you choose the right answer.

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: Really very smart. Funny in an awkward way but still really funny. Harder test but fair.

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: Ashton is my favourite professor at Brock because he seems like he actually likes teaching. His tests can be hard but are VERY fair, especially with the study sheets he posts which literally have a 1:1 ratio on what will be really on the test. He's super nice and always happy to explain and help you out. I wish he taught more classes!

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: Had ashton for 3F20 as well & he cares about teaching & his students; he's extremely easy to talk to although he may seem intimidating. Most people find his exams to be very difficult but I ended up with over 90s on both the midterm and final!! His exams are all multiple choice & he gives a review; do the review in detail & your golden! Very easy

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: He is great!

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: Ashton is a great professor, he lectures well, and studies his topics passionately. He is clear in his descriptions and makes the content easily digestible. His style is very calm and monotone, so his lectures can be boring if you have no interest in the material. Overall a good professor, very fair with excellent course structure.

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: Lays the expectations out from the very 1st lecture. Personality is an extremely tough class with an extremely light workload (if that makes sense). If you are not good at multiple choice tests, I wouldn't advise taking 2p25. Also, lecture attendance is not 'entirely' mandatory, as he writes the textbook and pretty much goes through it lec by lec.

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: he was the worst prof when it came to exam time. The multiple choice was next to impossible! 3 hour exam of all multiple choice that took a page each was a killer!!!!! he definitely needs to change that

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: Ashton is a funny guy if you like quirky humour. His mannerisms are especially fun to watch when he lectures, like how often he squints his eyes. He is very clear about his expectations, and yes, his tests are on the difficult side. However, they are entirely fair if you attend the lectures and DO THE READINGS. YOU CANNOT SKIP ON HIS TEXTBOOK.

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: He is very clear with his explanations. Obviously knowledgable. He wrote the textbook so obviously if you're going to miss something, like he says miss lecture not a reading. Great class, pretty interesting.

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: Purposely tries to make course difficult. I understand it is university but the test do not need to be made so difficult. Very poor format for an MC test. Almost every question consists of a, b, c, a&b, b&c....voice can become annoying during a 2 hour lecture. Clearly trying to make more difficult than need be, trying to show off.

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: He is a very nice man on a personal level, but has extremely tough tests. He takes pride in knowing he has tough tests. He told my class "This will be the hardest multiple choice you have ever taken".

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: Not as interesting as i expected. I did very well on the midterm but then was destroyed by the final. Exams are extremely tough & designed to stump you. I spent all study time with just the textbook & had mixed results (see beginning) however he wrote the thing so it is very accurate compared to most classes.

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: Just terrible. His textbook is garbage, you cant learn from it, and unfortunately he is the same way. He teaches very general information with no conclusions. His tests are ridiculous and full of double negatives. He is very nice man who cares about his students and work but don't take his class, it sounds interesting but it really sucks.

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: Funny!

Name: Michael Ashton
Review: CUTE!

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: So, this may be more of an indictment of the course than Dr. Danahay himself, but ENGL3P90 is an absolute joke. I really shouldn't complain, it is an easy A, but this course is less challenging than an elementary school course. You will learn nothing. You don't need to go. You don't need to buy the books. He doesn't even try to teach you anything.

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: There are lots of tags I could give Danahay, but I think those three are the most relevant. Danahay is a huge part of why I have the confidence to pursue my masters, and if you ever have the chance to take one of his classes, I cannot recommend it strongly enough.

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: Dr. Danahay has been one of the most influential profs I have ever had. He gave excellent feedback to essays and was willing to talk over anything I didnt understand about how I was being graded. He was always accessible in office hours and so if anyone had any problems in the course he was always there to help make it easier. Excellent Professor!

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: Danahay has been one of my favourite profs since I had him in second year. While it's understandable that some people might be put off by his teaching style (as we've been taught to follow strict guidelines before postsecondary) the fact that he allows students freedom is really beneficial for critical and creative thinking. Also incredibly funny!

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: he is great and reminds me of George Clooney.

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: Thanks to Danahay, this has been my most educational and interesting semester at Brock. His lectures and method of teaching have helped me learn what makes a great essay and how to take interest in what I am given to read. His humour and expressive mannerisms create a fun class experience that never made me want to drop his class or miss a lecture

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: I loved the prof!! Such an amazing person!  But the class in general was a bit over place, I don't feel like I've taken anything from it...

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: Unfortunately, my style of learning did not match his style of teaching. I would have loved to like him more, but I just struggled with the formatting of the class.

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: Danahay never fails to make lecture interesting with a good sense of humor and a plethora of obscure YouTube videos, and he truly cares about his students and being a good professor. I would happily take all his courses over and over.  Also, he has an uncanny resemblance to George Clooney.

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: Dr. Danahay is very energetic and enthusiastic about what he teaches, which I think is a necessary quality in a professor. His lectures are thought-provoking and interesting. The feedback on essays and assignments is very helpful.

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: Fun lively class, stunning resemblance to George Clooney! and the material is well organized! Loved the class!

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: This man has restored my faith in Brocks English Department! If they can hire someone this amazing, then they must be doing something right.

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: So this semester was really interesting, a few weeks into the semester ur lectures stopped and we got into groups that would meet up every 3 lectures and it was really fun. We got more face time with the prof to help us with our assignments without having to go through 1000 students it was helpful for our research papers

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: WHY CANT HE TEACH EVERY CLASS IN THE ENGLISH DEPARTMENT?! material is amazing, amazing personality, the lectures are mind blowing!

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: I was worried when I picked Victorian Literature because it all seemed boring but boy was I wrong. This class changed my entire perspective on The Victorian Era and literature itself, its amazing how awesome a class can be when its taught right and Dr. Danahay did just that!

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: For the first time in my life I wanted to read Victorian novels and poetry.

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: I tried so hard to get in a fourth year course just so I could have him next semester. I couldn't and it actually broke my heart. He is so great.

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: He's a very fun guy and he makes every lecture exciting. And I am telling you he looks exactly like George Clooney.

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: I was not happy with my first essay mark but he was very helpful with his feedback and future essays.

Name: Martin Danahay
Review: He gave good feedback when I went to him for help and keeps the classes fun and light.

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: TEXTBOOK is your best friend. course touches over a lot of content so his lectures dont cover a lot or they skip over things... questions on videos or in class discussion. theres a mandatory proficiency test that will kill your grade if you fail... MAKE SURE YOU PASS THAT (worth 25% but passing grade is 70%) People either love him or hate him

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: Way too exam heavy and the proficiency test is a joke

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: If I wanted to hear my peers and myself talked down to all the time, I would have joined the military instead of going back to school. Went to 3 lectures and made peace with the mark I receive studying the book only. Lectures: word for word from text, minus useless info he throws in for tests. Teaching methods are terrible. Go to college instead.

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: Hes a good instructor however the course layout and what were graded on is horrible. Its extremely hard to get a good grade in this class

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: Herb is a conservative man who demands respect as he deserves it. A lot of students dont like him for this but personally, I respect him as a professor. If you go to class and study, youll get the grade you deserve.

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: a difficult class

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: If you put the work in, youll get a grade youre happy with. Dont understand the negative reputation

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: the lecture is so boring; maker is not fair; never try to take this professor course! you can not get the credit!

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: He abuses his power by making us take our hats off for no reason

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: Good

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: He wrote the textbook. So his expection is high. That's why it's not easy to acheive a good mark in this course. But you do learn real stuff. Personally I prefer tough graders who can teach rather than someone giving away marks just because s/he can't teach. Pay attention to details if you have him!

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: Worst class I have ever taken. I am a 90+ average student and got a 67 in this class because it is so subjective.

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: Great prof. Knows what he is talking about. Very difficult class to pass. Exams are based on entire textbook and ANYTHING he says in class. Study hard, go to class, and you'll pass

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: Read the textbook, everything is from the textbook

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: Everything in this course is his opinion. Yes some of it may be correct, but a large part goes against anything ive ever learned about business. He is very intimidating and hard to like. You cant make students afraid and expect them to respect you. Tests are hard. Study lots. AVOID HIM AT ALL COSTS.

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: He's one of the worst professor's I've had. He never elaborates on questions he just automatically refers you to the syllabus as if that has all the answers. He's also extremely arrogant and I highly recommend you never take his classes.

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: Professor MacKenzie lays out exactly what he expects from you (which is a great deal) at the beginning of the semester and this course is a great eye-opener for university students. I found that he made the lectures very interesting, just make sure you read the book and make good notes. Take advantage of every extra credit opportunity he gives you!

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: The worst professor/teacher I have ever had. Uses an old approach to teaching and includes irrelevant test subjects. Grading is outrageous. I have a 90 average among my other courses and struggle to pass these tests. I would highly recommend talking to a guidance counsellor and requesting a substitute class to fulfill this credit.

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: He is very challenging and expects a lot from his students. To pass his midterms and exams you need to memorize the book. He told me once that "if I open any page of this book I expect you to know what exactly it says." I failed the class, but I learned a lot from.

Name: Herb F MacKenzie
Review: may the 1p93 odds be ever in your favor

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: Thank you for going above and beyond! Professor Trabelsi, it was a great time and good luck for me, being your corporate governance's student, I have learned lots of interesting cases especially bitcoin which I think it's really useful. Finally, you brought us from the moon to the earth, successfully and safely. Please accept my deepest thanks.

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: A wonderful and caring man that wants nothing but the best for his students, but a frustrating professor. Passionate about the subject material and will take time after class to explain concepts BUT during lecture - jumps all over the place, repeats unclear ideas over and over, pulls marks out of thin air and promises bonuses you'll never see

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: Samir is a great prof. He picks on students a lot and puts you on the spot. However, the class isn't too hard if you work for the grade. He's and easy grader, and a funny guy, and there's so many opportunities for extra credit. He's very respected at GSB and many students look up to him. There's no final exam, just 2 midterms, and 2 assignments,

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: I'm sure Professor Samir is a nice person at heart however his teaching style is unbearable and incomprehensible. He spends a tremendous amount of time complaining about absences and adjusts the quality of teaching according to it. I understand showing up is important however he should "show up" ready to teach properly regardless!

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: Professor Samir is mindblowingly caring towards his students. His classes are some of the few classes in which I feel a human being is lecturing, not a machine. Thank you for your inspiration Professor Samir. You are a professor we will always remember...

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: I really enjoyed Mr. Trabelsi teaching style, he was energetic and engaged with the students. He would always be willing to take the extra time after class to help anyone. It was not an easy course but if you go to class and take some time to study every week for a few hours you will do well. I hope he continues to teach at Brock University!

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: Professor Trabelsi has been my idol in accounting. He makes things so simple that you would not miss anything... Plus, he is very personal with student.. We're really lucky to have him in Brock

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: Prof Samir is my best professors so far, and thanks to him I will major in accounting. He shows that he really cares for his students, and do everything to explain things in a simple manner

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: Decent Professor and he really cares about his students doing well, but extremely unorganized and doesn't remember what he said the class before. He'll assign work to be collected then completely forget, and change assignments halfway through you working on it. His midterms are completely arbitrary on what he's feeling when he writes it.

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: He is the best prof you will get at Brock University.

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: Samir is a pride for Brock... no doubt why he was awarded the Faculty Excellence award lately by the senate. Exam are relatively easy, and gives you everything in class. He's among the few that show he really cares about your success.

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: Lectures are boring yet he expects you to be hooked on every word. Doesn't upload any slides but expects you to know course content in advance. Spends most of the lecture talking down on other profs. The best part of this course is that he is an extremely easy grader so at least you don't need to put any real effort in other than the midterm.

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: The best faculty at the accounting department. Must teach MACC 5P12 as the CFE results are simply horrible.

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: simply the best at Goodman. extremely dedicated for international students success

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: great prof. passionate about corp gov and teaches it very well. enjoyed his classes and the real life examples in every lecture.  amazing

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: Simply the best at GSB...

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: Nice guy, interesting classes. Among the very few that relates class materials to real world. You can learn a lot from him. Seems always in a hurry. If you need to ask a question - email him or go to his office.

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: terrible professor, never say useful thing in class. Never respect to his students

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: Really awesome professor. Knows his stuff and is careful in making sure that everybody in his class understands his lectures. Nice guy, fair tests, goes out of his way to help you study for exams.

Name: Samir Trabelsi
Review: Took this last summer, the class was half online video to teach concepts, the other half was in person to help us and go through problems. Trabelski is the best teacher I ever had. If you show an interest in doing the work he will help you with any problem you occur. I hope I get the opportunity to have him teach me again in the future.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: why are y'all hating on probably the best prof ever. She is kind, generous, and a leader in her profession. She is a star. Y'all don't know now, but she will make a business leader out of you. Count your blessings!

Name: Laura Allan
Review: I won the faculty wide new venture competition in her class. Our group asked for copies of the photos taken with our trophy. After many empty promises to provide these she never did. If you win new venture, don't expect more than the minimum.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: Terrible prof. Never takes time to address student concerns. Want to go to office hours? Forget about it... teaches vague content which is essentially useless.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: Amazing prof. Going to lec is very important if you want to score high. Clear explanations and lots of examples that's really helpful. She prepares an exam review guide which is really helpful since it gives you an idea of the mark breakdown and topics to focus more. Didnt follow the review for midterm(got 67%) but followed it for final(got 83%)

Name: Laura Allan
Review: Laura appears as a great teacher on the outside. But after being hypocritical, and a confusing marker; Im not sure what to rate her. Would NOT recommend

Name: Laura Allan
Review: Brutal professor. The class isn't fair since most of your mark is based off how lucky you get with your new venture group. If you get a terrible group in BU111, your mark will suffer even more in BU121. Content was extremely boring, and mostly common sense. She made exams super hard and vague.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: Unorganized, materials are explained poorly.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: She has a very annoying teaching style, thinks she know everything. If that was true I'm sure you'd be at a better place than a first year business teacher at Laurier. She doesn't want her students to do well.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: Laura definitely knows what she's talking about. If you work hard in the course then you can succeed with her, but she does have high expectations. She's not always the most kind professor; however, I learned a lot from her.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: Tries to trick students with trick questions and is excessively sassy when answering students' well thought out questions that require guts to ask in front of a class of 200 students.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: She has no experience in entrepreneurship. She said she has been teaching for almost 30 years! I found her to be rude and condescending. I don't know why she is teaching this course. It is very introductory and not very useful.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: She is the best prof I have had during my first year. Her lectures are amazing and inspirational. As a person, she is very supportive.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: Terrible professor. intentionally making people fail the course on purpose, making points to make the course harder and doesn't care about student's success.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: So far she's been the worst prof that I've had. She is never specific and will tell you that things are not on the exam even though there were on it.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: The BU121 course in itself is meant to be a challenge to all students taking it, it is supposed to intentionally take more time than your other courses and have way more assignments, it doesn't help to have a professor like professor Allan who makes it more difficult. Her hard to understand lecture style and last minute exam alterations don't help

Name: Laura Allan
Review: You really need to attend Laura's lectures in order to do well on exams. She wants very specific answers so study well.   As far as profs go, she gave a review guide for the midterm and final, which was very generous. She is very honest during office hours.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: I did not love Laura Allan, I thought she could be a little condescending at times. A large portion of your grade was also from group projects which are great if you have a strong group but terrible with a weak group. It also seemed that each TA marked different and averages would be different lab to lab.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: If you can get notes from other people then there is no point to go to class. They are boring and not much value is added. I found the textbook useful to help explain connection not discussed in class, though textbook not needed to get a good mark. You can pass fine without the textbook. TA's in this course are amazing.

Name: Laura Allan
Review: She is a really nice prof, but I found it rather hard to grasp the concepts compared to BU111. Also almost all grades are from New Venture, which is group based, so my mark suffered from that

Name: Laura Allan
Review: RIP in peace everyone who takes BU121. get ready to either sleep through every class. most interesting thing that happened was the end of class. 10/10 would not recommend this prof, but if you're in BU you have to have her anyways so good luck

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: A passionate, knowledgeable man who cared deeply about his students. He will be greatly missed!

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: He made me want to major in psychology, he made you want to be in class and had so much passion for teaching and the students.  By far the best prof I have ever had.

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: The best prof I have ever had hands down. He cares about his students so much and makes sure midterms are more than fair. Teaching style is a bit different with no slides but still the best lectures I've ever been to!

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: The kindest most wonderful man and professor. So caring and kind. If he sees midterms aren't done well, he will re-adjust marks so it is more fair and his students do well. TAKE ANY COURSE HE TEACHES! Wonderful man.

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: Amazing professor. Learned a lot and was very inspired by his lectures. He knows the material and can relate it back to us as students which is something not many profs can do. Would take more classes with him.

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: Every professor at every university in any discipline should sit in his class and they would learn something on the art of teaching.  It would be beneficial to everyone.

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: amazing teacher! his writing is a little unclear sometimes, but he explains very well if you listen. go to his office hours if you need help!! i could take a class with him again anytime

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: The greatest professor to ever step foot in a lecture hall! I would highly recommend his class to anyone!!!!

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: Amazing lectures, has a lot experience in the field of psychology, great at cracking a joke. Lectures usually will not cover all the material, you will need to read and make your own notes to do well in the class. He doesn't cover all the chapters for the final, so you will have to study that on your own time. Tests can be a little tough. Worth it.

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: So clear in his expectations and very knowledgable. He knows a lot and teaches very well.

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: Cutest prof I've ever seen! Amazing man, and great prof. I would take every course he taught if he taught more.

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: Dr. Morgenson was hands down the best professor I have had so far in university. His lectures are incredibly engaging, interesting, and extremely well put (possibly the most articulate man I have ever had the pleasure of listening too). He really cares for all of his students and does as much as he can to help them succeed.

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: I had Don last year for my intro psychology courses. He is, and will forever be my favourite professor. If you are struggling with anything, visit his office hours- he will do what he can to make sure you do well in the course. His lectures were the only 830 AM lectures I looked forward to. Such a great man.

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: Best Professor at Laurier. You have to take his course, his teaching is outstanding. His lectures are invaluable.  He is so nice and respectful to students. The test are very fair as well. Im going to take every single course he offers throughout university. He is the best professor out there.

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: Don is awesome! I really like his lecture style. He's always willing to have you visit him in his office to get clarification  on anything. He's an extremely inspiring prof and I look forward to ps102 with him!

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: Morgenson is a gem and if you have the opportunityoption to have him as a professor I would 100% take it! He truly inspired me when it came to psychology and his lectures are very personal and interesting. Morgenson really cares about his students and he goes out of his way to make sure they do well! I would take his class again in a heartbeat!

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: HE'S SO ADORABLE PLEASE TAKE HIS COURSES

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: Took Intro to Psych 20 years ago. First day, he told us all we had 100% and it was up to us to keep it - a lesson I have used with my kids.  Also, used his idea of contracting for a grade - x amt of work  80%, y amt of work  90%, etc.  Could be difficult, but lots of makeup chances.  He's all about learning - which I did.

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: Morgy is the best prof I had all year and I am so happy to have had him for both PS101 and PS102. His lectures are priceless and so worth going to, as long as you follow up on the material in the textbook. Exams can be difficult if you don't study/pay attention in class, but if you come and learn or even just listen, its worth every minute.

Name: Don Morgenson
Review: His style is old school, he loves his students and teaches because he truly loves spreading his knowledge. He wants us to apply our knowledge, not just test our ability to memorize facts... Great guy!

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: Great!

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: Amazing prof. really helps you hit the ground running in first year. Wish he didn't decide to retire after this year. Hope he changes his mind and decides to come back and teach for a few more years.

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: Fantastic Prof. If you attend lectures you'll do fine on the exams. Interesting course as well.

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: Amazing Prof! hes never not smiling! haha, definitely in my top 3 teachers ever. Sad to see him retire.

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: He's a very good prof, helps u understand material very well. Speaks clear and good english. Definatly one of my better profs.

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: Cool

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: One of the greatest prof.indulges ones interest in the subject

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: Jim's ma boy! He is the most friendly prof I've met so far, and is really clear on exam content. GO TO LECTURES and you'll be fine!

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: Lectures were fun & interesting, but attendance is definitely mandatory since he likes to use the whiteboard (not available for download) and that's where Jim gets most of his exam questions. If it's from the readings he will tell you and gives a full exam review of what to study. Amazing prof, and a great way to start the BBA program at Laurier!

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: Attend all classes cause there are white board notes. Memorize everything to do well. I spent 1 1/2 day memorizing and I got the top mark in my lab for midterm(75.5%). Final exams suppose to be easier and is free marks.

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: Attendance in lectures, definitely mandatory as this is the only place Jim pulls from for exam questions.  If its from any of the readings he will tell you, gives a full exam review of what to study.  Amazing prof, and a great way to start the BBA program at Laurier!

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: Didn't care for him at all. He put me to sleep quite often.

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: Great prof. Keeps class interesting with games and always has good stories.

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: he is so boring in class.

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: Great prof. Nothing like Laura Allan

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: I thought that he was a very cocky person. Although he was a good teacher, i would avoid him again if possible.

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: Great prof.! Really supportive in e-mails and encouraging. The midterm was ridiculously hard though make sure you study well in advanced!!

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: He's a good prof... the midterm was ridiculously hard though. My TA ruined the class for me, but Jim was a good prof.

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: My favourite prof, by far!

Name: Jim McCutcheon
Review: He is a nice guy. Midterm is extremly hard so make sure you study study study for it...i actually get it back today and am terrifed to see how i did...but yeah he is a nice guy, always clear about whats on tests, and interesting to listen to. It would be nice if he just got to the point every once and a while but other than that hes a nice guy:)

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Not so caring, needed 0.2% more to get a better grade due to Laurier's GPA system. Asked for an exam remark and got deducted 5% instead.

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Sofy is a shock to a lot of people who take business and think it's gonna be a walk in the park. Sofy challenges her students and makes them think critically about the content at hand, and she has a good flow to her lectures and they are not boring if you understand and like the material. Final exam was really hard and I would suggest studying !

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Sofy is one of the best profs I've had so far. It is SO important to go to every lecture and take notes on what she says because she hints towards exam questions and helps answer them. She also gives great examples that help you understand the content. Sofy can be scary though so don't be on ur phone during class cuz she'll call you out for it.

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Although BU111 is a challenging class, if you work hard it is still very possible to get a great mark. Sofy makes lectures interesting and engaging and clearly cares about her students.

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: overall very great. She made me want to do the work!!

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Don't go to class after the first midterm; go to labs and SI sessions. Spends a lot of time on administration when she does not need too and class becomes a waste of time especially when you get into TVM and the material that follows. Her passion for the HP Case Competition can make her rude and aggressive. On the positive, very knowledgeable.

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Called out people in class for talking when the bigger disturbance was her calling them out. She spent a large amount of time at the beginning of class talking about non-course related topics which made her rush the actual course content. She was not good at teaching the "math" part of the course which was a large amount of the exam.

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: She is very unprofessional and condescending towards her students. Provides lots of extra credit, thank goodness. The lectures are very boring but you MUST go or else you will fail. - take down notes of everything she says in lectures. For exams, you have to memorize word for word everything in the slides if you want a decent mark.

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Sofy is very passionate about her job, and loves teaching others her knowledge. She provides lots of good examples and extra info in her lectures, making them very beneficial and informative. Made for good and valuable info on the exams. Could do without the new venture project though, as it was very time-consuming and hard for the group to do.

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Sofy is an extremely unprofessional professor .Revoked bonus marks from hundreds of students that earned them through clicker marks and makes insanely unfair deductions. She doesn't care for the well being of students and her grammar and sentence structure on exams is embarrassing and hard to read. Genuinely takes away from first yr BBA.

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Sofy is incredibly insensitive to situations surrounding her students. Her lectures are long and sickeningly boring and the content of her class is overly specific and makes general concepts far more confusing than necessary. She is rude, impatient and uncooperative. If you are supposed to be in her class, RUN!

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Awesome prof! Super funny and genuinely cares about her students. Provides thorough outlines for projects, midterms and exams which are super useful.

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Sofy is a great prof - she always comes to class prepared and gives really good examples that connect concepts in the slides to the business world. She is nice and cares about her students, although she will not continue the lesson if students are talking (something I appreciated but others found annoying). Overall, good first term for business!

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Sofy is a great professor who really knows her content (BU111). If you don't go to the lectures, it will be hard to succeed in this class as the slides are mostly visual. The content isn't hard, it's the workload. I spent around 80% of my first semester on reports/presentations for this class. After September the course takes over your life.

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Sofy overall is a great professor and the class is really not difficult contrary to popular belief. Her lectures are useful and interesting and the class is a great introduction to the business world. Sofy can be a little extra in lectures however, so get ready for her to call out students who are on their phone, talking, or leaving the class early

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Great Lectures, Very caring prof, however, it feels like she just reads off of the provided slides and answers questions about them. So if you understand the material on the slides beforehand, there isn't really a reason to go to class

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Detailed explanation of topics. Gives useful insights and examples. Best lecture ever

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: The lecture material is pretty dry but Sofy explained it clearly. The also gave out lots of exam question hints and gave us a very thorough exam study guide. If you study and memorize everything that's on the study guide and practice writing answers out you can definitely go well in the course.

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Went through lectures slow, but very in depth. Kind of abstract at times.

Name: Sofy Carayannopoulos
Review: Funny, smart, engaging helpful and fair. Of course she is challenging and has high expectations for her students, as any good prof should, but certainly doesn't surprise or seek to trick you on exams.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Quality individual. Always well prepared. Extremely knowledgeable and passionate. Great story teller. Focuses on need to know vs nice to know. His sense of humour also appreciated. Hated when his lectures ended

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Pretty cool guy, his tests and exams are hard but he's a fair marker.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Great lecturer who is obviously knowledgeable about history but his marking style has led to confusion and a lack of understanding on how to do better. only a midterm, one paper and a final exam and so each are worth a lot. The paper average was in the low 60's and the class average is in the high 60's. It's not a GPA booster!!

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Very hard marker.  Pinpoints little things such as citations as reasons why you got a low mark on an essay.  Very funny man, makes class fun, but is not worth the countless hours spent doing papers and notes. Loves his history and can teach it, but really attacks the mark if one point is missing.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Lenny is probably the coolest human being to ever grace Laurier's fine campus. He's hilarious and his sarcasm is always on point.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: L E N N Y is amazing, engaging, and hilarious. A solid 1 out of 1 professor

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Lenny is a beast, ok?

Name: Len Friesen
Review: No single textbook but assigned readings that were all available free online which was great. Hilarious and very informative lectures - this class covers a lot of ground. A tough but fair grader but can be flexible about workload/deadlines when the class needs it.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Friesen can be harsh and slightly disrespectful in is comments when grading essay. Beware, your papers cant go against his opinion. You will get minimal marks. He also makes it mandatory that you consult with him for your essays. Or you wont get a decent grade.  good personality, but definitely passive aggressive.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Lecture format is very disorganized. A few times he's finished the entire lecture, but is still on the first few slides. Not having a corresponding slides to go with his level of detail is extremely confusing. Most times he doesn't finish the lecture, leaving it to the next week.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: A gift to teaching, Dr. Friesen is the most hilarious and amazing professor I have ever seen. I took his Russian history course in the first-semester of 2nd year and then promptly found ever other class he taught. I have zero interest in International Relations or politics and it was the most fun I had in class all year. His anecdotes are gold.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Has that rare ability to break complicated-beyond-belief things down into something everyone can understand. Truly cares about students;  I e-mailed him for clarification and HE thanked ME for taking such an interest. Takes a personal interest in students who work hard and want to learn. Very easy on the eyes, with a great voice to boot!  1010.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Those who are complaining he's too 'difficult' have just been spoiled by the easy-going profs that make university seem like highschool pt 2. Friesen is everything a professor should be, he's tough, but he'll push you towards improving yourself as an academic and frequently challenge you and your ideasunderstanding of the world.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: He seems to have a 'love-hate' reputation among students. He has a sarcastic and pessimistic sense of humor which I personally didn't enjoy. He tries to cover too much information in readings and lectures. Prepare to do a lot of reading and studying for marks that will probably be lower than your average. This class will probably not help your GPA.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Intelligent professor, but tends to go into tangents and can lose focus. Incredibly hard marker and expects a bit too much for a third year class. Over all a bit of a buyer beware type of prof.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: An incredible professor, and the best one at Laurier. Visit his office hours, and he will help you so much! I took every one of his classes, including his seminars. He is a difficult marker at first, but if you listen to his comments you will steadily improve. Incredibly knowledgeable, and hilarious.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Not for the faint of heart. That said, HI 206 was the most rewarding, engaging, and challenging class that I've ever taken. I came out of it a stronger writer, better critical thinker, and developed a love for the Soviet Union. TIPS for success: Visit him in office hours, GO TO CLASS, read Suny's The Soviet Experiment, STUDY LIKE CRAZY = get an A.

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Super helpful and absolutely hilarious in lecture. Extremely attractive and a nice voice to listen to boot. I have even signed up for the follow up course because I enjoy his lecture style so much!

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Without a doubt the best prof I have ever had perfect amount of difficulty with the amount of knowledge given. very friendly and funny, knows his Sh*t and great to have a conversation with after class in wilfs

Name: Len Friesen
Review: Had him for HI205 and HI206. Was without a doubt the best prof I have ever had! Difficult marker, but very helpful. Ask him questions if you're confused and about his thoughts on essay topics... Just amazing.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: horrible prof, talks about herself way too much. called class idiots. leaves no clear instruction for papers and assignments due

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: The sections taught by Morgan Holmes were significantly more difficult than others.  Her midterms and final are longer and far more tedious.  Difficult to study for in a short period of time. Pick a different prof!

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: Worst prof ever. Thinks she's the all that because she wrote the textbook. Tests make absolutely no sense and lecture information is not included in the midterms and final exam. The M/C Exams consisted mostly of random stats and 'common sense' questions with potential answers being slightly different from one another. She ruined sociology for me.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: Extremely passionate. She'll bring up her rough childhood at least once per lecture, but it always had something to do with the lesson. I loved going to her class. She was intimidating, but she was helpful if you asked. Tests are hard, memorizing the lectures won't get you past a 60. Know the textbook cover to cover.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: Very passionate... Her lectures can be fun at times, she adds a lot of humor. Sure, she is a little different than most professors, but it makes for a more interesting class.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: Professor Holmes is not only helpful but is truly passionate about what she is educating her students on. I must say that she is one of the most influential professors I have ever had. Not an easy marker, however, if you pay attention and attend her classes you will succeed. She is amazing.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: By far, Morgan Holmes was my favourite professor this year. I took Sociology of Medicine with her, and by no means is she an easy marker, but it is possible to get an A, I did! My first A in University. You will be humbled by the extent of her knowledge. If you pay attention and participate in class, and take the class seriously, you will do great.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: Honestly, one of my favourite professors. Passionate about what she teaches and passionate about engaging students. If you attend class, ask questions and do the readings, there is no reason you can't get a great mark. Holmes is a more than fair marker especially when you show that you aren't afraid to question societal norms. I recommend her 100%.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: Awful proff! Will be avoiding her in the future. She loves what she teaches but two 15 page essays later and a condescending teaching style ruined a class I was initially pretty excited about.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: her classes are different from any other class ive taken. She makes it interesting and brings some actual substance to the classroom. its easy for a prof to read from a text, she brings in personal exams for better clarity, shes a must have prof !!!

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: As a professor, Dr. Holmes has a wonderful personality and she really makes the classes interesting - but it won't be to everyone's taste. She is a difficult marker and her instructions are sometimes unclear, so it's wise to ask a lot of questions. The lectures compliment the text, and I found they had nothing to do with the test and final exam.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: She scared the daylights out of me. She would go on personal rants and we would just try our best not to make eye contact. She was very passionate about the material, but not a good teacher.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: Outstanding. She is absolutley brilliant. For people who are looking for more then just flying through university BUT actually learning, she is amazing.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: Terrible... Tests were ridiculously hard because she puts you in a situation to most likely fail. Do yourself a favor and get out of this class. I got A+ and A's in all my other classes and a B in sociology. I also worked the hardest in this course because I knew it was gonna be the hardest. Take sociology with a different proffessor if your intere

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: Class would be better if groups were monitored more. Funny lectures. Tests were REALLY tough nad its weird not to know what's going to be on hte tests in advance.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: She lectures as if all problems in society are your fault. Her jokes are not funny and a waste of time where she could be teaching actual textbook information instead of telling us stories about her family tree. This class is not interesting and tutorials would be a lot more helpful than discussion groups.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: No Comments

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: Holmes is a great prof!!  I LOVED her class.  She was highly entertaining...the stuff she lectured on really stuck in your head because she presented it in a passionate, interseting way

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: Awesome, amazing professor! She's a smart, strong woman that I have a lot of respect for. I'm doing a double major in sociology just because of her.

Name: Morgan Holmes
Review: I haven't had her since first year, but a GREAT prof that sticks out in my mind. Tests straight from the textbook, and interesting stats provided in lecture that make you think!

Name: William McNally
Review: Always making jokes that are irrelevant to the course material, which is kind of annoying. Giving opinions about current news in an inappropriate way without fully considering student's feeling.

Name: William McNally
Review: Worst prof ever. Doesn't care for students and lectures are useless. Taught myself everything - Course was not supposed to be that hard. Made me hate finance!

Name: William McNally
Review: The flip classroom structure that McNally created is absolutely the worst - nobody goes to class because NOTHING is taught in class. He does not seem to care whatsoever about teaching students and being helpful. Word of advice for Laurier - scrap the flip classroom .... it doesnt work.

Name: William McNally
Review: Hilarious guy. People who hate on this class dont put in the effort to understand the material. The content is easy and his textbook makes learning the content enjoyable. You get to use Excel which makes the problems much easier. The only downside is that his flipped classroom style is not liked by most, but that depends on your learning style.

Name: William McNally
Review: Although I did well in his class, his teaching style was extremely ineffective. His textbook is full of errors and he puts in minimal prep into his lectures (ex. he spent 10 minutes pulling up an example instead of having it ready). He is negligent about student questions and hates on WLU frequently.

Name: William McNally
Review: Amazing prof. Very funny and knowledgeable. Although people who are more HR and marketing focus may not like him and be offended by his comments, they are funny and usually truly. Very fair midterm easy to do well.

Name: William McNally
Review: Doesn't actually teach anything. He expects you to learn everything from the textbook and only goes over examples in class without actually explaining them. Also doesn't have a great attitude towards student questions.

Name: William McNally
Review: Not a fan of his flipped classroom style, tends to go off on tangents unrelated to the subject. Not that helpful either.

Name: William McNally
Review: Teaching style seemed more like an online course than a lecture course. Nice guy but his teaching style is a bit lackluster.

Name: William McNally
Review: He liked his flipped classroom learning... I don't think anybody else did.

Name: William McNally
Review: Litterally the best prof at Laurier. I do not understand those who do not like him. Very intelligent, caring, hillarious, easy work load. Encompasses everything. Mcnally should teach every course a Laurier.

Name: William McNally
Review: He is hilarious and his lecture style is great.

Name: William McNally
Review: He cares nothing about his students. All he was trying to do was not teaching you anything but trying to give you a fail. Worst prof in the university.

Name: William McNally
Review: He gives clear instruction in an organized class. If you're willing to put in the work, he's a great prof! (he also makes Star Wars jokes)

Name: William McNally
Review: Terrible. Used the class to sell his textbook, and has a formula for calculating everyone's final grade, and most people got curved down!

Name: William McNally
Review: This guy is hilarious. I think he was a very fair prof. He bellcurved the exams to around 70% which was very annoying as we were all unsure about what our final grades would actually be. Students became too reliant on the testbanks and ended by being burned on the final.

Name: William McNally
Review: People love to hate on him, but really wasn't that bad. He structured the class so that lectures are mainly used for him asking questions for the class. In my opinion, this was the best use of time because the textbook is good and the best way to learn is by doing questions. I thought it was really easy if you put in a bit of work.

Name: William McNally
Review: You end up learning everything by yourself. Some of the problems you do in his textbook's homework sections have wrong answers. I would have gotten an A+ if he knew what he was doing.

Name: William McNally
Review: He is honestly the best finance prof! Anoyone who does not do well in this course is just lazy!! Most of his questions on midterms and final come from the homework questions online, DO THEM! Read the online text, understand it well, do the homework, and you are guranteed an A+! This prof is amazing, such a wonderful guy! No surprises on any finals!

Name: William McNally
Review: good guy. great prof. people who don't do well in his class are just lazy.

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: To put it into perspective, Rick is the type of dude who would sue you for emotional distress if you call him stupid.

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: My friends gave him a 3-4 stars rating out of pity but I'll be honest, this man is the embodiment of the word "pretentious". How he consistently manages to make everyone sleep at 5:30 pm is a mystery.

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: Very interesting teacher. He seems to enjoy Visual Basic and knows a lot about it,does a pretty good job of teaching it. However he is always pissed off in the labs for some reason and is very rude during them. I've also heard he teaches the Python course, but I didn't have him for that so I can't comment. Overall I think the good outweighs the bad

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: Very lazy Teacher, you could better understand anything for this course, on your own. Clearly got his degree on the back of a cereal box. Does not know how to communicate with his students , he is not needed.

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: Two words, Rude and Spiteful

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: He is uncaring about students. Will make mistakes, and after a student corrects him, he will act as if he knew what the issue was... Profs make mistakes as well, and it's obvious. When you need help on the other hand, he will make the most difficult question seem like a three year old could do it. Very harsh, and extremely rude. UNrecommended.

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: Couldn't go to my usual lab with David Brown so I went to his lab instead. He's rude and will make you feel dumb for asking any question. Got a D- on that lab (had gotten A+ on every single lab until that one).

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: rude

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: Rick henderson is extremely condescending whenever you ask him a question, and makes you feel very stupid.

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: Great guy. Just do the homework, and go to labs (mandatory) early to show how hard you're willing to work. Easy to rub him the wrong way, but it's not hard to get him on your side either. Also a real comic book guy who loves both Marvel and DC.

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: Good prof overall. Sometimes he gets really mad so be aware of that. And please, DO NOT talk a lot during his lectures because he WILL embarrass you.

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: Go to labs and its an easy A+

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: Rick Henderson was a really good prof.  He would always respond to emails quickly. He made the  classes  easier with practices and videos he posts online.

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: Great class and great Prof

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: This guy doesn't care about his students at all. He never says anything that isnt condescending and always seems angry in labs. Not a good prof. But at least he knows his class is a joke.

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: The labs were pretty easy, as long as you prepared and did the myitlab exercises. ALthough his attitude to some students were not that great, as long as you do ur work and come prepared to class it's not a problem. Every lab he would do explanations on areas that other students from previous labs had trouble on. This was very helpful

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: Nice and easy going personality.

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: Awesome Prof! I found the class really interesting and Prof Henderson to be very articulate.  Just don't show up late!

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: I find going to lectures saves me studying time, but you can learn from the text yourself (it's easy) and get high marks. All the lab marks are giveaways so do all the stuff and you can A+ too. He explains things so clearly that you can learn it without really studying. He doesn't bite if you're not late to lectures or asking him stupid questions

Name: Rick Henderson
Review: Wonderful!

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: I would really recommended NOT taking a class with her. She waits till the end of term to mark all papers. For the final exam I have 30% of my grade from 2 quizzes. These quizzes were designed for you to fail and trip you up on technicalities. Her instructions aren't clear for assignments. Shes slow to respond to questions. worst prof I've had.

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: She is a nice woman but her choice of assignments feels like she is setting you up to fail. Her quizzes (60mc/Qs, 60min) have very txb. specific questions, I did not learn from them. Instructions on the main group project were vague, with no posted grading rubric or instructions + the group project is a ridiculous time commitment to expect from us.

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: the midterm content, as well as the content on the final, is pointless and to specific. You cant take notes on your computer, only on paper but she moves through slides so fast that it is pointless. just read the textbook but honestly, you still won't do well at all. The course itself is ok but DO NOT take this course if it is with this prof!!!!

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: Professor Ellis-Hale tends to include minor details and examples from the texts in the quizzes... so just knowing the main concepts will not cut it!

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: She's caring professor and very approachable however she bans laptops which I didn't find it to be a problem till I saw the quizzes would ask about tiny details she said in class and only once. She makes the quizzes unnecessary difficult and I'm saying this as a student who got an A in SY103 but a B- in her class, SY101

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: I enjoyed her class. Although I hated we could not use laptops, I did enjoy writing because it helped me remember info more and write only the important things.

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: Does not allow technology in class nor does she post the lecture slides, therefore it quite difficult to grasp the content while scrambling to write notes. She heavily relies on the textbook for her students to understand her and to do well on the quizzes. DO NOT take this class if you are anything other than a visual and self-taught learner.

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: The lectures were very interesting as the professor taught with enthusiasm. However, one can only do very well if they have photographic memory. The 3 tests were based on pure memory and exact detail from the textbook. Go to class as that class discussion will help you in the end. Beware of the final exam- had nothing to do with textbook or lecture

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: I rarely write these reviews but i had to for dr. elis-hale. She lectured on absolutely nothing we were tested on. This course is entirely self-taught with unclear grading criteria, intense textbook memorization (she'll ask you for specifics), and too many guest speakers. I wished i listened to these negative reviews before taking a class with her.

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: She makes us write our notes, we aren't allowed our computers. It's 2019 and I cant hand write for my life. Doesn't even posts slides online.

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: Unclear grading and expectations for all projects. She didnt teach any tested content and had guest speakers almost every class. Tests are very hard and on content never learned in class

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: Garbage lecturer, really annoying and treats the class like high school kids. Does certain things like the class comments at the end of the lecture to guarantee attendance. As well as incorporating questions into the online quizzes that are about specific discussions held in class. She posts nothing at all on MLS,. she doesn't even use it, period.

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: This is the only review I've written here but I just had to. NEVER take a class with Ellis-Hale! We have 3 online quizes and one final exam and the questions she asks are NOT from the textbook NOR her slides! There is literally no way to know the answers to what she asks and almost NO ONE in the class got a 12. NEVER TAKE Ellis-Hale

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: Asks questions about SPECIFIC sentences from the textbook so be ready to memorize all 250 pages.

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS PROF! She truly cares about her students and wants to set us up for success. This is my second course with her and hope to take more. She is always around to give advice on school (on any course) and always willing to lend a listening ear when needed. I can't express how much she has done for me. Changed my uni experience!!!

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: I don't know where everyone else is getting their information from but Kimberly is the best professor at Laurier. She brings in lovely speakers and doesn't have long lengthy slides. She doesn't post her slides but does get most of her information from the textbook so miss a class? just check the textbook. And lastly, her marking is not hard.

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: DO NOT RECOMMEND TAKING A CLASS WITH HER! I never ever wrote a rating for a prof but i think this time i really have too. Took SY321 this summer term and haven't received any marks since June. She graded the first midterm but before the final exam we haven't received a mark for midterm 2, essay or participation.

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: The worst prof I have had at Laurier. She is condescending and treats all students like children.
