We had several lectures about learning strategies and multiple choice strategies for 1st years despite many upper years taking the class, and 20% of the midterms were questions based on that. She doesn't actually teach anything relevant to sociology.

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: Spends over half of each class talking about current events that have absolutely nothing to do with the course content. She doesn't post her slides or allow laptops in class but speeds through slides before you can write it all down. Her slides are often straight from the textbook and she provides way too many statistics

Name: Kimberly Ellis-Hale
Review: Loved this class! We discussed current events at the beginning of every lecture and most of the time these issues were applied to the lecture topic for that day. She played multiple TedxTalks in the class which really inspired me. This course changed my life.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: Ive never rated a professor but had to do it for kathy foxall. Shes horrible. Her slides dont make sense. Her lectures dont make sense. She has no structure to her speaking. Going over lecture notes is hell because none of it makes sense. She talks so slowly and spends so much time giving us pointless stories and examples that wont help us at all.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: She was good. Attending class will give you an advantage. I found the exams very reasonable and she gives lots of chances for bonus.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: Dr Foxall is a very caring individual, who wants her students to succeed. She is always willing to help and stay after class in order to answer your questions. Her lectures are very informative and you will not do well if you skip her classes nor if you don't read the required readings. Class is graded by a few things ( 2 midterms and final exam)

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: Great teacher, knows her stuff. if you don't go to class you won't have good grades. she is really helpful and great at explaining stuff.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: I love this prof, I have taken a few of her classes and she is amazing. she will take real life to stroy when it comes to explaining something. she is so caring and will help out her student as much as she can. If you go to class and are not on your phone you should great.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: Posts slides, helps if you need it. But overall, you get what you put in.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: Kathy is fair with her exams and wants her students to succeed. You should reference the textbook though because her slides do not have much information on them. She is caring and honestly funny. Another thing I like is that she posts grades very fast and does not waste her time unlike other profs; usually within the next day or two after writing.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: awful, such she is such a boring presenter. She goes trough slides so fast you don't have a chance to write a single thing form her slides or that she said. she makes you want to fall asleep.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: She seems nice during class although the tests in this course were ridiculous. Some of the questions on the midterm had nothing to do with the content, the multiple choice questions had random theorists and terms that I have never seen before coming from someone who read the textbook and went to every class. I would recommend not taking the course.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: PS102 - Kathy was a fair professor. Very monotone for a 3-hour lecture prof, but was very nice if you had additional questions. She posts lecture slides online. She sometimes tests on things that are in the textbook but not in lectures so beware! If you show up to class (which is almost always done early) and read, I can almost guarantee an A.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: Midterms and exams are pretty straight forward... just study her lecture notes and do the readings!

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: Do not take this class. Quizzes and tests are based on material that isn't covered in the lecture notes or the textbook. She expects you to remember silly details that have nothing to do with the chapter or is something that is mentioned once in a short sentence in the textbook. She doesn't respond to many emails. No help given.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: My advice to you: Only take a class with her if you absolutely have to it, otherwise wait until next term. All she does is read the slides, she says something will be on the exam and then it won't and the same happens when she says it won't be on the exam. Don't trust her slides they can be confusing read the text book.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: not a great prof, very boring lectures, very easy to get off topic and makes it hard to concentrate as you get very bored. Does post lectures online though so it is easy to catch up if you miss any work

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: Very nice women but I would avoid taking another class with her. I found that she went off topic a little too much and was too hard to follow during lecture

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: Dr. Foxall's lectures are off-topic and she essentially reads off her slides, which she posts on MLS. She does not have a sense of social appropriateness and shares very personal stories. I stopped showing up and taught myself the course from the textbook. If you read your textbook, you will be fine.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: Kathy may not be the best public speaker, but she is very fair with the material and tests. She summarizes the textbook quite nicely in her slides and you are guaranteed an 80 if you go with just her slides. The above and beyond would be reading the textbook. She also shows videos to further your understanding and she appears to like her job! :)

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: This prof sucks when it comes to giving you the actual info that you need to know. All she does is tell useless (and fake) stories that do not relate that well to lecture material. I pretty much teach myself this course by reading the textbook after each of her lectures because she misses more than half of the info in the textbook. Too emotional

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: Not a very interesting lecturer.  Really boring.  Just read the text.  Doesn't seem to care about teaching or her students.  Maybe she should just do research and leave the teaching to professors who actually care to teach.  The department should consider replacing her with a good teacher for first year students at the very least.

Name: Kathy Foxall
Review: She cried in class every time I went. She tells stories about her traumatic life experiences. Eventually I stopped going and just read the text book.

Name: Jean Eid
Review: I worked my butt off and still failed. I took it again the following semester with another professor, and I got an A. Microeconomics is very interesting and easy to understand with the right professor. Do yourself a HUGE favour, and just take it with another professor. Avoid Jean Eid. I have never received anything lower than an A- until him.

Name: Jean Eid
Review: This program is not worth it just go to bba

Name: Jean Eid
Review: Never have put in more work in a class to have the worst grade I'll receive. Type of prof that makes you want to drop out. Content is not hard to learn, but questions on midterms often include things that we haven't even seen or learned, so avoid if you can, if not GGWP

Name: Jean Eid
Review: Quizzes, notes and slides filled with many typos and errors, almost feels impossible to do well in this class, avoid this prof at all costs

Name: Jean Eid
Review: Ruined my undergrad. Only has midterms and finals that are crazily hard and questions are similar to extension questions. Laughed when we asked for practice questions and extra help for exams, and is super disorganized with no slides so you're forced to read his ugly writing for notes. (you'll laugh at how easy it is to understand with a GOOD prof)

Name: Jean Eid
Review: Dont do it - not only does he act unethically by mocking students for asking questions, his information is riddled with inexcusable typos. Grades on tests are often added up incorrectly. I have noticed that he makes seemingly unclear questions and makes them worth a lot.. then he gives no part marks so you lose like 20 marks out of 100 for small

Name: Jean Eid
Review: Do yourself a favour and AVOID THIS PROFESSOR. Never never never never take his class

Name: Jean Eid
Review: my #1 piece of advice to all econ students at laurier is avoid this prof at all costs, cool and funny guy but his class is a STRUGGGGLE.

Name: Jean Eid
Review: He is pretty cool but he is so bad at teaching, he just assume everyone knows the material pretty well and does not explain much about the math. I heard last year average midterm grades was 38 or something... this year is better but still quite upsetting

Name: Jean Eid
Review: You basically have to teach the course material to yourself but its so hard to do so because all his notes and learning materials have typos in them. I took this class thinking it couldn't be as bad as everyone says it is but IT IS THAT BAD, AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!!!!!!!!!

Name: Jean Eid
Review: worst prof, avoid at all costs!!

Name: Jean Eid
Review: I've never worked so hard at a class to pull off such awful marks. Midterm and exam questions came out of no where with no way to properly prepare. Quizzes are easy enough, assignments get gradually more difficult. Class has a good split up but testing really brings to class average down. Check your grades as marks on tests are often incorrect.

Name: Jean Eid
Review: Difficult teacher, calculus heavy and no calculus preparation for the lesson. Posted very minimal practice questions and homework to which they were also many typos within. Midterm and Final averages hovered around 50. Try your best to get another Prof!

Name: Jean Eid
Review: wouldn't recommend this prof to anyone

Name: Jean Eid
Review: This prof doesn't know his stuff well. Class lecture contents were terrible explained. After finish his class less than 5 people understood his way of doing math. He doesn't care anything about his students and hard to reach. He cancelled two classes and gave the exact scheduled exams with same content. Most exams questions were unexpected! Avoid!!

Name: Jean Eid
Review: The worst and ridiculous prof I have ever had. He is unresponsible for students and did not care students. He does not know how to teach and bad handwriting. No response for email, just SKIP him for every course he teaches

Name: Jean Eid
Review: Jean Eid's EC370 is a tough course for the average student. Many students found his midterms to be brutal. Expect the final question on the exams to be a problem that you haven't seen done in lecture. There is a lot of material crammed into one semester. Shortcut to success: #1. Go to every class. #2. Ignore textbook work. #3. Study his assignments

Name: Jean Eid
Review: Brush up on your calculus before EC270. Prof is a really good guy and teaches the economics well, but is not good at teaching the math. If you know basic calculus you will be fine, but he expects you to already be familiar with the concepts and wont explain them most of the time

Name: Jean Eid
Review: Does not believe in practice questions when micro is essentially a math-heavy course. Tests were poorly designed and not reflective of any of the assignments or quizzes he suggests we use to practice instead (had extension questions with many theories that undergraduates students learning the basics would not understand).

Name: Jean Eid
Review: In the answer to the assignment questions he post in the final review, there are many answers that don't not match the questions. However, he even doesn't check and correct it. Only thing he does is just post it out. Dodge him if you can.

Name: Michael Imort
Review: A true gem

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Realest G I know in all of uni

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Honestly the best professor I have ever had. Even though I didn't get a great grade in the class (due to the labs) I loved his lecture he's an amazing person with an amazing story

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Imort is the kindest prof I had during first year. If you put in effort it is easy to get a good mark. He is very passionate about geography which makes his lectures very interesting. This is a interesting class with a few assignments (marked very easy) no midterm, and an easy final where he gives almost 80% of the questions in lecture

Name: Michael Imort
Review: A great prof with a very clear message. Mastering Geography is a pain but the lab assignments are quite easy and there is no midterm.

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Great prof with a lot of knowledge about the world!

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Great prof! Every lecture I would be disappointed when the class time was up because of how interesting Imort's lectures are. You have to attend class to do well in the course. BUT if you interested in the content you won't want to miss anyways. Not a bird course like many students think it will be.

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Amazing prof and you'll find the lectures fascinating if you're interested in the subject matter. Has some very interesting stories of his humanitarian work in Africa and his time in the military. Online homework due before class twice-weekly, but not too difficult if you can read maps and graphs. No midterm. Most woke prof you will ever have.

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Love him. He's one of the best profs I've had. He's passionate about his discipline, interesting, & very elaborate. Imort's one of those profs who really makes you think...   People think it's a bird course but it's not as effort is needed. Attending his lectures is key if you want a decent mark. Pay attention & take notes.  Imort in 1 word: WOKE

Name: Michael Imort
Review: This is the most woke man you will ever meet

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Reading the textbook is mandatory if not you will struggle in the course.

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Imort was a great prof! He is really passionate about what he is teaching and it shows in his lectures. Take a lot of notes in class, pretty much everything on the final is from his lectures. Labs are pretty easy but a little bit of work. Overall easy class and nice guy got a 12 (probably because of all the extra credit options he gives students)

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Does try his best to keep the lectures interesting, but the information it self is fairly bland (keep in  mind you must be interested in the course and its content or it will be difficult to follow along). Its a MUST to read the textbook and be able to look for the small details for his exams. Textbook based exams.

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Overall I enjoyed the class. If you go in expecting to do nothing and get an A you might be disappointed. Do a bit of work &  show up to lecture and it'll be easy.  The labs are a big chunk that are pretty easy. Final exam covers A LOT of material though.  Watch out because he regularly changes his syllabus Work and you'll be rewarded

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Very boring lectures. Exam was heavy on lecture while everything I studied from the textbook was no on the exam. Lab assignment are easier marks depending on how much work you put into it but very boring. Would not recommend taking the course if you have Imort.

Name: Michael Imort
Review: You should be interested in human geography if you take this course. Attending lectures is important if you want to understand the slides and examples, and there are in-class questions that count for marks, too. Read all of the textbook and know definitions. He's a super nice guy who really cares about what he's teaching!

Name: Michael Imort
Review: GG102 had my interest at first but it got lost in the rather bland lectures. Reading is a must if you want to have a full understanding of the lectures. He randomly does in-class participation questions so reading the textbook in prep for that is important as well. Shows students the respect that they show him generally.

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Dr. Imort's lectures are very interesting but when it comes times for exams you will realize how little he taught you and how much learning you must do on your own.

Name: Michael Imort
Review: In GG102, Dr. Imort is trying to inspire you to pursue geography. So, don't expect the normal lectures about the content. The lecture are fun. If you read the book, you will get an A+ without flinching. If you don't read the book, You will feel like the exam is like nails on a chalkboard.

Name: Michael Imort
Review: Found him quite rude. Very boring class, and extremely hard midterms and exams. Do not expect this to be a bird course, even though it is stated as one. Too harsh on his students, and the material was quite boring.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Helen was an incredible professor! Used no lecture slides or my learning space so it was definitely important to attend class. However, she was an extremely easy marker and definitely passionate about the content she teaches. Will be taking more courses with her for sure!

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: The worst educator I have ever had. Lectures are unstructured, she made up what she was gonna say everyday. Doesn't use slides or my learning space. Only answers your emails when its convenient for her, if you have a problem she probably won't help you. Final exam was ridiculous hard but she added extra time BUT didn't tell anyone. 11/10 thumb down

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Ramirez was an amazing prof. I actually took a class next semester a year up so I could have her again.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Helen is a very passionate professor. She goes on and on every lecture about nonsense that is repetitive. This course will not boost your GPA unless you are a strong passionate writer that has the same beliefs in gender rights as Helen. The whole course is vague: feedback, assignment outlines, etc. Not a good prof, could've been a good course.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Helen is passionate and enthusiastic. She is also opinionated, and any dissent from her point of view or the established narrative will not be accepted. She is however, very caring and also willing to lend an ear to any problems you might have.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Speaks about her own experiences too much and is hard to follow as she talks about many different things at the same time. WS100 is not a bird course as Ramirez marks hard, and the feedback she gives is very vague and confusing.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Ramirez does nothing but speak about her own personal made-up experiences all lecture every lecture, she does not prepare you for the final examination at all, and everything is based on books that are mind-numbing. She also provides no feedback on how to improve grades moving forward and gives most people B's throughout the semester. 0 Stars.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Very unclear about what is expected.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Did not enjoy lectures with this professor what so ever. She spent an hour and 20 minutes every lecture talking about whatever popped into her head, no structure what so ever. Gives very vague instructions for papers and group projects. Gives very unclear feedback on paper. Heard she was an "easy marker" and I can assure you she is not.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Dr. Ramirez makes me dread going to class to be honest. From her extremely quiet voice that causes me to doze off during class, to her completely irrelevent topics of discussion. I only go to class in case any important info is covered (which we haven't really), since she does not post any slides online, let alone during class. Would not recommend.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: She does not project her voice whatsoever. Probably the quietest and most uninteresting lectures i've ever been in. Her voice puts me to sleep and she uses no visual aids to help with note taking. No powerpoints. Speaks Quietly. Makes me hate coming to class becuse no slides are posted online and I have to come if I want any idea of key topics.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: She was not specific in what she wanted for essays and her feedback was only ever a sentence long. You don't need to go to class to get a good mark. She is pretty boring to listen to as all she does is lecture with zero slides

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Thinking about taking WS100 as a "bird course"? Don't. 3 hour lectures where Ramirez talks (no PPTS) about topics not related to the final exam. She also talks very quietly; hard to hear/ understand her. 2 essays (have to read books), one group written project + discussion with her, and one final essay all worth a lot and she's a hard marker.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: The prof does not say "refer to the syllabus" since it does not provide any clear instructions yet does not clarify in class either. I originally attended class for the 5% attendance but gave up halfway through because the lectures are 3 hours long and unrelated to the tested material.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Helen Ramirez does not use powerpoint or any visual aid while lecturing. She has no planned outline for each lecture, she just sits on her desk and talks about her life and stories she has heard. Godlike taking meaningful notes when the teaching style is not teaching. Helen made me hate this course.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Absolutely incredible professor. She has opened my eyes and brought so many issues to the forefront. The topics discussed in class are tough, but well worth listening to. You will learn A LOT if you take this class. She is incredibly inspirational, and willing to help students in any way she can. Amazing lectures, thought provoking classes. Love!

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Lectures never followed the required readings, Ramirez was never on topic. She lacked guidance for assignments and was unclear when it came to grading and requirements. Exam was tough, the essay topics were about the readings which we never discussed in class. Easy marker and open to many ideas for paper making it an easy A. Not a heavy course load

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: The worst class ever. There is absolutely no structure for this class. Ramirez gives no instruction or feedback but expects you to do well. The lectures are awful. She uses no slides or powerpoint and rambles on about absolutely nothing. The lectures also don't correspond with the terrible text we have to read. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS!!!

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: She is the worst instructor I have ever had. she shows up and talks on tangents for 1.5 hours. she doesn't use slides or has notes. She doesn't use MLS and speaks quietly and doesn't care that students in the back cant hear her. she doesn't provide clear expectations for assignments and overall I suffer through this lecture twice a week.

Name: Helen Ramirez
Review: Dr. Ramirez has opened my eyes on the topics that we have discussed in class and has made Women and Gender Studies very enjoyable for me! I will definitely be taking more of her classes in the future

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Talks way too fast, mumbles and is rude.

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Professor Haxell is extremely knowledgeable and very helpful, but you have to ask for the help, he won't seek you out. His marking is very difficult but appropriate for the education level.

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Haxell is a brilliant guy. But man.. are his tests ever hard. Not very many evaluations, so the tests are worth a huge amount of your grade. Most people seem unable to complete the tests because they are so long. Very long short answer portions, and usually an essay question at the end. Know your stuff and study extensively if you want to pass.

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: talks to fast, confusing, boring

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Terrible prof. He's too fast and mumbles on about necessary things. He also doesn't post anything online which is a hassle for students when trying to figure out where they stand in the course. The course is interesting and he is a smart prof but he needs to slow down and get to the point. Organized slides would be appreciated as well.

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: I hated Haxell when I first had class with him. I thought he went too fast and didnt care about his students. This changed when I started taking charge of my own education. He expects alot but he is one of the only profs I actually have  learned from. He is also really good at explaining things; go to his office hours

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Does move pretty fast, and knows his stuff. I wouldn't consider myself the smartest guy out there but I worked hard and studied what he taught in class and did my readings and got a A-. His exams are tough but fair and if you study properly you will do well.

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Haxell goes Very fast in lectures, making kt hard to keep up notes wise, but as long as you take decent notes, you're golden. his exams are difficult, and you will go to the literal last second trying to finish, but he is a fair marker, so if you put in the effort you will do fine. If you ask questions after class, he is always willing to help you.

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Marks are fair and if you put time and effort into things that does reflect. However he has GOT to slow down in lectures. Fires slides off like a machine gun and talks a mile a minute which makes it difficult to keep up... on the bright side he loves to see you in office hours to explain what you didn't understand in class.

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Super hard marker, all exams are long and short answer and he's looking for REALLY specific answers. If you don't give him exactly what he's looking for you won't get marks. But if you're stugling with the class he's open to help you during office hours and will make time outside of that if needed

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Favourite prof at Laurier for Archaeology. He is hard but if you study the lecture notes the way he has written them you will do great on exams. By far one of the most knowledgable profs in what he teaches. You will definitely learn a lot in his courses!

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: He is a really smart teacher and while he expect you to be able to keep up you learn quite a bit in his class and he is really helpful if you go in for help!

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Haxell hated me b/c I was probably the worst student ever, yet overall he is in different to his students. weather he hates you or not, he will mark fair.He is harsh, hates questions, goes way too fast, gives too many readings. trick is copy all the slides, and just study off class notes instead of readings. you'll do well! good luck

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Unprofessionally rude, He choose favorites and is partial in his marking. Doesn’t take time to explain concepts and bombards students with information which rarely if ever gets remembered after the course. He talks and changes slides quickly and expects too much out of students on his 1.5 hour exams (which many do not finish or are forced to rush).

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Haxell is actually a really good prof if you think about it. Ya you have to work really hard to get a good grade, and I have and I have gotten really good marks like A- and A's. In terms of getting your money's worth, he crams a lot of information into each so at least you're learning.

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Great professor! He knows his stuff for sure! He is also great to talk to but his classes can be hard. I am happy I finished with a B but if you do the work and keep up with the lectures you should  be fine.

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: He is a great teacher! keeper me awake for a three hour long lecture every time. His test and exams are very hard and he is a very hard marker, but if you pay attention and study you will do fine.  He is a very good teacher and very knowledgeable  in his field.

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Oh man. Its like, He hates you when you don't understand, then you ask for him to clarify, and he hates you more. I enjoy his jokes, but thats about it.

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: Complete Napoleon complex.  The only reason he can fill a 3 hour class is because he says something a complicated way, then says "in other words" and then says it in an equally as complicated but different way.  Prof Haxell doesn't teach, but he tells.  Avoid him if you can.

Name: Jonathan Haxell
Review: extremelly high energy, may have a little bit of a napoleon complex but he is honestly a good guy and a passionate teacher

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Ziss notes and book are useless. His classes are based on the slides. For the assignments you need to think a lot since the notes are not good and the book has nothing. For the exams the marks were very bad midterm but made the final easier. His office hours are excellent and he knows what he is teaching. He just needs to improve material.

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Ziss is an animal. He is great at reading lecture slides. Always ripping lessons out in the atrium. Gave us a massive boost at the end.

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Fantastic prof. Does everything well. Anyone who disagrees is a spoiled, spoon-fed incel with unrealistic expectations. Doesn't get nearly the credit he deserves. A++

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Terrible lectures, slides are horrible and just filled with text. Made the course so much worse than it should've been although the DSM's and pearson homework were semi-helpful.

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Was a good prof, with very good lecture notes. Class content was somewhat difficult to understand but his notes were clear, textbook was available and he was often available for help in Laz outside of class. Quite a few online pearson homeworks to do but they were helpful easy marks, Exams (final + 2 midterms weighted very highly (80% total).

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Worst prof Ive ever had. Im an A grade student and I found this class extremely challenging. After approaching Ziss about my mark he was not kind at all. I would NEVER take his class again. I also wouldnt recommend him to anyone.

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Easy class, literally just supply and demand. Great prof.

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Ziss is a decent prof if you put the time into the class. He is available for many hours outside of class and seems to care about the students. EC120 is a hard course to teach, and if you study his lessons and understand the content you will be fine for the evaluations (thats what I did). Seems like a intelligent prof but should teach higher years

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: half of the students failed all the exams

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: nice guy... tries hard to get along with students... hard class... hard content... not like high school economics... nice ell curve tho...

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Super sweet guy, tries his best to teach everyone the material. He really cares about his students and wants to see them succeed.

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Best prof at Laurier hands down. Easy 11/12 if you study his mock tests. Hilarious guy

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Steffen Ziss has made microeconomics extremely difficult. Our class is failing and he has to bump everyones mark to compensate for this. He only reads off of the slide deck and when he does draw a diagram or write something it isn't legible. Good luck!

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Zissy read off slides and could not explain concepts. I cannot believe how much I'm paying to NOT teach me economics. I tried learning from the textbook but he tests in odd ways-watch out! He loves multiple choice and students tears.

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: An amazing and sweet guy always there to help.

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Not gonna lie I used to hate Ziss after the 2 midterms that had failing averages, but he has redeemed himself by bumping everyone 2 GPAs

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Really cares about his students. He has tons of office hours and he is willing to talk to students one on one if they have any questions. Midterms were hard but are being compensated by a 2 GPA increase.

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: Great semester. Ziss goes above and beyond with office hours and his "MAMMOTH" review session which detailed everything on the exam. If Ziss can stand for 10 hours on his day off without a bathroom break then you can put a couple hours of studying in and go over the mock midterm. No reason to not be successful in the course. Ziss deserves a raise.

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: its pretty hard

Name: Steffen Ziss
Review: His midterms and the final are based off of his lecture content only and his lectures do not make any sense. He teaches as if we have taken this course already, and all you can do is hope for that bell curve.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Ken Jackson is a G. His lectures were pretty in-depth and he was the first prof I've seen to make use of clickers properly. He does give a lot of homework, but it can only help your final grade; 21% of your EC120 final grade was almost guaranteed because you could re-do homework. Great office hours. Recommend switching into his class if you can.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Ken Jackson gives lots of opportunities to increase your grade through the graded homework, this work also helps you understand the content a lot better.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Ken Jackson is the best professor, hands down.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Ken is an amazing prof. He gives credit for minor assessments to help you learn the material and improve your mark.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Dr. Jackson is truly a great professor who cares about all of his students. He keeps Econ engaging with clickers and good lectures and it isn't very hard to do well in the class if you put in the work. Midterms and exams are all based on practice quizzes, never any surprises.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Amazing amazing prof. Jackson made the transition from high school to university much easier.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Very caring attitude towards students, wants to see them do well. Offers lots of office hours and additional support. A lot of homework and review quizzes to help you master concepts and pass the midterms. Would highly recommend as a prof and would definitely have him again if the opportunity arises

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Easily one of the best profs I've ever had. He is very caring and genuinely wants to see his students succeed. His lectures are usually fun and intriguing with all the clickers. Midterms and final is fair and usually lecture-based. Overall, an amazing, caring prof. Hope I have him again in upper years.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: A real solid dude. I didn't attend half the classes and ended with a 10 almost an 11. The lectures I did attend, he teaches very well. Provides you with all the resources you need to be successful.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Ken is a very good professor. Although his teaching style in lectures wasn't the best for my learning style, his office hours came to great use. He is very patient and good at explaining one on one. You can tell that he truly has a passion for Econ and for teaching. He genuinely cares for his students.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Ken is the best prof ever. He just gets it, he gets us. He does so much for his students. Econ can be a hard concept to follow however Ken makes it a lot easier. Hands down my favourite professor.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: just an absolute beauty, best prof at Laurier

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: THE GOAT

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Ken Jackson is an excellent prof. The way his class is structured if you complete the homework you get a free 21% and by doing that it's literally impossible to fail. He gives you the old midterms before you do your midterm too. I've heard he's pretty helpful in office hours too but I've never had to go because I read the textbook which makes it ez

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: no doubt the best prof on earth. go to office hours ask questions and you cant fail

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Can't go wrong with K-Jax. Homework and study modules are graded. Going to class isn't really necessary, however, clicker questions are vital for the 21% you get for completing them (+ HW, DSM, online quizzes w unlimited attempts). Easy to talk to and is always available for interaction.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Great guy! If you show up to class and take notes, you'll get a good grade.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Daddy of Economics.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Great guy! Ken is the econ god, dont take any first year econ course that he does not teach.

Name: Ken Jackson
Review: Maybe much more acceptable for others, but for me it is hard to understand what he is talking about. He is a nice guy, but his course is hard.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Top 2 profs ive ever had in waterloolaurier, the other being my calc 2 prof.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Francine explains things really well and she is always there for you if you need extra help. She is an amazing professor.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Not as bad of a prof as everyone says. It's a very tough course though. If you go to class and do the assigned homework you'll survive. Final exam was a huge grade dropper. But as a prof she teaches the material well.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Dr. Vinette is a hilarious prof and super nice once you get to know her. see loves to simplify math by putting things in "clouds/flowers" and wants to help her students.midterm was fair but her 5% test and exam were super super challenging. loved having her though. accent was had at first but u adapt. seems scary at first but is very nice at end

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Dr. Vinette was such a great pro. She was super funny and always used silly analogies to describe math like "clouds" or flowers. Her accent was tricky at first but you get use to it. the midterm was fair but the exam was very very challenging and the 5% test was also too challenging. Overall if you wok hard, you can pass and do semi well:)

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Failed the class the first time. Retook it this year and passed. She does read these reviews. Very strict prof, but means well. Her lectures are pretty tough to follow. She often skips steps making it more difficult than necessary. She is super nice 1 on 1 though. Really does want you to succeed! Keep up with homework or you won't stand a chance.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Always shows up to class late, at first its really hard to understand her through her accent and she growls at people during class. She's an absolute nutcase, I highly recommend not taking her class.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: She is the worst teacher. She is always late for class. She isn't interactive. She always makes mistakes in examples. She wastes time in class yelling at any student even whispering. She isn't clear, her lectures have no logical flow. She is incredibly inconsistent and forgetful. You have to learn the entire course by yourself.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Occasionally makes mistakes when doing practice problems on the board, is not always clear and can sometimes seem condescending. That being said, she really wants you to do well but you have to show that you are willing to put the work in for that A+. She's more helpful one on one than in lecture. Not as bad as everyone says.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Taking this course for the second time with her. I dropped it the first time around, I found her to be really quick with explanations and made many mistakes during examples. Second time around much better, much easier also taking it in the summer, she is much more laid back during lectures. Also, very helpful if you go for one one one help.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: She can be hard to understand at times but is very passionate and helpful.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Thick accent. Hard to understand. Made many mistakes in her examples on the board. There were multiple LAN parties in her class while she was attempting to teach (despite her attempts to stop them). Will attempt to fail you if you show that you can do something that she can't (like doing differentiation in your head).

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: GET OUT NOW! The worst prof I've ever had, inconsistent teaching style and her marking makes no sense, had to teach the course to myself.  This is coming from an A+ math student.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: She goes way too fast. Doesn't let you take down proper notes and only does examples without explaining what she is doing. TRY TO TAKE THE COURSE WITH SOMEONE ELSE

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: For calculus, she did a fine job lecturing, and was friendly. She does make a lot of mistakes on the board / in examples though.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: She is a good professor, the midterm was almost identical to homework questions, she drops hints for the final, so it is important to go to class. She helps students and is understanding. Do your homework, pay attention and you're good.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Extremely inconsistent teaching style. She regularly completes 10 minute long examples and then erases it because it's wrong. If a student was late to her lecture she centred them out to the entire class. Did I mention she was late to every single class? She is not an efficient University teacher.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Terrible Teacher, doesn't even know how to answer the questions she asks on her tests and exams.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Interesting personality, average teaching ability, but tries hard and display a strong interest in the success of the students.

Name: Francine Vinette
Review: Can't understand her. Makes numerous mistakes in her examples. You learn more from MathXL and the labs. Went into the final with an A+, came out of the exam with a C. She claimed that because she couldn't easily do a certain problem in her head and I hadn't show enough work on that question I must have cheated on the entire exam and gave me a 0.

Name: Loren King
Review: Amazing prof who can make dry content exciting. Also this man has seen every movie so be ready for him to recite lines in lecture.

Name: Loren King
Review: Amazing guy, not a great teacher. He goes on crazy rants and I have no understanding of the actual material. He also doesn't use slides so the lectures are all over the place and that much more confusing. I promise you will leave lectures confused and not gaining much knowledge. Like I said though, really good person and he has a good heart!

Name: Loren King
Review: He's a jokes guy who really cares about the material he teaches. He gives really easy assignments and only cares that you show that you're grappling with the material. Also, no exams.

Name: Loren King
Review: All he does it talk about how his wife and his children are great. MIT, Harvard, how superior he is to everyone and wastes 20-30 minutes of each class posturing and seeking validation for his "accomplishments." I wanted to love this class but he totally destroyed the content. Take PO350 with anyone BUT Loren King.

Name: Loren King
Review: Shout out to Loren King for being an absolute gem. His grading scheme is so great and he is very flexible about deadlines. He gives you great feedback and advice, and is one of the nicest professors I have ever met!

Name: Loren King
Review: He was amazing, I really appreciated his feedback. I did not even realize how well I could do in a theory course.

Name: Loren King
Review: King makes the best out of the driest material. He's super funny, and even though lecture can seem long some days, he definitely knows how to keep students awake, despite his tendency to go on tangents. The assignments were fair and required students to come to class to fully grasp the material. Not only is this man brilliant, he's also super hot!

Name: Loren King
Review: He's an amazing professor, he definitely gets of tangents and can be kind of confusing in class but is very clear about his expectations. I really love his lectures, even though I could do without the cold-calling. Absolutely love  him, his projects are fair, and he is helpful if you are confused. He really tries to get you to think! Plus he's hot.

Name: Loren King
Review: Awesome! He is hilarious and talks about fun stuff and things with course material.

Name: Loren King
Review: King is honestly the man. I've had him for more classes than any other professor in my university career, and he's probably in my top 3 favorite profs. The smartest guy, really understanding with deadlines, helpful, and gives great lectures. Sometimes he's a little hard to follow- but if you pay attention and ask questions you'll kill his classes.

Name: Loren King
Review: He's a smart guy, but he's all over the place and he never gives strict deadlines which is annoying.

Name: Loren King
Review: What can I say about Dr. King. This was a mandatory class for me, and all Poli-Sci students, and he made it nearly impossible. His lectures were incoherent and most learning was done via the TAs. He later posted a rant on our online learning portal complaining of how lazy students were being.

Name: Loren King
Review: He is honestly the man, his lectures are super interesting as he does his best to provide high energy.

Name: Loren King
Review: GREAT prof! My favorite at Laurier. The only downside is if you aren't already interested in the subject matter, you may be a little lost. But otherwise, incredible.

Name: Loren King
Review: I took PO235 last semester and found Dr. King's class to be very difficult and hard to succeed in however, this past semester was a huge turn around as it was clear Dr.  King was truly interested in helping students work to the best of their ability and he made a conscious effort to be more clear and concise regarding the material. Bravo, Dr. King!

Name: Loren King
Review: such a cool guy, yes he goes on tangents but he has an amazing grasp of the material he teaches and his passion makes you want to learn. He is very approachable so talking to him if you have any questions is a good option

Name: Loren King
Review: Probably the worst prof at WLU that I've had... completely incoherent lectures, no one ever goes, talks more about star trek than anything useful to my knowledge, all over the map, totally overwhelming... do not take a class with him unless its mandatory (like several of his are for me, unfortunately).

Name: Loren King
Review: Lectures are literally all over the place. He is entertaining and interesting. Grades fairly, seemingly, and doesn't surprise you with anything. Just do the readings and make sure you understand and it'll all be ok. It is incredibly difficult to take lecture notes because of the incoherence, but if you understand the readings you'll be fine.

Name: Loren King
Review: Lectures are clear if you pay attention, which isn't hard because he is very entertaining. I find with his papers if you suck at writing papers and are used to getting C's you'll get a B- and if you are used to getting A's you'll get a B+. When in doubt on his papers, just regurgitate what he said in class, he will love you for it.

Name: Loren King
Review: best prof at Laurier

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: Professor McKenzie is, no joke, the best professor I've ever had. I jump at the opportunity to take one of her classes. Yes, you'll have to put in work, but I generally find her assignments to be fun and unique - not just essay after essay. I can tell she truly cares about the material she teaches. I enjoy her teaching style and demeanour.

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: Amazing course if you're looking for ancient history but bored of Greek and Roman. Lectures are heavy but fascinating. She obviously wants students to do well but expects you to work for it. Really great in office hours - go to see her when you're writing the papers!

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: I found her lectures very lengthy and hard to follow, and her general persona to seem quite rude. She was not very clear when it came to assignments and despite the class being a first year class, she acted as though it were more senior.

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: Interesting lectures, but a ton of info thrown at you in a short time. Take notes very quickly. Slides are unhelpful. The articles we read were a real mixed bag. Some were great and some were awful. Very dry and sarcastic sense of humour. Don't ask questions about something she already answered; her response will be unkind.

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: Mrs. Mackenzie is great, her classes are tough and shes a fair marker. But show up to class, be an active participant and youll see how great her classes can be

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: One of the best profs this school has to offer. Insightful, caring, funny, and delivers amazing lectures. Do not show up late and don't pull your phone out and you will love any class with her. I've also taken ML100 and ML101 with her and can recommend those with her as well

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: Really great lectures. Liked that she talked about archaeology too. Readings were tough but the exam was fair and I loved the blog entry assignment.

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: I LOVE ancient history but I could not stand this class. Her lectures were dry and she literally sat there reading off a long paper she wrote and barely referenced the slides. Every time I tried to ask her a question she would look at me like I was stupid and it gave me to much anxiety to speak up in class or in tutorials

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: Dr. McKenzie cares about her students and knows her material inside and out yet she still asks way too much of the UNDERGRADUATE students. I do not think she realizes that we are in other courses, and/or maybe she does but doesn't care. The assignments that she gives start extremely simple and then with no warning jump to near impossible.

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: I had prof Mckenzie for 2 courses last semester and although she was quite intimidating, she was very caring towards her students. Easy marks from participating in the tutorials, also helps with the final exam.

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: Fantastic lectures and overall a really good teacher, she gave lots of opportunities to prove myself. Excited to have her again next semester.

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: Don't go into this class thinking it's a bird course just because it's Harry Potter. But if you like history and the Middle Ages and you're willing to put in the work you'll get a lot out of it. She's tough but not unreasonable and she definitely knows the material. Much less intimidating in office hours!

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: Hard prof but clearly cares about her students. Show up to lectures, participate in tutorials and put a decent amount of effort into your work and you'll be fine. She did have random mood swings though which was intimidating and was unpredictable in her marking, she either marked really hard or really easy. The course was 99% medieval studies 1% HP

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: Professor McKenzie is an icon. She cares about her students so much, she just showed up to proctor the final exam after being HIT BY A CAR. You should respect and fear her.

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: Professor McKenzie was an amazing teacher who despite being a little intimidating at first, shows off her caring, helpful and funny characteristics. She makes class interesting with showing videos and occasionally doing activities in class. Would recommend as she does care for her students and their marks. Just make sure to pay attention!

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: Not at all what I was expecting from a Harry Potter course but really cool. She basically shows you what from the middle ages inspired Rowling and how Rowling did her own thing with it. Lectures can be a little heavy but it's interesting enough that I don't have trouble paying attention. She's super nice too if you go talk to her in office hours.

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: So boring

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: Amazing professor!! This is my 7th course with Professor McKenzie! She can be tough on her students, but that is because she wants to see us succeed. This course was about medievalism in video games, something that alone is a real treat to Wilfrid Laurier, let alone having Professor McKenzie teach it. Talk to her, she loves hearing from students!!

Name: Alicia McKenzie
Review: I absolutely loved this course. I learned so much about ancient history that I never knew existed, and my mark on the paper is way higher than it would have been if Mckenzie hadn't encouraged us to bring in outlines so she could give us feedback. I may not be planning to major in history but I'm for sure going to be taking more courses with her.
